Aajkal college mein admission milna himalaya ki chotiyan chadhne se zyaada mushkil ho gaya hai.
Hamare dhong bhare dimaag mein kuch sujhaav aaye jo ab aap ke saamne hain.
Padhiye aur padhaiye ye raaste apne doston ko.
1.
Sa-parivar college mein jaakar bawaal macha do.
Jab tak do chaar news channel waale na aa jaayen bilkul na hilna.
Yaad rakho ek baar ye khabar akhbaar athva tv mein aa gayi, to college ka principal khud tumhare darwaje par aayega tumhara admision karne.
Keh dena media se ki college ne tumko vaada kiya tha admission ka.
2.
College ke principal ke ghar doodh-dahi ityaadi khaane peene ki vastuen lekar pahunch jaao.
Aur unke ghar ke kaam-kaaj mein haath batao.
Yaad rakho kuch paane ke liye aajkal bahut kuch khona padhta hai.
3.
Uppar wale upaay se zyaada achha ye tarika hai.
Aapko jis college mein admission chahiye uske principal ke ghar par aap 6 mahine pehle se hi naukar ban jao – naukri kar lo.
Din mein 2-3 ghante jhadoo, pocha aur bartan hi to karne padenge.
Lekin uska fal tumhe milna hi milna hai.
4.
College ke principal aur dusre shikshakon ke bachhon se dosti kar lo.
Aur unhein apni dosti mein unhe itna paagal kar do ki wo tumhare bina ek pal bhi na gujaar saken.
Baad mein apne admision ka kaam bhi unhi ke sar daal do.
5.
Principal ki shrimati se mel jol badha lo.
Unka koi bhi bahar ka kaam ho to jaakar karke aao.
Yaad rakho har mard ki gardhan uski bivi ke haathon mein hoti hai.
Lekin koi anuchit kaarya na kar baithna, jisse humein bhi sharminda hona pade.
6.
College mein jaakar ek gang bana lo.
Jiska naam Dhongi gang hona chahiye.
Aur hamare tarah vastra dhaaran karke bhook hadtaal par baith jaao.
Bhook hadtaal sirf naam ki honi chahiye.
Chupke se pizza wageraah khate rehna.
Jab tak admision na ho jaaye ye nautanki jaari rakhna.
7.
Principal ko bata do ki tum kiske shishya ho.
Hamara naam sunte hi uski pairon tale zameen khisak jaayegi.
Hahakaar mach jaayega samast paathshaala mein.
Palak jhapakte hi tumhara daakhila nischit hai.
8.
Principal ki pichhli zindagi ki chhan been karo.
Pata karo ki unka kisi ke saath prem sambandh tha kya jis ke baare mein kisiko bhanak bhi nai hai.
Agar kuch baatein maloom pade to principal se keh dena, admission de do nahi to soch lo.
9.
Principal ke pair pakad lo.
Jab tak wo daakhila dene ke liye haan na bol de pair bilkul na chhodna.
Chahe wo gir bhi jaayen to bhi apne kaam mein date rehna.
10.
Kuch mahino pehle se hi sabhi gurujano ke parivaar se mel jol badha lo.
Tumhe abhi se maalum hona chahiye ki tumhare ank kitne kam aane waale hain.
Jitna zyaada meljol badhega, baad mein tumhe utni hi aasani hogi.
11.
Faaltu ke tareekon ko padhne aur apna bahumoolya samay vyarth karne se behtar hai ki aaj se hi kathin parishram karna aarambh kar do.
Agar abhi se padhai mein dhyaan doge to kabhi kisi ke aage haath na failaana padega.

vichar kare!
Ishu Maseeh ke Praeshchit ko apnaane se, tum ek baar phir apne dhaarmik saahas ko aaj bada sakte ho agar tum sunne aur amal mein laane ki ichcha rakhte ho.
Ek(1) se le ke das(10) ke beech, aap Parmeshwar ke saamne apne dhaarmik saahas ki tulna kaise karoge? Kya aapke paas ek niji gawahi hai ki aapka vartamaan ka bhent ek Antim-din Sant ke mein paryaapt hai anant jiwan paane ke liye? Kya aap maante hai ki Swarg ke Pita aapse prasann hai? Kya baate mann mein aaenge agar abhi se ek minat mein Uddhaarkarta ke saath aapka niji vaartalaabh ho jaaye? Kya paap, niraashaaen, aur galtiyaan tumhare apne aap ki drishti mein hai, ya phir aap khushi se intazaar karenge? Kya aap Unke aankhon mein dekhoge ya Unse nazre churaaoge? Kya aap darwaaze par khade rahoge ya Unki or badoge?
Jab bhi shatru tumhare jaise apurn magar parishrami Santon ko tumhare apne aur prem se bhare Parmeshwar mein vishwaas se alag nahin kar sakta, tab woh ek dusht chaal chalta hai taaki tumhare aur Parmeshwar ke beech dooriya paeda ho jaaye.
Shatru jaanta hai ki Maseeh mein vishwaas—woh vishwaas jo lagataar komal daya aur prabhaoshaali chamatkaar utpann karta rehta hai—ek niji saahas ki tarah hai ki tum sahi chunne ki koshish kar rahe ho.
Is kaaran woh tumhare mein tumhe jhut batlaaega —woh jhut jisse Swarg ke Pita tumse niraash ho jaaye, ki tum Praeshchit ke ashirvaadon ke laayak nahin ho, ki koshish karne mein koi faaeda nahin, ki sabhi log tumse behtar hai, ki tum ayogye ho, aur ek hazaar usi tarah ke baatein.
Jab tak tum in awaazon ko mauka doge tumhare aatma ko dhire dhire nasht karne mein, tum sachchi saahas se Parmeshwar ke singhaasan ki or nahin badoge.
Tum jo bhi karoge, jis kisi bhi cheez ke liye prarthna karoge, jo bhi chamatkaar ki aashaaen hongi, wahan hamesha paryaapt aatma-shanka hoga tumhare vishwaas ko kam karne ke liye—Parmeshwar mein tumhare vishwaas ko hi nahin, parantu tumhare saahas khud mein bhi ho.
Susamachaar ko is tarah se jine mein koi maza nahin hai, aur na to yeh bahut swasthpurn hai.
Sabse zaroori, yeh to ekdam anavashyak hai! Badalne ka nirnay tumhara hai—aur sirf tumhara hai.
Mai cheh upyogi sujhaao baatna chahata hoon jiska, agar paalan kiya jaaye, to saare bure aawaaz gum ho jaaenge aur tumhe phirse woh shantipurn ashwaasan aur dhaarmik saahas milega jo agar tum chaaho to paa sakte ho.
Ek (1) se-le- kar- das (10) ke beech ki jo bhi tulna tum ne apne liye ki thi, ab Ishu Maseeh ke Praeshchit ko apnaane se, tum ek baar phir apne dhaarmik saahas ko aaj bada sakte ho agar tum sunne aur amal mein laane ki ichcha rakhte ho.
Mai nidarta purwak bolunga, is aasha ke saath ki sudhaar aa sake na ki bura lage.
1.
Apne dhaarmik sukh ki zimmedaari lijiye.
Anye logon ya apne paristhitiyon ko dosh dena band karo, safaai dena band kijiye, aur vajah nikaalna ki aap kyun aagyaakaari nahin ban paa rahein hai band kijiye.
Maano ki tum “shareer se swatantra ho” aur “swatantra ho swatantrata aur anant jiwan chunne ke liye” (2 Nephi 2:27).
Prabhu tumhare paristhitiyon ko bhali bhati jaanta hai, magar Woh yeh bhi jaanta hai ki chunn lete ho ki susuamachaar ko purn rup se na jiya jaae.
Agar yeh baat hai, to utna imaandaar raho ki tum woh keh sako, aur apne hi paristhitiyon ke andar tum nipunn hone ki koshish karo.
Dhaarmik saahas badta hai jab tum apne dhaarmik sukh zimmedaari lete ho Ishu Maseeh ka Praeshchit har din apnaane se.
2.
Apne shaaririk sukh ki zimmedaari lijiye.
Tum shareer aur aatma ke bane ho (dekhiye D&C 88:15).
Apne aatma ka poshan karna aur shareer ko thukraana, jo ki ek mandir hai, aksar aatmik takraao aur aatma sammaan ko utpann karega.
Agar tum mote ya patle ho, agar tum apne shareer se na khush ho aur uske baare mein kuch kar sakte ho, to kijiye! Elder Russell  M.
Nelson ne sikhlaya ki hamein "apne shareer ko ek mandir ke tarah sawaarna chahiye" aur hamein "apne khaane peene par dhyaan dena aur paryaapt kasrat karna chahiye"(“We Are Children of God,”Ensign, Nov.
1998, 87; Liahona, Jan.
1999, 103).
Pradhaan Boyd K.
packer ne sikhlaya "ki hamare aatma aur shareer is tarah se jude hai ki hamara shareer hamare mann ka hatiyaar ban jaata hai aur hamare charitra ka buniyaad"(“The (“The Instrument of Your Mind and the Foundation of Your Character” [Church Educational System fireside, Feb.
2, 2003], 2; speeches.byu.edu).
Isliye, samajhdaari barte aap apne khaane par aur khaaskar apne khaane ki maatra par aur yeh jaane ki apka shareer kitna kasrat seh sakta hai.
Agar aap shaaririk rup se tandurust hai, aaj nirnay kijiye ki aap apne shareer ko sambhaalenge aur ek sahi, lambe-samay ka kasrat yojna banaye aur ek swasth bhojan yojna bhi banaye, apni chamtaaon ko dhyaan mein rakh kar.
Dhaarmik saahas badh jaata hai jab tumhara aatma, Uddhaarkarta ke madad se, puri tarah se zimmedaar ho jaata hai tumhare swabhaawik prakriti ke purush ya mahila ke.
3.
Aagyakaarita ko apne jiwan ka bhaag banaye use pure hriday se apna kar.
Yeh maane ki tum Parmeshwar se nahin prem kar sakte bina Unke aagyaaon ko bhi pyaar karke.
Uddhaarkarta ka star saaf aur aasaan hai: “Yadi tum mujhse prem rakhte ho, to meri aagyaaon ko maanoge” (John 14:15).
Thoda aagyaakarita thode hi ashirvaad laata hai, aur kuch bura chunna bajae kuch bahut bura ke phir bhi galat chunaao kaha jaata hai.
Tum ek buri film nahi dekhkar shudh nahin mehsoos kar sakoge kyunki tumne ek bahut buri film nahin dekhi.
Kuch aagyaaon ko achchi tarah nibhaane se anye aagyaaon ka thukraana maaf nahin kiya jaata.
Abraham Lincoln ne sahi kaha: “Jab mai achcha karta hoon mai achcha mehsoos karta hoon, jab mai bura karta hoon mai bura mehsoos karta hoon” (in William H.
Herndon and Jesse William Weik, Herndon’s Lincoln: The True Story of a Great Life, 3 vols.
[1889], 3:439).
Iske saath saath, sahi cheezein karein sahi vajahon ke liye.
Prabhu, jo “jo ek hriday aur ek ichchapurn mann chahata hai” (D&C 64:34) aur jo “dil ke baaton ko jaanta aur samajhta hai” (D&C 33:1), jaanta hai kyun tum girjaghar jaate ho—kya tum sirf wahan shareer mein hote ho ya sach much araadhna kar rahe ho.
Tum Raviwaar ko “O Babylon, O Babylon, [I] bid thee farewell” gaaoge aur phir kuch chanon baad uska anand le sakoge (“Ye Elders of Israel,” Hymns, no.
319).
Yaad rakho ki dhaarmik cheezon ko halke se lene se khushi nahin praapt hoti hai.
Girjaghar aur punahsthaapit susamachaar ko apna pura jiwan banaao, na sirf apne baahari ya dikhaawe ka jiwan.
Aaj chunna ki tum kiski sewa karoge sirf kehne ki baat hai—jabtak tum usi tarah se jeene na lago (dekhiye Joshua 24:15).
Dhaarmik saahas badta hai jab tum sach mein koshish karoge, sahi vajah ke liye, ek samarpit jiwan jeene ke liye tumhare sabhi kamzoriyon ko lekar!
4.
Ekdam nipunn ho jaao achchi tarah aur jald se pashchataap karne mein.
Kyunki Ishu Maseeh ka Praeshchit tatkaal hota hai, tumhe chaubiso ghante use karte rehna hai, kyunki uske ashirvaad kabhi khatm nahin hote.
Ishu Maseeh ke Praeshchit aur pashchataap ko ayse apnaao jaise Mahaan Daactar(Ishu Maseeh) ke aadesh par har din tum dawaaiya lete ho.
Aadat daal lo lagataar, khushi se, anand ke saath pashchataap karne ka taaki yeh tumhare jiwan guzaarne ka chunaao ban jaaye.
Aysa karne mein, dhyaan dein ki tum samay na barbaad karo, aur auron ka intazaar na karo tumhe aashwaasan dene ke liye.
Apna dhyaan Uddhaarkarta par tikaa kar, yeh parwaah karein ki Woh tumhare baare mein kya sochta hai, aur parinaam aane do.Dhaarmik saahas badhti hai jab tum swanye ichcha aur anandit hokar apne chote aur bade, paapon ka pashchataap karte hai, jis samay woh hota hai Ishu Maseeh ke Praeshchit ko apnaane se.
5.
Maaf karne mein ekdam chatur ho jaao.
“Mai, Prabhu, unhein maaf karunga jise mai chaahun, magar tumhare liye zaroori hai sabhi manushye ko maaf karna” (D&C 64:10).
Har ek insaan, har cheez ko, har samay, maaf karna ya koshish karna, taaki tumhare jiwan mein maafi aaye.
Dushmani na rakhe, aasaani se bura na maan lein, jald se maaf karein aur bhul jaayein, aur kabhi nahin sochein ki tumhe yeh aagya nahin maanna hai.
Dhaarmik saahas badta hai jab tum jaante ho ki Prabhu jaanta hai ki tumhe kisi aur insaan se dushmani nahin hai.
6.Kathinaaiyon, rukaawaton, aur “achambhon” ko apne maransheel anubhav ka ek bhaag samjhein.
Yaad rakhiye ki tum yahan sahi aur nipunn tay hone ke liye aaye ho, “yeh dekhne ke liye ki [tum] woh sab karoge jo Prabhu [tumhare] Parmeshwar [tumhe] batlaayega” (Abraham 3:25)—aur mai yeh bhi kahun, “chaahe jo bhi paristhiti ho.” Tumhare kayi milyan bhaai aur bahanein pariksha le chuke hai ya usse guzar rahe hai, to tumhe kyun baksha jaaega? Kuch musibatein tumhare apne unaagyaakaarita ya laaparwaahi ka natija hote hai.
Anye musibatein aati hai kyunki koi aur laaparwaah reh chuka hai ya is kaaran kyunki yeh duniya pehle se hi buri hai.
Jab yeh musibatein aati hai, shatru ke chelein yeh batlaane lagte hai ki tumne kuch galat kiya hai, ki yeh ek saza hai, ek chinnh ki Swarg ke Pita tumse prem nahin karte.
Ise nazarandaaz kar dein! Balki, ek muskaan laaye, swarg ki or dekhein, aur kahe, “Prabhu, mai samajhta hoon.
Mai jaanta hoon yeh kya hai.
Woh samay jab mai khud ko tumhare laayak banaau, hai na?” Phir Unke saath milkar ant tak jhelein.
Dhaarmik saahas badta hai jab tum yeh maan lo ki “aksar musibaton aur kashton ko [tumhare jiwan] mein aane diya jaata hai kyunki [tum] kuch sahi kar rahe ho” (Glenn L.
Pace, “Crying with the Saints” [Brigham Young University devotional, Dec.
13, 1987], 2; speeches.byu.edu).
Jab mai Ukraine Kyiv Mission ka adhyaksh kar raha tha, maine apne ek sabse vishwaasi bahanon se pucha ki kyun woh khud ke liye itni sakht rehti hai, kyun woh khud ko chote chote galtiyon par sudhaarti thi.
Uska jawaab ek ayse vyakti ki tarah tha jo hamesha galat aawaaz ko sunta hai, usne kaha, “Isliye koi mere jaisa nahin hai.”
Bhaaiyon aur bahanon, mera jo salaah tha is bahan prachaarak ke liye wahi tumhare liye bhi hai: apne kamzoriyon ko swikaar karo, par unke kaaran koshish karna mat chodo, un mein se kuch tumhare saathi bane rahenge jab tak tum yeh jiwan na chod do.
Chaahe jo bhi tumhare abhi ka stithi ho, jab bhi tum imaandaar, khushaal, daenik pashchataap ko apnaaoge sabse behtar bankar, Uddhaarkarta ka Praeshchit tumpar samet lega aur tumhare saath chalega, khud hi, jaha kahi bhi tum jaaoge.
Is tarah se jeene se, tum sach mein “sadeo apne paapo ki chama praapt karoge” (Mosiah 4:12) har din ke har ghante, har minat ke har ek chan, aur is tarah puri tarah saaf aur Parmeshwar ke saamne laayak hamesha rahoge.
Yeh tumhara saobhaagye hai, agar tum chaaho, ki khud ke liye jaano, aaj ya jald hi, ki tum apne kamzoriyon ke sahit Parmeshwar ko khush rakh paa rahe ho.
Mai ek premi Uddhaarkarta ki gawahi deta hoon jo chahata hai ki hum aagyaakari ho.
Mai ek premi Uddhaarkarta ki gawahi deta hoon jo utsuk hai Apne anugrah aur daya ko humpar undelne ke liye.
Mai ek premi Uddhaarkarta ki gawahi deta hoon jo anand manata hai jab hum Unke Praeshchit ko har din shaant aur khush aashwaasan ke saath istemaal karte hai aur hum sahi disha mein jaa rahe hai.
Mai ek premi Uddhaarkarta ki gawahi deta hoon jo utsuk hai ki tumhara “saahas Parmeshwar ki upasthiti mein mazboot [ho] jaaye” (D&C 121:45).Ishu Maseeh ke naam se, amen.
Main Parmeshwar ke purohiti ke saath ikatta hone ke liye khush hoon, jo duniya bhar mein hai.
Main tumahre vishwaas, tumhare sewa, aur tumhare prarthna ka abhari hoon.
Mera sandesh is raat ka Aaronic Purohiti par hai.
Yah hum sab ke liye bhi hai jo Prabhu ke vaade ko pura hone mein madad kartein hain jo dharmshatra mein batlaye hoye ko rakhtein hain “kam purohiti.”1 Ise Taeyaari ki Purohiti kaha jata hai.
Yah wah mahaan teyaari hai jiske bare mein main aajraat ko baatein karunga.
Prabhu ke yogya mein Uske kaarye taeyaariyon se bhari hui hai.
Usne humare liye dharti ko taeyaar kiya hai maranshil ke parinaam aur aosaron ko anubhao karne ke liye.
Jabki hum yaha hai, hum usmein hain jise dharamshaastra mein “taeyaari ka samay”kaha jata hai.”2
Bhavishyevakta Alma ne anant jiwan ke taeyaari ke zaroori mahatav ko batlaya, jaha humesha hum parivaaron ki tarah Parmeshwar jo Pita hai aur Ishu Maseeh ke saath rahenge.
Usne taeyaari ki zaroorat ko is tarah batlaya: “Aur hum dekhtein hain ki manushyon ki mritio hoti hai, ha, wah mritio jiske vishye mein Amulek ne kaha tha, jo ki shaaririk mritio hai; phirbhi manushyon ko samay diya gaya tha jismein wah paschtaap kar sakta tha; isliye wah jiwan pariksha kaal ki stithi mein hota hai; aur yah samay Parmeshwar se milne aur taeyaari karne ke liye hota hai; us anant stithi ki taeyaari ka samay hota hai jiske vishye mein hum logon ne kaha haiaur jo ki mere huon ke punaharjiwit hone ke paschaat aata hai.”3
Maranshilta mein hume jo samay jine ko mila hai wah Parmeshwar milne ki taeyaari ka samay hai, Aaronic Purohiti mein hume jo samay sewa karne ke liye pradaan kiya gaya hai wah aosar hai humare liye dusron ko zaroor madad karne ko sikhne ke liye.
Ussi tarah jayse Prabhu madad dete hai hume zaroori hai ki maranshil jiwan ke parikshan mein hum safal ho jayein, Wah hume humare purohiti ke taeyari mein madad karta hai.
Mera sandesh dono ke liye hai jinhein Prabhu hume Aaronic Purohiti ko rakhne waalon ki taeyaari ke madad ke liye bhejta aur jo Aaronic Purohiti ko rakhtein hain.
Main pitaoun se baatein karta hoon.
Main bishops se baatein karta hoon.
Aur main unse baatein karta hoon jo Melchizedek Purohiti ke hai jinhein jawaan purush ke saathiyon aur shikshaoun ki tarah banaya gaya hai jo purohiti taeyaari mein hain.
Main tum mein se kai ke liye izzat aur abhaar se baatein karta hoon duniya bhar aur sunne aur padhane waalon ke liye.
Main galat hunga agar main apne yuva ke shaakha pradhaan aur bishop ki baatein nahi karun.
Main 12 ki umar mein ek deacon bana United States ke purabi bhaag ke ek chote se shaakha mein.
Shaakha itna chota tha ki mere bade bhaai aur main sirf Aaronic Purohiti ko rakhne waale the mere pita ke baad, jo shaakha pradhaan tha, ne ek adhedh-umar ke aadmi ko Girjaghar mein amantrith kiya.
Us naye pariwartith ko Aaronic Purohiti prapt hua aur, uske saath, ek niyukti Aaronic Purohiti ko dekhbhaal karne ke liye.
Mujhe abhi bhi yaad hai jaese ki kal hi hua tha.
Mujhe sundar girtey hue patiyon ki tarah yaad hai ki naye parwartith ne mere bhaai aur mere saath ek vidwa ke liye kuch kaarye kiya tha.
Mujhe kaarye yaad nahi hai, parantu mujhe wah ahesaas yaad hai ki purohiti shakti ne humein madad kiya tha karne ko jo maine baad mein Prabhu ke kahe ko sikha tha ki hume wah sab karna hai humare paapon se chama ke liye aur isliye Usko milne ki taeyaari karo.
Jabki main us kaarye ko ab yaad karta hoon, main us shaakha pradhaan ke liye abhaar mehsoos karta hoon jisne naye parwartith ko madad kiya tha Prabhu ke dono bachchon ko taeyaar karne ke liye jo kisi din bishops ban saktein hain, gareeb aur zarooratmandon ki dekhbhaal ko karne ke liye aur purohiti ki taeyaari karne waalon ko sanchaalan ke liye bhi.
Main us samay bhi deacon tha jab humare parivaar Utah ke ek bade ward mein gaye.
Wah pahali baar tha jab maine Aaronic Purohiti ke parishad ki puri shakti ko mehsoos kiya tha.
Sahi mein, wah pahali baar tha jab maine ek dekha tha.
Aur baad mein maine pahali baar priests parishad ke sanchaalan bishop ke shakti aur ashirwaad ko mehsoos kiya tha.
Bishop ne mujhe priests parishad ke apne pahale sahiyogi ki tarah niyukt kiya tha.
Mujhe yaad hai ki usne parishad ko khudh hi padhaya tha—wah sakriye tha, dusre gunwaan aadmi ke saath jinhein wah hume sikhlane ke liye niyukt kar sakta tha.
Wah kaksha mein kursiyon ko gol mein rakhta tha.
Wah mujhe apne kursi ke bagal mein, dahene oar bithlaya.
Main unke khandhe ke bagal se dekh sakta jab wah padhata.
Wah apne ghutne par rakhe chote se chamde ke bindar mein saaodhaani se likhe vivran ko kabhi kabhi niche dekhta aur zyaada istamaal hue aur chinned dharamshaastra ko doosre ghutne par khol rakha tha.
Main uske anokhe andaaz ke saath himmat waale dharamshaastra ke Daniel ke kahani ko dobara yaad karta hoon aur uske Uddhaarkarta, Prabhu Ishu Maseeh ki gawahi ko.
Main humesha yaad rakhunga ki Prabhu kis tarah purohiti ke rakhne waalon ki taeyaari ke liye saaodhaani se saathiyon ki niyukti karta hai.
Mere bishop ke paas shaktishaali salaahakaarein the, aur kai kaaranon se main samajh nahi pata phir, ek baar se zyaada usne mere ghar par fone kiya aur kaha, “Hal, main chahata hoon ki tum mere saath mere saathi ki tarah kuch bhent ke liye chalo.” Ek baar, wah mujhe apne saath ek vidwa ke ghar le jana chahta tha jo akeli rahati thi aur ghar mein bina bhojan ke.
Jab hum ghar ja rahe the usne kaar ko rokh diya, apne dharamshaastra ko khola, aur mujhe batlaya ki usne kyo us vidwa ko is tarah sammaan diya tha ki wah sirf apne aap ki dekh bhaal ke liye shakti ko nahi rakhti parantu, aage aanewaale jiwan ke samay mein, dusron ki madad bhi kar sakti hai.
Dusra bhent tha us admi ko jo Girjaghar bahut samay se nahi agya tha.
Mere bishop ne use waapis bulaya tha Santon ke saath rahane ke liye.
Maine apne bishop ke prem ko jo ek apremi aur ziddi dushman dikhta tha ki oar dekha.
Ek dusre aosar par humne ek ghar bhent kiya jaha do choti ladkiyon ko hume darwaaze par milne ke liye unke sharaabi maata-pita dwara bheje gaye the.
Choti ladkiyon ne screen ke darwaaze se kaha unke maata-pita so rahein hain.Bishop unse baatein karta raha, muskuraatey aur unke achchaaiyon aur unke himmat ke gungaan kartey hue, jo mujhe 10 minton se zyaada laga.
Jab hum us ghar se ja rahe the, usne dhire se kaha, “Yah ek achcha bhent tha.
Weh choti ladkiyon humare bhent ko kabhi nahi bhoolengi.”
Do ashirwaad jo buzurg purohiti ke saathi de saktein hain weh hai vishwaas aur dekhbhaal ke uddhaaran.
Maine wah dekha tha jab mere putra ko gharelu shikshan saathi diya gaya tha jiske paas usse bhi zyaada purohiti ka anubhao tha.
Uska buzurg saathi do baar mission pradhaan tha aur dusre netatav sthaanon par bhi sewa kar chuka tha.
Unko niyukht hue parivaaron ko bhent se pahale, us anubhawik purohiti neta ne pahale hi humare ghar par mere putra ko bhent karne ko kaha tha.
Unhone mujhe sunne ki ijazat diya tha.
Buzurg saathi ne prarthna se shuruaat kiya, madad maangtey hue.
Phir usne mere putra se kuch ayesa kaha: “Mujhe lagta hai ki hume wah shikshan lena chahiye jo is parivaar ko unhein paschaataap ki pukaar ki tarah sunaai de.
Mujhe lagta hai ki weh mujh se bahot achchie tarah se nahi lenge.
Mujhe lagta hai ki weh sandesh ko tumse zyaada achchie tarah se sunnege.
Is liye tum kya sochtey ho?”
Mujhe apne putra ki ankhon mein wah dar yaad hai.
Main us khushi ke pal ko abhi bhi mehsoos kar sakta hoon jab mere putra ne vishwaas ko swikaar kiya tha.
Yah bina yojna aur taeyaari se bishop ne unko saathi ki tarah saath nahi kiya tha.
Yah saaodhaani se taeyaari ke saath kiya gaya tha taaki jo buzurg saathiyon ne us parivaar ke ahesaas ko mehsoos kiya tha jisse weh sikhlane ja rahe the.
Use prerna prapt hua tha ki wah piche hat jaaye, ek anaadi yuva mein Parmeshwar ke bade bachchon ko paschaataap aur surakhchaa ki niyukti ko karne ke liye.
Mujhe unke bhent ka parinaam nahi pata hai, parantu mujhe pata hai ki ek bishop, ek Melchizedek Purohiti rakhne waala, aur Prabhu, ek purush ko purohiti ke liye taeyaar kar rahein the aur kisi din bishop ki tarah.
Abh, purohiti taeyaari ke is tarah ke safalta ko tum jaamtey ho jo tumne apne khudh ke jiwan mein dekha aur anubhao kiya hai.
Tum ayese bishops, saathiyon, aur maata-pitaoun ko jaantey ho aur khudh bhi ho.
Tumne apne purohiti ke kaarye ke taeyaari mein Prabhu ke ashirwaad ko dekha hai jo wah jaanta hai ki tumhe pahale hi prapt hai.
Hum sabhi purohiti ke rakhne waalon ke paas kaarye hai doosron ko Prabhu tak laane mein madad ke liye.
Yaha kuch cheezein hain jo hum kar saktein hain jo bahut madad pradaan karega.
Hume dharam vidhi ko sikhlaane mein shabdon se ziyada shaktishaali humare dharam vidhi se jine waale uddhaaran hain.
Humari purohiti ki sewa bahot zaroori hai logon ko Maseeh tak ke aane liye amantirith karna vishwaas, paschaataap, baptisma, aur Pavitra Aatma ko prapt karke.
Pradhaan Thomas S.
Monson, ne isliye, un sabhi dharamsiddhaanton par prerit bhare bhashanon ko diya hai.
Parantu mujhe pata hai usne jo Girjaghar ke logon aur prachaarakhoun aur doston ke saath kiya tha jab Toronto ke mission mein salchaalan kar raha tha ne mujhe kaarye ke liye prerna diya tha.
Purohiti ki taeyaari mein, “mujhe dikha” hua “sunne hue” se zyaada prabhaao daalta hai.
Isliye dharamshaastra bahut zaroori hai purohiti ki taeyaari karne mein.
Weh uddhaaran se bhare hue hain.
Mujhe ayesa lagta hai ki main Alma ko devdut ke aagaya ke paalan kartey hue aur phir Ammonihah ke dusht logon jald se dobara sikhlaatey hue mehsoos kar sakta hoon jinhone usko inkaar kar diya tha.
.4 Main jael mein thandh ko mehsoos kar sakta hoon jab Bhavishyevakta Joseph ko Parmeshwar dwara batlaya gaya tha himmat rakhne ko aur uska dekhbhaal kiya gaya tha.5 In dharmshaastra ke chitraon ko yaad karne se hum apne sewa mein ant tak taeyaari kar saktein hain jab wah katin lage.
Ek pita ya ek bishop ya ek buzurg gharelu shikshak saathi jo dikhlata hai ki wah jawaan purohiti ke rakhne waale par vishwaas karta hai uski jiwan ko badal sakta hai.
Mere pita ko ek baar Barah Devduton ke Parishad ke ek sadesye ne science aur jaati par ek choti lekh likhne ko kaha gaya tha.
Mere pita ek mahaan vegyaanik aur ek vishwaasi purohiti ko rakhne waala tha.
Parantu mujhe abhi bhi yaad hai uska likha hua lekh mujhe dena aur kahana, “Ya, mujhe Barah ko dene se pahale, main chahata hoon ki tum padho.
Tum jaanoge ki kya yah sahi hai.” Wah mujh se 32 saal bada tha aur bahot zyaada budhimaan aur hoshiyaar.
Main abhi bhi ek mahaan pita aur purohititav aadmi ke vishwaas dwara mazboot raha hoon.
Main jaanta tha ki wah mujhe vishwaas nahi karta tha parantu Parmeshwar kar sakta tha aur mujhe batla skata tha kya karna hai.
Tum anubhawit saathiyon ek jawaan purohiti ke rakhne waalon ke taeyaari mein ashirwaad de saktey ho jabkabhi tum use us tarah ke vishwaas ko dikhlaaoge.Yah unhein madad karega khud ke liye prerna bhare ahesaas ko vishwaas karne mein jab wah kisi din ek bachche ko achcha hone ke liye ashirwaad deta hai jise daaktar ne nachane ko batlaya tha.
Us vishwaas ne mujhe ek baar se zyaada madad kiya hai.
Humare safalta doosron ko purohiti ki taeyaari mein aayega ki hum unhein kitna prem kartein hain.
Yah us samay sachcha hoga jab hum unhein sudhaareinge.
Us samay ke liye socho jab ek Aaronic Prohiti ko rakhne waala, shayad prabhubhoj ke mez par, ek dharamsiddhant ko karne mein galti ko karta hai.
Yah ek ghambheer samasya hai.
Kabhikabhi galti ki saza jaanta dwara zaroor hona chahiye nakhushi, apmaan ke ahesaas ke saath ya kharajh karne se.
Tum Prabhu ke salaaha ko yaad karoge: “Gambheerta se salaaha dena chahiye, jab Pavitra Aatma dwara prerna mile; aur phir baad mein use zyaada prem karo jiska tumne ninda kiya hai, taaki wah virodhi ki tarah na dikhe.”6
Shabdbadhanti ka ek khaas matlab hai purohiti ko rakhne waalon ki taeyaari mein jab unhein sudhaar ki zaroorat hai.
Is shabd ka matlab prem badhaana hai jo waha pahale se tha.
Jo “dikhlana hai” wah zaroori hai.
Tum mein se jo purohiti ko rakhne ki taeyaari kar rahein hain unhein galtiyon ko kartey hue dekheinge.
Tumhe unhein sudharne se pahale, unhein tumhare prem ko jald aur turant hi ahesaas kiya hoga.
Unhein tumhare sudhaar ko karne se pahale tumhare sahi gungaan ko mehsoos kiya hoga.
Prabhu khudh kahata hai ki chote purohiti rakhne waale Unke prati apne chamta ka samaan kartey aur mulye detein hain.
In shabdon ko sunno, John jo baptisma dene waala tha se jab Aaronic Purohiti ko punaharsthapit kja raha tha: “Mere priye saathiyon tumhare upar, Maseeh ke naam se main Aaron ki Purohiti ko deta hoon, jo devduton ki dekhbhaal karne ki chaabie rakhtein hain, aur paschaataap ke susamachaar ko, aur paapon se mukti ke baad baptisma ke liye; aur yah dobara kabhi dharti se waapis nahi liya jayega, jabtak ki Levi ke putra dobara Prabhu ko sachchaai ke bhent nahi detein.”7
Aronic Purohiti bade Melchizedek Purohiti ka ek aor bhaag hai.8 Sabhi purohiti ke pradhaan ki tarah, Girjaghar ke Pradhaan taeyaari karne waale purohiti ka bhi salchaalan kartein hain.
Saalon se Uska sandesh hai ki doosron ke jiwan mein paschaataap ke susamachaar aur baptisma ko lane se sahi bachaao ho sakta hai.
Deacon ke Parishad, shikshakein, aur paadri humesha salaaha kartein hain sabhi parishad ke sadasyon ko Prabhu tak pahunchaane ke liye.
Adhyakshtaaein sadesyon ko vishwaas aur prem ke saath aage badhane ko batlatein hain.
Deacons prabhubhoj ko shaant aur vishwaas ke saath detein hain taaki sadasye Praeshchit ke ahesaas ko mehsoos karein aur vaadon ko nibhaaye jab weh us pavitra rup mein prapt kartein hain.
Shikshakoun aur padriyon apne saathiyon ke saath prarthna karo ki Girjaghar, ke ek vyakti ke baad ek ka puri tarah se dekhbhaal karoge.Aur weh saathiyon saath mein prarthna kartein hain parivaaron ke mukhyon ke zarooraton aur aashaon ko seekhne ke baad.
Ayesa karne se, woh mahaan din ke liye taeyaar rahatein hain jab weh apne khudh ke parivaar mein pita ki tarah, vishwaas se sanchaalan kartein hain.
Sabhi bhakton ko hamara dhong bhara aashirwad.
Aaj hum aapko prem ke sambandh mein ek mahatvapoorn paath padhane ja rahe hain.
Prem karne se pehle kuch baaton ko zaroor soch lena chahiye ki kahin jisse aap pyar karne ja rahe hain us insaan mein kuch aisi baatein to nahi hain jo aapke khushhal jeevan ko gum ke saaye mein daal sakti hain.
Ye rahi kuch aisi baatein jinko apne humsafar ka chunaav karne se pehle aapko hamesha dhyaan mein rakhna chahiye.
Yadi aap jiske saath apna jeevan bitana chahte ho, us insaan mein inmein se koi bhi baat fit baithti hai to sachet ho jaaiye, jeevan mein mushkilein badh sakti hain…
Shak Karne Waale Log:- Agar aapke premi/premika ko baat baat par shak karne ki aadat hai to aapko jald se jald us insaan se apna peechha chhuda lena chahiye, kyunki insaan pyaar karta hai taaki wo ek khushhal zindagi jee sake, par yadi koi aap par baat baat par shak kare to kya aap uske saath khush reh sakoge? Kabhi nahi bachha!
Baat Baat Par Gaali Dene Waale Log:- Bhoolkar bhi aise insaan se mel jol na badao jo baat baat par gaaliyan deta ho.
Hamesha yaad rakho, sabhyata hi insaan ki pehchan hoti hai bhakton, Insaan ki pehchan uske kapdon se nah uski baateon se hoti hai.
Jo Doosaron ki Izzat Na karta Ho:- Aisa insaan jo kabhi bhi doosaron ki izzat na karta ho, kabhi bhi unke saath prem sambandh nahi banane chahiye, kyunki jo kisi ki izzat nahi karta wo aapki bhi izzat kabhi nahi karega, ye ek param satya hai bhakton.
Jise Khud Par Yekeen Hi Na Ho:- Aisa insaan jo har mushkil mein doosaron ka muh dekhta ho, chhote se chhote faisle mein bhi jise hamesha doosaron ka muh dekhna achha lagta ho, aise insaan ke saath aap kabhi bhi khush nahi reh sakte bachha.
Jise Aap Par Yakeen Na Ho:- Yadi koi kahe ki use aapse behad pyar hai, kintu use aap par yakeen hi nahi hai to bhakton kabhi bhi aap us insaan ke saath khus nahi reh sakoge, kyunki jahan yakeen hi na ho wo rishta kabhi safal nahi ho sakta.
Jo Waqt Ke Saath badalta Ho:- Apni zaroorat ke samay jo insaan aapse pyar bhari baatein karta hai, kintu apna matlab nikal jaate hi badal jaata hai, aise insaan se jitna door rho utna hi behtar hai bhakton.
Jo Aapki Zindagi Mein Had Se Zyaada Dakahl De:- Agar aap kisi aise insaan ke saath apna jeevan bitana chahte hain jo aapki apni zindagi mein kisi bhoot ki tarah peechhe pad gaya ho to bhakton usse to turant hi door ho jaao, warna zindagi aap jiyoge lekin uske isharon par.
Theek kathputli ki tarah.
agar aapako kisee tarah kee koee khaas beemaaree na ho, kisee tarah kee koee kasam aapane na kha rakhee ho aur aapake chikitsak ne alag se aapako mana nahee kiya ho to koee agar aapase yah poochhe ki chaay chalegee? to bhale hee aapaka javaab na me ho, us vakt aapake chehare kee chamak se saamane vaale ko yah andaaja ho hee jaata hai ki chaay kee jaroorat aapako kitanee hai.
chaay to chaay hai.
agar aap daaroo-shaaroo nahee peete hai aur chalo saath me chaay bhee nahee peete hai, tab bhee aap kahalaate hai- Tee-ToTalar.
yaanee chaay aapake saath hai, bhale hee aap chaay ke saath nahee hai.
subah uThate hee chaay, fir akhabaar ke aa jaane ke baad khabaro ke saath chaay, fir subah ke naashte ke saath chaay, fir daftar ya dukaan pahunchane par kaam kee shurooaat ke lie chaay, dopahar kee atiaavashyak chaay, dopahar ke bhojan ke baad jarooree chaay, shaam kee chaay aur is beech Tapak paDe mehamaano ke svaagat satkaar ke lie chaay.
yaanee apane jeevan ke ek baDe hisse kee ek baDee jaroorat hai chaay aur sirf chaay.
chaay aaj ke vakt ka jeevan jal hai.
jara yaad keejie jab pichhalee martaba aap kisee kaam se kisee kaaryaalay me padhaare the to daftar ke bheetar aur daftar ke baahar chaay kee dukaan ka najaara kaisa tha?
jahaa daftar ek or neerav, nirjeev, praaNaheen aur boriyat se paripoorN najar aaya tha, vahee daftar ke paas vaalee chaay kee dukaan jeevanee shakti se paripoorN, sajeev, praaNavaan, oorjaavaan aur rangeeniyat se bharee najar aee thee.
aakhir kyo? sirf isalie ki chaay me vah taakat hai jo praaNaheen cheejo me bhee praaN vaayu ka sanchaar kar de.
yahee kaaraN hai ki daftaro me failo ke boz se martapraay: baabuo ka man chaay kee dukaan par aakar harshollaas se jeevit ho uThata hai.
jara yah bhee yaad keejie ki kisee daftar ke kisee baaboo kee ubaasiyaa kaise chhoomantar ho gee thee jab aapane use chaay ke lie aamantrit kiya tha.
chaay ka chakkar ajeeb hai.
chaay pila kar jahaa ek or aap saamane vaale se apanee aatmeeyata prakaT kar sakate hai, to ghoos roopee sirf ek kap chaay se aap apana koee baDa kaam bhee karava sakate hai.
namak ka karj ada karane kee baat puraanee ho chukee hai.
ab to chaay ka karj chaDhata aur utarata hai.
aapase kee dafa logo ne apanee sevao ke badale chaay-paanee ka kharcha chaaha hoga.
kabhee aapaka aatmeey aapako chaay ke lie poochhana bhool gaya hoga to bhale hee aap chaay nahee peete ho, aapaka chaay peene ka mooD us vakt bilakul na raha ho, fir bhee aap kahenge saale ne chaay ke lie bhee nahee poochha.
samay ke hisaab se chaay ke apane maje hai.
subah kee chaay ka aparimit, ateev, aseem aanand avarNaneey aur akalpaneey to hai hee, kisee khomache vaale kee chaay ka fursat me baiTh kar peene ka apana aanand hai.
chauk par saDak par khaDe rah kar faalatoo kee charcha me chaay paan ka alag aanand hai.
akhabaaro me sir ghusaakar suDakee gee chaay ka alag aanand hai, to beevee aur Teevee ke saath Tee ke aanand kee baat hee kya hai.
chaay chaahe meeThee ho ya kaDavee, kaalee ho ya khaalis doodh kee, apane hisaab se sabako achchhee lagatee hai, khaasakar tab jab isakee talab tej lagatee hai.
iseelie to Treno me bikane vaalee safeda kee chaay bhee bhaee log usame maja DhoonDhakar pee hee lete hai.
darasal chaay to hamesha achchhee hee hotee hai, bas kabhee vah thoDee achchhee, jyaada achchhee ya kabhee sabase achchhee ho jaatee hai.
aur agar aap chaay ke vijnyaapano par bharosa kare to chaay ke baDe-achchhe faayade bhee hai.
kisee braanD vishesh kee chaay peekar aadamee kaDak dil vaala javaan ho jaata hai jisakee moonchho kee taav se hee sher Dar ke maare bhaag jaata hai to koee aur braanD kee chaay kee khushaboo se aadamee martyushaiyya se vaapas aa jaata hai.
koee khaas braanD kee chaay peekar vaah! bol uThata hai, to koee usakee khushaboo meelo door se soongh kar khincha chala aata hai.
ho sakata hai chaay ke aapake anubhav bhee aise hee romaanchakaaree ho.
mera apana anubhav hai ki subah ka preshar chaay ke bagair banata hee nahee.
akasar log subah uThane ke lie chaay peete hai par kee aise bhee hai jo chaay ka ek pyaala halak me utaar kar sone jaate hai.
chaay kee itanee charcha karane ke baad to bhaee, ab to chaay chalegee?

  baat itni si hai ki tujhe pyaar hai

   HAAN MUJEH PYAR HAI...
ek paranparagat aam bharatiy kee kuchh khasiyaton kee taraf dhyan hi nahin gaya hoga aapaka.
jahan jara dukhati rag par hath rakho, jara dard kuredo, devadasamukhi stail men shuroo ho jaenge.
shuroo bhi kya honge, karmafala, vidhi ka vidhana, 'prarabdha' aadi-aadi ko bich men lakar aise-aise talle denge ki aapako lagega ki aadami to jabardast kailibar ka hai, bas jara uparokt chijon ke chalate 'pratibha' nahin dikha pa raha hai.
hamari khasiyat hi ye hai ki dard-dukh-gam-asafalata aadi ke adhikansh 'karanon' ko duniyobar vyavasthaon ke havale karate jaenge.
halanki log bhi kya karen sadiyon se pidhi-dar-pidhi yah vichar virasat kee tarah saunpa ja raha hai.
halanki koee safalata mili nahin ki ekadam se aantarik gun dikhaee dene lagenge, namratapoorvak badappan sahit usaka kredit lene lagenge.
khaira, filahal to ham bat kar rahe hain kailibar n dikha pane ke karanon kee.
ab jaise 'ka' kee 'kha' se batachit hi len.
'' ye kya hal bana rakha hai chacha'' 'ka' ne poochha nahin ki 'kha' shuroo -''kya bataoon beta, vidhi ka vidhan hai, bhugat rahe hain, jane kya karm kare the, aise din vidhata kisi ko n dikhae''.
'ka'- chacha aisa kyon kah rahe ho, beta dekho kitana kabil ho gaya hai, padh-likh gaya hai, tumhara bhar halka kar dega.''
'kha'- ''kamina hai kamina'', kahe ka bhar halka karega, khud hi bojh hai, eeshvar n jane kin janmon ke papon kee saja de raha hai, fir dukh men atirikt saund traik bhi milaenge.
''he! eeshvara'' simpaithi apane atirikt kisi ke paksh men gavara hi nahin karate aise prani.
'ka'- ''are chacha sab thik ho jaega, bas tum himmat rakho, han badi bitiya kee shadi ka kya huaa.''
'kha'- '' kya bataoon beta, itani nanhin si to bitiya hai, jo bhi dekhane aata hai, dahej ke lie munh fad deta hai, samajh nahin aata.
kahan se, kaise vyavastha karoon.
vidhata bhi n jane kya-kya din dikha raha hai.''
ab kaun inhen samajhae ki nanhin si bitiya hai to kyon bal-vivah kar andar jana chahate ho.
fir bhi har dukh ke sath ek tek jaroor marenge, dardonmukhi munh banakar ek atirikt dukhiya enavayarament kriet kar denge.
'ka'- ''nahin chacha, sab ho jaega.
tum dhiraj to rakho.''
'kha'- ''ab kya dhiraj beta, jo 'prarabdha' men likha ho.''
itani eemanadari se to naukari karata hoon, bakee beimanon ko dekho kitana aage badh gae, eemanadari se naukari kee hai, ijjat kamaee hai, vahin pade hain.'' jane kya hoga...b''
(fir vahi bat kaun samajhae ki too ijjat kamane men biji raha.
sath vale not kamate gae.
kahe kilap raha hai?)
ek bat to gajab rahegi aisi rotili baton ke sath aavaj kee aisi-aisi -'bhayanaka' miksang dalenge ki samane vala aadami himmati n ho to vahin pasar kar dahaden marane lage.
eemanadari-eemanadari kee bar-bar tadi denge.
kam nahin karenge bas eemanadari-eemanadari ka stenja ghuma-ghumakar thonkenge.
ab inhen kaun samajhae ki bhaiye too to sirf eemanadar hi raha kam to kiya nahin.
samane vale kam karate-karate khud ka, doosaron ka bhala karate-karate kabil ban gae.
too to eemanadari gale men latakakar aofis men ghusa, dar ke mare sit par baith gaya, n kisi kam men himmat dikhaee, n aage badhakar koee kam kiya, n sahab ko dabangata se koee chij samajhaee.
samane valon ne aisa kuchh kiya to tatkal unhen beeeman ghoshit kara, eemanadari ke khol men ghus kar dukhiya ghonghe bane pade rahe.
fir samane vale ne koee safalata paee nahin ki duniyobar vyavastha ko bich men lakar kosane kee mahafil jama li.
koee aaya nahin, shrota dikha nahin ki bat ghuma-ghuma kar baten apane dard-dukh-jakhmon kee taraf laenge, taki priy trek par vahi dard bhari shahanaee vadan suna saken.
har chij men oopar vale ka kasoor dhoondhenge.
abhyas bhi itana tagada kar lenge patthe ki aisa jatalaenge jaise eeshvar har dukh ko asafalata ke pichhe karm-prarabdhy-vidhan aadi ko yathasthan fit karane men karate hain.
usakee har safalata ke pichhe tikadam hai, sabit kar hi denge.
apani har asafalata ke pichhe pichhale janm ke karm, eemanadari, achchhaee aadi poorvajanmiy vyavasthaon- sadgunon ka 'hath' bataenge.
khud bhale hi salon tak ek hi jagah par atake rahen, samane vale ke har pramoshan men, oopar uthate jane men usake gire hue tarikon ka rajafash karane men hi apana kartavy nirvahan manenge.
lagatar prayason se ye pramoshan-dimoshan-ejaitijm ka nitant maulik mainejament modal hi taiyar kar lete hain, jise gahe-bagahe har sthiti men fit karane ke lie mamooli se raddo-badal kee hi jaroorat padati hai.
fir lagatar is modal kee sanshodhit-parivartit janakari de-dekar ek vishleshak ke roop men 'prakhar-medha' ke dhani jaisa tanboo bhi tan lenge, taki navoditon ko isake tale laya ja sake.
in sab mamalon men to mehanat men koee kami hi nahin chhodate patthe.
jara bhi sahan nahin ki poori srishti kee vyavastha bhedabhav rahit santulit hai.
man ke hi chalate hain kaliyug hai, kauvvon ko khir pina hi hai, hans to sale ghoore se hi khane ka jugad karate firenge.
jahan rahenge, vahan ke vatavaran men adrishy prabhav chhodakar hi rahenge.
sankhyabal men bhale hi kam ho, lekin atishighr apane jaison kee poori shrrinkhala ka vaicharik utpadan kar dete hain.
ye utpadan bhi chain riekshan kee prakriya apana dvigunit-trigun badhata hi chala jata hai.
becharagi ka bahumat badhata hai, to har doosara-tisara chehara sataya huaa sa, har panchavin-aathavin shakl dukhiyari dikhane lagati hai.
isi prakriya ka hi to pratifal hai ki duniya dukh kee khan...
re manava duniya dukh kee khan...
jaisi baten sansar men aakar mahaul kaipchar karane lagati hain, dukhiyaron ka ek market nirmit hone lagata hai.
fir ye log nirantar apane svantah dukhay par chintan-manan-sanbhashan aadi dete-dete ek din duniyabhar ko inhin se mukt dilane ke bijanes men sanlagn ho jate hain.
aoftar-aol yoo no its a lang eksapiriyans aof 'dekha-samajha-bhoga-yatharth' vich kanvart in e mishan for pis for main kaind.
isalie bhavishy men yad rakhen, modarn ej men dukh-dard-prarabdh men bhi 'etasetra...
etasetra...eksatra' kee bharapoor gunjaish hai.
''baboo ji ek rupaya de do, ek rupaya de do baboo ji'' kahate hue ek bhikharin ek aadami ke samane gidagidane lagi.
us aadami ne use das ka not de diya.
sath men baithe usake dost ne kaha 'yar vah bhikharin tujhase ek rupaya mang rahi thi aur toone use das rupaye de die.
toone aisa kyon kiya ? yah log bahut jhoothe aur makkar hote hain.
''nahin aisa nahin hai'' usane kaha aur shoony men dekhane laga-
bat us samay kee hai jab meri haeeskool kee pariksha ho chukee thi aur meri bahan kee navin kaksha kee pariksha chal rahi thi.
us din usaka ganit ka pepar tha.
main use skool chhodane gaya tha.
jaise hi pepar shuru huaa main bahar sit par aakar baith gaya aur pepar khatm hone ka intajar karane laga.
itane men hi ek boodhi aurat chehare par jhurriyan, aankhon men gaddhe, bal safed mere pas aakar baith gaee.
usane mujhase yoon hi baten karana shuru kar din aur kaee tarah ke saval bhi poochhe jaise main kahan rahata hoon ? yahan kyon aaya hoon ? aur use jab yah maloom huaa ki mainne is bar haeeskool ke imtihan die hain to vah mujhe achchhe nambaron se pas hone kee duaaen dene lagi.
fir usane mujhase das rupaye mange.
usane kaha tha ki vah bhookhi hai.
'hoon jhoothi makkar lalachi mujhe bevakoof bana rahi hai.' mainne dil hi dil men aisa socha aur usase kaha ki mere pas das rupaye nahin hain.
fir vah mujhase bina kuchh kahe uthakar chali gaee.
pepar khatm hone tak mere jahan men yah bat kaee bar aaee ki log panch das rupaye ke lie kaise kaise jhooth bolate hain.
pepar khatm hote hi main bahan ko lekar ghar aa gaya aur kuchh din bad yah bat bilkul bhool gaya.
dhire dhire vah din bhi aa gaya jisaka mujhe intajar tha.
aaj mera rijalt aane vala tha.
mujhe bahut dar lag raha tha.
lekin main farst divijan pas huaa tha jisakee mujhe ummid bhi n thi.
ab n jane kyon mujhe yad aaee us boodhi aurat kee.
n jane kyon usake lie antahkaran tadap utha.
n jane kyo mera sharir mere pas tha aur meri aatma usake pas chali gaee thi.
usane mujh anjan ko duaaen din thin aur badale men maine use apashabd.
n jane kyon mujhe laga jaise vah sach kah rahi thi ki vah bhookhi thi.
maine socha jakar use kuchh paise de doon.
agale din main vahan pahucha jahan vah mujhe mili thi.
usaka nam pata kuchh bhi maloom n tha, sirf soorat hi yad rah gaee thi.
jab maine usake bare men pata kiya to maloom huaa ki usakee maut hue do mahine ho chuke hai.
mujhe n jane kyon aisa laga ki jaise usakee maut ka jimmedar main hi hoon.
anayas hi yah lafj mere jahan men goonjane lage 'kash mainne use das rupaye de die hote.' usakee maut ka jimmedar main khud ko manane laga aur yah bat mere dil men ek tis banakar rah gaee.
kisee kaary kee safalata ke lie use abhiyaano ke roop me badal diya jae to usake safal hoagar aapako yah pata chale ki aapakee kunDalee me raajayog hai aur isake kaaraN nikaT bhavishy me aapake neta-mantree banane ke khaase chaanses hai, to kya aap prasann nahee honge ? avashy honge aur kyo nahee honge? aakhir, satta-shakti ka svaad jo chakhane ko milega, parantu jara Thaharie, thoDee gambheerata se vichaar keejie.
ho sakata hai maamala pooree tarah se prasannata ka na ho.
aie jara gambheerata se gaur faramae.
maan leejie ki aapaka raajayog vaastav me prabal hai.
Theek hai, parantu mantree pad aapako aise hee nahee milane vaala.
isake lie aapako chunaav laDana hoga.
ab agar aapaka bhaagy vaastav me prabal hoga, to aap eemaanadaaree se chunaav jeet sakate hai.
varana aaj ke maahaul me to jab tak aap beeemaanee se jaati-dharm ke gaNit nahee lagaenge, chunaav kisee soorat jeet nahee sakate.
maan leejie, yah bhee ho gaya.
parantu khaalee chunaav jeetane se bhee kuchh haasil nahee hone vaala.
aap bane rahenge do Take ke emele aur emapee.
asalee, raubadaar mantree pad paane ke lie aapako tamaam joDatoD karana hogee.
goTiyaa biThaana hongee.
raajayog ka yahaa kya kaam? chalie, maan leejie ki yahaa bhee bhaagy ne saath de diya, magar fir aisa ho sakata hai ki aap mahatvaheen ya bina vibhaag ke hee mantree ban jae aur log-baag aapaka majaak uDaane lage.
jaahir hai, mahatvapoorN aur bhaaree bharakam bajaT vaale malaeedaar vibhaag ko paane ke lie aapako kheenchaataanee karanee hogee, laabing karanee hogee, preshar TaikTiks apanaanee hogee.
muft me kuchh bhee haasil hone vaala nahee hai.
isake lie alag se mehanat mashakkat karanee hogee.
alag se, naayaab, kelakuleTeD paanse chalane honge.
jaise-taise, maan liya ki aap mantree ban hee ge.
dhanyavaad raajayog.
parantu aapakee aage kee raah bhee koee aasaan nahee hogee.
ho sakata hai ki aapaka ya apake sambandhiyo ka ateet ranga-puta ho.
tab aapake virodhee ya bahut sambhav hai aapake neta-sangee-saathee jo mantree pad se maharoom hai – khod-khod kar aapake ateet ko ughaaDenge aur is tarah aapake mantree pad par hamesha talavaar laTakatee rahegee.
ab yah maan le ki kaanch kee tarah aapaka ateet svachchh hai aur vartamaan paaradarshee hai– jo ki bhaarateey raajaneeti me - soory ke ulaTee disha me ugane ke samaan hee saty hai, to bhee bhavishy ke baare me kya kaha ja sakata hai.
aapake virodhee jo maatr aapake satta me aane kee vajah se paida hue honge ya doosare satta kaamee aapako yoo hee chain se nahee rahane denge.
ve aapakee har baat ko, har kaary ko desh aur janata ke viruddh batala kar aapake viruddh zooThe kaanD-kisse frem karenge aur usame aapako Taangane kee harachand koshish karenge.
yah bhee ho sakata hai ki aap apane virodhiyo ko samaapt karane kee aisee hee kisee koshish me khud hee fans jae.
fir, satta milate hee aapakee parsanal laif ka beDa gark ho jaega.
aap chaaTukaaro se ghir jaenge.
aapake chaaro aur suraksha ka arthaheen ghera khaDa kar diya jaega aur aapako aapake parichito se bhee milane nahee diya jaega.
yah sthiti kisee kaidee se juda nahee hogee.
yahaa fark sirf yah hoga ki kaidee kisee jel me sashastr pahare me rahata hai aur mantree khule me sashastr pahare me rahane ko abhishapt hota hai.
ab yah baat juda hai ki ho sakata hai ki pahare daaree me rahane ke aap aadee ho jae aur isaka maja lene lage.
haalaaki, yah bhee shaasvat saty hai ki jisane bhee satta ka svaad chakha, chaahe vah bhagavaan hee kyo na ho, sarvada sukhee kabhee nahee raha.

Dharamshaastra maata-pitaon ke kaarye ko batlate hain- yah unke kaarye hai ki apne bachchon ko “paschaataap ke siddhaant, Parmeshwar jo jiwit hai ke Putra Ishu Maseeh mein vishwaas, aur baptisma aur Pavitra Aatma ke uphaar ko sikhlaye” (D&C 68:25).
Maata-pitaon, ke rup mein hume apne bachchon ke mukhye susamachaar shikshak aur uddhaaranon ko banna chahiye- bishop, Raviwaar Skool, Jawaan Mahilaien ya Jawaan Purush, nahi parantu maata-pita.
Unke muhkye susamachaar adhyaapak ki rup mein, hum unhein Praeshchit ke shakti aur sachchaai ko sikhla saktein hain- unke pehchaan aur diviye bhaagye- yah karte hue unhein sachcha neev pradaan karo jis par weh bana sakein.Jab sab bol diya gaaye aur sampann hai, ghar hi Ishu Maseeh ke susamachaar ko sikhlane ka mukhye sthaan hoga.

Maata-pita ki tarah, hum apne bachchon ko anant cheezon ke parinaam ke liye humare bachchon ko prarthna karna sikhlana chahiye- prarthna karna chahiye ki is chunaoti bhari duniya mein sudhta se rahane ke liye shakti mile, aagyakaari rahein, aur sachchaaie se khade rehne ke liye himmat rahe.
Koi sandeh nahi hai ki humhare yuva shaam ki prarthna nahi karte honge, parantu unmein se kai koshish karte hai subeh prarthana ko karne mein .Maata-pitaon ki rup mein, unke mukhye susamachaar shikshak ki tarah, hum yah sahi kar saktein hain.
Mormon Dharamshaastra ke kaun se maata-pita ne virodhi ke baochaar se bachne ke liye apne bachchon ko bina kawaj aur shild aur talwaar ke ladaai mein jaane diya tha? Magar hum mein se kaun apne bachchon ko har subeh ghar se jaane se pehle khatre se bhare duniya mein, Shaaitaan ko jhelne ke liye aur uske kai bahekaawe mein ane ke liye, un ke dhaarmik kawaj aur shild aur talwaar ki bina bejenge jo bachaane waale shakti prarthna se prapt hota hai? Prabhu ne kaha, “Humesha prarthna karo, … ki tum Shaaitaan par viyay prapt kar sako” (D&C 10:5).
Maata-pitaaon ki tarah hum apne bhachon ko humesha subeh ki prarthna ko karne ki aadad ko banane mein madad kar saktein hain.
Hum apne bachchon ko unke samay ko achchie tarah se istamaal karne ko sikhla saktein hain.Kabhikabhi, Sonya Carson ki tarah, hume zaroori hai ki hum apne bhachchon ko prem se magar dhire se unko tv aur dusre electronic shaadhonon par pabandhi lagaye, joki kai stithiyon mein unke jiwan ke bahut se samay ko barbaad kar rahe hain.
Balki hume unke samay ko ziyada laabhdaayak susamachaar gatividhiyon mein lagane chahiye.

Ek din humare bachchein samjhenge aur jaanege ki jo humne kiya wah achcha tha.
Agar hum yah nahi karenge, to kaun karega?
Hum sab shaayad khud se puchein: kya humare bachchein humare sab se achcha dhaarmik, dimaagi, aur rachaatmak shaktioyn ko prapt kartein hain, ya woh humare bach kuche samay aur gunon ko prapt kartein hain, humare Girjaghar ya bahari ke kaamon mein sabhi samay ko dene ke baad jo bachta hai? Anewaale jiwan mein, mujhe pata nahi hai ki kya bishop ya Sahayak Sanstha pradaan ke shirshak rahenge ya nahi, parantu mujhe pata hai ki pati aur patni, pita aur maata, ke shirshak rahenge aur duniya ke ant tak izzat milega.
Yah hi wah ek mahaan zimmedaari hai jo hume maata-pitaon ko yaha is dharti par zaroor karna chahiye taaki hum apne jiwan ke un mahaan, parantu usi tarah ke , zimmedaariyon ko nibha sakein.
Maata-pitaon ki tarah, hume aashwaasan mila hai ki Parmeshwar hume kabhi akele nahi chodenge.
Parmeshwar hume woh zimmedaari nahi deta jo humare shakti se bahar ho- mai uska gawahi de sakta hoon.
Hum maata-pitaaon ki tarah humare diviye kaarye mein, aur Parmeshwar ke saath hissedaari mein, humare bachchon ke susamachaar aur uddhaaran ke muhkye shikshakein ban saktein hain, main yah Ishu Maseeh ke naam se prarthna karta hoon, amen.
'jan-gann-mana' suparichit hindi gazalakar dvijendr 'dvija' kee chhappan (56) gazalon ka pahala sankalan hai.
gazal jaise farasi-urdoo ke kavy-roop ke prati hindi men jo naya vatavaran taiyar huaa hai,nishchy hi isaka pramukh shrey svargiy dushyant kumar ko jata hai.
halanki dushyant kumar ke pahale, hindi men gazal rachana ka shubharanbh ho chuka tha.
keval aadhunik yug kee hi bat karen to bharatendu, badrinarayan chaudhari, pratap narayan mishra,nathoo ram sharma 'shankara', jay shankar 'prasada' nirala, da.
shamasher bahadur sinh,trilochan,janakee vallabh shastree,balabir sinh 'ranga' aadi ne hindi gazal ke prati apani ruchi aur rachana ka parichay diya tha .
lekin, ukt kaviyon kee gazalen jan-manas men aate men namak kee tarah ka hi prabhav utpann kar sakeen.
hindi gazal ko ek yugantarakari kavy vidha ke roop men pratishthit karane ka shrey dushyant kumar ko hi jata hai.
lekin 1975 men dushyant ke anayas dehavasan ke das varsh bad tak bhi kuchh log kahate rahe ki hindi gazal dushyant-kal men hi qdamatal kar rahi hai.aise kathan nishchit hi aagrah se yukt evan atishyoktipoorn the.
dushyant kumar ke dehavasan-kal se ab tak duniya bhi aage badhi hai aur hindi gazal bhi .
jivan, samaj, sanskriti,aur yatharth ke anek paripekshyon  ka udghatan huaa hai.
chetana ke naye staron kee nirmiti huee hai.
kala-sahity ke kshetr men  abhivyakti kee naee chunautiyan ubhari hain.
yatharth pahale se adhik saghan evan sanshlisht huaa hai.
jin sanjida hindi gazalakaron ne , manch yani bazar ka hissa n banate hue, anushasan,ekagrata aur aatyantikata ke sath desh ke bhinn-bhinn hisson men baithakar achchhi gazalen kahi hain- us feharist men gazalakar dvijendr 'dvija' ka nam sasamman shamil kiya ja sakata hai.,kyonki ve vigat teis varshon se maranda (palamapur) ,rohadoo, hamirapur, kangada aur dharmashala jaise parvatiy kshetron men nivas karate hue achchhi gazalen kah rahe hain- jahan vastut: gazalagoee ka koee utsah-vardhak mahaul nahin.

ye vo nahin jinhen mali kee dekhabhal lage.'
dvijendr 'dvija' angrezee ke pradhyapak hain-vardzavarth,keets, shaili se le kar aadhunik aangl-sahity ke adhyeta.
gazal keval unakee vaicharik- bhavabhoomi kee hi abhivyakti nahin, use kalatmak-star par bhi unhonne aatmasat kiya hai.
dvijendr kee gazalon men ek vishesh qism kee aantarikata, samajh, salahiyat, sookshmata aur saghanata ko mahasoos kiya ja sakata hai.ye bat sach hai ki dvijendr 'dvija' gazal ke mamale men kisi 'ustada' ke fer men nahin pade.fir bhi, gazal ko le kar unakee jigyasaen, unake anveshann, unake prayogon ko, ve desh ke guni gazalakaron se mil- bantakar,samajhate-boojhate…spasht karate rahe hain.
isake kahane ke kshetr men apane-aapako 'talib-e-ilma' (vidyarthi) samajhate rahane kee sahajata unake rachanakar -qd ko badhati hi hai.
bhashaee star par dvijendr 'dvija' dushyant -kul ke gazalakar hain.hindi aur urdoo ke bich santulan qaayam karane vale.
dvijendra  kee gazalon ka bhashaee- lahaza sada aur saf hai.
doosare shabdon men kahen to ye gazalen hindustani thath kee gazalen hain .
jahan tak she'ron men parasi gaee vishay-vastu ka saval hai to dvijendr 'dvija' ka 'kainvasa' qaafi vistrit hai.
jaisa ki gazal-sangrah ke shirshak se spasht hai-unakee gazalen samagr 'jan-gann-mana' kee gazalen hain.samajik, rajanitik,sanskritik evan aarthik morchon par tamam bechain saval uthati hueen.
aisa nahin hai ki pahadon men rahakar dvijendr pahadon kee bat nahin karate.
lekin unaka 'pahad' himachal tak simit nahin.
jati, mazahab,rang,naslon aue firaqaaparasti kee siyasat ke khailaf bhi unaka gazalakar tan kar khada hai.
pahad kee kathin zindagi men  khaoon(pasine) se sinche gae kheton kee upaj ka bantavara thik-thik hone kee chetavani bhi unake she'ron men hai.
kul mila kar, unakee gazalen pragatishil aur janavadi chetana se lais jagarook gazalen hain .,jo konpalon kee shaili men pallavit hoti hain.
unake andar gazal kee kavyatmakata kee hifazat karane kee avishrant chinta bhi dikhaee deti hai-jo nissandeh svagat-yogy hai.

krish n chandar ko to janate hi honge aap.
are, vahi krish n chandar jinakee 'ek gadhe kee aatmakatha' 'gadhe kee vapasi' 'ek gadha nefa men' jaisi rachanaen hain .
pahachan gae aap, shukr hai, main to dar hi gaya tha ki bat aage kaise badhegi .
janab, bat aisi hai ki aage jo kissa hai usaka nayak to vahi purana jana pahachana gadha hai .
aap kahenge isamen nae aur purane kee bat kahan se aa gaee .
ab gadhe to gadhe hi hote hain, yahi unakee vishisht pahachan hai .
yahi to, yahan bat hai aur gahari bat hai.
purana aur vahi gadha isalie ki isamen kishnachandaranuma farmoole ke antargat kuchh vishisht kism kee budghimatta dali gaee thi anyatha gadhe to sadiyon se ek hi 'daee' se nirmit kie ja rahe hain, nirih kism ke, gadhepan kee chamak lie, kharanuma budghimatta se otaprot .
halanki ye bat alag hai ki 'gadhon' ko yah galatafahami hai ki ve 'imoshanal fool' hain - dhobi ke pyar men, ghas ke ikarar men, bojha dhone ke intajar men .
aap kahenge ye kis taip ka imoshan hai, ab hai to hai, isalie to ye ...
ab rahane bhi dijie bar-bar kyon ek hi bat doharaee jae .
so, apane nayak ke vyaktitv ka jyada bakhan n karate hue bat ka sira fir se pakada jae .
mamala kuchh aisa hai ki is bar apane 'gadarbharaj' kee chetana rajaniti, pyar ya desh ko lekar vichalit nahin hai, balki ve kuchh naya soch rahe hain .
badalate vakt ke sath ve bhi kafi 'fyoochar planing' men vishvas rakhane lage hain .
unaka vichar hai ki ve apani aane vali santatiyon ke lie aakhir virasat men kya chhodakar ja rahe hain ? us par unakee poori jati kee nigahen jaroor hi tikee hogi .
halanki unake pas kafi kuchh hai fir bhi ve 'nem-fem-gen' kee kuchh ekstra vyavastha baithana chahate hain .
apani pidhiyon ke lie 'bhari-kuchh' chhodakar jana chahate hain .
kya ?..sheyar, nahin janab ye insananuma baten gadhon kee khopadi men nahin samati hain .
nivesh-gyan durbhagy se unake pichhale poore anubhav men aasapas se thikathak tarike se bhi nahin gujara hai, anyatha ve ekadh 'traee' to jaroor hi mar lete .
khair, arthajagat to is krity men hissa na lie jane par sadiyon tak unaka ahasan utar hi nahin paega.
bhari vichar manthan ke uparant ek din unake 'unnat lalat' aur 'virat khopade' men kriket men kairiyar banane ka aaidiya aa gaya .
tatkshan unhen apane charon or gardabh jati, apani santati, jayakar kee dhvaniyan sunaee dene lag .
aaidiya aane kee khushi men hi unhonne tin char bar kasakar 'rainka-rankee' kee, fir khud bhavishy ke rol modal ke roop men apani sthiti ka chintan kar sanyamit mudra dharan kar li.

to filahal ve sangit sun rahe the.
gharavale aur mohalle vasiyon ka manana tha ki ve kisi ko tadapane aur 'tarchara' karane kee apani praiktis ko niyamit jari rakhane kee bhavana ke antargat is mahafil ka aayojan karate rahate hain.
balki kaee shatiron ka to manana tha ki dalan men dera jamae baithe thakur sa'b door se aane-jane vale ke aadhar par 'tarchara' kee vanchhit 'digri' ka kaisit lagakar volyoom ke tregar ko dabate hain.
aaropi ke najadik aate hi use jabardasti rokakar pas vali khatiya par bitha lete h.
fir jab tak do-tin 'digriyon', unaka vanchhit prabhava, usase samane vale ke chehare par ubhari pida kee lakeeren, 'apane jamane' ke kisson ka aartanad in sabaka milajula prabhav usake chehare par har kon se dekh nahin lete hai.
usaka chhoot pana asanbhav hi tha.
...to bakaul in shatiron ke thakur sa'b sedist the, parapidak jo ritayarament ke bad bhi penshan kee evaj men apani nakari bamulahija baja rahe the.
pair men lagi kisi goli ke karan langadate rahane ke chalate door-door tak 'shikara' khojane nahin ja pate the, so najadikee nirih logon par hi julm dha rahe the.
balki kuchh atirikt shatiron ka to manana tha ki esapi n ban pane ke malal ke karan ve aaj bhi dyooti bajane men lage hain, taki marate-marate hi sahi dipartament unhen 'manada' esapi kee padavi jaise kuchh vyavastha nikal kar thama sake.
...to ab drishy parivartan ke tahat ve dalan men baithe hain.
sangit sun rahe hain, saraunte se supari kat rahe hain.
so mutthiyan bhinch nahin pa rahi hain.
anguli katane ka dar hai, jis karan aankh bhi minch nahin pa rahi hai.
lapatan chhotoo pas men baithe hain, unake jamane se rajadar-sajheedara, vasooli-ejenta, mukhabira, thukaee-pitaee, vasooli ke pratyek maukon ke aayojan ke sanyojanakarta.
ritayarament ke bad bhi ve khud ko dyooti men hi manane kee mansha ke tahat thakur sa'b ke 'krityon' men sahayogi kee haisiyat se aaj bhi khade najar aate hain.
shikar kee pakad aur usakee 'aakarikee' men praranbhik parivartan ka mahati dayitv bhi varshon unhin ke pas raha hai.
isi ke chalate ve abhi bhi 'samaj ke dushmanon', rishtedaron men apane virodhiyon ko gahe-bagahe lekar thakur sa'b ke pas pahunchate rahate hain, taki sammilit aayojan ke madhyam se kisi sima tak apani dyooti bhi poori kar len aur purane jamane ka raub galib kar usake dil men dahashat bhi baithaee ja sake.
pas pahunchane valon ke lie thakur sa'b ke pas apane jamane ke kisson ke alava har mudde par maulik vichar bhi the, jise ve pulisiya vinamrata se prastut kar samane vale ko abhibhoot kara dete the.
aaj chhotoo ko sa'b behad udas lag rahe the.
