kya mathura , kya barasana - - kya gokul , kya nandaganv! matalab yah ki brajakshetr kee inch - inch jamin par pativrata sushila kee mahima gaee jati thi.
log kahate ki agar sakshat pativrata nari ke darshan karana chahate ho to devi sushila ke darshan karo.
thi bhi yahi bat.
sushila kee jindagi ka har pal apane pati ke lie tha.
pati ke darshan kie bina vah jal n piti.
ek bar vah apani ek saheli ke yahan gaee.
saheli ka pati kahin parades gaya huaa tha.
lekin khane ke lie saheli ne nana prakar ke svadisht vyanjan pakae the.
sushila yah dekhakar hakkee - bakkee rah gaee.
vah to pati kee anupasthiti men ek boond tak grahan karane kee bat n soch sakati thi.
isalie usase n raha gaya.
vah boli , " bahan , tum kaisi stree ho! tumhare pati to parades men hain aur tumane apane lie itani tarah ke vyanjan pakae hain.
bhala ek pativrata ke lie yah sab shobha deta hai! sachchi pativrata to vah hai jo pati ko dekhe bina jal tak n pie.
"
sushila kee saheli bade munhafat svabhav kee thi.
dil kee bhi vah badi saf thi.
boli , " bahan sushila , yah sab dhakosalebaji mujhase nahin chalati.
agar main apane pati ke bahar hone par bhi achchha khana khati hoon to isaka matalab yah to nahin hota ki main unhen nahin chahati.
main to jaisi khush unake samane rahati hoon vaisi hi unake pichhe bhi.
agar koee mujh par ungali uthane par hi tula hoga to use main rok nahin sakati.
bakee yah to sirf main janati hoon ya mere pati , ki ham ek - doosare ko kitana chahate hain.
" saheli ke is javab se sushila jal - bhunakar rah gaee.
usane munh chuniyakar kaha , " yah to sab thik hai , lekin tum pativrata nahin ho.
pativrata stree ke lie shastron men likha hai ki pati kee gairahajiri men vah jal tak n pie.
" saheli ne isaka bhi karara javab diya.
boli , " aise shastr mere thenge se! " ant men bat yahan tak badh gaee ki sushila tunakakar apane ghar laut aaee.
ghar aakar sara kissa usane apane pati ko bataya.
pati bhi sushila ko bahut chahata tha aur usakee nishkam pati - bhakti se bahut prabhavit tha.
fir bhi kabhi - kabhi use yah jaroor lagata tha ki yah sab dhong hai.
agar pati ek mahina tak ghar par n rahe to kya koee stree bina ann - pani ke ek mahina tak rah sakati hai! aur use laga ki yah bilakul asanbhav hai.
agar koee jiddi stree is bat par ad hi jae to jivit nahin bach sakati.
yah sochakar pati ne sushila kee pariksha lene ka vichar banaya.
kaee dinon tak vah tarah - tarah se sushila ko kasauti par kasata raha , lekin sushila har bar khari utarati.
kabhi vah snan der se karata , to kabhi khet se dopahar dhale lautata.
kabhi - kabhi to aisa hota ki parosi thali tak samane hone par vah bahana banakar bahar nikal jata aur din dhale lautata.
lekin sushila ne kabhi bhi pati ke khane se pahale pani tak n piya.
ek din sushila ke pati ne kaha , " aaj mera man khir aur puaa khane ka ho raha hai.
isalie khoob ilayachi gari dalakar pue aur chiraunji , kishamish , kesar dalakar khir bana banao.
" ye donon chijen sushila ko bhi badi priy thin.
isalie khoob man lagakar usane ye chijen banaee.
kesar aur ilayachi aur desi ghee kee sugandh se banate samay hi sushila ke munh men pani aane laga.
chijen bana chukane ke bad sushila ne apane pati se jhatapat snan kar lene ko kaha.
lekin pati ko to us din dhairy kee pariksha leni thi.
isalie kafi der tak vah dhil dale raha aur talata raha.
sushila ke bar - bar kahane par , aakhir men harakar , vah balti - lota aur rassi lekar nahane gaya.
nahane men bhi usane kafi der laga di.
idhar sushila kee aaten mare bhookh ke kulabulane lagi thi.
lekin jaise hi dehari ke bahar use pati ke khadaoon kee aavaj sunaee di , use dilasa bandhi ki ab to khane ka samay aa hi gaya.
lekin jaise hi pati ne dehari de andar pair rakhe , dayen pair kee khadaoon se pair aisa fisala ki vah charon khane chit fail gaya.
balti - lota hath se chhootakar door ja gire aur aankhen faili kee faili rah gaee.
yah dekha to sushila jis halat men thi vaisi hi daudi pas jakar sir hilaya , aavajen din , lekin sab bekar.
pati agar jinda hota tab to bolata hi , lekin usake to pran pakheroo ud chuke the , isalie bhala vah kaise bolata.
sushila kee aankhen dabadaba aaee aur gala bhar aaya.
usaka man huaa ki dhad marakar ro pade.
lekin tabhi use khir aur pue ka dhyan ho aaya.
usane socha ki pati ab mar hi gae hain.
rone se ji to paenge nahi.
han , aas - pados ke log jaroor jud jaenge.
aur tab khir - pue khane ka mauka to milane se raha.
isalie behatar yah hoga ki pahale main khir - pue kha loon , tab rona - dhona shuroo karoon.
yah sochakar vah chupachap gaee aur jaldi - jaldi khir udane lagi.
pue agale din ke lie rakh lie , kyonki unake kharab hone ka dar n tha.
asaliyat yah thi ki pati mara nahin tha , balki marane ka natak kie pada tha.
isalie apani patni kee yah sari harakaten vah dekhata raha.
jab sushila khir khoob ji bharakar kha chukee to jhatapat munh dhoya aur lamba - sa ghoonghat nikalakar pati ke pas gaee aur sine se chipatakar rone lagi.
rone ke sath - sath vah yah bhi kahati jati thi - -
" tum to chale paramadham koon , ham hoon soon kuchh bakkhaun (kaho).
"
usaka pati kuchh der tak to usake nakali prem aur dukh ko sahan karata raha.
lekin ant men usase n raha gaya.
aur jaise hi sushila ne apana jumala `tum to chale paradham koon ham hoon soon kuchh bak khau' khatm kiya , vaise hi usake pati ne usise milata - julata ek jumala jad diya.
pati ka jumala is prakar tha - -
khir sadopa kari tau puanoon koon tau chak khau.
"
ab to sushila kee aisi halat ho gaee ki kato to khoon tak n nikale.
use kya pata tha ki usaka pati natak kie pada hai aur usakee pariksha le raha hai! man hi man vah rah - rahakar apane aapako kosati rahi ki yah kya kiya.
kyon n jaban par kaboo rakhakar buddhi se kam liya! aur usake bad fir kabhi kisi ne sushila ke munh se apane pativrat dharm kee tarif nahin suni.
pahale jaisi dinge hankana ab sushila ne band kar diya tha.
-------.
shekhachilli aur kuen kee pariyan
ek ganv men ek sust aur kamachor aadami rahata tha.
kam - dham to vah koee karata n tha , han baten banane men bada mahir tha.
isalie log use shekhachilli kahakar pukarate the.
shekhachilli ke ghar kee halat itani kharab thi ki mahine men bis din choolha nahin jal pata tha.
shekhachilli kee bevakoofi aur susti kee saja usakee bivi ko bhi bhugatani padati aur bhookhe rahana padata.
ek din shekhachilli kee bivi ko bada gussa aaya.
vah bahut bigadi aur kaha , " ab main tumhari koee bhi bat nahin sunana chahati.
chahe jo kuchh karo , lekin mujhe to paisa chahie.
jab tak tum koee kamaee karake nahin laoge , main ghar men nahin , ghusane doongi.
" yah kahakar bivi ne shekhachilli ko naukari kee khoj men jane ko majaboor kar diya.
sath men , raste ke lie char rookhi - sookhi rotiyan bhi bandh din.
sag - salan koee tha hi nahin , deti kahan se? is prakar shekhachilli ko n chahate hue bhi naukari kee khoj men nikalana pada.
shekhachilli sabase pahale apane ganv ke sahookar ke yahan gae.
socha ki shayad sahookar koee chhoti - moti naukari de de.
lekin nirash hona pada.
sahookar ke karindon ne dyodhi par se hi dant - dapatakar bhaga diya.
ab shekhachilli ke samane koee rasta nahin tha.
fir bhi ek ganv se doosare ganv tak din bhar bhatakate rahe.
ghar laut nahin sakate the , kyonki bivi ne sakht hidayat de rakhi thi ki jab tak naukari n mil jae , ghar men pair n rakhana.
din bhar chalate - chalate jab shekhachilli thakakar choor ho gae to socha ki kuchh der susta liya jae.
bhookh bhi joron kee lagi thi , isalie khana khane kee bat bhi unake man men thi.
tabhi kuchh door par ek kuaan dikhaee diya.
shekhachilli ko himmat bandhi aur usi kee or badh chale.
kuen ke chabootare par baithakar shekhachilli ne bivi kee di huee rotiyon kee potali kholi.
usamen char rookhi - sookhi rotiyan thin.
bhookh to itani jor kee lagi thi ki un charon se bhi poori tarah n bujh pati.
lekin samasya yah bhi thi ki agar charon rotiyon aaj hi kha dalin to kal - parason ya usase agale din kya karoonga , kyonki naukari khoje bina ghar ghusana namumakin tha.
isi soch - vichar men shekhachilli bar - bar rotiyan ginate aur barabar rakh dete.
samajh men nahin aata ki kya kiya jae.
jab shekhachilli se apane aap koee faisala n ho paya to kuen ke dev kee madad leni chahi.
vah hath jodakar khade ho gae aur bole , " he baba , ab tumhin hamen aage rasta dikhao.
din bhar kuchh bhi nahin khaya hai.
bhookh to itani lagi hai ki charon ko kha jane ke bad bhi shayad hi mit pae.
lekin agar charon ko kha leta hoon to aage kya karoonga? mujhe abhi kaee dinon yahin aasapas bhatakana hai.
isalie he kuaan baba , ab tumhin batao ki main kya karoon! ek khaoon , do khaoon , tin khaoon charon kha jaoon? " lekin kuen kee or se koee javab nahin mila.
vah bol to sakata nahin tha , isalie kaise javab deta!
us kuen ke andar char pariyan rahati thin.
unhonne jab shekhachilli kee bat suni to socha ki koee danav aaya hai jo unhin charon ko khane kee bat soch raha hai.
isalie tay kiya ki charon ko kuen se bahar nikalakar us danav kee vinati karani chahie , taki vah unhen n khae.
yah sochakar charon pariyan kuen se bahar nikal aaee.
hath jodakar ve shekhachilli se bolin , " he danavaraj , aap to bade balashali hain! aap vyarth hi ham charon ko khane kee bat soch rahe hain.
agar aap hamen chhod den to ham kuchh aisi chijen aapako de sakati hain jo aapake bade kam aaengi.
" pariyon ko dekhakar v unakee baten sunakar shekhachilli hakke - bakke rah gae.
samajh men n aaya ki kya javab de.
lekin pariyon ne is chuppi ka yah matalab nikala ki unakee bat man li gaee.
isalie unhonne ek kathaputala v ek katora shekhachilli ko dete hue kaha , " he danavaraj , aap ne hamari bat man li , isalie ham sab aapaka bahut - bahut upakar manati hain.
sath hi apani yah do tuchchh bhenten aapako de rahi hain.
yah kathaputala har samay aapakee naukari bajaega.
aap jo kuchh kahenge , karega.
aur yah katora vah har ek khane kee chij aapake samane pesh karega , jo aap isase mangenge.
" isake bad pariyan fir kuen ke andar chali gaee.
is sabase shekhachilli kee khushi kee sima n rahi.
usane socha ki ab ghar laut chalana chahie.
kyonki bivi jab in donon chijon ke karatab dekhegi to fooli n samaegi.
lekin sooraj doob chuka tha aur rat ghir aaee thi , isalie shekhachilli pas ke ek ganv men chale gae aur ek aadami se rat bhar ke lie apane yahan thahara lene ko kaha.
yah bhi vada kiya ki isake badale men vah ghar ke sare logon ko achchhe - achchhe pakavan v mithaiyan khilaenge.
vah aadami taiyar ho gaya aur shekhachilli ko apani baithak men thahara liya.
shekhachilli ne bhi apane katore ko nikala aur usane apane karatab dikhane ko kaha.
bat kee bat men khane kee achchhi - achchhi chijon ke dher lag gae.
jab sare log kha - pi chuke to us aadami kee gharavali joothe baratanon ko lekar nali kee or chali.
yah dekhakar shekhachilli ne use rok diya aur kaha ki mera kathaputala bartan saf kar dega.
shekhachilli ke kahane bhar kee der thi ki kathaputale ne sare ke sare bartan pal bhar men nipata dale.
shekhachilli ke kathaputale aur katore ke yah ajibogarib karatab dekhakar ganv ke us aadami aur usakee bivi ke man men lalach aa gaya shekhachilli jab so gae to vah donon chupake se uthe aur shekhachilli ke katore v kathaputale ko churakar unakee jagah ek nakali kathaputala aur nakali hi katora rakh diya.
shekhachilli ko yah bat pata n chali.
sabere uthakar unhonne hath - munh dhoya aur donon nakali chijen lekar ghar kee or chal die.
ghar pahunchakar unhonne badi dingen hankee aur bivi se kaha , " bhagavan , ab tujhe kabhi kisi bat ke lie jheenkana nahin padega.
n ghar men khane ko kisi chij kee kami rahegi aur n hi koee kam hamen - tumhen karana padega.
tum jo chij khana chahogi , mera yah katora tumhen khilaega aur jo kam karavana chahogi mera yah kathaputala kar dalega.
" lekin shekhachilli kee bivi ko in baton par vishvas n huaa.
usane kaha , " tum to aisi dinge roj hi mara karate ho.
kuchh karake dikhao to janoon.
" han , kyon nahin? " shekhachilli ne tapak se jabav diya aur katora v kathaputalen men apane - apane karatab dikhane ko kaha.
lekin vah donon chijen to nakali thin , at: shekhachilli kee bat jhoothi nikali.
natija yah huaa ki unakee bivi pahale se jyada naraj ho uthi.
kaha , " tum mujhe is tarah dhokha dene kee koshish karate ho.
jab se tum ghar se gae ho , ghar men choolha nahin jala hai.
kahin jakar man lagakar kam karo to kuchh tanakha mile aur ham donon ko do joon khana nasib ho.
in jaduee chijon se kuchh nahin hone ka.
"
bebas shekhachilli khisiyae hue - se fir chal die.
vah fir usi kuen ke chabootare par jakar baith gae.
samajh men nahin aa raha tha ki ab kya kiya jae.
jab sochate - sochate vah har gae aur kuchh bhi samajh men n aaya to unakee aankhen chhalachhala aaee aur rone lage.
yah dekhakar kuen kee charon pariyan fir bahar aayi aur shekhachilli se unake rone ka karan poochha.
shekhachilli ne sari aapabiti kah sunaee.
pariyon ko hansi aa gaee.
ve bolin , " hamane to tumako koee bhayanak danav samajha tha.
aur isalie khush karane ke lie ve chijen di thin.
lekin tum to bade hi bhole - bhale aur sidhe aadami nikale.
khair , ghabarane kee jaroorat nahin.
ham tumhari madad karengi.
tumhara kathaputala aur katora unhin logon ne churaya hai , jinake yahan rat ko tum ruke the.
is bar tumhen ek rassi v danda de rahi hain.
inakee madad se tum un donon ko bandh v marakar apani donon chijen vapas pa sakate ho.
" isake bad pariyan fir kuen men chali gayin.
jaduee rassi - danda lekar shekhachilli fir usi aadami ke yahan pahunche aur kaha , " is bar main tumhen kuchh aur naye karatab dikhaoonga.
" vah aadami bhi lalach ka mara tha.
usane samajha ki is bar kuchh aur jaduee chijen hath lagengi.
isalie usamen khushikhushi shekhachilli ko apane yahan tika liya.
lekin is bar ulta hi huaa.
shekhachilli ne jaise hi hukm diya vaise hi us gharavale v usakee bivi ko jaduee rassi ne kas kar bandh liya aur jaduee danda danadan pitaee karane laga.
ab to ve donon chikhane - chillane aur mafi mangane lage.
shekhachilli ne kaha , " tum donon ne mujhe dhokha diya hai.
mainne to yah socha tha ki tumane mujhe rahane ko jagah di hai , isalie main bhi tumhare sath koee bhalaee kar doon.
lekin tumane mere sath ulta bartav kiya! mere kathaputale aur katore ko hi chura liya.
ab jab ve donon chijen tum mujhe vapas kar doge , tabhi main apani rassi v dande ko rukane ka hukm doonga.
" un donon ne jhatapat donon churaee huee chijen shekhachilli ko vapas kar din.
yah dekhakar shekhachilli ne bhi apani rassi v dande ko ruk jane ka hukm de diya.
ab apani charon jaduee chijen lekar shekhachilli prasan n man se ghar ko vapas laut pade.
jab bivi ne fir dekha ki shekhachilli vapas aa gae hain to use bada gussa aaya.
use to kaee dinon se khane ko kuchh mila nahin tha , isalie vah bhi jhunjhalaee huee thi.
door se hi dekhakar vah chikhi , " kamachor tum fir laut aae! khabaradar , ghar ke andar pair n rakhana! varana tumhare lie belan rakha hai.
" yah sunakar shekhachilli daravaje par hi ruk gae! man hi man unhonne rassi v dande ko hukm diya ki ve use kaboo men karen.
rassi aur dande ne apana kam shuroo kar diya.
rassi ne kasakar bandh liya aur dande ne pitaee shuroo kar di.
yah jaduee karatab dekhakar bivi ne bhi apane sare hathiyar dal die aur kabhi vaisa bura bartav n karane ka vada kiya.
tabhi use bhi rassi v dande se chhutakara mila.
ab shekhachilli ne apane kathaputale v katore ko hukm dena shuroo kiya.
bas , fir kya tha! kathaputala bartan - bhade v jin - jin chijon kee kami thi jhatapat le aaya aur katore ne bat kee bat men nana prakar ke vyanjan taiyar kar die.
aaj jindagi men fir ek bar main chaubis maee ke din balgariya men hoon, jab is desh men aksharon ka utsav manaya jata hai...
aaj savere se menh baras raha tha.
kal se sabhyata kee raksha par vichar karane ke lie jo kanfrens shuroo hogi, usake lie mulkon se log aae hue hain, aur ham sab soch rahe the ki is barasate menh men aaj aksharon ka utsav kaise hoga..
lekin utsav usi aab-tab se huaa, das baje se lekar sadhe gyarah baje tak, jaise har baras hota hai.
har ilake ke saikadon bachchon ne, barasate hue menh men jaloos nikala, lal hari pili aur safed jhandiyan laharaee.
jinhonne slav lipi banaee thi, un do vidvanon-krial aur maitovi-~kee tasviren laharaeen.
aur un aksharon ko istemal karake, jin shayaron aur adibon ne mulk ke gulam sharir men svatantrata kee ruh jagaee thi, un shayaron aur adibon kee tasviren bhi laharaee...
main bahut-se shayaron aur adibon ke namon se parichit hoon, imaroj ne bhi inake skaich banae hain, isalie ham donon, juloos ke jhadon par laharaee gaee tasviron se, kaeeyon ke nam pahachanate rahe-vah vapatsarov vah kharisto botef...vah gio milev ..vah eevan vajov...vah kharisto samaranainskee ...
aur itane men samane ek jhande se laharati huee ek tasvir dikhaee di-dora gabe kee...
1966 men main pahali bar dora gabe se mili thi, aur milate hi ham donon ko ek doosare kee aisi pahachan ho gaee ki hamane ek doosare se us kee najmen bhi sunin aur dilon kee baten bhi.
aur yah silasila pandrah baras chalata raha.
jab 1980 men main balgariya aaee thi, dora gabe se usake ghar milane gaee thi, to ek reshami rumal mere gale men dalakar usane kaha tha, `yah hamari aakhari mulakat hai, tum ab agali bar aaogi tab men nahin houngi...
mainen usake munh par hatheli rakhi, to usane meri hatheli ko honthon par se hatakar apani chhati par rakh liya, boli, "suno ! mainen ek lambi najm likhi hai-`samudr se baten ' ..." aur is varsh ke aarambh men maine suna tha ki vah samudr se baten karate hue, samudr men lin ho gaee hai...
aur dekha samane jo aksharon ka utsav manaya ja raha hai, usamen vah ek tasvir banakar , ek jhade par lahara rahi hai...
man kee jis halat men main dilli se aaee thi sirf men janati hoon, ya imaroj aur jaisa ki imaroj ke kaha tha, mainen apane desh kee dahalijon ko par karate samay sari udasi ko kenchuli kee tarah utar diya tha...
lekin ab-jab samane aksharon ke utsav men dora bage kee tasvir laharati huee dekhi to aankhon ka pani aankhon ka pani aankhon ke kahane ke bahar ho gaya.
honth sisak aae-' o khudaya ! yah bhi ek desh hai jo apani ek shayara ke aksharon ko aksharon ke utsav men shamil kar raha hai, aur ek mere aksharon vala panjab hai, jo aaj mere aksharon par faujadariyan kar raha hai...' mainen apani aankhon ko saugandh dilaee thi ki rona nahin, lekin do-ek pal ke lie jab meri aankhon ke saugandh ko tod diya, to pas khade imaroj se kuchh takat udhar lene ke lie usakee banh kasakar tham li...
usane meri or dekha, aur mere gale kee aavaj chahe gili thi, par hontho par jo lafz aae vah sookhe bhi the, sahaj bhi,-'mere bad, shayaron par faujadariyan karane valon, aur pavitr aksharon par goliyan chalane valon se kah dena ki duniya men vah goli kahin nahin bani hai jo sach ko lag sake...
7 maee kee dopahar thi jab dekha-pairon ke niche zamin bhi udasi ke rodon vali thi, aur sir ke oopar aasaman bhi udasi ke badalon se ghira huaa tha...
aur man n jane kaunase patal men utar gaya...
aur fir 14 maee kee rat thi jab aadhi nind kee halat men maine ek chikh kee tarah kaha tha-'mere nanak, ! maine tumhari kalpana karake dekhi hai, lekin aaj tumhen pratyaksh dekhana chahati hoon...kalpana kee aankhon se nahin, in had-mans kee aankhon se..' nahin janati, yah chikh kitani lambi thi-sirf itana janati hoon ki mere sharir ka rom-rom chikh bana huaa tha ki achanak aankhon ke samane ek ujala fail gaya, aur bijali jaisi ek tharatharahat mere sare sharir me utar gaee...
koee soorat samane nahin aaee, lekin ahasas jaisi ek aavaz suni-'tum ! usake astitv ka saboot mangati thin, saboot mil gaya ?' us aadhi nind kee halat men munh se nikala-'han, maine unhen dekh liya...' aur agale kaee dinon tak, akhabar valon ne jitane intarvyoo mange, main deti rahi aur guroo nanak ke bare men likhi huee meri nazamon par jo faujadari mukadame ka notis tha, usake javab ke lie, ek vakeel ko mukhyaranama bhi likhakar diya, lekin itane dinon si sari uparamata ke sath-chaudah tarikh kee rat vale sapane ne, mere mathe par jaise ek thandi hatheli rakh di.
21 maee kee sham ko balgariya jana tha, chali gaee.
25 maee se 27 maee tak sofiya men ko hi, kangres men sanskritik aur aadhyatmik moolyon ke bare men jo takarir karani thi, vah bhi kee.
lekin 28 maee se varna ja kar apani sehat ke lie jo ilaj lena tha, usake lie panch sau kilomitar ka safar karate hue prakriti ka jo manoram drishy dekha, usane faujadari mukadame vali bat kee udasi bhi aur gahari kar di aur 14 maee kee rat vale sapane kee tharatharahat bhi mathe men bhar di...
yahi ek tadap thi, ek sukoon tha, jo ek nazam banata gaya-
aaj se gyarah baras pahale imaroz aur mainne landan men ek skaindineviyan film dekhi thi, jisamen muhabbat ko kal-kal karate jharanon kee bhasha men pesh kiya gaya tha.
vahan kaee thietar aise hain jahan ek hi film din-bhar chalati rahati hai, aur ek paund ka tikat lekar aagar aap thietar men chale jaen to ek hi film ko, chahen to kaee bar dekh sakate hain.
imaroz aur maine bhi vah film us din kaee bar dekhi thi...
kahate hain, us film kee kahani ek sachchi ghatana ke aadhar par banaee gaee thi.
usamen sarkas men kam karane vali ladakee hai aur fauj ka ek sipahi.
donon apane kshetron se bahar nahin aa sakate, lekin donon ko ek doosare se bepanah muhabbat ho jati hai, aur us muhababt ka takaza hai ki donon ko kuchh din sath jaroor jina hai- donon apane-apane kshetr se bahar aa jate hain, aur janate hain ki donon bahut jaldi kanoon kee pakad men aa jaenge, isalie maut se udhar lie hue dinon men, vah har pal foolon kee aab-tab ke saman jite hain...
21 maee ko balgariya aane se pahale dilli men ek afavah suni thi ki aajakal panjab men jaise kaee log goliyon ka nishana ban rahe hain, main bhi vaise hi kisi goli ke nishane ka lakshy hoon...
ise afavah kahana hi sahi hai, vaise mainne yah bat ek vishvasaniy sootr se suni thi...
balgariya ka nimantran svikar karane kee manasik dasha nahin thi, lekin jitane bhi mere shubh-chintak mere pas aae the, unaka aagrah tha ki main yah nimantran zaroor svikar kar loon...
aur us samay gyarah baras pahale dekhi huee skendiviyan film kee kahani mere manas me ghul gaee...
aur laga-jindagi kee aakhari sans tak, foolon kee aab kee tarah jina hai...bad men balgariyan doston ka tapak bhi foolon ko pani dene jaisa tha...
lekin kabhi-kabhi ghor udasiyan bhi aankhon men jo pani nahin la sakati, kisi dost kee muhabbat us pani ka bandh tod deti hai...
aisi ghatana dilli men bhi huee thi jab khushavant sinh ne kaha tha-"main tumhen akeli kisi kachahari kee peshi men nahin jane doonga.
tumhare sath rahoonga.
agar tumhen kisi ne goli marani hai to sath men mujhe bhi mar den..." aur thik aisi hi bat haribhajan sinh ne bhi kahi thi-'dekho, shayar ke taur par mujhe jo hasil karana tha, kar liya hai.
talim ke kshetr men bhi jo pana tha, pa liya hai.
aur aalochak ke taur par bhi jo prapti karani thi, kar li hai.
ab tumhare sath marane ko taiyar hoon...' aur ab ekadam paraye desh men aaj 25 maee kee rat ko jab balga-riya ke sabase pyare shayar lyoobomir laivachail ne apane ghar davat par bulaya hai, to chabhiyon ke guchchhe men se ghar kee chabhi nikal kar mujhe thama di hai-"yah tumhara ghar hai, tumhara jab ji chahe, aakar khol liya karana !" laivachaiv ke ghar kee chabhi mainen apane mate se laga kar laivachaiv ko lauta di, aur "kaha, dosto ! tumhari bivi chitrakar hai, usase kaho ki is chabhi ka chitr banakar mujhe de de.
main jab tak jioongi-tumhare bol kee nishani apane pas rakhoongi." lekin levachaiv ke ghar kee sidhiyan utar kar, jab men aur imaroz apane hotal ke lie kar men baithe, to imaroz ke kandhe se sir laga kar-mujhe rona aa gaya...
sofiya,-25 maee, rat sadhe barah baje is bar zindagi kee ganimat vali bat hai ki balgariya ka nimantran sirf mujhe hi nahin tha, imaroz ko bhi tha, isalie safar ka ek-ek pal khushagavar hai...
sofiya se varna jate hue panch sau kilomitar raste ka chappa-chappa falon aur foolon se lada huaa dekha, to pata laga ki kaee ujadon ka ek-ek ekad tukada, yahan kee sarakar ne un logon ko bina kisi muly ke, diya hai, jo bhi apani mehanat se aabad karake rakh sakaten hain.
shart sirf ek zamin par sari mehanat unhen apane hi hathon se karani hai, kisi majadoor ko ujarat dekar apane khet ya bagiche ka kam nahin karavana hai...
maine hans kar kamaroz ke kaha, "chalo, yahi bas jaen ! tum to jaton ke putr ho, kheti-badi tumhari nason men hai, tum ek ekad zamin aabad karana, aur main kheton men jhonpadi dalakar rahoongi, tumhara khana pakaya karoongi..." yah din lal pakee huee cheriyon ke hain aur hamane cheriyon kee tokari bhar kar kar men rakhi huee thi.
imaroz ne kaha,"gehoon aur makaee bijane vali mehanat shayad ab mujh se nahin ho sakegi, ham poori ek ekad zamin men cheriyon ke paudhe laga lenge...roj lal pakee huee cheriyan kha liya karenge...tum pakkee cheriyan todati raha karana.." main bhi usi rau men thi, kaha "han, ham cheriyan chunate rahenge, main kabhi-kabhi nazam bhi likh liya karoongi, tum kabhi-kabhi pent bhi kar liyo karana..." aur imaroz ne kaha,"fir kabhi koee idhar se guzarega to poochhega,-yahan kahin ek shayara kee jhonpadi hai, jo kabhi hindustan se aaee thi." "han, vaise hi jaise hamare damodar ne apani kahani men likha hai ki koee rahi makke kee or ja raha tha.
raste men rat ho gaee, lekin us bhookhe-pyase rahi ke pas n roti ka ek tukada tha, n ek ghoont pani, aur n hi rat ka koee thikana.
us samay registan men use ek jhonpadi nazar aaee.
vahan pahuncha to hir bibi ne use pani ka katora bhar kar diya, aur kaha abhi miyan ranjha bheden chara kar lautega, to tumhen dudh ka katora doongi..." aur meri bat abhi muhan men hi thi ki imaroj ne kaha-"vah bhi tum aur main the.
tab makke ke raste men jakar bas gae the, ab is janm men varna jane vale raste par bas jate hain..." aur hansi-hansi kee bat ek thandi sans ka mod mud gaee, mere munh se nikala, "yah siyalon aur khedon ke karm hamen har janm men bhugatane hain ?"
ab jis sapane se badi hairan jagi hoon, imaroz kee banh pakad kar kitani hi der tak usakee or dekhati rah gaee ki yah sapana use kaise sunaoon ! kuchh bhi lafjon kee pakad men nahin aa raha tha...haule-haule aadhe-adhoore lafjon men sunane kee koshish kee...
"kisi divar men ek bahut bada shisha laga huaa hai...achanak mera dhyan shishe kee or jata hai aur dekhati hoon ki sir se pair tak meri soorat kisi mandir men padi huee parvati kee soorat jaisi ho gaee hai...badan par safed dhoti hai jis ka palla sir tak lipata hai sir par lambe balon ka ek jooda hai...naksh isi tarah tarashe hue...par meri soorat, aaj se kuchh baras pahale jaisi hai...chehare par ganbhirata aaj jaisi hai, par nakshon kee javani aaj se kuchh baras pahale jaisi...
"patthar kee ek gadhi huee moorti kee tarah apane aapako dekhati hoon...aur khud hi kahati hoon-aaj mainne yah kaisa bhes banaya huaa hai ? bilkul shiv kee gauri jaisa..." sapane kee hairani aur khumari bataee nahin jati.
hamara desh ek hai.
hamari sanskritik virasat ek hai.
is desh men bole jane vali bhinn-bhinn bhashaon ke 50% se adhik shabd ek saman hain.
fir bhi yadi ek rajy ka nivasi doosare rajy men jae to bilakul ajanabi ho jata hai.
isake viparit yoorop men alag-alag desh hain, unakee sanskritik virasat alag-alag hain.
unakee bhashaon men pae jane vale shabd bhi saman nahin hain.
fir bhi yoorop ke ek desh ka nivasi agar doosare desh men jata hai to bhasha se usaka aparichay, aatmiyata men badhak nahin banata.
isake anek karanon men se shayad sabase jyada mahatvapoorn karan hai lipi.
yoorop kee sabhi bhashaon kee ek lipi- roman lipi unake ek doosare ke najadik aane aur paradeshi bhashaen sikhane ka karan banati hai.
yoorop ka nivasi doosare yooropiy desh men ja kar bhi anajan nahin rahata kyonki vah lipi ke karan jagahon, bason, sadakon aadi ke nam pahachan leta hai aur thoda prayas karane par bhasha ka bhi kamachalaoo gyan hasil kar leta hai.
isake viparit hamare ek rajy ka nivasi matr lipi ke bhed ke karan doosare rajy men ajanabi aur paraya ban jata hai.
udaharan ke lie bengaloor men 'ramanagar' ke samane khada vyakti yah nahin jan pata ki vah 'ramanagar' ke samane khada hai.
jabaki ramanagar shabd usaka parichit hai keval lipi ke karan vah paraya ho gaya hai.
aaj duniya sikudati ja rahi hai.
log ek antararashtriy lipi kee bat karane lage hain.
hamare svatantrata sainaniyon kee drishti se bhi yah bat chhupi nahin thi.
unhonne is samasya par ganbhir vichar vimarsh kiya, isake itihas kee khoj kee.
vibhinn lipiyon ka tulanatmak adhyayan kiya.
isake natijon ne unhen sukhad aash‍chary se bhar diya.
unhonne paya ki –
1.
hamari kaee bhashaen ek hi lipi men likhi jati hain, jaise hindi, sanskrit, nepali, marathi aadi bhashaen devanagari lipi men likhi jati hain aur asamiya aur bangala bangala lipi men aur urdoo aur kashmiri arabi lipi men likhi jati hain.
2.
kaee lipiyan alag hone ke bavajood bahut kuchh saman hi hain.
jaise devanagari aur gujarati ya kannad aur telugoo lipiyan.
jab inhonne isaka karan khoja to paya ki aaj se takariban 2000 sal pahale hamari sabhi bhashaen ek hi lipi men likhi jati thin.
yahan yah kahana aprasangik nahin hoga ki purane bharat men sanskrit ek bhasha thi aur us vaqat isake alava kaee aur bhashaen bhi maujood thin.
aaj durbhagy se ve bhashaen nahin milatin parantu purane sahity men kabhi-kabhar unaka zikr aa jata hai, aachary kishori das vajapeyi ne apani vikhyat pustak 'hindi shabdanushasan' men sabit kiya hai ki bharat kee aadhunik bhashaen sanskrit se paida nahin hueen balki isake sath hi bole jane vali kaee doosari bhashaon se vikasit huee hain.
lekin agar hamen purane bharat men ek hi bhasha hone ka bhram hota hai to isaka karan vibhinn bhashaon dvara ek hi lipi ka istemal karana hai.
aisa bhi nahin hai ki us samay doosari lipiyan nahin thin.
parantu us samay ke logon ne desh kee ekata ke lie yah zaroori samajha ki ek hi lipi apanaee jae.
aur yah lipi thi- brahmi lipi.
do hazar sal ke betaratib vikas ne durbhagy se brahmi lipi ko 10 lipiyon men badal diya, jo hamari aadhunik lipiyan hain.
hamare svatantrata sainaniyon ke man men aaya ki agar aaj se 2000 sal pahale is desh kee ek lipi ho sakati thi to aaj kyon nahin ho sakati.
unhonne tay kiya ki hamari ek rashtr lipi honi chahie.
jo pahale apani lipi ke sath-sath is lipi men bhi samagri chhape aur bad men doosari lipiyan chhod kar ek hi lipi rah jae.
gahan vichar vimarsh ke bad ve is natije par pahunche ki devanagari lipi hi hamari rashtr lipi ho sakati hai.
rashtr lipi ke roop men yani bharat kee sabhi bhashaon jaise panjabi, gujarati, telugoo, tamil aadi kee lipi ke roop men devanagari ko apanae jane ke samarthakon sabhi bhashaon kee vibhootiyan shamil thin.
jaise gujarati bhashi- mahatma gandhi, marathi bhashi- bal gangadhar tilak, panjabi bhashi- shahid bhagat sinh, bangala bhashi- sharadacharan mitra.
par devanagari hi kyon? kyonki devanagari lipi ke ---
k.
hindi, marathi aur nepali kee lipi hone ke karan is desh kee bahusankhyak janata is lipi se parichit hai.
kh.
sanskrit kee lipi hone ke karan is desh ke paranparagat roop se padhe-likhe tabake is lipi se parichit hain.
g.
kaee doosari lipiyan jaise gujarati, gurumukhi aadi lipiyan bhi devanagari se kafi milati hain.
atah in bhashaon ko bolane vale log bhi devanagari se aparichit nahin hain.
gh.
sabase mahatvapoorn yah ki vibhinn puravasheshon se pata chalata hai ki kannad aadi bhashaon ke tamr patr aadi devanagari lipi men likhe milate hain.
yani yah pahale hi rashtr lipi rah chukee hai.
par isamen kuchh samasyaen bhi hain.
vibhinn bhashaon men kuchh aisi dhvaniyan ya chihn vikasit ho gae hain jo hindi devanagari men nahin milate.
to kya kiya jae.
vibhinn vidvanon ke sahayog se bharat sarakar ne nae chihn vikasit kar hindi devanagari ko badhaya taki yah bharat kee sabhi bhashaon kee dhvaniyon ko vyakt kar sake.
ise parivardhit devanagari nam diya gaya.
sarvapratham 1966 men bharat sarakar ke kendriy hindi nideshalay ne ise chhapaya aur vitarit kiya.
aajadi ke dauran devanagari lipi men kaee bhashaen chhapane ke kaee prayat‍n hue jinamen sharadacharan mitr kee patrika 'devanagar', baboo ramanand chatarji ka patr 'chaturbhashi' jisamen hindi, gujarati, marathi aur bangala ke lekh devanagari lipi men chhapa karate the; aazadi ke bad 1953 men hamare pahale rashtr pati do.
rajendr prasad ke sanrakshan men 'devanagar' ka punarprakashan aaranbh huaa.
isake atirikt gyanapith prakashan aur sahity akademi ne bhi bhinn bhashaon ke sahity ko devanagari men lane ka kam kiya.
urdoo ka to sara sahity hi devanagari men chhapata hai.
kendriy hindi nideshalay aur rajabhasha vibhag ne bhi aise kaee prayas kie.
bharatiy bhashaon kee kanpyootari ke itihas men 15 aprail 2005 ka din aitihasik hai.
is din bharat sarakar ne aisa kadam uthaya hai ki jisane tamil kanpyootari ke raste men aane vali sari badhaon aur samasyaon ka hal ek hi sidi men upalabdh kara diya.
aur vah bhi bilkul muft, jise aap nissankoch apane mitron ko vitarit bhi kar sakate hain.
yah sidi soochana praudyogikee men bharatiy bhashaon ke upayog ko badhava dene ke soochana praudyogikee vibhag aur sanchar evan soochana praudyogikee mantralay ke rashtriy prayas ka ek kadam tha.
sanchar evan soochana praudyogikee mantree shree dayanidhi maran ke dimag kee upaj yah pariyojana sabhi bharatiy bhashaon ke softaveyar upakaranon ko muft aur mukt upalabdh karane kee hai.
jab yah pariyojana poorn hogi to sabhi 22 bharatiy bhashaon men is prakar kee sidiyan jari ho chukee hongi.
is pariyojana ke agale charan ka din tha 20 joon 2005, jab rashtriy salahakar parishad kee adhyaksha aur bharatiy rashtriy kangres kee adhyaksha shreemati soniya gandhi ne "hindi softaveyar upakarann" namak sidi ka lokarpan kiya.
is avasar par hamare pradhanamantree shree manamohan sinh bhi upasthit the.
sanyukt pragatishil gathabandhan ke sajha nyoonatam karyakram ka ek mudda soochana praudyogikee ka vahaniy keemat par prasar karana bhi tha.
is sidi par jari apane sandesh men shree dayanidhi maran ne kaha tha—"mujhe poora vishvas hai ki yadi kanpyootar ke labh aam janata tak pahunchane hon to isaka upayog unakee apani matribhasha men kiya jana anivary hai.
isake lie aavashyak font aur bhasha ke softaveyar upakaran logon ko aasani se upalabdh hone chahie.
mujhe ummid hai ki hindi bhasha se sanbandhit ye softaveyar upakaran tatha font nihshulk upalabdh hone se aam janata ko bhi kanpyootar ka prayog karane ke nae avasar milenge." aur yah nishchit hi ek nishtha aur samarpan ka mamala hai.
unhonne lokarpan ke avasar par kaha ki yah sasti aur sthaniy praudyogikee ko janata ko upalabdh karane kee disha men ek kadam hai.
ve manate hain ki vyavasayik utpadon ka mahatv hai par ghareloo soochana praudyogikee upabhog ke vikas ke vartaman charan men font aur softaveyar upakaranon ko tab tak vitarit nahin kiya ja sakata jab tak ki ve muft aur mukt n hon.
jo praudyogikee vahaniy hogi vahi bharatiy logon kee rachanatmak kshamata ko unmukt karane kee sanbhavana rakhegi.
itane roopon men jinakee ham kalpana bhi nahin kar sakate, aur jaisa ki vikasit deshon ka anubhav raha hai.
is sidi ke jariye sabase achchhi bat yah ho rahi hai ki aam aadami ke hit men bhashayi praudyogikee ke prayogashalayi utpadon se upayogita utpadon men roopantaran ho raha hai.
isase nishchay hi vyaktigat kanpyootaron kee khapat badhegi.
jisase gramin kshetron men doorasanchar aur brodabaind kranti men teji aaegi.
isase ee-shasan aur ee-shiksha men anuprayogon ka bhi vikas aur prasar hoga, jo sthaniy star par sarthak hoga.
yah maikrosoft aofis jaise vindoz anuprayogon men hindi men taip karane kee suvidha pradan karata hai.
kisi bhi shabd sansadhak dvara nirmit kisi samagri ko dekhane tatha use mudrit karane ke lie titief fonton kee aavashyakata hoti hai.
fonton kee shaili tatha aakar mudrit samagri tatha pradarshan ko padhane men aakarshak banate hain.
is sidi men hindi bhasha ke sundar tarike se nirmit 365 titief font hain.
titief men ek kunjipatal draivar kee aavashyakata hoti hai, at: sanbandhit kunjipatal draivar bhi upalabdh karae gae hain.
is taiparaiting tool kee sahayata se deta ka nirman kisi bhi vindoz aadharit anuprayogon arthat vindoz 95, vindoz 98, vindoz 2000, vindoz eksapi men kiya ja sakata hai.
yah inskript, taiparaitar aur fonetik tin tarah ke kunjipatal leaaoot upalabdh karata hai.
yah maikrosoft aofis jaise vindoz anuprayogon men vibhinn font nirmataon ke fonts se hindi men taip karane kee suvidha pradan karata hai.
isaka vikas saibaraspes maltimidiya li.
ne kiya hai.
isaka pratishthapan karake prayokta vibhinn tarah ke font yani ekabhashi, bahubhashi font vibhinn anuprayogon men tin kunjipatalon (dioee, taiparaitar aur egjikyootiv) men se kisi ka bhi upayog kar vividh troo taip fonton men hindi men deta taiyar kar sakate hain.
maltifont injan kee ek hi jiyooaaee se samuchit injan evan fonton ka chayan is upakaran kee visheshata hai.
deta ka nirman kisi bhi vindoj aadharit anuprayog men kiya ja sakata hai, udaharan ke lie emaes aofis 2000 men deta ka nirman karane ke lie vibhinn prakar ke kunjipatalon ka istemal kiya ja sakata hai jaise ki insakript, fonetik tatha taiparaitar jo kisi vishisht softaveyar men upalabdh karae gae hain.
deta ka nirman vina98/vinaenati/vina2000/vinaeksapi aadi men kiya ja sakata hai.
jaisaki pahale bhi bataya gaya hai, yahi font vartaman aur bhavishy ka manak hain.
isalie yadi aapake pas vindoz 2000 ya vindoz eksapi hai, ya koee any yoonikod samarthak aopareting sistam hai, aur jis anuprayog men aapako kam karana hai, vah yoonikod samarthak hai, to inhin fonton ka istemal karen.
inhen instal karane se pahale oopar di gaee vidhi se apane aopareting sistam men hindi ko sakriy kar len.
inaka istemal behad aasan aur sarvavyapi hai, intaranet par adhikansh samagri inhin fonton ka istemal karake taiyar kee jati hai.
yadi aapane apani vindoz eksapi men hindi ko sakriy nahin kiya huaa hai, aur in font men taiyar koee samagri vaib ya ee-mel se aapako prapt hoti hai to bhi aap use padh paenge, sanrakshit kar paenge aur usaka print bhi le paenge, yani usaka manachaha istemal kar paenge.
han, use sanpadit nahin kar paenge.
sanpadan karane ke lie aapako keval apani vindoz men hindi ko sakriy bhar karana hai.
abhi tak yoonikod men samanyatah ek font upalabdh tha—'mangal', vindoz eksapi ke sath 'eriyal yoonikod emaes' aaya, ek aadh font aur taiyar kie gae, parantu kul milakar yoonikod men fonton ka abhav tha.
is sidi men 160 yoonikod aadharit opanataip font die gae hain.
isase yah kami bhi ab door ho gaee hai.
soochana-samagri ke nirman tatha pradarshan ke prayojan se in fonton ka vikas sundar roop men kiya gaya hai.
font kee glifon ke aakaron kee ekaroopata ke karan font kee pathaniyata kafi adhik ho jati hai.
font antarnirmit hain, jisaka tatpary yah hai ki is font ka prayog karake veb par soochana-samagri taiyar kee ja sakati hai aur kisi daunalod ke bina hi braujar men pradarshan ho sakata hai.
yah vibhinn opan taip fonts men hindi men taip karane kee suvidha pradan karata hai.
yadi aap yoonikod anuroopi opan taip fonton ka istemal karana chahate hain, aur aap pahale se hi hindi taiping taiparaitar kunjipatal men karate rahe hain ya aap keval angreji men taip karana janate hain aur aapaka kam samagri ka kabhi kabhar thoda bahut sanpadan karana bhar hai, aur aapako inskript kunjipatal men taip karana nahin aata, to ghabaraie mat, aapakee samasyaon ka sath jist-oti taiping tool ko instal karake ho jaega.
yah inskript kunjipatal leaaoot ke sath taiparaitar leaaoot aur angreji dhvanyadharit kunjipatal kee suvidha bhi upalabdh karata hai.
taiparaitar leaaoot yani mainual taiparaitar vala kunji patal jo kafi sare doosare softaveyaron aur fonton ke sath upalabdh hota hai, ab isakee sahayata se yoonikod ke sath bhi upalabdh ho gaya hai.
isake atirikt angreji taiparaitar ke anuroop yani 'e' kunji dabane se 'a' taip ho aur 'ke' kunji dabane se 'k' taip ho, isake lie dhvanyadharit kunjipatal (fonetik kee-bord) vikasit kiya gaya hai, jist oti taiping tool ko instal karane par is kunjipatal ka istemal bhi kar sakenge.
yah ek font storej kod se doosare font storej kod men parivartan kee suvidha pradan karata hai.
is softaveyar se prayokta ek kod se doosare kod men deta ka parivartan kar sakate hain.
yah tekt fail tatha deta fail donon ka hi parivartan karata hai.
yah jist karda/jist shel men nirmit purane deta ko bhi parivartit karata hai.
nae softaveyar men parivartan (naya deta farmet) men parivartan ke lie prayokta ke pas mool softaveyar (purana deta farmet) hona jaroori nahin hai.
yah printaron aur net par kam karane valon ke lie bahut hi upayogi softaveyar hai.
ve isakee madad se ek font men aaee fail ko apane manachahe font men parivartit kar usaka upayog kar paenge aur apane grahak ko usake manachahe font men parivartit kar de paenge.
jis prakar uttar bharat ke nivasi dakshin bharat ke nivasiyon ko chahe vo tamilanadu ke ho ya keral ke karnatak ke ho ya aandhr pradesh ke sabhi ko madrasi kahakar sambodhit karate hain usi prakar chahe vah chita ho tenduaa ho badh ho ya sher ho sabhi sher kahe jate hain.
inamen se hi koee ek hamara rashtriy pashu hai.
is bat se chahe sher ko etaraj ho sakata hai lekin ham bharatavasiyon ko koee aapatti nahin hai.
ab vah yadi apana yah samman lautana bhi chahe to bhi use kisi n kisi ke kahane s apana lautaya huaa samman vapas lena hi padega .ham bharatavasiyon ko aapatti isalie bhi nahin hai kyonki usake darshan hi durlabh hain.
rashtriy ohada pane valon ke darshan aksar durlabh ho jate hai.
unake darshan pane ke lie ek lambe samay tak pratiksha karani padati hai .
kabhi kabhi to kaee kaee salon tak.

rashtriy pashu ka darja milane ke sath sath sher ko pashuon ka raja bhi samajha jata hai .
raja hone ke karan apani praja kee bhalaee usaka mukhy dhyey hona chahie kintu anek raja maharajon kee tarah jo rashtriy darja pa jate hai vah bhi apani praja par atyachar karane lagata hai .
ek bar raja ghoshit ho jane ke bad punah is pad hetu dobara ray shumari n karavana bhi rashtriy star ke ohade valon ke svabhav ka ek ang hai.
har vyakti yah janata hai ki sher rashtriy pashu tatha jangal ka raja hai.
sanbhavatah sher tatha any pashu hi shayad n janate hon.
ek vyakti ek pad ka niyam jangal raj men kayam nahin hota .
suna tha ki usako yah samman pradan karane ke lie poorv men ek shisht mandal jangal gaya tha aur sher ke rajy kee shasan vyavastha se prabhavit ho kar vah shisht mandal us ke rajy men hi bas gaya aaj tak vapas nahin lauta.
hamare desh ka bachcha bachcha sher ke vishay men janakari rakhata hai kyonki bachchon ko bachapan men hi sher aur kharagosh kee ek katha suna di jati hai jisake anusar jahan ek aur kharagosh ko kamajor tatha chhota hote hue bhi buddhiman bataya gaya hai vahin sher ko balashali hote hue bhi parale darje ka moorkh bataya gaya hai jo apane pratidvandi ko dekhate hi dahadane lagata hai.
is hisab se kharagosh ko rashtriy pashu ka darja milana chahie tha n ki sher ko.
hamare desh men rashtriy samman prapt karane ke liye buddhiman kee apeksha balashali athava moorkh hone se bhi kam chal jata hai jo apane pratidvandvi ko dekhate hi dahadane lage.
sher ke bare men logon ke man men anekon bhrantiyan hai jaise ki vah chara nahin khata hai.
rashtr star ke jan pratinidhiyon ke vare men aisa kahane men sanshay hai.
is bat ka itana badha chadha kar prachar kiya gaya ki sher yadi munh ka jayaka badalane ke lie kabhi shakahari chijen khana bhi chahe to is dar se nahin kha pata hai ki kahin n kahin koee n koee deshi ya videshi apana kaimara fokas kie is tak men jaroor baitha hoga ki vah kuchh ulta sulta khae aur us drishy ko jhat kaimare men kaid karake kisi nyooj chainal par prasarit karava de.
rashtriy star ke logon ke man men bhi isi bat ka dar laga rahata hai.ho ek aur bat donon men saman roop se paee jati hai.
donon ko fansane ke lie bakare ka lalach diya jata hai .sammanit praniyon ke jivan ke sucharoopoorvak yapan ke lie kisi bakare kee ya chhote mote praniyon ko apane pranon kee bali deni hi hoti hai.
rashtriy star ke logon ko rashtriy pashu se bahut pyar hota hai.
isaka sabase bada praman yahin hai ki aise anek logon ke draing room men rashtriy pashu ka hadidayon tatha mans hin sharir poore samman ke sath vidyaman rahata hai.
hadidayon kee upasthiti vyarth ke vivad ka prashn ban jati hai .
hadidayon tatha mans kee apeksha chamadi men aakarshan adhik hota hai.
ab sher ko usakee jivit avastha men draing room men sajana tatha pyar karana to jara mushkil kam hai n atah use mar kar usakee khal se hi muhabbat kar lete hai.
rashtriy pashu ko rahane ke lie do sthan niyat hain.
ek rashtriy abhyarany aur ek jel roopi chidayaghar.
hamare rashtriy pashu ko pinjare men dekhane ka ek alag hi aanand hai .ham usako bahar khade hokar patthar mar sakate hai.
us par keechad uchhal sakate hain.
sher pinjare men bhi nonavej khana hi pasand karata hai.
sher sarkas bhi bahut achchha karate hain.
ve apane ring mastar ya ring mastarani ke aadesh par kursi par baith jate hai ya kursi se utar jate hain.
unako salam karate hain.
kabhi kabhi dikhane ke lie unase gussa bhi ho jate hai fir unake samane apani dum bhi hilane lag jate hain tatha unake sath sath anek sthanon kee sair bhi karate hain.
is prakar sher ka rashtriy pashu hona hamare lie saubhagy hai ya durbhagy yah sochana tabhi sanbhav hai jab mujhe bhi koee rashtriy ohada prapt ho jayega.
aap sab log duaa karen ki mujhe yah avasar shighr prapt ho jisase rashtriy star ke logon ke bare men apani ray vyakt kar sakoon.
