bhains bahut gusse men hai.
usaka gussa apani jagah thik bhi hai.
usakee narajagi gay ko mon ka darja pradan kie jane ke karan hai.
gay ko ham mata ke saman manate hain yahi bat pratyek man apane bachchon ko bhi batalati hai .
isake pichhe sanbhavatah yahi tark hai ki jis prakar apani man ke doodh ko pikar har bachcha hsht pusht tatha bada hota hai gay ka doodh bhi yahi kary karata hai.
doodh ka rang safed hota hai tatha usakee yah visheshata hoti hai ki yadi usamen pani mila diya jae to vah bhi doodh ban jata hai.
kuchh film vale bhi apane giton men doodh vitarakon ko pani ke rang ke bare men bhi yahi salah dete rahate hain ki use jis men mila do lage us jaisa.
gay ke doodh kee visheshata yah bhi hai ki usase dahi, panir, ghee, chhachh, rabadi ityadi anek chijon ka nirman hota hai sath hi gaumootr ko bhi anek rogon kee chikitsa men labhakari bataya gaya hai jisake upayog kee salah sab doosaron ko to dete rahate hai par svayan upayog nahin karate hai par bhains naraz hai usaka kahana hai ki usake doodh se bhi vahi sab banata hai jo gay ke doodh se banata hai fir kya bat hai ki gay ko to man ka samman prapt hai aur use kuchh bhi nahin .
bhains ka kahana hai ki anek gharon men aaj bhi khana banate samay sabase pahale sirf gay ke lie hi ek roti banane kee paranpara hai jise ve log apane ghar men bachi khuchi joothan tatha falon aur sabjiyon ke chhilakon ke sath use paros dete hai par bhains ke lie koee kuchh nahin banata.
isi prakar dharmik karyon men bhi sabase pahale gaoo gras ko hi mahatv diya jata hain bhains gras nam kee koee bhi chiz nahin banaee hai.
kuchh log gay ko ek do roopayon ka chara dal kar apana paralok sudharane men bhi lage rahate hain isalie unako puny ka bhagidar banane ke lie bahut si chare valiyan sadk ke kinare dera jamae rahatin hain yah bat aur hai ki yadi koee gay mata unake chare ke dher men galati se munh mar kar chare valiyon ko bhi puny kamane ka avasar pradan karana chahe to use svayan pap ka bhagidar banana padta hai jisakee pariniti do char dande khane ke bad hi hoti hai par bhains ko koee chara nahin dalata isalie usake pas gussa karane ke alava aur koee chara bhi nahin hai .
shastron ke anusar gay kee poonchh pakad kar hi vaitarani par kee jati hai tatha baikunth prapt hota hai kintu sadkon ke kinare puny kamane kee dukanon ke karan anek log bhi sadk par hi sashtang pranam karate hue baikunth pahunch jate hai .
sanbhavatah gay ko isilie man ka darja diya gaya hai.
bhains is bat par bhi gusse ka izahar karati hai ki usaka upayog hindi kahavaton tatha muhavaron men karake use badanam karane kee sajish rachi gaee hai jaise "bhains ke aage bin bajana' men use aisa mana gaya hai jaise bah bahari ho tatha sangit se nafarat karati ho jabaki yada kada vah bhi apane mukh se anek kathin tane nikalati rahati hai.
yadi bin bajani hi ho to sanp ke aage bajao bhains ke aage bajane kee kya aavashyakata hai.
"kala akshar bhains barabara' men use anapadh tatha moorkh samajha gaya hai jabaki sabhi granth pustaken samachar patr kale aksharon men hi prakashit hote hai kya ve sabhi usake barabar hain.
isi tarah "akl badi ya bhainsa' men akl ko sab usase bada samajhate hai .
jara sochie ki akl bhains se badi kaise ho sakati hai .
kya akl jo chhote se dimag men rahati hai ke andar bhains sama sakati hai parantu bhains ke andar thodi bahut to akl hoti hi hai .
isi tarah "gaee bhains pani men' yadi pani men chali gaee to kya julm ho gaya pani men jakar jab vah bahar aaegi to saf suthari hi to rahegi gandi to nahin.
'jisakee lathi usakee bhainsa' men use takatavar ka pakshadhar tatha ladaee jhagadon kee jad samajha gaya hai aur to aur skoolon men nibandh bhi gay par likhane ke lie die jate hai bhains par koee likhane ke lie nahin kahata.
film nirmataon ne bhi usakee upeksha karane men koee kasar nahin chhodi hai.
unhone bhi gay , hathi , kutte , bailon , sher , bandar , aadi janavaron par mahatvapoorn filmen banaeen hain par us par dhyan nahin diya gaya .
ek filmi git men ek bat avashy us ke paksh men film ke hiro ne uthaee hai ki usakee bhains ko danda kyoon mara jabaki usaka kusoor sirf itana hi tha ki vah khet men chara char rahi thi kisi ke bap ka kuchh nahin kar rahi thi jabaki bahut se log to poore ka poora khet hi char jate hain .
use shikayat hai ki usake prati rangabhed niti apanaee ja rahi hai jo sarasar galat hai .
jagah jagah gau raksha samitiyon ka gathan huaa hai tatha samay samay par gau raksha aandolan bhi chalae jate rahe hain parantu bhains raksha samitiyan ya bhains raksha aandolan kahin bhi kisi ne bhi nahin chalaya .
kisi sundar tatha sushil mahila ke lie bhi usakee prashansa karane ke lie bhi usakee tulana gay se hi kee jati hai jaise dyavah to poori gaoo hai' kintu kisi ke durgunon ya apaman karane ke lie bas itana hi kahana kafi hota hai ki "vah to poori bhains hai'.
use is bat par bhi etaraj hai ki devataon ne bhi usake sath pakshapat kiya hai.
adhikansh devataon ne doosare janavaron ko apana vahan banaya hai jinamen gay, bail, garood, tatha mor aur yahan tak ki chooha aur ulloo tak shamil hain kintu bhains ke vanshajon ko mrityu ke devata yamaraj ko saunp diya hai.
apani mang ko manavane ke lie vah aaj ke chalan ke anusar apane parivar ke sadasyon ke sath yada kada sadkon ke bich men baithakar tatha chakka jam karane ka hathakanda bhi apanati rahati hai parantu prashasan use vahan se khaded deta hain .
usakee mang hai ki yadi use man ke saman n samajha jae to kam se kam yah to kaha jae ki gay hamari mata hai aur bhains hamari mausi hai.
Zindagi mein chahe kitni bhi pareshaniyan hon yadi jeevan mein koi prem karne waala ho to saari mushkilein khatam ho jaati hain bhakton.
Kintu kabhi-kabhi prem jeevan mein kuch aise bhi pal aa jaate hain ki mehbooba zara si baat par muh phulakar baith jaati hai, aur rooth jaati hai.
Vaise to mehbooba ko manane mein bada hi maza aata hai, kintu hamari kuch mahila bhakt badi ziddi hain, wo itni aasani se purushon ko maaf nahi karti.
Ab purush bechare karein bhi to kya, isiliye hum apne purush bhakton ke liye laaye hain kuch aise tareeke ki ab aapki mehbooba to kya uski amma bhi turant maan jaategi.
1.
Sabse pehle to apni mehboob ko ek zordaar prem patra likh bhejo, kam se kam 420 pano ka prem patra hona chahiye, Aur likhavat aisi honi chahiye ki wo kya tum bhi na samajh sako.
Phir dekho, kaise maari firti hai use samajhne ke liye tumhare peeche.
2.
Apni mehbooba ke naam se ek prem shanti ka hawn karva lo.
Aur uski khabar kisi tarah us tak bhi pahucha do.
Wo bin paani ki machhli ki tarah tadapti hui tumse lipat na jaaye to hamara naam Dhongi nahi.
3.
Apni mehbooba ki param mitra arthaat uski best friend ke saath apni dosti badha lo.
Aur uske saath khoob hans khelkar baat kiya karo.
Tumhari mehboob ko aisi mirch lagegi ki wo apni naarazgi bhoolkar tumhare kadmon mein giregi.
4.
Uski param mitra ko ek mehenga sa aur achha sa tohfa uphaar mein de do.
Jismein ki hriday arthaat dil bhi bana ho.
Jab use pata chalega ki tumne apna dil kisi aur ko diya hai aur wo bhi uski sabse param mitra ko to socho uski haalat kaisi hogi.
5.
Aap chahe apni jagah par kitne hi sahi kyun na hon, lekin apni mehbooba ki har galti ko apni galti samjho.
Use ye yakeen dilao ki duniya mein tumse bada joru ka ghulam na aaj tak paida hua hai na kabhi hoga.
6.
Apni mehbooba ke doorbhaas yantra mein pyaare-pyaare pyaar bhare sandesh arthaat sms bhejo.
Wo chahe kitna bhi gussa dikhaye kintu tum bilkul bhi na rukna, aur apni mohobbat ko kisi jalti hui aag ki tarah use dikha dena.
7.
Apne chehre par kisi cartoon ka chitra banva lo aur phir uske saamne jaake zor zor se gaana gaao, “Mujhko pehchanlo Mein Hun Kaun??” yadi use tumhari shakal par hansi aa gayi to samjho tumhara kaam jhat se bana.
8.
Uski param mitra ko kisi 5sitara hotel mein koi achhi si daavat de daalo.
Jab uski param mitra use ye batayegi ki tumne use ek zabardast daavat dee hai to wo bhi us daavat ko yaad kar karke apna saara gussa bhoolne lagegi.
Aur aage tum jaante hi ho kya hoga…
9.
Apni mehbooba ki manpasand jagah par use le jaakar uske manpasand khaane peene aur gaane ka prabhand karo.
Uske saath wo sab karo aur kaho jo use behad achha lagta ho, apni pasand to bhool hi jaao to behtar hai.
10.
Apni mehbooba ke liye kisi aise uphaar ka prabandh karo jo use aaj tak kabhi bhi kisi ne na diya ho, uske baad use kisi khaas jagah bulakar, uski aakhein band karke wo uphaar bhent kar do.
11.
Apni mehbooba ki taarif mein koi shayari likh kar use suna daalo.
Par ek baat hum saaf kar dena chahte hain bachha, yadi tumhari mehbooba ko shayari pasand aa gayi to samjho kaam ban gaya, aur yadi use shayri na pasand aaayi tab to samjho ab tumhara kuch bhi nahi ho sakta, phir to tum sanam bewafa aur dil jale ke geeton ko sunne ki aadat hi daal lo to behtar hoga.
To bhaktjano ye the 11 chamatkari upaay, inhe apni mehbooba par aajmao aur khushhali ke saath saath prem leela karo.
Aur haan koi baat bigad jaaye to sanyam se kaam lena.
Jald baazi mein aksar bane bane kaarya bhi bigad jaate hain.
Tathastu
vishv patal par mahatma gandhi sirf ek nam nahin apitu shanti aur ahinsa ka pratik hai.
mahatma gandhi ke poorv bhi shanti aur ahinsa kee avadharana falit thi, parantu unhonne jis prakar satyagrah evan shanti v ahinsa ke raston par chalate huye angrejon ko bharat chhodane par majaboor kar diya, usaka koee doosara udaharan vishv itihas men dekhane ko nahin milata.
tabhi to prakhyat vaigyanik aainstin ne kaha tha ki -''hajar sal bad aane vali naslen is bat par mushkil se vishvas karengi ki had-mans se bana aisa koee insan dharati par kabhi aaya tha.'' sanyukt ra'tr sangh ne varsh 2007 se gandhi jayanti ko 'vishv ahinsa divas' ke roop men manaye jane kee ghoshana karake shanti v ahinsa ke pujari mahatma gandhi ke vicharon kee prasangikata ko ek bar punah siddh kar diya hai.
2 aktoobar 1869 ko gujarat ke porabandar men janme mohanadas karamachand gandhi ne 1891 men inglainnd se bairistari pas kee aur pahale rajakot v fir bambaee men vakalat karane lage.
1893 men abdulla seth namak ek vyapari ke mukadame men ve dakshin afrika gaye aur vahan pahali bar unhen angrejon kee bharatiyon v afrikiyon ke prati rangabhed niti ka katu anubhav huaa.
ek taraf unhen pratham shreni ka tikat hone ke bavajood relave ke dibbe se bahar nikal diya gaya to doosari taraf bharatiy hone ke karan tin paund kee laisens fis dene ko kaha gaya.
yahi nahin unakee vesh-bhoosha ka bhi majak udaya gaya.
aise men gandhi ji ne is rangabhed niti ka virodh kiya aur 1903 men 'indiyan opiniyan' akhabar kee shuruaat kee.
11 sitambar 1906 ko yuva bairistar gandhi ji ne bharatiy mool ke lagabhag 3000 logon ko dakshin afrika men johansabarg ke enpayar thiyetar men ikattha kiya aur eshiyatik adhyadesh ke khilaf, jisake tahat eshiyaee logon ko apani anguliyon ke nishan rajistar karane v apane sath sadaiv pahachan patr rakhana anivary bana diya gaya tha, ke virooddh yah prastav pas kiya ki- ''ve apana daman karane vale shvet aupaniveshik atyacharon ka pratirodh un par hath uthae bina karenge aur unake kisi bhi julm ke samane sir nahin jhukaenge.'' yahin par gandhi ji ne logon ko sambodhit karate huye pratham bar 'satyagrah' vicharadhara ka sootrapat kiya.
virodh ke is nae hathiyar ko dakshin afrika kee angrej sarakar sahan n kar sakee aur gandhi ji sahit 27 vyaktiyon ko giraftar kar un par mukadama chalaya aur unhen desh chhodane ka aadesh diya.
parantu gandhi ji ne us aadesh ka bhi ullanghan kiya aur unhen jel bhej diya gaya.
is pratirodh ke chalate dakshin afrikee sarakar ne antatah jhukate huye 1914 men bharatiyon ke viruddh adhikatar vibhedakari kanoon khatm kar diya.
yah gandhi ji kee ek badi jit thi aur isi ke sath 18 julaee 1914 ko inglaind hote huye ve bharat ravana ho gaye tatha 1915 men bharat pahunche.
is bich 4 agast 1914 ko pratham vishv yuddh aarambh ho chuka tha aur gandhi ji british sarakar ke bina shart ke sahayogi roop men samane aaye.
vastutah unhen laga ki angrej is vishv yuddh men uchch siddhanton kee raksharth lad rahe hain aur yuddh pashchat bharat kee svadhinata kee disha men kam karenge.
angreji hukoomat ne isake badale men gandhi ji ko 'kesar-e-hind' upadhi se navaja.
parantu gandhi ji kee soch antatah svapnabhang hi sabit huee aur asahayog aandolan ke dauran angreji nitiyon ke virodh men unhonne yah upadhi lauta di.
jab gandhi ji bharat laute to ve inglaid se bairistari pas kar laute aise aise dhani vyakti the, jisakee salana aay karib 5,000 paund thi.
bharat kee dharati par pravesh karate hi unhen laga ki angrejon ke daman ka shikar bharatiyon ko kala kot pahane farrate se kort men angreji bolane vale mohanadas karamachand gandhi kee nahin varan ek aise vyakti kee jaroorat hai jo unhin ke pahanave men, unhin kee boli men, unhin ke bich rahakar, unake lie sangharsh kar sake.
aise men gandhi ji ne apani pahali upasthiti aprail 1917 men champaran, bihar men nil ke kheton men kam karane vale kisanon hetu satyagrah karake darj karayi par akhil bharatiy star par unaka udbhav 1919 ke khilafat aandolan v fir asahayog aandolan se huaa.
1919 se aarambh is daur ko bharatiy rashtriy svadhinata aandolan men 'gandhi yug' ke nam se jana jata hai.
gandhi ji ne n keval us samay chal rahi udar v ugr vicharadharaon ke uttam bhagon ka samanvay kiya balki donon ko ek adhik gatishil aur vyavaharik mod diya.
5 faravari 1922 ko chaurichaura kand ke bad bich men hi asahayog aandolan vapas lekar gandhi ji ne yah jata diya ki ve hinsa kee bajay ahinsak tarikon se bharat kee aajadi chahate hain.
asahayog aandolan se jahan janamanas men angreji hukoomat ka khauf khatm ho gaya vahin janasamooh gandhi ji ke pichhe umad pada.
isake bad to silasila chal nikal pada, aage-aage gandhi ji aur unake pichhe poora karavan.
jati-dharm-bhasha-kshetr se pare is karavan men purush v mahilayen ek svar se judate gaye.
1920-22 ke asahayog aandolan, 1930-34 ke savinay avagya aandolan, 1940-41 ke vyaktigat savinay avagya aandolan aur 1942 ke bharat chhodo aandolan dvara gandhi ji ne angreji hukoomat ko jata diya ki bharat kee svatantrata nyayapoorn hai aur bharat men angreji rajy kee samapti aavashyak hai.
1942 ke bharat chhodo aandolan ne to angreji hukoomat kee choolen hila din.
us dauran british pradhanamantree vinstan charchil se varta pashchat samrat jarj shashtham ne apani dayari men darj kiya tha ki-'' vinstan charchil ne mujhe yah kahakar aashcharyachakit kar diya hai ki unake sabhi sahayogi aur sansad ke tinon dal yuddh ke pashchat bharat ko bharatiyon ke hathon men chhodane ko udyat hain.
krips, samachar patr aur amarikee lokamat- sabhi ne unake man men yah bhavana bhar di hai ki hamara bharat par rajy karana galat hai aur sadaiv se bharat ke lie bhi galat raha hai.'' is prakar 15 agast 1947 ko aajadi prapt kar gandhi ji ne samooche vishv ko dikha diya ki hinsa jo sabhy samaj ke astitv ko n't karane ka khatara utpann karati hai, ka vikalp dhoondhane ke lie svayan kee padatal karane ka bhi ek prayas hona chahie.
gandhi ji saty, ahinsa, svadeshi, svarajy v rachanatmak karyakramon ke kayal the.
in sabhi siddhanton ko unhonne n sirf vaicharik dharatal par utara balki unamen antarsambandh bhi sthapit kiya.
gandhi ji ko 'mahatma' kee upadhi se sarvapratham vibhooshit karane vale ravindr nath taigor ne kaha tha ki- ''gandhi ji ek rajanitigya, sangathanakarta, janamanas ke neta aur naitik sudharak ke roop men mahan hain, parantu vah manu'y ke roop men usase bhi adhik mahan hain.
yadyapi vah asadhy roop se aadarshavadi the aur apane nishchit mapadandon dvara pratyek kary ko mapate the, fir bhi vah manav premi hain n ki khokhale vicharon ke premi.'' gandhi ji saty ke bahut bade praneta the aur isake liye ahinsa ke tarikon ke pakshapati the.
satyagrah unake lie matr niti nahin, siddhant tha.
vastutah satyagrah ke madhyam se gandhiji ne mahatma buddh, mahavir v tamam mahapurooshon dvara pratipadit ahinsa ke siddhant ko samajik v rashtriy shakti men tabdil kar diya.
pashchaty vicharak thoro kee vyaktigat savinay avagya kee avadharana ko samajik shakti men badalakar aisa bemisal janajagaran paida kiya jo dirghakal tak avashy chalata hai, par asafal nahin hota.
svayan gandhi ji ka manana tha ki- ''satyagrah ek aisa aadhyatmik siddhant hai jo manav matr ke prem par aadharit hai.
isamen virodhiyon ke prati ghrina kee bhavana nahin hai.'' ahinsa gandhi ji ka pramukh satyagrahi hathiyar tha.
gandhi ji ke liye ahinsa, hinsa ka nishedh matr nahin thi balki ek jivan paddhati thi.
ve aksar kaha karate the ki aaj kee duniya men jitane log jivit hain, ve batate hain ki duniya ka aadhar hathiyar bal nahin hai.
isaka sabase bada praman to yahi hai ki duniya itane hangamon ke bad bhi tikee huee hai.
gandhi ji kee ahinsa kayarata ka pratik nahin balki antashchetana v aatma men vishvas karane vali virata ka parichayak hai.
unhonne ise vyakhyayit karate huye likha ki -''yadyapi ahinsa ka arth kriyatmak roop se janaboojhakar k't uthana hai, tathapi yah siddhant durachariyon ke samane hathiyar dalane ka samarthan nahin karata.
isake viparit yah durachari ka poorn aatmabal se samana karane kee prerana deta hai.
is siddhant ko manane vala vyakti apani ijjat, dharm aur aatma kee raksha ke lie ek anyayapoorn samrajy sahit samast shaktiyon ko bhi chunauti de sakata hai aur apane parakram dvara usake patan ke bij bhi bo sakata hai.'' batate hain ki jab itali ke tanashah musolini ke aagrah par gandhi ji usase milane gaye, to kaeeyon ne unhen samajhaya ki ek ahinsak vyakti ka hinsak vyakti se milana uchit nahin.
par gandhi ji ne javab diya ki hinsak vyakti se hinsa jyada khataranak hai aur hamara uddeshy saty v ahinsa ke madhyam se ahinsa ko khatm karana hai.
gandhi ji tin logon ke sath musolini se milane gaye, jab ki vahan kursiyan sirf do thin.
jab musolini ne gandhi ji se baithane ka aagrah kiya to gandhi ji ne apane sath aaye tinon logon ko kursi kee taraf ishara karate huye baithane ko kaha.
musolini ka sochana tha ki kursi par sirf gandhi ji aur vo baithega, par gandhi ji apane sath ke tin any mehamanon kee khatir kursi par baithane ko raji nahin huye aur antatah musolini ko tin any kursiyan mangavani padi.
vakaee yah rochak ghatanakram duniya ke sabase bade tanashah aur ek ahinsak satyagrahi ke bich ghata tha, jisane tanashah ko ek satyagrahi kee bat manane par majaboor kar diya.
gandhi ji svadeshi ke prabal samarthak the.
ve janate the ki asali bharat ganvon men basata hai, jisake aarthik svavalamban kee ridh kutir v laghu udyogon par tikee huyi hai.
gandhi ji ka charakha katana pratikatmak roop men svadeshi v svavalamban ka hi pratik tha.
svadeshi ko badhava dene ke lie hi ve videshi vastuon ke bahishkar ka aahvan karate the.
gandhi ji sirf rajanaitik vyakti nahin balki ek rachanatmak samaj sudharak bhi the.
asprishyata, nari sudhar, hindoo-muslim ekata ityadi ke lie unhonne bahut kary kiye.
asprishyata ko manavata par kalank batate huye unhonne isake unmoolan par jor diya v tadnusar achhooton ko sammanajanak 'harijan' nam dene, harijan sevak sangh kee sthapana, vibhinn patra-patrikaon men asprishyata ke viruddh likhana evan deshavyapi bhramanon ke dauran achhooton kee bastiyon men jakar unako gale lagakar asprishyata ko avaigyanik v amanaviy siddh karane jaise apratim kadam uthaye.
gandhi ji ke man men nari ke prati badi shraddha thi.
ve nari ko parda-pratha, bal-vivah v bahu-vivah jaisi manyataon se bahar nikalana chahate the aur unake aahvan par n sirf tamam nariyon ne parda-pratha se bahar nikal kar rashtriy svatantrata aandolan men bhag liya balki auron ko bhi jagrit kiya.
nari utthan hetu gandhi ji ne shiksha, antarjatiy vivah v vidhava vivah par jor diya.
unaka manana tha ki jab tak nari apane adhikaron hetu svayan aage nahin aayegi, tab tak usakee sthit men parivartan nahin hoga.
gandhi ji dharm v sampraday men bhed karate the.
dharm unake liye karmakandon se nahin apitu manaviy v naitik gunon se nirmit tha.
ve rajaniti v dharm ke sahaastitv ko svikar karate huye donon ke lie saty, ahinsa, tyag, vishvabandhutv, aatmavishvas v naitikata ko jaroori manate the.
sadhan aur sadhy donon kee pavitrata par jor dete huye ve kisi bhi prakar ke chhal kapat ya anuchit tarikon ko pasand nahin karate the.
angrejon kee 'foot dalo aur raj karo' niti ke viparit gandhi ji hindoo-muslim ekata ke prabal samarthak the.
1919 men khilafat aandolan ke dauran unhonne ise hinduon v musalamanon ke madhy ekata sthapit karane ka aisa suavasar bataya jo ki aage sau varshon tak nahin milega.
hindoo-muslim ekata ke prati gandhi ji ka aagrah isi se samajha ja sakata hai ki jab 15 agast 1947 ko sara desh aajadi ke jashn men dooba tha to gandhi ji sampradayik dangon ko khatm karane ke lie noaakhali men pad yatra kar rahe the.
vastutah gandhi ji ke lie svatantrata ka svaroop sirf rajanaitik nahin tha, apitu yah logon kee samajik, aarthik v aatmik unnati bhi thi, jise ve 'ram-rajy' kaha karate the.
aaj gandhi ji sirf bharat kee bhoomi tak hi simit nahin balki samagr vishv-dhara men vyapt hain.
unake dikhaye gaye raste par chalakar n jane kitane ra'tron ne apani svadhinata payi hai.
yah anayas hi nahin hai ki gandhi ji ko panch bar 1937, 1938, 1939, 1947 v 1948 men nobel shanti puraskar ke liye namit kiya gaya.
yah ek alag bahas ka vishay hai ki kin karanon se unhen nobel puraskar nahin diya gaya par kalantar men gandhi ji ke siddhanton par chalakar unhen apana preranasrot manane vale kaee logon ko nobel shanti puraskar se sammanit kiya gaya.
1989 men nobel shanti samman ke lie dalaee lama ke nam kee ghoshana karate huye nobel kameti ke sadasyon ne gandhi ji ko nobel samman nahin dene par afasos jataya aur kameti ke adhyaksh ne kaha ki dalaee lama ko yah samman diya jana gandhi ji kee smriti ko shraddhanjali dene ka prayas hai.
isi prakar 1984 v 1993 men kramashah desamand tootoo v nelsan mandela ko nobel shanti puraskar se sammanit kiya gaya, jinhonne gandhi ji ko preranasrot manate huye dakshin afrika men varnnabhed v rangabhed kee khilafat kee thi.
aaj gandhi ji ke vichar poore vishv men sarvagrahy hain.
kabhi aarnald tayanabi ne kaha tha - ''main jis pidhi men paida huaa, vah pidhi pashchim men keval hitalar athava stalin kee hi pidhi nahin thi apitu bharat men gandhi ji kee bhi pidhi thi.
ham nishchayapoorvak yah bhavishyavani kar sakate hain ki manav itihas par gandhi ji ka prabhav hitalar aur stalin ke prabhav se adhik hoga.'' aaj kee nayi pidhi gandhi ji ko ek nae roop men dekhana chahati hai.
vah unhen ek sant ke roop men nahin varan vyavaharik aadarshavadi ke roop men prastut kar rahi hai.
'lage raho munna bhaee' jaisi filmon kee safalata kahin-n-kahin yuvaon ka unase lagav pratibimbit karati hai.
aaj bhi duniya bhar ke sarvekshanon men gandhi ji ko shirsh puroosh ghoshit kiya jata hai.
hal hi men hindoo-si0 ena0 ena0- aaee0 vi0 ena0 dvara 30 varsh se kam aayu ke bharatiy yuvaon ke bich karae gae ek sarvekshan men 76 pratishat logon ne gandhi ji ko apana sarvochch rol modal bataya.
bi0bi0si0 dvara bharat kee svatantrata ke 60 varsh poore hone par kiye gaye ek sarvekshan ke mutabik aaj bhi pashchaty deshon men bharat kee ek pramukh pahachan gandhi ji hain.
yahi nahin tamam pashchaty deshon men gandhivad par vistrit adhyayan ho rahe hain, to bharat men sundaralal bahuguna, megha patekar, aroona ray se lekar sandip pande tak tamam aise samajaseviyon kee pratishtha kayam hai, jinhonne gandhivadi moolyon dvara samajik aandolan khada karane kee koshishenn keen.
aankade gavah hain ki vishv bhar men har sal gandhi ji v unake vicharon par aadharit lagabhag do hajar pustakon ka prakashan ho raha hai evam hal ke varshon men gandhi ji kee kritiyon ka adhikar hasil karane ke liye prakashakon v lekhakon ke aavedanon kee sankhya do guni ho gaee hai.
vastutah aaj jaroorat gandhivad ko samajhane kee hai n ki use aadarsh manakar pitare men band kar dene kee.
svayan gandhi ji ka manana tha ki aadarsh ek aisi sthiti hai jise kabhi bhi prapt nahin kiya ja sakata balki usake lie matr prayasarat raha ja sakata hai.
sanyukt ra'tr sangh ne gandhi jayanti ko 'vishv ahinsa divas' ke roop men manaye jane kee ghoshana karake shanti v ahinsa ke pujari mahatma gandhi ke vicharon kee prasangikata ko ek bar punah siddh kar diya hai.
saty, prem v sahishnuta par aadharit gandhi ji ke satyagrah, ahinsa v rachanatmak karyakram ke achook margon par chalakar hi vishv men vyapt asamanata, shoshann, anyay, bhrashtachar, aatankavad, durachar, naksalavad, paryavaran asantulan v dinon-b-din badhate samajik aparadh ko niyantrit kiya ja sakata hai.
gandhi ji dvara rachanatmak karyakram ke jarie vikalp ka nirman aaj poorvottar bharat v jammoo-kashmir jaise kshetron kee samasyaon, naksalavad v ghareloo aatankavad se nipatane men jitane karagar ho sakate hain utana bal-prayog nahin ho sakata.
gandhi ji duniya ke ekamatr lokapriy vyakti the jinhonne sarvajanik roop se svayan ko lekar abhinav prayog kie aur aaj bhi sarvajanik jivan men naitikata, aarthik muddon par unakee naitik soch v dharm-sampraday par unake vichar prasangik hain.
tabhi to bharat ke antim vayasaray lard mauntaben ne kaha tha - ''gandhi ji ka jivan khataron se bhari is duniya ko hamesha shanti aur ahinsa ke madhyam se apana bachav karane kee rah dikhata rahega.''
Bachaane waali aasha ki gawahi hai jo kahi napa ya sanchit nahi ja sakta hai.
Ishu Maseeh us aasha ka neev hai.
Kai saal pehle, Bahan Packer aur main Oxford University gaye the.
Hum apne saathwe par-aaja ke suchi ko dhoondh rahe the.
Oxford ke Christ ke Kolej ka neta, Dr.
Poppelwell, ne dayaluta dikhlaya kolej ke archivist ko suchi lane diya.
Waha saal 1853 mein humne apne purwajon ke naam, John Packer ko paya.
Uske baad ke saal hum waapis Oxford ko gaye sundar se pure dharamshaastra ko Christ ke Kolej ke kitaabghar ko diya.
Yah Dr.
Poppelwell ko taaklifdeh laga.
Shayad usne socha ki hum Isaai nahi the.
To usne kolej ke Paadri ko kitaab lene ke liye bulaya.
Paadri ko dharamshaastra ko dene se pehle, maine Topical Guide ko khola aur use ek paat dikhlaya: 18 panon ka, bahut hi chote se likha hua, single-spaced, “Ishu Maseeh” oar likha gaya.”Yah Uddhaarkarta par pure dharmshaastra ko saath mein ikatha kiya gaya hua suchi hai jo duniya ke itihaas mein likha gaya hai-Purane aur Naye Niyam, Mormon ki Dharamshaastra, Doctrine aur Covenants, aur the Pearl of Great Price ki gawahi hai.
“Kisibhi tarah se is suchi par chalo,” maine use batlaya, “bagal-bagal mein, upar aur niche, kitaab se kitaab, mahatav ke baad mahatav-tum jaanoge ki wah humesha hai, Prabhu Ishu Maseeh ke kaarye mein diviye sundar gawahi ke saath- Uska paydaish, Uska jiwan, Uska shikshan, Uska Suli par chadhna, Uska Pumaharjiwit hona, aur Uska Preashchit karna.”
Paadri ke saath Uddhaarkarta ke kuch shikshan baatne ke baad, vaatawaran badal gaya, aur usne hume imaarat ko saer karaya, jiske saath Romans ke zamaane ko batlaane waali cheezein.
Topical Guide mein likhe hue in sambhandhon mein yah Mormon ki Dharamshaastra mein se hai: Ishu Maseeh ka Dusra Gawahi: “Hum Maseeh ki charcha kartein hain, hum Maseeh mein anandith hotein hain, hum logon ko Maseeh ke vishye mein updesh detein hain, hum Maseeh ke vishye mein bhavishyevaani kartein hain aur hum apni bhavishyevaani ke anusaar likhtein hain ki humari santaan yah jaan sakey ki weh apne paapion ki chama ke liye kaha dekhein” (2 Nephi 25:26).
Uske khudh ke shabdon mein, Uddhaarkarta ne batlaya, “Maarg aur sathye, aur jiwan main hi hoon; bina mere dwara koi Pita ke paas nahi pahunch sakta” (John 14:6).
Aur Mormon ki Dharamshaastra mein, Usne batlaya hai: “Sunno, main wahi hoon, jo ki apne logon ko mukt karne ke liye shirishti ki neev ke samay se karne ko taeyaar tha.
Sunno, main Ishu Maseeh hoon .
… Mujhi se sara mahushye samaajh jo mere naam par vishwaas karenge, weh anant ke liye prakaash paayenge; aur weh mere putra aur putriyon ban jaenge” (Ether 3:14).
Yah par kai sthir ko kaarye hai jismein se kai cheezein hain jo Ishu Maseeh ke diviye kaarye ko Muktidata ki tarah batlati hai unko jo pehle the ya aage payeda hone maranshil jiwan mein.
Ishu Maseeh ke Praeshchit ke dwara hum sab Aadmi ka patan hone se hum sabhi ko mukti prapt hua hai, jo Adam aur Eve ko Eden ka Bagiche mein mana kiya hua fal khaane ke baad hua tha, jaese 1 Corinthians mein batlaya gaya hai: “Aur jaese Adam mein sab martein hain, waise hi Maseeh mein sab jilaaye jayenge(1 Corinthians 15:22).
Mormon ki Dharamshaastra sikhlata hai ki, “Praeshchit karna hi chahiye  … , nahi to maanao samaajh ko nasht hone se bachaya hi nahi ja sakta hai, ha, sabhi katohar hai, sabhi ptith aur bhatke hue hain aur nasht honge; kewal praeshchit jo ki hitkaari hai …usi ke dwara bach sakenge” (Alma 34:9–10).
Hum sahi tarah se ashaayad jiwan ko nahi bita rahein ho, aur humare galtiyon ke liye yahakaarye hai karne ko, parantu hume dharti par aane se pehle, humne Uske niyam ka paalan karne ko kaha tha aur uske niyam ko todhne se saza ko pura karne ko swikaar kiya tha.
“Isliye ki sab ne paap kiya hai, aur Parmeshwar ki mahima se rahit hain;
“Parantu uski anugharah se us chutkaare ke dwara jo Ishu Maseeh mein hai, senth-menth dharmi taharaaye jaatein hain” (Romans 3:23–24).
Uddhaarkarta ne Praehchit ko kiya, jis tarike se hum saaf ho sakey.
Ishu Maseeh punaharjiwit Maseeh hai.
Hum Uska bhakti kartein aur Uske jaantein hain wah peeda jo usne hum sab ke liye aur wah peeda jo Usne hum mein se har ek ke liye jhela tha ko, dono Gethsemane ke Bagiche aur kruss par chadhane ke samay ko.
Usne yah mahaan vinamrata ke saath kiya tha aur Uske diviye anant samjh ke rishtey aur kaarye mein.
Jo paschaataap karenge aur paap ko chodh denge weh Uske daya ke haath ko apne sir par mehsoos karenge.
Jo Uske vaani aur Uske chune hue sewakon ke vaani ko sunenge shaanti aur samjh ko mahaan dukh aur musibaton ke chan mein bhi prapt karenge.
Uske balidaan ka parinaam hai ki hume paap se bachaaye, taaki sabhi ko pastawa se mukti mile aur asha ko mehsoos karein.
Agar Usne Praeshchit ko pura nahi kiya hota, yaha koi mukti nahi hoti.
Yah jeene ke liye mushkil se bhare duniya hota agar hume apni galtiyon ke liye chama nahi mila hota, agar hum apne aap ko kabi saaf nahi kare hotey aur aage badhe hotey.
Ishu Maseeh ka daya aur sundarta sirf unke liye nahi hai jo bure kaarye karne se hota hai ya jo achcha nahi kar paatein hai se, parantu weh anant tak ki shasanti ka vaada un sabhi ke liye hai jo Use swikaar karenge aur piche chalenge aur Uske shikshanon ko maanege.
Uska daya se mahaan dukh bharta hai, dusron ke paap ko jhelne waala bhi.
Abhi haal hi mujhe ek mahila ka patra mila jisne apne jiwan mein mahaan dukhon ko jhela tha.
Bahut hi galat, jo wah nahi jaanti thi parantu batlaya gaya, ki uske khilaaf hua tha.
Usne batlaya ki usne mahaan kadwaahat ko jhela tha.
Apne gusse mein, wah dimaagi taur se rone lagi, “Kisi ko is mahaan galti ke liye bharna padega.” Is khaas dukh aur swaalon ke samay par, usne likha ki uske hriday mein turant hi jawaab aaya: “Kisi ne ise pehle hi bhar diya hai.”
Agar hum hum yah nahi jaantey ki Uddhaarkarta ka blidaan humare liye kya kar sakta hai, hum jiwan bhar pastaawa mein rah saktein hain ki humne kuch galta kiya hai ya kisi ke saath bura kiya hai.
Wah galti jo galti se hui ho ko saaf kiya ja skta hai.
Agar hum Uske Praeshchit ko samjhenge, hum Prabhu Ishu Maseeh se mahaan shaanti kop rapt karenge, Uske dharti par dekh rekh ke samay, aur Uske diviye mission humare Uddhaarkarta ki tarah.
Ishu Maseeh ka Girjaghar Antim-din Santon ka duniya bhar mein faela tha jiwan ke gyaan aur Uddhaarkarta ke shikshanon ko punaharsthapit karne ke liye.
Yah mahaan sammelan 94 bhaashaon mein satellite se 102 deshon mein dikhlaya jar aha hai parantu yah sabhi desh mein Internet par bhi hai jaha Girjaghar hai.
Humare paas 3,000 se zyaada stakes hai.
Humare paas 80,000 pure-samay ke prachaarakhein sewa mein hai, aur Girjaghar mein 15 milion se zyaada sadesye hai, Yeh nambar yah dikhlarein hai ki “jo pattar pahaad se bina haathon se kata gaya ho” aage badhata rehta hai aura nth mein “pure duniya mein fael jayega” (D&C 65:2).
Parantu Girjaghar ka sangaton kitna bhi badh jayega ya kitne million humare saath shaamil ho jaye, chahe kitne bhi bhaagon aur deshon mein humare prachaarakhon pahunch jaye yab chahe hum kitne bhi bhaashoun mein baatein karein, Ishu Maseeh ke susamachaar ki sachchie safalta veyaktigat sadasyon ke dhaarmik shakti dwara hi napa ja sakta hai.
Hume vishwaas ki shakti chahiye jo Maseeh ke sabhi vishwaasi chelon ke hriday mein paya jata hai.
Bachaane waali asha ki gawahi hai jo kahi napa ya tola nahi ja sakta hai.
Ishu Maseeh us aasha ka neev hai.
Hum jawaan aur buzurg, shaadi shuda aur avivahit ke gawahiyon ko mazboot karne ko dhoondhtein hain.
Hume Ishu Maseeh ke susamachaar ko aadmi, mahila, aur bachchon, sabhi jaatiyon aur deshon, dhani aur gareeb ko sikhlans zaroori hai.
Hume abhi jald parwartith aur jo humaare beech mein kai girjaghar ko shuruwaat karne waalon ke bachchein ho.
Hume unko dhoondhna hai jo kho gaye hai aur unhein madad se waapis yaha lana hai.
Hum sabhi ke gyaan aur drishye aur dhaarmik shakti ki zaroorat hai.
Is Girjaghar ka har ek sadasye vyaktigat taur se Girjaghar ka ek mahaan bhaag hai.
“Kyunki jis prakaar deh to ek hai aur uske angh bahut se hai, aur us ek deh ke sab ang bahut hone par bhi sab milkar ek hi dehhain: ussi prakaar Maseeh bhi hai.
“Ek hi Aatma ke dwara ek deh hone ke liye baptisma liya.
…
“Isliye ki deh mein ek hu ang nahi parantu bahut se hai” (1 Corinthians 12:12–14).
Har sadasye jiwan ki gawahi ki sewa karta hai aur Ishu Maseeh ki shikshan ka.
Hum virodhi ke saath ladaai mein shaamil hain, aur hume har ek ki zaroorat hai agar hum Uddhaarkarta ke diye hue kaarye mein safal hona chahatein hain.
Tum shaayad socho ki, “Main kya kar sakta hoon? Main akela hoon.”
Sahi mein Joseph Smith ne kai baar akelapan mehsoos kiya tha.
Wah mahaan bana, parantu14-saal- ke umar ka ladka hone se hi usne shuruwaat kiya tha is sawaal se: “Sabhi Girjaghar mein se mujhe kis mein shaamil hona hai?” (dekhiye Joseph Smith–History 1:10).
Joseph ki Uddhaarkarta mein vishwaas aur gawahi badhati rahi jayesa humara hona chahiye, “Aagya par aagya, thoda yaha, thoda waha dunga” ((2 Nephi 28:30; D&C 128:21bhi dekhiye).
Joseph prarthna karne kiye ghutne par hua, aur kitna mahaan kaarye hua prarthna aur Pehle Pratikaran ke uske parinaam mein.
Barah Devduton mein se ek hone se, main Prabhu Ishu Maseeh ki gawahi ko bayaan karta hoon.
Wah jiwit hai.
Wah humare Muktidata aur Uddhaarkarta hai.
“Maseeh ke Praeshchit ke karan, sare manushye bach sakte hain” (Articles of Faith 1:3).
Wah is Girjaghar ka sanchaalan karta hai.
Wah Apne sewakoun ke liye ajnabi nahi hai.
Jabki hum anewaale jiwan ki oar atama vishwaas ke saath badh rahe hai, Uska Aatma humare saath hoga.
Yaha Uske shakti ka koi anth nahi hai unke jiwan mein ashirwaad aur maarg dene ke liye jo sahi aur sachchaai ko dhoondh rahein hain.
Main Uski gawahi Ishu Maseeh ke naam se deta hoon, amen.
meri tin prabal ichchhaen hain.
pahali yah ki main pyano bajaoon .
doosari main apani patni kee kam se kam ek bar pitaee karoon aur tisari ki main bhi jel jaoon.
ab pahali ichchha poori karane ke lie 20 guna 50 vargafut ka makan paryapt nahin hai usake lie to ek shanadar mahalanuman bangala chahie.
bangale ke bahut bade hal men rakha huaa pyano chahie.
hal men chakkar lagati huee sundar premika aur gusse men aag baboola hota huaa usaka bap bhi chahie fir pyano bajane men ek pareshani yah thi ki use donon hathon se bajana hota hai.
mainen ab tak sirf haramoniyam hi bajaya hai aur vah bhi ek hath se yadi donon hathon se bajata to hava kaun bharata.
hava bharane par hi bahut si chijen bajatin hain.
meri patni ne salah di ki vah pair failakar baith jayegi aur main usake pairon par donon hathon se pyano bajane ka abhyas kar loon isase mera abhyas thik ho jayega aur usake donon pairon ka dard.
in sabhi men bahut si jhanjhaten tatha kharcha adhik hone ke karan mujhe is ichchha ko chhodna pada.
doosari ichchha jo patni kee pitaee se talluk rakhati thi usake vishay men mujhe ekaek mahasoos huaa ki is prakar kee ichchha doosari or bhi janm le sakati hai.
aag donon taraf lag sakati hai.
mahilayen bhi puroosh ke saman adhikar prapt karane kee disha men sakriy hain.
main apani ichchha ke karan itana bada jokhim uthane ko taiyar nahin tha at: is ichchha ka bhi tyag karana pada.
meri tisari aur antim ichchha jel jane kee abhi bhi balavati bani huee hai.
jel jane men aasani yah hai ki isake lie kisi yogyata kee aavashyakata nahin hoti.
samaj men do hi sthan aise hain jahan yogyata ka koee mahatv nahin hai ek jel tatha doosara sansad.
kisi charadivari ke bahar ladne jhagadne par jab aapako jis charadivari ke andar kar diya jata hai use jel kahate hai par jab kisi charadivari ke andar ladne jhagadne par aapako bahar nikal diya jaye vah jagah sansad kahalati hai.
aap soch rahe honge ki yah mukhy vishay se door hat raha hai.
ek achchhe vyang lekh kee yahi visheshata hai.
jel aur rajaniti ka to chaddi baniyan jaisa sath hai.
apane desh men kuchh log jel chale jate hain to kuchh rajaniti men.
kuchh rajaniti men jakar jel chale jate hain to adhikansh jel se rajaniti me chale aa rahe hai .
hamari aayat aur niryat niti bahut achchhi hai .
jelon ke vishay men hamari hindi filmon ne sabako itana vishad adhyayan karava diya hai jitana svayan jel ke adhikari bhi nahin janate honge fir bhi jel ke vishay men kuchh mahatvapoorn janakariyo upalabdh karana apana farj samajhata hoon kyonki jis jagah jana hai usake itihas aur bhoogol kee janakari to honi hi chahie.
isaka tatpary yah nahin hain ki mujhe jelon ke bare main bahut gyan hai adhikatar log kisi vishay men janakari n hone par bhi us vishay par bat kar lete hai.
sahity aur kavita ke kshetr men bhi yahi ho raha hai.
jel kee janakari hone se bhavishy men vah aap ke kam bhi aa sakati hai.
jel kee divaren hamesha oonchi aur chaukor pattharon kee bani hotin hain jin par siment ka plastar nahin hota.
vaise plastar hota to hai par jel kee divaron par nahin kagajon par hota hai.
prasiddh vyangakar sharad joshi ke anusar oonchi oonchi ye divaren kaidiyon ke samane ek chunauti ke roop men khadi hokar unhe hamesha langhane ke lie ek prerit karati rahatin hain.
bina plastar kee divaren hone ka ek labh yah hai ki kaidi is bat kee aasani se joch kar lete hai ki kis sthan ke patthar hata kar aasani se bhaga ja sakata hai.
jel ke adhikariyon ko bhi yah pata karane men suvidha rahati hai ki kaidi kis jagah ke patthar hata kar bhaga.
donon ko fayada hai.
jel ko kuchh manachale sasural kee bhi sangya dete hai kyonki vaho khana pina tatha thaharana muft men hota hai.
mere anubhavon ke aadhar par aajakal jel ko sasural manane se behatar hai ki sasural ko jel saman mana jaye.
sas sasur ke is vaky men ki ''hamare damad to hamare bete jaise hain'' ke pichhe ek bhayankar shadyantr chhupa hota hai.
is brahyavaky ka prayog kar ve aapase ghar ke anek chhote mote kary jaise unako doktar ko dikhana unakee dava lana ya unake kisi rishtedaron ko rel ya bas men baithana ityadi karavate rahate hai.
jel men ek jelar bhi hota hai jo n to kaliya film ke pran jaisa hota hai n hi karma ke dilip kumar jaisa aur n hi angrejon ke jamane ke jelar asarani jaisa.
pahale ke jelaron ko bada khoonkhar kism ka mana jata tha kintu aaj ke jelar kayar bhi ho sakate hai aur shayar bhi.
aise bhi ho sakate hai jinake n moonchh ho n dadhi aur aise bhi jinake badan par lipati ho sadi.
aajakal jelon men jagah jagah sudhar karyakram aayojit kie jate hai.
jab hamane ek jelar se poochha ki aise karyakramon se kya kaidiyon men kuchh sudhar hota hai to ve bole '' aam kaidiyon men to hota hai kintu khaaas kaidiyon ke lie to hamen jel men hi sudhar karana padta hai.
ab to yahi dar laga rahata hai ki in khaaas kaidiyon kee saza poori karavane men kahin hamen hi saza n bhugatani pade.
Mere priye bhaaiyon, hume Pradhaan Thomas S.
Monson ke vyaktigat uddhaaran aur purohiti ki sewa se humesha prerna prapt hota hai.
Abhi jald, kai deacons se pucha gaya, “Pradhaan Monson mein tumhe sab se achcha kya lagta hai?” Ek deacon ne batlaya ki kis tarah Pradhaan Monson, jab wah bachcha tha, ne apne khilaunon ko zarooratmand doston ko diya tha.
Dusre ne kaha ki kis tarah Pradhaan Monson apne ward ke kai vidwaoun ka dhyaan rakha.
Teesre ne batlaya ki wah bahut hi kam umar mein ek Devdut ban gaya tha aur duniya bhar ke logon ko ashirwaad diya hai.
Phir ek jawaan purush ne kaha, “Wah cheez jo mujhe Pradhaan Monson ke bare mein sabse achcha lagta hai Unki gawahi.”
Sahi mein, hum sab ne apne bhavishyevakta ke khaas gawahi Uddhaarkarta Ishu Maseeh ka aur usko Aatma ke prerna par humesha chalne ko mehsoos kiya hai.
Har ek uddhaaran jo wah bataata hai, Pradhaan Monson chahtein hai ki hum susamachaar mein aur zyaada jiwan bitaaein aur humare vyaktigat gawahi ke liye dhoondhein aur shaktishaali banaye.
Yaad karo kuch pahale sammelan mein usne isi manch par yah kaha tha: “Hume shaktishaali rahane ke liye aur bure disha mein jaane se bachne ki koshish karo … , hume khud ki gawahi hona chahiye.
Chahe tum 12 ya 112 ke ho-yah beech ke bhi-tum khud hi jaan saktey ho ki Ishu Maseeh ka susamachaar sahi hai.”1
Bhale hi mera aaj raat ka sandesh12 se 112 tak ko maargdarshan dene ka hai, siddhaantein sabhi par laagu hota hai.
Pradhaan Monson ke kahe hue par, main puchta hoon: Kya hum sab apne liye jaantein hain ki susamachaar sachcha hai? Kya hum atma-nirbharta se kaha saktein hain ki humare gawahi sach mein khud ka hai? Pradhaan Monson ne dobara batlaya tha: “Main batlata hoon ki Uddhaarakarta aur Uske susamachaar ki gawahi ko jo… shakti tumhe tumhare ird-gird ke paap aur buraai se bachayega.
… Agar tumahre paas abhi yah gawahi nahi hai, jo kuch bhi ho yah gawahi ke parapt karne ke liye karo.
Tumhara khud ki gawahi hona zaroori hai, kyunki dusron ki gawahiyan kuch der hi saath dega.”2
In Baaton ko Main Swaye hi Jaanta Hoon
Khud ke liye yah jaanna ki Ishu Maseeh ka punaharsthapit susamachaar sachcha hai jiwan ke anubhao mein sab se mahaan aur khushi ka ho sakta hai.
Hum dusron ki gawahi par nirbhar hone se shuruwaat kartein hain- kahatey hue, jaese kishor yodha ne kiya tha, “Hum is mein sandeh nahi kartey ki humari maataaein bhi yeh baatein jaanti thi.”3 Yah achcha tarika hai humare gawahi ka shuruwaat karne ka, parantu hume zaroori hai ki hum madad karein use aage badhane mein.
Susamachaar mein humesha jine ke liye, yaha apne khud ke gawahi ko prapt karne aur mazboot karne se zyadaa zaroori kuch bhi nahi hai.
Hume bhi, Alma ki tarah batlana chahiye, “In baaton ko main… swaye hi jaanta hoon.”4
“Aur tum yah kaese maantey ho ki main in baaton mein nishchit hoon?” Alma aage batlaya.
“Sunno, main tumse kahta hoon ki Parmeshwar ki Pavitra Aatma ne un baaton ki jaankaari mujhe karaaai hai, in baaton ko swaye jaanne ke liye maine kai dinon tak upwaas aur prarthna ki hai.
Aur main jaanta hoon ki weh sab sathye hai.”5
Main un Baaton ko Dekhna Chahata hoon jo Mere Pita ne Dekha hai
Alma ki tarah, Nephi ne bhi khud ke liye sachchaai ko jaana.
Apne pita ko khud ke kai aatmik anubhaaoun ko batlatey sun kar, Nephi wah jaanna chahata tha jo uske pita ko pata tha.
Yah jaanne ke liye bahut hi utsuk tha- yah wah tha jis ki use bahut ikcha thi.
Bhale hi wah “bahut hi kam aayu ka tha, “usko “Parmeshwar ke bhedon ko jaane ke liye badi abhilaasha thi.”6 Aur maine Prabhu ko pukara aur sunno, aur mainn jaanta hoon, Pavitra Aatma ki shakti dwara.”7
Jab Nephi “in vichaaron mein [apne]mann mein khoya hua tha,” wah “Aatma mein leen ho gaya tha … bahut unche parwat ko dekha, “jaha usse pucha gaya, “Tum kya chahatey ho?” uska jawaab saral tha: “Main un baaton ko dekhna chahata hoon jinhein mere pita ne dekha tha.”8 Kyunki usko bahut vishwaas tha aur uska saaodhni se kaarye ke bal tha, Nephi ko mahaan anubhaoun ke saath ashirwaad diya gaya.
Usne Uddhaarkarta Ishu Maseeh ke payedaish, jiwan, aur Krus par chadhane ki gawahi ko prapt kiya tha; usne Mormon ki Dharamshaastra aur antim dinon mein susamachaar ki Punaharsthaapna ko pahale hi dekha tha-khud se pura jaane ki sachchi ikcha ke parinaam mein.9
Prabhu ke in vyaktigat anibhaoun ke saath Nephi ko taeyaar kiya tha use anewaale virodhiyon aur musibaton ko jhelne ke liye.
Us ne uski madad kiya tha sthir rahane mein jabki parivaar ke dusre sadasye jhel rahe the.
Wah yah kar sakta tha kyuki usne khud hi sikha tha aur wah khud jaanta tha.
Uske paas uski khud ki gawahi prapt thi.
Tum Parmeshwar se Maango
Nephi ki tarah, Bhavishyevakta Joseph Smith bhi “bahut kam aayu ka tha” jab uska “man mein ghabeer parchaai dikhaai diya” dhaarmik sachchaai par.
Joseph ke liye, wah samay “mahaan kathinaaiyon ka tha,” jaati ke sandesyon ko lekar jhagde aur galat faramiyon se gira hua.
Wah jaanna chahata tha ki kaun sa Girjaghar sachcha tha.10 Bible ke in shabdon se prerit hua: “Par yadi tum mein se kisi ko bhuddhi ki ghati ho to Parmeshwar se maango,”11 usne apne jawaab ko dhoondhne ke liye kaarye ko kiya.
1820 ke garmi mein ek sundar subeh ko, usne jangal mein jakar padon ke beech ghotne par hokar prarthna kiya.
Kyunki usko vishwaas aur kyunki Parmeshwar ke paas uske liye khaas kaam tha karne ko, Joseph ko Parmeshwar jo Pita hai aur Uske Putra, Ishu Maseeh ki mahaan drishti prapt hui aur khud ke liye sikh ki use kya karna chahiye.
Kya tum Joseph ke anubhao mein wah uddhaaran dekhtey ho jo tum apne gawahi ko paane aur mazboot karne mein kar saktey ho? Joseph ne dharamshaastra ko apne hriday ko prabhaawit karne diya.
Usne us par bahut socha aur apne khud ke stithi mein kaam mein laya.
Usne phir uspar kaarye kiya jo usne sikha tha.
Parinaam mein mahaan Pahela Drishye tha-aur Punaharsthaapna ka kariye baad mein aaya.
Girjaghar sachche siddhaanton par paya gaya tha jo sabhi log—jismein shaamil hai 14-saal ka kisaan ladka—“Parmeshwar se maang sakta hai” aur apne prarthnaon ke jawaab ko prapt kar sakta hai.
To Gawahi Kya Hai?
Hum humesha Girjaghar ke sadasye ko yajh kahatey hue suntein hai ki unke susamachaar ke gawahi sab se anmol cheez hai.
Yah Parmeshwar se prapt hui pavitra uphaar hai jo hume Pavitra Aatma ke shakti dwara prapt hota hai.
Yah wah shaanti, hai jo hum sthir rahane se humesha prapt kartein hain jab hum susamachaar ko sikhtein, prarthna kartein, aur susamachaar mein jeetein hain.Yah Pavitra Aatma ki ka ahesaas hai jo humare aatmaoun ko gawahi deta hai ki hum jo sikh rahein aur kar rahein hai waha sahi hai.
Kuch log gawahi ko is tarah batlatein hai jaese ki kuch tumhare paas hai ya nahi—ussi tarah jaese batti ki swich jal rahi hai ya bandh hai.
Sahi mein, ek gawahi ped ki tarah hai jo fule aur falne ke liye kai awastha se guzarta hai.
Kuch sab se bade ped pakchim United States ke Redwood National Park mein paya jata hai.
Jab tum is bade ped ke niche khade hoge, yah aschriye hoga yah dekhna ki har ek chote se beejh se hua hai.
Yah humare gawahi ke saath bhi hai.
Bhale hi hum ne ek hi dhaarmik anubhao se shuruwaat kiya ho, weh samay ke saath fultey aur faltey hain humesha ke poshan aur humesha dhaarmik anubhao ke dwara.
Yah ascharye nahi hai, phir, jab bhavishyevakta Alma ne gawahi ko badhaane par samjhaya tha, usne beejh ko ped banne par batlaya tha.
“Agar tum sthaan doge,” usne kaha, “ek beejh tumhare hriday mein boya jayega, sunno, agar wah sachcha ya achcha beejh hai aur tumne apne aswaashan ke karan use fekh nahi diya, jisse ki tum prabhu ki aatma ka virodh karo, tab wah tumhari chaati ke andar vikaash karega aur jab tumhe is vikaash ka anubhao hoga tab tum apne maanas mein kahoge—yah beejh ek uttam beejh hai arthat yah achchie vaani hai kyuki yah meri aatma ka vikaash karti hai; ha, usne mere vivek ko badhaana arambh kiya aur is ka swaad mujhe achcha lag raha hai.”12
Ayese hi gawahi badhata hai: pavitrata, roshni, wah ahesaas ke saath jo batlata hai ki Parmeshwar ki vaani sachchie hai.
Phirbhi, is ka ahesaas aschariye hai, yyah sirf shuruwaat hai.
Tumahre gawahi ko badhane ki kaarye bhi katam nahi hua hai—redwood ped ko bone ke kaam jayse hota hai jab dharti mein se pahala patta nikalta hai.
Agar hum haal ke dhaarmik prerna ko andekha aur nikaar kartein hain, agar hum uski paalan poshan humesha dharamshaastra ko sikhne aur prarthna aur Aatma ke aur zyaada anubho ko dhoondhtein nahi hain, humare ahesaas mar jayega aur humare gawahi kam ho jayega.
Alma ne is tarah kaha: “Lekin agar tum us vriksh ko tukraya hai aur use sichne ki parwa na ki, tab dekho, usmein jad na hoti aur jab surye ka dhup use jhulsayega tabjad na hone se wah sukh jayega, aur tum use ukhaad kar fenk doge.”13
Kai stithiyon mein, humare gawahi ped ki tarah hi badhenge: humesha, us tarah se ki vishwaas nahi kiya ja sakta hai, humare humesha ke dekhbhaal aur pariksham ke kaarye ki parinaam mein.
“Agar tumne vaani ka paalan poshan kiya,” Alma ne vaada kiya, “ha, agar viraksh jab badhana aarambh karta hai tabhi tumne uska paalan poshan agar pariksham dwara vishwaas ke saath dhayerpurwak fal ko prapt karne ki asha se kiya tab us mein jadh padegi; aur dekho, wah badh kar viriksh hoga aur anant jiwan prapt karega.”14
Abhi Samay Hai; Aaj Wah Din Hai
Mera khud ki gawahi shuru hua jab maine Mormon mein paaye hue shikshan ko sikha aur vichaar kiya hai.
Jab main Parmeshwar se vineet prarthna mein ghutne par hokar pucha tha, Pavitra Aatma ne mere aatma ko gawahi diya tha ki jo main padh raha tha wah sachcha hai.
Yah haal ki gawahi ne mujhe apne kai dusre susamachaar sachchaaiyon mein se ek gawahi tak pahuchaya tha, kyunki, jaesa Pradhaan Monson ne sikhlaya tha: “Jab hum jaantein hai ki Mormon ki Dharamshaastra sachcha hai, tab phir jaantein hai ki Joseph Smith sahi mein ek bhavishyevata hai aur usne Parmeshwar jo Anant Pita hai aur Uske Putra, Ishu Maseeh ko dekha tha.
Yah bhi jaantein hai ki antim-din mein Joeph Smith ke dwara susamachaar punaharsthapit hua tha—saath mein Aaronic aur Melchizedek Purohitiyan bhi punaharsthapit hua tha.”15 Us din se, mujhe Pavitra Aatma ke dwara kai pavitra anubhaoun ko prapt hua hai jisne mujhe aswaasan diya hai ki Ishu Maseeh duniya ka Uddhaarkarta hai aur Uska punaharsthapit susamachaar sachcha hai.
Alma ke saath, main yah kahe sakta hoon ki main jaanta hoon ki yah sab sachcha hai.
Mere jawaan doston, abhi aur aaj samay hai hume sikhne ya jaane ka ki susamachaar sachcha hai.
Har ek ke paas zaroori kaarye hai karne ko.Yah kaarye karne ke liye, aur duniya ke us prabhaao se bachne ke liye jo humesha musibat mein daalta hai, humare paas Alma , Nephi, aur jawaan Joseph Smith ke jaesa vishwaas hona chahiye humare khud ke gawahi ko paane aur badhaane ke liye.
Us jawaan deacon ki tarah jis ke bare mein maine pahale baatein kiya tha, main Pradhaan Monson ke gawahi ko pasand karta hoon.
Yah redwood ped ki tarah shaktishaaly bada ped hai, Pradhaan Monson ki gawahi bhi samay ke saath fale aur bade.
Hume khud hi jaan saktein hain, jaesa Pradhaan Monson ne jaana tha, ki Ishu Maseeh humare duniya ke Uddhaarkarta aur Muktidata hai, ki Joseph Smith Punaharsthapna ka bhavishyevakta hai, saath mein Parmeshwar ki purohiti ko bhi punaharsthapit kiya hai.
Hum us purohiti ko rakhtein hain.
Main vineet se prarthna karta hoon ki hum in cheezon ko khud hi sikhein aur jaane Ishu Maseeh ke naam se, amen.
