Parmeshwar ko khush karne se pehle dusron ko khush karte hue woh ek aur dusri aagyaon ko ulta kiya jata hai.
“Tum kis tarah ho?” Pradhaan Boyd K.
Packer ne mujhe is pechida sawaal ke sathaschriye mein dala jab hum apne pehle kaarye ke liye saath ja rahe the naye Sattar ki tarah.
Bina hi samjhaaye swaal ko stithi dekh kar pucha, Main achambe mein padh gaya.
“Ek Sattar,” wah aage bola, “bhavishyevakta se baatein kar raha tha sabhi sadasyon ki oar se parantu wah bhavishyevaktaon ke shabdon ko sadasyon ko batla rahe the.
Kabhi na bhulo tum kis tarah ho!” Yah ek shaktibhara shikshan hai.
Parmeshwar ko khush karne se pehle dusron ko khush karte hue woh ek aur dusri aagyaon ko ulta kiya jata hai (dekhiye Matthew 22:37–39).
Hum bhul jaatein hai ki hum kis tarah hain.
Aur phirbhi, hum sab ne wah galti ko kiya hai kyunki insaan se darten hain.
Isaiah mein Prabhu ne hume chetaaoni diya hai, “Tum na to manushye ke tiraskaar se aur na hi unke apshabdon se daro” (Isaiah 51:7;  2 Nephi 8:7bhi dekhiye).
Lehi ke sapne mein, yah dar dusre logon ko mahaan aur khule imaarat se ungali ko utane se shuruwaat kiya gaya tha, kai ko bhulate hue ki weh kis tarah the aur ped ko chod diya “lajjit hokar” (dekhiye 1 Nephi 8:25–28).
Dusre logon ke prabhao mein aakar log dhang badal detein hain, agar chaalchalan nahi, ek ko nikar karne ke zimmedar bana kar.
Hum jo ungali utatein hain ke liye izzat bhare sah-hastitav ko dhoondhtein hain, magar jab insaani dar hume paap se chama karta hai, yah ek “fanda” ban jaata hai Proverbs ki kitaab mein likhe ki tarah (dekhiye Proverbs 29:25).
Yah fanda chalaaki se humare dayaluta ki oar badhta hai, taaki Parmeshwar jo pasand nahi karta ya chahat usi kaarye ko karein.
Kamzor vishwaasi ke liye, yah ek mahaan rukaawat ki tarah hai.
Uddhaaran mein, kuch praarchaarakhen is insaani dar ko apne saath mission ke sewa mein le jatein hain aur apne saathi ke galat harkaton ko apne mission pradhaan se nahi batlatin hain kyunki weh apne saathiyon ke saath dhoka nahi karna chahate.
Chaalchan ka parinaam sahi dhang se pehle aur dusre aagyaon yaad karne se hota hai (dekhiye Matthew 22:37–39).
Jab yeh achambe mein pade prachaarakhen Parmeshwar ke khilaaf hone ko jaante hain aur apne saathi ko nahi, unhein himmat se apne dhyaan ko badalna chahiye.
22 ki yuva bhare umar mein, jab Joseph Smith bhool gaya tha ki kis tarah kare tab usne Prabhu manaya tha Martin Harris ko 116 dharamshaastra ke panon ko udhaar dene ke liye.
Shaayad Joseph Martin Harris ko uski madad ka abhari hona dikhlana chahata tha.
Hum jaantein hain ki Joseph bahut hi utsukh tha dusre gawahi kartaon ko uske khilaaf jhute mute baaaton ko faelne se bachaane ki madad ke liye.
Chaahe kuch bhi Joseph ka kaaran ho, ya kitne bhi kaaran ho, Prabhu ne unhein maaf nahi kiya aur us par rokh laga diya: “Kitni baar tumne galti kiya hai  … aur apne aap ko insaan ke mat kiya hai, Isliye, dekho, tumhe Pareshwar se zyaada insaan se darna nahi chahiye” (D&C 3:6–7; zor diya gaya).
Is dukhit anubhao ne Joseph ko yah yaad rakhne mein madad kiya tha, humesha ke liye, kis tarah wah tha.
Jab insaan dusre insaan se achcha rishtarakhne ki koshish kartein hai, weh Parmeshwar se vishwaas ko kho saktein hai.
Yah sochte hue ki ek insaan Parmeshwar ko khush kar sakta hai aur usi samay isaan ki aagyakaari na hone par bhi unke taraf ho sakta hai parantu chal ya sachcha insaan nahi ya “do swamiyon ka ek saath sewa” karna chahata hai (Matthew 6:24; 3 Nephi 13:24).
Jabki khatre ko jhelna himmat ki baat hai, sachcha himmat ka chinn insaani dar par jeet raha hai.
Uddhaaran mein Daniel ki prarthna ne use sher se jhelne ki madad kiya tha, parantu use Raja Darius ko lalkaarne mein himmat kis ne diya tha (dekhiye Daniel 6).
Us tarah ki himmat Aatma ka uphaar hai jo Parmeshwar se dartein hain jisne apne prarthnaon ko kiya hai.
Rani Esther ke prarthna ne use wahi himmat diya tha uske pati se saamna karne mein, Raja Ahasuerus, jaanta tha ki yah karne se uske apni jiwan mein khatra hoga (dekhiye  Esther 4:8–16).
Himmat hi ek gun ka mulye nahi hai, parantu jayesa C.
S.
Lewis ne dekha tha: “Himmat hai …sabhi gun ka parikchan ke samay.
…Pilate daya se bhara hua tha jabtak ki daya karne se khatre mein nahi pada.”1 Raja Herod dukh mein tha John jo Baptisma dene waala tha ko nikaalne ke aagre par parantu pasand karna chahata tha “baitne waalon ke sang” (Matthew 14:9).
Raja Noah Abinadi ko azaad karne ke liye taeyaar tha jabtak ki uske dusht paadiriyon ne us par duwidha ke dabaao ko dala tha (dekhiye Mosiah 17:11–12).
Raja Saul ne Prabhu ke baaton ko nahi sunna tha ladaaiyon ko karwaya tha kyunki wah “logon bhaye mana, aur unki baaton ko sunna” (1 Samuel 15:24).
Mount Sinai ke niche vidhrodi Israel ko shaant karne ke liye, Aaron ne sone ke gaaye ko banaya, bhooolte hue ki use kis tarah karna tha (dekhiye Exodus 32).
Kai Naye Niyan ke mukhye netaaein “vishwaas kiya [Prabhu] par; Parnatu Phariseeyon ke kaaran prakat mein nahi maante the kahi ayesa na ho ki weh araadhnalaye mein nikaale jaaye: Kyunki manushyon ki oar se prasansha unko Parmeshwar ki oar se prasansha ki apeksha adhik priye lagti thi” (John 12:42–43).
Dharamshaastra mein is tarah ke uddhaaran bhare hue hain.
Ab kuch prerit bhare uddhaaran ko sunno:
• Pehla, Mormon: “Sunno, Main nidarta se kehta hoon, Parmeshwar se aagya lene se; aur main darta nahi ki insaan kya kar sakte hai; sachcha prem har dar ko bhaga deta hai” (Moroni 8:16; zor diya gaya).
• Nephi: “Isliye, sansaar ko pasand karne waali baaton ko main nahi likhta, lekin jo baatein sansaarik nahi hai, aur jo Parmeshwar ko pasand karne waali baatein hain, unko main likh raha hoon” (1 Nephi 6:5).
• Captain Moroni: “Sunno, main tumhara pradhaan senapati Moroni hoon.
Main shakti ko nahi khojta usedhona chahata hoon.
Main sansaarik izzat nahi dhoondhata parantu main apni Parmeshwar ka izzat, apne desh ki swatantrata aur bhalaai chahata hoon” (Alma 60:36).
Moroni ke paas bahut himmat tha yah jaane ke liye ki wah kis taraf tha, ki usne yah kaha, “Agar ateeth aur vartamaan mein sabhi log Moroni jaese hote aur bhavishye mein usi ki tarah loh hote, tab sunno, adholog ki shakti hi sadeo ke liye nasht ho jaati; aur maanao vash ke hridayon par shaitaan ka kabhi bhi koi adhikaar nahi ho pata” (Alma 48:17).
Itihaas bhar mein bhavishyevaktaaoun ki ninda ki gayi hai.
Kyo? Dharamshaastra mein, yah hai kyunki “apradhi sachchaai ko katorta maante hai, do tukdon mein karne jesa aadhaat pahunchaati hai” (1 Nephi 16:2), jaise Pradhaan Harold B.
Lee ne dekha, “Logon ko sachchaai bura lagta hai!”2 Unke ninda bhare kaarye hai, sahi mein, galti jo khudh ko sahi lage, Korihor ki tarah jisne ant mein maan gaya, “Main jaanta tha ki ek Parmeshwar hai” (Alma 30:52).
Korihor jhut bolne mein itna mahir tha ki usne apne khudh hi ke jhut ko vishwash kiya (dekhiye Alma 30:53).
Nintaatmak humesha bhvishyevktaoun ki khilli udaatein hain ki naye zamane ke nahi hai ya kattar hain.
Weh Girjaghar ko vishwaas dilate aur un par dabaao dalte hain Parmeshwar ke star ko kam karne ke liye apne khud ke chaalchan ki barabari tak, jo Elder Neal A.
Maxwell ke shabdon mein, “khud ko satusht karega, aatam-sudhaar dhoondhane ke bawajood”3  aur paschaataap nahi.
Prabhu ke star ko sanstha ke chaalchan tak karna sidhaant chodhna hai.
Nephites ke beech kai girjagharein, Uddhaarkarta ko unko bhent ke do sadiyon ke baad, siddhaant ko “saral” karna shuruwaat kiya, Elder Holland ke kahawat ko udhaar maange kar.4
Jab tum 4 Nephi ke is bhaag se suntein ko, humare dinon ke tulna ko dekho: “Aur ayesa hua ki do sao daswa warsh smaapt hote-hote desh mein kai girje ho gaye; ha, bahout se girje Maseeh ko jaanne ka dhong kartey hue uske injil ke adhikaash bhaag ko is kaaran karne lage, yaha tak ki unmein har prakaar ki buraaiyon ah gayi aur ayesi kariyaon karne lage jo ki unke liye anuchit hone ke karan wachit thi parantu un logon ke liye pavitra ho gayi” (4 Nephi 1:27).
Usi tarah ka kaarye aaj Antim dinon mein ho raha hai! Kuch sadasye yah nahi jaan rahein hain ki weh bhi ussi fande mein fas rahein hain jab weh prabhaao daalna chahate hai sthaaniye ya ‘pitaon ke parampara” (D&C 93:39) ko apnatey hain jo susamachaar ke parampara se mel nahi khata Abhi log, khud-jhut bolte hain aur khud ko nikaar detein hain, bishop se guzaarish ya chahatein hain ki mandir ke sifaarish ke star ko kam karein, skool pushti, ya praarchaarak ke arzi mein.
Is tarah ke dabaao mein bishop hina asaan nahi hai.
Phirbhi, Uddhaarkarta ki tarah jisne mandir jo saaf kiya tha uske pavitrata ke liye (dekhiye John 2:15–16), aaj ke bishop ko mandir ke star ko puri tarah se bachaane ko batllaya gaya hai.
Wah Udddhaarkarta tha jisne kaha, “Main apne aap ko apne logon ke liye daya  … agar mere log mere vaade ko pura karenge, aur is pavitra ghar ko maela nahi karenge” (D&C 110:7–8).
Uddhaarkarta, humare mahaan Uddhaaran, humesha Apne Pita par dhyaan diya.
Usne Apne logon se prem aur sewa kiya parantu kaha, “Maine logon se izzat nahi paya” (John 5:41).
Jinhein Wah sikhlata tha Wah chahata tha ki Uske piche chalein, parantu Usne unke hit mein nahi dhoondha.
Jab dayaluta ke kaarye ko karta tha, jaese bimaaro ko dheek karna, uphaar humesha aadar se aaya ki “kisi insaan ko nahi batlaao” (Matthew 8:4; Mark 7:36; Luke 5:14; 8:56).
Bhaag mein, yah sahi ko chupaane ka tha jo Uske piche aaya tha Uske bal ko rokhne ke bawaajood (dekhiye Matthew 4:24).
Usne Pharisees ko accha kaarye karne ke liye ko bura bhala kaha taaki sirf insaan use jaane (dekhiye Matthew 6:5).
Uddhaarkarta, sirf ek hi sachcha insaan jo jiya tha, sab se nidar tha.
Uske jiwan mein, Us par kai ilzaam lagaye gaye parantu unke ungali utaane par kabhi faeda nahi utaya.
Wah hi sirf woh insaan hai jo kabhi nahi bula tha kis tarah karna hai: “Main humesha wah karta hoon jo [Pita] ko pasand hai” (John 8:29; zor diya gaya), aur “Main apneaap se kuch nahi kar sakta, parantu apne bhejne waale ki ichcha chahata hoon” (John 5:30).
3 Nephi 11adhyaye aur 3 Nephi 28 adhyaye ke beech, Uddhaarkarta ne shirshak Pita ko lagbhag 163 samay par istamaal kiya hoga, Nephites ko saaf taur se batlatey hue ki Wah waha par Apne Pita ko prastuth karne ke liye tha.
Aur John 14 adhyaye se  17 tak, Uddhaarkarta ne lagbhag 50 samay par Pita ke baare mein batlaya hoga.
Sabhi stithiyon mein, Wah Apne Pita ka sachcha chela tha.
Wah Apne Pita ko prastuth karne mein bilkul sachcha tha, ki Uddhaarkarta ko jaanna Pita ko bhi jaane jaesa hai.
Putra ko dekhna Pita ko dekhne jaesa hai (dekhiye John 14:9).
Putra ko sunna Pita ko sunne jayesa hai (dekhiye John 5:36).
Woh Apne Pita ke jaesa ban gaya tha.
Pita Us mein hai aur Woh Pita mein ek hai (dekhiye John 17:21–22).
Wah sahi tarah se jaanta tha Use kis tarah karan tha.
Uske prerit bhare uddhaaran humein shakti de jhut ke chungal se bachne mein dusron se ya khud ke ghamand se.
Main asha karta hoon ki Uske uddharan se hume himmat milega darenge nahi ya un ko khush nahi karenge jo hume darayenge.
Main asha karta hoon ki Uske uddhaaran se hum prerit honge sachche karam karne mein jitna bhi ho gumnaam rup se, aur “insaan se izzat nahi chahenge” (D&C 121:35).
Aur main asha karta hoon ki Uska anokha uddhaaran hume humesha madad kare yaad rakhne mein jo “pehla aur mahaan aagya hai” ko ” (Matthew 22:38).Jab dusre Parmeshwar ke aagyaon ka anaadar karne ke liye ijaazat ko chahatein hain, main asha karta hoon ki hum humesha yaaad karein ki kis ke chelein hum hain, aur kis taraf hum kartein hain, mera prarthna hai Ishu Maseeh ke naam se, amen.
ganv ab shahar men tabdil hote ja rahe hain.
aaj yahan badi badi imaraten, motar-gadi dekhe ja sakate hain.
ganv ka gudi@ chaipal aur amaraee aaj dekhane ko nahin milata...
naee pidhi ke logon ko maloom bhi nahin hoga ki ganvon men aisa kuchh raha bhi hoga.
hamare poorvajon ne ganv men amaraee lagana, kunaa khudavana aur talab khudavana puny kary samajha aur use karavaya.
rasile aur pakke aam ka svad bhi hamane chakha.
aaj naee pidhi ke bachche botal men band mengo joos, frooti aur aamaras ka jeli aadi ko sarvottam bhale man le lekin palaee aam ko choosane aur aam ka amasara khane ka maja kuchh aur hi tha.
mujhe mere ghar men hamare poorvajon ke dvara kunaa aur khudavane sanbandhi kagajat mile hain jisake evaj men dipti kamishnar, rayapur ke dvara prashasti patr diye gaye hain.
arthat! das kal men kunaa aur talab khudavana atyant puny kary tha.
talabon ke kinare baragad, pipal aur nim ke ped lagavaye the jisakee chhanv men hamara bachapan gujara tha.
meri dadi batati hai ki unakee 5-6 varsh ka bachcha khatm ho gaya jisakee yad men unake sasur ne chhuiya talab ke kinare panch ped lagavaye the jisakee chhaya aaj bhi sabako milati hai.
prayah sabhi ganvon men anek talab, talab ke kinare ped aur shiv mandir avashy hote the.
isi prakar dharmarth kuen khudavaye jate the.
talab 'vatar harvestinga' ka bahut achchha madhyam tha.
aaj ganvon kee tasvir badali huee hai.
logo ne gharon ke farnichar ke lie amaraee ke pedon ko katava dala hai.
aaj vahan pedon ke thoonth hi shesh hain.
amaraee ke aamon kee baten kisse kahaniyon jaise lagata hai.
talab ab jana nahin hota kyon ki gharon men boring ho gaya hai, panchayat dvara pani saplaee bhi kee jati hai...
arthat ghar baithe pani kee suvidha ho gayi hai.
isalie talab kee upayogita ya to machhali palan ke lie rah gayi hai ya fir use patakar ko imarat banaye ja rahe hain.
ganv se shahar ban rahe kasbon ke talabon men gharon ka ganda pani dala ja raha hai.
ratanapur, malhar, kharaud aur adabhar men kabhi 120 se 1400 talab hone kee bat kahi jati hai.
rayagadh men itane talab the ki use 'khaiya ganva' ke nam se sanbodhit kiya jane laga tha.
lekin aaj vahan kuchh hi talab shesh hain bakee sabako patakar badi badi imaraten, skool-kalej aur sinema hal bana diya gaya hai.
kahana n hoga ki talab aur nadiyon ke kinare lage pedon ke jad mitti ko bandhe rakhata tha, jisake katane se nadiyon ka katav badhate ja raha hai aur aane vale samay men samooche ganv ke nadi men sama jane ka khatara banane laga hai.
ganv ke bahar prayah sabhi chhote-bade kisanon ka 'ghurava' hota tha jisamen gay aur bhains ka gobar dala jata tha.
bhavishy men yahi uttam khad ban jata tha aur barasat ke pahale use khamaton men dala jata tha jisase khamaton kee urvara shakti badh jati thi aur paidavar achchhi hoti thi.
tab dubaraj chanval kee khushaboo poore ghar men fail jati thi.
aaj ganvon men aisa kuchh nahin hota kyon ki aaj hal kee jagah trektar, gobar khad kee jagah yooriya khad le liya hai.
pani nahin barasa to nahar se liya jata hai jab nahar se pani nahin mila to tyoob bel khodakar pani khinchakar sinchaee kee jati hai.
fasal men keede ho jate hain to keet nashak davaeeyan dali jati hai.
bhale hi ab dubaraj chanval men khushaboo nahin hai lekin sarakar ke dvara kam samay men adhik paidavar vale dhan ke bij upalabdh kara diya jata hai.
kisanon kee chinta hai ki unake bachche kheton men jana nahin chahate.
ve to pan thela, hotal aur any dukan kholakar jine ke aadi hote ja rahe hain.
naee pidhi ke kheti-kisani ke prati aroochi se khet banjar hote ja rahe hain, yah chinta kee bat hai.
ghar men khane ko kuchh ho ya n ho lekin ek motar sayakal avashy hona chahiye.
isake lie baink aur fainensing kanpaniyan lon dene ko taiyar baithe hain.
lon ke karj men ghar bhale hi doob jaye, isase kisi ko kuchh lena dena nahin hota.
logon ka manana hai ki karj men ham janm lete hain, karj men jite hain aur karj lie mar jate hain....
khushi karane kee bat hai ki nadi kinare vale ganvon men audyogik pratishthan lagate ja rahe hain.
logon ko ummid hai ki audyogik pratishthanon ke lagane se unhen rojagar mil jayega, vyapariyon ka vyapar badh jayega, makan malikon ko kirayedar mil jayega......
chhattisagadh shasan audyogik samoohon ko pratishthan lagane ke lie aamantrit kar rahi hai, yahan unhen bhoomi muhaiya kara rahi hai to svabhavik hai ki yahan audyogik pratishthan lagenge hi...
lagate ja rahe hain.
akele rayagadh jile ke aasapas lagabhag 150 aayaran aur pavar plant lag chuke hain.
chhattisagadh ka sabase bada jindal spanj aur stil plant lag chuka hai aur jald hi unaka pavar plant lagane vala hai.
isake lie kelo nadi men unaka pavar plant lagane vala hai.
isi prakar anek audyogik pratishthan lag chuke hain aur lagate ja rahe hain.
svabhavik roop se in sabhi pratishthanon ko pani kee aavashyakata hogi jisakee poorti nadiyon ke upar bane bandhon se kee ja rahi hai.
bandh ke banane se nadiyon men pani hi nahin hai aur hai bhi to audyogik pratishthanon se nikala rasayan yukt ganda pani hai jisase nadiyan pradooshit ho gayi hai.
pradesh men audyogik pratishthanon ke lagane se rashtriy aur antarrashtriy bajar men vikas ka graf avashy badha hai.
lekin vikas ke sath sath anek prakar kee buraeeyan bhi aati hain jise pratyaksh roop se dekha ja sakata hai.
audyogik pratishthanon se nikala dhunaa jahan pedon ke chakriy jivan ko prabhavit kar raha hai, vahin usake dhuen se khet kee urvara shakti khatm hoti ja rahi hai aur khet banjar hote ja rahe hain.
adhikansh nadiyon men bandh banaye ja chuke hain jisase nadiyan sookh gayi hai.
usamen jo thoda bahut jal hai usamen audyogik pratishthanon ka rasayan yukt ganda pani pravahit ho raha hai.
isase jan jivan ast vyast hote ja raha hai.
aaj fasal chakr kee bat kee jati hai...
fasal chakr to nahin badala lekin jalavayu parivartan avashy ho gaya hai.
ek hi nagar men kahin barasat hoti hai to kahin nahin hoti.
jal ka chakr ke prabhavit hone se aisa hota hai.
jalavayu parivartan vikasit aur vikasashil deshon ke bich vad vivad ka vishay jaroor bana hai lekin sachchaee yah hai ki hava, pani, bhojan, svasthy, kheti, aavas aadi sabhi ke upar isaka pratikool prabhav padane vala hai.
samudri jal star ke badhane se prabhavit hote tatiy kshetr ke log hon ya asamany manasoon athava jal sankat se trast kisan, vinashakari samudri toofan ka kahar jhelate tatavasi hon athava sookhe se trast aur asamany mausam se janit ajibo-garib bimariyan jhelate log ya fir vinashakari badh men apana sab kuchh gavan baithe aur doosare kshetron men palayan karate tamam lo jalavayu parivartan kee mar jhel rahe hain.
prakriti ke tin upakar h mitti pani aur bayara
audyogik kranti kee bhatthi men hamane apana jangal jhonk diya hai.
ped kat dale aur sadaken bana dalin.
kulhadi-aari se jangal katane men der hoti thi, to pavar se chalane vali aariyan gadh dalin.
san 1950 se 2000 ke bich 50 varsho men duniyan ke lagabhag aadhe jangal kat dale, aaj bhi berahami se kate ja rahe hain.
jal sangrahan ke lie talab banaye jate the jisase kheton men sinchaee bhi hoti thi.
lekin aaj talab ya to patakar usamen badi badi imaraten banayi ja rahi hai ya usamen keval machhali palan hota hai.
machhali palan ke lie kaee prakar ke rasayanon ka upayog kiya jata hai jisaka talabon ka pani anupayogi ho jata hai.
isi prakar audyogik dhuon se vayumandal to pradooshit hota hi hai, jamin bhi banjar hoti ja rahi hai.
isase prakriti ka santulan bigadane laga hai aur dushparinam ham bhugat rahe hain.
aakhir jangal kyon jaroori hai ? ped hamen aisa kya dete hain, jo unhen bachana jaroori hai ? ped hamen fal, fool, jadi-booti, bhojan, rindhan, eemarati lakadi, gond, kagaj, resham, rabar aur tamam duniyan ke adbhoot rasayan dete hain.
isalie hamane usaka dohan (shoshann) to kiya, par yah bhool gaye ki vrikshon ke nahin hone se yah dharati aaj viran banati ja rahi hai.
vanon ke is upakar ka roopayon men hi hisab lagayen to ek ped 16 lakh roopaye ka fayada deta hai.
ghane jangalon se bhap banakar uda pani varsha banakar vapas aata hai aur dharati ko hara bhara banata hai.
ped paudhon kee jaden mitti ko bandhe rahati hai.
pedon kee kataee se dharati kee hariyali khatm ho jati hai.
dharati kee upajaoo mitti ko tej bauchharon ka pani baha le jati hai.
pedon kee dhal ke bina pani kee tej dharaen pahadon se utar kar maidanon ko dubati chali jati hai.
har sal badh ka pani apane sath 600 karod tan mitti baha le jata hai.
mitti ke is bhayavah katav ko rokane ka ek hi upay hai-vriksharopan.
mitti, pani aur bayar, ye tin upakar hain vanon ke ham par.
isalie hamare desh men prachin kal se pedon kee pooja hoti aayi hai.
kabir kahate hain ki manushy ke man ke ganga jal kee tarah nirmal ho jane par hari arthat eeshvar ko khojane kee aavashyakata nahin apitu hari hi manushy ke pichhe-pichhe dauda chala aaega.
sant ravidas bhi kahate hain ki man changa to kathauti men ganga.
kabir aur ravidas hi nahin sabhi santon ne man kee nirmalata par bal diya hai aur nirmalata bhi gangajal -si.
ek prarthana men bhi pankti aati hai ki gangajal sa nirmal man ho, mila mujhe vidya ka dhan ho.
prashn uthata hai ki man kee nirmalata se kya tatpary hai aur isakee kya upayogita aur mahattv hai tatha man kee nirmalata kee upama ganga ke jal se kyon di jati hai?
ganga bharat kee ek atyant pavitr nadi hai jisaka jal kafi dinon tak rakhane ke bavajood ashuddh nahin hota jabaki sadharan jal kuchh dinon men hi sad jata hai.
ganga ka udgam sthal gangotree ya gomukh hai.
gomukh se bhagirathi nadi nikalati hai aur devaprayag namak sthan par alakananda nadi se milakar aage ganga ke roop men pravahit hoti hai.
bhagirathi ke devaprayag tak aate-aate isamen kuchh chattanen ghul jati hain jisase isake jal men aisi kshamata paida ho jati hai jo usake pani ko sadane nahin deti.
har nadi ke jal men kuchh khas tarah ke padarth ghule rahate hain jo usakee vishisht jaivik sanrachana ke lie uttaradayi hote hain.
ye ghule hue padarth pani men kuchh khas tarah ke baiktiriya ko panapane dete hain to kuchh ko nahin.
kuchh khas tarah ke baiktiriya hi pani kee sadan ke lie uttaradayi hote hain to kuchh pani men sadan paida karane vale keetanuon ko rokane men sahayak hote hain.
vaigyanik shodhon se pata chalata hai ki ganga ke pani men bhi aise baiktiriya hain jo ganga ke pani men sadan paida karane vale keetanuon ko panapane hi nahin dete isalie ganga ka pani kafi lanbe samay tak kharab nahin hota aur pavitr mana jata hai.
kaha gaya hai ki sankalpavikalpatmakan manah arthat man sankalp aur vikalp svaroop hai.
man men har pal asankhy vichar aate aur jate hain aur unamen parivartan hota rahata hai.
man atyant chanchal hai, kahin ek sthan par tikata nahin, bhagata rahata hai.
isamen paraspar virodhi vicharon ka pravah chalata rahata hai.
kabhi achchhe vichar to kabhi bure vichar.
man kee isi chanchalata ke karan manushy anek samasyaon aur vyadhiyon se grast rahata hai.
vicharon ke anuroop hi hamari aadaton ka vikas hota hai aur vichar hi karm karane ke lie utprerak tattv kee bhoomika ka nirvah karate hain.
sakaratmak vichar hamen sahi karm kee or agrasar karate hain to nakaratmak vichar galat karm kee or.
hamare achchhe svasthy ke lie sakaratmak soch hi uttaradayi hai to bure svasthy ke lie nakaratmak soch.
man kee chanchalata ke karan athava man kee nirmalata ke abhav men hi ham apani chetana se ekakar nahin ho pate hain.
man kee nirmalata se tatpary hai man ka vikaron arthat galat vicharon se rahit hona.
vikar roopi baiktiriya hi hamare man kee nirmalata ko nasht karate hain atah unase chhutakara pana anivary hai.
jahan tak jal kee nirmalata kee bat hai shuddh jal ka n to koee svad hota hai aur n koee rang ya gandh hi.
ham prayah kahate hain ki ye pani mitha hai aur ye khara hai.
vastav men shuddh pani mitha nahin hota apitu jo pani khara nahin hota ya jisamen ashuddhiyan nahin hotin use hi mitha pani kah dete hain.
aur yah bilakul svadahin, rangahin tatha gandhahin hota hai.
hamara man bhi shuddh pani kee tarah hi hona chahie tabhi vah nirmal mana jaega arthat man men bhi kisi prakar ke bhav nahin hone chahien lekin yah asanbhav hai kyonki man vichar shoony nahin ho sakata.
vichar ke abhav men to karm hi sanbhav nahin.
jaise vichar ya bhav vaisa manushy atah manushy ko karmashil bane rahane ke lie tatha sahi disha men agrasar hone ke lie achchhe vicharon se otaprot hona chahie.
manushy nakaratmak vicharon ya bhavon ke vashibhoot hokar hi galat kary karata hai atah vicharon par niyantran anivary hai aur vicharon par niyantran ke lie anivary hai man kee nirmalata.
jis prakar pani ko sadane se rokane ke lie pani men panapane vale ghatak baiktiriya ko rokane ke lie usamen upayogi baiktiriya kee upasthiti anivary hai usi prakar man men bhavon ke pradooshan ko rokane ke lie sakaratmak vicharon ke nirantar pravah kee bhi aavashyakata hai.
jab bhi koee nakaratmak vichar utpann ho sakaratmak vichar dvara use samapt kar dijie.
sakaratmak vichar roopi baiktiriya dvara hi ham apane man ko nirmal kar sakate hain aur man kee nirmalata ka arth hai man men rag-dvesh aadi paraspar virodhi bhavon v vikaron kee samapti dvara samata kee sthapana.
jab vyakti samata men sthit ho jata hai to dvandv kee bhi samapti ho jati hai aur dvandv kee samapti hi vastavik upachar hai.
sakaratmak vicharon ke nirantar pravah dvara n keval sharirik vyadhiyon ka upachar sanbhav hai apitu svayan ke vastavik svaroop athava chetana se ekakar hona bhi sanbhav hai.
svayan ke vastavik svaroop athava chetana se ekakar hone ka arth hi hai apane andar ke eeshvar kee khoj.
man kee nirmalata ke bad eeshvar ko khojane kee aavashyakata hi nahin rahati kyonki svayan eeshvar hi pichhe-pichhe dauda chala aata hai arthat manushy ke man men aa upasthit hota hai.
yahi man kee vastavik nirmalata hai.
rashtriy asmita ke rekhankan ka sarthak prayas hai ''kranti-yagya''
svatantrata aur svadhinata pranimatr ka janmasiddh adhikar hai.
isi se aatmasamman aur aatmautkarsh ka marg prashast hota hai.
bharatiy rashtriyata ko dirghavadhi videshi shasan aur satta kee kutil-upaniveshavadi nitiyon ke chalate paratantrata ka dansh jhelane ko majaboor hona pada aur jab is krooratam krityon se bhari apamanajanak sthiti kee charam sima ho gaee tab janamanas udvelit ho utha tha.
apani rajanaitik-samajik-sanskritik-aarthik paradhinata se mukti ke lie san 1857 se san 1947 tak dirghavadhi krantiyagy kee balivedi par anek rashtrabhakton ne apana sarvasv nyauchhavar kar diya tha.
isi 'kranti yagya' kee gauravagatha janamanas men sahity aur sahityetihas men ankit hai.
bharatiy dak seva ke adhikari evan yuva sahityakar krishn kumar yadav v yuva lekhika aakanksha yadav dvara susampadit pustak ''kranti yagy h 1857-1947 kee gatha'' men bharatiy svadhinata sangram kee amar balidani gaurav gathaon evan inake vibhinn pahaluon ko vividh jivan kshetron se sankalit karake aitihasik shodhagranth ke roop men prastut kiya hai.
is prastuti men bharatiy svadhinata sangram ke gyat v agyat amar shahidon aur senaniyon ko vistrit rashtriy asmita ke bhavapoorn parivesh men ankit karane ka sarthak prayas kiya gaya hai, jo apane rashtriy jivan ke aadarshamay sandeshon se paripoorn hai.
apani sampadakeey men krishn kumar yadav ne svayan kaha hai ki- ''bharat ka svadhinata sangram ek aisa aandolan tha jo apane aap men ek mahakavy hai.
lagabhag ek shatabdi tak chale is aandolan ne bharatiy rashtriyata kee avadharana se sangathit hue logon ko ekajut kiya.
yah aandolan kisi ek dhara ka paryay nahin tha balki isamen samajik- dharmik-sudharak, rashtravadi sahityakar, patrakar, krantikari, kangresi, gandhivadi ityadi sabhi kisi n kisi roop men sakriy the.'' inhi vicharon ko pramanikata pradan karate hue is shodh sahity men un sabhi vicharakon, chintakon itihasakaron aur amar balidani krantikari shahidon se jude evan unakee lekhani se nikale aitihasik dastavejon ka sankalan kiya gaya hai.
''kranti yagy h 1857-1947 kee gatha''' men jin lekhon ko sankalit kiya gaya hai, unhen do bhagon men banta ja sakata hai.
pratham bhag 1857 ke svatantry sangram kee prishthabhoomi, kranti kee tivrata aur kranti ke nayakon par kendrit hai, to doosare bhag men 1857 kee kranti ke paravarti aandolanon aur nayakon ka chitran hai.
pratham svadhinata sangram par svayan sampadak krishn kumar yadav ka likha huaa lekh '1857 kee kranti h prishthabhoomi aur vistara' sarvadhik ullekhaniy hai.
is aalekh men tatkalin eest indiya kampani kee shoshan niti aur bharatiyon ke prati unakee kroorata ko 1857 kee kranti ka pramukh karan mana gaya hai.
isake alava bharatiy paramparaon aur dharmik manyataon ko kuchal kar eesaee dharm ke vistar kee niti ko bhi kranti upajane ka karan mana gaya hai.
ghatanaon ka tarkasangat vishleshan karate hue vidvan lekhak ne us kranti ko matr 'sipahiyon ka vidroha' athava 'samanti virodha' ke angrej itihasakaron ke jhoothe prachar ka khandan bhi kiya hai.
krishn kumar ne bade nayab tarike se ankit kiya hai ki 1857 kee kranti ko kuchh itihasakaron ne mahasvapn kee shokantika bhale hi kaha ho, par is garvile upakram ke falasvaroop hi bharat ka nayab moti eest indiya kampani ke hathon se nikal gaya aur jald hi kampani bhang ho gaee.
pan0 javahar lal neharoo kee pustak 'bharat kee khoja' se uddhrit aitihasik aalekh '1857h aajadi kee pahali angadaee' is sangrah ka mahatvapoorn aalekh hai, jisamen vishv itihas kee jhalak ke sath tatkalin rashtriy vicharadharaon v unake prabhavon ka sanskritik aur samajik paksh ujagar huaa hai.
isamen bharat ke pratham pradhanamantree ne un sabhi pakshon ka varnnan kiya hai, jo janamanas men british shasan ke virooddh upaje aakrosh ka karan the.
sangrah men ek aur mahatvapoorn aalekh daae0 ramavilas sharma ka '1857 kee rajy krantihitihasakaron ka drishtikonna' hai.
1857 kee kranti ka adhyayan karane ke lie shree sharma ne itihasakar shree majoomadar, shree sen aur shree joshi ke lekhon ka vishleshan kiya hai.
makrsavadi drishtikon aur paddhati ko svikar karane vale itihasakaron ne british satta ka paksh liya hai.
daae0 sharma ne aise tathyon ka tarkasangat khandan kiya hai.
'striyon kee duniyan ghar ke bhitar hai, shasan-sootr ka sahaj svami to puroosh hi hai' athava 'shasan v samar se striyon ka sarokar nahin' jaisi tamam purooshavadi sthapanaon ko dhvast karata aakanksha yadav ka lekh 'viranganaon ne bhi jagaee svadhinata kee alakha' svatantry samar men mahilaon kee prabhavi bhoomika ko karine se prastut karata hai.
inamen se kaee viranganaon ka jikr to itihas ke pannon men milata hai, par kaee viranganaon kee mahima atit ke pannon men hi dabakar rah gayi.
isi kram men aasharani vhora dvara prastut 'pratham krantikari shahid kishorihpritilata vadedara' evan svatantrata senani yuvatiyon men sarvadhik lambi jel saja bhugatane vali nagalaind kee rani gidaloo ke sambandh men lekh bhi mahatvapoorn hain.
aajad hind fauj men leftinent rahin manavati aayrya ka manana hai ki bharat apani sajjanata ke vyavahar ke karan samrajyavadi angrejon kee kootanitik chalon v hinsavadi gatividhiyon ka shikar bana tha.
apane lekh ''bharatiy svatantrata kee do sashastr krantiyan'' men ve 1857 kee kranti v aajad hind fauj kee ladaee ko bharat kee aajadi ke pramukh aadhar stambh ke roop men chinhit karati hain.
1857 kee kranti ka itihas mangal pande, bahadur shah jafar, tatya tope, nana sahab, ajimulla khan, maulavi ahamadulla shah, kunvar sinh, rani lakshmibaee jaise krantidharmiyon ke bina adhoora hai.
vidvan lekhak shree ram shiv moorti yadav ne 1857 kee kranti ka pratham shahid mangal pande ko manate hue jo tathy prastut kiye hain vah angrejon kee barbarata-tanashahi aur nirankushata ka pardafash karane vale-pramanik-kanooni-pahaloo ko ujagar karate hain.
jabalapur ke sena aayudh kor ke sangrahalay men rakhe mangal pande ke fansinama ka hindi anuvad is lekh kee vishishtata hai.
vijay narayan tivari dvara atit ke pannon se uddhrit ''bahadurashah jafar ka aitihasik ghoshana patra'' sanskritik aur samajik samarasata ko aadhar deta, sabhi bharatiyon ko sangathit hokar aatatayi ke virooddh aandolit hone ka nimantran patr hai.
gurilla yuddh men mahir tatya tope ke sambandh men dinesh bihari trivedi ka lekh kaee pahaluon kee padatal karata hai.

is kod kee kaee visheshataen hain---
· yah brahmi lipi par aadharit hone se brahmi lipi se utpann sabhi lipiyon ke lie ek saman hai, yani ki n keval bharatiy lipiyon jaise asamiya, udiya, tamil, telugoo, devanagari, ke lie balki tibbati, thaee aur sinhali bhashaon ke lie bhi yah kod saman hai.
· sabhi brahmi aadharit lipiyon ka saman kod hone ka labh yah hai ki in lipiyon ka aapas men satik lipyantaran kiya ja sakata hai.
jahir hai isase matr lipi ke karan paida hone vali ajanabiyat ko door karane men madad milegi.
· iskee kod men aksharon ko unake uch‍charan ke kram men hi rakha gaya hai, chahe unaka likhane ka tarika alag hi kyon n ho.
isase ham chahen kisi bhi lipi men taip kyon n kar rahe hon, un aksharon ke likhane ke tarikon men chahe kitana hi antar kyon n ho, unhen taip karane ka tarika ek hi rahega.
· isaka doosara fayada yah hai ki isase unake akaradikram men sidhi chhantaee men koee dikkat pesh nahin aati.
mool aksharon ko taiping ka aadhar banane ke karan unhen taip karane ka ek hi tarika ho sakata hai.
yadi ksha, tra, gy jaise sanyuktaksharon ke lie alag kod diya jaega to yah sanbhav nahin ho sakega.
· iskee kod men eskee kod ko yathavat rakha gaya hai jisase angrezi aur bharatiy bhashaon ke sah-astitv men koee kathinaee nahin aaegi.
isase angrezi men vikasit sabhi softaveyaron men isake istemal men koee kathinaee nahin aaegi.
aap soch rahe honge ki jab hindi men itana suvicharit aur suchintit kod tha jo n keval hindi ko vaigyanik aadhar par sanyojit karata tha balki sabhi bharatiy lipiyon kee aadharabhoot ekata kee bhitti par bhi khada tha.
aur jisake karan sabhi bharatiy bhashaon kee ekata bhi ek naya takanikee aayam grahan karane ja rahi thi.
fir kya huaa ki isake bavajood hindi men behad arajakata kee sthiti dikhaee padati hai.
is kod ke itana behatarin aur upayogi hone ke bavajood adhikatar softaveyar nirmataon ne isaka anupalan nahin kiya.
is bat ko zara thande dimag se samajhie.
yani ki, man lijie, 184 ke sthan par, jise iskee kod men 'k' ke lie niyat kiya huaa hai, yadi ek softaveyar nirmata ne 'g' rakh de aur doosara softaveyar nirmata ne isi sthan par 'ch' rakh de to kya hoga.
pahale nirmata ke softaveyar men taiyar dastavez men jahan-jahan 'g' taip kiya huaa hai, doosare softaveyar men kholane par vahin-vahin 'ch' dikhaee padega.
aur manak iskee kod ka istemal karane vale softaveyar men vahan 'k' dikhaee dega; yani betaratib, arthahin, aksharon ka samooh skrin par drishtigochar hoga.
aur mitro, yahi huaa bhi hai.

kya yah sab kuchh hamare desh men hindi ke bina ho sakata hai? kya isakee pahunch aam janata tak ho sakati hai? kya angrezi ke madhyam se intaraneti dukanen apana mal vigyapit kar sakati hai? kya ve apane mal ko angrezi se aon-lain bech sakati hain? in sab savalon ka ek hi javab hoga ki nahin, nahin, nahin.
yadi bharat men soochana praudyogikee ko apani kamaee badhani hai, yadi bharat kee upabhok‍ta v seva kanpaniyon ko apana intaraneti bazar tezi se failana hai, yadi intaranet ko apani paith door daraj tak karani hai to use hindi aur bharatiy bhashaon ko apanana hi hoga.
in sab karanon ne opanataip font banane ka marg prashast kiya.
opan taip font dizital font hain jo opanataip vishishtataon se yuk‍t hain.
ye font brahmi aur semetik lipiyon jaisi jatil lipiyon ke lie apekshit unnat taipografi visheshataen upalabdh karate hain.
sath hi ye font ligechars, roopon, vikalpon aur any pratisthapanon ko samarthan pradan karate hain.

ye skript prosesing laibreri aur opan taip laibreri seva (otielaes) ke sath milakar kam karate hain.

vindoz aopareting sistam men yooniskraib aur otielaes aopareting sistam laibreri ka ang hain.
opan taip fonton ka uddeshy bharatiy bhashaon men vaib-vishayavastu taiyar karana, deskatop anuprayogon men bharatiy bhashaon ko samarthan pradan karana, yoonikod aadharit bharatiy bhashaon men sarch injan vikasit karana aur vibhinn bhashaon ke lie bharatiy bhasha nidhi vikasit karana hai.
choonki ye vindoz 2000, vindoz eksapi, linaks, yooniks, mek oes aadi lagabhag sabhi aopareting sistamon ka hissa hain isalie ye prayok‍ta ko vahi svatantrata muhaiyya karate hain, jo angrezi ke fonton ke istemal men dekhane men aati hai.
inaka upayog karane par aap apane foldar ya kisi fail ka nam hindi men de sakate hain, hindi men fail dhoondh sakate hain.

basharte ki vah kanpyootar yoonikod samarthit hona chahie.

spraidashit men aap apani kastam soochi bhi hindi men bana sakate hain.

chahe bangal ho ya maharashtr, madras ho ya rajasthan ya madhyapradesh sabhi jagah yah tyauhar badi dhoomadham aur pavitrata ke sath manaya jata hai.
bangal men to yah tyauhar shakti ka pratik mana jata hai.

bahan dvara bhaee kee kalaee men bandha gaya 'raksha kavacha' jahan bhaee kee suraksha karata hai vahin unhen bahan kee raksha ke vachan ko smaran karata hai aur is atoot bandhan ko aakhiri kshan tak nibhane ka prayas karata hai.
bahanon kee khatir bhaee apane pran tak dene ko tatpar rahata hai.

sarv rogo rishamanan sarv shubh vinashakam.
sakriy krite nandekam pashamanan raksha krita bhavet..
bhavishy puran men bataya gaya hai ki raksha kavach bandhane kee pratha kee shuroovat maharaj indr kee patni shachi ne kiya tha.
jab dev aur danavon ke bich yuddh chal raha tha tab indrani ne apane pati kee vijay kamana ke lie usake dahine hath men raksha sootr aur chanval-sarason ko bandhakar unakee suraksha aur vijay kee kamana kee thi jisase ve asuron par vijay prapt kar sake the.
ek doosari kinvadanti ke anusar kanv rishi ke aashram men jab shakuntala ko raja dushyant shrap vash pahachanane se inkar karane ke bad rahane lagi.
vahan usake garbh se 'bharata' paida huaa.

tab tak raksha sootr kitane logon ko sarp banakar das chuka tha.
balak bharat "sher, chita aur any janavaron ke sath khela karata tha.
shrap se mukti pakar raja dushyant shakuntala ko khojate kanv rishi ke aashram men pahunche.
vahan is adbhut balak ko dekhakar aashchary chakit ho uthe.
unhonne dekha ki usake hoth se raksha kavach gir gaya hai.
raja use uthakar usake hath men punah bandh diya.
rishi kanyaon ne is drishy ko dekhakar yah jan liya ki yahi bharat ke pita raja dushyant hain.

isaka arth hai- raksha karana, raksha karane ko tatpar rahana ya raksha karane ka vachan dena.

aisa bhi mana jata hai ki lanka par chadhaee karane ke lie shreeramachandr ji ne isi din ko chuna tha isase unhen lanka par vijay mili.

sanskritik paranpara h-
rakhi kee bhi ek sanskriti hoti hai.
rakhi ka vartaman svaroop is sanskritik yatra ka hi parinam hai.
pahale nari devi huaa karati thi, sati hoti thi.
unhen apane sat par atoot vishvas tha.
unhen unaka sat hi shakti pradan karata tha.
jab raje-rajavade huaa karata tha tab ladaee men jane ke poorv raniyan raja kee aarati utarakar unhen dhal aur talavar saunpakar unake mastak men tilak lagakar unake dahine hath men raksha sootr bandhakar unake vijay kee kamana karati thi.
rannakshetr men jane ke pahale vah apane pati se kahati thi-'mere satitv ka pratik yah raksha sootr aapakee raksha hi nahin karegi varan aapako shakti bhi pradan karegi aur aapakee vijay hogi.
yah sahi hai ki pahale nariyan sati huaa karati thi, sat hi unaka dharm tha, pati unake lie devatuly tha.
yahi unaka sanbal tha isalie vah sabala thi.
unhen kisi ke sanrakshan kee aavashyakata nahin thi.
apane dharm aur satitv se shaktimay sabala apane devatuly pati kee raksha bhi karati thi.
bharatiy sanskriti men aise kaee udaharan mil jayenge jahan pati kee raksha prativrata nari ke satitv se huee hai.
tab nariyan poojaniya huaa karati thi.
sulochana, anusooiya aur sulakshana ka satitv aur satvik oj samaj ke lie raksha kavach ka kam karata tha.
tab nari prabala thi.
vidya, buddhi, gyan, tap aur pavitrata aadi har drishti se unaka vyaktitv sabal tha.
vah raksha ke lie kisi se yachana nahin karati thi apitu raksha ka varadan deti thi.
rakhi kee sanskriti ka itana udatt aaranbh nishchay hi bharatiy sanskriti ka gauravashali paksh raha hai.
samay parivartan ke sath hi paristhitiyan badal gayi, manobhavon men badalav aaya.
videshi aakramann, satta parivartan aur daman chakr men nari pisati chali gayi aur vah poojaniya se bhogya rah gayi.
nariyon ka satvik oj samapt hota gaya.
sabala nari aaj abala ho gayi aur pratikool paristhitiyan aakhir unhen kamajor bana diya.
puroosh pradhan samaj men nari ekadam asurakshit ho gayi aur unakee suraksha ka bhar pita, bhaee aur pati upar aa gaya.
pati kee raksha ke lie unakee kalaee men raksha kavach bandhane vali nari aaj svayan kee raksha ke lie bhaiyon kee kalaee par rakhi bandhati hain.
rakhi ek pavitr bandhan h-
hindoo dharmavalanbiyon ke sanskarik karyon aur vishesh samaroh aadi men dhage ko pavitr sthan diya gaya hai.
manushy ke sath dhage ka sanbandh garbh men aane ke bad se lekar usake mrityu sanskar (antyeshti) tak hota hai.
upanayan sanskar aur antim sanskar ye donon dhage ke atoot bandhan par aadharit hota hai.
dhaga keval achetan vastu n hokar silk ya soot ke kaee taron ko pirokar taiyar hota hai.
yah bhavanatmak ekata ka pratik hai.
isilie ise pavitr mana jata hai.
dhage se sanpadit hone vale sanskaron men upanayan sanskar, vivah aur raksha bandhan pramukh hai.
puratan kal se vrikshon ko raksha sootr bandhane kee paranpara hai.
baragad ke vriksh ko striyan dhaga lapetakar roli, akshat, chandan, dhoop aur dip dikhakar pooja kar apane pati ke dirghayu hone kee kamana karati hai.
aanvale ke ped par dhaga lapetane ke pichhe manyata hai ki isase unaka parivar dhan dhany se paripoorn hoga.
is tarah ham dekhate hain ki dhage ka upayog prachin kal se hota aaya hai.
yah dhaga matr nahin hai jise bhaee kee kalaee men bandhakar paise kee kamana karen balki yah to shakti kar pratik hai.
vah bhaiyon ko itani shakti deta hai ki vah apani bahan kee raksha karane men samarth ho sake.
aajakal mera dhyan is saval kee or bar-bar jata hai ki aaj se sau-pachas varsh bad bharat ka roop kya hone vala hai.
kya vah aisa bharat hoga, jise kanban, kabir, akabar, tulasidas, vivekanand aur gandhi pahachan sakenge athava badalakar vah poora-ka-poora amarika aur yoorop ban jaaiga? pichhale sau-dedh sau varshon se bharat aadhunikata kee or badhata aa raha hai, lekin samajha yah jata hai ki bharat ab bhi aadhunik desh nahin hai, vah madhyakalinata se aachchhann hai.
svatantrata ke bad se aadhunikata ka prashn atyant prakhar ho utha hai, kyonki chintak yah manate hain ki hamane agar aadhunikata ka varan shighrata ke sath nahin kiya, to hamara bhavishy andhakarapoorn ho jayega.
ataev yah prashn vicharaniy hai ki aadhunik banane par bharat ka kaun-sa roop bachane vala hai aur kaun balidan men jayega.
naitikata saundary-bodh aur adhyatm ke saman aadhunikata koee shashvat mooly nahin hai.
sach poochhiye to vah mooly hai hi nahin, vah keval samay-sapekshy dharm hai.
navin yug, samay-samay par aate hi rahate hai aur jaise aaj ke naye jamane par aaj ke logon ko naj hai, usi tarah har jamane ke log apane jamane par naj karate hai.
sansar ka koee bhi samaj kisi bhi samay itana svabhavik nahin raha hai ki vah har aadami ko pasand ho.
aur koee samaj aisa bhi nahin bana hai, jisake bad ka kal usaka aalochak nahin huaa ho.
vaidik yug bharat ka pray: sabase adhik svabhavik kal tha.
yahi karan hai ki aaj tak bharat ka man us kal kee or bar-bar lobh se dekhata hai.
vaidik aary apane yug ko svarnnakal kahate the ya nahin, yah ham nahin janate, kintu unaka samay hamen svarnnakal ke saman avashy dikhayi deta hain.
lekin jab bauddh yug ka aaranbh huaa.
vaidik samaj kee pol khulane lagi aur chintakon ke bich usakee aalochana aaranmbh ho gayi.
bauddh yug anek drishtiyon se aaj ke aadhunikata-aandolan ke saman tha.
brahmanon kee shreshthata ke viruddh buddh ne vidroh ka prachar kiya tha.
jati-pratha ke buddh virodhi the aur manushy ko ve janmana nahin karmana shreshth ya adham samajhate the.
nariyon ko bhikshuni hone ka adhikar dekar unhone yah bataya tha ki moksh keval purooshon ke hi nimitt nahin hai, usakee adhikarani nariyan bhi ho sakati hain.
buddh kee ye sari baten bharat ko yad rahi hain aur buddh ke samay se barabar is desh men aise log utpann hote rahe hain, jo jatipratha ke virodhi the, jo manushy ko janmana nahin karmana shreshth ya adham samajhate the.
aaj kee aadhunikata ke prasang men dekhen, to buddh ke yuddh-virodhi vichar bhi aadhunik the.
kintu buddh men aadhunikata se bemel bat yah thi ki ve nivritivadi the.
grihasthi ke karm se ve bhikshu-dharm ko shreshth samajhate the.
unakee prerana se desh ke hajaron-lakhon yuvak, jo hatte-katte the, hal jotane aur gadi hankane ke yogy the.
utpadan badhakar samaj ka bharann-poshan karane ke layak the.
sannyasi ho gaye aur unakee yuva patniyan jivit vaidhavy kee vedana se kaharane lagin.
sannyas kee sanstha samaj-virodhini sanstha hai.
hansi-hansi men ek bar svami vivekanand ne bhi kaha tha ki sannyas ka ek bada dosh yah hai ki vah achchhe logon ko samaj se alag kar deta hai.
kintu vivekanand fir bhi adhik aadhunik nikale, kyonki apane sannyasiyon ko unhonne samajasevi bana diya.
vivekanand ke sannyasi ek daravaje se sansar se nikal jate hain, kintu doosare daravaje se ve sansar men hi vapas aa jate hai: apani grihasthi chhodakar ve sabakee grihasthi men sahayata karate hain.
kintu buddh kee drishti aihik thi hi nahin.
ve manushy ko yah upadesh dete the ki jivan jalata huaa makan hai aur buddhimani kee bat yah hai ki ham is aag se nikal bhagen.
jivan du:khapoorn hai aur sare du:khon kee jad manushy ka janm hai.
ataev hamen vah rasta pakadana chahie, jisase janm lena hi asanbhav ho jay.
srishti ke vishay men buddh kee drishti kya thi, isaka spashtikaran buddh ne kabhi nahin kiya.
is par buddh ko kaee nastik athava sandehavadi manate hain.
garache adhik sachcha mat yah maloom hota hai ki buddh eganastik the, kyonki unaka vichar tha ki jo tatv bhautikottar aur indriyon kee pahunch ke par hain, unhen buddhi nahin jan sakati hai.
aur unakee yahi nastikata aur sandehavadita unhen aadhunik yug ke lie aakarshak bana deti hai.
nastik to charvak aur brihaspati bhi the, kintu charvak aur brihaspati bharatiy vicharadhara athava usake drishtikon ka pratinidhitv nahin karate.
kintu buddh bharatiy vicharadhara ke bahut bade pratinidhi hai.
unaka bharatiy chintan par prabhav hai aur bharatiy sanskriti ke pratinidhi hone ke karan hi ve vishnu ke navam avatar mane jate hain.
gautam buddh prachand buddhivadi the.
ve janata kee shradva ka shoshan karake us par apana mat ladana chahate the.
apane shishyon se bhi unhone kaha tha, 'aatmadipo bhava'.
tum apana dipak aap bano.
tum meri koee bhi bat isalie mat mano ki vah meri kahi huee hai.
tumhen unhin baton men vishvas karana chahie, jo tumhari khud kee samajh men aati hon.
jin prashnon ka samadhan buddhi se nahin ho sakata aur jinake uttar pane ya n pane se aadami ka kuchh banata- bigadata nahin, vaise sabhi prashnon ko tathagat ne avayakrit koti men dal diya tha aur unake poochhe jane kee manahi kar di thi diryanikay ke potthapad-sutt men buddh karate hai: podvapad! log nity hai, aur doosara mat yah ki lok nirarthak hai, ise mainne avyakrit (kathan ka avishay) kaha hai.' potthapad ke yah poochhane par ki kisalie bhante, bhagavan ne ise avyakrit kaha hai? tathagat ne batalaya ki 'isalie ki ye prashn n to arthayukt hain, n dharmayukt, n aadi brahmachary ke upayukt, n nirved (vairagy) ke lie, n nirodh ke lie, n upasham ke lie.' arthat in prashnon ke vivechan men padane se manushy ko kuchh bhi prapt hone vala nahin hai.
kintu, buddh ka avyakrit charon or se nishchhidr nahin hai, kyoki paralok ko ve manate the, devataon kee yoni men unaka vishvas tha aur, garache aatma ko ve nashavan samajhate the, kintu aavagaman ke sidvant men unaka atal vishvas tha aur ve manate the ki jo aatma sharir ke sath nasht hoti hai, usi ka punarjanm bhi hota hai.
ataev janmantaravad aur karmafalavad men unaka poora vishvas tha aur is mamale men unaka darshan vahi tha, jo vaidik dharm valon ka raha hai.
buddh ke pahale bharat men sanskriti kee ek hi dhara bahati thi, jise ham vaidik sanskriti ke nam se janate hai.
kintu buddh ke aavirbhav ke bad se is desh men sanskriti kee do dharaen bahane lagi hai.
pahali dhara sanskriti kee vah mat-dhara hai, jo varnashram-dharm ka samarthan karati hai, jati-pratha ko kayam rakhana chahati hai, shoodron ko oopar uthane dena nahin chahati chhuaachhoot men vishvas karati hai.
aur any dharmon aur sanskritiyon ke prabhav se bachakar jina chahati hai.
doosari dhara vah hai, jo buddh ke kamandalu se nikali hai.
yah dhara brihat manavata kee dhara hai.
ab to is dhara ka bhi eeshvar men vishvas hai aur vah janmantaravad aur karmafalavad ko usi dridhata se manati hai, jis dridhata ke sath vaidik dharm usamen vishvas karata hai, kintu yah dhara varnashram-dharm ke viruddh hai, jat-pat ko vah nahin manati hai, chhuaachhoot ko vah adharm samajhati hai, shoodro aur daliton ke lie usake bhitar khas pakshapat hai tatha any dharmon aur sanskritiyon se vah dvesh nahin, prem karati hai, kam-se- kam unake prati vah poorn roop se sahanashil hai.
koee aashchary nahin ki bharat ka niryat-dharm bauddh dharm nikala.
koee aashchary nahin ki aaj ke yug men bharat ka sarvabhaum satkar buddh ka karan adhik, kisi any dharm-neta ke karan kam hai.
aur koee aashchary nahin ki is desh men dharm ke jo shaktishali thekedar the, unhone bauddh mat ko khadedakar desh se bahar nikal diya.
kintu bauddh keval sharir se hi hara hai.
man to usaka sanpoorn hindutv ke bhitar aaj bhi jivit aur sachet hai.
jyon-jyon samay bitata jata hai ham manu ke paksh men kam, buddh ke paksh men adhik hote jate hain, tulasi kee or kam, kabir kee or adhik jhukate jate hain.
lagata hai buddh ne jin baton ke khilaf vidroh kiya tha, hamen bhi unake viruddh aavaj uthani chahie, kyonki vaidik dharm kee jo baten buddh ko napasand thin, ve dharm ke tatv nahin, usake oopar jami huee roodhiyon kee papadiyan hai aur unhen todakar jhade bina bharatadharm navin nahin hoga.
jisaka arth yah hai ki vah apane asali svaroop par nahin pahunchega.
kintu aadhunikata ke prasang men svabhavat: hi yah prashn uthata hai ki tab asali bharat kaun hai? vah jisake shastrakar manu aur vashishth darshanik shankar ramanuj aur vallabhachary tatha kavi valmiki, kanban aur tulasidas hain? athava vah jisake shastrakar svayan buddh, darshanik nagarjun aur vasubandhu tatha kavi tiroovalluvar, vemanna aur kabir hain? prashn bada hi bihad hai, lekin khairiyat yah hai ki itihas ne use sulajhakar hamare lie aasan kar diya hai.
hindu-dharm ab vahin nahin hai, jo kanban aur tulasi athava vemanna aur kabir ke samay tha.
yooropiy sanpark ka ek bahut bada shubh parinam ham yah manate hain ki usane hindutatv ko hilakor kar usake bhitar ek kranti utpann kar di aur us kranti ne manu aur buddh vali donon dharaon ko milakar ek kar diya hai.
hindutv ab vahi nahin hai, jo manu kee smriti tatha vidyapati ke ninbadhon men likha milata hai.
usaka shashvat, chir-navin aur jagrat roop ab vah hai, jisaka aakhyan paramahans ramakrishn aur svami vivekanand ne kiya hai, aravind aur maharshi raman ne kiya hai, gandhi aur svami dayanand ne kiya hai.
yah thik hai ki vivekanand aur gandhi ke bataye hue marg par sari janata abhi nahin chal rahi hai.
kintu yah bhi thik hai taki samaj ke agrani log, jinaka aacharan dekhakar samaj apana aacharan badalata hai, purane hindutv ko chhodakar abhinav hindutv par aa gaye hain aur jahan samaj ke agrani log aaj pahunche hai, vahan sara samaj kal pahunchakar rahega.
kintu kya apane samajik aachar badal dene se hindoo poorn roop se aadhunik ho joyenge? bharat ke poorn roop se aadhunik hone men badhaen kaun-kaun-si hai? aadhunikata kya hai aur bharat-dharm ke kin mool tatvon se usaka virodh padata hai? kya poorn roop se aadhunik banane ke prayas men ham bharat-dharm ke in mool tatvon ka bhi balidan karengen? agar han to ramamohanaray, vivekanand aur gandhi ke is svapn ka kya banane vala hai ki hamen bharatiy paranpara ke shiv-ansh ko kayam rakhana hai, hamen apani paranpara ke sarvashreshth tatvon ko pashchaty sabhyata ke un tatvon se ekakar karana hai, jo us sabhyata ke sarvashreshth ansh hai? aur kahin hamane apani paranpara ka pakshapat karane ke prayas men aadhunikata ka poorn roop, se varan nahin kiya, to isase hamara aur sansar ka koee akalyan to nahin hone vala hai? sansar men jab bhi koee naya yug aaranbh hota hai, vah yuddh ke karan aaranbh nahin hota, parajay ya vijay ke karan aaranbh nahin hota, kranti ke karan aaranbh nahin hota, n desh ka naksha badalane se aaranbh hota hai.
naya yug barabar naye prakar ke logon ke janm ke sath udit hota hai.
vaise jise ham aadhunikata kahate hai.
vah kaee baton ka ek sammilit nam hai.
audyogikaran aadhunikata kee pahachan hai.
saksharata ka sarvavyapi prasar aadhunikata kee soochana deta hai.
nagar-sabhyata ka pradhany aadhunikata ka gun hai.
sidhi-sadi arth-vyavastha madhyakalinata ka lakshan hai.
aadhunik desh vah desh hai, jisakee arth-vyavastha jatil aur svabhavat: hi prasarannashil ho, jo 'tek-aafa' kee sthiti ko par kar chukee ho.
band samaj vah hai jo any samajon se prabhav grahan nahin karata: jo apane sadasyon ko bhi dhan ya sanskriti ki dirgha men oopar uthane kee khooli chhoot nahin deta, jo jati-pratha aur gotravad se pidit hai, jo andhavishvasi, gatanugatik aur sankeern hai.
band samaj madhyakalinata ka samaj hota hai.
aadhunik samaj men unmuktatata hoti hai, us samaj ke log any samajon se milane-julane men nahin ghabarate, n ve unnati ka marg khas jatiyon aur khas gautron ke lie hi simit rakhate hain.
aadhunik samaj ka ek lakshan yah bhi hai ki usakee har aadami ke pichhe hone vali aay adhik hoti hai, har aadami ke pas koee dhandha ya kam hota hai, aur avakash kee shikayat pray: har ek ko rahati hai.
lekin ye aadhunikata ke bahari lakshan hain.
yoorop aur amarika ka samaj, sachche arthon men, aadhunik samaj hai aur oopar ke lakshan mainne yooropiy samaj ko hi dekh kar diye hain.
kintu udyog aur rojagar, saksharata aur oonchi aay, yadyapi is samaj ke pramukh lakshan hai magar yooropiy samaj ke ve maulik gun nahin hai.
yoorop aur amarika men jo aadhunikata faili hai, usaka asali karan vaigyanik drishtikon kee prathamikata aur prabaly hai.
yah drishti udyog aur teknaloji se nahin utpann huee hai, balki teknaloji aur udyog hi is drishti ke parinam hain.
yoorop aur amarika ka sabase bada lakshan vaigyanik drishti hai, nishthur hokar saty ko khojane kee vyakulata hai.
aur is khoj ke kram men shradra, vishvas, paranpara aur dharm, kisi bhi badha ko buddhi svikar karane nahin hai.
aadhunik munashy ke bare men samany kalpana yah hai ki apane chintan men vah nirmam hota hai, nishthur aur nirbhik hota hai.
jo bat buddhi kee pakad men nahin aa sakati, use vah trikal men bhi svikar nahin karega aur jo baten buddhi se sahi dikhayi deti hain, unakee vah khuli ghoshana karega, chahe ve dharm ke viruddh padati hon, naitikata ke khilaf jati hon athava unase manavata ka chiraposhit vishvas khand-khand ho jata ho.
isilie log aksar aadhunikata ko nastikata ka paryay samajh lete hain aur yah sochane lagate hain ki aadhunikata ka ek lakshan yah bhi hai ki vah naitik niyamon kee avahelana karati hai.
yahi nahin, jinhonne aadhunikata kee rooh ko pahachanane kee koshish nahin kee hain, ve 'jaja' sangit aur 'trivasta' nrity tatha mata-pita ke sath ladakon ke durvyavahar ko bhi aadhunikata ka hi lakshan man lete hain.
kintu ye chijen aadhunikata kee nahin, uchchhrinkhalata ki nishani hain aur ve aadhunik hon bhi, to mai to unhen aadhunikata kee prakriti nahin, vikriti hi kahoonga.
ye kuritiyan aadhunikata kee shobha nahin badhatin, purane deshon men use agrahay bana deti hai.
unnisavin sadi men aadhunikata kee lahar bharatavarsh men bade jor se uthi thi aur jahan tak usake moolatattv yani buddhivad ka sanbandh hai, hamare mahapurushon ne use svikar bhi kiya tha.
kintu do karanon se aadhunikata bharat men badanam ho gayi.
ek karan to yah tha ki jitane logon ne aadhunikata kee ridh yani aur vaigyanik drishti aur buddhivad ko pakada tatha svasth svadhin chintan ke lie usakee mahima svikar kee, unase kaee guna adhik log svadhin chintak hone ka svang bharane lage.
aise yuvak us samay apane ko 'yang bangala' kahate the.
aur apani aadhunikata kee abhivyakti ve sharab pikar, apane dharm kee ninda karake balki mandiron men gomans fenkakar karate the.
inase se bahut-se log eesaee bhi ho gaye the or kaee mamalon men dekha gaya tha ki unake dharm-parivartan kee prerana aadhyatmik jigyasa nahin, koee ihalaukik lobh athava prem tha.
aadhunikata kee badanami ka doosara karan yah huaa ki usake pratik hamare angrej shasak the, jinamen hamen mohabbat nahin, ghrina thin.
aadhunikata ke viruddh bharatiy samaj ne jo kathor pratikriya abhivyakt kee thi, usaka praman ham unnisavin sadi men dekh chuke hain.
aadhunikata ke chhichhalepan ko dekhakar bharat itana naraj huaa ki yoorop ko svikar karane ke badale usane ek doosari hi rah pakad li.
hindoo kahane lage ki hamari sanskriti bahut purani hain, hamara sahity sarvashreshth hai aur dharm ke bare men ham jitana janate hain, usase adhik janakari ka dava yoorop ke log nahin kar sakate, ataev ve hamase chahe to dharm sikh len, ham unakee vichar-paddhati ko kabool nahin karengen.
aur musalaman kahane lage ki jo shikshaen hamen yoorop ke log dene aaye hain, ve hamare dharm granthon men pahale se hi maujood hain.
nayi duniya se hamen kuchh bhi nahin lena hain.
lekin bharat us samay bhram men tha.
nayi duniya kee hamane bahut sari baten svikar kar li hain aur bahut-si baton ko svikar karane kee hamari taiyari jari hai.
audyogikaran yoorop aur amarika kee den hain.
bharat men nagaron kee jo sankhya aur pradhanata badhane lagi hain, vah aadhunikata ka parinam hai.
kolejon aur yoonivarsitiyon ka aaj ka roop bahar se aaya hain, saksharata ka vikas aadhunikata ke dhakke se ho raha hai.
hamare prajatantr kee paddhati yoorop aur amarika se li gayi hain.
vyaktivad kee prerana is desh men yoorop aur amarika kee dekha-dekhi badh rahi hai aur sammilit parivar kee paripati par jo khatare mandara rahe hain, ve bhi aadhunikata kee hi den hai.
nariyon kee maryada-vriddhi aadhunikata ke karan ho rahi hai aur yadi aadhunikata kee prerana hamare bhitar kam nahin karati hoti, to ham hindoo kod ko kanoon ka roop nahin de sakate the.
kuchh baton men aadhunikata ne hamari sahayata paroksh roop se bhi kee hai.
jin pravrittiyon ko aaj ham aadhunik kahate hain, ve buddh men dikhayi padi thin, bhakt aur sant kaviyon men dikhayi padi thi.
unhen aadhunikata ne kuchh tej kar diya aur ham asprishyata ko kanooni aparadh ghoshit karane men safal hue.
isi prakar hamare sanvidhan men jo yah shart rakhi gayi hain ki nar-nari ke bich koee asamanata nahin barati jayagi tatha unnati ke avasar sabhi jatiyon ke logon ko, bhedabhav ke bina, upalabdh rahenge, vah shart, vaise dekhiye to, manusmriti ke khilaf padati hai.
lekin us shart ko janata ne isalie kabool kar liya ki pichhale sau-dedh sau varshon ke bhitar usake kattarata ke bahut-se bhav badal gaye hain ya dhile pad gaye hain aur usaka man dhire-dhire navin ho raha hai.
Kaam mein thodi mazaak-masti ho jaaye to kaam ka maja hi kuch aur hoga.
Dhongibaba laaye hain kuch anokhe tarike jis se aap apne office ke sahyogiyon ko barabar pareshan kar sakte hain.
Lekin isse apki roji-roti par koi bhi asar pade to bhai humko mat bolna.
Aakhir hum to hain hi Dhongibaba ;-)
1.
Din mein achanak apne desh ka rashtriya gaan computer pe chalu kar dein.
Sabhi sahyogiyon ko apni kursiyon se uthna hi padega.
Jo khada rehne se inkaar kare uska naam apne boss ko bata do.
2.
Kisi ka mobile akela mil jaaye, to ek badiya sujhaav hai.
Uski contact list mein hahakar macha do.
Jaise Saurav ke naam ke aage Dhoni ka no daal do aur Harbhajan ke naam ke aage Sreesanth ka mobile no daal do.
3.
Ek badiya sa chinese mobile kharid lo.
Uske speaker ki aawaz zordaar honi zaroori hai.
Ab apna ring tone koi ghatiya sa gaana rakho jise sunke log chid jaaye.
Kisi ko koi gaana bilkul pasand nahi, to usi ko apna ring tone bana lo.
4.
Kisi ka mobile 5 min ke liye mil jaaye to us par ekdum bekaar gaane ko uska hello tune bana do.
Log use sawaal puchhne lagne chahiye ki bhai ye gaana kaise rakh diya.
5.
Jis din tum chhutti par ho, to apne kisi dost se office mein phone karwao.
Use kehna chahiye ki use tumse baat karni hai.
Aur use har ek ghante baad phone karne ko kaho.
6.
Shaam ko ghar jaate waqt apne office walon ki kursiyan idhar-udhar ghuma do.
Fir savere dekho mazaa.
Koi tumse kursi ke baare mein puche to bilkul anjaan ban jao.
7.
Apne kisi mitra ko kaho ki wo tumhare sahyogiyon ko har aadhe ghante ke baad phone karta rahe aur khoob baatein kare.
Wo pareshan hokar apna sar pakad lenge.
8.
Sabki kursiyon mein khujli ka powder chhidak do, phir dekho unka nritya.
Thoda nritya karne ka naatak tum bhi kar lena nahi to kisi ko tum par shak ho jayega.
9.
Apne manpasand geet ko kam se kam 17 baar lagatar chalao.
Tum sirf apna manoranjan karo.
Doosron se tumko kya matlab.
10.
Apne office ke kisi aadmi ke naam se sabke liye pizza mangvalo, tumhari pet pooja ho jayegi aur uski jeb dhili.
11.
Office ki fileon ko idhar udhar mix kardo.
Kisi ko bhi koi bhi file dhundne mein kam se kam 10 minute to lagne chahiye.
12.
Apne kisi office ke mitra ke keyboard ka taar chupke se computer se nikal do.
Fir dekho bechara pareshan ho jayega aur tum maje lena.
13.
Bina nahaye office jaya karo.
Tumhare paseene ki sugandh se unhe apni naani yaad aa jaayegi.
Tumhe train aur bus mein aane jaane mein bhi zaroor fayda milega.
14.
Ye tarika kisi mahila sahyogi pe aazmao.
Mauka milte hi kisi mahila ke keyboard ke 4-5 button idhar-udhar laga do.
Jaise Q ki jagah S aur U ko H bana do.
Thode hi button idhar udhar karoge to tumhari sharat ke baare mein pata nahi chalega.
Us ladki ke dimaag ka dahi ho jaayega, lekin wo samajh nahi paayegi ki aankhir uske saath ho kya raha hai.
15.
Apne kisi sahyogi ka mobile number credit card/insurance/loan dene waale marketing afsaron ko de do.
Unhe keh do ki tumhara dost to karodpati hai aur kuch na kuch to zaroor lega.
Wo tumhare dost ko har roj phone kar karke uska sukh-chain chheen lenge.
16.
Apne sahyogiyon ke ghar par subah-subah phone karke keh do ki aaj office ki chhutti hai.
Lekin muh mein kapda lagakar kisi PCO se phone karna aur apna naam mat batana.
Tum office pahunch jao aur koi na mile to usi bahane tum bhi chhutti lekar ghar aajana.
17.
Chupke se kisi sahyogi ka khaane ka dabba khali kardo ek thaili mein.
Wo thaili kisi bhikari ko chupke se de do.
Tumhe bada punya milega.
Tumhara sahyogi jab chakraa ke bahar khaane nikle to uske saath tum bhi fokat ka khaane chale jao.
Ye tarika mahine mein ek-aadh baar apnaya karo.
Ye koi bhi kaarya karte samay pakde gaye to turant ‘Jai Dhongibaba’ bol dena.
Do laatein extra mil jaayegi.
IPL mein itna hungama ho gaya ki wahan ke kuch uchha adhikari aaj hamare aashram mein aaye the humse milne.
Ab ghotale karne thode mushkil honge is liye IPL 4 ke liye paise kamane ke kuch naye sujhaav unhe chahiye the.
Isiliye is par kaafi soch vichar ke baad humne apne kuch anmol sujhaav IPL ke aala adhikariyon ko de diye hain.
Aap log bhi padhiye hamre anmol sujhaav.
Aap bataiyega aap bhakton ko kaunse sujhaav khaas pasand aaye.
1.
Aaj tak aap match ke beech mein advertisement dekhte aaye hain, lekin ab aisa nahi hoga.
IPL 4 mein aap advertisement ke beech mein match dekhenge.
Aapko match se zyaada advertisement ka anand milega.
2.
Aadhi se zyaada public match ke badle cheergirls ko dekhne jaati hai.
Isiliye unhe poore kapde pehnaye jaayenge.
Aur kapdon ke uppar kam se kam 12-15 companyion ke ad chipkaye jayenge.
3.
Umpires se walkie-talkie chheen liya jayega.
Uske badle kisi mobile company se sponsorship leke unke handset pakda diye jayenge.
Aur phone karne ke liye koi mobile carrier ka advertising badhiya ho jayega.
4.
Har match ke beech mein maidan par ek-do kutton ko chhod diya jayega.
Waise bhi kutte ghus hi aate hain.
Jaan ke bhejne mein kya buraai? Unke peeth ke uppar kam se kam 2-3 sponsors ka naam aa jaye to bada achha coverage milega.
5.
Jaise sixer ko DLF maximum banaya gaya, waise har ek shot ko koi na koi naam de dena chahiye.
Jaise haajme ki goli straight drive, majedaar gutka cover drive, thandi lassi square cut, etc.
6.
Cricketeron ko half-sleeve ke t-shirt ban kar diye jaayenge.
Full-sleve pehen na zaroori hoga.
Aage ke sleeve ke hisse mein 3-4 company ke logo to chipka hi sakte hain.
7.
Commentators ko hataa diya jayega.
Waise bhi wo log bahut pakaate hain.
Unke badle film abhinetaon ko apni filmon ke baare mein batiyane ka mauka diya jayega.
8.
Aaj kal public se zyaada to stadium mein security guards hote hain.
Unka bhi fayda uthana chahiye.
Suraksha sambandhit cheezon ki advertising security guards ke kapdon par ki jaa sakti hain – jaise taale, cement, insurance, ityaadi.
9.
Aaj kal khiladiyon ke haathon mein kapdon se zyaada pattiyan hoti hain.
Aur hum iska poora faayda uthayenge.
Khiladiyon ke haathon mein lagi patti par bhi kisi bandage ki company ka naam hoga.
10.
Bowler ka run-up nahi dikhaya jaayega.
Kyun samay barbaad kiya jaaye? Har gend par ek hi tarah to bhaagta hai.
Jitni der mein bowler daudta hai, utni der mein to ek advertisement dikha dalenge.
Isiliye fast bowlers ko zyaada mahatva diya jaayega kyunki wo bhagenge tab to lambi ad dikha sakte hain.
11.
Kisi ke girne ka hum poora faayda uthaenge.
Agar koi khiladi khelte waqt koodega ya girega, usi waqt TV par kisi dard nivaarak malham ka advertisement dikhaya jayega.
12.
Jo cheergirl sabse achha nritya karegi aur darshakon ka man moh legi use bhi uphaar diya jaayega.
Use uphaar mein kisi dance reality show mein hissa lene ka mauka milega.
13.
Jo batsman zyaada der tak crease par tikega uski paari ke dauraan kisi gum ki company ka sponsorship diya jayega.
14.
Jo bowler sabse tez gati se gend daalega uske over ke saath tez gati se chalne wali gaadi ka sponsorship hoga.
15.
Jo bolwler sabse zor se chillakar appeal karega usi waqt kisi gale ki davai ka sponsorship dikhaya jaayega.
16.
Balle par to sticker hota hi hai.
Gend ko kyun chhoda jaye.
Batsman ko gend naa dikhe to wo gaya tel lagane.
Ek badiya sa advertisement ka sticker ball ki dono or chipka diya jayega.
17.
Jaise news channel par surkhiyan lagataar niche chalti rehti hain, waise hi saare samay advertisements ki ek line tv ke nichle hisse mein daudti rahegi.
Khub munafa hoga.
Note kijiye ki ye sab hamari gilli dande wali Dhongi Premier League ke liye nahi hain.
man tum mere lie vo sooraj ho jisaka roshani men main chala hoon ,man tum mere lie vo dharati ho jisamen mai pala hoon.
man main tumhare kadamon ke nishan par chalakar aage badha hoon.
man maine dekhen hai hamari jara si khushi ke lie aapake girate aansoo , hamari jara si thandak ke lie aapaka girata pasina.
man tumane hi banaya hai is makan ko ghar .
man mainen aapake aanchal ke tale hi manaee hai holi aur divali.
man tumhen to vo yad hi hoga jab tum bimar ho jati thi aur apane ilaj kee jagah mujhe khilaune dilati thi .
main nadan tha khush ho jata tha .par tumhare aansuon se bhige takiye mujhe har subah milate the.
man tumane hi sikhaya tha na mujhe har vakt sach bolana fir meri khushi ke lie kyon jhooth bol deti thi tum.
man tum saty kee vo moorat ho jisane jhooth ko khvabon men bhi haraya hai.
man tumane hi banaya hai mere astitv ko.
tumane hi sikhaya hai ungali thamakar mujhe
tere balidan aur tyag ke karan hi tujhe bhagavan ka roop kaha jata ,maine kabhi bhagavan ko nahi dekha par main poore yakeen ke sath kah sakata hoon kee bah teri hi parachhaee hogi.
aakhir kahan se lati ho man tum itana samarthy aur sahas jo sah jate hai hamari jara si muskan ke lie, sare jahan ke dukhon ko.
man mujhe kuchh yad aata hai kee mujhe jab koee manjil mil jati thi , ek pal men hi tumhari palaken bhig jati thi aur tum apane hi gire aansuon se mere lie naya rasta banati thi.
man tum haradam mujhako aage badhati ho aur jab main pahunch jata hoon manjil par to fir kyon khud ko pichhe chhupati ho.
tere aanchal men ek ajab sa jadoo hai man ,sach jab jab sota hoon tere aanchal men to ek naya ahasas sa jagata hai jo tere aanchal ke bare men har vakt yahi kahata hai ki
Hamare jo bhakt prem ka paath padne ke baad asafal ho gaye hain unke liye hum laaye hain kuch dard bhare sms, jo aapko us bewafa ke diye zakhmo ko bharne mein madad karenge.
To bhakton aap inhe us bewafa ko bhejiye aur use uski galti ka ehsaas karaiye.
Use dikhaiye ki usne aap jaise insaan ko khokar kitni badi bhool ki hai…
Vadon par tere aitbaar kar baithe,
Na jaane kis patthar dil se hum pyar kar baithe,
Mohobbat ki raah mein chale sambhlkar bahut,
Phir bhi na jaane kaise dhoka kha baithe.
Tere siva kabhi kisi ko na chaha humne,
Apna har sapna tere liye lutaya humne,
Jis rah par saath chalne ka sapna dikhaya tha toone,
Unhi raahon par khud ko tanha paya humne.
Chala gaya wo hame bhulakar,
Sapno ka mahal pal bhar mein jalakar,
Socha tha sapne honge haqeeqat,
Par bhool kar dee humne usse dil lagakar.
Duniya mohobbat ki humne bhi basayi thee,
Duniya sapno ki humne bhi sajai thee,
Jab tak chalengi saans hum rahenge saath,
Ek bewafa ke saath ye kasmein humne bhi khayi thee.
Mohobbat mein akela chhod gaya wo hame,
Apni mohobbat se maar gaya wo hame,
Karte the yakeen hum khud se bhi zyaada,
Wahi shaqs jeete jee maar gaya hame.
Hansti hui zindagi veeran kar gayi wo,
Meri khushiyon ko pal bhar mein barbad kar gayi wo,
Sapne dikhaye mohobbat ke kai usne,
Aur baad mein un sapno ko jalakar raakh kar gayi wo.
Mere jazbaat se khel gaya wo,
Pyaar ke vaade saare tod gaya wo,
Pehle sapne dikhaye bade bade,
Phir unhe apne hi haathon se tod gaya wo.
Saat samandar paar hum bhi kar lete,
Uske liye saare zamane se hum bhi lad lete,
Pyaar ki kadar hi na ki usne mere,
Warna jholi khusiyon se uski hum bhi bhar dete.
Jisko apna samjha wahi tanha chhod gaya,
Pyar ki rahon mein hame rota chhod gaya,
Pehle sapne dikhaye rang birange,
Baad mein unko berang kar gaya.
Na mohobbat hi naseeb hui, na pyar hame naseeb hua,
Jisko dil ke sabse kareeb samjha wahi sabse door hua,
Jaane kya khata ki humne is mohobbat mein,
Jo dil ka aashiyana banne se pehle hi choor choor ho gaya.
Duva taqdeer badalti hai suna tha humne,
Pyar mein hasti badal jaati hai suna tha humne,
Dil to hota hai seeshe sa,
Jab toone toda to ye jaan liya humne.
Jaane kyun wo humse khafa ho gaya,
Na jane zindagi mein humse kya gunah ho gaya,
bahut chaha humne use,
Par jise chaha jaane kyun wahi humse door ho gaya.
Kuch is tarah toote sapne mere,
Jaise sapno ka jaha ujad gaya ho,
Uski fitrat ko kabhi samajh na paaye hum,
Wo bewafa hai ye baat na jaan paaye hum.
Is suni aankhon mein intezaar unka hai,
Dil ki har dhadkano mein naam unka hai,
Pyaar kitna hai wo kabhi samajh hi na paaya,
Na chahenge kabhi use, ab ye paigam dil ka hai.
Jaane kya baat hai ki gamon ki aadat see ho gayi hai ab,
Jaane kya baat hai ki raat ko chhup chhup rone lage hain hum,
tu to hai Bewafa jee bhar ke khel mere dil se,
Kyunki tere diye chot khaane ki aadat si ho gayi hai hume ab.
Meri mohobbat ka katl karke wo khushhal ho gaye,
Hum unke ishq mein badnaam ho gatye,
Hame mili sirf badnami unki mohobbat mein,
Hame badnaam karke wo to khushhal ho gaye.
Kuch iss tarah se bhula diya usne hame,
Jaise ek raat ka sapna the kabhi hum.
Mohobbat ke safar mein saath dene wale bahut kam mile,
Sapne dikhakar use todne waale hazaar mile,
Rote rahe hum saari raat teri yaad mein,
Teri yaad ko bhulane mein ab shayad hame barson lagein.

Jab hum sunege, hamare hridayon ko chuh lein aur hamara vishwaas badhe.
Mere bhaaiyon aur bahanon, mai bahut prasann hoon aapko is mahaan sammelan mein swaagat karne ke liye.
Hum duniya bhar mein kayi sthaanon mein ikattha hue hai un bhaaiyon aur bahanon ko sunne aur unse seekhne ke liye jinhe humne Maha Adhyakshtaaon aur Girjaghar ke maha afsaron ki tarah swikaar kiya hai.
Unhonne swarg se sahayta li hai apne sandeshon ko pesh karein, aur unhonne prerna mehsoos ki hai ki unhein kya kehna hai.
Yeh sammelan 90-saalon ka varsh ghaat hai jab hum maha sammelan ko redio dwara prastut kiye the.
1924 ke October sammelan ke daoraan, sabhaaen pehli baar redio dwar prastut hui thi Girjaghar ke apne KSL naamak station dwara.
Yeh sammelan tv prasaaranon ka bhi 65-saalon ka varsh ghaat manata hai.
1949 October mein hue maha sammelan par, sabhaaen pehli baar pure Salt Lake chetra mein KSL television dwara prasaarit hua tha.
Hum aadhunik midia ke ashirvaadon se prasann hai jo laakho Girjaghar ke sadasyon ko maoka dete hai maha sammelan ko dekhne ya sunne ke liye.
Is saptaah ant ke sabhaae tv, redio, cable, setlait prasaaran, aur Internet, tattha mobile saadhaanon ke dwara prastut honge.
Jabse hum pichle che mahino pehle the, ek naya mandir ka samarpan hua hai aur ek ka dobara-samarpan hua hai.
May mein Pradhaan Dieter  Uchtdorf ne Fort Lauderdale Florida Mandir ka samarpan kiya.
Ek badhiya yuvaaon ka sanskritik samaroh pesh kiya gya samarpan se ek din pehle.
Agle din mein, Raviwaar, May 4, ko mandir ko teen sabhaaon mein samarpan kiya gaya.
Sirf do saptaah pehle mera saobhaagye tha Ogden Utah Mandir ko dobara samarpan karne ka, jo pehli baar 1972 mein Pradhaan Joseph Fielding Smith dwara samarpan kiya gaya tha.
Ek vishaal sanskritik samaroh hua tha dobara samarpan se ek din pehle, itne saare yuva us mein bhaag le rahe the ki do alag alag pradarshan hue the, jiske kalakaar bilkul alag the.
Sab milakar, 16,000 yuvaon ne bhaag liya tha.
Dobara samarpan ke samaroh agle din sampann hue the, jismein kayi Bhaaiyon ne saath diya, jismein saath the adhyakshta ke netaaen aur mandir pradhaan, unke salaahkaarein, aur unke patniyaan.
Hum ab bhi mandirein banana jaari rakhe hai.
Agle mahine naya Phoenix Arizone Mandir ka samarpan hai, aur agle saal, 2015 mein, hum aasha karte hai paanch anye mandiron ka samarpan ya dobara samarpan hoga, anye mandirein bhi mumkin hai, agar samay par samaapt ho jaaye.
Jaisa mainne April mein kaha tha, jab pehle ke tay kiye gaye mandiron ka nirmaan aur samarpan samaapt ho jaaega, hamare paas duniya bhar mein 170 chaalu mandirein hongi.Kyunki hum apne koshishein pehle goshna kiye mandiron ka nirmaan samaapt karne mein lagae hai, hum is samay koi bhi naye mandir ka ghoshna nahin karenge.
Haalaanki, bhavishye mein, jab zaroorat dikhega aur hum sthaanein niyukt kar denge, tab anye mandiron ke ghoshna hum karenge.
Girjaghar ki badhti jaa rahi hai.
Abhi hum 15 laakh se zyaada sadasye hai aur sankhya badhti jaa rahi hai.
Hamare prachaarak koshishein aage badh rahi bina koi rukawat ke.
Hamare paas 88,000 prachaarakein hai jo sewa kar rahe hai, duniya bhar mein susamachaar ke sandesh ko le jaa rahe hai.
Hum yeh dobara pushti karte hai ki prachaar kaarye ek purohiti zimmedaari hai, hum sabhi yogye aur nipunn jawaan purshon ko sewa karne ke liye protsaahit karte hai.
Hum abhaari hai un jawaan mahilaaon ke liye jo sewa kar rahi hai.
Woh bhi bada yogdaan deti hai, bhale hi unhe koi avashyakta nahin hai sewa karne ki jaise jawaan purshon ke liye yeh aagya hai.
Ab mai aap ko amantrit karta hoon ki apna dhyaan un bhaaiyon aur bahanon par dein jo aaj aur kal ke hamare sammelan sabhaaon mein bhaag lenge.
Jo sabhi logon ko bhaashan dene ke liye kaha gaya hai ise ek mahaan zimmedaari samajhte hai.
Jab hum sunenge, hamare hridayon ko chuh lein aur hamara vishwaas badhe, mai vinamrata se prarthna karta hoon Ishu Maseeh ke naam se, amen.
Aap Dhongibaba se itna prem kyun karte ho? Dhongibaba par aapko itna vishwas kyun hai? Dhongibaba ki bhavishyavani aapko itni pasand kyun hai? Kyun kyun kyun?
Log aapse agar puchhte hain ye prashn, to unhe aap ye gyarah kaaran bata dein.
In gyarah kaarano ko sunkar logon ko unke sabhi sawaalon ka jawab mil jayega.
Aur wo bhi aapki hi tarah hamare bhakt ban jayenge.
1.
Dhongibaba baaki saare baba log se zyada smart aur handsome hain.
2.
Dhongibaba ke paas antaryami kaala chashma hai jo logon ke dil ya mann ki baat bhi padh leta hai.
3.
Dhongibaba hamesha aapke paas uplabdh hai computer mein – 24 ghante, wo bhi muft mein.
Aur koi baba ke liye aap ko line lagani padegi.
4.
Dhongibaba jaat-paat mein vishwaas nai karte.
Baba ke hazaaron saal ke chamatkari gyaan ki koi tulna nahi.
5.
Dhongibaba ka gyan aapko kisi kitaab ya tv channel par nahi milega.
Unki leela aparampaar hai.
6.
Dhongibaba ki anmol bhavishyavani tumhe kahin aur sar patakne ya karodon rupaye dene par bhi nahi milegi.
7.
Dhongibaba ki bhavishyavani padhne se aapki zindagi ekdum badal jaayegi.
Sukh nahi to dukh – kuch to milega hi.
100 taka guarantee.
8.
Dhongibaba ki bhavishyavani aap kabhi bhi aur kahin bhi padh sakte hain.
Shauchalaya ho ya office mein boss se chhup ke.
9.
Dhongibaba ki bhavishyavaniyan ekdum shaktishaali, tikaau, anubhav-bhari, gyan-bhari, dumdaar aur dhong-bhari hoti hai.
10.
Baba jo bolte hain hamesha dil se bolte hain.
Isiliye bhakt unko itna maante hain.
11.
Hazaaron bhakt hain Dhongibaba ke Facebook pe.
Utne bhakt galat to nahi ho sakte ;-)
