 jivan sinh ke ab tak ke kiye-dhare ko lakshy karake yah kahane men tanik bhi sanshay n hoga ki unakee aalochana-drishti sadaiv lok ke paksh men, samay ke sapeksh aur jivan-gatikee ke rachanatmak kriyashilanon se bhasaman rahi hai jahan ekangi, adhoore, nishkarshamoolak, khandit aur vakr vicharon ko kabhi 'spesa' nahin mili.
unakee aalochana men vishay-vastu aur vichar sahajata kintu samagrata se pravesh pate hain aur ek udar vikasit jivan ke paksh men badi dridhata aur nishpakshata se apani bat pathakon ke samaksh rakhate hain.
yah unakee aalochana-vidha ka ek vishesh gun samajha jana chahie jo pathakon ko path ke daramyan us vitrishna aur oob se ubarata hai (jo prayah kisi ganbhir lekh ke shastreeyata aur vichar-vithiyon ke adhyayan-kram men anubhavaniy hoti hai) aur, pathak lekh ke ant tak aalochy vishay-ras ke aasvadan men apane ko bandhe pate hain.
kahana n hoga ki shree sinh aalochy-vastu ke bhitar bade nisprih bhav se apani paith banate hain, usako gunate aur taral banate hain, fir apane manasapatr par sokhakar hamare samay, lok aur sanskriti ke nikash par use dhar dete hain aur jab vah unakee apani vastu ban jati hai to badi sahajata se kagaj par rakh dete hain, jo adhyetaon ko sahaj svikaraniy hoti hai.
parantu aisa karate hue unamen apani vidvata ka leshamatr bhi ahamany bhav nahin jhalakata.
isi karan da sinh kee kritiyan matr aalochana n hokar, ek rachana ka bhi aabhas de jati hai jisamen kavita kee-si sarasata aur bodhagamyata bhi hoti hai.
sanpreshaniyata ke is gun ke karan pathak ke man men unake aalochy-vastu ka vichar gahare utarata hai aur aatmasat ho jata hai.
yahi vajah hai ki inakee kavyalochana aur vaicharikee, donon pathakon-kaviyon ko n sirf gahari samajh pradan karate hain, apitu klasikee aur shaili-shilp ke star par bhi usakee samajh ko parimarjit kar use samriddh banate hain.
nishchay hi, yah unake satat aalochanabhyas, ganbhir adhyayanashilata aur apratim hunar ka parinam hai jo unake shramafal ke roop men unakee kritiyon men udbhasit hota hai.
ek aise samay men, jab sanprati rachi ja rahi aadhi-adhoori aur khandit aalochana se sahity ka bhala nahin ho raha, balki apooraniy kshati ho rahi hai, vichar-bodh kee sakaratmak aalochana paranpara, jisamen janapadiy sanskar aur lokajivan ke prati atoot aastha ho, kee mahati aavashyakata mahasoos kee ja rahi hai kyonki dekhane vali bat yah hai ki hindi aalochana ka rachana-sanbandh jyadatar aaj vyakti-sanbandh men badal chuka hai jise aalochana kee girohabandi bhi kahana atyukti n hoga! pahale aalochana vyakti-aachchhann n hokar rachana ke gunn-doshon par kendrit hoti thi.
par aaj adhikatar yah prayojit hoti hai jisake pichhe ya to bajar aur poonji ka ganit kam karata hai ya fir sabake apane-apane poorvagrah, aatmamoh aur apane krititv ke prati sammohan hote hain.
isaliye door-daraj ke ilakon men, janapadon men jo lekhak-kavi yadi mahatvapoorn bhi siraj rahe hain to unakee rachanaon kee kadr nahin.
ve upekshaon kee tokari men pade rahate hain.
falatah chije shinakht ke abhav men dhire-dhire apani pahachan kho deti hain aur rachanakar bhi nirash aur shithil ho baithane lagate hain, usakee rachanashilata bhi kramashahkharab hoti chali jati hai.
aisa isaliye hota hai kyonki suvidhaon kee trishna bade lekhakon -aalochakon ko nagaron-mahanagaron men khinch lati hai jahan ve janapadiy chetana aur spandan se door rahate hain, ataev janapadon men rache ja rahe mahatvapoorn sahity ke prati anyamanask hote hain.
isaliye da.
jivan sinh ke shabdakarm kee upadeyata svayansiddh hai, karan ki ve pradhanatah janapad ke hi aalochana paranpara se sarokar rakhate hain aur usi ko apani aalochana ka aadhar banate hain.
sath hi un vicharadharaon ka tarkasangat prativad bhi karate hain jinase jivan aur lok ka ahit ho raha ho.
shram ke bhavalok kee pratishtha aur poonji ke prabhav se falit roopavad aur nira kalavad ko jivan ka pratipaksh manate hue usaka virodh in prativadon men aasani se lakshit kiya ja sakata hai.
'kavita kee lokaprakriti' aur 'kavita aur kavikarma' ke bad da.jivan sinh kee naee aalochana-kriti 'shabd aur sanskriti' aayi hai jo aalochana-sahity ke ek sukhad bhavishy kee aashvasti deti hai.
do sau prishthon kee is aalochana-kriti men kul ikkees vicharalekh hain, jo vibhinn avasaron par unake dvara diye gaye sahityik-vaicharik vyakhyan hain, jise yahan ek mala ke roop men silasilevar gunthakar prastut kiya gaya hai.
samay aur sanskriti ko parat-dar-parat kholate hue, bharatiyata se jude anek mahatvapoorn savalon aur usakee asmita kee gaharaee se padtal karate hue, manavapaksheey saty kee nirantar tatol jari rakhate hue, shram kee bhavabhoomi par janagan ke jivan-sangharsh kee katha ka marm batalate hue, vaishvikaran ke sarvagrasi vichar se hajaron salon kee chintanaparampara se nihsrit apani sanskriti ke vinasht ho jane ke aasann sankaton se savadhan karate hue aur manushyata kee sanskriti ka sabal paksh udghatit karate hue da.
sinh ne jin moolyon kee sthapana is aalochy-pustak men kee hai, unakee ninv par hi ab tak kee manav sabhyataen nafasat se tikee huee hai aur usaka astitv har samay vajood men hona jivan ke liye anivary hai jisase jude savalon ka sookshmata se avagahan karane kee jarurat hai kyonki ab ham ek gulami se nikalakar doosari gulami kee or chal rahe hain.
yah paratantrata itani prachchhann aur (apani bhasha men kahen to) kapatapoorn indrajal kee maya hai ki hamen ahasas to hota hai ki is daur men ham sabase jyada unmukt ho gaye hain, par kam karane kee jagah se lekar bistar aur atyant niji antarangata kee jagah tak bhi vah hamen apane lapete men le chukee hai.
vaishvikaran kee kokh se udbhoot udarikaran ke nam par sare sansar men failaya gaya bhramapoorn vicharajal hi vastutah vah uttar-aadhunikata hai jisane manav jivan ke chandrama ko rahu kee tarah aaj gras liya hai.

sinh ne pustak ke aamukh men hi kaha hai ki - "poonji ka paksh itana nirankush hokar hamari chhati par baith chuka hai ki kavita, sanskriti aur svabhashayen jindagi ke sarokaron se lagabhag bahar hote ja rahe hain.
ham uttar-aadhunik samay ke ek aise chakravyooh men ghir gaye hain ki isase mukti ke upay dhoondh pana kathin ho raha hai.
sare vaikalpik jabab vastusthiti kee aalochana se aage nahin badh pa rahe hain.
jo bhi uttar nikalakar aate hain, unamen aagat se jyada vigat kee gandh hoti hai.
yadi vikalp kee soch ko koee tek milati hai to le-dekar marks aur gandhi kee vichar paranparaon men.
kuchh log donon ko milak bhi sochate hain.
fir bhi manushyata ke liye bhavishy ka koee spasht uttar nahin ban pa raha hai.
n deshi, n videshi.
ek sanbhram jaisi sthiti hai."
is pustak men adhyayan ke drishtikon se aalekh tin khandon men vibhajit kiya gaya hai.
harek ka alag nam bhi hai, - kavita, sanskriti aur bhasha.
pratham khand men aath lekh hain jinamen ek ko chhodakar shesh madhyakalin sant-kaviyon par hain.
dvitiy khand 'sanskriti' men chhah aur 'bhasha' par sat aalekh hain.
doosare aur tisare khand ke adhyayan se pratham khand men kabir, soor, tulasi, bihari aur subhadra kumari chauhan ke oopar likhe vichar ka uddeshy svayamev ujagar ho jata hai jisakee charcha main ant men karana chahoonga jisase bat ko rakhane men suvidha hogi.
sanskriti ke vividh vishayon par kendrit doosare khand ke sabhi aalekh itihas aur sanskriti-nirman kee prakriya ka udbhedan karate hue apani sanskriti ke tatv, sankat aur usake satitv ke raksharth un kriyashilanon ko samajhane kee antaradrishti deta hai jisake mool men lok kee ve paranparaen aur jivanonnmukh gatividhiyan hain jo manushy kee aantarik unnati ke dvar kholati hai aur manavata kee sanskriti rachane men sahayy aur agragami hoti hai.
is khand ka pahala adhyay 'prakriti, darshan aur sanskriti' hai.
yahan sanskriti kee rachana -prakriya ko samajhate hue jivan ji ne prakriti, dharm, paranparaen aur vikas se usake antarsanbandhon aur dvandvon ko itani barikee aur saghanata se chitrit kiya hai ki poora aalekh hi ek shodh-aalekh sa lagata hai.
ek udaharan dekhie sanskriti aur paranpara ke antarsanbandhon par -
"paranpara ka kam to bas itana hai ki vah sanskriti ke apane shishu ko vartaman ko saunp deti hai.
isake babajood sanskriti ke kshetr men prayah yah dekha jata hai ki prachinata ke prati hath kee had tak anurag hota hai, jo us bandariya men bhi dikhaee deta hai, jo agyanatavash apane mritashishu ke thathari ko apane vakshasthal se chipakaye ghoomati hai.
kahane ka matalab yah hai ki ham sanskriti ke karmakand se bachakar hi usake jivit aur svasth paksh ka vikas kar sakate hain.
karmakand aur anushthan, sanskriti ke bahari paridhan hote hain usakee aatma nahin.
manushy ko sadaiv aatmik vikas kee jarurat hoti hai, n ki bahari vaichitry kee."
is aalekh kee badi khoobi yah hai ki yahan sanskriti ko aadami ke antas-vikas kee prakriya se jodakar dekha gaya hai jisamen prakriti ke sahayog aur sangharsh ke avadan aur sath hi bhoomandalikaran ke nakaratmak bhoomika ko bhi lakshit kiya gaya hai.
bakaul samalochak "manav-jati ka dhyan manav-sanskriti par kendrit n rahakar, vastu aur usake upabhog par kendrit ho gaya hai.
poonji ka mahatv har samay raha hai lekin vah pahale kabhi manushy kee sthanapann nahin ban payi thi, jabaki ab vah usaka sthan leti dikhaee de rahi hai, yah sanskriti-premiyon ke liye sabase badi chinta kee bat honi chahie.
bhavishy ka sangharsh poonji aur sanskriti ka hi sangharsh hoga." dekha jay ki is sangharsh men manushy kitana vijit aur kitana parajit hota hai!
'sanskriti' khand ke aalekh itihas kee prakriya ko samajhane ke liye bahumooly vichar prastut karate hain.
yahan mai ek dilachasp bat yah kahana chahata hoon ki main khud bhi itihas ka vidyarthi raha hoon aur mujhe aayog kee pariksha-taiyari ke dinon, sanskritik itihas ka vivaranatmak adhyayan bhi karana pada tha.
parantu mujhe itihas-vettaon kee moti-moti kitabon se us samay utana labh nahin huaa jitana ki filavakt is chhoti si pustak ke 'sanskriti' khand ke aalekhon se, par afasos ki us vakt tak yah pustak prakash men nahin aayi thi.
in aalekhon ke padhane ke uparant agar koee bharat ke sanskritik itihas ka adhyayan kare to mere vichar se vah isake udbhav aur vikas kee jatil-sanshlishth prakriya ko adhik gaharaee se samajh payega kyonki in aalekhon men nihit vichar, sanskriti ke aadhunik bhavabodh ko chetana ke star par jagrat kar hamen us satyanveshan kee or modate hain jahan, vivad kee paridhi se alag, itihas apane mool roop men ghatit huaa hai.
isaliye pustak ka yah khand matr sahity-sachetaon ke liye hi nahin, sanskriti aur itihas ke shodharth - vidyarthi ke liye ek mahatvapoorn pustak (a manual to understand the cultural heritage in India) sabit hogi.
inamen sanskriti ke oopar 'dharm aur sanskriti' aur 'bhoomandalikaran aur sanskriti' nam se do vishad aalekh to hain hi, 'bharatiyata ke jvalant aur behad vivadit, ulajhe hue mudde par 'bharatiyata ka savala' shirshak se likha gaya ek matr itana gahan-ganbhir, bahuprastariy (multi layered) aur bahuaayami (multi dimensional) vicharalekh bhi hai ki ise is pustak ka 'menifesto' bhi kaha ja sakata hai jo pustak ko 'sarvajan hitaya' aur keemati banate hain kyonki bakaul samalochak 'yah ek aisa saval hai jo aasani se pichha nahin chhodta.
hajaron salon kee paramparaon ka bal hamare pichhe jo hai.
kaisi vidambana hai ki aaj kee 'bharatiyata' men ram kee us sanskriti ko ulata ja raha hai, jisamen kursi lene ke bajay kursi chhod dene kee hod rahi hai.'
ikkeesavin sadi kee dahalij par kadam rakhane ke sath hi samay kee gati itani tivr ho gayi hai ki ab svagati, svavalanban aur aatmanirbharata jaise vichar pichhadepan ke dyottak ho gaye hain jisamen gandhi kee mool avadharana ke ant kar dene ka bhi bigul foonk diya gaya hai kyonki da.
sinh ke anusar "arthavyavastha men ab sab kuchh itana gadd-madd hai ki deshi-videshi, rashtriy aur antarashtriy, jatiy aur vijatiy shaklon kee pahachan kee sookshm rekhaen tak mitane ko hain.

vahi hamari bharatiyata hai." vastav men is shodhalekh ke madhyam se bharatiyata kee jo khojabin kee gayi hai, usamen yahan ke darshan, rishi-chintan parampara, sanskriti kee samarasata ka aatmasati charitrik paksha, manav-vyavahar aur sanbandh-bhavana ko bakhoobi samane rakha gaya hai.
isake sufal ke roop men bharatiyata ka jo pratiman yahan prastut hai, vah is arth men anyatam hai ki vah hi kal ke pravah men tik saka to tik payega, bakee sab aisa pratit hota hai, tathakathit uttaradhunikata ke prabal veg men bah jayenge, itihas jisaka sadiyon se sakshee raha hai.

jivan sinh kee atyant mahatvapoorn sthapana hai ki anek jhanjhavaton ke bavajood bharatiyata ke mool men 'karuna' rahi hai jo hamari samast darshan-parampara ka nichod bhi hai par jo vaishvikaran kee chhdm sanskriti ke pas nahin hai ulte, udaravad kee aad men shoshan aur kroorata ka ganda khel chand bahurashtriy kanpaniyon ke dvara khela ja raha hai.
sath hi yahan, is bahari bayar men bharatiyata kee karunadhara ke ksheen ho jane ke sankat par gahari chinta vyakt kee gayi hai.
isi bhanti, isake bad ke aalekh 'dharm aur sanskriti' men dharm ke prati marksavadi drishtikon men sanprati falit ho rahe vivekahin, bhramak vicharon ko aade hathon lete hue jivan ji ne dharm ke mool aur sattatmak, donon pakshon ka vishleshan kiya hai kyonki dharm ke mool men manaviy karuna, sachaee, nishchhalata, sanvedanashilata, aasha jaise hriday ke aatmik bhav hain par jab koee bhi dharm, da.
sinh ke anusar "sattatmak sthiti men tabdil ho jata hai to apani us manaviy pahunch se door hone lagata hai, jo manav jati ke ek samooh ke liye ek samay shanti ka sandesh lekar aayi thi.
tab rah jati hai usakee aanushthanikata, usaka karmakand, usaka sharir.
dhire-dhire usakee aatma nasht jati hai aur vah ek dhancha matr banakar rah jata hai." is rahasy ko koee jivan sinh sarikhe samalochak kee kushagrabuddhi hi jan sakati hai ki marks ne dharm kee isi ulti prakriti ko janata ke liye afim bataya tha jo dharm kee manaviy bhoomika ke viparit hai, n ki us dharm ko jo kshudratam prani ke liye bhi karuna aur shil ka vyavahar lekar sansar ke kalyanarth avatarit hota hai.
yahan dharm ke sanskritik paksh ke ud‌ghatan men samalochak kee medha atulaniy pratit hoti hai jo aadami ke vishvas ko dharm se digane se bachati bhi hai.
'bhoomandalikaran aur sanskriti' nam ke aalekh men, jaisa ki shirshak se spasht bhi hai, vaishvikaran se sanskriti' par aasann khataron kee bahukoniy padatal kee gayi hai.
yahan lekhak ne yah sandhan aur sanket karane kee koshish kee hai ki yadi bajar, takanik ityadi aadhunik shodhon ka upayog manaviy gunnavatta ke liye kiye jayen to sthiti badal sakati hai jo ki ek vicharaniy sthapana hai.
aalekh 'kala kee mooly prakriya' kavi-pathakon ke liye vishesh labhakari hai kyonki isamen kavy-kala ke jin moolyon ko mahan bataya gaya hai,vah gahan manaviy prakriya ke marg se hokar jata hai.
kis tarah jata hai, yah sudhi pathak aalochana padh kar aasani se samajh sakate hain.
is path se gujar kar aise kalavad aur roopavad se mohabhang bhi hota hai jo jivan kee prakriya se bahar hai.
jaisa ki oopar bataya gaya hai, 'bhasha' par is pustak par sat aalekh hai.
ye aalekh vishvavidyalayi chhatron aur pratiyogi parikshaon men apane vaikalpik vishay hindi sahity chunane valon ko visheshopayogi pathaniy samagri upalabdh karata hai jo unake bhasha sanbandhi silebas par gahari pakad banane ke kam aa sakata hai.
sath hi yahan 'hindi jati' kee sankalpana ko vrihattar, udaravadi pariprekshy men vivechit kiya gaya hai jo hindi kshetr ke alava ahindi kshetron men hindi ke vikas aur prasar kee naee sanbhavanaen aur dishaen kholati hain.
sath hi sabhi jatiy bhashaon ke unnayan aur aatm-gaurav ka marg prashast karati hai, 'hinglisha' ke prabhav men din-din nishpran ho rahi janabhasha hindi ko akshunn rakhane ke nihitarth bharatiy aatmabal ko sahi disha aur soch pradan karati hai.
is prakar yah saf hai ki dvitiy aur tritiy khand men sanskriti aur bhasha ke sandarbh men da.
jivan sinh dvara bharatiy samay aur lok ko samajhane ka sarahaniy aur abhinav prayas kiya gaya hai jisamen un navachari vicharon ka pratifalan huaa hai jo bharatiy lok aur jivan ke paksh men hai.
isi lakshy kee prapti, kavita khand ke aalekhon ka bhi abhipret hai.
ataev ab main pahala khand, jo kavita vishayak pathon par aadhrit hai par aata hoon.

aur ek premamay, bhavapoorn sansar kee rachana karate hain.
aadikal kee kaviyon kee tarah inamen bhakti ka paksh jivan aur lok se kata huaa nahin hai.

in lekhon ka sabase mahin aur saghan pahaloo hai unamen vyaiktik bhinnata ((individual difference), jo bahut rochak bhi hai.

ve toote-foote ko jodane ka kam jyada karate hain.....kabir samanvayavad ke poshak nahin hain.

is morche ko sanbhalati hain miran." soor par likhe gaye aalekh 'ye braj ke loga' men ve sabase mahatvapoorn bat kahate hain ki soor ne nagar sabhyata ke oopar gramy sabhyata ko pratishthit kiya hai jinamen prem aur jivan ke rag hain.

par unako sangopang padhakar svayan yah anubhav kiya ja sakata hai ki unakee soch men pragadh parthivata vidyaman hai jo unakee aalochana ko shreshth aur arthavan banati hai.
thik hi kaha hai kisi ne ki "shauk-e-didara' gar hai to nazar paida kar." unamen yah nazar arthat aalochana -drishti isi parthivata se utpann hoti hai.
main samajhata hoon, sahity ke gady aur pady, donon pathakon ke liye apane lok, vartaman aur bharatiy sanskriti ke samajh ko vikasit karane kee ek anoothi aur anivary pustak sabit hogi- 'shabd aur sanskriti' jo unake sandarbh-granth ke roop men sahayak ho sakati hai.

bina kisi bhed bhav ke.

`is aadami ke vyaktitv ke kaee pahalu hain.

insan, jo aap hi kee tarah musibaton ka mara hai.'

matr saintis baras kee umr men.
bahut adhik sharab pine ke karan.

`abhi mainne aadha hi git gaya tha ki stej par sikkon kee barasat hone lagi.
mainne tatkal ghoshana kar di ki main pahale paise batoroonga aur usake bad hi gana gaoonga.
is bat par aur adhik thahake lage.

ab main bilkul sahaj tha.
main darshakon se baten karata raha, main nacha aur mainne tarah-tarah kee nakal karake dikhayi.
mainne man ke aayarish march thim kee bhi nakal karake batayi.'

vah dekhane men bahut aakarshak thi aur gussail svabhav kee thi isalie man se usakee kam hi patati thi.
usaka kabhi-kabhar aana achanak chhote-mote tante men hi khatm hota tha ki man ne kuchh n kuchh ulata sidha kah diya hota tha ya kar diya hota tha.
attharah baras kee umr men man ek adhed aadami ke sath afrika bhag gayi thi.
vah aksar vahan kee apani zindagi kee bat kiya karati thi ki kis tarah se vah vahan pedon ke jhuramuton, naukaron aur jin kase ghodon ke bich masti bhari zindagi ji rahi thi.
usakee umr ke attharahaven baras men mere bade bhaee sidani ka janm huaa tha.
mujhe bataya gaya tha ki vah ek lord ka beta tha aur jab vah ikkees baras ka ho jayega to use vasiyat men do hajar paund kee shanadar rakam milegi.
is samachar se main ek sath hi dukhi aur khush huaa karata tha.
man bahut arase tak afrika men nahin rahi aur ingalaind men aa kar usane mere pita se shadi kar li.
mujhe nahin pata ki usakee zindagi ke afrikee ghatana-chakr ka kya huaa, lekin bhayankar garibi ke dinon men main use is bat ke lie kosa karata tha ki vah itani shanadar zindagi kahe ko chhod aayi thi.
vah hans deti aur kaha karati ki main in chizon ko samajhane kee umr se bahut kam hoon aur mujhe is bare men itana nahin sochana chahiye.
mujhe kabhi bhi is bat ka andaza nahin lag paya ki vah mere pita ke bare men kis tarah kee bhavanaen rakhati thi.
lekin jab bhi vah mere pita ke bare men bat karati thi, usamen koee kaduvahat nahin hoti thi.
isase mujhe shak hone lagata tha ki vah khud bhi unake pyar men gahare-gahare doobi huee thi.
kabhi to vah unake bare men bahut sahanubhooti ke sath bat karati to kabhi unakee sharabakhori kee lat aur hinsak pravritti ke bare men bataya karati thi.
bad ke barason men jab bhi vah mujhase khafa hoti, vah hikarat se kahati,``too bhi apane bap kee hi tarah kisi din apane aapako gatar men khatm kar dalega."
vah pitaji ko afrika jane se pahale ke dinon se janati thi.
ve ek doosare ko pyar karate the aur unhonne shamus o'briyan nam ke ek aayarish melodrama men ek sath kam kiya tha.
solah baras kee umr men man ne usamen pramukh bhoomika nibhayi thi.
kampani ke sath toor karate hue man ek adhed umr ke lord ke sampark men aayi aur usake sath afrika bhag gayi.
jab vah vapis ingalaind aayi to pita ne apane romans ke toote dhagon ko fir se joda aur donon ne shadi kar li.
tin baras bad mera janm huaa tha.
main nahin janata ki sharabakhori ke alava aur kaun-kaun si ghatanaen kam kar rahi thin lekin mere janm ke ek baras ke hi bad ve donon alag ho gaye the.
man ne guzare bhatte kee bhi mang nahin kee thi.
vah un dinon khud ek star huaa karati thi aur har hafte 25 paund kama rahi thi.
usakee mali haisiyat itani achchhi thi ki apana aur apane bachchon ka bharan poshan kar sake.
lekin jab usakee zindagi men durbhagy ne dastak di tabhi usane madad kee mang kee.
agar aisa n hota to usane kabhi bhi kanooni karravaee n kee hoti.
man ko usakee aavaz bahut takalif de rahi thi.
vaise bhi usakee aavaz kabhi bhi itani buland nahin thi lekin zara-sa bhi sardi-jukam hote hi usakee svar tantree men soojan aa jati thi jo fir hafton chalati rahati thi; lekin use mazaboori men kam karate rahana padata tha.
isaka natija yah huaa ki usakee aavaz bad se badatar hoti chali gayi.
vah ab apani aavaj par bharosa nahin kar sakati thi.
gana gate-gate bich men hi usakee aavaz bharra jati ya achanak gayab hi ho jati aur fusafusahat men badal jati.
tab shrota bich men thahake lagane lagate.
ve gala fad ka chillana shuroo kar dete.
aavaz kee chinta ne man kee sehat ko aur bhi danvadol kar diya tha aur usakee halat manasik rogi jaisi ho gayi.
natija yah huaa ki use thiyetar se bulave aane kam hote chale gaye aur ek din aisa bhi aaya ki bilkul band hi ho gaye.
ye usakee aavaz ke kharab hote chale jane ke karan hi tha ki mujhe panch baras kee umr men pahali bar stej par utarana pada.
man aam taur par mujhe kiraye ke kamare men akela chhod kar jane ke bajaye rat ko apane sath thiyetar le jana pasand karati thi.
vah us vakt kaintin et da' eldarashat men kam kar rahi thi.
ye ek ganda, chalataoo-sa thiyetar tha jo jyadatar faujiyon ke lie khel dikhata tha.
ve log ujadd kism ke log hote the aur unhen bhadakane ya ochhi harakaton par utar aane ke lie mamooli-sa karan hi kafi hota tha.

mujhe yad hai, main us vakt vings men khada huaa tha jab pahale to man kee aavaz fati aur fir fusafusahat men badal gayi.
shrotaon ne thahake lagana shuroo kar diye aur anap-shanap gane lage aur kutte billiyon kee aavajen nikalana shuroo kar diya.
sab kuchh aspasht-sa tha aur main thik se samajh nahin pa raha tha ki ye sab kya chal raha hai.
lekin shor-sharaba badhata hi chala gaya aur mazabooran man ko stej chhod kar aana pada.
jab vah vings men aayi to buri tarah se vyathit thi aur stej mainejar se bahas kar rahi thi.
stej mainejar ne mujhe man kee sakhiyon ke aage abhinay karate dekha tha.
vah man se shayad yah kah raha tha ki usake sthan par mujhe stej par bhej de.
is bich ham tin aaramadayak kamaron ke makan men se do kamaron ke makan men aur fir ek kamare ke makan men shift ho chuke the.
hamara saman kam hota chala ja raha tha aur har bar ham jis tarah ke pados men rahane ke lie jate, usaka star niche aata ja raha tha.
tab vah dharm kee or mud gayi thi.
mujhe isaka karan to yah lagata hai ki shayad use yah ummid thi ki isase usakee aavaz vapis laut aayegi.
vah niyamit roop se vestaminstar brij rod par kraist charch jaya karati aur har itavar ko mujhe bakh ke aargan myoojik ke lie baithana padata aur padari ef bi meyer kee joshili tatha dramaee aavaz ko sunana padata jo giraje ke madhy bhag se ghisatate hue pairon kee tarah aati pratit hoti.
zaroor hi unake bhashanon men apil hoti hogi kyonki main aksar man ko daboch kar tham leta aur chupake se apane aansoo ponchh dalata.
halanki isase mujhe pareshani to hoti hi thi.
mujhe achchhi tarah se yad hai us garm dopahari men pavitr prarthana sabha kee jab vahan bhid men se chandi ka ek thanda pyala guzara gaya.
us pyale men svadisht angooron ka ras bhara huaa tha.
mainne usamen se dher sara joos pi liya tha aur man ka mujhe rokata-sa vah nam naram hath aur tab mainne kitani rahat mahasoos kee thi jab fadar ne baibal band kee thi.
isaka matalab yahi tha ki ab prarthanaen shuroo hongi aur eesh vandana ke antim git gaye jayenge.

usakee vah duniya ab chhoo mantar ho chukee thi aur usakee ab yaden hi bachi thin.
aisa lagata tha mano ham hamesha se hi is tarah ke dayaniy halat men rahate aaye the.
bich ka ek baras to takalifon ke poore jivan kal kee tarah laga tha.
ham ab beraunak dhundhalake kamare men rahate the.
kam-dham talashana bahut hi doobhar tha aur man ko stej ke alava kuchh aata-jata nahin tha, isase usake hath aur bandh jate the.
vah chhote kad kee, lality liye bhavuk mahila thi.
vah viktoriyan yug kee aisi bhayankar vikat paristhitiyon se joojh rahi thi jahan amiri aur garibi ke bich bahut badi khaee thi.
garib-guraba auraton ke pas hath ka kam karane, mehanat majoori karane ke alava aur koee chara nahin tha ya fir thi dukanon vagairah men had-tod gulami.
kabhi-kabhar use narsing ka kam mil jata tha lekin is tarah ke kam bhi bahut durlabh hote aur ye bhi bahut hi kam arase ke lie hote.
isake bavajood vah kuchh n kuchh jugad kar hi leti.
vah thiyetar ke lie apani poshaken khud siya karati thi isalie sine-pirone ke kam men usaka hath bahut achchha tha.
is tarah se vah charch ke logon kee kuchh poshaken si kar kuchhek shiling kama hi leti thi.
lekin ye kuchh shiling ham tinon ke guzare ke lie nakafi hote.
pita ji kee darookhori ke karan unhen thiyetar men kam milana aniyamit hota chala gaya aur is tarah har hafte milane vala unaka das shiling ka bhugatan bhi aniyamit hi rahata.
man ab tak apani adhikansh chizen bech chukee thi.
sabase aakhir men bikane ke lie jane vali usakee vo peti thi jisamen usakee thiyetar kee poshaken thin.
vah in chizon ko ab tab isalie apane pas sanbhal kar rakhe hue thi ki shayad kabhi usakee aavaz vapis laut aaye aur use fir se thiyetar men kam milana shuroo ho jaye.
kabhi-kabhi vah trank ke bhitar jhankati ki shayad kuchh kam ka mil jaye.
tab ham koee mudi-tudi poshak ya vig dekhate to usase kahate ki vah ise pahan kar dikhaye.
mujhe yad hai ki hamare kahane par usane jaj kee ek topi aur gaun pahane the aur apani kamazor aavaz men apana ek purana safal git sunaya tha.
ab vah hamare samane pradarshan karati to vah apane khud ke manoranjak ansh to dikhati hi, doosari abhinetriyon kee bhi nakal dikhati jinhen usane tathakathit vaidh thiyetaron men kam karate dekha tha.
kisi natak ko sunate samay vah alag-alag anshon ka abhinay karake dikhati.
udaharan ke lie da' sain aof da' krosa' men marsiya apani aankhon men alaukik prakash bhare, sheron ko khana khilane ke lie mand vale pinjare men jati hai.
vah hamen vilsan bairat kee oonchi pop jaisi aavaj men nakal karake dikhati.
vah chhote kad ka aadami tha isalie panch inch oonchi hil vale joote pahan kar ghoshana karata:"yah eesaiyat kya hai, main nahin janata lekin main itana zaroor janata hoon ki..ki yadi eesaiyat ne marsiya jaisi auraten banayi hain to rom, nahin, jagat hi isake lie pavitratam hoga." is ansh ko hasy kee jhalak ke sath karake dikhati lekin usamen bairet kee pratibha ke prati sarahana bhav jaroor hota.
jin vyaktiyon men vastavik pratibha thi, unhen pahachanane, man dene men usaka koee sani nahin tha.
chahe fir vah nayika ailen teri ho, ya myoojik hol kee jo elvin, vah unakee kala kee vyakhya karati.
vah takanik kee barik janakari rakhati thi aur thiyetar ke bare men aise vyakti kee tarah bat karati thi jo thiyetar ko pyar karane vale hi kar sakate hain.
vah alag-alag kisse sunati aur unaka abhinay karake dikhati.

mera kad ooncha hai." aur nepoliyan yah kahate hue khafa hote hue gurraya "ooncha ya lamba?"
man nel gvin ka vistar se abhinay karake batati ki vah kis tarah se mahal kee sidhiyon par jhukee huee hai aur usakee bachchi usakee god men hai.

dopahar dhalane ko thi.

vah garibon aur masoom bachchon ke prati yishoo masih ke prem aur daya ke bare men bata rahi thi.

man unakee sahishnuta aur samajh ke bare men bata rahi thi; usane us mahila ke bare men bataya jisase pap ho gaya tha aur use bhid dvara patthar mar kar saza di jani thi, aur unake prati yishoo ke shabd "aap men se jisane kabhi pap n kiya ho vahi aage aa kar sabase pahala patthar mare."
sanjh ka dhundhalaka hone tak vah padhati rahi.
vah sirf laimp jalane kee lie hi uthi.
tab usane us vishvas ke bare men bataya jo yishoo masih ne bimaron men jagaya tha.
bimar ko bas, unake choge kee turapan ko hi chhoona hota tha aur ve change ho jate the.

pontiyas ne hath dhote hue kaha tha (man ne bahut hi shanadar abhinay karake ye bataya)," mujhe is aadami men koee kharabi hi nazar nahin aati." tab man ne bataya ki kis tarah se un logon ne yishoo ko nirvastr kar dala tha aur use zalil kiya tha aur usake sir par kanton ka taj pahana diya tha, usaka mazak udaya tha aur usake munh par ye kahate hue thooka tha, "o yahoodiyon ke raja ..."
jab vah ye sab suna rahi thi to usake galon par aansoo dharake chale aa rahe the.

man ne barabas ke bare men bataya jo pashchatapi tha aur kros par unake sath hi mara tha.
vah kshama mang raha tha aur yishoo kah rahe the, "aaj tum mere sath svarg men hovoge", aur kros se apani man kee or dekhate hue yishoo ne kaha tha, "man, apane bete ko dekho." aur unake antim, marate vakt kee pida bhari karah, "mere param pita, aapane mujhe kshama kyon nahin kiya?"
aur ham donon ro pade the.
"tumane dekha", man kah rahi thi, "ve manavata se kitane bhare hue the.
ham sab kee tarah unhen bhi sandeh jhelana pada."

okle strit ke us tahakhane ke us andhere kamare men man ne mujhe us jyoti se bhar diya tha jise vishv ne aaj tak jana hai aur jisane poori duniya ko ek se badh kar ek katha tatv vale sahity aur natak diye hain: pyar, daya aur manavata.
ham samaj ke jis nimnatar star ke jivan men rahane ko mazaboor the vahan ye sahaj svabhavik tha ki ham apani bhasha-shaili ke star ke prati laparavah hote chale jate lekin man hamesha apane parivesh se bahar hi khadi hamen samajhati aur hamare bat karane ke dhang, uchcharan par dhyan deti rahati, hamara vyakaran sudharati rahati aur hamen yah mahasoos karati rahati ki ham khas hain.
ham jaise-jaise aur adhik garibi ke gart men utarate chale gaye, main apani agyanata ke chalate aur bachapane men man se kahata ki vah fir se stej par jana shuroo kyon nahin kar deti.
man muskurati aur kahati ki vahan ka jivan nakali aur jhootha hai aur ki is tarah ke jivan men rahane se ham jaldi hi eeshvar ko bhool jate hain.
isake bavazood vah jab bhi thiyetar kee bat karati to vah apane aapako bhool jati aur utsah se bhar uthati.

tab man meri taraf dekhati aur mujhe akela pa kar mera hausala badhati.
sardiyan sir par thin aur sidani ke kapade kam hote chale ja rahe the.
isalie man ne apane purane reshami jaiket men se usake lie ek kot si diya tha.
us par kali aur lal dhariyon vali banhen thin.
kandhe par plits thi aur man ne poori koshish kee thi ki unhen kisi tarah se door kar de lekin vah unhen hata nahin pa rahi thi.
jab sidani se vah kot pahanane ke lie kaha gaya to vah ro pada tha,"skool ke bachche mera ye kot dekh kar kya kahenge?"
"is bat kee kaun paravah karata hai ki log kya kahenge?" man ne kaha tha,"isake alava, ye kitana khas kism ka lag raha hai." man ka samajhane-bujhane ka tarika itana shanadar tha ki sidani aaj din tak nahin samajh paya hai ki vah man ke fusalane par vah kot pahanane ko aakhir taiyar hi kaise ho gaya tha.
lekin usane kot pahana tha.
us kot kee vajah se aur man ke oonchi hil ke saindilon ko kat-chhant kar banaye gaye jooton se sidani ke skool men kaee jhagade hue.
use sab ladake chhedate,"josef aur usaka rang biranga kot?" aur main, man kee purani lal lambi jurabon men se kat-koot kar banayi gayi juraben (lagata jaise unamen pliten dali gayi hain.) pahan kar jata to bachche chhedate,"aa gaye sar fransis drek."
is bhayavah halat ke charam dinon men man ko aadhi sisi sir dard kee shikayat shuroo huee.

vah kaee-kaee din tak andhere kamare men sir par chay kee pattiyon kee pattiyan bandhe padi rahati.

isake bavajood, sidani skool ke ghanton ke bich akhabar bechata, aur beshak usaka yogadan oont ke munh men jira hi hota, ye us khairat ke saman men kuchh to jodata hi tha.
lekin har sankat men hamesha koee n koee klaimeks bhi chhupa hota hai.
is mamale men ye klaimeks bahut sukhad tha.
ek din jab man thik ho rahi thi, chay kee patti kee patti abhi bhi usake sir par bandhi thi, sidani us andhiyare kamare men hanfata huaa aaya aur akhabar bistar par fenkata huaa chillaya,"mujhe ek batuaa mila hai." usane batuaa man ko de diya.
jab man ne batuaa khola to usane dekha, usamen chandi aur sone ke sikke bhare hue the.
man ne turant use band kar diya aur uttejana se vapis apane bistar par dhah gayi.
sidani akhabar bechane ke lie bason men chadhata rahata tha.
usane bas ke oopari talle par ek khali sit par batuaa pada huaa dekha.
usane turant apane akhabar us sit ke oopar gira diye aur fir akhabaron ke sath pars bhi utha liya aur teji se bas se utar kar bhaga.
ek bade se hording ke pichhe, ek khali jagah par usane batuaa khol kar dekha aur usamen chandi aur tanbe ke sikkon ka dher paya.
usane bataya ki usaka dil balliyon uchhal raha tha aur vah bina paise gine hi ghar kee taraf bhagata chala aaya.
jab man kee halat kuchh sudhari to usane batue ka sara saman bistar par ulat diya.
lekin batuaa abhi bhi bhari tha.
usake bich men bhi ek jeb thi.
man ne us jeb ko khola aur dekha ki usake andar sone ke sat sikke chhupe hue the.
hamari khushi ka thikana nahin tha.
eeshvar ka lakh-lakh shukr ki batue par koee pata nahin tha.
isalie man kee jhijhak thodi kam ho gayi thi.
halanki us batue ke malik ke durbhagy ke prati thoda-sa afasos jataya gaya tha, alabatta, man ke vishvas ne turant hi ise hava de di ki eeshvar ne ise hamare lie ek varadan ke roop men oopar se bheja hai.
man kee bimari sharirik thi athava manovaigyanik, main nahin janata.
lekin vah ek hafte ke bhitar hi thik ho gayi.
jaise hi vah thik huee, ham chhutti manane ke lie samudr ke dakshin tat par chale gaye.
man ne hamen oopar se niche tak naye kapade pahanaye.
pahali bar samudr ko dekh main jaise pagal ho gaya tha.
jab main us pahaaadi gali men tapati dopahari men samudr ke pas pahuncha to main thaga-sa rah gaya.
ham tinon ne apane joote utare aur pani men chhap-chhap karate rahe.
mere taluon aur mere takhanon ko gudagudata gunaguna samudr ka pani aur mere pairon ke tale se sarakati nam, naram aur bhurabhuri ret..
mere aanand ka thikana nahin tha.
vah din bhi kya din tha.
kesari rang ka samudr tat, usakee gulabi aur nili dolachiyan aur us par lakadi ke belache.
usake satarangi tanboo aur chhatariyan, laharon par itarati kashtiyan, aur oopar tat par ek tarah karavat le kar aaram faramati kashtiyan jinamen samudri sevar kee gandh rachi-basi thi aur ve tat? in sabakee yaden abhi bhi mere man men charam uttejana se bhari huee lagati hain.
1957 men main dobara sauth end tat par gaya aur us sankari pahadi gali ko khojane ka nishfal prayas karata raha jisase mainne samudr ko pahali bar dekha tha lekin ab vahan usaka koee namo-nishan nahin tha.
shahar ke aakhiri sire par vahi jo kuchh tha, purane machhuaaron ke ganv ke avashesh hi dikh rahe the jisamen purane dhab kee dukanen najar aa rahi thin.
isamen atit kee dhundhali si sarasarahat chhupi huee thi.
shayad yah samudri sevar kee aur tar kee mahak thi.
baloo ghadi men bhari ret kee tarah hamara khazana chuk gaya.
mushkil samay ek bar fir hamare samane munh baye khada tha.
man ne doosara rozagar dhoondhane kee koshish kee lekin kamakaj kahin tha hi nahin.
kiston kee adayagi ka vakt ho chuka tha.
natija yahi huaa ki man kee silaee mashin uthava li gayi.

aur koee upay nahin tha.

1.
Kam se kam 10 bahane yaad karke rakho, aur jaise hi tumhara boss tumhe timepass karta paaye to koi bhi ek bahana de dena.
Dhyaan rakhna, ek hi bahana dubaara mat batlana.
2.
Apne sabhi office ke doston ko chhoti moti party dete raha karo.
Apna saara kaam unhi se nikalva liya karo, tumko kaam karne ki kya zaroorat.
3.
Jis din zyaada tension aaye, apne office ke sabhi computers pe virus chhod do.
Virus sab ka kaam tamaam kar dega.
Aur tumhe chhutti mil jayegi.
4.
Apne computer ko format kardo aur iska ilzaam kisi aur ke sar daal do.
Aur khafa hokar ghar ke liye nikal jao.
Zor se bolo ki tumhe koi kaam hi nahi karne deta.
Yaad karke apni important files ka backup le lena.
5.
Apne office mein black and white zamaane ke geet bajao.
Saare log itne pareshan ho jaayenge ki tumhara kaam khud hi karne lagenge aur tumhe rawana kar denge.
6.
Koi bhi kaam ho mazaak mein liya karo.
Jeevan mein serious hoke kya milega.
Koi bhi kaam karo tu usmein kam se kam 13 galtiyan karo.
Koi bhi tumhe kaam dene ke naam se hi ghabrayega.
7.
Apna din bhar ka kaam 2-3 ghanton mein khatam kardo.
Fir baki bache din mein kaam karne ka naatak karo.
Hamare facebook page mein aake samay barbaad kiya karo.
8.
Din bhar facebook par dhongibaba ke chamatkar ke baare mein duniya ko batao.
Hamari kripa se tumhara uddhar hoga ki nahi ye to pata nahi, par dusron ka zaroor ho jaayega.
9.
Koi tumhe dekhe to ekdum pareshaan chehra bana ke computer ki taraf dekhte raho.
Koi naya kaam dene aaye to ekdum rota hua chehra bana lo jaise bijlee tum par giree ho.
10.
Har do minute mein zor zor se khaansi karo.
Koi paas aaye to khaansi karo.
Rumaal ka bilkul upyog mat karna.
Jab tak tumhe ghar jaane ko log nahi kehte, tab tak naatak jari rakho.
sari duniya men is samay mahan kaise banen, mahanatam safalata kaise paen taip kee kitabon kee badh aaee huee hai.
aisi hi ek kitab mere hath lag gaee hai.
usake lekhak aur usane sade siddhanton ko mainne padha, manavata ke itihas men yada-kada hi itana mahan kam itani saral bhash men huaa hoga, aisa mera manana hai.
halanki jab aap khud padh lenge to man lenge ki main kitana sahi kah raha hoon.
mahatvakankshiyon ke hitarth alankar rahit yah kitab itani saral aur lokal bhash men likhi gaee hai ki aapako lagega ki jaise aap apane aasapas ke hi kisi vyakti ka sansmaran sun rahe hon.
yahi is kitab ke lekhak aur usake siddhant kee khasiyat hai.
khair, main yon poori kahani suna doon aap hi padh len, lekhak ka preranadayi jivan aur unaka kalajayi siddhant kee dastan...
notah yah rachana jivan ko behatar banane se sanbandhit hai.
atah shuroo men hi batata chaloon ki poori rachana men vyangy ya hasy jaisi fijool kee chijon ko dhoonndhane ka anavashyak prayas kataee na karen, preranadayi rachana ko mahan najarie se padhen.
to chalie shuroo se shuroo karate hain.
jivan parichay...

tiem sahab ke nam se janata hai, thik usi tarah jis tarah ajit ko sara shahar layan ke nam se janata tha.
tejaram moti prakash morale nahin balki 'tangadimara' morale urf pro.
tiem sahab.
unake mainejament kaushal ke kayal, 'medha' se aatankit poore kolej ke log, unakee karagujariyon ke jivant kaisit, batan dabaya kisse shuroo, kisse bhi kya akhand kisse, ek kisse men hi tin sahayak kisse nikal aaen.
anant kathaen ek pro.
tiem.
yoon to unhonne apana kaeriyar chaparasinuma kisi chij se shuroo kiya tha.
halanki ve tab bhi ise shikshan sahayak hi kahate the.
shikshan sahayak ke roop men unake dayitvon ke antargat ve batate the.
ji han, yahan sab kuchh ve hi batate the yonki unake samay ke bakee sab 'varishtha' to unakee karagujariyan se asamay hi mritapray ho gae.
is karan ye dayitv unhen hi nibhana padta hai.
to ve jab shikshan sahayak the to varishth pradhyapakon, adhyapakon ko chak, dastar, pani, sutaee ka rool, bhavishy ke drishtigat kuchh profesaron ke ghar kee rashan-pani aadi lakar dete the.
isake alava sammanit karyon ke antargat ve batate the ki laibreri se kitaben lana bhi unhin ke dayitv huaa karate the.
yahin us aitihasik jagah ve pustakon ke nikat sanpark men aae, jahan unhen apani medha ke bare men 'gyana' huaa, aur ve kafi padh likhakar is jagah tak pahunche.
isi sandarbh men ek maukhik kinvadanti yah kahati hai ki unhen pradhyapakon dvara di gaee list kee kitabon ko dhoondhane ke dauran kuchh purani piechadi dhool khati mil gaee thi, jinhen unhonne hastagat karake ghar pahunch liya tha.
tatpashchat kolej ke trasti mahoday ke yahan di gaee apani 'nisvartha' sevaon ke pratifal ke roop men unhen isi kolej men adhyapakee prapt ho gaee thi.
ek any (yahan bhi maukhik kinvadanti) ka vivaran kuchh doosari taraf ka hai, jisake antargat bataya jata hai ki trasti mahoday ke boodhe bap jo ritayar profesar the, ki tiem sahab ne itani seva kee thi ki marate samay ve apani piechadi unhen saunp gae the jise tiem sahab jild kholakar dobara peshakar piechadi prapt kar li thi, jis vishayak unaka kathan tha ki unhonne ''guruprasad amar kar diya hai'' vo guru ke khase bhakt the aur jab tab las men batate rahate the ki kaise unake guru ne keval unakee lagan aur jigyasa dekhakar khansate-khansate hi unhen 'prabandhana' kee shiksha di thi.
halanki yah bat alag hai ki is dauran girane vale thook ka ve prabandhan uchit dhang se nahin kar pae the, jis sanbandh men bhi unakee amar sooti thi ki ''guru ka thook bhi shishy ke lie moti ban jata hai.'' arthat ve shikshan par isi thokotsarjit paddhati ke antargat shikshit-dikshit hue the, jis karan thookakar chatane, doosaron ke charitr par thookane aadi-aadi karyon ko atyant hi nishnat evan samarpit bhav se karate the.
ye to tha unake profesar banane kee disha men ek chhota sa flaish baik.
ab us bat par aate hain jisake chalate ve femas hain.
unakee athah 'khyati' hai.
vah hai prabandhan ka unaka bilakul maulik tiem urf tangadimar siddhant ya modal.
dheron chhatr isakee sahayata se uchch shikharon par pahunch chuke hain.
chhatron ke jivan men prerana bharane vala yah most femas modal hai, aap bhi isase prerana le saken, isalie is siddhant ka laiv demo diya ja raha hai, taki aap ise sikhen, gunen aur pad-haisiyat aur antatah jivan 'behatara' bana saken.(notah yah bhi us kitab men hi bataya gaya hai.) 
filahal ve las men padha rahe hain...
chhatr tanmayata se unase 'prabandhana' kee shiksha grahan kar rahe hain.
tiem sahab kah rahe the ''dekho bachchon prabandhan kya hai? kshudr drishti se dekho to vyakti, sanstha, vastuon ka uchit niyojan hi prabandhan hai.
lekin jab aap ise 'vyapaka' najarie se dekhate hai to prabandhan hai vyakti, sanstha, vastuon kee apane anukool kar, thik dhang se apani vyavastha baitha lena, arthat vinamrata se tangadi marate hue kam se kam samay men adhikatam doori prapt kar lena.
shram-buddhi-kaushal ke vanchhit ghalamel se, tikshnnata se chijen mainej karate hue mainejar ho jana.
ye vyavaharik prabandhan hai.'' aage unhonne joda aadhunik kal men se hi 'tangadimar mainejamenta' kahate hain.
yah prabandhan ka ekadam naya aur 'spesilaijd eriya' hai.
spesilaijd isalie hai ki koee aam chhatr ise kar hi nahin sakata.
isake lie to 'kaiyanpanti' kee dhoortata men page hue khas baikagraund kee aavashyakata padti hai, yoon hi nahin har koee ise prapt kar sakata hai.
isamen sabase khas bat hai uchit taiming kee yani yogy avasar par tatkshan hi kalakari dikha di jae, anyatha to 'loojarsa' kaitegiri men gine jane ke lie taiyar rahana padta hai.
tiem sahab apani bat kah bhi nahin pae the ki poorv men hi ek chhatr bol pada.
''sar jara taiming kee bat ditel men samajhaie na...''
''bilakula'' unhonne kaha-''jaise atyant mahatvapoorn vyakhyan ke bich tumhari se pin-pinati, jigyasayut aavaj baid taiming ka klasikal udaharan hai.
bagule kee tarah ghat lagakar sadhi jati hai taiming jara sa chooke aur poori mehanat ka safaya'' jaise kisi aofis men pramoshan ek ka hona ho aur tin davedar ho to yahan taiming ka kya mahatv hai, ek udaharan ke madhyam se samajho-'a' ne isake lie salabhar dikhae apane kam karmathata ko hi paryapt aadhar manate hue.
aadhar par khud ko pramoshan ka sabase bada davedar mana liya.
vahin 'ba' ne kam aur karmathata ke sath-sath bos ko samane apani nirantar hajiri ko pramoshan ka aadhar pana.
vahin isi dauran 'sa' ne kam-karmathata-kartavy ke sthan par bos ke prati kartavy ko prathamikata dete hue jeschar-poshchar men bhi vinamrata kee atirikt 'doja' milana shuroo kar di.
aofis aur bangale par dyooti kee pankchualati badha di, yani fal pakane ka mausam aane par har tarah kee nishkriyata ko tyag kar 'prabandhana' men jut gaya.
''han to bachcho batao fir kise mila hoga promoshana'' tiem sahab ne kaha.
'sa' ko hi mila hoga, sar.
kaee aavajen ek sath aaee.
'vairi gud ab samajh rahe ho 'tangadimar prabandhana' jahan 'a' aur 'ba' kartavy aur mehanat men kam nahin the lekin jab atirikt mehanat kee jaroorat thi to ve chook gae, vahin 'sa' ne is atirikt mehanat arthat fal pakane ke mausam men 'mali' ke saman najaren rakhin, ped ke aasapas fal ke chanhuor 'jholi' failakar usake girane par lapakane ke lie taiyar ho gaya.
tab kahi jakar hath aata hai fal.
ye kya ki bij to dal die aur nishchintata men baith gae, konpale bhi nahin nikalane paengi ki dhor-dangar khel kar denge.
machan bandhana padta hai, fasal kee raksha karani padti hai niraee-gudhaee bhi samay-samay par kee jati hai, tab pramoshan kee fasal pak kar khalihan men aati hai.
jaisi 'sa' ke khalihan men aaee.
''poori kahani se kya shiksha milati hai'' tiem sahab bole.
fir khud hi aage shuroo ho gae, shiksha hi nahin ye kahani to apane aap men poori 'pasabuka' hi hai, jo kahati hai uchit samay kiya gaya koee bhi atirikt prayas fal kee prapti karavata hai.
mainejament kee bhasha men 'sahi taiming men sahi eta' jabaki 'tangadimar mainejamenta' men ise kahate hai 'karagujari vid taiminga' kyonki agar aaj tumhare pas yah kala nahin hai to aage badhane ke avasar bhi nahin h,ai karan ye hai ki aaj to isafarish tak yogy logon kee lagaee jati hai, ayogy kee to koee sifarish tak nahin lagana to aise paridrishy men tangadi marate hue hi aage badhana padta hai.'' 
''fir to tangadimarane' ka matalab doosaron ka anyayapoorn dhang se mauka chhinana huaa sara'' fir las ke kahin kone se aavaj aaee.
''bilakula'' tiem sahab ne kaha ''tum kabiliyat nahin dikhaoge to koee doosara dikha jaega, kyonki mardn mainejament men kabiliyat aur karagujari lagabhag paryay hi ban chuke hain.'' 
ye to tumhari ichchha hai ki tumhen aguaa banana hai ya karyakarta.
halanki karyakartapana mainten karana bhi harek ke bas kee bat nahin hai'' kyonki karyakartapane men bhid banana padta hai, bhid lagana padti hai, bhid jaisa munh banana padta hai, kaee bar to sari vyavastha jeb se hi karana padti hai, fir saikadon karyakarta hote hain neta ke chahunor khade hone ko.
karagujari kee kala nahin aati ho to do-tin pidhiyon tak bhid hi bane rahana padta hai.
neta ke daravaje par hi mandarate rahana padta hai, panvon men pade rahana padta hai, joote-moje tak ban jana padta hai, tikat kee mashakat karani padti hai.
aise n jane kitane 'padta hai' karane padte hai tab kahi jakar ekadh ichchha poori ho pati hai.
ab tumhin batao hain na sau mushkilen, isalie mainejar bano vats‌, mainejar, ejiyootiv bane rahane men karyakartapane ka dam chahie, isalie karagujari dikhani hi padti hai'' fir mere alava poore desh men tumhen itana uchchastariy prabandhan modal koee nahin padha paega, samajha paega.
isalie mere in sikhon ko aaj hi ganth bandh lo anyatha fir tapate hi rah jaoge.
tiem sahab prabandhan men gahan darshan mis karake roj hi isi tarah ka athah gyan chhatron ko pradan karate hi rahate hain.
ab ek preranadayi prasang stafaroom ka bhi ho hi jae.
vahan bhi tiem sahab kee ojamayi vani goonj rahi hai.
''apana prinsipal nanbari hai nanbari, stoodenton se politis karake apana hit sadhata rahata hai.
kal hi chhatron ko baragala raha tha ki agar koee profesar padhae nahin to use shikayat kee jae, batao to ab stoodent bataenge ham ya-kaise padha rahe hain, 25 sal se to padha rahe hain aaj tak samajhe kya jo ab bataenge, vaise samajh jate to 'hama' n ho jate, tharakee dikhata hai prinsipal kya kahate ho, teka marate hue bakiyon se hami bharavaenge fir stafaroom se nikalakar prinsipal ke kamare men bhi pahunchenge taki vahan bhi...
vahan prinsipal ko bataenge ki in boodhe-khoonsat profesaron ke pas koee kam to hota nahin hai, dinabhar baithakar kolej kee buraee karate rahenge, fir aisa nahin ho raha, vaisa nahin ho raha ki tan chhede rahenge,sar jara tait to karo inako.
itane 'prabandhana' se nivrit hokar ve ek chakar stoodent lidaron ke pas lagaenge jinhen ve bataenge ki rajaniti kaise chalaen, kaun se profesar chhatron ke virodhi hai, fand kitana hai aadi-aadi.
itana karane ke bad ve motarasaikil lekar pahunchenge pres, jahan sab editaron ke pas baithakar unhen bataenge ki bhaee kolej men kya ghapale-ghotale chal rahe hain, nam mat dena lekin dekh lo kaisa durdasha kar di kolej kee, shiksha kee dukanen bana ke chhod diya hai.
tum hi kuchh karo nahin to sab rasatal men jaega.
mera nam nahin chhapana aadi do-tin bar doharakar ve apani praivet koching men pahunchenge taki men bahari chhatron ko bhi vyavaharik prabandhan men dikshit kiya ja sake.
vaise unaka manana hai ki unake tiem prabandhan modal ke siddhant behad saral evan bharatiy laimet ke sarvatha anukool hain, kyonki pashchim pranbadh kee kitabon men 'vyavaharik prabandhana' vahin ke najarie se likha gaya hai, jise sthaniy jaruraton ke hisab se parivardhit-parimarjit karane ka prayas aaj tak kisi ne kiya hi nahin, choonki is prabandhan ko unhonne poorvaroopen praitikal taur par aajamakar bhi dekha hai, pritesting ke anukool parinam prapt hone par hi bahusankhyak chhatr varg ke vyapak hiton ko drishtigat rakhate hue ve ise ek siddhant ke roop men vikasit kar usake dooragami shikshann-prashikshan men lage hain.
unaka to manana yahan tak hai ki kisi bhi safalata ko aap jan nahin pa rahe ho to unake maulik siddhanton kee roshani men is siddhant ka vishleshn kar len, kahin n kahin usake jivan men inaka anushilan mil hi jaega.
pratidin lagabhag ye bat kisi n kisi las batate hi hain fir chhatr kalyan ke mahan siddhant ke janmadata ke taur par usakee khumari men hi ghar kee or lautate hain.

unake siddhanton ke anushilan se sarvatr khushi faile isi kamana ke sath.....

rod inspektar urf sadak chhap majanoon, samaj ke aise chir-parichit jiv hain, jinase sabhi parichit hain.
ye neta, abhineta, gunde, badamashon kee tarah samaj ke anivary tatv hain.
inake bina samaj ka poorn nirman nahin ho pata hai, kyonki inake karan hi nari jati se judi dahej kee tarah kee samasya , chhedachhad ka astitv, samaj men maujood rahata hai jo kisi bujurg ke aashirvad kee tarah din doona rat chauguni dar se mahangaee kee tarah badhati chali ja rahi hai.
isase ghar kee grihani ho , skool-kalej jati chhatra ho, daftaron men kam karati praudha ho, koee bhi nahin bacha hai.
sabhi ko ghar se bahar nikalate hi rod inspektar kee chhedachhad ka shikar hona padata hai.
rod inspektar subah se lekar rat tak bas ek hi kam chhedachhad karate hai.
jis din galati se ye chhedachhad nahin kar pate hai., us din ye upavas dharan kar lete hain, kyonki bina chhedachhad ke inhen khana nahin pachata hai.
samaj men inhen talashane ke lie koee vishesh chashma lagane kee jaroorat nahin hai.
ye pop star maikal jaikshan kee tarah bal badhaye, apane sharir kee chaudaee ke barabar baigi pent kam paijama pahane govinda chal, amirakhan muskan ke sath alag se sadak par ghoomate najar aa jate hain ye apani upasthiti ka ehasas hamen svayan karate hain jab bhi kisi kanya ko dekhate hai.
to apane arddhanarishvar balon ke pichhe hath ferakar apana rod inspektar hone ka parichay dena yah pratham farj samajhate hai.
rod inspektaron ke jivan men sadakon ke kinare sthit pan thele ka utana hi mahatv h, jitana ki netaon ke pahanane ke lie khadi ke kurtte ke paijama ka, chara surkhiyon men rahane ke lie ghotale ka hai.
inakee sari javani pan ke thele par sadak takate hue kat jati hai.
ye subah sat baje se rat das baje tak ek aadarsh sipahi kee tarah pan ke thele par dyooti dete hai.
jis tarah yatayat sipahi kee najar se koee trak bachakar nikal nahin pata , usi tarah inakee giddh nigahon se koee ladakee bachakar nahin ja sakati hain jo bhi ladakee inhen bhanti hai usake pichhe ye shahad kee makkhi kee tarah lag jate hain aur ek aadarsh parivarik sadasy kee tarah use roj ghar se kalej v kalej se ghar chhodakar aate hai.
is bich men jitana bhi samay inhen raste men aasapas kee motar karon, trakon, taimpon se bachane ke bad milata hai, utana samay ye prem ijahar ( chhedachhad ) karane men lagate hai.
aisa din men ye char -panch ladakiyon ke sath avashy karate hai.
rod inspektar chhedachhad men ek se ek chuninda shabdon ka istemal karate hain inakee kalpanaon ke aage kaviyon kee kalpanayen bhi fikee pad jati hai.
ye log angrej dikhati ladakee ko pari sindrela, mini skart chhata li oonchi edi vali ladakee ko maharani viktoriya , ghas n dalane vali , patthar ka javab eent se dene vali ladakee ko maharani lakshmibaee, saindil marane vali ko maharani durgavati , jaise aitihasik patron se pukarate hain, inamen kam padhe-likhe aavara navayuvak hi nahin, em.e.,bi.e, pi.ech.di., dharak padhe-likhe samajhadar log bhi shamil rahate hain.
jo aksar chhedachhad men dushyant kee shakuntala, tulasi kee ratnavali, mahabharat kee panchali , vridavanalal varma kee mriganayani jaise sahityak patron ka istemal karate hain.
ye log ladakiyon ke sanbandh men ke.ji.be.ke jasooson kee tarah ghar valon se jyada janakari rakhate hain.
rod inspektar apane aap ko bhagavan krishn ka anuyayi samajhate hai.
isalie sadak chalati kanyaon ko brij kee gopikaon kee tarah chhedata ye apana pratham karttavy samajhate hai.
ye log apane guroo ka upadesh 'karm kiye ja fal kee chinta n kar' par vishvas karate hai.
isalie ye apana karm karate jate hain aur usaka fal lat-joote khana, samaj men badanami hona, sar ke balon ka chauraha banavana, ladakiyon dvara ek se ek shabdon -bandar , gadha, khajoor, tingoo, kaddoo jaise shabdon se sanbodhit hona , mar kha jana, aadi ka in par koee asar nahin padata hai.
Zamana kaafi aage pahuch gaya hai bhakton.
Ab ek se kaam nahi hota.
Phir wo chahe mobile phone ho, Computer ho ya pyaar.
Kam se kam 2-4 logon se pyaar karna aajkal ka rivaaj ban gaya hai.
Kyunki agar ek ne dhoka diya to doosara koi to hona chahiye na.
Par kuch bhakt 2-4 logon se ek hi samay mein ishq ladate samay pakde jaate hain, aur joote chappal khaakar waapas aate hain, apne bhakton ki isi samasya ko door karne ke liye aaj hum aapko denge kuch aise anmol tareeke jinko amal mein laane ke baad aap 2-4 kya, balki 15-20 logon se ek hi samay mein ishq lada sakte ho, aur pakde bhi nahi jaaoge.
1- Ek zamana tha ki log kasmein khaate the jiyenge saath aur marenge saath.
Kintu aaj ke samay mein log pehli kasam khate hain ki na tu mera mobile check karegi, aur na mein tera check karunga.
To kehne ka arth hai bhakton ki jab bhi unse milne jaao to bhoolkar bhi apna Chalit Doorbhas yantra arthaat mobile phone na le jaayein.
Ye samaj lo ki tumhara sabse bada shatru hai ye.
2- Hamesha koshish karo ki alag-alag jagah ke logon se ishq ladaaya jaaye.
Yaad rakho aajkal duniya chhoti hoti ja rahi hai, yadi ek hi sthaan ke logon se ishq ladaya to pakde jaane ki apaar sambhaavna hai.
3- Jitne logon se tumhara chakkar chal raha hai un sabko alag-alag mobile no do.
Aur sabko apna naam alag alag batao.
Khatra mol lene ki bhool na karna.
Aur ye yaad rakhna, saavdhani hati durghatna ghati.
4- Kisi bhi haal mein unke saath chitra arthaat photo na khichvao.
Kyunki galti se usne tumhara chitra facebook mein daal diya to tumhara to chamatkaar ho gaya samjho.
Phir to hum bhi do chaar laat ghoose maarne mein peechhe nahi hatenge.
5- Jitne logon se pyaar karte ho utne facebook account bana lo.
Aur sabko alag alag account mein add karo.
Yaad rakho tumne zara see bhi laaparwaahi barti to tumhara bhaanda phoota samjho.
6-  Kabhi bhi apne kisi mitra ko apne prem prasang arthaat affair ke baare mein na batao.
Aajkal dushmano se zyaada khatra apno se hota hai, kahin aisa na ho ki tum kisi ko patane mein laakhon paapad belo aur tumhara mitra use lekar udan chhu hole.
Mitrata apni jagah aur prem apni jagah.
Zyaada jaankaari ke liye angrakchhak artaat Bodyguard dekh lo bachha, samajh aa jaayega ki aajkal ke mitra kis mitti ke bane hain.
7- Jab bhi ishq ladane jaao to hamesha kisi aise sthaan par jaao jahan doosari waali ke hone ki sambhaavna bilkul bhi na ho.
Kyunki yadi unmein se kisi ek ne bhi tumhe doosari waali ke saath dekh liya to tumhara to phir jo haal hoga uski hum abhi sirf kalpana hi kar sakte hain.
Ye the hamare kuch aise achook sujhaav jinhe apnane se aap 2-4 kya balki jitne chaho utne logon ke saath raas leela racha sakte hain.
To bhakton der na karo aur zyaada se zyaada logon par ye achook tareeke apnao…Dhong kaayam rahe ;*)

vaidik kal se 'loka' shabd prachalit hai.
rigved ke purush-sookt men yah shabd aaya hai.
vaidik kal men hi ved aur lok shabdavali apani-apani prithak satta spasht kar deti hai.
panini ne ved aur lok shabdon ke bhinn-~bhinn svaroopon ka bodh karaya hai.
naty shastrakar bharat muni, natyadharmi aur lokadharmi pravritiyon ko bhinn batate unaka ullekh karate hain.

bharatiy chintan men 'loka' shabd ke tatpary ko sangat roop se spasht karane vala ek any shabd 'jana' hai.
'jana' ka prayog atharvaved ke prithivi-sookt men dekha ja sakata hai, 'janan vibhrati bahuya vivachasan.
nana dharmannan prithivi yathokasam (45).' yahi manav matr kee or ingit karane vala 'jana' shabd, samrat ashok ke saptam aur ashtam shilalekhon men sthan pata hai jahan samrat janapadavasiyon se sampark karane nikalata hai.
yah 'jana' us samrajy ke sare nivasi hain jo nagar, gram aadi men basate hain.
is vivechan se yah nishkarsh sahaj men hi nikalata hai ki lok aur jan ka arth sare nivasiyon se hai jo kahin bhi basate hon.
is vishal manav samaj men ek shisht varg apane aachar, vichar, sanskar aur aupacharik bandhanon ke karann, samany jan samaj se alag padata huaa, 'nagar varga' se sanbodhit hone lagata hai.
ise aabhijaty varg bhi kah sakate hain.
is varg ke lie kuchh kary-kalapon ka khula pradarshan varjit (teboo) hota hai.
yah varg svanirmit anushasan ke niyamon se bandha rahata hai.
is varg ka pahinava, bhasha, sahity aur jivanacharya ek vishesh dhanche men bandh jati hai.
athach aise varg ka sahity ritibaddh aur shastr sammat hota hai.
is aabhijaty sahity ke thik samanantar lok samuday ka sahity bhi pravahit hota rahata hai, jo nisandeh svachchhand, nirankush, sahaj aur naisargik bhavon se ras-sikt rahata hai.
sach to yah hai ki lok-sahity koee aabhijaty sahity ke viparit nahin hota hai.
vah lok samuday ke ek ghatak ka sahity hai jo shisht varg dvara srijit hota hai.
apani ritibaddhata ke karan aabhijaty sahity ke nam se sanbodhit hota hai.

is bhanti lok apana gatishil jivan bitata hai, vah kisi aadim bhav ke khoonte se badha nahin rahata hai.

har yug men hone vale is mridu pari-vartan ko, us yug ke lok sahity men aank sakate hain.
parinishthit sahity ke sath-sath lok sahity bhi vismrit hota, khandit hota aur parivarddhit hota pravahaman rahata hai.
yah lok sahity aur pradarshanakari-kalaon kee parampara, apane yug ka darpan hoti hai.
abhi bharatiy lok sahity ke sangrah aur parichay ka prayas matr huaa hai, usaka yug parak itihas likhana bhavishy ke aadhin hai ?
yah bhrant dharana ghar kar gaee hai ki lok rachanaon ka koee rachanakar nahin hokar, vah rachana lokarachit hoti hai.
is srijan aur srijak kee oohapoh ka samadhan bhi aavashyak hai.
lokarachana ka srijak koee samooh nahin ho sakata.
bhavonmad men aakar koee srijak apani anubhooti shabdon athava pradarshan dvara vyakt karata hai.
vah anubhooti svabhavik, sahaj aur ahaitukee hone par lok samooh dvara apana li jati hai, tab vah srijan, lok-manas kee abhivyakti ban jata hai.
usaka uts v srijak vismrit ho jate hain aur sara lok samuday use angikar kar env poornnaroopen apanatv pradan kar, srijak ke sthan par aa baithata hai.

fir yug pravah men vah rachana bahati rahati hai.

lokanubhooti aur lokabhivyakti ke karan vah rachana sadaiv hari rahati hai.
apane in gunon ke karan vah itani saksham hoti hai ki lok manas ka atoot ang ban jati hai.
usake chintan men vah ekakar ho jati hai.
lok samuday ka ek manas hota hai.
vah apani ruchi athava vyavahar men aadim, jangali athava aindrik nahin hota hai.
vah to gatishil tatha jivant samooh ke karyakalapon ko sanchalit karata hai.
usamen sahaj vivek evan mangal kee bhavana bhi rahati hai.
vah anayas hi, anajane apana parishkar karata rahata hai.
usamen kuchh aise parampara jany vyavahar aur vishvas apana sthan banaye rahate hain jo usakee sahaj prakriti v tark ke abhav men apani sthiti ko kalantar men adhik sudridh bana lete hain.

lok visvason ke aadhar par hi kavi prasiddhiyan tikee hain.
n kisi ne chakor ka angar bhakshan karana dekha hai aur n use ratri ko chandr kee or takatakee lagae.

yah sab lok tattv ke parichayak hain jinamen riti-rivajon ke bhoole v vismrit upakaranon ke kuchh avashesh bhi dekhane ko milate hain.
