5 lok kavy ka shilp.
lok sahity ka kavy-shilp nirantar upeksha ka vishay raha hai.
yah sach hai ki yah sahity ritibaddh nahin hota hai.
n to usamen chhand kee matraon ka vidhan hai aur n ganon ka.
usakee abhi-vyakti anayasit hoti hai par hoti hai sahajata men.
usamen geyata hoti hai, ter hoti hai aur shabdon kee thumak hoti hai.
kya yah gun use jivit nahin rakhate hain ? vah lok ka kanthahar kyon hai ? kya yah gun us naisargik shilp kee or ingit nahin karate hain jisamen maulikata, nootanata aur marmasparshi sanvedana koot koot kar bhari hai ? van pushp kee tajagi sundarata, mohakata evan vichitr agyat suvas ko isalie nahin nakar sakate ki vah kisi vatika athava pushpadan men sthit nahin hai.
nagar kee solah shrringar se sajjit sundari ke samakaksh kya kisi alhad agyat yauvana graminn, maili veshabhoosha vali, yuvati ko roop ka patr nahin gin sakate ? saundary athava usaka shilp ritibaddh rachanaon men shastreey hoga parantu lok rachanaon men vah sahaj evan naisargik aabha evan chatak lie hoga jo sadaiv nit nootan hoga.
ataev lok sahity niralankrit aur bhale hi anagadh ho parantu usamen manav bhavon kee abhi-vyakti jis saralata aur lay se prakat hoti hai, vah rasatmakata anyatr durlabh hai.
sach to yah hai ki lok kavy ka niralankaran hi usaka alankaran hai.
kya sachamuch men alankar saundary kee vriddhi karate hain ? yah prashnachihn mahakavi bihari ne laga hi rakha hai.
usane apani satasaee men aabhooshanon ke dvara nari kee saundary sadhana ko nakara hai.
ataev lok kavy ka shilp-saushthav ka lekhajokha aavashyak aur anivary hai.
aisa karate samay aalochana ka mapadand koee ritibaddh shastr to avashy nahin hoga.
is prem varta ka kathanak, sootr men itana hi hai ki poongal ka raja apane desh men akal padane ke karan malava prant men, parivar sahit jata hai.
usakee shishu vay kee rajakumari (maravani) ka bal-vivah, malava ke salhakumar (dhola) se kar diya jata hai.
sukal ho jane se poongal ka raja laut kar ghar aa jata hai.
salhakumar vayask hone par apani patni ko livane nahin jata hai.
use is bal vivah ka gyan bhi nahin hota hai.
is bich salhakumar ka vivah malavani se ho jata hai jo sundar aur pati-anurak ta hai.
malavani ko maravani (saut) ke hone ka gyan hai aur poongal ka koee sandesh apane malava men aane nahin deti hai.
kalantar men maravani (maroo) ankurit yauvana hoti hai.
us par yauvan apana rang dikhata hai.
idhar svapn men use priy ka darshan bhi ho jata hai.
paryavaran se sabhi upakaran use virah ka darun du:kh dete hain.
papiha, saras evan kungj paksheegan ko vah apani virah vyatha sambodhit karati hai.
poongal ke raja ke pas ek ghodon ka saudagar aata hai aur malava ke salhakumar kee bat karata hai.
yah soochana sunakar maravani aur vyathit ho jati hai.
salhakumar ko bulava dhadhiyon (mangannahar) ke dvara bheja jata hai.
yah gane bajane vale chatur dhadhi gantavy sthan par pahunchakar, salhakumar (dhola) ko maravani kee sthiti ka poora gyan kara dete hain.
dhola poongal hetu prasthan karana chahata hai parantu saut malavani use bahane banakar rokati rahati hai.
malavani kee eershya, chinta, unmad, kapat, virah aur asahay avastha ka varnnan doohon men vistar se huaa hai.
ant men dhola prasthan kar hi deta hai aur poongal pahunch jata hai.
dhola aur maravani ka milan hota hai.
sukh vilas men samay vyatit hota hai.
fir pati-patni apane desh lautate hain to marg men oomar-soomara ke jal se to bach jate hain parantu ek naee vipada unhen gher leti hai.
ratri ko registan ka pivana (sarp) maravani ko soongh jata hai.
maravani ke mrit-pray achetan sharir ko dekhakar sthiti visham ho jati hai.
vilap aur krandan se sara vatavaran bhar jata hai.
tab shiv-parvati prakat hokar maravani ko jivit karate hain.
dhola maroo sakushal apane ghar pahunchate hain.
aanand se jivan vyatit karate hain.
vahan par chatur dhola, sautiha dah kee nonk jhonk ka samadhan bhi karata hai.
maravani ko adhik pyar v sneh samarpit karata hai.
dhola-maroo kee prem katha men samay-samay par ansh judate gae.
vachik parampara men aisa hona svabhavik hi hai.
kuchh pratiyon men 'dhur sanbandha' ke dohe milate hain.
is shirshak se hi spasht hai ki pahile ke sabandh kee katha, inaka vishay hai.
prastavana roop yah dohe maru (maravani) ke pita pingal raja ke vivah kee katha kahate hain.
jalor kee rajakanya sundari uma ka varann, apane paurush se karake gujarat ke rajakumar rannadhaval kee mang ka haran karate hain.
jalor ka raja samantasi ka namollekh huaa hai.
yah sara varnnan itihas viruddh hai.
ek roopantar men pankti aaee hai, 'dhan bhatiyani maravani, dholo kooram ranna', isase maravani jati men bhati aur dhola kachhavaha vansh ke kahe ja rahe hain, parantu itihas in tathyon ka samarthan nahin karata hai.
roopantaron men nishchit samvat aadi ke ullekh bhi hain jo kisi prakar se itihas sammat nahin hai.
isi bhanti oomar-soomara ka prasang hai jo mool katha men ghat badhakar sthan pa jata hai.
varta kee rochakata, romans, kautoohalata aur chatury ke pradarshan hetu umara soomara ka prasang bhale hi upayogi ho parantu itihas isakee sakshee nahin bharata hai.
rajasthan kee kathy parampara athava hastalikhit pratiyon men dhola-maroo kee bat ke roopantar, premakatha ke mool roop ko sthit rakhakar, any kathaon ko jodakar varta ka vistar avashy karate hain.
parantu is varta ke jo any pradeshik roop milate hai ve dhola-maravani ke prem katha ke sahare, unake mata-pita, bhaee, sevakon aadi ko bhi patr banakar, katha ka naya tana-bana bichhakar, jadoo, ghat-pratighat, chhal-kapat v shadayantr ka sahara lekar katha ko ek naya roop de dete hain.
braj, panjab (hariyana sahit), chhattisagadh (madhy bharat sahit) aur bhojapuri lok sahity men rajasthan kee yah bat apane men bahut kuchh 'nal damayanti' ke prasiddh pauranik kathanak ko bhi samet leti hai.
vastav men rajasthan kee yah bat, in pradeshon ke katha sahity men kho-si gaee hai aur keval dhola-maroo ke patr nam, kuchh samy ka aabhas matr dilate hain.
sahi arthon men rajasthan men milane vale roopantar hi dhola-maroo kee mool (athava aadim) katha ke prati nishthavan hain.
roopantar to mool kathanak men vistar karake use naya roop dete hain.
yah fer kal (samay) aur kshetr (sila bhoomi) se sanbandhit rahata hai parantu avantar kathayen, naye prasangon athava samanantar kathaon ko jodakar, mool katha ko pusht (sanvarddhan) matr karati hain.
udaharan ke lie oomar-soomara ke prasang ka ullekh oopar kar chuke hain.
oomar-soomara ke sanbandh men, ek alag se lok katha hai aur yah aitihasik vyakti bhi hai.
vah rasik aur nari saundary ka lubdh bhramar hai.
yah oomar-soomara ka vyaktitv chitran hai.
hamare kathanak kee maravani advitiy sundari hai aur jab aisa hai to usake saundary kee sarthakata athava sakh kee sakshee hetu oomar-soomara ke aakarshit hone ka prasang jod diya gaya.
lok kavy ke kathanakon men aisa sahajata se hota hai.
maryadaon men simit shastr sammat prem katha men bhi sundari ke padm svaroop mukhamandal kee saurabh ke karann, kale bhaunron kee panktiyan jaise use aa gherati hain.
is katha ke any roopantaron men dhola aur bhat ka sanvad vistar se hai.
yahi sthiti dhola aur gadariye ke sanvad kee hai.
sandeshavahak dhadhiyon ko salh kumar tak pahunchane hetu kaee avarodhak fandane pade, parae desh men saha-~yak khojane pade aadi kee prasang-vartayen hi avantar kathayen hain jo apane aap men poorn hain.
unhen hata bhi diya jaai to mool katha ka sootr bhang nahin hota aur sanlagn rakhane se katha ko pushti milati hai.
is lok kavy ka kya mool roop tha ? yah khojana kathin hai.
jis katha ka uts kal kee parton men kho gaya ho, usaka aadi khojana asambhav-sa hai.
parantu prastut 'dhola-maroo ra dooha' namak kriti ke jitane rajasthani parampara ke roopantar mile hain unamen ek laksha-nik tathy ujagar hota jan padata hai.
yadi vichararth yah kahen ki yah to 'prasangatmak giton' ka sangrah hai jisamen prasangon ke katha sootr ko ath se iti tak akshunn rakhane ka dhyan rakha gaya hai, to kaisa ? is vicharadhara ko ek any drishtant se bal milata hai.
mahakavi sooradas ke padon ko prasanganusar isi shati men jamakar jab prakashit kiya gaya to vah padavali bhagavat puran ka anusaran karane vali dikh padi aur bhavavesh men kuchh kah bhi baithe ki yah bhagavat puran ka ultha hai.
hamari is dharana kee sthapana hetu hamen koee hath athava aagrah nahin hai parantu is kriti ka vachik parampara men jab samana hota hai tab maravani ke virah sandesh aur malavani ke virah rudan ke prasang hi upasthit hote hain.
Yeh Ishu Maseeh ka susamachaar hai joy ek neev pradaan karta hai jispar hum gehri shaanti aur anant parivaar gharein bana sakte hai.
Play
Hamare jiwan ki yaatra mein achche aur bure donon tarah ke samay hote hai.
Har ek mein alag alag chunaotiyaan hoti hai.
Hum kis tarah seekhte hai in badlaao mein jeena hamare khud ke buniyaad par nirbhar hai.
Hamare Prabhu aur Uddhaarkarta ka susamachaar ek surakshit aur thos buniyaad pradaan karta hai.
Yeh ek ek karke nirmaan hota hai jab hum Prabhu ke anant yojna ka gyaan paate hai Unke bachchon ke liye.
Uddhaarkarta Swaami Shikshak hai.
Hum Unke tarah jeete hai.
Dharamshaastra Unki gawahi dete hai aur hamare liye sampurn dhaarmikta ka uddhaaran pradaan karte hai taaki hum unhe kar sake.
Maine pehle ke ek sammelan mein Girjaghar ke sadasyon ko batlaya hai ki mere paas kuch chotekitaab hai jismein meri maa ne likhaawatein ki hai Sahayak Sanstha ke paathon ki tayyaari karte samay.
Yeh likhaawat pehle ke jaisa aaj bhi laabhdayak hai.
Is mein ek 1908 mein Charles Edward Jefferso dwara likha dohraana hai Ishu Maseeh ke charitra ke baare mein.
Ismein likha hai:
“Isaai hone ka matlab hai Ishu ko itni sachchaai aur utsaah se saraahna karo ki hum apna pura jiwan Unhe dein koshish karte samay.
“… Hum shaayad unki gawahi praapt karenge unke kahe shabdon, kiye kaamon, aur unki kahi khamoshi dwara bhi.
Hum use us prabhaao se jaante hai jo usne sabse pehle apne doston aur dusra apne dushmanon par daala tha se, aur teesra un logon par jo us samay jiwit the.
…
“Beeswi sadi ke jiwan ka ek visheshta hai bechaeni [aur katinaaiya].
 …
“… Duniya kisi cheez ke liye ro rahi hai, par woh nahin jaante woh kya hai.
Paesa aa gaya hai, … [aur] duniya mein … manushye ke gun aur gyaan se bane avishkaarein bahut hai, par … hum[abhi bhi] bechaaen, asantusht [aur] ghabraaya hue hai.
…[Agar hum] Naya Niyam kholenge [hamein yeh shabd sabse pehle milenge], ‘Mere paas aao aur mai tumhe vishraam dunga, jiwan ki roti Mai hoon, jagat ki Jyoti Mai hoon, Yadi koi pyasa ho to mere paas aaye aur piye, Mai tumhe shaanti diye jaata hoon, Tum saamarthya paaoge, Tumhara mann anandit hoga’” (The Character of Jesus [1908], 7, 11, 15–16).
Purush aur mahilaa kuch had tak jinke saath rehne ko chunte hai unke hi tarah ban jaate hai.
Woh jinka aadar karte hai aur unki nakal bhi karna chahate hai bhi unhein prabhawit karte hai.
Ishu hi mahaan Uddhaaran hai.
Gehri shaanti paane ka ek ho raasta hai Parmeshwar ki or dekhkar jiwit raho.
Ishu ke baare mein kya hamare adhyan ke liye zaroori hai?
“Naye Niyam ke lekhak …[Ishu] ke kad, unke kapde ya un gharon ke jahan woh rehta tha… ki parwaah nahin kiye the.
…Woh ek charni mein paeda hua, ek kapentar ke dukaan mein kaam kiya, teen saalon tak padhaaya, aur phir krus par mar gaya.
…Naya Niyam ayse logon dwara likha gaya tha jo chahate the ki hum apna dhyaan… [Unpar] dhare (Ishu ke yogta , 21–22) ek ashwaasan ke saath ki Woh sach mein Parmeshwar ka Putra tha aur hai, duniya ka Uddhaarkarta aur Muktidaata.
Mujhe vishwaas hai ki, Uddhaarkarta ka ek nitikatha, khaaskar hamare aaj ke dinon se taalluk rakhta hai.
YahMatthew adhyaaye 13, meim likha hua hai, jaha hum padhte hai:
“Par jab log so rahe the, to uska shatru aakar gehu ke beech jangli beej bokar, aur chala gaya.
“Jab shoot nikle, aur baalein lag gayi, to jangli daane ke paodhe bhi dikhaai diye.
“Is par grahast ke daaso ne aakar usse kaha, he Swami, kya tune apne khet mein achcha beej na boya tha? phir jangli daane ke paodhe usmein kaha se aaye?
“Usne unse kaha, ‘Yah kisi shatru ka kaam hai.
Daaso ne usse kaha, Kya teri ichcha hai, ki hum jaakar unko bator lein?
“Usne kaha, Nahin; aysa na ho ki jangli daane ke paodhe batorte huwe tum unke saath gehu bhi ukhaad lo.
“Katni tak donon ko ek saath badne do: aur katni ke samay mai kaatnewaalo se kahunga ki pehle jangli daano ke paodhe batorkar jalane ke liye unke gatthe baandh lo, aur gehu ko mere anaajghar mein ikattha karo” (verses 25–30).
Manushye ke us puraane dushman ne kayi saadhanein paayi hai jisse woh jangli daano ko dur dur tak phenkega.
Uske paas tarike hai hamare apne gharon ke shudhta mein daakhil hone ka.
Bure aur duniyadaari ke tarike itne zyaada fael gaye hai ki unhe jad se hatane ka sahi raasta nahin milta.
Woh taar dwara se aate hai aur hawaai ki or se jise prayog hote jo hamein shiksha aur manoranjan ke liye banaya hai.
Jangli daane aur gehu kareeb aa gaye hai.
Jo vyakti khet ke liye zimmedaar hai ko,uske ya uski puri shakti se, woh jo achcha hai ka poshan karna chahiye aur use itna mazboot aur sundar karna chahiye ki jangli daane use nahin akarshak lagenge.
Hum Prabhu ke Girjaghar ke sadasye kitne dhanye hai hamare Prabhu aur Uddhaarkarta ke anmol susamachaar ko apne buniyaad ki tarah rehne ke liye jispar hum apna jiwan banate hai.
Mormon Dharamshaastra mein se 2 Nephi mein hum padhte hai: “Isliye, mai tumse phir kehta hoon ki agar tum sahi raaste se andar prawesh karoge, aur Pavitra Aatma graham karoge, tab woh tumhe bataega ki tumhe kya karna chahiye” (2 Nephi 32:5).
Hamein kabhi sansaar ke shor se us shaant, dhimi awaaz ko dabne aur tabaah nahin hona dena chahiye.
Hamein to pehle se chetaoni mil gayi hai in ghatnaaon ki jo hamare dinon mein ghategi.
Hamara chunaoti rahega hum kaise Prabhu ke batlaaye baaki ke ghatnaaon ke liye tayyari karenge.
Kayi log hamare chintit samaaj mein samajhte hai ki parivaar ka bhang hona sirf dukh aur niraasha laaega ek pareshaan duniya mein.
Girjaghar ke sadasye hone ke naate, hamari zimmedaari hai parivaar ko sambhaalna aur surakshit rakhna samaaj aur anantta ka mul ang banakar.
Bhavishyevaktaaon ne baar baar chetaaoni di hai parivaar ke aniwaariye aur haanikaarak parinaamon ke baare mein jab parivaar ke mulye kam ho jaaenge.
Duniya hamein dekhti rahegi, aur hamein yeh dekhna hai ki hamara uddharan Prabhu ke rache yojna ko banaye rakhna aur sahara dena hai is maranshilta ke Unke bachchon ke liye.
Sabse badhiya shiksha sachche uddharan se diya jaata hai.
Hamare ghar pavitra sthaan hone chahiye duniya ke prabhaawon ko jhelne ke liye.
Yaad rakhiye ki Prabhu ke badhiya ashirvaad sachche parivaaron ke dwara milte aur diye jaate hai.
Hamein apne maata-pita hone ki bhumika ko lagataar jaanchna chahiye.
Ek bachche ka sabse shaktishaali shiksha unke parwaah karne waale aur sachche pitaaon aur maataaon se milta hai.
Aao hum pehle maata ke bhumika ko dekhein.
Pradhaan Gordon B.
Hinckley ke is dohraane ko sunen:
“Woh mahilaaen jo ek ghar ko swarg banati hai samaaj ke liye unka yogdaan unse bada hota jo bhaari sena ka agwaai karta ya jo kisi bade vayvasaae ka mukhya hota.
Koi mulye nahin diya jaa sakta ek ka uske bachchon par prabhaao ka, ek naani/aji ka unke peedhiyon par, ya mausiyon aur bahanon ka unke anye rishtedaaro se?
“Hum mahilaaon ke prabhaao ko naap ya andaaza nahin kar sakte, jo ki apne hi tarikon se, sthir paarivaarik jiwan banati hai aur bhavishye ki peedhi ko anant achchaai ke liye poshan karti hai.
Jo nirnay is peedhi ki mahilaaen banati hai woh anantta tak prabhaawit karenge.
Mai sujhaao dena chahata hoon ki aaj ki maataaon ko mauka aur chunaoti mila hai woh sab karne ka jisse woh[ghar] ko mazboot kar sakein” (Standing for Something: 10 Neglected Virtues That Will Heal Our Hearts and Homes [2000], 152).
Aao hamare jiwan mein pita ke bhumika ko dekhein:
Pitaaen ashirvaad dete aur pavitra dharamvidhiyon ko apne bachchon ke liye pura karte hai.
Yeh unke jiwan ke dhaarmik mukhyaansh ban jaaega.
Pitaaen khud parivaar prarthnaaen, daenik dharamshaastra adhyan, aur saaptaahik gharelu shaam sabhaaon mein shaamil rehte hai.
Pitaaen parivaar ke paramparaaen banate hai ghumne ke liye yojna bana kar jismein parivaar ke sabhi sadasye shaamil rehte hai.
In saath bitaae khaas samay ke yaadein bachche kabhi nahin bhulenge.
Pitaaen apne bachchon se ek ek karke bhent karte hai aur unhein susamachaar ke siddhaant sikhlaate hai.
Pitaaen beton aur betiyon ko kaam ka mulye sikhlaate hai aur unhein apne jiwan mein zaroori lakshye banane mein madad karte hai.
Pitaaen vishwaasi susamachaar sewa ka uddhaaran dikhlaate hai.
Kripya yaad rakhein, bhaaiyon, tumhara Israel mein pita hone ka pavitra niyukti—tumhara maranshilta aur anantta ka sabse zaroori niyukti—ek aysa niyukti hai jisse tum kabhi mukt nahin hoge.
Kayi saal pehle stake sammelanon mein, hum ek film dikhaaya karte the taaki hamara mukhye sandesh aasaani se samjha jaa sakein.
Ek saal mein, Girjaghar ke stake sammelan daoro mein yaatra karte karte, hum us film mein kya hai ko achchi tarah jaan jaate the.
Hum ise asaani se dohara saktein hain.
Woh sandesh in kayi saalon mein ab bhi mere mann mein hai.
Film mein aawaaz Pradhaan Harold B.
Lee ka tha aur usmein usne apne beti ke ghar mein hue ghatna ko batlaaya tha.
Woh aysa kuch tha:
Ek shaam us ghar ki maata jaldi jaldi kuch fal batli mein bhar rahi thi taaki kaam khatam ho sake.
Ant mein bachche sone ke liye gaye the aur shaant ho gaye the.
Aab woh samay tha fal ke paas jaane ka.
Jab woh fal ko cheelne aur beej nikaal lagi, do chote betein rasoi mein aaye aur kaha ki woh apne sone jaane waale prarthna ke liye tayyaar hai.
Woh kaam rokna nahin chahati thi, maata ne beton se jaldi se kaha, “Kyun nahin tum aaj raat ka prarthna khud keh lo aur Maa fal ka kaam karti rahegi?”
Donon mein se bade bete ne apna paer thoka aur kaha, “Kya zyaada zaroori hai, prarthnaaen ya fal?” (Dekhiye Teachings of Presidents of the Church: Harold B.
Lee [2000], 143–44.)
Kabhi kabhi hum khudko ayse stithiyon mein paate hai jab hamare paas mauka hota hai ek bachchon ko ek seekh dene ka jisse unke chote jiwan mein anant asar padega.
Haan, prarthnaaen fal se zyaada zaroori hai.
Ek safal pita ya maata ko kabhi utna vyast nahin hona chahiye ki woh apne bachche ke saath ka yeh sikhlaane ka pal nahin bita paaye.
Yeh mera pakka vishwaas hai ki mere jiwan ke itne saalon mein koi bhi aysa samay nahin tha jab hamare Swarg ke Pita ke bachchon ko abhi se zyaada maata/pita ke vishwaasi, sewanisht maargdarshaate haath ka zaroorat tha.
Hamare maata-pita ek mahaan aur prabhaaoshaali viraasat hai jahan woh sab kuch daao par lagate hai taaki woh apne parivaaron ko vishwaas aur saahas ke saath paal sakein taaki agla peedhi ke paas unse bhi zyaada mauke ho.
Hamein apne hi andar us tarah ke lagan ki aatma ko paana hai aur sab chunaotiyon ka saamna karna hai balidaan ke usi aatma ke saath.
Hamein bhavishye ke peedhiyon mein hamare Prabhu aur Uddhaarkarta ke sikhshanon par zyaada nirbhar hona sikhlaana hai.
“Aur ab, mere beton, yaad rakho, yaad rakho ki tumhe apne Muktidaata, jo ki Parmeshwar ka Putra, Maseeh hai, uski chattaan par apni neev ko banana hai; jisse ki jab shaetaan apni prabal hawa ke jhakoro ko, haan bawandal ke dhure ko, apne sabhi olon aur bhishn aandhiyonke thapedon ko tumhare upar bheje, tab uske paas, woh shakti na hogi jo tumhe, khinch kar santaapo aur anant dukho ki khaai mein phenk sake kyunki jis chattaan par tumne apni neev daali thi woh nissandeh aysi neev hai jis par agar logon ne apne makaan banaye tab woh kadapi gir nahin sakte” (Helaman 5:12).
Yeh Ishu Maseeh ka susamachaar hai joy ek neev pradaan karta hai jispar hum gehri shaanti aur anant parivaar gharein bana sakte hai.
Iski mai gawahi deta hoon humare Prabhu aur Uddhaarkarta, Ishu Maseeh ke naam se bhi, amen.
utsukata aur chinta se bhara main los enjels pahuncha aur gret nardarn men ek chhote se hotal men kamara le kar tik gaya.
pahali hi sham ko mainne ek basamain holide ka tikat liya aur empres men doosara sho dekha.

Humari aatma ko Aatma swast aur nawikaran karta hai.
Prabhubhoj ka vaadha hai ki “[humare] saath humesha uska Aatma rahega.”
Ek baar ek jawaan dal ki mahilaaon ne mujh se pucha ki, “Tum kya aasha karte ho ki humare umar mein pata hota?” Agara mujhe us swaal ka abhi jawaab dena hota, main yah khata: “main aasha karta hoon ki jab main tumhare umar ka tha main prabhubhoj ker mahatav ko aur zyaada samjhta.
Main asha karta hoon ki maine Elder Jeffrey  R.
Holland ko prabhubhoj par batlaaye hue ko zyaada samjhta.
Usne kahata tha, ‘Prabhubhoj siddhaant mein ek sahaj tarke se prapt kiya hua nimataran hai ki yah ek sachcha dhaarmik anubhao, ek pavitra mel, aatma ke liye ka nawikaran hai.
’1”
Kis tarah prabhubhoj “ek sachcha dhaarmik anubhao hai, ek pavitra mel, aatma ke liye ka nawikaran hai” har safta ke liye?
Prabhubhoj ek dhaarmik shakti anubhao karane waala banta hai jab hum prabhubhoj ke prarthna ko suntey aur apne vaadon ko doharatein hain.
Yah karne ke liye, Hume Ishu Maseeh ke naam ko apne ikcha se lena chahiye.2 Is vaada ke saath, Pradhaan Henry B.
Eyring ne sikhlaya ki: “Uske zarooraton ko apni tarah jaano.
Hum Usko apne jiwan ki sabse zaroori bhaag janege.
Hum wah karege jo Wah chahata hai naaki jo hum chahatein ya jo dunuya humein karne ko sikhlati hai.”3
Jab hum Prabhubhoj ko letein hain, hum yah bhi vaada kartein hain ki “humesha”4 Ishu Maseeh ko yaad karenge.
Usko suli par chadhaane se pehle ki raat ko, Maseeh ne apne chelon ko Apne ird-grid ikatha kiya aur prabhubhoj ko sthaapit kiya.
Usne roti ko thoda, ashirwaad diya, aur kaha, “Lo, khaao; Yah meri deh hai.”5 Phir Usne katora lekar dhanyewaad diya, aur Apne Devduton ko pine ko diya, aur kaha, “Yah vacha ka mera wah laho hai … , jo bahuton ke liye paapion ki chama ke nimit bahaya jata hai.”6
Nephites aur antim dinon mein Uske Girjaghar ko dobara Punaharsthaapit karne ke liye, Usne dohraya ki hume Uske yaad mein prabhubhoj ko lena hai.7
Jab hum prabhubhoj ko letin hain, hum Parmeshwar ko gahwhi detein hain ki hum Uske Putra ko humseha yaad karenge, naaki sirf parbhubhoj ke hi samay.
Is ka matlab hai ki hum humesha Uddhaarkarta ke uddhaaran aur sikhshanon ko apne ichchaaon, apne chunaao, aur apne karye ko maargdarshan dene ke liye dekhenge.8
Prabhubhoj prarthna hume yah bhi yaad dilata hai ki hume humesha “uske aagyaon ka paalan karna chahiye.”9
Ishu ne kaha, “Agar tum mujh se prem kartey ho, mere aagyaaoun ka paalan karo.”10 Prabhubhoj hume antardiristi ka ek aosar deta hai aur Parmeshwar ki oar humare hriday aur kaarye ko mudhne ka aosar deta hai.
Aagayaoun ka paalan karne se humare jiwan mein susamachaar ki shakti, mahaan shaanti aur dhaarmikta prapt hoti hai.
Prabhubhoj sachche dhaarmik anubhao ka samay pradhaan karta hai jab hum Uddhaarkarta ke bachaane waale aur mahaan shakti ke bare mein Uske Praeshchit par sochtein hain.
Ek Jawaan Mahilaaon ki neta ne abhi haal hi hume prapt hue shakti ko sikha jab hum prabhubhoj ko laayak se lene ko jhel rahe the.
Personal Progress ke kaarye ke zarooraton ko pura karne ke liye, usne prabhubhoj ke ishubhajan aur prarthanaon parinaam banaya.
Har safta, usne prabhubhoj ke dauraan apneaap ka antardrishti se sanchaalan kiya.
Usne apne kiye hue galtiyon ko yaad kiya, aur vaada kiya kiya agle safta wah nahi dohra jayega.
Wah cheezon ko sahi tarah se kar ke aur paap se mukt hokar khush thi.
Anubhao ko yaad karke, usne kaha, “main Praeshchit ke ke paschaataap ke bhaag mein kaarye ko kar rahi thi.”
Ek Raviwaar ko uske antardrishti ke baad, wah dukhi aur niraashawaadi mehsoos kar rahi thi.
Wah dekh sakti thi ki waha wahi galti ko baar baar kar rahi thi, har safta.
Parantu phir usne vyaktigat yogna banaya ki wah Praeshchit ke mahaan bhaag ko andekha kar rahi thi—Maseeh ki na khatam hone waale shakti.
Wah bhool rahi thi ki sabhi samay par Uddhaarkarta ne use madad kiya tha wah banne mein jo use banna zaroori tha aur apne khud ke chamta se zyaada sewa ko karne mein.
Yah yaad karke, usne pehle haftey ke vishye par dobara socha.
Usne kaha: “Main apne khushi ke ahesaas ko udaasi mein badalte hue dekh rahi hoon jabki Use mujhe kai aosarein aur chamtaaein ko diya hai.
Mujhe apni chamta pata thi anpe bachche ki zarooraton ko jaane ke liye jab wah sapasht nahi tha.
Maine yah us din jaana jab maine mehsoos kiya ki main aur zyaada kuch bhi nahi kar sakti thi, main apne dost ko kewal shakti bhare shabdon ko de sakti thi.
Maine us aosar par vineet hokar dikhlaya jab mujhe uske vrodh mein karna tha.”
Usne anth mein kaha: “Jab maine Parmeshwar ko apne jiwan mein Uddhaarkarta ke shakti ko pradaan karne ke liye dhanyewaad diya, maine apne kiye hue paschaataap ke kaarye mein aur zyaada asha mehsoos kiya tha aur maine anewaale safta ke liye dobara asha ki umeed kiya tha.”
Elder Melvin J.
Ballard ne sikhlaya ki prabhubhoj kis tarah se changaai aur safaai ke anubhao ko pradaan karta hai.Usne kaha:
“Humein mein se kaun hai jo uske aatma ko haali pahuchata hai shabd, soch, ya karm ke saath, Sabbath se lekar Sabbath tak? Humun cheezon ke liye maafi chahtein hai aur aasha kartein hain ki chama prapt hogi.
… Chama prapt karne ka tarika hai … apne paapion ka paschaataap, unke liye hoga jinke khilaaf humne paap ya apraadh kiya hoga aur unse chama manga hoga aur phir prabhubhoj ke mez par dobara jaane ke liye taeyaar jaha, agar humne sahi paschaataap ko kiya hoga aur apneaap ko sahi tarike se rahka hoga, hume chama prapt hoga, aur dhaarmik changaai humare aatma ko prapt hoga.
…
“Elder Ballard ne kaha, “Main ek gawaah hoon” “ki waha par prabhubhoj ke dauraan aatma maujood rehta hai jisse tan-man mein sukh cha jaata hai; tum aatma ke ghaao ko changaai prapt kartey mehsoos karoge, aur bhoj ko kam hotey hue.
Sukh aur khushiyon un aatmaon ko prapt hota hai jo dhaarmik bhojan ke laayak aur sachchai se lene ki aasha kartein hain.”11
Humare dukhit aatma changaai aur dobara achche ho saktein hain kyunki sirf roti aur paani hume Uddhaarkarta ke balidaan Uske sharir aur khoon ko hume nahi yaad dilata hai parantu kyunki lakchan hume yah bhi yaad dilata hai ki Wah humesha humare “jiwan ki roti”12 aur “jiwan ka jal” deta hai.”13
Nephites ko prabhubhoj mein maujood karne ke baad, Ishu ne kaha:
“Jo is roti ko khata hai wah apni aatma ke liye mere sharir ka maans khaata hai; aur jo is dakhars ko pata hai wah apno aatma ke liye mera rakht peeta hai; aur uski aatma kabhi bhi na to bhukhi rahegi aur na hi pyaasi rahegi, parantu sada tatav rahegi.
“Jab, bheedh ne kha aur pee liya tab sunno, weh Aatma se bhar uteh.”14
In shabdon ke saath, Maseeh hume sikhlaatein hain ki hamari aatma ko Aatma ko swast aur nawikaran karta hai.
Prabhubhoj ka vaadha hai ki “[humare] saath humesha uska Aatma rahega.” 15
Jab main prabhubhoj ko leti hoon, main us chitra ke bare mein sochti hoon jaha punaharjiwit Uddhaarkarta Apne haathon ko faelaye hue hain, jayese ki Wah hume prem se gale lagaane ke liye khade hain.
Main is chitra ko pasand karti hoon.
Jab main is mauke ke bare mein prabhubhoj ke dauraan sochti hoon, mera aatma bhar jata hai jayese ki main Uddhaarkarta ke sahbon ko sunn rahi hoon: “Sunno, mera daya ka haath tumhari oar faela hua hai aur jo mere paas aayega, use main swikaar karunga; aur dhanye hai jo log mere paas aatein hain.”16
Aaronic Purohiti rakhne waale Uddhaarkarta ko prastuth kartein hain jab weh taeyaari, ashirwaad, aur prabhubhoj ko baatey hain.
Jab purohiti rakhne waale apne haathon se hume pavitra lakchan se deta hai, ayesa hai jayse Uddhaarkarta Khudh hi Apne daya ke haathon ko badha raha hai, hum sab ko amantrith karta hai anmol prem ke uphaaar ko lene ke liye Uske bachaane waale balidaan—paschaataap, chama, daya, aur aasha ke dwara.17
Jitna zyaada hum prabhubhoj ke vishye mein sochtein hain, utna hi pavitra aur mahatav bhara humare liye hota hai.
Yah hai jo 96-saal-umar ka pita ne jo batlaya tha jab uske putra ne pucha tha, “Pitaji, tum girjaghar kyo jaate ho? Tum dekh nahi saktey, tum sunn nahi saktey, tumhare liye chalna kitna mushkil hai.
Tum girjaghar kyo jaatey ho?” Pita ne jawaab diya, “Yah prabhubhoj hai.
Main prabhubhoj lene jaata hoon.”
Main aasha karta hoon ki hum sab prabhubhoj sabha mein taeyaar hokar aaye “ek sachche dhaarmik anubhao, ek pavitra dal, ek dobara [humare]naye aatma ke liye.”18
Main jaanta hoon ki humare Swarg ke Pita aur humare Uddhaarkarta jiwi hain.
Main abhaari hoon prabhubhoj ke us aosar ke liye jiske dwara Uske prem aur Aatma ko mehsoos kiya hai.Ishu Maseeh ke naam se, amen.

Woh hamare Uddhaarkarta ka antim raat tha maranshilta mein, us shaam se pehle jab Woh Khudko sabhi maanav jaata ko chudaane ke daan mein de diya.
Jab Usne Apne chelon ke saath roti ko toda, Usne kuch kaha jisse unke hriday mein achambha aaya hoga aur gehri udaasi bhi.
Usne kaha, “Tum mein se ek mujhe pakadwaaega.”
Chelon ne Unke kahi baat ki sachchaai nahin jaanni chaahi.
Na to woh idhar udhar dekhein, taaki kisi aur par ungli uthaae, aur kahe, “Kya woh yeh hai?”
Balki, “woh bahut udaas hue, aur har ek usse puchne laga, he Prabhu, kya woh mai hoon?”1
Mai yeh soch raha hoon ki hum kya karte agar Uddhaarkarta ne humse yeh sawaal kiya hota.
Kya hum apne aas paas waalo ko dekhte aur khud se kehte, “Shaayad yeh Bhaai Rama ke baare mein keh raha hai.
Maine hamesha uspar shak kiya hai,” ya “achcha hua ki Bhaai Rama yaha hai.
Use yeh sandesh sunne ki zaroorat thi”? Ya kya hum, us samay ke chelon ki tarah, khud ki sochte aur yeh mahatvapurn sawaal apne baare mein puchte: “Kya woh mai hoon?”
In saral shabdon mein, “Prabhu, kya woh mai hoon?” “ mein gyaan ka shuruaat aur vyaktigat samarpan aur anant badlaao hai.
Dendilaeans(Peele Zebra Phool ki tarah ka jangli phool) ka Niti Vachan
Ek samay ek aadmi tha jise shaam ke samay apne pados mein tahelna pasand tha.
Use apne padosi ke ghar ke saamne se guzarna khaas pasand tha.
Is padosi ka aangan bahut saaf sutra rehta tha, phool hamesha khilte the, ped swath aur chaao dene waala.
Aisa dikhta tha ki padsi bharpur koshish karta tha ki uska aangan sundar ho.
Magar ek din jab woh aadmi apne padosi ke ghar ke saamne se guzar raha tha, use is sundar aagan ke beech mein ek, bhaari, peeli rang ki dendilaean ka jangli ped dikha.
Yeh usko bahut vichitra laga.
Uske padosi ne ise kyun nahin ukhaada tha? Kya usne dekha nahin tha? Kya woh nahin jaanta tha ki uske beej wahi par aur jangli pedon ko na uga dein?
Yeh akela dendilaean har samay use takleef deta tha, aur woh kuch karna chahata tha is ke baare mein.
Kya woh use sirf ukhaad kar phenk sakta tha? Ya use ped maarne waale dawaai se maar sakta tha? Shaayad agar woh raat ke samay jaaye tab, woh use chupke ukhaad sakta tha.
Ghar lautte samay yeh sab baaton se uska mann bhaari ho gaya tha.
Woh apne ghar mein gaya bina apne khud ke aangan ko dekhe—jo ki kayi peele dendilaean ke phoolon se bhara tha.
Lakdiyaan aur Tinke
Kya yeh kahani hamein Uddhaarkarta ke shabd yaad dilaati hai?
"Tu kyun apni bhaai ke aankh ke tinke ko dekhta hai, aur apni aankh ka lakdi tujhe nahin sujhta? …
"… Pehle apni aankh mein se lakdi nikaal lein; tab tu apne bhaai ki aankh ka tinka bhali bhaati dekh kar nikaal sakega.”2
Lakdi aur tinke ki yeh kahani shaayad hamare khud ko na dekh sakne ki chamta ki tarah hai.
Mai nahin jaanta hum kaise itni achchi tarah se anye logon ke musibaton ko jaan jaate hai aur sujhaao bata lete hai, jabki hamein aksar mushkil hoti hai apni khud ki musibaton ko dekhna.
Kayi saal pehle samachaar aayi ek aadmi ke baare mein jo vishwaas karta tha ki agar woh apne chehre par neebu ka ras laga le, tab woh kemron ke liye gaayab ho sakta hai.
Isliye usne apne pure chehre par neebu ka ras laga liya, baahar gaya, aur do benkon mein daaka daala.
Bahut der nahin hui ki use pakad liya gaya jab usi sham ki TV ke samachaar mein uska tasveer aaya.
Jab pulis waalo ne aadmi ko Cameron se li gayi vidio dekhaaye, use khud par vishwaas nahin hua.
“Magar mere chehre par to neebu ka ras tha!” usne kaha.3
Jab Cornell Vishwavidhyalay ke ek vaygyanik ne yeh kahani suna, use dilchaspi hui ki ek aadmi apne hi asamartha ko hi nahin pehchaan paaya.
Yeh jaanne ke liye ki kya yeh ek aam samasya hai, do anusandhaankartaaon ne kolaj ke vidhyaarthiyon ko jiwan ke kuch yogyataaon se jude kuch parikshanon mein bhaag lene ke liye amantrit kiya aur phir unse pucha ki woh parinaam ke baare mein kya sochte hai.
Jo vidhyaarthi ke jawaab kamzor dikhe unke kaam karne ke dhang ke milaan mein woh apna kaam ka andaaz lagane mein sabse piche the—un mein se kuch ke parinaam jitna woh soch rahe the usse paanch guna zyaada tha.4
Yeh adhyan kayi aur tariko se kiya gaya hai, har baar yahi parinaam par aata hai: hum mein se kayi log kathinaai ka saamna karte hai apne aap ko sahi maaine mein dekhne mein, aur kaamyaab log bhi apne khud ke yogdaan ko badha kar batlaate hai aur auron ke yogdaan ko ghata kar batlaate hai.5
Utna zaroori nahin hai badha kar kehna ki hum kitna achcha gaadi chala sakte hai ya kitni dur golf ke gend ko uda sakte hai.
Magar jab hum vishwaas karna shuru kar dete hai ki ghar, kaam, aur girjaghar ke hamare yogdaan jitna hum karte hai se bada hai, tab hum apne aap ko andha kar dete hai ashirvaadon aur mauko ko dekhne se jiske zariye hum khud ko badhiya tarikon se pragati dila sakte the.
Andekhe Dhaarmik Sthaan
Mera ek pehchaan waala, ek ward mein rehta tha jiska darja Girjaghar mein uncha tha—sabhaaon mein lagbhag sabhi log aate the, gharelu shikshan ke pratishat zyaada the, Praathmik ke bachche hamesha achche kaede ke rehte the, ward mein bhojan ke samay badhiya bhojan aata tha jo ki sabhaghar ke farsh par bahut kam girta tha, aur mujhe lagta hai kabhi Girjaghar ke naachon mein kabhi ladaai nahin hoti thi.
Mera dost aur unki patni ko baad mein mission par jaana pada.
Jab woh teen saal baad laute, yeh dampati achambhe mein the ki jab woh baahar sewa pradaan kar rahe the, us ward mein 11 dampatiyon ka talaakh ho chuka tha.
Bhale hi ward ke paas har baahari ishaara tha vishwaas aur shakti ka, unke dilon aur sadasyon ke jiwanon mein kuch ashubh ho raha tha.
Aur takleef ki baat yeh hai ki yeh stithi naya nahin hai.
Ayse bure aur aksar bekaar ke cheez hote hai jab Girjaghar ke sadasye susamachaar ke siddhaanton se dur ho jaate hai.
Baahar se woh Ishu Maseeh ke chelein lagenge, magar unke dilon ke andar unhonne Uddhaarkarta aur Unke shikshan ko alag kar diya hai.
Woh dhire dhire dhaarmik cheezon se dur ho gaye hai aur duniya ke cheezon ke kareeb ho gaye hai.
Jo purohiti rakhnewaale kabhi-yogye the khud ko batlaane lagte hai ki Girjaghar achcha hai mahilaaon aur bachchon ke liye magar unke liye nahin.
Ya kuch log santusht hai ki unke paas samay nahin ya alag paristhitiyaan unhein daenik shradha aur sewa se mukt karti hai jisse woh Aatma ke kareeb rahenge.
Is yug mein jahan log apne aap ko sahi saabit karte hai aur khud se bahut zyaada prem karte hai, aasaan ho jaata hai bahane banana ki kyun Parmeshwar se prarthna nahin karein, dharamshaastra adhyan baad mein kyun karein, Girjaghar sabhaaon aur gharelu shaam sabhaaon se dur rahe, ya imaandaari se daswa hissa aur bhenton ko na bhare.
Mere pyaare bhaaiyon, kya tum apne dilon mein jhaankoge aur saral sawaal puchoge: “Prabhu, kya woh mai hoon?”
Kya tum—thoda bhi—bhatak gaye ho “ashish bhare Parmeshwar ke susamachaar…se, jo [tumhare] bharose mein saopa gaya tha”?6 Kya tumne “is sansaar ke parmeshwar” ko mauka diya ki tumhare budhi ko andhi kar dein taaki “Maseeh ke vishaal susamachaar ka prakaash” tum par na chamke”?7
Mere priye doston, mere priye bhaaiyon, khud se pucho, “Mera dhan kaha hai?”
Kya tumhara hriday is sansaar ke suvidha waale cheezon mein tika hai, ya woh parishrami Ishu Maseeh ke shikshan par kendrit hai? “Kyunki jahan tumhara dhan hoga, wahan tumhara dil bhi hoga.”8
Kya Parmeshwar ki Aatma ka gehra prabhaao tum par hota hai? Kya tum Parmeshwar aur tumhare bhaai bandhuwon ke prem mein “jad pakde hue aur neev daale hue” ho.
Kya tum paryaapt samay aur rachne ka gun lagate ho apne vivaahit jiwan aur parivaar mein? Kya tum apna sab kuch Ishu Maseeh ke punahsthaapit susamahcaar ke lakshye ko paane aur jeene ki “aasaar, aur lambaai, aur unchaai, aur gehraai”9 mein dete ho?
Bhaaiyon, agar yeh tumhari ichcha hai (ki apneaap mein) Maseeh jaise gunon ko laao jaise ki “vishwaas, sadgun, gyaan, santulan, shaanti, bhaai se dayaluta, ishwartav, dayaluta, vinamrata, [aur sewa],” 10 Swarg ke Pita tumhe Apne haathon ke aozaar banaenge kayi logon ko uddhaar dilaane ke liye.11
Woh Nirikshit Jiwan
Bhaaiyon, hum mein se koi nahin batlaana chahata ki hum sachche raah se bhatak rahe hai.
Aksar hum apne andar nahin dekhna chahate aur apne kamzoriyon, paabandhiyaan, aur dar ka saamna nahin karna chahate.
Isi kaaran, jab bhi hum apne jiwanon ka nirikshan karte hai, hum aysa ek filtar ke madad se karte hai jahan tarafdaari, bahano, aur kahaniyon se hum khud ko batlaate hai ki hamare soch aur karam ayogye nahin the.
Magar apne aap ko saaf rup se dekhna hamare dhaarmik badhanti aur tandurusti ke liye zaroori hai.
Agar hamare kamzoriyaan aur trutiyaan parchaaiyon mein reh jaaye, tab Uddhaarkarta ka mukti dene waalu shakti unhein change nahin karegi aur mazboot nahin banaegi.12 Pratikul tarike se, hamara andhera hamare maanav kamzoriyon ke prati bhi hamein divye saobhaagye ke prati hamein andha karta hai jo ki hamare Pita chahate ki hamare andar rahe.
Tab hum kaise Parmeshwar ke shudh raushni ke sachchaai ko apne hridayon par chamkaaenge aur khud ko dekhenge jaise Woh hamein dekhta hai?
Mai sujhaao deta hoon ki pavitra dharamshaastra aur bhaashanein jo maha sammelan mein diye gaye the ab ek upyogi seesha hai jo hum dekh sakte hai khud-nirikshan karne ke liye.
Jab tum pracheen aur abhi ke bhavishyevaktaaon ke shabdon ko sunte ya padhte ho, yeh mat soche ki kaise yeh shabd kisi aur par laagu hote hai par yeh saral sawaal puchiye: “Prabhu, kya woh mai hoon?”
Hamein apne Anant Pita se tute hriday aur shiksha paane waale mann se aaye.
Hamare andar seekhne aur badlaao laane ki ichcha rehni chahiye.
Aur, haan, hum kitna kuch paate hai hamare Swarg ke Pita ke jaisa jiwan jeene ka nirnay karne se.
Woh jo seekhna aur badalna nahin chahate nahin seekhenge aur badlenge aur ho sakta hai oh sochne lagenge ki Girjaghar unhein kya deta hai.
Par jo log badal kar aur pragati karna chahate hai, jo Uddhaarkarta se seekhna aur Unke jaisa banna chahate hai, jo khud ko chote bachche ki tarah vinamra kar lete hai aur hamare Swarg ke Pita se apne soch aur karmon ko milaana chahate hai—woh Uddhaarkarta ke Praeshchit ke chamatkaar ko anubhav karenge.
Woh zaroor Parmeshwar ke badhiya Aatma ko mehsoos karenge.
Unhe ek vineet aur ahankaar rahit hriday ka parinaam anubhav hoga.
Unhe Ishu Maseeh ke sachche chelein banne ki ichcha aur kaeda se ashish milega.
Achchaai ki Shakti
Mere jiwan mein, mujhe mauka mila hai is duniya ke kuch sabse mehnati aur budhimaan purush aur mahilaaon ko jaanne ka.
Jab mai chota tha, mujhe prasannta milti thi unhein dekh jo padhe likhe, sampan, safal, aur jinhe duniya dwara prashansa milta tha.
Magar in varshon mein, mainne yeh jaana hai ki mujhe zyaada khushi milti hai ashcharyejanak aur ashishbhare logon ko dekh jo sach mein achche aur bina chal ke hote hai.
Kya susamachaar achchaai ke baare mein nahin, aur kya yahi susamachaar hamein deta hai? Yaho to achchi khabar hai, aur yeh hamein madad karta hai achcha banne mein.
Devdut James ke bol aaj hum par laagu hota hai:
“Parmeshwar abhimaaniyon ka virodh karta hai, par deeno par anugrah karta hai.
…
“Prabhu ke saamne deen bano, aur woh tumhe unchaai tak pahunchaaega.”13
Bhaaiyon, hamein apne ghamand ko bagal karna hai, apne dikhaawe ko nazarandaaz kar dena hai, aur vinamrata se puchna hai, “Prabhu, kya woh mai hoon?"
Aur agarPrabhu ka jawaab hoga “Haan, mere putra, kuch cheezon mein sudhaar laani hai, woh cheezein jismein Mai tumhare madad kar sakta hoon,” mai prarthna karta hoon ki hum is jawaab, vinamrata purwak apne paapon aur khaamiyon ko swikaar karenge, aur phir apne rawaiya ko badlenge achche patiyon, achche pitaoun,achche putron ki tarah ban kar.
Hum is samay se aage puri koshish karein Uddhaarkarta ke ashish bhare raaste par sthirta se chalne ke liye—kyunki khud ko spashtta se dekhna gyaan ka shuruaat hai.
Jab hum aysa karenge, hamara uddaartapurwak Parmeshwar hamare haath pakde hamein le jaaega; Prabhu hamein “balwaan banaega, aur Parmeshwar dwara hamein ashirvaad milega.”14
Mere priye doston, ek pehla kadam is vishaal aur sampurn chelapan ke maarg par chalne ka shuruaat hota hai woh saral sawaal puchne se:

shahar ke kone men boodhe baragad ke ped ke niche pakshiyon ki sabha men sare pakshee vyathit evan udas the.
aaj unhonne kuchh aavashyak muddon par faisala karane ke lie is sabha ka aayojan kiya tha.
pakshiyon ke saradar vriddh tota ne sabha ko sanbodhit karate hue kaha ki - mere priy sathiyon - aaj hamari sthiti bahut dayaniy ho gayi hai.
shahar ka vatavaran bigadate ja rahe hain.
hamare ghar aaj asurakshit hain.
ek samay tha jab hamari chahachahahat se sara mahaul goonj uthata tha.
apane parivar v sage sanbandhiyon ke sang ham nishchit aanandapoorn jivan bitate the.
yah bag hamari bhookh mitata tha.
pas ke sarovar ka mitha pani hamari pyas bujhata tha.
bade-bade pedon ki chhanv men hamare nid surakshit the aur ham hamare bachchon ke lie anaj, dana, fal chunane befikr hokar jangal ka bhraman karake sham ko lautate the.
fir rat ko chain ki nind bhi sote the.
par aaj mahaul badal gaya hai.
manav apani pragati ke khatir pedon ko nasht karake karakhane bana raha hai.
yah mangalamay vatavaran shreehin ho gaya hai.
aaj ham hamare bachchon ko nishchint chhodakar dana chugane nahin ja sakate.
unaki suraksha ki koi garanti nahin.
sham ko ham apane nid ko trasat pate.
tadapate hue bachche aur foote hue andon ko dekhakar man bhari ho jata.
subah ke nikale ham thake hare laut aate.
aashray ke lie ped bahut kam hi milate aur door udate-udate hue hamare pankhon men dard hone lagata.
aankhon se pani aane lagata.
fal chugane jate to falon men pahale jaisa svad bhi nahin hai.
shayad falon ke utpadan ko badhane ke lie usamen aavashyak rasayanik padarth milae jate hain.
vayu men bhi pradooshan ki vajah se sans lene men takalif si hoti hai.
prayaH ghutan mahasoos hoti hai.
gale men jalan hone lagate aur pani pine ke lie saf jal ke lie ham taras se jate hain.
pani yadi milata bhi hai, to milavat ki vajah se svadarahit hota hai.
hamari pyas hi nahin bujhati.
sabhi pakshiyon ne saradar ki baton par hami bharate hue aavashyak kadam uthane ki gujarish ki.
ek kaue ne kaha bard-floo ki vajah se hamare anaginat murgi bhai mare gae.
saradar ne is bat par apana khed prakat karate hue do minat ki maun sabha rakhi.
gauraiya ne kaha - dana chugane hamen kafi unchi unchi imaraton men jana padata hai aur udate-udate pankhon men dard aur thakavat aa jati hai.
poora vatavaran bigad raha hai - kabootar bhaiyya ne apani or se varta aage badhai.
sabha men fir maun chha gaya.
fir maina ne kaha - kya isaka koi hal nahin?
tabhi achanak sundar si pakshiyon ki jodi aasaman se gir padi.
bhookh, pyas aur thakavat ke mare ve nirjiv se ho gaye the.

sab yah janane ke lie hairan the ki ye pakshiyan kahan se aai hain?
ham pravasi pakshee hain.
hamare desh men atyadhik thand ki vajah se ham is samay bharat men apane din gujarate hain.
pahale jab ham door yatra tay karake aate to pedon ki chhanv men thodi der aaram karate.
parantu aaj kitani buri sthiti hai.
ped to bahut kam hai aur unhen dhoondhate-dhoondhate ham thak gaye.
hamare poore sharir men bahut pida ho rahi hai.
pankhon men ab shayad udane ki takat nahin.
sabhi pakshiyon ne un pravasi pakshiyon ka svagat kiya, un ki poori tarah dekhabhal karake apane mehaman ka aadar-satkar kiya.
pravasi pakshiyon ne kaha - ham desh-desh bhatakate rahate hain.
is prakar ki pareshaniyon ka samana hamen har pradesh men karana padata hai.
vaigyanik tarakki, audyogikaran, praudyogikaran ke karan poora vishv bigad raha hai.
prakriti ki sundarata men bhi grahan lag raha hai.
aakhir kab tak aisa chalata rahega?
kya hamara bhavishy isi tarah asurakshit rahega? sabha men ashanti fail gai.
saradar ne shant hone ka sandesh dete hue kaha - doosaron ko dosh dene ke bajae ham yadi hamari taraf se kuchh kar saken to kaisa rahega? ham bhala kya kar sakate hain? - koyal ne apani surili aavaj men kaha, - koyal bahana! ham jo fal khate hain kyon n un bijon ko sadak ke kinare door-door dal den taki vah kalantar men ped ka roop le le.
yah prayas kis had tak kamayab hoga isaka kuchh pata nahin, lekin prakriti ki raksha ke nate ham yah chhota-sa prayas karake dekh to sakate hain, kyon bhaiyon, kya thik kahi n? pravasi pakshiyon sahit sabhi pakshiyon ne apani sahamati prakat ki.
manushy ek vicharavan prani hai.
use sahity, samaj aur parivesh se prapt manas sanvedanon ke sandeshon se jin anubhootiyon kee upalabdhi hoti hai, unake hi vimarsh se naee-naee vyakhyaon ko aadhar milata hai.
yuva chintak evan lekhak tatha bharatiy dak seva ke adhikari krishn kumar yadav ka nagarik uttar pradesh, lakhanaoo se prakashit dvitiy nibandh sangrah ''anubhootiyan aur vimarsh" isi chintan, manan aur vivechan ko aadhar deti manasi vritti ka parinam hai, jisamen lekhak ne sahity aur sahityakar, vyakti aur samaj, vigyan aur praudyogikee, vaishvik chetana tatha sanskritik adhyayan ke anek aadhunik aur uttar aadhunik tathyon ko vyakhyayit karane ka prayas kiya hai.
lekhak ka isase poorv ''abhivyaktiyon ke bahane" namak nibandh sangrah prakashit ho chuka hai.
prashasanik seva men rahakar bhi chintan manan karana evan sahityik lekhan karana apane aap men ek vishisht upalabdhi hai.
rajakeey seva ke dayitvon ka nirvahan aur shreshth kritiyon kee sarjana ka yah mani-kanchan yog viral hai.
krishn kumar yadav ke nibandhon men unaka bahuaayami chintan mukhar huaa hai.
samikshy nibandh sangrah 'anubhootiyan aur vimarsh' men krishn kumar yadav ke vibhinn patra-patrikaon men prakashit vibhinn 15 lekhon ko nibandh sangrah ke roop men sankalit kar prastut kiya gaya hai.
is sangrah ke nibandhon ko tin bhagon men banta ja sakata hai-vyaktitv v krititv par aadharit nibandh, sanskritik pratimanon par aadharit nibandh evan samasamayik v jvalant muddon par aadharit nibandh.
vyaktitv v krititv aadharit lekhon men desh ke moordhany sahityakaron v manishiyon - munshi premachand, rahul sankrityayan, manohar shyam joshi, amrita pritam v da0 ambedakar ke janm se mahaprayan tak ke safar ko kramashah lipibaddh kar bikhare manakon ko ekatr kar mala ke roop men taiyar kar unake jivan-sangharsh v bharatiy samaj men yogadan ko rekhankit karane ka sarthak prayas kiya gaya hai.
aaj jab har lekhak pustak ke madhyam se sirf apane bare men batana chahata hai, aise men 'anubhootiyan aur vimarsh' men tamam sahityakaron v manishiyon ke bare men padhakar sukoon milata hai aur is prakar yuva pidhi ko bhi inase jodane ka prayas kiya gaya hai.
lekhak kee shreshth-jivan moolyon ke prati prakhand aastha, bharatiy sanskriti ke prati agadh anurag tatha samagrata bharatiyata ke prati ekanishtha kee sprihaniy chetana se prannavan ye nibandh hindi jagat kee sthayi nidhi hain.
inamen lekhak ka svadhyay tatha abhivyakti kee nishchhalata apane poorn vaibhav ke sath vidyaman hai.
vaigyanik vishleshan kee dakshata lekhak men hai, isalie usaka kathy pratyek pathak ka kathy ban gaya hai.
premachand hindi sahity hi nahin vishv sahity ke patal par manushy kee yatharth jindagi ke hamarahi rahe hain.
svatantrata poorv ke varshon men jab bharatiy samaj anek kuritiyon aur visangatiyon ke karan sabhi naitik moolyon se chyut ho raha tha, tab is lekhak kee kahaniyon men vyapt pragatishil vicharon aur janajagriti ke sandeshon se sahity lokahit ke sanvardhan ka ek naya aandolan bana tha.
rashtraprem, stree vimarsh, jatipratha, ashiksha, nirdhanata, sadhanahinata, kisan, majadoor,sarakari tantr aadi ke tatkalin svaroop aur unake parinam aur dushparinam premachand ke sahity men kis prakar rache base hain, krishn kumar yadav kee is pustak men gambhir adhyayan ka vishay banakar ubhare hain.
premachand ke oopar aaj jis tarah ke aakshep kiye ja rahe hain, unakee rachanayen jalayi ja rahi hain, unakee prasangikata par saval khade kiye ja rahe hain, aise men yah lekh aur bhi mahatvapoorn ho jata hai.
bahubhashavid, dharm, darshan aur adhyatm ke talasparshi vidvan, yayavar, mahamanav rahul sankrityayan ka sampoorn jivan prayogik gyan ke karmashil chetan ka vikasasaman svaroop tha.
unhonne kisi ek dal ke daladal ko kabhi nahin svikara tha.
vah vidrohi aatma ke jyortimay pragya puroosh the.
vivechana ke kram men shree yadav ne apane kathanon ko rahul ji ke jivan darshan se, unake lekhan se tatha unakee rajanaitik aur pragatishil avadharanaon ke sandarbhon se bahuvidh sanvar kar jis jatil bauddhikata se mukt kiya hai, vah pathak ke man ko samaj, sabhyata, sanskriti, itihas, vigyan ityadi se anupranit manishi ke sanyas se samyavad tak le jakar us bhavabhoomi par pratishthit karane ka prayas hai, jahan lekhak kahata hai- ''bhago nahin duniya badalo."
manohar shyam joshi ka bahuaayami sahityik vyaktitv, unaka aam aadami ke lie lekhan, patrakarita ke uchch aadarsh, hamalog, buniyad, jaise dharavahikon ke sarjak tatha kyap jaise sahityik srijan ke lie akadami puraskar prapt karana sahity ke itihas kee abhootapoorv upalabdhi hain .
''kho gaya kissagoee" shirshak se is pustak ke lekhak ne paramparaon, roochiyon aur vimarshon ke jivant uddharan uddhrit kiye hain, jo joshi ji ke prati shraddhanjali hai.
amrita pritam ke yogadan par hindi jagat men sashakt roop men adhik nahin likha gaya hai, aise men amrita pritam ko, jitane najadik se shree yadav ne dekhane ka prayatn ''gum ho gaya rasidi tikat" namak lekh men kiya hai svayan men ek jigyasapoorn satat utsukata ka nirvah karati kahani ka kathanak hi lagata hai.
''daliton ke masihah do0 ambedakar" ko ambavadekar se apane is nam tak pahunchane ke lambe safar men jin samajik visangatiyon se hokar chalana pada tha tatha apane katu anubhavon se unhonne jo kuchh prapt kiya tha, unase vichalit n hote hue kis prakar shikshavid rajanitigya, arthashastree, vidhivetta aur sanvidhan nirmatree parishad ke mahatvapoorn pad tak pahunchakar ek sarvamany neta banane men safalata paee thi, usaka vivaran bhi 'anubhootiyan aur vimarsh' ke prishthon par ankit hai.
do0 ambedakar ke antarvirodhon par charcha ke sath-sath vartaman rajanaitik-samajik parivesh men jis prakar unhen bhunaya ja raha hai, us par bhi charcha karake is lekh ko aur bhi aayam diye ja sakate the.
bharatiy sanskriti ke pratiman vishayak lekhon men ''nari shakti ke utkarsh" men samaj men nari-vikas ke vibhinn charanon kee vyakhya karate hue vartaman parivesh men nari jagat dvara prapt kee ja rahi oonchaeeyon ko ingit kiya gaya hai, chahe vah panchayati raj dvara ho ya ghareloo mahila hinsa adhiniyam dvara ho ya roodhivadi varjanaon ke todane dvara ho.
deh vimarsh ke daur men yah lekh apani prasangikata sthapit karata hai.
'itihas ke aayam' men lekhak ne aitihasik dharoharon ke mahatv ko paribhashit karate hue, hal ke dinon men itihas purnalekhan ko lekar uthate savalon ke bich itihas kee vibhinn dharaon ko rekhankit kiya hai.
'bharatiy pariprekshy men dharmanirapekshata' lekh men pashchaty v bharatiy sandarbhon men dharm kee tulanatmak mahatta ko rekhankit karate hue bharatiy samaj men dharm ke avadanon v vibhinn samayon men dharmik ekata ko darshate hue antatah sanvaidhanik upabandhon ke madhyam se vartaman samaj men dharm ka vishleshanatmak vivechan kiya gaya hai.
lekhak ka kathan bada satik hai ki- 'tushtikaran kee nitiyon ke bich hamane ek dharmanirapeksh rajy ko to apana liya hai par dharmanirapekshata abhi tak hamare samajik jivan ka ang nahi ban payi hai.
'bharatiy sanskriti aur tyauharon ke rang' is sangrah ka sabase lamba lekh hai.
isamen lekhak ne desh ke kone-kone men manaye jane vale mahatvapoorn tyauharon, inake pichhe chhipi manyataon, riti-rivajon aur aitihasik ghatanaon, unako manane ke dhangon men vividhata aur unakee prasangikata par rochak dhang se prakash dala hai.
lekhak ne is lekh ke madhyam se antatah samajik samarasata, rashtriy ekata v akhandata evan tyauharon- parvon ko manane kee mool manaviy bhavanaon ko sanjone kee koshish kee hai.
yadyapi is lekh men bharatiy tyauharon par vistrit janakari hai lekin pongal aadi dakshinanchal aur uttaranchal ke tyauharon ko jodakar ise aur bhi rochak banaya ja sakata tha.
aadhunikata aur uttar aadhunikata ke drutagami vikas ke badhate charan jis prakar nit naye gyan aur vigyan ke aalokamayi jharokhe kholate ja rahe hain, unase hi yuvaman chakachaundh ke bhoolabhulaiya poorn jivan men digabhramit ho raha hai.
filmi duniya, usamen vyapt jivan moolyon ko tilanjali deti naee pidhi aur us adhogaman kee or utsukata bhari nigahon men vastavik jindagi se door ke sapane to chinta ka vishay hain hi, vidyarthiyon ka rajanitigyon dvara shoshann, shiksha ka gunatmak avamoolyan, netritv kee akshamata, sahity, kala, sanskriti aur gyan kee avahelana se upaji nakaratmak soch, ''yuva bhatakav kee sthiti kyon" shirshak lekh men bahut satik dhang se ukeri gaee hai.
in sabhi lekhon men lekhak kee tathyatmak drishti bina kisi bhavukata ke, bina kisi atyukti ke bharatiy sanskriti kee sachchi nishtha se parichalit hai.
poorvagrahon se mukt krishn kumar yadav kee lekhani prachinata evan aadhunikata ka samanvay prakat karate huye ek vimarsh khada karane men safal rahi hai.
bhoomandalikaran ek vastavikata hai.
soochana-praudyogikee aur yatayat ke sadhan tatha aarthik udarikaran ke daur men jivan ke sabhi paksh prabhavit hue hain, fir bhasha aur sahity aprabhavit kaise rah sakate hain? hindi bhasha par isaka kya prabhav huaa hai aur kya hoga, is tathy ko vartaman men dekhate hue atit ke lekhan aur patrakarita ke itihas tak pahunchata lekhak 'bhoomandalikaran ke daur men hindi' dvara anek sarthak prashn karata v unaka uttar dhoondhata pratit hota hai.
'bhoomandalikaran ke daur men teji se badhate bharatiy kadam' men lekhak ne 1990 ke bad arthavyavastha men teji se aaye uchhal ko rekhankit kiya hai aur udghoshana kee hai ki - 'bharat ko ek bar fir se jagadguru kee bhoomika nibhane ke lie taiyar ho jana chahie.' bajarikarann, drishy aur shravy midiya, bahurashtriy kampaniyan, upabhoktavad aadi ka ''brand imej kee mahatta" "shirshak lekh men tatha ''intaranet ka badhata prabhav" men vishv-gram kee najadikiyon se bhasha, sanskriti, vyapar, vyavasay, shiksha aur jivan ke sabhi kshetron kee soochanaon ke upalabdh hone ke sadhan roop men bhi is pustak men charcha ka vishay bana hai.
''koching sansthaon ka failata mayajal" bhi lekhak ke drishtipatal se gujara hai aur usane koching sansthanon dvara apanayi jane vali takanikon evan unake mayajal men fansate samany vidyarthiyon kee durdasha par bebakee se prakash dalate hue koching vyavastha ke chalate vidyalayon men adhyapan ke girate star par bhi chinta vyakt kee gayi hai.
'anubhootiyan aur vimarsh' sankalit nibandh varnnanatmak hote hue bhi tathyaparak gambhir vaicharikata ke vimarsh hain.
lekhon men aankade jutane men lekhak ne kafi shram kiya hai.
unamen rochak shaili men kahi gaee vishayavastu ka sahityik moolyankan kiya gaya hai.
parat dar parat naye-naye sandesh jan grahay bhasha men diye gaye hain aur pramanik sandarbh prastut kiye gaye hain.
lekhak ne atyant saral-subodh bhasha men varnit vishayon ko badi gaharaee men pakada hai.
nibandhon ke bich upayog men layi gayi ghatanayen, drishtant ityadi gady jaisi niras vidha men rochakata ka samavesh karate hain aur lekhan ko tarkapoornn-tathyapoornn-praman sammat banate hain.
krishn kumar yadav ne is pustak men sahity aur sahityakar, vyakti aur samaj, vigyan aur praudyogikee, vaishvik chetana tatha sanskritik adhyayan ke anek aadhunik aur uttar aadhunik tatvon ko vyakhyayit karane ka prayas kiya hai.
lekhan kala men prabandh ya nibandh ka sahity men mahatvapoorn sthan hota hai.
is pustak ke lekhak ne us apeksha kee poorti ka prayatn kiya hai.
nibandh ke svaroop vivechan men hi nahin balki unake sampadan men bhi lekhak ne apani shodhaparak drishti dvara vishay-vastu ko aitihasik taratamy kee chasani ke sath paros kar apani lekhani ke kaushal ka parichay diya hai, jo nishchay hi pathakon ke lie upayogi ban pada hai.
kul milakar krishn kumar yadav ka alp samay men yah doosara nibandh sangrah 'anubhootiyan aur vimarsh' ek mahatvapoorn upalabdhi hai jo bade shram, vivek aur visheshata ke sath sadhy huyi hai.
ek prashasak hone ke sath-sath manaviy sanvedanaon se gahare roop men jude hue krishn kumar yadav ka yah sankalan vaishvik jivan drishti, aadhunikata bodh tatha samajik sandarbhon ko vividhata ke anek staron par samete hindi nibandh ke jis poore paridrishy ka ehasas karata hai vah nibandh kala ke bhavi vikas ka soochak hai.
lekhak ne parampara se hatakar ek naye marg ka anusaran karake nibandh vidha ko ek naya aayam dene ka prayas kiya hai.
sarvatha naee shabd yojana, naee prasangikata, naee anubhootiyan aur naee vimarsh shaili ke sath yah ek dastaveji nibandh sangrah hai, jo vicharon kee dharohar hone ke karan sangrahaniy bhi hai.
kul milakar pratipady, bhasha, shaili-tinon hi drishtiyon se ye nibandh prashansaniy hain.
inakee prastuti sarvatha svagat yogy hai.
yadi paanee gir raha hai ya kohara chhaaya hai ya dono hee ek saath ho raha hai ya dono ek saath nahee ho raha hai - kanDeeshan koee bhee ho - bas der se hee aegee.
yadi aapako der ho rahee hotee hai tab bas aur bhee deree se chalatee hai, aur har sambhaavit-asambhaavit sTop par rukatee hai.
yadi aap sochate hai ki aapako apanee bas pakaDane me bahut samay bacha hai to ya to aapane koee galat samay saariNee dekh lee huee hotee hai ya fir vah saariNee puraanee paD chukee hotee hai.
yadi aap samay se jaldee pahunch jaate hai to bas leT ho jaatee hai aur yadi aap leT hote hai to bas samay se pahale chhooT chukee hotee hai.
bas sTop par intajaar me bitae ge us pratyek pal me bas ke pahunchane kee sambhaavana nagaNy hee hotee hai.
yadi kisee din aapake paas chillar nahee hota hai to us din kanDakTar ke paas bhee chillar nahee hota hai.
bas ka kanDakTar kisee bhee yaatree ko bina koee safaee die kisee bhee samay kahee par bhee utaar sakata hai.
bas sTop par intajaar karate samay ek hee sthaan ke lie do bas ek saath hee aa jaatee hai parantu aapako jaana kahee aur hota hai.
bas ke saamane chhapa hua gantavy sthal sirf bas kee sajaavaT ke lie hota hai - bas ka gantavy nahee.
bas ke lie bitaaya gaya intajaar ka samay bas me kee jaane vaalee yaatra ke kul samay se baDa hota hai.
jis bas ko aap pakaDana chaahate hai vah hamesha hee aapake pahunchane ke paanch minaT pahale chhooT chukee hotee hai aur jo bas aap antata: pakaD paate hai vah pahale hee das minaT kee deree se chal rahee hotee hai.
agar dhoolabharee aandhee chal rahee hogee to bas me aapakee seeT kee khiDakee ka sheesha TooTa hua hee milega.
yadi aapako apane rooT kee antim bas pakaDanee hotee hai to vah bas aapake pahunchane ke Theek pandrah sekaND pahale chhooT chukee hotee hai.
jitanee dafa aap kanDakTar se yah poochhenge ki aapake gantavy par bas kab pahunchegee, kanDakTar dvaara na bataane kee sambhaavana utanee hee jyaada hogee.
intajaar karate karate jab aap thak haar kar sigareT sulagaate hai ya paas ke Thele se chaay lekar pahala ghoonT bharate hai ki bas aa jaatee hai.
yadi aap yah sochakar ki bas jaldee aegee - sigareT sulagaate hai ya chaay ka aarDar dete hai to bas deree se hee aatee hai.
bas sTop par jab aap kisee khoobasoorat stree (ya smaarT puroosh) se jaise hee batiyaana praarambh karate hai, naamaaloom kahaa se bas aa jaatee hai.
manushy kee ab tak kee sabase utkarshT, ujjaval, chamakeelee sarjana jo usakee kaalpanikata kee aseemitata ko bakhoobee darshaatee hai - bas kee samay saariNee hai.
yadi aapako kisee din majabooree me bas me jaana hota hai to aapakee bas roD jaam kee vajah se sabase lambe rooT par chalatee hai.
samay aur rooT se pare, siTee base hamesha hee pahale se jyaada bharee huee milatee hai.
bas ka antim yaatree hamesha hee bas ke aakhiree sTop par utarata hai.
jab aap leT ho rahe hote hai to ruT par milane vaale sabhee Traifik siganal laal hee milate hai.
kanDakTar ho ya yaatree - bas me kabhee bhee kisee ke paas bhee uchit chillar nahee hota hai.
khoobasoorat stree (ya smaarT puroosh) agale hee sTop par utar jaatee(ta) hai aur jo bagal ka bevakoof aapako fokaT kee kahaanee sunaata hota hai bas se utarata hee nahee.
jab aap bas sTop kee or ja rahe hote hai aur bas ke raaste kee or dekhate hue jaate hai ki bas aa rahee hai ya nahee to bas nahee aatee hai aur jab aap nahee dekhate hai to bas aakar saamane se nikal jaatee hai.
jab aap intajaar karake thak haar kar bas sTop se jaane lagate hai tabhee bas aatee hai aur aapake paas dauD kar bas pakaDane ka avasar nahee hota.
bas me aapake bagal kee seeT me chaahe koee bhee aa jae - vah apane mobail fon se apane har sambhav parichito se batiyaane lagata hai.
ham donon, yoonivarsiti men do varsh sath padhe the.
donon men ghanishthata vahin se thi lekin jab donon kee, ek hi daftar men naukari lag gaee to, ham donon ke sanbandh aur pragadh ho gae the.
raghu baboo, bade sahayogi prakriti ke aadami the.
daftar ka koee bhi aadami, kisi aafat vipatti men fans jae, rog bimari se ghir jae, to raghubaboo, vahan pahale pahunchate the.
apana ghar parivar chhod, rat-rat, bimar ke sirahane baithe rahate the.
aur kahin, vaisi sthiti mere sath, ya mere patni bachchon ke sath ghat jae, to ve apani patni ko sath lekar mere ghar pahunch jaya karate the aur pati patni, sab kuchh aisa samhal liya karate the jaise koee saga apane ko sanbhalata hai.
raghubaboo men is khasiyat ke sath, ek khasiyat aur bhi thi vah yah ki ve bada haesod aur vinodi tabiyat ke aadami the.
unake pas kisse kahaniyon chutakulon aur jumalon ka bahut bada pitara tha.
mauka chahe sanjidagi ka ho ya udasi ka ya too too main main ka bich men ve apane jumalon kee aisi futakee fod diya karate the ki, mahaul kee garmi aur kasodh, pal bhar men hi chhoomantar ho jaya karati thi.
rote hue ko hansa dena to, raghubaboo kee chutakiyon kee bat thi.
nae jumale, ve aanan-fanan men, gadh liya karate the aur use ve, kuchh is andaj men kah dete the, ki use sunakar, hansate hansate logon ke pet men, bal pad jaya karate the.
aur maje kee bat to yah thi ki raghubaboo, apani baton se to, logon ko hansa hansa kar lotapot kar diya karate the, lekin kya majal, jo unake chehare par hansi ka, ek chhota sa bhi tukada kahin dikh jae.
vahi raghubaboo ek din achanak bimar pad gae the.
bimari bhi unakee aisi vaisi nahin thi.
un par dil kee badi khataranak aur jan leva bimari ne hamala bol diya tha.
bimari ke chalate, unaka chalana firana kaun kahe, bistare par uthana baithana tak band ho gaya tha.
unakee bimari kee khabar, jab mujhe mili to main bhagakar unake ghar pahuncha tha.
raghubaboo kee jo hal thi, us samay, use dekh, main buri tarah ghabara gaya tha.
raghubaboo, apane bistar par bejan se pade hue the.
unaka damakata chehara, ekadam se bujh chuka tha.
aankhon men unake, pida mishrit bhishan udasi thi.
dadhi unakee kafi badh gaee thi.
raghubaboo utan bistare par pade hue the aur unake donon hath, unake sine par bejan se pade hue the.
nigahen unakee siling par sthir thin aur ve gahari soch men doobe hue the.
patni unakee, unake payatane, bisoorati baithi huee thi.
raghubaboo ko us halat men dekh, main thodi der tak to avak khada raha tha, isake bad, apane ko dridh karata, dhire dhire, unake pas pahuncha tha.
kya huaa - bhaee ji aapako ? unake sine par pada unaka hath, apane hathon men lekar, use sahalate hue unase poochha tha, to raghubaboo ne, mujhe koee javab nahin diya tha.
javab men, unakee aankhon se jhar jhar jharajhar aansoo jharane lag gae the.
raghubaboo kee patni, jo abhi tak, unake payatane bisoorati, udas baithi huee thi mujhe aaya dekh, ve bhi susuk susuk kar rone lag gaee thin.
donon ko rota dekh main aur jyada ghabara gaya tha.
isaka matalab, ab, raghubaboo ka ant, ekadam najadik aa pahuncha hai aur ve kisi bhi kshan apani ih lila samapt kar, is lok se bida ho lenge.
raghubaboo, mujhe hamesha hamesha ke lie, chhod kar chale ja rahe hai, yah bat dimag men aate hi mera dil baithane lag gaya tha.
man men aaya tha, ki raghubaboo ko pakad loon jor jor se rokar unase kahoon aap mujhe is tarah akela chhodkar nahin ja sakate bhaee jan, main aapako jane nahin doonga.
lekin us samay, mere aisa kuchh karane ka matalab tha, raghubaboo ke marane ke pahale hi, unhen mar dena.
main mard hoon aur aise maukon par, mujhe dridh hona hoga.
mujhe aisi koee bat nahin karani hai, jisase ki, raghubaboo ke bhitar kee kamajori aur badh jae aur unakee maut unake oopar havi hokar unhen jo do char dinon aur zinda rahana hai, usake pahale hi unhen apane sath le ude.
yahi sab soch kar main raghubaboo se lipat kar vilap karane ka apana irada badal diya tha aur dilasa dekar unhen dridh karane kee sochane lag gaya tha.
lekin, raghubaboo ko koee dilasa doon, usake pahale, jan to loon, ki aakhir unhen huaa kya hai?
bhaee jan aapako huaa kya hai? apane hathon men bejan sa aur thanda pada raghubaboo ka hath, sahalate hue, unase poochha tha to unhonne, apane donon hathon se, aansuon se tar apani aankhen ponchh, apana dahina hath apane sirahane le jakar vahan se ek lifafa nikal mujhe pakada diya tha.
lifafe ke bhitar daktar khetan, hriday rog visheshagy ke letar paid par, unaka preskripsan aur sath men do tin janch riport natthi thi.
unhen padhakar raghubaboo kee bimari janane kee koshish kiya tha lekin daktar sahab kee likhavat aisi thi ki use padh hi nahin saka tha aur daktari bhasha men likhi janch riport bhi mere palle nahin padi thi.

'' vyangy lekhan ek bahut kathin karm hai jisamen apane ko chhipane ki chaturai nahin chalati hai .
vyangy lekhan aur aatmakatha lekhan men chaturai nahin chalati hai .
aap vyangy ke madhyam se aisi mar karate hain jo mar ho aur lage bhi nahin .
prem janamejay apane lekhan ke dvara aisa hi kathin karm kar rahe hain .' ye udgar prasiddh aalochika nirmala jain ne prem janamejay ke, 'aksharam' dvara hindi bhavan dilli men aayojit, 'granth akadami' dvara sadyaH prakashit vyangy sankalan 'kaun kutil khal kami' ka lokarpan karate hue vyakt kie .
unhonne sabase pahale lekhak ko badhai di ki vah rachana ke akal se bahar nikal aaya hai .
unhonne lekhak ki is bat ki bhi prashansa ki ki usamen imanadari jinda hai aur isi imanadari ke tahat usane bhoomika men apane rachana-akal se sangharsh karane men ravindr kaliya aur gyan chaturvedi ke sahayog ko rekhankit kiya hai .
prem janamejay ke vyangy apane prahar men nishthur hain par unamen manaviyata nirantar bani hui hai .
nirmala jen ne prem janamejay ke lekhakiy fakkadpan ki prashansa bhi ki .
mukhy atithi do.
kanhaiyalal nandan ne kaha ki prem janamejay jaise 'khataranak' rachanakaron se savadhan rahana chahie kyonki inaki drishti bahut paini hai .
inaki kalam imanadar kalam hai jo apani visangatiyon par bhi behichak prahar karati hai .
ve dishayukt prahar karate hain aur nirarthak bahakate nahin hain .
unhonne kaha ki kutil khal kami ke garmagarm bajar men kaun nangai kar raha hai aur kaun is sabamen ujala dikh raha hai isaka gyan yah sankalan deta hai .
gyan chatuverdi ne kaha ki main is sankalan ko ek upanyas ki tarah, bahut sare kam chhodkar, ek hi siting men padh gaya, yah kitab ki takat ko batata hai .
prem janamejay ne is kitab ke dvara nai jamin todi hai aur sahi jagah todi hai .
prem ne ret men bij dalane ka kam kiya hai .
unhonne apani soch ko todkar bahar aane ka prayas kiya hai .
pradip pant ne prem janamejay ki muhavaredar bhasha aur vishay vaividhy ki prashansa ki .
unhonne kaha ki prem janamejay un gine chune vyangy lekhakon men hain jo tatkalik ghatanaon par matr vyangyatmak tippaniyan nahin karate hain apitu door tak mar karane vali rachana ka srijan karate hain .
aur yahi karan hai unaki rachanaon men netaon par vyangy kam hain .
harish naval ne kaha ki prem ka vyangy prayojaniy vyangy hai .
prem ne bhoomika men apane jis akal ki charcha ki hai, vo akal nahin hai bahut dinon se jis jamin par koi fasal nahin us jamin ke adhik urvar hone ki prakriya hai .
ye parati ke bad ki parati-katha hai .
prem janamejay jaisa bhashik prayog hamare samay ke vyangyakaron men bahut kam hai .
divik ramesh ne kaha ki prem janamejay un gine chune vyangyakaron men se hain jinhonne vyangy ko foohad hone se bachaya hai .
bhasha par inaki pakad bahut gahari hai .
prem janamejay ki rachanaon men ek tarah ki mahakavyatmakata hai .
ye khatara mol lete hue vyangy karate hain aur svayan ko bhi kataghare men rakhate hain .
prem ki rachanaon men hasy ki kami hai aur ye vyangy ke sath hasy ka ghalamel kam hi pasand karate hain aur yahi karan hai inaka hasy bhi chutila hota hai .
