is nadi ke sanskar mokshadayi hone ke karan isake tatavarti gram sanskritik tirth ke roop men jane gaye.
magar mahanadi ke tat par basa nagar shivarinarayan sanskritik aur sahityik donon tirth hai.
san 1861 men jab bilasapur ko jila banaya gaya to prashasanik suvidha ke lie bilasapur ke alava shivarinarayan aur mungeli ko tahasil banaya gaya.
san 1880 men suprasiddh sahityakar bharatendu harishchandr ke mitr aur sahapathi thakur jagamohanasinh jo ek bahut achchhe kavi aur aalochak the, chhattisagadh ke dhamatari men tahasiladar hokar aaye.
do varsh ve yahan rahe aur sthanantarit hokar shivarinarayan aa gaye.
yahan ke nadi-nale aur pahadi ka prakritik saundary unhen bahut bhaya aur yahan rahate hue unhonne kaee granthon kee rachana kar dali.
shivarinarayan ko unakee karyasthali kaha jaye to atishyokti nahin hogi.
yahan unhonne kashi ke ''bharatendu mandala'' kee tarj men ''jagamohan mandala'' banakar chhattisagadh ke bikhare sahityakaron ko sametane ka sadprayas kiya jisamen ve safal bhi hue.
kadachit yahi karan hai ki shivarinarayan ek ''sahityik tirtha'' ke roop men bhi prasiddhi pa saka.
pandit hiraram tripathi jagamohan mandal ke ek jagamagate nakshatr the.
bhoole bisare rachanakaron ko yad karana apani parampara kee pahachan ke sath rin shodh bhi hai.
vartaman kee sahi pahachan ke lie atit kee sajhedari aavashyak hai.
atit ko ulatane palatane ka makasad un bhooli bisari kadiyon se apane ko jodna hai jinase hamara vartaman samoortit huaa hai.
jatiy smritiyon se judkar hi sahity yugabodh kee sahi pahachan kar sakata hai.
bahuaayami aur bahurangi rachanadharmita kee pahachan hindi men pahali bar bharatendu yug men milati hai.
kavita ke pravah ke samanantar natak, nibandh, upanyas aur samalochana ka pravah isi kal men dikhaee deta hai.
bharatendu yang ka mahatvapoorn aur ullekhaniy tathy hai- hindi kavita ka kendr sankraman.
is yug men hindi kavita vyaktigat aur darabari roochiyon se hatakar nagar roochiyon men sankramit hoti hai.
inase kavy sanchetana ke samoohik vikas ke naye kendron ko janm diya.
kashi aisa hi ek pramukh kendr tha aur is kendr ke nyookliyas the- baboo bharatendu harishchandr.
aalochakon aur itihasakaron ne badi shiddat ke bad is tathy ko svikar kiya hai ki us samay kee sahityik gatividhiyan bharatendu harishchandr kee parishkrit sahityik suroochi evan jagarookata ke falasvaroop kendrit hokar naye vatavaran niyojit karane men pratifalit huee thi.
us yug kee sahityik gatividhiyon kee ek jhalak hamen chhattisagadh men bhi dekhane ko milati hai.
in sahityik gatividhiyon ka kendr mahanadi ka tatavarti gram shivarinarayan tha aur thakur jagamohanasinh usake nabhikendr the.
unhonne yahan ke aath sajjan vyaktiyon ka parichay apani kriti ''sajjanashtaka'' men diya hai jinamen pandit yadunath bhogaha, mahant arjunadas, mahant gautamadas, makhan sav, pandit hiraram tripathi, mohan pujari, rishiram aur ramanath pramukh hain.
sajjanashtak ke bare men ve likhate hain.
pandit hiraram tripathi mahant gautamadas ke atyant priy the.
unhin kee aagyanusar unhonne pandit rishiram dvivedi aur pandit vishveshvaraprasad tripathi ke sahayog se ''shree shivarinarayan mahatmya'' ko sanskrit se hindi bhasha men anuvad karake sanshodhit kiya.
yah pustak sanvat 1944 men balaram pres rajanandaganv se prakashit huee.
isakee bhoomika prajahitaishi ke sanpadak shree bhagavanadatt sharma ne likhi hai.
shree shivarinarayan mahatmy ke bare men tripathi ji likhate hain:-
shivarinarayan katha gautamadas mahant
lakhi ichchha rachyau dvij hira yah granth.
ve yah bhi likhate hain ki yah kshetr aadikal se siddhapith raha hai aur isi karan har yug men is kshetr kee apani visheshata rahi hai.
kadachit yahi karan hai ki rishi muniyon ne ise apani sadhana ka kshetr banaya.
satayug ke uttararddh men yahan matang rishi ka gurookul aashram tha, jise vishv ka prachinatam gurookul vishv vidyalay mana jata hai.
shabari yahan kee paricharika thi jisake joothe ber khane shreeram aur lakshman yahan aaye the.
balmikee ramayan men bhi ullekhit hai:-
matangashishyatast trasannrishasah susamahitah
teshan bharabhitapranan vanyamaharatan guro .
is kshetr ko siddhipith kahe jane kee pushti yahan ke mandiron men devataon kee mala lie sadhanarat moortiyon se hoti hai.
kahana n hoga ki yahan rishi-muniyon ko siddhi prapt hoti thi.
kadachit isi karan alag alag yugon men yahan kee mahima ka bakhan karate hue pandit hiraram tripathi likhate hain- ''saunakadik rishiyon ke shree narayan kshetr ke bare men poochhane par soot ji bhagavat dhyanakar is maha utaam mahatmy kahate bhaye ki he munigan ekagrachitaa hokar suniye.
narayan kshetr ko sakshat bhagavatdham janiye.
vah narayan ka kala roop hai.
is kshetr ka aadi nam vishnupuri, dvitiy nam ramapur, tritiy nam baikunthapur aur chaturth nam narayannapur yuganukram se janiye.
vahan chitrotpala-ganga ke tat par punyaroopi kanan mandit sindooragiri parvat ke nikat sakshat avinashi shree narayan virajaman hain.
unakee charan ko sparsh karati huee pavitr ''rohini kunda'' sthit hai.
suprasiddh sahityakar shree batusinh chaihan ne rahini kund ko ek dham bataya hai:- ''rohini kund ek dham hai, hai amrit ka nira'' jabaki pandit malikaram bhogaha ne use mokshadayi bataya hai.
shree shivarinarayan mahatmy ke alava tripathi ji ne do pustaken aur likhin hain jinamen bhakti vishayak padavaliyan hain.
hastalikhit unakee ye pustaken aprakashit hi rahin aur kal ke gart men sama gaee.
unakee bhakti vishayak padavaliyan chhattisagadhi rahas men khoob prachalit thi.
aaj bhi yatr tatr unake dvara likhit pauranik kathaon ka vachan pandit log karate hain.
unake kavy to logon ko kanthasth the.
dekhie unaka ek kavy.
pandit hiraram tripathi nihayat sajjan puroosh the.
ve gahare aasthavan vyakti the.
bhagavan shreekrishn ke prati unamen gahari bhakti thi.
jan kalyan chetana se unaka vyaktitv sampann tha.
ve ahan chaitany se shoony bhole bhale udar manushy the.
sahridayata to unamen koot kootakar bhari thi.
shree shivarinarayan mahatmy ko unhonne mahant gautamadas ji kee prerana se sanshodhit aur anuvadit kiya tha.
is bat ko ve svayan kahate hain.
aise satpuroosh ka janm san 1826 men uttar pradesh ke unnav jile ke durban namak gram men huaa tha.
ve kisi kary ke silasile men chhattisagadh ke bemetara gram aaye.
vahan se ve ratanapur aaye.
yahan unakee mulakat kasadol ke malagujar misir ji se huee.
ve unhen kasadol le aaye.
kasadol men tripathi ji malagujari kee dekharekh aam mukhtiyar ke roop men karane lage.
aam mukhtiyar ke roop men unhonne malagujari ko bahut achchhe dhang se chalaya.
yahan kee prakriti pradatt sushama unake kavi man ko jaga diya aur ve yahan kavy rachana karane lage.
tabhi shivarinarayan ke tatkalin tahasiladar aur suprasiddh sahityakar thakur jagamohanasinh kasadol aaye aur hiraram tripathi kee kavy dhara se bahut prabhavit huye.
unhonne tripathi ji ko shivarinarayan aane ka nimantran diya.
bad men unakee niyukti yahan tahasil ke khajanchi ke pad par kar di.
san 1891 men tahasil mukhyalay shivarinarayan se janjagir aa gaya aur isi ke sath tripathi ji saparivar janjagir aa gaye.
yahan ve arjinavisi karane lage.
jivan kee antim yatra bhi unhonne yahin poori kee.
unake mrityoparant unaka parivar kahan chala gaya, isakee sahi janakari nahin milati.
tripathi ji kee rachanaen ek aasthavan vyakti kee bhavanubhooti hai.
ek simit sarokar ko lekar unaka rachana sansar hamare samane aata hai.
yah simit sarokar dharm aur aastha ka hai.
unamen aastha ke nam par vaishnnavavadita hai.
unakee vaishnnavavadita madhy yugin vaishnnavavadita se alag hai.
unake kavy men jo bhakti niroopan hai, usaka svaroop vyapak aandolan ya samajik vyapti men n hokar simit tatha sankeern vyaktigat nishtha par hai.
tripathi ji kee bhakti bhavana men aastha ka sanpradayik roop nahin hai.
unakee bhakti bhavana men sagun nirgun sabhi ekakar hai.
unake jivan kee ramamay jhankee prastut hai.
Prabhu humko amantrit karne ke liye verb ka istemaal karta hai: “Mere paas aao,” “Mere piche ho le,” “Mere saath chalo.” Har ek baar yeh kuch kar dikhane ka nimantran tha.
“Kyunki dekho, Prabhu sabhi deshon ko, apne raashtra aur bhaasha mein, apni vaani ki shiksha logon ko deta hai.”1 Aaj yeh dharamshaastra ki purti ek baar phir hui hai jab mujhe apne ehsaas batlaane ka maoka mila hai apne maatra bhaasha mein.
Woh 1975 tha, jab mai Uruguay-Paraguay Mission mein ek jawaan prachaarak tha.
Mission par mere pehle mahine mein, zone ke netaaon ne ek gatividhi rakhi ek susamachaar ke siddhaant ko dikhlaane ke liye.
Zone ka har prachaarak ke aankh par patti baandhi gayi, aur hamein batlaya gaya ki hamein ek patle maarg par chalke ek bade kamre tak jaana tha.
Hamein ek hi neta ki aawaaz ko sunkar, jo pehle se batlaya gaya hai, uske paas pahunchna hai.
Haalaanki, hamein chetaoni di gayi thi ki safar ke daoraan, hamein kayi aawaazein sunaai dengi jo hamein uljhaega aur gumraah karna chahenga hamare maarg se.
Kuch minato tak aawaazon ko sunne, baate karne ke baad, aur—iske daoraan—ek awaaz jisne kaha, “Mere piche ho lo,” mai nidar tha ki mai sahi aawaaz ka picha kar raha hoon.
Jab hum bade kamre tak pahunche, hamein apne aankh ki patti ko kholne ko kaha gaya.
Jab maine aysa kiya, maine jaana ki wahan do dal the aur mai us dal mein tha jisne galat aawaaz ka picha kiya tha.
Mainne apneaap se kaha, “Yeh aawaaz to bilkul sahi aawaaz ki tarah sunaai de raha tha.”
Un 39 saalon pehle ka anubhav mere upar lambe samay ka prabhaao chod gaya.
Maine khud se kaha, “Kabhi bhi, galat aawaaz ko nahin sunna.” Phir maine khud se kaha, “Haan, Prabhu, Main Aapke Piche Ho Lunga.”
Mai ek anubhav batlaana chahata hoon Uddhaarkarta ke komal nimantran ko lekar hamare liye:
“Achcha charwaaha mai hoon, aur mai apni bhedon ko jaanta hoon.
…
“Mere bhedein mera aawaaz sunte hai, mai unhein jaanta hoon, aur woh mere piche piche chalti hai.”2
“Unke piche chalne” ka nimantran sabse saral, sidha, aur shaktishaali nimantran hai jo hum paate hai.
Woh ek saaf aawaaz se aata hai jisse hum uljhenge nahin.
Prabhu humko amantrit karne ke liye verb ka istemaal karta hai: “Mere paas aao,” “Mere piche ho le,” “Mere saath chalo.” Har ek baar yeh kuch kar dikhane ka nimantran tha.
Yeh sabhi manushye jaati ke liye hai uske dwara jo bhavishyevaktaaon ya Bhavishyevakta hai, shikshakon ka Shikshak, Parmeshwar ka Putra, Maseeha hai.
“Mere Paas Aao” ka Nimantran
“He sab parishram karne waalo aur bojh se dabe hue logon, mai tumhe vishraam dunga.”3
Tum mein se jo abhi Girjaghar ke sadasye nahin hai ko yeh nimantran prachaarakon ke aawaaz se milega, “Kya tum Mormon Dharamshaastra padhoge? Kya tum prarthna karoge? Kya tum girjaghar jaaoge? Kya tum Ishu Maseeh ka uddhaaran par chaloge aur adhikaar rakhe hue se baptisma loge?”4 Aaj tum is nimantran ka kaisa jawaab doge?5
Mai aapko amantrit karta hoon is sandesh ko sunne aur swikaarne ke liye yeh kehkar, “Haan, Prabhu, mai Aapke piche ho lunga!”
Carlos Badiola aur uska parivaar, Minas, Uruguay ka, prachaarakon ke saath bhent kar rahe the.
Kyunki elders paath ke daoraan kayi sawaal puchte the, unhonne tay kiya ki woh ek gaersadasye padosi—ek sundar 14-varsh ki Norma namak ladki—ko bulaenge jawaab dene mein madad karne ke liye.
Norma bahut hi utsuk haae skool vidhyaarthi thi jo is varsh skool mein Bible (dharamshaastra) adhyan kar rahi thi, isliye jab prachaarakon ne usse ek sawaal pucha, Norma turant jawaab de deti.
Woh ek “mahatvapurn jaanjhkarta thi.” Us din a paath Gyaan ke Shabd (Word of Wisdom) par tha.
Jab woh prachaarakon ke saath paath karke ghar pahunchi, Norma jaan gayi thi ki use kya karna hai.
Usne apni maa se kaha, “Maa, ab mujhe dudh ke saath coffee milakar mat dena.
Sirf dudh dena.” Uske us nirnay se uska ichcha dikh raha tha ki woh Maseeh ka nimantran swikaar karna chahati thi, jo prachaarakon ne usse pucha tha.
Donon Carlos Badiola aur Norma ne baptisma liya.
Baad mein, Norma ke uddharan ko dekh kar, uske maata, pita, aur bhaai bahan ne bhi baptisma liya.
Norma aur mai ek saath bade hue us chote magar shaktishaali shaakha mein.
Baad mein, jab mai prachaar sewa se waapas laota, hum ne shaadi kar li.
Mujhe hamesha pata tha ki use apne saath rakhkar Uddhaarkarta ke piche ho lena aasaan ho jaaega.
Jo vyakti is Girjaghar ka sadasye hai aur ne is nimantran ko swikaar kiya hai har saptaah prabhubojh lene se is vaade ko phir se leta hai.
6Is vaade ka thoda bhaag ki aagyaaon ka paalan karna; aysa karne se tum kehte ho, “Haan, Prabhu, Mai Aapke piche ho lunga!”7
“Mere Paas Aao” ka Nimantran
“Mere paas aao” Prabhu ka nimantran tha dhani yuvak ke liye.
Us dhani aadmi ne apne jiwan bhar aagyaaon ka paalan kiya tha.
Jab usne pucha mai aur kya karun, use ek saaf nimantran ke saath jawaab mila: “”Aao, … mere paas.”8 Haalaanki, bhale hi nimantran saral tha, woh bina balidaan ka nahin tha.
Uske liye mehnat chahiye tha—nirnay aur kriya ke saath.
Bhavishyevakta Nephi ne khud ke baare mein socha jab usne sawaal kiya: “Woh [Ishu] maanav vansh se kehta hai: Tum mera anukaran karo.
Isliye, mere priye bhaaiyon, bina Pita ki aagyaaon ka paalan kiye hum kya Maseeh ka anukaran kar sakte hai?”9
“Uske paas aao,” Unki aawaaz ko sunne, aur uspar amal karne ka nimantran shuruaat se prachaarakon ka sandesh raha hai, kayion ko madad kiya hai achchaai ke liye apne aap ko badalne mein.
Pachaas (50) saal pehle prachaarakein mere pita ke ghadi banane waale dukaan mein aaye ek ghadi ki maramat karwaane ke liye.
Jaise sab achche prachaarak karte hai, unhonne is maoke ka faaeda uthaaya aur mere pita aur maata se susamachaar ke baare mein baat ki.
Mere pita ne prachaarakon ko swikaar kiya, aur meri maata ne Maseeh ke sandesh aur nimantran ko apnaaya.
Us din se aaj tak, woh Girjaghar mein sakriye rahi hai.
Usne kaha, “Haan, Prabhu, mai Aapke piche ho lungi!”
Jab tum Unke paas aane ki koshish karoge, tumhe shakti milegi jiwan ke bojhon ko sehne ka, chaahe shaaririk ya aatmik, aur andar se achcha badlaao anubhav karoge jo tumhe khush rehne mein madad karega.
“Mere saath Chalne” ka Nimantran
Enoch ko kathin, kathor-hriday waale logon ke paas susamachaar prachaar karne ke liye bheja gaya tha.
Woh uske yogye nahin mehsoos kar raha tha.
Use sandeh hua ki kya woh aysa kar paaega.
Prabhu ne uske mann ko shaant kiya aur uske vishwaas ko mazboot kiya “Mere saath chalo” nimantran ke zariye—ek nimantran jo, ek andhe ki laathi ya ek dost ke haath ke jaisa hota, kisi ke hum safar ban sakta hai jo nishchayi nahin hai.
Uddhaarkarta ka haath lekar aur Unke saath chalne se, Enoch ne paaya ki woh saahasi ho gaya aur ek achcha prachaarak aur ek bhavishyevakta ban gaya.10
“Mere paas aao” aur “mere piche ho lo” ka nirnay niji hai.
Jab hum is nimantran ko swikaar karte hai hamare lagan ka darja badh jaata hai, aur tab hum “Uske saath chal” sakte hai.
Is darje par hum Uddhaarkarta ke saath nazdeeki rishta bana sakte hai—pehla nimantran swikaarne ka hamara fal.
Norma aur mai ne vyaktigat rup se “mere paas aao” aur “mere piche ho lo” ka nimantran ko swikaar kiya.
Phir, ek saath, ek dusre ko sahara dete hue, hum ne “Unke saath chalna seekh liya hai.”
Use dhoondhne aur Unke piche ho lene ke koshish aur lagan ko tohfa milega zaroori ashirvaad ka.
Yeh thi us mahila ki kahani jo, bahut mehnat se, Uddhaarkarta ka kapda chuh paayi thi11 aur phir ya Bartimaeus jo andha tha ki tarah jiska ichcha zaroori tha uske jiwan mein ghate chamatkaar mein.12 Donon kisson mein shareer aur aatma ki changaai hui thi.
Apna haath aage badhaao, Unka kapda chu lo, Unka nimantran swikaar karo, aur kaho, “Haan, Prabhu, mai Aapke piche ho lunga!” —aur Unke piche chalo.
“Mere paas aao,” “Mere piche ho lo,” aur “Mere saath chalo” nimantranon ke shakti adhik hai—aap logon ke liye jo use swikaar karte hai—taaki tum apne aap ko badlo aurandar ek badlaao laao jo tumse kehlaaega, “[Mai] shaetaan ke kaaryon ko nahin karunga, par sadeo achche karam hi karunga.”13
Us badlaao ke kaaran, tumhe kamzor ki madad karne ka, latke hue haathon ko uthaane ka, aur kamzor ghutnon ko mazboot karna ka ichcha jaagega.”14
Hum aaj kya kar sakte hai “Unke saath chalne ke liye”?
1.
Apne ichcha ko pura karo Maseeh ka behtar chela bankar.15
2.
Is ichcha ke liye prarthna karo taaki Unmein tumhara vishwaas badhe.16
3.
Dharamshaastron mein se gyaan paao, raasta dikhlaate hue aur tumhare badlaao ke ichcha ko mazboot karte hue.17
4.
Turant nirnay lo aysa karne ka aur kaho, “Haan, Prabhu, mai Aapke piche ho lunga!” Sirf sachchaai jaanne se tumhari duniya nahin badal jaaegi jabtak tum gyaan ko karm mein na badloge.18
5.
Apne nirnay mein parishrami bano in siddhaanton ko har din karne se.19
Hamare priye bhavishyevakta, Pradhaan Thomas S.
Monson, ke shabd hamein Uddhaarkarta ke nimantran ko swikaarne aur karne mein uksaate hai.
Pradhaan Monson ne kaha: “Woh mahima ka Raaja kaun hai, yeh praaniyon ka Prabhu? Woh hamare Swami hai.
Woh hamare Uddhaarkarta hai.
Woh Parmeshwar ka Putra hai.
Woh hamein Mukti Dilaane Waala hai.
Woh kehta hai, ‘Mere piche ho le.’ Woh sikhlaata hai, ‘Jaao, aur waisa hi kar.’ Woh niwedan karta hai, ‘Mere aagyaaon ka paalan karna.’”20
Aao hum aaj nirnay banae ki hum apne bhakti ka darja aur Parmeshwar se lagaao ko badhaaenge, aur tab shaayad Unke nimantran ka hamara jawaab zor aur saaf se sunaai dega: “Haan, Prabhu, mai Aapke piche ho lunga!”21 Prabhu Ishu Maseeh ke pavitra naam se, amen.
karava chauth bharat men mukhyatah uttar pradesh, panjab, rajasthan aur gujarat men manaya jata hai.
is parv par vivahit auraten apane pati kee lambi umr ke liye poore din ka vrat rakhati hain aur sham ko chand dekhakar pati ke hath se jal pikar vrat samapt karati hain.
is din bhagavan shiv, parvati ji, ganesh ji, rkatikey ji aur chand kee pooja karati hain.
shurooaat aur mahatvah
is parv kee shurooaat ek bahut hi achchhe vichar par aadharit thi.
magar samay ke sath is parv ka mool vichar kahin kho gaya aur aaj isaka poora paridrishy hi badal chuka hai.
purane jamane men ladkiyon kee shadi bahut jaldi kar di jati thi.
aur unhen kisi doosare ganv men apane sasural valon ke sath rahana padta tha.
agar use apane pati ya sasural valon se koee pareshani hoti thi to usake pas koee aisa nahin hota tha jisase vo apani bat kah sake ya usase madad mang sake.
usake apane parivar vale aur rishtedar usakee pahunch se kafi door huaa karate the.
aur us jamane men na to telifon hota tha, na to bas aur na hi tren.
is tarah ek rivaj kee shurooaat huee ki shadi ke samay jab dulhan apane sasural pahunchegi.
to use vahan ek doosari aurat ko dost banana hoga jo umr bhar usakee bahan ya dost kee tarah rahegi.
ye dharm-sakhi ya dharm-bahan ke jaisa hoga.
unakee mitrata ek chhote se hindoo poojan samaroh dvara shadi ke samay hi pramanit kee jayegi.
ek bar dulhan aur is aurat ke dharm-sakhi ya dharm-bahan ban jane ke bad jindagi bhar is rishte ko nibhayengi.
ve aapas men sagi bahanon jaisa bartav karengi.
bad men kisi tarah kee pareshani hone par, chahe vo pati ya sasural valon kee taraf se ho, ye donon auraten aapas men bat kar sakati hain ya ek doosare kee madad kar sakati hain.
ek dulhan aur usakee dharm-sakhi (dharm-bahan) ke bich is mitrata (sambandh) ko ek parv ke roop men manaya jane laga.
is tarah karava chauth kee shurooaat huee.
pati kee bhalaee ke lie pooja aur vrat isake bahut bad men shuroo huaa.
aisi aasha hai ki is parv kee mahatta ko aur badhane ke lie ise purani kathaon ke sath jod diya gaya.
aur kisi bhi halat men pati is parv ke sath hamesha juda rahega kyonki do dharm-sakhiyon ke bich is pavitr sambandh ke din kee shurooaat ke lie jaroori hai dulhan kee usake sath shadi ka din.
aur is tarah usake is dharm-sakhi ke rishte ke samaroh ke dauran patni dvara pati ke liye pooja aur vrat rakhana kafi had tak achchha karan mana ja sakata hai.
is tarah, moolatah karava chauth is dharm-sakhi (dharm-bahan) ke rishte ko fir se navin roop dene aur manane ka salana parv hai.
ye us samay kee ek sarvashreshth samajik aur sanskritik mahanata thi jab duniya men batachit ke tarikon kee kami thi aur aana-jana itana aasan nahin tha.
paramparagat katha (rani viravati kee kahani) : bahut samay pahale viravati nam kee ek sundar ladkee thi.
vo apane sat bhaiyon kee ikalauti bahan thi.
usakee shadi ek raja se huee thi.
shadi ke bad pahale karava chauth ke mauke par vo apane mayake aa gaee thi.
usane bhi karava chauth ka vrat rakha.
lekin pahala karava chauth hone kee vajah se vo bhookh aur pyas bardasht nahin kar pa rahi thi.
aur chand ke ugane ka intajar karane lagi.
usake saton bhaee usakee ye halat dekhakar pareshan ho gaye.
vo apani bahan se bahut jyada pyar karate the.
unhonne viravati ka vrat samapt karane kee yojana banaee aur pipal ke patton ke pichhe se aaeene men nakali chand kee chhaya dikha di.
viravati ne ise asali chand samajh liya aur apana vrat samapt kar khana kha liya.
rani ne jaise hi khana khaya vaise hi samachar mila ki usake pati kee tabiyat bahut kharab ho gaee hai.
rani turant apane raja ke pas bhagi.
raste men use bhagavan dyankar parvati devi ke sath mile.
parvati devi ne rani ko bataya ki usake pati kee mrityu ho gaee hai kyonki usane nakali chand dekhakar apana vrat tod diya tha.
rani ne turant kshama mangi.
parvati devi ne kaha, ''tumhara pati fir se jinda ho jayega lekin isake liye tumhen karava chauth ka vrat kathorata se sanpann karana hoga.
tabhi tumhara pati fir se jivit hoga.'' usake bad rani viravati ne karava chauth ka vrat poori vidhi se sanpann kiya aur apane pati ko dubara prapt kiya.
is parv ke bare men bahut si kathayen prasiddh hain jinamen satyavan aur savitree kee kahani bhi bahut prasiddh hai.
Kya aap amir ban na chahte hain? Ye rahe Dhongibaba ke 16 zordaar upaay.
Inhe apnaiye aur paison ke dher mein nahaiye.
1.
Apne nazdik ke chaurahe par baithkar hamari bhavishyvani sunao aur karodo kamao, ek-ek se 501 rupiya lena.
Dhanda apni jagah, yaari dosti apni jagah.
Hamara hissa pura 20% hai, yaad rakhna.
Gaddari karne ki bhool na kar baithna kyunki hamare dhongiwindows software mein sab ki khabar hoti hai.
2.
Apna naam badal kar Mobilewale baba ya daphliwale baba ya aur koi baba rakh lo.
Uske baad kisi bheed-bhaad waali jagah mein ghoomo.
Jitne zyaada log tumhe dekhenge utna zyaada chadava tumhe prapt hoga.
Chadave ka 10% hamara hoga.
3.
Apne Account ke saare paise hamari dhongibaba co-op bank mein account khulva kar transfer kardo.
Tumhara dhan ka chaar guna tumhe wapas milega.
Is janam mein ya agle janam mein, chaar guna to mil hi jaayega.
4.
Har mahine apni aamdani ke 10% hisse se dhongi bumper lottery kharido.
Har lottery ke ant ke 3 ank ek samaan hone chahiye.
Aur intezaar karo – 5-7 saalon mein tumhari bhi lottery niklegi.
5.
Shaam/raat ko kisi bar ke paas khade hokar ande becha karo.
Bahut se sharaabi tumhe sharaab ke nashe mein 2 rupaye ke badle 100-200 de jaayenge.
6.
Raddi/Kabaad ikattha karke use becho.
Duniya ki nazron mein us kabaad se kuch nahi aata.
Laabh hi laabh hai bachha kabaad mein.
Zara socho khud ko tum kabaad bechte hue kitne pyare dikhoge.
Thode dinon mein kabaadi king kehlaoge.
7.
Tumhare jitne bhi jaan pehchaan ke log hain sabhi se 1-1 rupiya maang lo.
Yaad rakho boond-boond se hi ghada bharta hai.
Aur sabse badi baat ki jab tum sabse 1 rupiya maagoge to use waapas koi nai maangega.
Isiliye aaj se hi ek rupiya maangna shuru kar do.
8.
Unlimited talktime wala phone lekar ek PCO khol lo.
Fir kya hai, mahine ke ant mein jab tum iska munaafa dekhoge to ulte pair hamare ashram ki taraf mithai ka dabba lekar aaoge, ye vaada hai hamara.
9.
Aajkal ke logon ko kuch kaam dhandha to hai nahi, isiliye to wo bewakoofon ki tarah taveez aur angoothiyon mein paisa kharch kiya karte hain.
Jald hi mauke ka faayda uthakar ye dhandha apna lo.
Hamari tasveer angoothi, taveez aur pendant mein daalkar bechna chalu karo.
25% hissa hamara hoga bachcha.
Hamare ashram mein bhi to kharcha hai.
10.
Apne kisi paise wale chacha ya mama ki khoob seva kiya karo.
Taaki jab wo parlok sidharen to apni jaaydaad se thoda bahut to tumhe bhi de jaayen.
Hindi picture nai dekhte kya tum – yahi to raasta hai.
11.
Agar tumhare haathon mein khujli lage to bhoolkar bhi apne haath mat dhona.
Yahi to nishani hai ki ab tum paise wale banoge.
Par bachcha paisewale ban ne ke baad humein bhoolne ki bhool bhoolkar bhi na kar baithna, anyatha palbhar mein hi kangaal ho jaaoge.
12.
Hamare kisi amir bhakt se shadi kar lo.
Shadi se pehle to tum kuch kar na sake, lekin humein vishwas hai ki hamare amir bhakt se shaadi karte hi tumhare rahu-ketu sab theek ho jayenge.
13.
TV par kisi ka swayamvar aaye to usmein hissa le lo.
Ismein to bevakoof hone ka bhi bada fayda hai.
Bahut pragati karoge bachha.
14.
Lottery bechne ka kaam shuru kar do.
Kaafi kamaai ka dhanda hai ye.
Hamare kai saare bhakt har mahine karodon ki lottery khareedte hain.
Hum unhe bol denge ki abse lottery sirf tumhari hi dukaan se khareeden.
Apna pata humein sms kar dena 1-800-dhongibaba par.
Hamara hissa hamare bachat khaate (saving a/c) mein dalva dena.
15.
Aaj kal ke netaon se zyaada to koi bhi nahi kamata.
Dekhte hi dekhte paisa aur taakat dono mutthi mein aa jaati hai.
Tum bhi koi neta ke PA ban jaao aur phokat ka paisa khao.
16.
Tum ek top level ke khabri ban jao.
Har khabar yahan ki wahan karo aur jitna chahe utna kamao.
Har khabar ka kam se kam hazaar rupiya lena.
Hamari zaroorat pade to bejhijak keh dena.
Hamare chele aayenge tumhari sahayta ke liye.
Agar tumne ye sabhi tarike padh liye hain to isse ek baat to siddh hoti hai, ki yadi swayam hum bhi tumhare saath saari zindagi gujaar dein to bhi tum amir nahi ban sakte.
Ye sab padhne se achha hai ki kahin apne samay ka sahi upyog karo to 2 paise kamao.
Chalo humein bhi paise kamane jaana hai ;-)

chitr : rekha shreevaastav kee kalaakarti.
aarT pepar par kaalee syaahee se rekhaankan
kahate hain ki jab maut aati hai to insan ko kahin bhi sharan nahin milati, par ulata ho gaya.
maut ko sharan mil gaee.
aath aprail do hazar aath ko sharan rani nahin rahin.
aaj ve assiven varsh men pravesh karatin par ek din pahale hi apani zindagi kee si.
di.
riliz kara ke sidhi chadh gaeen.
yastarade tak sarod gunjaya aur apana myoozik tude ko de gaeen.
log unhen kahate the sarod rani.
saghan andhere men jaise kaundh-kaundh uthati ho sarod kee vidyut, us tadittarangiy gatimayata men prarambh ho jae aalap, jo dhire-dhire badhata jae, jhala kee nakshatra-mala tak.
taramandal khil uthen aur fail jae ujala, guru sharan rani ke nam ka.
sharan rani ji ka janm 9 aprail, 1929 ko dilli ke ek jane mane kayasth mathur parivar men huaa.
us kayasth parivar men sahity, sangit, kalaon ke prati prem bhav to tha lekin ladakiyan usamen aage badh-chadhakar hissa len isakee manahi thi.
dhun kee dhani sharan ji ne pratikool vatavaran ko bachapan se hi anukool bana liya, aur aage bhi sangharsh karati rahin.
sarod ghar men bade bhaiya lae the apani shreemati ji ko sikhane ke lie, par nanhin sharan rani ne dekha ki bhabhi to khan-pan, ghar-parivar aur grihasthi men doobi huee hain, kahan sikhengi.
liya ek sikka, chhed die svar, aanand aaya, saragam nikali.
sa-re-g-m nikal aae to fir kya tha, vah vady inaka ho gaya aur ye us vady kee ho gaeen.
bahut sare pratham jude hain unake nam ke aage.
guru sharan rani pratham mahila thin jinhonne sarod jaise mardana saj ko sanpoorn oonchaee di.
ve pratham mahila thin jo sangit ko lekar poore bhoomandal men ghoomin, videsh gaeen.
ve pratham mahila thin jinhen sarod ke karan vibhinn prakar ke samman mile.
ve pratham mahila thin jinhen sarod par doktaret kee upadhiyon se navaza gaya.
ve pratham mahila thin jinhonne pandrahavin shatabdi ke bad bane hue vady yantron ko n keval sangrahit kiya balki rashtriy sangrahalay ko dan men de diya.
ve prathamon men pratham thin.
unake prayatnon men aaee kabhi kami nahin.
unakee sangit sadhana kabhi thami nahin.
neharoo ji kaha karate the ki sharan rani to hamari kala aur sanskriti kee rajadoot hain.
sahi kaha tha pandit ji ne, sharan ji desh-deshantar tak ghoomin.
sarod ko unhonne vishv-vikhyat kiya.
unake guru baba alauddin khan gajab ke insan the.
ve sansar ka har baja baja sakate the.
jo chiz n bhi baje vah bhi baj uthati thi unake sparsh se.
yuva aur apoorv sundari sharan rani ko yon hi sharan men nahin liya baba ne.
shishyon ko gay kee sani karani padti thi, chilam bharani padti thi.
rasoee men samay dena hota tha.
aur das-das ghante ke riyaz kee pabandi.
sanbhrant-raees parivar kee sharan rani ne aughad baba kee sari bat manin.
naee pidhi ko agar batana ho ki kya hoti hai guru-shishy paranpara, kya hota hai paranpara pradan karane kee prakriya ka silasila, to baba aur sharan rani ji ke aapasi rishton ko badi gaharaee se samajhana hoga.
guru aise hi vidya nahin deta, jab tak ki shishy men poori lagan n ho, nishtha n ho.
us nishtha kee pratimoorti banakar sharan rani bar-bar maihar jati rahin.

unhonne than liya ki sikhakar hi manengi.
gagan ko gunja dengi sarod ke suron se.
kala mar jati hai, agar jivan-sathi sahara n de.
pati bhi sarod jaisa hi mila.
surila sultan sinh bakalival.
unhonne sharan ji ko sada utsahit kiya aur aage lane ke lie pichhe-pichhe rahe.
aashchary kee bat hai ki baba vibhinn vadyon ko sampoorn kushalata se bajate the, kahan sitar, kahan bansuri, kahan sarod! ve vilakshan svar-samrat the aur sare vady-yantron se pyar karate the.
vadyon ke prati yah prem, paranpara ke roop men sharan rani ji ke pas aaya.
ve bhi vadyon se pyar karane lagin.
pati sultan sinh bakalival ke sahayog se vady-yantron ka ek vishal bhandar unake pas ikattha ho gaya.
kahin vo aadivasi kshetron se anoothe prachin vady lekar aaeen, kahin unako gramin lok vady mile.
tarah-tarah ke tantree-vady aur tal vady.
ve sab ke sab unhonne bharat sarakar ke adhin rashtriy sangrahalay ko dan men de die.
'sharan rani bakalival gailari' bani, jisaka udghatan kiya tha shreemati indira gandhi ne.
is sangrahalay ko sharan ji nirantar sanpann karati rahin.

sunita ne bad men, bahut bad men usase kaha bhi tha ki us din vah ghar ja kar bahut der tak roti rahi thi.
isalie nahin ki ve achanak usake samane us vakt pad gayi thin jab vah futapath par is tarah kee koee chiz bech raha tha.
usase pahale bhi vah use kuchh n kuchh bechate hue dekh hi chukee thi aur is bat ke lie usakee tarif hi karati thi ki vah kisi bhi kam ko chhota nahin samajhata tha aur sab kam karane ke bavazood apani padhaee ke prati bhi utana hi siriyas tha.
use rona to is bat par aaya tha ki use padhaee poori karane ke lie kaise kaise din dekhane pad rahe the.
vah sunita kee sthiti ko achchhi tarah samajhata tha.
apane prati usakee bhavanaon se vah vakif tha.
unaka kaee barason ka parichay tha.
un donon ne lagabhag poora bachapan ek sath hi bitaya tha.
vah kuchh kahe bina bhi sab kuchh samajhati thi aur hamesha ek maichyor dost kee tarah usaka sath deti thi.
ek tarah se usakee chhooti huee padhaee fir se shuroo karane ke pichhe sunita kee hi zid thi, varana to vah ek sal barahavin men fel ho jane ke bad padhaee ko poori tarah se alavida kah chuka tha.
sunita usase ek sal jooniyar thi aur usake fel ho jane se donon barahavin men aa gaye the.
us sal bhi vah lagatar sunita ke konchane, samajhane aur har tarah se usaka manobal banaye rakhane ke karan hi achchhe nambaron se pas ho paya tha.
bie ke lie bhi usake lie farm sunita hi layi thi aur apani poori anichchha ke bavajood sirf sunita ka man rakhane ke lie bie kar raha tha.
beshak bie karane ke chakkar men usaka aarthik graf bigad gaya tha aur usake hath se ek dhang kee naukari bhi jati rahi thi.
vah yah bhi janata tha ki vah bie to kya emae bhi kar le, dhang kee naukari usase sau tarah ke papad bilavayegi.
lekin isake bavajood vah sunita ka kaha nahin tal paya tha.
vah usake lie itana kuchh karati thi.
usakee sari takalifon ko vah beshak kam n kar sake, vah itana to karati hi thi ki jaise bhi ho, vah usaka manobal banaye rakhati thi.
padhaee ke lie bhi aur behatar zindagi ke khvab ko lagatar nigah men rakhane ke lie bhi.
use yah bhi pata tha ki vah jo bhi, jahan bhi koee dhandha kar raha hota tha ya jis sadak par vah saman bech raha hota ya jis dukan par vah koee tuchchi selsameni kar raha hota to vah us sadak se bhi guzarana talati thi taki use yani katha nayak bharat ko bevazah usakee nazaron ke samane chhota n hona pade.
yah bat vah samajhata tha aur ve donon kabhi bhi is bat ko apane aapasi sanbandhon ke bich men nahin late the.
khasakar, mojon vale kisse ke bad se to sunita usakee khuddari ka poora samman karati thi.
vah us ghatana ke bad se is bat ka poora khyal rakhati thi ki usakee kisi bhi bat se, vyavahar se katha nayak ko takalif n pahunche.
un dinon usakee aarthik sthiti bahut kharab chal rahi thi.
isake bavajood usakee poori koshish rahati ki usake kapade saf suthare rahen, kisi ko bhi hava tak n lage ki vah kitane kathin daur se guzar raha hai.
kaee zaroori chizen tal rahi thin.
vah chah kar bhi apane lie dhang ke rumal aur moje nahin kharid pa raha tha.
jo do ek jode the usake pas ya to unaka ilastik dhila ho gaya tha ya ve panjon kee taraf bilakul fat gaye the.
sunita se yahin ek bevakoofi ho gayi thi.
halanki usakee khud kee apani koee kamaee nahin thi, fir bhi vah apani taraf se usake lie do jodi moje aur rumal le aayi thi.
vaise to isamen aisa kuchh bhi nahin tha ki bat ka batangad banata.
ve donon pahale bhi ek doosare ko chhoti moti chizen dete hi rahe the.
lekin in chijon ko dekhakar vah buri tarah hart ho gaya tha.
ekadam chup ho gaya tha.
is ghatana ke bad se usane kaee din tak sunita se bat nahin kee thi.
usake hisab se yah usake aham par chot thi.
use becharagi kee had tak sharminda karane vali bat.
shayad yah usi ghatana ka prabhav raha ho ki usane us din ke bad se aaj tak mojon vale joote hi nahin pahane hain.
vah ya to saindil pahanata hai ya fir bina tasmen vale joote, jinamen mojon kee zaroorat hi nahin rahati.
sunita se behad aatmiy sanbandhon ke bavazood vah in sanbandhon ka hashr janata tha aur huaa bhi vahi tha.
use achchhi sekend klas ke bavazood padhaee ko ek bar fir viram dena pada tha aur sunita sirf pas bhar hone ke bavajood emae karane ke lie apani badi bahan ke pas doosare shahar chali gayi thi.
un donon ke bich sare vayade aur us anakahe sanbandhon ke barik reshe apani jagah par the aur zindagi kee sachchaee apani jagah par.
sunita kee shadi vahin se, usakee bahan ne apane kisi rishtedar se tay kar di thi.
ladaka doktar tha.
sadak ke kinare feri laga kar saman bech kar padhaee karane vala katha nayak nishchit roop se us doktar ka vikalp nahin ho sakata tha.
filmin kisson men yah bat chal jati thi, lekin zindagi kee sachchaee donon hi janate the.
ab emae pas sunita ke sapane ek bie pas aur do sal se lagabhag berojagar katha nayak kaise bhi to poore nahin kar sakata tha.
ek aadh sapana bhi nahin.
yahan bhi usane ise apani ek bahut badi har man liya tha.
vah ladata bhi to kisase aur kis aadhar par.
ladane layak aatmavishvas berozagaron ke hisse men nahin aata, yah bat vah janata tha.
usane sunita kee shadi ke bare men ek lafj tak nahin kaha tha.
ek bar fir chuppi ke gahare koone men utar gaya tha.
halanki shadi ka nyauta use bhi mila tha balki sunita ke hath se likha akela kard usi ko bheja gaya tha.
yah bat sunita bhi janati thi aur chahati bhi thi ki vah n hi aaye to behatar.
janata vah bhi tha isilie to usakee shadi men jane ke bajaye usane vah shahar hi hamesha ke lie chhod diya tha.
vah bambaee aa gaya tha.
banbaee - jahan dher sare log sapane le kar aate the aur dhire dhire sapanon kee baten poori tarah se bhool kar ek mamooli si, gumanam si zindagi guzarane lagate the.
thik katha nayak kee tarah.
vah bhi khali hath yahan chala aaya tha.
shayad yahin kismat kuchh palata khaye.
jin bhasin sahab ke bachchon ko vah tyooshan padhata tha, ve jab sthanantarit ho kar banbaee aaye to unhin ne koncha tha, chale aao yahan.
yahan koee bhookha nahin marata.
ek bar kismat aajamane men koee harj nahin.
main apane aofis men hi tumhare lie koee badhiya job dekhoonga.
tab tak tum hamare sath hi rahana.
sachamuch use bhasin sahab kee meharabani se futapath par nahin sona pada tha, n bhookhe rahana pada tha aur n hi khana khane ke evaj men hotalon men bairagiri karani padi thi.
kar leta to behatar tha.
bhasin sahab ne use chhat aur roti zaroor di thi, lekin usakee haisiyat tyootar se girate girate ghareloo naukar aur bebi sitar kee ho gayi thi.
aisi zindagi se to behatar tha, futapath par hi so leta.
vah soya bhi lekin bad men.
jahan tak naukari ka saval tha to mistar bhasin kabhi bhi nahin chahate the ki use naukari mile.
ve to yahi soch kar use laye the ki vah roti aur chhat ke evaj men unake bachchon ko padhata bhi rahega ve donon jab naukari karane jayenge to din bhar muft men bachchon ka khyal bhi rakhega.
panch sal pahale jab katha nayak yahan aaya tha tab se aaj tak usane jitane bhi anubhav batore hain, jitane sangharsh kiye hain, un par chahe to ek poori kitab likh sakata hai, chahe to bina ruke ghanton bat kar sakata hai.
lekin takalif yahi hai ki yah sona itana tap chuka hai, isane itani garami, tap aur mar jheli hain ki ab vah bat hi nahin karata.
ab ekadam chup hi rahata hai.
vah kaee kaee din tak ek shabd bole bina bhi rah sakata hai.
kaee bar to poora poora din yahan tak ki shanivar kee sham se lekar somavar aofis pahunchane tak ek shabd bole bagair sara vakt kat deta hai.
kahe bhi to kya.
kahe bhi to kisase.
hamare kitane bachche hain yah batate samay ham garbhapaton kee sankhya nahin ginate.
yahan to katha nayak ke pas safalataon ke nam par misakairij aur aborshan vale mamale hi hain.
safalata ek bhi nahin.
han, is shahar men bhi usakee ek premika hai.
yahi ikalauta prem hai jo pichhale dhaee tin sal se kisi tarah ghisat raha hai.
dost ek bhi nahin.
is shahar men katha nayak kee pahali pagar nau sau rupaye thi.
jabaki loj men rahane-khane ke hi sadhe sat sau dene padate the.
us laj se nikalane aur aaj do hazar sau kee pagar tak pahunchane men use panch sal lag gaye hain.
is bich mairin draiv kee is munder se arab sagar kee itani laharen nahin takarayi hongi jitane dhakke usane khaye hain.
loj se jhopadi, chal, daftar ke chaparasi kee bolkani, bistar bhar jagah ke lie kabhi vasaee to kabhi chemboor, kabhi bhayakhala to kabhi ulhasanagar.
banbaee ka koee bhi upanagar nahin bacha hoga.
kabhi bilakul sadak par aa jane kee halat.
ekadh rat park men bhi.
naukariyan bhi isi tarah badalin.
begari kee mar bhi khayi aur paise bhi ganvaye.
kaee bar poori pagar hi jebakataron ka nishana ban gayi.
kitani hi raten usane dal ubal kar bred ke sath khayi hai, dal ka pani pi kar raten guzari hain.
pav aur garam mithe pani ka kambineshan banaya hai.
bhala aise dinon kee bhi ginati rakhi ja sakati hai kya.
bas, har bar pagar ka sabase bada hissa use kamare ke lie rakhana padata hai.
bhookhe pet hi sahi, sone ke lie to jagah chahiye hi.
usake pas is bat kee koee ginati nahin hai ki usane kitani bar khudakashi karane kee sochi aur kitani bar vapis jane kee.
donon kam hi vah nahin kar paya.
aajakal use kat kata kar kul do hazar rupaye milate hain.
jis jagah vah rahata hai, vahan use rahane khane ke hi pandrah sau rupaye dene padate hain.
bakee panch sau rupaye usakee zindagi kee bakee sari zarooraton ke lie hain.
inamen kabhi-kabhar ghar bheja ja sakane vala maniaardar bhi shamil hota hai.
usakee sari khushiyan, takalifen, bimari, kapada latta, tren ka sizan tikat, chay, toothapest, brash, kanghee, tel, kitab, pain, tauliya, akhabar, joota, moja vah pahanata nahin, rumal, pres, sabun, sigaret, pan, jo vah eford hi nahin kar sakata, dadhi, heyar kating, sinema, manoranjan, upahar, ghar jane aane ke lie kiraya jo vah panch sal men sirf ek bar hi juta paya hai, aur vah sab kuchh jo ek shahari aadami ko subah uthane se le kar rat ko sone tak jutana hota hai, use in panch sau men hi jutane hote hain.
ye panch sau rupaye usake vartaman ke lie hain, usake bhavishy ke lie hain, jisamen sirf salana tarakkee pachas rupaye hoti hai.
aur yahi masik rashi usake bhavishy ke lie hai.
isi men usakee bhavi grihasthi, makan, parivar, bal bachche unaka bhavishy aur usake khud ke sare sapane isi rashi ke sahare poore kiye jayenge.
kabhi-kabhar bimari kee vazah se usakee pagar se koee katauti hoti hai ya ovar taim kee vajah se ya bonas kee vazah se koee atirikt rashi milati hai to vah samajh hi nahin pata, isaka kya kare aur kaise kare.
yahan pair thik se jama lene ke bad shuroo shuroo men vah kuchh tyooshanen padha liya karata tha.
hath kharch layak paise mil jate the, lekin ab sab kuchh chhod chhad diya hai.
vahan bhi vahi khichakhich.
falan din nahin aaye the, falan din aaye the lekin bachche kee tabiyat thik nahin thi so padhaya nahin tha, falan din...falan din...
ab vah kuchh bhi nahin karata, chhutti hote hi yahin aa baithata hai aur tabhi jata hai jab khana khane aur sone ka vakt ho jata hai.
vah ab har taraf se laparavah ho gaya hai.
n kuchh sochata hai, n sochana chahata hi hai.
pichhale do tin salon se usakee sari shamen aam taur par yahin gujari hongi.
chupachap akele, door kshitij men jahajon ko, niche laharon ko ya fir sadak par chal rahe logon ko chupachap dekhate hue.
sirf shanivar ko hi vah kuchhek vaky bolata hai jab katha nayika aati hai.
us ek ghante men vah katha nayika se jitane shabd bolata hai, utane vah poore hafte men bhi nahin bolata.
katha nayika, jaisa ki mainne bataya hindi men emae hai aur kavitaen likhati hai.
usakee ab tak kee poori zindagi lagabhag usi tarah kee rahi hai jaisi zindagi katha nayak ne guzari hai.
kadam kadam par sangharsh.
kabhi padhaee ke lie, kabhi chhat ke lie to kabhi do vakt kee roti ke lie hi.
vah bhi agar ginane baithe ki kul mila kar use kitani bar apani padhaee sthagit karani padi hai to usakee koee ginati nahin hai.
naukariyon kee ginati bhi vah ab tak bhool chukee hai.
lekin ek bat usake sath hamesha rahi.
ek ek kadam aage badhati badhati vah yahan tak aa pahunchi hai.
vaise usake samane bhi kaee bar zindagi ke shart kat aaye the.
vah chahati to unaka fayada utha kar kahan se kahan pahunch sakati thi, lekin dikkat yahi thi ki ye sare shartakat usakee deh se ho kar guzarate the.
is desh men kam karane ke lie ghar se nikali jyadatar ladakiyon kee yahi pida thi.
desh ka aur desh kee ladakiyon ka zikr aaya hai to yah dekh lene men koee harz nahin hai ki kul mila kar aam taur par bakee ladakiyan kis tarah ke halat se guzar rahi thin.
vaise to is desh men ek taraf padhi likhi, doosari taraf anapadh, ghareloo ya naukaripesha, kunvari ya shadishuda kisi bhi tarah kee ladakiyon kee samajik aur aarthik halat kabhi bhi achchhi, sammanajanak aur sukoonabhari nahin rahi thi, lekin har vakt paison kee tangi, rozana kee zarooraton ke aur sath hi un zarooraton ko poori karane vali chizon ke dam betahasha badh jane ke aur kisi bhi tarah se unhen poora n kar pane kee kachot ne idhar unake jivan ko aur bhi doobhar aur takalifadeh bana diya tha.
padhi likhi lekin mazaboori se ya svechchha se ghar ke bhitar baithi aurat ko to ghar kee chaharadivari ke bhitar hi shoshit karane vale kaee hath the lekin jo aurat mazaboori ke chalate do char atirikt paise kamane kee niyat se ghar se bahar nikalati thi, usaka gala tipane ke lie charon taraf kaee jodi hath ug aate the.
emae, emaesasi aur bied ya emaed vagairah kar lene ke bad bhi usake nasib men gali mauhallon men har chauthe ghar men khule pablik skoolon men panch-sat sau rupalli kee naukari hi bachati thi, jahan use sau-sau bachchon kee klas ke sat aath piriyad rozana lene hote.
ye panch sat sau bhi use apani taraf se kuchh dhila kiye bagair nahin milate the.
is aarthik aur manasik shoshan ke alava naukari kee anishchitata evan daihik shoshan kee aashanka kee addashy talavar har samay unake sir par latakati rahati.
kisi bhi any behatar vikalp ke abhav men vah vahin aur yoon hi khatati rahati thi.
apani zindagi ka behatarin vakt yoon hi barabad ho jane deti thi.
khushi, kuntha, sapane sab apani jagah hote the aur yah chhoti si naukari apani jagah hoti thi, jo beshak ek dhang kee sadi bhi nahin dila sakati thi, fir bhi kuchh to deti hi thi.
kaee jagah to halat itani kharab thi ki kuchh javan auraten sirf isalie do char sau rupaye kee naukari karane ke lie din bhar ke lie ghar se bahar rahati thin taki akele ghar par baithe boodhe sasur ya jeth ya javan devaron kee muft kee khitamadagari n karani pade aur unakee ijzat bhi bachi rah sake.
yah hamare vakt kee ek bahut kadavi sachchaee thi ki sadak ke kinare dihadi par mazadoori karane vale mazadoor ke lie to sarakar ne sath sattar rupaye mazadoori tay kar rakhi thi, steshan par hamali karane vale ke lie bhi fi fera das bis rupaye ka intazam tha, lekin ek em e aur emaesasi pas kisi maidam shyama ke lie ya din bhar kisi praivet aafis men khatane vali konvent se padh kar aayi mis mairi ke lie sarakar ne kisi nyoonatam vetan kee bhi zaroorat nahin samajhee thi.
jo bhi chahe unaka shoshan kar sakata tha.
log dhadalle se kar hi rahe the.
poore desh ka yahi aalam tha.
inakee tulana men mahanagar munbaee kee ladakiyon kee halat fir bhi behatar thi.
usakee vazahen bhi alag thin.
ve sthaniy thin.
halanki unakee takalifen bahar se aane vali ladakiyon se alag nahin thin, fir bhi donon men ek fark to tha.
ve yahin kee, isi mitti kee bani huee thin.
yahin kee paidaish.
ve choonki kahin bahar se nahin aayi thin, atah is shahar ke mijaz ko achchhi tarah se janati thin.
sangharsh choonki is shahar men rahane kee pahali aur aakhiri shart thi, isalie vah is yahan kee zamin ko, isakedh tapaman ko, yahan ke yatharth ko, zindagi ke sabhi rangon, roopon aur jayakon ko khoob pahachanati thi.
vah bilakul pados men basi filmi duniya kee chakachaundh ko, aisho aaram ko, vahan kee beshumar daulat kee asaliyat se vakif to thi, in sari chizon ke lie use svabhavik roop se sapane bhi aate the, lekin in asambhav se lagane vale sapanon ko poora karane ke lie ve aam taur par koee badi bevakoofi nahin karati thin.
bambaee kee ladakiyon kee zindagi kee bahut kadavi sachchaee thi ki vah apani haisiyat ke anusar hi aise sapane dekhati thin jinhen vah thode bahut sangharshan ke sath, kuchh intajar ke sath kisi bhi bade samajhaute ke bina poore kar sakati thin.
yah ek tarif karane layak bat thi ki aam taur par munbaee kee har doosari tisari madhyavargi ladakee ka sapana thodi si aarthik aazadi, ek thik thak sa, naukarishuda pati, aur khud ka, beshak chhota sa hi sahi, ek adad alag ghar huaa karata tha.
jo sachamuch achchhi kismat vali hoti thin, ve tinon sapane n sahi, inamen se do ek to aage pichhe poore kar hi leti thin.
inakee zindagi ka matalab chhoti-chhoti khushiyan, sangharsh, kabhi n khatm hone vali takalifon ka antahin silasila hota tha, jinake sath madhyavarg kee sabhi ladakiyon ko aage pichhe, kam jyada, joojhana hi hota tha.
lekin ek bat hamesha unake paksh men raha karati thi ki ve kabhi himmat nahin harati thin.
hamesha lagi hi rahatin.
behatar, thoda aur behatar kee chah unhen kabhi thakati hi nahin thi.
ek-ek tinaka chun-chun kar ghonsala sajane jaisa sangharsh.
ek sapane ke poore hote hi doosara sapana poora karane ke lie ya us sapane se thoda oopar ke star ka sapana dekhane ka silasila shuroo ho jata.
is tarah se apane sansar ko aur behatar banane ka silasila chalata hi rahata tha.
isi vajah se kaee bar sapane tootane ya poore n ho pane par bhi unaka mohabhang nahin hota tha, aur n hi ve kabhi nirash hi hoti thin.
ve zindagi ke sath sath in sab baton kee aadi ho jati thin.
lekin takalif un ladakiyon kee hoti thi jo kahin bhi, kabhi bhi, bahut oonche star ke sapane dekhana shuroo kar deti thin.
sapane dekhana aur unake poora n hone par nirash hona koee galat bat nahin thi, balki sapane n dekhana hi asvabhavik mana jata.
pareshani kee bat to yah thi ki unake apane chhote bade shaharon ya kasbon men jab unake ye sapane poore nahin ho sakate the aur ve bina soche samajhe munbaee mahanagar kee taraf chal padati thin ya kaee bar fusala kar le aayi jati thin, jahan unake vichar se raton - rat n keval sare hasin sapane poore kiye ja sakate the balki duniya bhar kee shano-shaukat bhi jutaee ja sakati thi.
ve sapane men dekhi gayi ek anajani duniya kee talash men munbaee aa to jati thin, lekin aate hi rah bhatak jati thin.
takalif yah bhi thi ki desh ke har bade chhote shahar men aise sapane dekhane vali kamazor, bhavuk, aur kaee bar bevakoof ladakiyon kee tadad hamesha badhati hi rahati.
kabhi kabhar alag alag chhote bade shaharon se bhag kar ya bhaga kar layi gayi kuchhek ladakiyon ko bahut sangharsh karane ke bad filmon men ekstra ka ekadh rol mil jaya karata tha.
bakee ninanave fisadi ladakiyan hamesha ke lie gumanami ke andheron men kho jati thin.
raste bhatakate bhatakate ve alag alag raston se bazar men bikane ke lie pahunch jati thin.
vahan sirf chhat, roti aur hamesha ke lie gumanam, badanam zindagi hoti thi.
aur kuchh bhi nahin.
kuchh bhi to nahin.
lekin idhar hal ke barason men halat kuchh badale the.
galat vakt par galat faisale lene ke lie badanam lekin doosaron ke lie udar hamare desh ne jab se apana aakash duniya bhar ke aadamakhor, jadon se kate, bilakul anajan deshon se aaye apasanskriti ke giddhon ke lie khol diya tha, aur ye badi-badi aankhon vale daravane giddh amooman har ghar kee chhat par lage entina ke zariye har ghar ke draing room men pahunch gaye the, tab se alag alag shaharon se balivud khinche chale aane vale ladake ladakiyon ko rozana pachason kee tadad men banane vale tivi siriyalon men chhote mote kam milane lage the.
isake bavazood rozana jitane log yahan rol pane kee talash men pahunchate the, unake do fisadi ko bhi kaimare ke aage ya pichhe kam nahin mil pata tha.
natiza yahi hota tha ki itane sare log jab arasa bit jane par bhi apani kismat kee potali ko khulata bhi nahin dekh pate the to apane aap ko kisi bhi aise kam men jhonk dete the jisamen beshak gumanami ho, lekin thik thak paise milate rahen.
ladakiyon ke mamale men yah bat jyada lagoo hoti thi.
jab is tarah se yahan pahunchane vali hazaron ladakiyan apani haisiyat bhar sangharsh karane ke bavazood kuchh hasil nahin kar pati thin to unhen munbaee ke amooman har upanagar men bisiyon kee sankhya men khul gaye ledij biyar bar sharan dete the.
yahan ve ga leti thin, nach sakati thin aur agar inamen se unhen kuchh bhi nahin aata tha to grahakon ko apani muskan ke sath biyar to pila hi sakati thin.

' satyamev jayate '- prachin bharatiy sahity men mundakopanishad se liya gaya yah sootr vaky aaj bhi manav jagat kee sima nirdharit karata hai .
'saty kee vijay ho ' ka viparit hoga 'asaty kee parajay ho' .
saty- asaty, sabhyata ke aarambh se hi dharm evan darshan ke kendr- bindu bane huye hain.
ramayan men bhagavan ram kee ravan par vijay ko asaty par saty kee vijay bataya gaya aur pratik svaroop ham aaj bhi ise dashahara parv ke roop men manate hain tatha ravan ka putala jalakar saty kee vijay ka shankhanad karate hain.
mahabharat men bhi ek krishn ke netritv aur panch pandavon kee sau kauravon aur attharah akshauhini sena par vijay ko saty kee asaty par vijay bataya gaya.
kalantar men ved aur puran ke virodhi buddh v jain ne bhi saty ko panchashil v panchamahavrat ka pramukh ang mana.
' saty ' ek behad satvik par jatil shabd hai.
dhaee aksharon se nirmit yah shabd utana hi saral hai jitana ki ' pyar ' shabd, par is marg par chalana utana hi kathin hai jitana ki sachche pyar ke marg par chalana.
rashtrapita mahatma gandhi, jinhen saty ka sabase bada vyavaharavadi upasak mana jata hai ne saty ko eeshvar ka paryayavachi kaha.
unake shabdon men-'' saty hi eeshvar hai evan eeshvar hi saty hai.'' yah vaky gyan, karm evan bhakti yog kee triveni hai.
saty kee anubhooti agar gyan yog hai to ise vastavik jivan men utarana karmayog evan antatah saty roopi sagar men doobakar isaka rasasvadan lena hi bhakti yog hai.
shayad yahi karan hai ki lagabhag sabhi dharm saty ko kendr bindu banakar hi apane naitik aur samajik niyamon ko pesh karate hain.
saty ka viparit asaty hai.
saty agar dharm hai to asaty adharm ka pratik hai.
gita men bhagavan krishn kahate hain-'' jab-jab is dhara par adharm ka abhyuday hota hai tab-tab main is dhara par janm leta hoon.'' bharat sarakar ke rajakeey chinh ashok - chakr ke niche likha 'satyamev jayate' shasan evan prashasan kee shuchita ka pratik hai.
yah har bharatiy ko ahasas dilata hai ki saty hamare liye ek tathy nahin varan hamari sanskriti ka sar hai .
sahity, film evan lok vidhaon men bhi antatah saty kee vijay ka udghosh hota hai .
saty ke vilom asaty ka sabase vyapak roop aaj bhrashtachar hai.
aisa nahin hai ki samaj men pahale bhrashtachar nahin tha.
kautily ne arthashastr men 27 prakar ke bhrashtacharon ka ullekh kiya hai.
unhonne likha hai ki-''jis prakar jihva par rakhe gaye shahad ka svad n lena manushy hetu asambhav hai, usi prakar sarakari karmachari hetu rajakosh ke ek ansh ka bhakshan n karana asambhav hai.'' bhrashtachar ek aisa vish bel hai jo samaj men nity fail raha hai.
ise khatm karane hetu kade se kade dand apanaye gaye, par isaka vish aur bhi gahara hota gaya.
yahi karan hai ki ek daur men bhrashtachar ko vishvavyapi samasya kahakar isaka samanyikaran karane kee koshish kee gayi to dekhate hi dekhate bhrashtachar ko shishtachar ka paryay mana jane laga.
nishchitatah jab aap kisi vyakti se kam nikalavane hetu use rishvat n dekar usake janm din par ek mahanga aur khoobasoorat upahar pradan karate hain to aap apani buri niyat ko chhupane ka ek shisht tarika apana rahe hote hain.
vastutah bhrashtachar svayan vyavastha ke andar se hi janm leta hai.
niyamon kee jatilata, nyay men deri, jagarookata ka abhav, shartakat tarikon se lakshy pane kee hod aur manav ka svarthi svabhav hi isaka mool karan hai.
in sabase nipatane hetu svatantr nyayapalika, svatantr peras, lokayukt v lokapal sanstha, satarkata aayog, bhrashtachar nirodhak byooro jaisi sansthayen gathit kee gayi .
vartaman men udarikaran vyavastha ke dvara laisens- paramit raj kee samapti, soochana-takanik ke badhate dayare ke sath har kisi par midiya kee najar , sitijan-chartar ke madhyam se vibhinn vibhagon dvara nagarikon ko jagarook banana, ee-garvanens ke dvara prashasan men kagaji bojh kam karake kampyootaraijeshan dvara paradarshita lana v tatkal seva muhaiya karana, sivil sosayati dvara apane adhikaron ke prati jagarook hona, soochana ka adhikar lagoo karane v sting aapareshan jaise tatvon ke dvara bhi bhrashtachar par kaboo karane ke prayas kiye gaye hain.
bhrashtachar us dimak kee tarah hai jo samaj ko andar hi andar khokhala karata hai.
yahi karan hai ki ise samapt karane hetu hamen us marm par chot karani hogi, jahan se bhrashtachar roopi gend uchhalati hai, n ki us jagah jahan par vah girati hai.
bhrashtachar par anekon seminar huye, bade-bade panne ise khatm karane ke dave se range gaye aur tamam jabani jama kharch huyi par ham is tathy kee avahelana kar rahe hain ki bhrashtachar antatah ek naitik evan vaiyaktik samasya hai.
jab tak har vyakti svayan ko is dosh se mukti dilane ka prayas nahin karata tab tak bhrashtachar unmoolan ek nara matr hi rahega.

aisa hi bhrashtachar ke sath bhi hai.
bhrashtachar ek samajik samasya bhi hai.
isase nijat pane hetu jaroori hai ki log vaiyaktik v manasik roop se bhrashtachar se mukt hon.
gandhi ji ne satyagrah ka pratipadan karate huye kaha tha ki ise poorn roop men apanane hetu jaroori hai ki sarvapratham manav apane duragrahon se mukti paye evan tatpashchat doosaron hetu ek aadarsh upasthit kar unhen saty kee rah dikhaye.

yadyapi ki isamen janata ka dosh nahin, balki dosh to rashtriy karnnadharon ka hai, jinhonne samaj ka mahaul aur sanskar hi aisa nirmit kar diya hai ki isake siva kuchh nahin ho sakata.
daraasal bat yah hai ki rashtr ke shikhar netritv kee niyat saf nahin hai ya yoon kahiye ki aaj ka netritv rashtr ke prati samarpit n hokar balki rashtr ko hi apane prati samarpit man leta hai.

nishchitatah ise uchit nahin thaharaya ja sakata aur isi ka natija hai ki aaj arajakata, aatankavad, anushasanahinata, bhrashtachar, samajik asuraksha ka dooshit mahaul poore rashtr men vyapt hai.

roj pravachan dene vale dharmachary janata ko dharm kee chashani khila rahe hain aur karmavad kee bajay logon ko karmakand kee taraf prerit karake apana ulloo sidha kar rahe hain.
aisa pratit hota hai ki ya to yah varg yah samajhakar pravachan jhadata hai ki is desh kee janata anapadh aur nasamajh hai athava ve is sootr par kam kar rahe hain ki kisi bhi jhooth ko bar-bar doharane se sach man liya jaega.

Girjaghar ke netaen Parmeshwar ke bachchon ki achchaai ke liye sabhi sthaan par dekhbhaal kar rahein hain aur saaodhaan hain.
Jab aur jaha par ho sake, Girjaghar aapat saadhanon ko jinhe zaroorat hai unhe diya jata hai.
Uddhaaran mein, pichle November, Philippines ke duwip desh mein Typhoon Haiyan ne pahaar kiya tha.
Ek 5 Darje ka mahaan tyhoon, Haiyan ne bahut chati aur peeda pahuchaya tha.Pure shaheren nasht ho gaye the; kai mar chuke the; milinoon se ghar barbaad ya nasht ho gaye the; aur mukyr sewaein jayse paani, naale, aur bijali bandh ho chuka tha.
Girjaghar saadhanein tofaan khatam hone ke baad turant hi ghanton mein uplabhd ho gaya tha.
Philippines nein rehne waale girjaghar ke sadasyon ne apne bhaaiyon aur bahanon ko saath milkar madad kiya tha bhojan, paani, kapde, aur swaasthiye vigyaan cheezon ko girjaghar ke sadasyon aur gaer-sadasyon ko pradaan kiya tha.
Girjaghar shabhgharein jinke ghar nasht ho gaye the ke sahara dene ka sthaan ban gaya tha.
Sthaan Adhyakshta aur sthaaniye purohiti ke netaoun ke netatav ke nirdeshan mein, kai jinhone sab kuch jo unke paas tha ko ho diya tha, raaye liya gaya ki sabhi sadasyon ke stithi aur surakhcha ke liye.
Prerit yogna banaye gaye aur daesyon ko jine ke stithiyon aur aatam-nibharta ko swikaar karne ke liye dobara shuruwaat kiya gaya.
Saral saadhanein Girjaghar sadasyon ki madad ke liye pradaan kiya gaya unke lakadi ke fram ko bandhne aur gharon ko banane ke liye.
Yah nuft mein nahi pradaan kiya gaya tha.
Sadasyon ko sikhlaya gaya aur phir zaroorat ke karamchaari ki tarah khudh aur dusron ke liye pradaan kiye.
Parinaam ke taur par ek ashirwaad jo prapt hua tha ki sadasyon ne karpentar, palambar, aur dusre ghar banane waale kaaryon ko sikha tha, weh achche kaam ke aosaron ko dhoondh paye the jab nazdeek ke shaharon aur sangatonon mein ghar banana dobara shuru hua tha.
Gareeb aur zarooratmandon ka dekhbhaal karna susamachaar siddhaant ke ek mul hai aur mukti ki yogna ka ek khaas zaroorat.
Uske maranshil dekhrekh se pehle, Jehovah ne apne bhavishyevakta dwara batlaya: “Tere desh mein daridar to sada paaye jaenge; isliye main tujhe yah aagya deta hoon, ki to apne desh mein apne deen daridar bhaaiyon ko apna haath dhila karke awashye daan dena.”1
Humare dinon mein, gareeb aur zarooratmandon ki dekhbhaal karna Girjaghar zimmedaariyon mein chaar mein se ek diviye niyukti mein se hai jo vyaktigat aur parivaaron ko mukti ke liye laayak rehne mein madad karta hai.2
Greeb aur zarooratmandon ki dekhbhaal karna mukti ke dono shansaarik aur dharmik kaarye mein hain.Is mein vyaktigat Girjaghar ke sadasye ki sewa shaamil hai jabki weh khud hi gareeb aur zarooratmandon ki dekhbhaal vyaktigat rup se kartein hain, Girjaghar kalyaan bhi sahi tarah se karta hai, jo purohiti adhikaar dwara dekhbhaal kiya jata hai.
Prabhu ke yogna ka ek zaroori bhaag hai gareeb aur zarooratmandon ki dekhbhaal karna upwaas ki niyam mein.
“Prabhu ne upwaas ka niyam banaya hai aur upwaas bhent se Apne logon ko ashirwaad dene ke liye aur ek tarika jisse weh zarooratmandon ki sewa kar saktein hain.”3
Uddhaarkarta ke chelon ke tarah, hume bhi vyaktigat zimmedari di gayi hai gareeb aur zarooratmandon ki sewa karne ka.
Girjaghar ke vishwaasi sadasye sabhi sthaan par har mahine upwaas kartein hain—24 ghanton tak bhojan aur paani nahi khana ya pina—aur phir Girjaghar ko wah upwaas ke samay bhojan ko karne waale keemat ke barabar upwaas bhent ko dena.
Isaiah ke shabdon ko sabhi gharon mein prarthnashilta se dekhna aur sikhlana chahiye:
“Jis upwaas se main pasand hota hoon, wah yah kya nahi hai? ki annaye se banaye huedason, andhera sahanewaalon ka jua todkar unko chuda lena, aur sab juaon ko tukade-tukade kar dena?
“Kya wah yah nahi hai ki apni roti ko bhukhe ko baat dena, anaath aur maare-maare firtey huon ko apne ghar le aana? kisi ko nanga dekh kar, wastar pahanana; aur apne jaatibhaaiyon se apne ko na chipana?”4
Isaiah ne phir Prabhu ke diye hue aschariye ashirwaadon ke vaadon ki suchi mein aage badha unke liye jo upwaas ke niyam ko nibhaatein hain.
Usne kaha:
“Tab tera prakaash pao ke fatne ke samaan chamkega, aur tu shidh changa ho jayega: tera dharam tere aage age chalega; Prabhu ka tej tere piche raksha karte chalega.
“Tab tu pukare aur Prabhu uttar dega; tu duhaai dega aur wah kahega, Main yaha hoon.
…
“Udhaarta se bhukhe ki sahayata kare, aur deen dhukhiyon ko santusht kare; tab andhiyare mein tera prakaash chamkega, aur tera ghor andhikaar dopahar ka sa ungiyala ho jayega:
“Prabhu tujhe lagataar liye chalega, aur akaal ke samay tujhe madad karega.”5
Is dharamshaastra ke liye, Pradhaan Harold  B.
Lee ne yah kaha: “Mahaan ashirwaad jo [upwaas rakhne] se prapt hota hai sabhi sadi mein saaf taur se batlaya gaya hain, aur yahan Prabhu apne mahaan bhavisyevakta dwara batlatein hain kyo yaha upwaas hai, aur wah ashirwaad jo upwaas ko rakhne se prapt hota hai.
… Agar tum Isaiah ke kitaab ki 58th adhyaye ko vishleshan karte ho tum waja jaanoge ki kyo Prabhu chahatein hain ki hum upwaas bhent ko bhare, kyo Wah chahata hai ki hum upwaas karein.
Kyunki hume yaha karne se hum pukaarenge aur Prabhu jawaab dega.
Hum prarthna karenge aur Prabhu kahega, ‘Yaha main hoon.’”
Pradhaan Lee aage kehte hai; “Kya tum kabhi us stithi mein hona chahate ho jaha hum pukaarein aur Prabhu jawaab na de? Hum musibaton mein prarthna karenge aur Wah humare saath nahi hoga? Mujhe lagta hai ki ab wah samay ah gaya hai jab hum is mul par vichaar karenge kyunki issi prakaar ke din honge ane waale jiwan mein, jab hume aur zyaada Prabhu ki ashirwaad ki zaroorat hogi, jab dharti par vichaar ka sahi ko padega.”6
Humare pyaare bhavishyevakta, Pradhaan Thomas S.
Monson, ne in siddhaanton par apni gawahi ko diya hai—ek vyaktigat rup se anubhao kiya gaya hua gawahi.
Usne kaha: “Girjaghar ke sabhi sadasye jinhone un zarooratmandon ki madad kiya hai anubhao ko kabhi nahi bhoolenge ya pastawa hoga.
Mehanat, saaodhaani, aatam-nibharta, aur dusron ke saath baatna humare liye koi naya baat nahi hai.”7
Bhaaiyon, Ishu Maseeh ka Girjaghar Antim-din Santon ka ke sadasyon vaadon ko banane waale aur aagyaon ka paalan karne waale log hain.
Main kisi bhi niyam, kisi aagya ko nahi jaanta, jo, agar sahi dhang se kiya gaya, saral hai karna aur jo upwaas ke niyam se zyaada ashirwaad ko deta hai.
Jab hum upwaas rakhtein hain aur sachche upwaas bhent ko bhartein hain, hum Prabhu ke bhandaar mein us samay ke bhojan ke keemat ko detein hain.
Yah zaroori nahi hai ki payese ka balidaan us samay ke kharch se zyaada ka ho.
Usi samay, hume aur zyaada ashirwaad milne ko vaada kiya gaya hai jyesa pahale batlaya gaya tha.
Upwaas ka niyam sabhi Girjaghar ke sadasyon par laago hota hai.
Jawaan bachchon ko bhi upwaas karna sikhlaya ja sakta hai, ek samay ka bhojan aur phir baad mein do se shuruwaat kiya ja sakta hai, jab ki weh upwaas ke niyam ko samajhte aur sharirik rup se kar saktein hain.
Patiyon aur patniyon, yuva, aur bachchon ko prarthna ke saath shuruwaat karna chahiye, apne jiwan mein ashirwaad ko prapt karne ke liye dena chahiye jab ki Prabhu ke ashirwaad aur upwaas ke samay shakti ko dhoondhte ho.
Upwaas ka niyam us samay pura hota hai jab upwaas bhent ko Prabhu ke abhikarta, bishop ko bhara jata hai.
Bishops, tum ward mein kalyaan maarg diklate ho.
Tumeh gareeb ke liye diviye dhoondhane ko aur dekhbhaal karne ka.
Sahayak Sanstha pradhaan aur Melchizedek Purohiti parishad netaon ki madad se, tumhara kaarye hai ki sadasyon ko madad karo unko madad mile aur aatam-nibhar banne.
Tumhe sadasyon ka sharirk aur dhaarmik zarooraton ka dekhbhaal karna hai upwaas bhent ko saaodhaani se istamaal karke sharirik madad ki tarah aur prashaarit parivaaron aur sangaton saadhanon ko pradaan karne.Jab tum purohitit ke chaabiyon ko prarthnashilta se karoge, aur gareeb aur zarooratmandon ki madad vivek tarah se karoge, tum yah jaanoge ki upwaas bhent ka sahi istamaal jiwan mein madad karne ke liye hai, naaki jiwan shaali ke.
Aaronic Purohiti parishad pradhaanein, tumhare paas chaabiyan hai aur bahari siddhaanton ko dekhrekh karne ki shakti hai.
Tum bishop aur parishad sadasyon ko unke purohiti ke kaarye ke liye aagya dete ho aur phir Girjaghr ke sadasyon ko dhoondhatey ho upwaas ka aosar mein shaamil hone ke liye.
Jab ki tum Aaronic Purohiti ko rakhne waale apne purohiti zimmedariyon ko badhatein hai aur sabhi Girjaghar ke sadasyon ko yah aosar pradaan kartein hain, tum turant hi upwaas ke vaada bhare ashirwaadon ko unko batlaao jinhein sab se zyaada zaroorat hai.
Tum yah gawahi doge ki greeb aur zarooratmandon ki dekhbhaal karne ki aatma ke paas kathor hriday ko komal banane ki shakti hai aur un logon ki madad karne ke jo humesha Girjaghar aatein hain.
Pradhaan Monson ne batlaya hai, “Jo bishop apne Aaronic Purohiti parishad ko upwaas bhent ko batorne mein shaamil hone ke liye sangatith kartein hain is pavitra zimmedari mein bahut safalta prapt karenge.”8
Bishops, yaad rakho ki yah stithi alag ho sakta hai ek sthaan se dusre aur ek desh se dusre mein.
Darwaze par ja kar Aaronic Purohiti parishad sadasyon ko payese batorne ka kaam shaayad waha nahi hota ho jaha tum rehte hoge.
Phirbhi, hum tumhe prarthnashilta se bhavishyevakta ki salaah ko karne ko amantirith kartein hain aur un prerit bhare kaaryon ko dhoondho jaha tumhare ward ke Aaronic Purohiti rakhne waale apne purohiti ko badha saktein hain upwaas bhent ko batorne ke kaam mein shaamil hokar.

bharat men 14 varsh se kam umr ke bach‍chon kee sankh‍ya 37.5 karod tatha chhah varsh se kam umr ke bach‍chon kee sankh‍ya 15.8 karod hai.

do karod se adhik bach‍che naukar ke roop men kary karane ke sath-sath chay kee dukanen, s‍kootar evan karon kee maram‍mat, dhabon, bhavan nirmann, kuligiri, kalin udyog, jari kee kadhaee, diyasalaee, aatishabaji, bidi tatha pital udyogon, choodi nirman jaise jokhimapoorn udyogon men lage hue hain.
do tihaee se j‍yada shramajivi bach‍che gam‍bhir choton ka samana jalana, t‍vacha kee bimari, aankh kee roshani evan sans kee bimari sahate hue asahay sa jivan jikar kal kavalit ho jate hain - yah s‍thiti bharat men hi nahin varan‌ vish‍v ke sabh‍y evan vikasit deshon men kisi bhi paimane par kam nahin dekhi ja rahi hai.
arthat‌ vish‍v ke rash‍tr bach‍chon ke dvara nirdharit adhikaron ke prati sachet nahin jan padate.
bach‍che ke adhikaron ke prati sarvapratham an‍tarrash‍triy s‍tar par varsh 1989 men taiyar kiye gaye bal adhikar kan‍venshan men in vishish‍t adhikaron ko bach‍chon ke maulik adhikar ke roop men s‍vikar kiya gaya.
jisako bharat sahit lagabhag sam‍poorn vish‍v dvara man‍yata pradan kee gaee.
20 navam‍bar 1989 ko sanyuk‍t rash‍tr mahasabha dvara bach‍chon ke adhikaron kee suraksha sam‍ban‍dhi ek pras‍tav s‍vikar kiya gaya.
is sam‍melan ka uddesh‍y bach‍chon ko kahin bhi unake shoshann, duroopayog aur ghrina se muk‍ti dilana tha.
isaka vis‍trit vivaran san‌ 1990 men aayojit vish‍v bal sam‍melan men kiya gaya॥ jisake dvara prat‍yek bach‍che ko samajik, aarthik, rajanitik tatha sans‍kritik adhikar pradan karane par vishesh bal diya gaya.
bach‍chon kee an‍y gam‍bhir samas‍yaen jinamen bal shram mukh‍y hai ke lie 27-30 ak‍toobar 1997 men narve kee rajadhani os‍lo men sanyuk‍t rash‍tr sangh dvara ek bal shram par an‍tarrash‍triy sam‍melan ka aayojan vish‍v ke logon ka dh‍yan bach‍chon ke adhikar evan samas‍yaon kee or aakarshit karane ka vishesh prayas kiya gaya.
sanyuk‍t rash‍tr kee vishesh mahasabha men 08.10.2002 ke dvara bach‍chon ke vikas, kal‍yan evan suraksha hetu vishesh rannaniti banaee.
is rannaniti men bach‍chon ke 54 moolabhoot adhikaron ko parit kiya gaya.
jinamen se pramukh roop se anu.

sanyuk‍t rash‍tr samajhaute ke anusar in adhikaron ke tahat bach‍chon ke sarvangin vikas ke lie n‍yoonatam jivan s‍tar sunish‍chit karana tatha prathamik shiksha kee samuchit v‍yavas‍tha karana sabase mahat‍vapoorn mana gaya hai.
bharatiy sanvidhan bhi bach‍chon ke moolabhoot adhikaron par vishesh bal deta hai jinamen bal shram ko rokane ke lie vishesh pravadhan kiye gaye hain.
hamare sanvidhan ka anuch‍chhed 15, raj‍yon kee mahilaon aur bach‍chon kee suraksha ke lie vishish‍t pravadhan karane kee shak‍ti deta hai.

vahin aarthik aavash‍yakataon kee vajah se kisi v‍yak‍ti se usakee kshamataon se pare kam karavane ka anu.

bharatiy sansad ke dvara in sanvaidhanik v‍yavas‍thaon ke tahat 1974 men ek rash‍triy niti s‍vikar kee gaee jisane ghoshit kiya ki bach‍chon kee upeksha, kroorata aur shoshan se raksha kee jayegi aur 14 varsh se kam ka koee bhi bach‍cha anish‍chitata vale v‍yavasay ya bhari kary men nahin lagaya jayega.
bharat men un sanvaidhanik pravadhanon ke atirik‍t anek aise mahat‍vapoorn vidhan diye gaye hain jo bach‍chon ko vibhin‍n v‍yavasayon ke tahat kanooni suraksha pradan karate hain.
14 varsh kee kam umr ka v‍yak‍ti faik‍tri ek‍t 1948 ke tahat rojagar nahin kar sakata hai.
bagan ek‍t 1951 tatha khan ek‍t 1952 ke tahat 15 varsh kee umr men karyon par pratiban‍dh lagaya gaya hai.
kuchh pramukh adhiniyam anubandhit shramik adhiniyam 1975, bal shramik (nivaran aur niyamitikarann) 1986 tatha 1987 kee rash‍triy bal shram niti ke an‍targat bal shramikon ko shoshan se bachane aur unakee shiksha, chikit‍sa, manoranjan tatha saman‍y vikas par jor dene kee v‍yavas‍tha kee gayi hai.
isake sath hi bharat sarakar apani vibhin‍n panchavarshiy yojanaon men balakon ke adhikar evan bal shramikon ke ut‍than ke lie kaee karyakram shurooaat kie hue hai.
sarakar ke alava kaee gair sarakari s‍vaich‍chhik sangathan bhi is disha men gam‍bhirata se prayasarat hain.
hamen bade dukh ke sath likhana pad raha hai ki vibhin‍n vaish‍vik sanvaidhanik pravadhanon aur sarakari tatha gair sarakari upayon ke bavajood ham bach‍chon ke unake maulik adhikar evan manavadhikar ko upalab‍dh nahin kara pa rahe hain arthat‌ aaj lakhon-lakh bach‍che garibi, aatankavad, bhikh mangavana, dhanadhyon ke manoranjan ke lie un‍hen videsh bhijavana, tas‍kari jaise kary karavana, balashram, bal v‍yapar, kuposhann, ashiksha, bal aparadh, bal sainik, vis‍thapan, balika bhroon hat‍ya, vigyapanon ke prayog men balakon ka manasik evan sharirik shoshann, bal yaun durachar aur yuddh jaise kaee karanon se palayan karane vale parivaron ke sath sima par sainikon kee kamavasana ka shikar hone ke alava un‍hen vibhin‍n tarikon se sharirik manasik aur sanvegat‍mak roop se pratadit karane, unake daihik aur aarthik shoshan karane evan moolabhoot suvidhaon se vanchit karane ke lie aisi takanikon aur pravidhiyon ka prayog kiya ja raha hai, jo manavata ke nam par kalank hai.
nish‍karsh roop men yah kaha ja sakata hai ki vikaral hoti bal adhikaron kee samas‍ya ko aaj kanooni aur manavadhikar kee drish‍ti se dekhane ke sath-sath usake manaviy, samajik tatha v‍yavaharik pahaloo se bhi dekhe jane kee aaj shiddat ke sath aavash‍yakata hai tabhi ham in jamin ke nan‍hen-mun‍nen sitaron ko sharirik roop se s‍vas‍th, manasik roop se sajag tatha naitik roop se aadarsh nagarik bana sakate hain.

gloriya apana sina dabochati hai aur madad ke lie pukarati hai.
ye chikhen vahi aadami sun leta hai jisase vah pyar karati hai.
sanyog se vah vahin se guzar kar ja raha hota hai.
is bhoomika men khoobasoorat tomi maigham the.
turant ve jhadi ke pichhe se aate hain.
"kya huaa?"

"kahan?"
vah apane sine kee taraf ishara karati hai.
"ye to sab sanpon se bhi jyada jaharila hai." tomi kahate hain.

ek minat bhi barabad karane ko nahin hai."
ve doktar se milon door hain.
aur aise mauke par raktabandh ka jo samany upachar hota hai ki prabhavit hisse par rumal bandh kar khoon men jahar ko failane se roka jaye, sanbhav nahin hai.
achanak hi ve use uthate hain, nayika kee kamij ko fadate hain aur unakee naram gori golaee anavrit karate hain.
tab ve kaimare kee badatamij nigah se bachane ke lie usaka chehara doosari taraf karate hain, us par jhukate hain aur unaka munh jahar choosane lagata hai aur jaise jaise ve jahar choosate hain, thookate chalate hain.
is choosan aopareshan ke parinam svaroop vah usase shadi kar leti hai.

barason ke bad mainne yahi paya hai ki vichar tabhi aate hain jab aap men vicharon ke lie utkat ichchha ho.
lagatar ichchha karate rahane se aapaka dimag aisi ghatanaon kee talash men bhatakane vala burj ho jata hai jinamen aapakee kalpana ko uttejit karane ka madda ho, sooryoday aur sooryast bhi vicharon ko amali jama pahana sakate hain.
main to yahi kahoonga ki koee bhi aisa vishay lijiye jo aapako uttejit kare.
ise failaiye aur isamen ram jaiye.
aur agar aap ise aur aage nahin badha pa rahe hain to ise chhod dijiye aur doosare vichar par kam karana shuroo kar dijiye.

to aadami ke pas vichar aate kaise hain.

Ladkon se ek bhi kaam theek se nahi hota.
Pehle hi itne tarike de diye ladkiyon ko patane ke liye lekin yeh ladkon se koi pat ti hi nahi hain.
Ladkiyan zyaada achhi hain, unhe humne thode par bade achhe tarike diye – wo unka barabar istemaal kar rahi hain.
Ab ladkon ke liye hum thode aur tarike le aaye hain.
Iske baad bhi agar aap asafal rahe to fir umeed chhod dijiye.
1.
Pata karo ki use kaun sa filmy hero pasand hai.
Aur tum bhi usi hero ki tarah dressing karke uske saamne ghoomo.
Maamla fit hone mein der nahi lagegi.
2.
Ladkiyan khaane-peene ke maamle mein ladkon se kaafi aage hoti hain.
Isiliye jab bhi unse milo to bina khilaye-pilaye mat jaane dena.
Ye baat aur hai ki wo na na karti hai, lekin unki na ke peeche hi to haan hoti hai.
3.
Ladkiyon ko dance karne wale ladke bahut pasand aate hain.
Isiliye abhi se dance ki practice shuru kar do.
Mauka milte hi koi Govinda ka zordaar geet chalu kardo aur thumke lagao.
4.
Uski best friend se dosti kar lo.
Use hamesha hasate raho aur pata ke rakho.
Ek baar agar uski best friend pat gayi to phir wo apni friend ko tumhari ungliyon par nacha degi.
5.
Uski har ek ada ki taarif kiya karo.
Uski jitni zyaada taarif karoge utna jaldi hi uske dil tak pahunch sakoge.
6.
Uske janamdin par sabse pehle use wish karo.
Kuch aisa uphaar use do jo aaj tak use kisi ne na diya ho.
Phir dekho kamaal.
7.
Ladkiyon ka dil bada komal hota hai.
Us komal hriday ko jeetne mein gulaab ka phool sabse achha tarika hai.
Jab bhi usse milo to use ek laal gulaab diya karo.
Agar usne ek baar bhi gulaab le liya, to tumhari to nikal padi.
8.
Use ghuma firakar hi batana ki tum use pasand karte ho.
Ghuma firakar baaten karne wale ladkon ko ladkiyaan pasand karti han.
Itna mat ghumana firana ki wo tumhe rakhi baandh de.
9.
Tum jise chahte ho poori tarah se usi ke jaisa rehne ki koshis karo.
Wo jo khati hai wo tum khao.
Wo jahan jaati hai wahan tum jao.
Aisa karne se wo tum par apni jaan luta degi.
Kyunki tum to wo sab kar rahe ho jo use pasand hai.
10.
Kabhi bhi apni pareshaniyan use mat batao.
Koi bhi ladki aise ladke se pyaar nahi karti jiski zindagi mein dher saari pareshaniyan hoti hain.
Isiliye use is tarah se baat karo ki tum is duniya ke sabse khuskismat insaan ho.
Bhale tumhara naam kangaalon mein pehla aata ho.
11.
Agar ladki tumhari class mein padhti hai, to pata karo ki wo kis vishay mein kamjor hai.
Use fir batao ki tum us vishay ke sabse bade gyaani ho.
Vishay sikhaate sikhaate use apne dil ka haal bata do.
Agar wo tumse zyaada akalmand hai, to tum use madad maango kisi vishay ke liye.
12.
Agar ladki tumhare saath padhai karti hai to use koi padhai ki kitaab mang lo.
Vapas karte waqt andar ek prem patra daal do.
Niche naam mat likhna.
Agar chappal padne ki baari aaye to bilkul mukhar jaana.
Aur haan bol de to 10 kilo jalebi ka prasad hamare ashram mein bhijwa dena.
13.
Jab bhi ladki tumhe koi uphaar de to tum uske uphaar ki khoob taarif karo.
Yaad rakho tumhari taarif jalti hui aag mein ghee ka kaam karti hai.
14.
Jise tum chahte ho uske liye thoda kharcha karo.
Har 2-4 din baad use ek chhota tohfa do.
Ab tum kahoge ki kaun itna kharcha karega.
Suno to sahi, aaj kal sadak ke kinaare log badhiya chinese maal bechte hain.
Dekhne mein hazaar, daam sirf sau.
Kharido aur de do.
15.
Ab tumhe to sirf ek ladki chahiye apni duniya mein.
Jo ladki thodi bhi achhi lage use propose kar do.
Haan bolegi ya na.
Haan boli to kaam ban gaya aur agar na hua to kya, dusri koi dhund lo.
Dus mein ek to haan bol hi degi.
16.
Apne mobile ke wallpaper mein hamesha uski hi tasveer rakho.
Uska dil pighal jayega aisa dekh ke.
Aur uske liye apne phone mein koi meetha sa naam rakho.
Fir dekho.
17.
Apne kisi dost ko ladki ka bhai banva do.
Aur ek din wo bhai apni behen ke liye tumhara haath maang lega.
Bhai ko behen kabhi naa bol sakti hai kya.
Yaad rahe, pehle ek rakhi to use zaroor bandhwani padegi.
Rakhi ki kasam dekar haath mangne se 100% karya safal hoga.
18.
Kahin se uske bachpan ki koi tasveer uda lo jise dekhkar wo ascharyachakit ho jaaye.
Apna bachpan tumhare haathon mein dekhkar wo apna bhavishya bhi tumhare haathon mein dekhna chahegi.
19.
Agar tumhe pata hai ki wo har hafte mein kisi din mandir jaati hai, to tum bhi pahunch jao.
Jaise wo pahunche tum mandir ki ghanti bajana chalu kar do.
Uske dil ki ghanti baj jayegi bhagwaan ke saamne.
Agar tum safal rahe apne maksad mein to mithaaiyan hamare ashram mein bhej do.
Aur agar nahi hue to fir kya… kuch nahi.
Dimaag mat khao hamara.
