ashlil tukabandi foohad hasy netaon ko galiyan parosakar kavi samajhata hai kee usane bada tir mar liya.
vani aur svatantrata ka duroopayog nahin hona chahie.
ijahare khyal bura nahin hota.
usakee abhivyakti ailaniyan aur khullam khulla kee ja sakati hai basharte kee khyal garimamay ho bhasha susanskrit aur parimarjit ho bat dushale men lapet kar bhi kahi ja sakati hai
josh malihabadi ne kaha tha kee "ajrah- ai- karam mujh nim jan ko bhi khabar kar den ,agar is koochagardi men koee insan mil jae.
hamare yahan kee suprasiddh shayara anjum rahabar ne kaha hai-
aadami to bahut hain jahan men ,aisa lagata hai insan kam hain.
isi prakar mera bhi yahi kahana hai kee kavi to bahut hain jahan men, aisa lagata hai sahityakar kam hain.
vyaktigat sambandhon kee kavita men samajik sahanubhooti ka manas-sansparsha
manushy ko apane vyaktigat sambandhon ke sath hi jivan ke vividh kshetron se prapt ho rahi anubhootiyon ka aatmikaran tatha unaka upayukt shabdon men bhav tatha chintan ke star par abhivyaktikaran hi vartaman kavita ka aadhar hai.
jagat ke nana roopon aur vyaparon men jab manishi ko naisargik saundary ke darshan hote hain tatha jab manokankshaon ke sath ragatmak sambandh sthapit karane men ekatmakata ka anubhav hota hai, tabhi yah samanjasy sajivata ke sath samakalin srijan ka sakshee ban pata hai.
yuva kavi evan bharatiy dak seva ke adhikari krishn kumar yadav ne apane pratham kavy sangrah ‘‘abhilasha” men apane bahuroopatmak srijan men prakriti ke apar kshetron men vistarit aalanbanon ko vishayavastu ke roop men prapt karake hnaday aur mastishk kee rasatmakata se kavita ke anek roop bimbon men sanjone ka prayatn kiya hai.
“abhilasha” ka sangyak sankalan sanskaravan kavi ka inhin visheshataon se yukt kavi karm hai, jisamen vyaktigat sambandhon, samajik, rajanaitik, aarthik samasyaon aur vishamataon tatha jivan moolyon ke sath ho rahe pidhiyon ke atit aur vartaman ke takaravon aur prakriti ke sath paryavaraniy vikshobhon ka khulakar bhavatmak arth shabdon men anugunjit huaa hai.
para aur apara jivan darshan, vishv bodh tatha vidvan bodh se upaji anubhootiyon ne bhi kavi ko anek roopon men udvelit kiya hai.
in udvelanon men jivan saundary ke sarthak aur sajiv chitr shabdon men arth pa sake hain.
sankalan kee pahali kavita hai- “man” ke mamatv bhare bhav kee nitant snehil abhivyakti.
jisamen mamata kee anubhooti ka pavitr bhav-vatsaly, pyar aur dular ke vividh roopon men kathan kee marmasparshi bhangima ke sath kathy ko sidhe-sidhe pathak tak sanpreshit karane ka prayatn banaya hai.
shabd jo abhidhatmak shaili men kuchh kah rahe hain vah bahut spasht arthanviti ke parichayak hain, parantu bhavatmakata ka kendr bindu vyanjana kee antashchetana sanbhoot v aatmiyata ka manavi manovigyan banakar ubhara hai.
god men bachche ko lekar shubh kee aakankshee man buri najar se bachane ke liye kajal ka tika lagati hai, banh men tabij bandhati hai, skool ja rahe bachche kee bhookh-pyas svayan men anubhav karati hai, padosi bachchon se ladakar aaye bachche ko aanchal men chhipati hai, doolha bane bachche ko bhav men dekhati hai, kalpana ke sansar men shahanaeeyon kee goonj sunati hai, bahoo ko saunpati huee man bhavuk ho uthati hai.
najon se pale apane ladale ko jivan dhan saunpati huee man ke ashru, karoona vigalit sneh aur anurag ke moti banakar ludhak padate hain.
kavi ka ‘man” ke prati bhav abhyarthana aur abhyarchana banakar kavita ka shashvat shabd saundary ban jata hai.
krishn kumar yadav ka sanvedanashil man anuman aur pratyaksh kee jivan smritiyon ka jagrit bhav lok hai, jahan man anek roopon men prakat hoti hai.
kabhi patr men utkeern hokar, to kabhi yadon ke jharokhon se jhankati huee bachapan se aaj tak kee upalabdhiyon ke bich ek safal putr ko aashirvad deti huee.
kisi nirashrita, abhav grast, kshudhit man aur santati kee kaya ko bhi kavi kee lekhani ka sparsh mila hai, jahan majaboori men chhipi nirihata ko bhookhi kamuk nigahon ke svarthi sansar ke bich ardhaanavrit aanchal se doodh pilati manavi ko amanaviy najaron ka samana karana pad raha hai.
man ke vividh roopon ko bhavon ke anek staron par ankit hote dekhana aur kavita ko shabd dena aadarsh aur yatharth kee anubhootiyon ka dil men utarane vala shabd bodh hai.
nari ka preyasi roop sukomal anubhootiyon se hokar jab bhav bhare hnaday ke neh-nir men roopayit hota hai tab sparsh ka sumadhur kankad kis prakar tarangayit kar deta hai, jyotsana snan prem kee suvistarit rati-rajani ke aagosh men baithe khamosh anrtamilan ke kshanon ko in panktiyon men dekhen-rat ka pahara/jab main jheel kinare/ baitha hota hoon/chand jheel men utar kara/naha raha hota hai/kuchh der bada/chand ke satha/ek aur chehara/mil jata hai/vah shayad tumhara hai/pata nahin kyon/ bar-bar hota hai aisa/main nahin samajh pata/samane tum naha rahi ho ya chanda/aakhirakar jheel men/ek kankad fenkakara/khamoshi se main/ vahan se chala aata hoon.
talash, tumhen jita hoon, tumhari khamoshi, bevafa, preyasi, titaliyan, prem, kunvari kiranen, shirshak kavitayen jin vaiyaktik bhavanaon kee mansal abhivyaktiyon ko angadaiyon men umang se bharakar dil ke jharokhon se jhankati sanyog aur viyog kee rasatmakata ka ijahar karati hain, vah gahari sanson ke bich uthati girati janm-janm se pyasi priti payasvini ke tat par baithe yugal kee hnadayaspandon men suni jane vali sharir kee khushaboo aur chhuan ka smriti-sfit sansar hai.
inamen aangik cheshtaon aur aindrik aasvadanon kee saundaryamayi kalpana ka kalatmak prannayan hnadayavan rasagyon ke liye rasayan ban sakata hai.
jivan prabhat se prarambh hokar vikas, vayaskata, praudhata aur vardhaky kee avasthaon ko langhati kavita kee gambhir dhvani madakata ke unmad ko jivan saty ka darshan karane men saksham bhi ho jati hai.
nari ke streetv ko matritv aur preyasi roopon se aage badhata huaa kavi, shoshann, utpidan, anachar, anyay ke paryay ban chuke sandesh se dalit v abala jivan se bhi sakshatkar karata hai, jahan mahiyasi kee mahima, khand-khand ho rahi bhogya banakar deh ban jati hai.
stree vimarsh kee in kavitaon men samajik aur vaiyaktik vicharana kee anek sanbhavanaon se sakshatkar karata kavi bhav aur vichar men poojya par ho rahe anant atyacharon ka pardafash karata hai.
bahoo ko jalana, havas ka shikar hona tatha “vo” ban kar sadak ke kinare adhanangi, pagal aur bechari bani becharagi kya kuchh nahin kah jati, jo in kavitaon men beti aur bahoo ke roop men kartavyon kee gathari lade jivan kee dagar par arthahin kadamon se jine ko vivash ho jati hai.
stree vimarsh ka yatharth, dalit chetana kee soch in kavitaon men vartaman ka saty ban kar ubhari hain.
balashram, balashoshan aur bal manovigyan ko “abhilasha” kee kavitaon men jin shirshakon men abhivyakt kiya gaya hai, unamen pramukh hain-akhabar kee kataranen, jamun ka ped, bachche kee nigah, vo apane, aatma, bachcha aur manushy tatha bachapan.
in rachanaon men bal man kee jigyasa, aakrosh, aatank, masoomiyat, prakriti, paryavaran aadi ka manushy ke sath, ped-paudhon ke sath v jiv-jantuon ke sath nikat sambandh aatmiyata kee kalpana ko sakar karate hue, atit aur vartaman kee sthitiyon se tulana karate hue, aage aane vale kal kee tasvir ke sath vyakt kiya gaya hai.
bahudha jivan aur kartavy bodh se anupranit is khand kee kavitaon men kavi ne bachche kee nigah men boodhe chacha ko bhikh ka katora lie hue bhi dikhaya hai aur hudadang machate jamun ke ped tatha mitti kee sodhi gandh men mauj-masti karate bhi smriti ke kotaron men chhipi atit kee tasvir se nikalakar prastut karate paya hai.
bachchon ke nishchhal man par chhal kee chhaya ka svarthi prapanch kis prakar havi hota hai aur jhoothe pralobhan v ahankar ke vashibhoot hue log unhen bhay ka bhoot dikhate hain aur jivan bhar ke liye kuritiyon ka gulam bana dete hain, yah bhi in kavitaon men drishtavy huaa hai.
man ke ekant men jivan kee gahan chetana ke gambhir svar samahit hote hain.
jab manushy aatmadarshi hokar prakriti se tadatmy sthapit karata hai, tab sansar ke halachal bhare mahaul se alag, use makhamali ghas aur pedon ke harit sansar men rachi-basi alaukik sundarata ka darshan hota hai aur chidiyon kee chahachahahat sunaee deti hai.
vah man kee khidakee khol kar dekhata hai tabhi use apane astitv ke darshan hote hain.
akelepan ka ahasas karati niravata, manav jivan kee hakeekat, bachapan se javani aur budhape tak ka safar anek aashaon aur nirashaon ka andhera aur ujala najar aane lagata hai akelepan men.
is prakar kee kavitaen bhi is sankalan kee visheshata hain.
vartaman samay kee gramy aur nagar jivan sthitiyon men panap rahi aapa-dhapi ka tik-tik-tik shirshak se karyalayi dinacharya, adhikari aur karmachari kee jivan dashayen, failen, suvidha shulk tatha farj adayagi shirshakon men niji anubhav aur dainik kriyakalapon ka svanubhoot prastut kiya gaya hai.
prakriti ke sath bhi kavi ka sakshatkar huaa hai-pachamadhi, badal, naya jivan tatha prakriti ke niyam shirshakon men.
inamen manushy ke bhav lok ko aanubhootik uddipan pradan karati prakriti aur paryavaran kee sukhad smritiyon ko prakritasth hokar jivan ke sath-sath jiya gaya hai.
naitikata aur jivan mooly kavi ke sanskaron men rache base lagate hain.
use angulimal ke roop men atyachari v anachari ka dushcharitra-chitr bhi yad aata aur buddh tatha gandhi ka jagat men aadarsh nishpadan tatha kshama, daya, sahanubhooti ka manav dharm ko anupranit karata charitrik aadarsh bhi nahin bhoolata.
vartaman samay men manushy kee sadvrittiyon ko chhal, danbh, dvesh, pakhand aur jhooth ne kitana dhak liya hai, yah kisi se chhipa nahin hai.
in manav moolyon ke avamoolyan ko kavi ne shabdon men kavita ka roop diya hai.
krishn kumar yadav ne “abhilasha” men kavita ko vastumatta tatha samagrata ke bodh se sadharan ko bhi asadharan ke ahasas se yatharth drishti pradan kee hai, jo pragatishilata chetana kee aadhunikata bodh se yukt chittavritti ka pratibimb hai.
isamen kavi man bhi hai or jan man bhi.
manushy is sansar men samajikata kee simaon men akela nahin rahata.
usake sath samaj rahata hai, atah apane samparkon se mili anubhooti ka aabhyantarikaran karate hue kavi ne apani bhavana kee sanvedanatmakata ko vivekajany pahachan bhi pradan kee hai.
roodhi aur maulikata ke prashnon se oopar uthakar jab ham in kavitaon ko dekhate hain to lagata hai ki sahaj man kee sahaj anubhootiyon ko kavi ne sahaj roop se samayik-sahityik sandarbhon se yug-bodh bhi pradan karane ka prayas kiya hai.
dayitv-bodh aur kavi karm men pandity pradarshan ka koee bhav nahin hai, fir bhi yah to kaha hi ja sakata hai ki vichar ko bhav ke oopar vijay mili hai.
kavita samakalin lekhan aur srijan ke samasamayik bodh kee parinnati hai so ‘‘abhilasha” kee rachanaen bhi is tathy se achhooti nahin hain.
bhasha aur shabd bhi aaj ke lekhan men apani pahachan badal rahe hain.
vah “vo” ho gaya hai, ve aur un ka sthan bhi tadbhav roopon ne le liya hai.
shree yadav ne bhi anek shabdon ke vyakaraniy roopon ka aadhunikeekaran kiya hai.
vaishvik jivan drishti, aadhunikata bodh tatha samajik sandarbhon ko vividhata ke anek staron par samete prastut sankalan ke adhyayan se aabhasit hota hai ki shree krishn kumar yadav ko vipul sahityik oorja sampann kavi hraday prapt hai, jisase vah hindi bhasha ke vangamay ko smriti pradan karenge.
'era batar sura' banane ke bad bhoopen ne nishchay kiya ki 'nil aakasher niche' namak bangla film banaenge.
banaras men padhate samay bhoopen ka parichay mahadevi varma se huaa tha.
mahadevi varma ki ek kahani ke aadhar par bhoopen is film ka nirman karana chahate the.
usi samay deloo nag namak vyakti ne aakar bhoopen ko bataya ki is kahani par film banane ka adhikar vah mahadevi varma se kharid chuka hai.
kahani ek chin desh ke ferivale ke jivan par aadharit thi jo ek bangali ladaki ko bahan banata hai.
bad men ferivale ki maut ho jati hai.
bhoopen ne deloo nag se kaha ki vah kahani ka adhikar unako bech de.
nag taiyar ho gaya.
bhoopen ne socha ki patakatha ritvik ghatak se likhavani chahie.
un dinon ghatak 'ayantrika' bana rahe the aur unake pas samay nahin tha.
bhoopen ne mrinal sen se bat ki.
pandrah sau rupaye lekar mrinal sen ne patakatha likhi.
bhoopen hemant kumar se mile.
hemant kumar ne aashvasan diya ki film ke lie rupaye ve denge.
sangitakar ke roop men hemant-bhoopen ka nam jaega.
isi dauran bhoopen ko kisi ne bataya ki deloo nag ne kahani ka adhikar kharidane ke bare men jhoothi janakari di thi.
vastav men kahani ka adhikar usake pas nahin tha.
bhoopen mahadevi varma se milane ranikhet gaye.
mahadevi unako pahachan nahin payin.
bhoopen ne banaras ki mulakat ke bare men bataya.
apana 'sagar sangamata' git gakar sunaya aur hindi men usaka arth bataya.
mahadevi prasann huin.
bhoopen ko unhonne khana khilaya.
bhoopen ne unase poochha ki chini ferivale ki kahani unhonne bech di hai kya ? mahadevi ne bataya ki ek ladaka aaya tha, jo kharidana chahata tha, magar vah dubara nahin aaya.
bhoopen ne unase apani yojana ke bare men bataya.
mahadevi ne unako apani kahani ka adhikar de diya.
us samay desh men hindi- chini bhai-bhai ka mahaul tha.
chin ke kaunsalar ko bulakar bhoopen ne muhurt karavaya tha.
lata mangeshakar ko klaipistik dene ke lie aamantrit kiya tha.
lata ne majak men kaha tha - 'bhoopen da, main jis film ke lie klaipistik deti hoon, vah film banati nahin hai.' lata ka majak sach sabit huaa.
ratonrat bhoopen-hemant prodakshan ki jagah hemant-bela prodakshan ban gaya aur mrinal sen film ke nirdeshak ban gaye.
ek tarah se langadi mari gayi thi aur film ke projekt se bhoopen ko bahar kar diya gaya.
mrinal sen ne film banayi.
jis din film kalakatta men rilij hui, usi din chin ne bharat par aakraman kar diya aur film buri tarah pit gayi.
bhoopen hatash nahin hue.
unhonne gvalapada ke lokajivan ko prishthabhoomi men rakhakar 'mahut bandhure' ka nirman kiya.
is film men gvalapada ki boli ka prayog kiya gaya tha aur gvalapadiya lokagit ki gayika pratima pandey ke giton ka istemal kiya gaya tha.
'mahut bandhure' ko jabardast safalata mili.
film ki prashansa javaharalal neharoo ne ki.
unhonne sabhi dootavason ko yah film bhijavai.
bhoopen ko bhishan aarthik sangharsh karana pad raha tha.
priyam bich-bich men aati thi aur vapas badauda chali jati thi.
ek film men sangit dene ke badale char hajar rupaye milate the.
tab tak git gane ke badale bhoopen paise nahin lete the.
san 1960 men kalakatta men postar lagaya gaya - 'bhoopen hajarika ka khoon chahie.' asam men chal rahe bangla virodhi aandolan ki pratikriya men kalakatta men asamiya logon ke khilaf ghrina ka vatavaran taiyar ho raha tha.
asam se soory bora 'shakuntala' film ke silasile men kalakatta gaye the aur bhoopen ke ghar men thahare the.
bahar nikalane par unaki hatya kar di gayi.
uttam kumar ne bhoopen ko sandesh bheja ki jara bhi asuvidha mahasoos ho to ve unake ghar aakar rah sakate hain.
jyoti basu tab mantree nahin bane the.
unhonne bhoopen ko lane ke lie gadi bhej di thi.
bhoopen jahan rahate the, us ilake men 'mastana' taip ladakon ne unase kaha - 'ham aapaka bal bhi banka hone nahin denge.
hamari lash par chadhakar hi koi aap tak pahunch sakata hai.
asam se bhage bangali siyaladah pahunch chuke hain.
aapako asali khatara unalogon se hi hai.'
bhoopen ke khilaf postar chipaka rahe ek ladake ko ritvik ghatak ne thappad marakar poochha tha - 'kisane sikhaya hai tujhe bhoopen hajarika ke khilaf postar lagane ke lie ?' bad men pata chala tha ki ek sangitakar ke ishare par vaisa kiya gaya tha.
ek din bhoopen bahar se ghoomakar ghar laute to naukar ne bataya ki paintis aadami aaye the.
kah rahe the ki vakt thik nahin hai.
bhoopen da se kahana rat nau baje ke bad kahin gane ke lie n jaen.
20 agast 1960 ko asam ke khilaf kalakatta ki sadakon par juloos nikala tha.
us din bhoopen mahajati sadan ke pas khade the.
unake sath krishnnafali chay bagan ke samar sinh the.
juloos aage badh raha tha.
samar sinh ne kahin chhipane ke lie kaha.
bhoopen ne kaha ki unhen koi dar nahin hai.
magar samar sinh nahin mane.
donon sonagachhi chale gaye.
ek veshya ke kothe par gaye.
veshya snan kar bahar nikali.
usane kaha ki yah sab kya ho raha hai.
aaj to poora bajar band hai, aapalog kaise aaye ?
bhoopen ne apana parichay nahin diya.
unhonne kaha ki ve rat gujarana chahate hain.
veshya ne unake lie bhojan ka prabandh kiya.
fir vah boli - 'aapalog baithie, main jara bahar se aa rahi hoon.' bhoopen ko aashanka hui ki kahin gundon ko bulane ke lie to nahin ja rahi hai ! kuchh der bad vah dher sare rikard lekar lauti.
rikard pleyar par vah rikard bajane lagi.
pahala gana tha bhoopen ka 'sagar sangamata', doosara gana tha bhoopen ka, tisara aur chautha gana bhi bhoopen ka hi tha.
veshya ne kaha - 'suna hai asamiya-bangali ke bich kuchh huaa hai ? aisi halat men aapalog yahan kyon aaye hain ? main yah dhandha jaroor karati hoon par aapako door se dekhane ke lie mahajati sadan men jati hoon.
aaf gane mujhe bahut achchhe lagate hain.
main asam ja chuki hoon.
ek chay bagan ke malik ke sath.
nam nahin bataungi.
asam itana pyara hai.
yah sab kya ho raha hai.'
subah pau fatate hi bhoopen ne mahila se vida mangi aur apane ghar laut aaye.
1960 men asamiya virodh ka jo mahaul bana, usaka gahara prabhav bhoopen par pada.
unako film ka kam milana band ho gaya.
priyam badauda men thi.
bhoopen aur naukar ko gujare ke lie har mahine panch sau rupaye ki jaroorat hoti thi.
panch sau rupaye ka jugad kar pana kathin ho jata tha.
kafi karj ho gaya tha.
guvahati men bhi parivar ko kafi dikkaton ka samana karana pad raha tha.
isi dauran bhoopen ne 'aamar pratinidhi' men stambh likhana shuroo kiya.
masik do sau rupaye mil jate the.
bhoopen ne socha ki kisi tarah paison ka jugad kar 'shakuntala' banayi jae.
udhar lekar unhonne 'shakuntala' ka nirman kiya.
film kafi safal hui.
'shakuntala' ko shreshth aanchalik film ka puraskar mila.
is film ke chalane se bhoopen ko aarthik roop se kuchh rahat mili.
ek sal tak ke lie bhoopen nishchint ho gaye.
bhoopen ne kam bajat men ek hasy aadharit film 'latighati' banayi, jisaki shooting unhonne terah dinon men poori ki.
bhoopen ko prag jane ka nimantran mila.
prag se lautane ke bad bhoopen asam gaye aur hemang vishvas ke sath sanskritik toli banakar jagah-jagah ghoomate hue asamiya-bangali sadbhav ka sandesh dene lage.
tatkalin mukhyamantree vimala prasad chaliha ne lagabhag rote hue bhoopen se kaha tha ki ve sthiti ko niyantrit nahin kar pa rahe hain aur unake jaise kalakar hi kuchh kar sakate hain.
bhoopen ko kai tarah ki dhamakiyon ka bhi samana karana pada, parantu dhairy khoe bina unhonne apana sanskritik abhiyan jari rakha.
utpal datt ne 'nyoo eja' men likha - 'bhoopen hajarika ki tarah kaun kalakar alpasankhyakon ki suraksha ke lie sadak par utarata hai ? kya ham utarate hain ? kya hamane kalakatta men aisa koi prayas kiya.
soorama bhopali fir budhavara kee gali ke mod par mil gae.
usi khas gali ke mod par jahan ve filmon men jane se pahale 'rahate the', majama jamate the .
halanki ab hal badarang hai lekin unakee lakadi kee tal par abhi bhi kuchh chamak bakee hai .
ve bhi apane purane rang men badastoor bolane kee mashinagan bane hue hain .
yani gali-tala, ve aur unaka majama hamakadam- hamanava taip dikhaee de rahe hain .
ve gali ke mod par isalie milate hain ki yahin vo aitihasik 'thiya' hai jahan ve jahira taur par baithakar un- un ko sun-suna aur gariya sakate hain .
jinhen ve kaee bar bhopali 'tahajiba' ke karan 'bakhsha' dete the .
ab ve jab gali ke mod par takara hi gae to bat jam gaee ki unaka ek intaravyoo hi kar liya jae .
kya pata ve kab fir filmon kee or rukh kar len.
aur sunao soorama bhaee, kya chal raha hai ? hamane kaha .
soorama bhaee- aman pailavana, chalega kya ? voee challariya hai .
voee, soorama bhaee....
voee kya? is bar hamen kuchh atirikt janane kee kunamunahat huee .
soorama-aman bhaee, tum to bina giyar ke iskootar ho riye ho, voee mane ekadam jhakkas challariya hai .
jab se bhopal lauta hoon jindagi men sukoon aariya hai .
bodi pe matan ke pilastar chadhariye hain, udar banbe men to bot hi bhannot laif ho ri thi .
par soorama bhaee banbe aur bhopal men ab kya antar bacha hai .
vo hi kraima, bildingen, vaise hi log hamane apani atirikt janakari ka prakshepan kiya .
soorama bhaee- 'miyan pathana', tumhare to pilag-pont men garda aariya dikhata hai.
banbe men to khopadi shyayali jiro bata sannata ho ri thi .
bhan to kanne kat giye the apane, dimag chariya huaa to ravannagi dal li.
siti to 'khan' bhopal hai, jannat hai, miyan jannat.
voee talaba, voee jheelen, jhan ghusate hi tin roj to birayani kee jagah 'miyan apan to' yahan ki desi hava hi khate rahe .
par soorama bhaee dekho to jheelen-talab kitane gande ho rahe hain? ab shahar ke bare men ham sakshat.
efaemanuma prasaran par utar aae the.
soorama bhaee- khan, tum mamoopane kee bat kaun kar rie ho.
do lapad lagaunga rakh ke abi naee talim kee charbi rod pe fail ke nali men baith jaegi.
tumako jara bitha ke chonch se chonch ka bhidaee.
tum to sale 'sera'(shahar) pe 'bhat-suara' chalan lage.
dekho pailavan jhan kayade kee bat karana ho to baitho naeen to nikkalalo patali gali se.
sale khud se to kuchh ho nahin sakata 'sera' ko kosane chale aariye hain .
paile bhi ek 'khan' ne aisaee jurrat kee thi.
apan ne rakh ke ek lapad di to sala hiyan paire men gir ke ron laga.
bola, soorama bhaee galati ho gaee.
hamane bhi kaha abakee ho gaee, so ho gaee, dubara huee to aisi kanapati bajaunga ki m sauth men bodi narth men ghoom jaegi.
apane 'sera' kee bejjati pe to apan sale jay-viru ko na bakhshen...
jay-viru ...! soorama bhaee, jay-viru kya kar rahe hain aajakala? unakee dosti ka kya huaa? hamen aankhon ke samane 'shole' kee motarasaikil men donon aate sakshat dikhane lage.
soorama bhaee- lahaul vila kuvbata, 'aman' pathana, tumhari yaddasht ka to kasam se 'chummi' lene ko dil chariya hai.
kya bhinnot bat yad dila riye ho 'miyan', khairiyat se hain donon.
vo lanba vala mil gaya tha 'bhan' banbe men viti 'isateshana' para, fir riya tha, hamane bhi lapak kar gireban pe hath dal diya.
poochha kaun 'khan' yiha kan tafarih kar rie ho.
bola, ganv se viru aa riya hai.
hamane bhi rakh ke diya.
ka-dhanno ke sath.
lanboo bola-naeen soorama bhaee basanti ke sath vaeen ganv men raita hai, kheti karata hai, bich-bich men 'bhatijon' ko dekhane main bhi aata-jata raita hoon.
sunake 'khan' apan ne to jay ko bhaeen jhad pila di.
ka 'pathana' vo to udhar sait ho gaya, too kyon jhan mar riya hai.
bhaeen kyon naeen chala jata.
sunakar 'khan' lanboo meri bushshart pakadakar rone laga, bola-jhan budhape men bhi khoob kam mil riya hai, soorama bhaee kaise jaoon...? mainne bhi kai diya, too bhopal aaja bhaeen rahenge, bola-meri to najadikee hai tumhare 'sera' se, tumhari bhabhi bhaeen kee to hain.
khoob aaya hoon.
kya 'sera' hai, kya log hain, kya tahajib hai, kya jheelen hain, kya kabab hain..., vahin bainch pe baitha ke hath nacha-nacha ke lanboo 'sera' ke lie 'vais ovara' karane laga.
hamane to use viru kee tren dikhake dudakee mar li.
naee to 'khan' shahar ke nam pe itana 'imosanala' ho ke fail riya tha lanboo ki viru ko lene ke bajae doosari tren se hamare sath bhopalaee aa jata.
badi mohabbat hai lanboo ke dil men 'sera' ke lie.
...aur soorama bhaee shahar ka chakkar lagaya kya? abakee bar hamane bhi kuchh 'imosanala' hote hue lokal mamalat men unaka fidabaik chaha.
soorama bhaee-...to ka jhan baith ke kanakauve uda rie hain 'khan'.
mini bas men ghoom ke dekha hai poora 'sera' .
kya bhinnaut aavajen lagate hain.
das...
gyirah...
barah...
naka!, kaun 'khan' kan jana hai? aisa lagata hai sari umar jhaneen bason men baitha ghoomata rahoon.
abakee bar soorama bhaee 'nasateljika' hote se dikh pade.
hamane bhi bat badali aur kaha soorama bhaee bhopali tahajib ke bare men kuchh batao, kuchh chenj dikha kya? ya vaisa hi sab kuchh lag raha hai aapako.
soorama bhaee- 'pathan miyan', abe tum jindagi men kuchh 'silo' chaloge to tab na janoge tahajib ko, urdoo ke shabd rat lie, tahajib-tahajib karane lage.
pahale dimag par jhadan firao miyan.
ab soorama bhaee nafasat-najakat ka kriya karm karake mujhapar nikalate se dikhe.
bole- abe, tahajib koee vilayati food jaisi aisaee-vaisaee chij hai kya ki khaya aur 'raipara' fenka.
yihin dil-jigar-fefadon men basi hai tahajib-akhalak-ravayaten.
kasam se, kabr men bhi sath jaegi.
abakee bar soorama bhaee ke chehare par mujhe 'dil ' najar aane laga.
ve fir bole tumhari 'ingalish...
chand rupae...
rishton ko, bhasha ko bhula denge kya? ab soorama bhaee kee aankhen chhalakane lagin aur mujhe apani bat par afasos sa hone laga.
are, isalie nahin ki soorama bhaee 'imosanala' ho rahe hain, balki yoon ki ve ab gyan dene vale the.
han-han karane par bhi aur n-n karane par to aur bhi jyada ki shayad main thik se samajh nahin pa raha hoon isalie .
samane vale ko ganbhir hota dekh purani bimari kee tarah unakee lidarana pravritti ubharane si lagati thi.
mainne bhi baton ko giyar kuchh badalate hue unase poochha ki kab ke gae aap ab laut rahe hain.
itane varshon men shahar men kya badalav dekh rahe hain?
soorama bhaee-'aman miyan', ' banakababa' khao, namakeen chay pio to tumhare bheje kee varjish hogi aur jai aisaee-vaisaee baten bhan se nikalana band hongi.
kahakar sooramabhaee fir 'lapaka' lene lage.
bole-jan tumhen bata-bata ke halak sukho riya hoon ki 'ser-sera' hai, jafaran jaisa...
mahak jati naeen hai, tum ho 'miyan' kee rashan-pani lekar 'sera' par chadhe-daude aarie ho.
jinda kaumon kee khushboo se mahakata hai 'sera' .
tum to aman kabristan ke chirag horiye ho roshani ke bajae lapalapate hi jariye ho.
hamen dekho miyan poori umar 'sera' ke nam khate rahe, bhasha ke nam par roji chalate rahe.
man jaisa 'saira' ne sanbhala- bhasha- hunar diya.
aaj soorama bhaee ka intaravyoo kar rahe ho khan, kaun soorama bhaee bhi hsti ban gaya hai isalie n.
apane log kee duaa se kabiliyat aaee hai.
jo log 'sera' men buraiyan dekhate hain .
mere kanne ekabar lao to jara sina khol kai 'dila' dikhaega soorama bhaee.
naeen to lapada lagakai bheje kee baitari ke vayar tait kar dega.
soorama bhaee fir purane rang men aate dikhaee dene lage.
main bhi unhen unake majame ke havale karake nikal liya.
dil men kasak lie ki shahar ko bisoorate logon ko kash ek bar men soorama bhaee ka yah 'eksakloosiv intaravyoo' padhava sakoon.
sochata hoon ki manav kee asali khoj kee disha‚ dharati se chand kee nahin.
balki sharir se aatma kee hai aur honi chahie.
mandir se manake andar kee hai aur honi chahie.
sukha‚ shanti aur aanand ka bhandar to aatma men hai‚ n ki chanda‚ sooraj aur grahon men.
n ki mandir aur tirth sthanon par.
jis tarah prabhu ko pyar karane vala‚ apani yatra mandir se shuroo karata hai.
par jaise jaise vo gyan ko prapt karata jata hai‚ vaise vaise vo samajhane lag jata hai ki prabhu ka vas to har sthan par hai.
vo ek din mandir jana hi chhod, deta hai.
usake lie har sthan hi mandir jaisa ho jata hai.
har samay hi prarthana ka samay ho jata hai.
aur vo har pal hi sukha‚ shanti aur aanand mahasoos karata hai.
fir usakee sari khoj khatm ho jati hai.
yahi vo kala hai‚ jo manav ko sikhani hai.
yahi vo vidya hai‚ jise manav ko prapt karana hai.
isake bina har kala bearth hai.
isake bina har vidya bekar hai.
aaj is kala aur vidya ko samajhane‚ sikhane aur grahan karane vale bahut hi kam hain.
har desh ka apana dharm hota hai.
har desh kee apani sabhyata aur sanskaॄti hoti hai.
har desh kee apani bhasha hoti hai.
ye nirbhar karata hai us desh aur us desh ke dharm par.
har desh ke dharm aur bhasha ka apana star hota hai‚ apani sima hoti hai.
ek desh ka dharm aur bhasha skool kee tarah hoti hai.
doosare desh ka dharm aur bhasha kalej kee tarah hoti hai.
tisare desh ka dharm aur bhasha yoonivarsiti kee tarah hoti hai.
jis desh ka dharm aur bhasha skool kee avastha men hain‚ vo apane bachchon ko kalej ya yoonivarsiti kee shiksha ya vidya nahin de sakata.
skool ke vidyarthi ko‚ yoonivarsiti ke vidyarthi tak pahunchane ke lie ek lambe samay aur kathin parishram kee aavashyakata hoti hai.
lekin aaj n to koee samay nikalana chahata hai aur n hi koee itani mehanat karani chahata hai.
fir bhi har manav chahata hai ki use turanta‚ bina parishram kie sabakuchh mil jae.
jo ki asanbhav hai.
isilie manav shortakat dhoondhata hai.
chand par pahunchana bahut aasan hai‚ par man tak pahunchana bahut mushkil hai.
chand par pahunchane vala bahut kuchh khokar bhi kuchh nahin pata.
lekin man tak pahunchane vala bina kuchh khoe‚ sabakuchh pa jata hai.
sabakuchh jit jata hai.
isilie guroo nanak dev ne kaha hai: man jitto jag jit.
uttar pradesh men ek sarakari adhikari ne sharab ke nashe men dhut apani beti kee saheli se badsalookee karane ka prayas kiya aur beti dvara isaka virodh karane par use jamakar mara-pita aur sari hadon ko todate hue apane beti ke sath hi balatkar kar dala.
beti dvara isakee shikayat karane par aala afasaron ne ghatana kee janch ka jimma aaropit adhikari ko hi saunp diya.
shikayat kiye jane se baukhalaye adhikari pita ne usake bad apani beti ke sath kaee bar balatkar kiya.
antatah pratadanaon se trast aakar beti ne ek door ke rishtedar ke sang shadi kar li.
marji ke khilaf shadi karane par adhikari pita ne usakee sasural men jamakar todafod kee aur bhade ke logon dvara usako sasural se jabaran uthava kar apani anaitik karatooton ke gavah bane garbh ka garbhapat karava diya.
varsh 2001 men ghatit is ghatana kee riport rajy mahila aayog v any sangathanon ke hastakshep ke bad varsh 2006 men hi jakar likhi gayi.
isi prakar ek any ghatanakram men jab ek garib chhatra ne haee skool pariksha achchhe ankone se pas karane ke bad intar men dakhila lena chaha to usake parijanon ne use dapat diya aur antatah padhaee jari rakhane se mana karane par naraj chhatra ne tren ke samane koodakar apani jan de di.
aise n jane kitane vakaye samaj men roj ghatit hote hain aur log use ghareloo vivad manakar prakaran ko vahin samapt kar dena chahate hain.
ghareloo hinsa ka tatkalik asar bhale hi sirf utpiditon par dikhe par isaka dooragami asar vaiyaktik sambandhon ke sath-sath poore parivar, samaj v antatah rashtr par padata hai.
paramparaon ke nam par ek lokatantrik rashtr men kisi bhi prakar kee hinsa ko uchit nahin thaharaya ja sakata.
antatah aajadi ke 59 varshon bad sarakar ko ghareloo mahilaon kee yad aayi aur 26 aktoobar 2006 ko 'ghareloo hinsa nishedh kanoon-2005' lagoo ho gaya.
bharatiy sanskriti men ek or jahan nari ko poojaniy mana gaya hai vahin ghareloo hinsa samet bahut sare anyay vah apani kismat manakar sahati rahi hain.
yah anayas hi nahin hai ki ladakiyon ke sath sabase jyada chhedachhad aur balatkar unake parivarik sadasyon aur nikat rishtedaron dvara hi hote rahe hain.
yahi nahin bharat men sal bhar men 2,90,000 betiyan kokh men hi mar di jati hain aur isake lie bakayada lagabhag 450 karod roopaye ka bhroon hatya ka karobar chal raha hai.
par ab puroosh aham se vashibhoot hokar bat-bat par mahilaon aur bachchon par apana gussa utarane valon kee khair nahin hai.
main maike chali jaoongi tum dekhate rahiyo, ab purani bat ho jaegi kyonki mahilayen patiyon se tang aakar apane mata-pita ke pas nahin varan najadikee thane men riport darj karati najar aayengi.
is kanoon ke tahat mahilaon ke khilaf ghareloo hinsa ko vyapak arthon men lete hue yaun sambandhi, sharirik, manasik, aarthik, bhavanatmak ke sath-sath maukhik pratadana ko bhi shamil kiya gaya hai aur ghareloo hinsa ko panch vargon men bantakar use aur bhi spasht kar diya gaya hai-
sharirik hinsa- marapit, thappad, thokar marana, dant katana, lat marana, mukka marana, dhakka dena, dhakelana, kisi aur tarike se sharirik takalif dena.
laingik hinsa - jabaradasti yaun sambandh banana, ashlil sahity ya koee any ashlil tasviren ya samagri ko dekhane ke lie majaboor karana, kisi doosare ka man bahalane ke lie majaboor karana, durvyavahar karana, apamanit karana ya nicha dikhane ke lie laingik prakriti ka koee doosara karm jo mahilaon ke samman ko kisi n kisi roop men chot pahunchata ho, balakon ke sath yaunik durvyavahar.
maukhik aur bhavanatmak hinsa - majak udana, galiyan dena, charitr aur aacharan par dosharopann, ladaka n hone ke lie beijjat karana, bachcha n hone par tana dena, dahej ke saval par apamanit karana, skool, kalej ya kisi any shaikshanik sansthan men jane se rokana, naukari karane se rokana, naukari chhodane ke lie majaboor karana, mahila ya usake sath rahane vale kisi bachche@bachchi ko ghar se jane se rokana, kisi vyakti vishesh se milane se rokana, ichchha ke khilaf shadi karane par majaboor karana, pasand ke vyakti se shadi karane se rokana, aatmahatya karane kee dhamakee dena, koee aur maukhik ya bhavanatmak durvyavahar.
ahinsak hinsa - mahila ya mahila kee santanon ko bharann-poshan ke lie paisa nahin dena, mahila ya usakee santanon ko khana, kapada aur davaiyan jaisi chijen muhaiya n karana, jis ghar men mahila rah rahi hai usase nikalane par majaboor karana, ghar ke kisi hisse men jane ya kisi hisse ke istemal se rokana, rojagar karane se rokana, kisi rojagar ko apanane men badha pahunchana, mahila ke vetan ya parishramik ko jabaradasti hadap lena, kapade ya doosari rojamarra ke ghareloo istemal kee chijon ke prayog se rokana, agar kirae ke makan men rah rahi ho to kiraye n dena, bina mahila kee soochana aur sahamati ke bagair streedhan ya any moolyavan vastuon ko bech dena ya bandhak rakhana, streedhan ko kharch kar dena, bijali aadi jaise any bilon ka bhugatan n karana.
dahej se juda utpidan - dahej ke lie kisi bhi prakar kee mang, dahej se jude kisi any utpidan men shamil rahana.
is kanoon kee sabase badi visheshata yah hai ki yah har us mahila par lagoo hoga, jo kisi ghar ke dayare men rahati hai, bhale hi vah kisi bhi dharm kee ho.
yahi nahin bina vivah ke sath rahane vali mahila, vidhava aur bahanon ko bhi is kanoon ke dayare men liya gaya hai.
niyam- kayadon ke ullanghan ko sangyey aur gair jamanati aparadh mana jayega evan doshi paye jane par ek sal kee saja ya 20 hajar roopaye jurmana ya fir donon sajayen ho sakati hain.
patni aur bachchon ko jivan nirvah ke liye dhan n dene kee sthiti men adhiniyam kee dhara-18 ke tahat patni apane stree dhan, gahane -jevar aur kapadon ko kabje men le sakegi.
sath hi aisi sthiti men bina kort kee ijajat ke sanyukt baink khaton aur baink lokar ka bhi upayog nahin kiya ja sakega.
adhiniyam kee dhara-19 ke tahat mahilaon aur bachchon ko ghar men rahane se roka nahin ja sakata aur n hi aise gharon ko becha ja sakata hai.
kiraye ka makan hone par usi tarah kee suvidhaon se yukt doosara makan dilana bhi badhyakari hoga.
is kanoon ke uchit kriyanvayan ke liye jilon men mahila sanrakshan adhikari kee niyukti bhi kee jayegi.
yadyapi har kanoon ke duroopayog kee sanbhavanayen rahatin hain par antatah usaka parinam usake kriyanvayan par nirbhar karata hai.
nishchitatah is kanoon ke lagoo hone ke bad mahilaon aur bachchon kee sthiti men sudhar aayega aur ek lokatantrik v sabhy samaj kee bhanti mahilaon ko gharon ke andar bhi vaidhanik taur par kuchh adhikar mil sakenge.
yah sahi hai ki jis samaj men nari poojaniy rahi hai vahan kanoon ka bhay dikhana uchit nahin kaha ja sakata par ham is tathy kee avahelana bhi nahin kar sakate ki samaj men ek aisa varg bhi hai jo ghareloo mahilaon v bachchon ko apani jagir samajh paramparaon ka havala dete hue unaka shoshan karata hai aur is sanbandh men koee kanoon n hone par vah apani haden par bhi kar jata hai.
yah sahi hai ki ghareloo parivarik jhagadon ko sulajhane ke lie mel-jol aur sadbhav ko aadhar banaya jana chahiye par antatah hinsa, bhale hi vah pita ya pati dvara ho ek sabhy samaj kee nishani nahin kaha sakata aur ghareloo hinsa nishedh kanoon is sambandh men mil ka patthar sabit hoga.
manushy jati ke lie manushy hi sabase vikat paheli hai.
vah khud apani samajh men nahin aata.

aur kahani ya aakhyayika sahity ka ek pradhan ang hai.
aaj se nahin, aadi kal se hi.
han, aajakal kee aakhyayika men samay kee gati aur roochi se bahut kuchh antar ho gaya hai.
prachin aakhyayika kutoohal pradhan hoti thi, ya adhyatmavishayak.
vartaman aakhyayika sahity ke doosare angon kee bhanti manovaigyanik vishleshan aur manorahasy ke udghatan ko apana dhyey samajhati hai.

koee patrika aisi nahin jisamen kahaniyon kee pradhanata n ho.
yahan tak ki kaee patrikaon men keval kahaniyan hi di jati hain.
kahaniyon ke is prabaly ka mukhy karan aajakal ka jivan-sangram aur samayabhav hai.
ab vah jamana nahin raha ki ham ‘bostane khayala’ lekar baith jaen aur sare din usi ke kunon men vicharate rahen.
ab to ham jivan sangram men itane tanmay ho gaye hain ki hamen manoranjan ke lie samay hi nahin milata.
agar kuchh manoranjan svasthy ke lie anivary n hota, aur ham vikshipt hue bina nity atharah ghante kam kar sakate to shayad ham manoranjan ka nam bhi n lete.
lekin prakriti ne hamen vivash kar diya hai.
ham chahate hain ki thode se thode samay men adhik se adhik manoranjan ho jae.
isilie sinema grihon kee sankhya din b din badhati jati hai.
jis upanyas ko padhane men mahinon lagate usaka aanand ham do ghanton men utha lete hain.
kahani ke lie pandrah-bis minat hi kafi hain.
ataev ham kahani aisi chahate hain ki vah thode se thode shabdon men kahi jae, usamen ek vaky, ek shabd bhi anavashyak n aane pae, usaka pahala hi vaky man ko aakarshit kar le, aur ant tak hamen mugdh kie rahe, aur isake sath hi kuchh tatv bhi hon.
tatvahin kahani se chahe manoranjan bhale ho jae, manasik tripti nahin hoti.
yah sach hai ki ham kahaniyon men upadesh nahin chahate, lekin vicharon ko uttejit karane ke lie, man ke sundar bhavon ko jagrit karane ke lie kuchh n kuchh avashy chahate hain.
vahi kahani safal hoti hai, jisamen in donon men se ek avashy upalabdh ho.
sabase uttam kahani vah hoti hai jisaka aadhar kisi manovaigyanik saty par ho.
sadhu pita ka apane kuvyasani putr kee dasha se duhkhi hona manovaigyanik saty hai.
is aaveg men pita ke manovegon ko chitrit karana aur tadanukool unake vyavaharon ko pradarshit karana kahani ko aakarshak bana sakata hai.
bura aadami bhi bilakul bura nahin hota, usamen kahin n kahin devata avashy chhipa hota hai, yah manovaigyanik saty hai.
us devata ko khol kar dikha dena safal aakhyayika lekhak ka kam hai.
vipatti par vipatti padane se manushy kitana diler ho jata hai.
yahan tak ki vah bade bade sankaton ka samana karane ke lie tal thonk kar taiyar ho jata hai.
usakee durvasana bhag jati hai, usake hriday ke kisi gupt sthan men chhipe hue jauhar nikal aate hain aur hamen chakit kar dete hain.
yah ek mano vaigyanik saty hai.
ek hi ghatana ya durghatana bhinn-bhinn prakriti ke manushy ko bhinn-bhinn roop se prabhavit karati hai.
ham kahani men isakee safalata ke sath dikha saken to kahani avashy aakarshak hogi.

pashchatap aise dvandvon ka akhand srot hai.
ek bhaee ne apane doosare bhaee kee sampatti chhal kapat se apaharan kar li hai.
use bhiksha mangate dekh kar kya chhali ko jara bhi pashchatap n hoga? agar aisa n ho to vah manushy nahin hai.

vishleshan aur vivechan bhi aavashyak hai.
chahe achchhaee ho ya buraee spashtikaran kee aavashkata uchit hai.
aatm nirapeksh hona rachana aur aalochana donon ke lie aavashyak hai.
aalochana bhi ek tarah ka kalatmak chintan hai aur srijan bhi isalie vastavik manav jivan ka gyan hue bina vah vivek vikasit nahin ho sakata jo rachana to kya aalochana karm ke lie bhi aavashyak hai.
aisi aalochana rachana se kam prabhavi nahin hoti.
aisi aalochana sar sangrah ka kary karati hai.
tabhi rachana men jo avanchhaniy hain, aalochana usaka nishedh aur virodh bhi karati hai.
yah virodh bhi rachanatmak hain.
aalochana ka kam bhale hi rakhavare aur prahari ka n ho par use rachanatmakata kee raksha karani padati hai.
rachana usase yahi apeksha karati hai.
at: yah dekhana aavashyak hai ki aalochana ke pas chijon ko vyavasthit roop dene kee kshamata hai ya nahin, usake pas gyanatmak aur sanvedanatmak prakash hai ki nahin, vah jin aujaron se raksha karana chahati hai ve aujar morche ke lie upayukt bhi hain ya nahin.
isaka bahut jyada samanyikaran is lie sanbhav nahin hai; kyonki rachana prakriya bhi ek samanyikrit prakriya nahin hai aur n hi rachanaprakriya ko yantreekrit kiya ja sakata hai.
vastut: rachana prakriya bahut kuchh aatmabaddh kriya bhi ho jati hai parantu aatmakenndrit nahin ; at: usakee samajikata bhi nasht nahin hoti hai.
at: alag-alag rachanakar rachana prakriya ka bhinn-bhinn anubhav arjit karata hai aur vah sanvedan kee navinata kee khoj karata hai.
aalochana ka kam sabhi ko ek lathi se hankane ke saman nahin hai.
use apane aujaron ka ek hi anupat aur santulan sarvatr prayog karane kee chhoot nahin di ja sakati.
isake parinam kabhi bhi achchhe nahin nikale hain.
aisi sthiti rachana ke sath nyay kataee nahin kar sakati.
yah bhi jaroori nahin hai ki ek samikshak alag-alag rachanakaron ka ek jaisa eprisiyetiv vishleshan aur moolyankan kare, par isaka yah bhi matalab nahin ki ham is aalochak ke sampoorn aalochana karm ko hi kharij karaden.
kaee bar poori aalochana ke bhitar hamen prakash kee ek aisi halkee aur barik kiran mil jati hai ki ham usi kee roshani men rachana kee gaharaiyon tak pahunch jate hain.
isalie aalochana se sar sangrah kee mang karana bhi galat nahin kaha jayega.
jahan tak rachana ka prashn hai chunav yahan bhi karana padata hai.

ab jaduee yatharth ka yug hai marks aur lenin aprasangik ho gae hain.

usane ghanti bajaee, chaparasi se pani aur fir chay lane ko kaha aur ulte usane mujhase janana chaha ki ye fenomina uttar aadhunikata aakhir kya hai ? mainne kaha - jaise modarnijm matalab aadhunikata purane roodhivadi mahaul men ek khulapan aur sampannata, adhik suvidhaen laya vaise hi ab post modarnijm aa gaya hai, matalab khulepan kee intiha, sampannata kee intiha, aur suvidhaon kee intiha ho gaee hai.
aadhunikata ke bad ab uttar aadhunikata ka jamana hai.
aap bataen is bare men aap kya sochate hain.

han kabhi lagata tha ki log padh likh kar modarn ho gae hain.
par dekhie hamare desh kee halat to bahut kharab hai.

ye kya hota hai ?

vah bola, isake bad kya hoga babooji, aap hi kahen, havaee jahaj bhi hai, ab aage kya aaega ?

har chij ko upayogita kee drishti se dekhane par unhonne khasi narajagi jahir kee aur bahut krodh ke sath bataya uttar aadhunikata ka virodh, samrajyavad ka virodh hai, maltineshanals ka virodh hai, globalaijeshan ka virodh hai, libarelaijeshan ka virodh hai, apasanskriti ka virodh hai, patanashil moolyon ka virodh hai, aakhir kitane log hain jo ye virodh kar rahe hain ? kitane log is ladaee men shamil hain?

Kisi ladke ko patana aap ladkiyon ke liye zyaada badi baat nahi hai.
Agar kisi ladke ko pata chal jaaye ki aap use chahti hain to wo khud hi dum hilaate hilaate aapke peeche aa jayega.
Ek to ladkon ko uchit ladki nahi milti – aisa sunhera avsar wo kadachit nahi chhodenge.
Fir bhi kuch doodh ke dhoole ladke honge jo aap ki bhavnaon ko samajhne mein waqt lagate ho.
Tab aap ke paas ek hi raasta hai – Dhongibaba ke sujhaav.
Chalo aage padhiye ladkon ko patane ke 13 tarike.
1.
Ladkon ko hasmukh ladkiyan badi pasand aati hain.
Tum uske ghatiya se ghatiya baat par bhi zor-zor se haso.
Wo bahut khush ho jayega aur tumhe chahne lagega.
2.
Tum jis ladke ko chahti ho uske doston ke saath thodi flirting kiya karo.
Tum jise chahti ho use bilkul bhav mat do.
Wo jalan se aag-baboola ho jayega.
Tumhare prem mein wo joru ka ghulam ban jayega.
3.
Jis ladke ko tum chahte ho, uske doston se uske baare mein poochti raha karo.
Par khud usse kabhi baat mat karna.
Wo khud tumse baat karne ko vyakul ho jayega.
Fir tum use apne prem jaal mein faans lena.
4.
Use jab bhi milo to hamesha akele hi mila karo.
Aur uski taarif kar diya karo – kabhi chehre ki, kabhi kapdon ki to kabhi shareer ki.
Ek din keh dena, aaj to bade mustande lag rahe ho.
Wo paagal hokar tumhare kadmon mein gir padega.
5.
Jise tum chahti ho uski behen se dosti kar lo.
Aur uski behen se hamesha meethi-meethi baatein karke uske ghar aana jaana chalu kar do.
Baaton baaton mein bata dena use ki tum uske bhai ko pasand karti ho.
Baaki ka wo khud hi sambhal legi.
6.
Ladkon ko sharmeeli ladkiyan bahut achhi lagti hain isiliye jab bhi usse milo to ekdum sharmeela pan dikhao.
Wo baat karne ki koshish kare to sharma kar bhaag jao.
Kuch aur kahe to keh do ki mujhe sharam aati hai.
Uska dil pighal jaayega.
7.
Jab bhi ghoomne jao aur paise kharch karne ka waqt aaye to tum bhi paise kharch kiya karo.
Ladkon ko ye lagta hai ki agar unke jeevan mein koi ladki aayi to jeb dheeli ho jayegi.
Tum kharcha karogi to wo khush ho jayega aur tumhe chahne lagega.
Ek baar pyaar ho gaya fir tum batwa ghar bhool jaana – sab chalta hai.
8.
Use boldo ki uski shakal-soorat aur baal kisi filmi hero se milte hain.
Ye jhooti baatein bolte waqt hasna mat.
Phir kya, wo is kadar tumhare liye paagal ho jaayega ki tum soch bhi nahi sakti.
9.
Uske doston se bolo ki tumhare peeche to ladkon ki line lagi hai lekin tum shayad us ladke ko pasand karti ho.
Jab ye baat ghoom phirkar us ladke tak pahunchegi to ismein uske doston ne itna mirch masala laga diya hoga ki tumhara kaam ban jaayega.
10.
Agar uske paas gaadi ya bike hai, to use kaho ki tumhe thoda ghumane le jaaye.
Kabhi lift maang liya karo.
Jhoot-moot ka anand dikhao.
Baaton baaton mein use apni mohmaya ke jaal mein fasa lo.
11.
Use jis khel men ruchi hai tum bhi wahi khel khelo.
Aue khelte samay ki tasveeren apne facebook mein post kardo.
Jab tumhe hazaaron ladkon ke comments aayenge to wo khud hi tumhare baare mein soch soch kar tumhe apna dil de baithega.
12.
Usse har choti-choti baaton ke liye salaah-mashwara liya karo.
Wo khud ko khoob samajhdaar samjhega aur tum uski isi bewakoofi ka faayda uthakar usse meethi meethi baatein karti rehna.
13.
Aajkal ke zyaadatar ladke to pyaar ke naam par sirf ladkiyon ke dilon se khelna hi jaante hain.
Isiliye hum to yahi kahenge, ladkiyon, in dushton se jitna door hi rahogi utni zyaada sukhi rahogi.
Lekin fir bhi honhaar ladke to hote hain hamari tarah.
Unhe pehchaan lo aur prem jeevan ka anand uthao.

Dhongibaba laaye hain aapke liye garmi se bachne ke ek dozen aadhunik tarike.
Faila do thand chutki mein.
1.
Refrigerator mein paani thanda karke usse hi nahaya karo.
Paani bhi bachega aur garmi bhi pal bhar mein gaayab ho jaayegi.
Nahane ke pehle ek sardi ki goli lena avashyak hoga.
2.
Hamari tarah fashionable goggles pehen ke hi ghar se niklo.
Par dhyaan rahe goggles ISO pramanit hone chahiye.
3.
Garmi ke mausam mein kapdon ko almari mein rakhne ke bajaay fridge mein rakhen.
Jooton ko freezer mein rakh do.
Iske baad garmi tumhe chhu bhi nahi payegi.
Ek naya fridge isi kaarya ke liye le lein.
4.
TV par item girls aur cheer girls ko dekhna band karein.
Is se taapman kam hone mein sahayta milegi.
5.
Koi achha sa thanda-thanda wala tel apne sar se leke poore badan par maalish kar lo.
Iske do faayde nakki hain.
Pehla to ye ki tumhara dimag bilkul barf ki tarah thanda rahega aur doosara ye hai ki tumhare aas-paas koi vyakti aane ki himmat nahi karega aur isliye bus aur train mein baithne ki jagah milne mein koi pareshani nai hogi.
6.
Ye khaas ladkon ke liye hain, jinke kamron mein film abhinetriyon ke posters hain.
Hata do inko.
Aadhe se zyaada garmi aise hi kam ho jayegi.
7.
Jaise pyaar baantne se pyaar milta hai vaise hi Ice cream baantne se thand milti hai.
Yakeen nahi aata aazma lo.
Vanilla aur chocolate ice cream ke tees cup kharid ke garibon mein baant do.
Dekhne kaise garmi thand mein badal jayegi.
8.
Kisi saste se swimming pool ki membership le lo.
Usmein roj 4-5 ghante zaroor bitaya karo.
Agar swimming pool nahi hai to apne ghar ki daayen taraf ek 5 feet gehra gadhha khodkar usmein thanda paani bharke kaam chala lo.
9.
Kisi peepal ke ped ke neeche apna basera bana lo.
Itni thandi hawa milegi ki tum gaana gaoge- “Mera man dole mera tan dole”.
Bhooton se savdhaan rehna.
10.
Mirchi ki ice cream banao aur roj ek cup subah shaam kha lo.
Ice cream aap ko thanda kar degi.
Aur mirchi khaate hi pasina chhut jayega jisse rahat milegi.
11.
Hamari tarah kam se kam vastra pehen kar bahar niklo.
Kapde kam pehno lekin ek rang birangi chhata lekar hi ghar se niklo.
12.
Garmi ki chuttiyan manane hamare Himalaya wale aashram mein chale aao.
Humne central AC lagva liya hai.
Lage haath humko bhi milloge aur ashirwaad bhi mil jayega hamara.
Address to hum pehle hi de chuke hain.

mujhe kam sunaee padane laga hai.

agale sire par kuchh gadabad zarur thi.

ab ham ek-doosare se nazaren bacha rahe the.
zahir hai, us din afasar ko mere der se daftar pahunchane par kros lagane ka avasar nahin mila.
par kyoo men khade-khade usane eesaee padariyon kee shaili men kaee bar kros zaroor banaya.
kyoo men khade rahane kee sthiti men kisi bhi vyakti ka nak-bhaun n sikodana apane-aap men boks men prakashit hone ke yogy samachar hai.
nayi pidhi ne to jaise kisi bhi kyoo men khade n hone kee mano kasam kha rakhi hai.
usake nare hain-'ham kyoo men khade nahin rah sakate', 'kyoo men ve khade hon jinhen apane aap par bharosa nahin','kya hamari niyati kyoo men khade rahana hi hain ?' isi prakar ke anek nare hain jo hamen gahe-bagahe sunane ko milate hain.
yahan har honahar kyoo banane ka nek kam n karane tatha kyoo tod kar bhagane ke lie kuchh vaisa vyavahar kar raha hai jaise bharatiy vidhayak mantrimandal men shamil n kie jane par apana dal chhodane ke lie aur adiyal bail apani rassi todane ke lie karata hai.
sare-ka sara desh pradhan mantree banana chahata hai.
par logon kee samajh men itani moti bat kyon nahin aati ki sabr se kyoo men lage raho aur jab bhi mauka aaye,use tod do.
maf keejiye, main hi galati par tha.
moti bat kah kar samajha raha tha, sabako samajh men aa jaegi.
par yah bhool gaya tha ki kuchh logon kee samajh itani moti hoti hai ki usamen moti bat bhi nahin aa sakati.
jahan tak meri bat hai, mainne kyoo men khade hone kee aadat dal li hai.
subah se sham tak main jo sarvadhik mahatvapoorn kam karata hoon, vah kyoo men khada hona hi hai.
subah nau baje jakar daftar kee bas kee kyoo men lag jata hoon aur furasat men kyoo men khada-khada anek yojanaen banakar apani damit ichchhaen poori karata hoon.
amuk vyakti se amuk kam nikal sakata hai,amuk vyakti ko kis prakar nicha dikhaya ja sakata hai, amuk vyakti ko kis prakar ooncha uthaya ja sakata hai aadi-aadi.
yah aakasmik nahin hai ki aadhunik manushy apani samast mahatvapoorn yojanaen kyoo men khada-khada hi banata hai.
fir kyoo men khada-khada akhabar padh leta hoon.
aage ya pichhe khadi ladakee se batachit karane ka bahana talashane kee koshish karata hoon, yani apana ishk bhi kyoo men hi ho jata hai.
is prakar kyoo men khade-khade kitani bar mujhe aisa avasar mila hai jab maine muhabbat ko nae sire se shuroo kiya hai.
kyoo men is prakar, lagatar aur bar-bar khade rahate rahane ka pratap hai ki sinema ke tikat-vikreta se apani dosti hai, rashaning vibhag ke hedaklark apane yar hain, pablik layabreri ka sanchalak mujhe janata hai, post aafis ka vindo klark mera mitr hai.
aur in sab sthanon par kyoo men khada nahin hona padata.
jis prakar dukh aur jel ka sathi jivan bhar ka sathi bana rahata hai, usi prakar kyoo ka sathi bhi aasani se daman chhodane ko taiyar nahin hota.
apane aapako kyoo men khada n karane valon tatha is sthiti kee ninda karane valon kee main ninda karata hoon.
kyoo men khade rahana hamari sabase badi rashtriy aavashyakata hai.
doodh ke dipo se lekar mantriyon ke bangalon tak jahan dekhie kyoo-hi-kyoo najar aati hai.
desh men kyoo sampraday kee jade nirantar gahari hoti ja rahi hain aur hazaron-lakhon log kyoo men khade hain.
aisi halat men svayan ko in kyuon se alag ghoshit karana rashtr virodhi kary hai.
sare desh ka bhavishy in kyuon par aur in kyuon ka bhavishy aap par nirbhar karata hai.
matadata ke daravaje par panch sal men ek bar vot mangane valo kee kyoo lagati hai aur desh ke har kone men matadata rozana kyoo men khada rahata hai.
kyoo men khade hue ye log mere svar men svar milakar aapase nivedan kar rahe hain ki khyoo men khade hone kee aadat avashy daliye.
yah aadat nahin daliega to aapako bhi janasamany kisi neta ka bhaee-bhatija samajhane lagega.
aur agar aap pahale se hi neta hain, tab bhi yah aadat buri nahin rahegi; kyonki aapako ek din matadata ke daravaze par ummidavaron kee kyoo men zaroor khada hona hoga.
ek bar kisi shayar ne apani premika se yah shikava kiya tha:
aur to tumase kya nahin hota
ek vada-e-vafa nahin hota.
yani shayar ne pahale to mahabooba kee stuti kee,usaka gunnagan kiya; use samast vishishtataon aur kshamataon se yukt srishti ke samast karmon aur marmon kee adhishthatree siddh karane kee garaz se pahala misara likha ya yon kahen ki kaha aur bad men use bevafa kahakar bechari ka patta hi kat diya.
ho sakata hai ki vah jamana itana hi kharab ho.
apani is qadar chapaloosi karane vale prashansakon, fainon aur adyatan muhavaron men kahen to chamachon se bhi vafa ka vayada n karate hon aur premiyon,aashikon,prashansakon ko vidhvansak virodhiyon kee bhangima apana kar doosari kism kee panktiyan jodani padi ho.
isalie us zamane ko yaqinan hi purana zamana karar diya ja sakata hai.
par aaj zamana badal chuka hai.
zanane ke tevar badal chuke hain, zamane ke taevar badal chuke hain.
premi, aashik aur prashansakon ke sath-sath mashook,premika or aaradhy badal chuke hain.
ab chahe matr premi ho athava desh-premi yani neta, vayada kuchh is tarah karate hain goya kapade badal rahe hon ya chunav sabha men arzinuma bhashan de rahe hon.
premi premika ke lie aakash ke tare tod lane se lekar bachche khilane tak ka vayada badi aajizi aur vinamrata se karata hai tatha netaji din-dukhi janata ke jivan men buddh jayanti park kee-si khushahali aur hariyali ka vachan dete hain.
adhyapak nalayak vidharthiyon ko tyooshan padha-padhakar layak bana dete hain aur yadi koee vidharthi apani tyooshan ko dharavahik roop se chala nahin pata to usake fel hone kee sanbhavanaen sir uthane lagati hain.
daraasal vayade ka sambandh kayade se itana nahin hai jitana ki fayade se.
baboo sahab ko tarakkee ke aasar nazar aayen to afasar ke ghar sham aur subah kee sabji bina naga pahunchane ka vayada pakka samajho.
bivi ke mayake jane kee khabar sunakar bahut se patiyon ne kanjivaram aur shantiniketan kee sadiyan lane ka vayada kiya hai, use nibaha bhi hai.
is antaral men unhonne apane lie ek adad soot ka fayada kamaya hai.
is sandarbh men 'vada-e-vafa' vali bat itani mahatvapoorn hai hi nahin, jitani ki 'aur to tumase kya nahin hota !' vali ukti.
is par bhi yadi 'kya nahin hota' par hi vichar kiya jae to kaee nayab nuqa te hath lagenge.
yah 'kya nahin hota' lagabhag usi andaz men kaha gaya hai jisamen aksar yah sab kaha-suna jata hai-tyagiyon ke mahal khade hain, brahmachariyon ke bachche kanventon men shiksha prapt kar rahe hain, veshyaen aatmashodh par kavitaen padh rahi hain, akavigan is-us manch se kavitaen padhane ko lalayit hain aur lala jhangoomal aamaran anashan karake bhi har tarah ka chanda kha rahe hain.
yah bat shuroo-shooroo men mere gale isalie nahin utarati thi, kyonki main manata tha, 'kya hota hai ?'meri antaratma aur vivek mujhase kaha karate the: amuk ji har kam beeemani se kar rahe hain, dhokhadhadi kar rahe hain, tumhen unaka virodh karana chahie aur main kahata tha ki mere virodh se kya hota hai ? bazar men chizen nahin mil rahi hain, zaroorat se zayada mahangi mil rahi hain,tum to fizool kee chizen kharidani band kar do,zaroorat se zayada kuchh bhi n lo.
yahan tak ki apani zarooraten bhi kam kar do,kyonki tumhari hi tarah yadi aur log bhi aisa hi karen, ghar nahin bharen to chizon ke dam khud-b-khud gir jaenge aur desh girane se bach jaega aur main kahata raha ki mere karane se kya hota hai ? log sadi gali laingik sadandh se bharapoor kavitaen sahityik goshthiyon men padhate rahe aur kshamashil sajjanon ne unhen yah soch kar naya kar diya ki hamare karane se kya hota hai.
natija yah huaa ki hamare kuchh n karane se kuchh nahin huaa.
amuk ji ka lakhon ka bizanes hai aur buddhijiviyon ko buddhoo samajhate hain, mahangaee din-b-din badhati ja rahi hai aur sadiyal kavitaon ke kavi svayan ko hindi hi nahin, sampoorn bharatiy bhashaon ka ezara paund samajh rahe hain.
'kya nahin hota ?'kee jade gahari karane ka shrey un nagarikon ko (mere ek mitr aise nagarikon ko ganvaron kee sangya pradan karate hain) pramukh roop se jata hai, jinakee manyata hai ki amuk kary ke lie is ya us mantree se kahala dijie, fir dekhate hain yah kam kis tarah nahin hota, is kary ke lie amuk ji ko aaj kisi tarah itani raqam de dijie, kam ho hi jaega; are yar, kabhi-kabhi unase milate julate raha karo n, vah khud hi apane yogy seva poochhate najar aayenge.
samay chahie, taikal karane ka tarika chahie, vyavahar kushalata chahie; kabhi-kabhi zaroorat padane par kakatel parti ka intajam bhi chahie, kya nahin hota ? achchhi-achchhi katavadar, paini aur tani huee moonchhen in karishmon ke samane jhuk jati hain aur poonchhon men parivartit hokar hilati huee najar aane lagati hain.

mahan prakritivigyani charls robart darvin (12 faravari 1809-19 aprail 1882) ko prajatiyon ke vikas kee nayi avadharanaon ke janak ke roop men jana jata hai.
ve aadhunik vigyan ke bhi janak hain.
sabase pahale unhonne hi ye siddhant diya tha ki prajatiyon ka udbhav vikasatmak parivartanon ke karan huaa aur yah vaigyanik thyori bhi sabase pahale unhonne hi di thi ki prakritik chayan vah prakriya hai jisake madhyam se is tarah ke parivartan hote hain.
unhonne chikitsa shastra, bhoovigyan, jiv vigyan, prakritik vigyan, aadi vishayon ka gahara adhyayan kiya aur kaee nayi avadharanaen din.
unhonne apani khojon ke lie lambi lambi yatraen keen aur shodh kiye.
bigal jahaj par unhonne panch varsh kee lambi yatraen keen aur in yatraon ke anubhavon ko vibhinn khojon aur prayogon ke roop men ve samane late rahe.
1859 men likhi apani vishv prasiddh pustak orijin aof speshij se jahan ek or unhen manav vikas kee apani nayi avadharanaon se vishv prasiddhi mili aur ve mahanatam vaigyanikon kee shreni men gine jane lage, vahin doosari or, unhen apane naye aur dharmik vicharon ke karan charch kee narazagi bhi jhelani padi.
roodhigat samaj ko darvin sahab ke manav vikas ke siddhant many nahin the.
charch ko lagata tha ki darvin kee thyori manav aur pashuon ke bich ke mahatvapoorn fark ko hi khatm kar degi.
lekin darvin apani khojon men lage rahe aur har bar naye shodh patron, pustakon aur aalekhon ke madhyam se apani bat kahate rahe.
darvin sahab aajivan bimar hi rahe aur har tarah ke ilaj aajamate rahe.
lekin bar bar hamala karane vali aur lambi bimariyon ne unake hausalon par koee asar nahin dala aur ve marate dam tak apane shodhon me lage rahe.
sanyog se unhonne apani hi kazin emma vejavud se shadi kee thi.
patni ne aajivan unakee seva kee aur unhen har tarah sankaton se door rakhane ka prayas kiya.
lekin shayad bahut najadikee khoon ke rishte men shadi karane ka khamiyaja unhen is roop men bhugatana pada ki unakee sari santanen hamesha bimar rahin.
aadhunik vigyan ko unhonne bahut kuchh diya.
beshak jite ji ve samaj ke, girajaghar ke aur doosare vargon ke hamale jhelate rahe, is bat se inkar nahin kiya ja sakata ki samaj ko unakee den bahut badi hai.
apane akele ke balaboote par unhonne prakritik aur jiv vigyan kee sabhi shakhaon ko samriddh kiya aur manav vikas kee vichar dhara ko ek nayi soch di.
unhonne apani aatm katha apane parivar ke sadasyon ke lie hi likhi thi lekin unake bete fransis darvin ne pita ke jivan ke anachhue pahaluon ko samane lane ke makasad se is aatm katha men apani or se ansh jode hain jinase is pustak ka mahatv aur bhi badh jata hai aur ham ek putr kee nazar se ek mahan pita ke jivan men jhankane ka ek aur mauka pate hain.
isi pustak ke tisare hisse men darvin sahab ke dharm par alag alag manchon se aur niji patron men vyakt kiye gaye vicharon ko shamil kiya gaya hai.
unake ye vichar bhi unake vaigyanik shodhon jitane hi mahatvapoorn hain aur hamari soch ko aaj bhi ek nayi disha dete hain.
hindi pathakon ke samane ye aatm katha pahali bar late hue ham garv ka anubhav kar rahe hain aur vishvas karate hain ki aapako hamara ye prayas achchha lagega.
sooraj prakasha aur ke pi tivari
charlsa darvina kee aatmakatha
anuvad evan prastuti: sooraj prakasha aur ke pi tivari
[mere pita ke aatm kathyatmak sansmaran yahan prastut kiye ja rahe hain.
ye sansmaran unhonne apane ghar parivar aur apane bachchon ke lie likhe the, aur unake man men kattaee yah vichar nahin tha ki kabhi inhen prakashit bhi karaya jayega.
bahut se logon ko yah asambhav lag raha hoga, lekin jo log mere pita ko janate the, ve samajh jaenge ki yah n keval sambhav tha, balki svabhavik bhi tha.
unakee aatmakatha ka shirshak tha mere mana aura vyaktitva vikasa ke sansmaranna aur ye vali antim tippani darj kee gayi thi 3 agast 1876 ko,"mere jivan ka yah rekhachitr hopaden men shayad 28 maee ko shuroo huaa aur usake bad se mainne lagabhag pratidin dopahar ek ghanta lekhan kiya."
yah bat aasani se samajhee ja sakati hai ki yah aatmakatha bahut hi vyaktigat aur pragadh sambandhon ko batate hue, apane parivar ke lie likhi gayi thi, lihaja isamen aise antarang vivaran bhi the, jinhen prakashit kiya jana uchit nahin tha.
mainne hatae gae varnnanon ka jikr bhi nahin kiya hai.
bahut hi zaroori hone par hi kriyapadon kee chook vagairah ko thik kiya hai, lekin is tarah ka badalav bhi kam hi kiya hai - fransis darvina]
ek jarman sampadak ne mujhe likha ki main apane man aur vyaktitv ke vikas ke bare men likhoon.
isamen aatmakatha ka bhi thoda-sa put rahe.
main is vichar se hi romanchit ho gaya.
shayad yah meri santanon ya unakee bhi santanon ke kuchh kam aa jae.
mujhe pata hai jab mainne apane dadaji kee aatmakatha padhi thi to mujhe kaisa laga tha.
unhonne jo socha aur jo kiya, tatha ve jo kuchh karate the, vah sab padha to lekin ye sab bahut sankshipt aur niras-sa tha.
mainne apane bare men jo kuchh likha hai, vah is tarah se likha hai jaise main nahin balki paralok men meri aatma mere jivan aur krityon ko dekh dekhakar likh rahi ho.
mujhe isamen kuchh bhi mushkil nahin aayi.
ab to jivan bas dhalan kee or badh raha hai.
lekhan shaili par mainne koee dhyan nahin diya hai.
mera janm 12 faravari 1809 ko shroojaberi men huaa tha.
mujhe sabase pahali yad us samay kee hai, jab main char baras se kuchh mahine jyada kee umr ka tha.
ham log samudr tat par sair-sapate ke lie gae the.
kuchh ghatanaen aur sthan abhi bhi mere man par dhundhali-si yad ke roop men hain.
main abhi aath baras se kuchh hi bada tha ki julaee 1817 men meri man chal basin, aur badi ajib bat hai ki unakee mrityu shaiyya, kale shanil se bane unake gaun, bade hi jatan se saheji silaee kadhaee kee unakee mej ke alava unake bare men mujhe kuchh bhi yad nahin.
usi sal basant ritu men mujhe shroojaberi ke ek de skool men dakhil kara diya gaya.
usamen main ek baras tak raha.
log-bag mujhe batate the ki chhoti bahan kaitharin ke mukabale main padhaee-likhaee men ekadam fisaddi tha jabaki main to manata hoon ki main kafi shararati bhi tha.
is skool men jane ke samay tak prakritik itihas, aur khas kar vibhinn prakar kee chizon ke sangrah men meri ruchi badh chukee thi.
main paudhon ke nam janane kee koshish karata, aur shankh, billauri patthar, sikke aur dhatuon ke tukade batorata firata rahata.
sangrah karane ka yah junoon kisi bhi vyakti ko salikedar prakritivadi ya kala parakhi hi nahin, use kanjoos bhi banata hai.
jo bhi ho, yah junoon mujhamen tha, aur yah sirf mujhamen hi tha, kyonki mere kisi bhi bhaee ya bahan men is tarah kee ruchi nahin thi.
isi bich ek chhoti-si ghatana mere zehan par pukhta lakeer chhod gayi.
mera vichar hai ki yah mere zehan ko bar bar pareshan bhi kar deti thi.
yah to saf hi tha ki main apane chhutapan men paudhon kee vividhata men ruchi leta tha.
mainne apane ek ham umr bachche (main yah pakka kah sakata hoon ki yah lehatan tha, jo aage chalakar prasiddh shilavalk vigyani aur vanaspati shastree bana) ko bataya ki main bahupushpak aur basant gulab ko kisi khas rang ke pani se sinchoonga to alag hi kism ke fool lagenge.
halanki yah bahut badi ding hankana tha, lekin mainne kabhi isake lie koshish nahin kee thi.
main yah manane men sankoch nahin karoonga ki main bachapan men alag hi tarah kee kapol kalpanaen kiya karata tha, aur ye sab mahaj ek utsukata banae rakhane ke lie karata tha.
aise hi ek bar mainne apane pitaji ke bag men beshakeemati fal batore aur jhadiyon men chhupa die, aur fir hanfata huaa ghar pahunch gaya aur yah khabar faila di ki churae hue falon ka ek dher mujhe jhadiyon men mila hai.
main jab pahali bar skool gaya to shayad buddhoo kism ka raha hooonga.
garanet nam ka ek ladaka ek din mujhe kek kee dukan par le gaya.
vahan usane bina paise die hi kek kharide, kyonki dukanadar use janata tha.
dukan ke bahar nikalane ke bad mainne usase poochha ki tumane dukanadar ko paise kyon nahin die, to vah fauran bola - isalie ki mere ek rishtedar ne is shahar ko bahut badi rakam dan men di thi, aur yah shart rakhi thi ki unake purane hait ko pahanakar jo bhi aae aur kisi bhi dukan par jakar ek khas tarah se apane sir par ghumae to is shahar ke us dukanadar ko bina paise mange saman dena hoga.' isake bad usane apana hait ghumakar mujhe bataya.
usake bad vah doosari dukan men gaya, vahan bhi usakee pahachan thi, us dukan men usane koee chhota-sa saman liya, apane hait ko usi tarah se ghumaya aur bina paise die hi saman lekar bahar aa gaya.
jab ham bahar nikal aae to vah bola, `dekho ab agar tum khud kek vale kee dukan men jana chahate ho (mujhe sahi jagah yad kahan rahane vali thi) to main apana hait de sakata hoon, aur agar tum ise sahi dhang se sir par hilaoge to jo kuchh chahoge, bina dam lie le sakoge.' is dayanatadari ko mainne fauran man liya aur dukan men jakar kuchh kek lie, us purane hait ko vaise hi hilaya jaise bataya gaya tha, aur jyon hi bahar nikalane ko huaa, to dukanadar paise mangate hue meri taraf lapaka.
mainne kek ko vahin fenka aur jan bachane ke lie sir par pair rakhakar bhaga.
jab main apane dhoort dost garanet ke pas pahuncha to use hansate dekhakar main chakit rah gaya.
main apane bachav men kah sakata hoon ki yah bal sulabh shararat thi, lekin is bat ko shararat man lene kee soch meri apani nahin thi, balki meri bahanon kee hidayaton aur nasihaton se mujhamen is tarah kee soch paida huee thi.
mujhe sandeh hai ki manavata koee prakritik ya janmajat gun ho sakati hai.
mujhe ande batorane ka shauk tha, lekin kisi bhi chidiya ke ghonsale se main ek bar men ek hi anda uthata tha, lekin ek bar main sare hi ande utha laya, isalie nahin ki ve beshakeemati the, balki mahaj apani bahaduri jatane ke lie.
mujhe bansi lekar machhali marane ka bada shauk tha.
kisi nadi ya talab ke kinare main ghanton baitha rah sakata tha aur pani kee kal kal sunata rahata tha.
mayer men mujhe bataya gaya ki agar pani men namak dal diya jae to kenchue mar jate hain, aur us din se mainne kabhi bhi jinda kenchuaa bansi kee kantiya men nahin lagaya.
halanki, isase pareshani yah huee ki machhaliyan kam fansati thin.
ek ghatana mujhe yad hai.
tab main shayad de skool men jata tha.
apane ghar ke pas hi men mainne badi hi nirdayata se ek pille ko pita.
isalie nahin ki vah kisi ko nuksan pahuncha raha tha balki isalie ki main apani takat aajama raha tha, lekin shayad mainne use bahut zor se nahin mara tha, kyonki vah pilla zara-bhi kinkiyaya nahin tha.
yah ghatana mere dilo dimag par bojh-si bani rahi, kyonki vah jagah mujhe abhi bhi yad hai, jahan mainne yah gunah kiya tha.
usake bad to jab mainne kutton se pyar karana shuroo kar diya to yah bojh shayad aur bhi badhata gaya, aur usake bad kafi samay tak yah ek junoon kee tarah raha.
lagata hai ki kutte bhi is bat ko jan gae the kyonki kutte bhi apane malik ko chhod mujhe jyada chahane lagate the.
mistar kes ke de skool men jane ke dauran huee ek ghatana aur bhi hai jo mujhe ab tak yad hai, aur vah hai ek draigoon sipahi ko dafanane ka mauka.
abhi tak vah manzar meri aankhon ke samane hai ki kaise ghode par us sipahi ke boot rakh die gae the aur karabain ko kathi se lataka diya gaya tha, fir kabr par goliyan chalayi gayin.
bhitar us samay jaise kisi soye hue kavi kee aatma jag uthi thi.
itana prabhav pada us drishy ka.
san 1818 kee grishm ritu men mera dakhila doktar batalar ke prasiddh skool men kara diya gaya.
yah skool shroojaberi men tha aur san 1825 tak sat sal mainne vahin guzare.
jab yah skool mainne chhoda to meri umr solah baras kee thi.
is skool men padhaee ke dauran mainne sahi mayanon men skooli bachche ka jivan bitaya.
yah skool hamare ghar se bamushkil aadha mil door raha hoga, isalie main hajiri ke bich khali samay aur rat men tale band hone se pahale skool aur ghar ke kaee chakkar laga leta tha.
main samajhata hoon ki ghar ke prati judav aur ruchi ko barakarar rakhane men yah kafi madadagar raha.
skool ke shuruaati dinon ke bare men mujhe yad hai ki mujhe samay par pahunchane ke lie kafi tej daudana padata tha, aur tej dhavak hone ke karan main aksar safal hi hota tha.
lekin jab bhi mujhe sandeh hota tha to adhirata se eeshvar se prarthana karane lagata tha, aur mujhe yad hai ki apani kamayabi ka shrey main hamesha eeshvar ko deta tha, apane tej daudane ko nahin, aur hairan hota tha ki prabhu ne meri kitani madad kee hai.
mainne kaee bar apane pita aur didi ko yah kahate suna ki jab main kafi chhota tha to sannyasiyon kee tarah dag bharata tha, lekin mujhe aisa kuchh yad nahin aata hai.
kaee bar main apane aap men kho jata tha.
aise hi ek bar skool se lautate samay shahar kee purani chaharadivari par chahalakadami karata huaa aa raha tha.
chaharadivari ko logon ke chalane layak to bana diya gaya tha, lekin abhi ek taraf munder nahin banayi gayi thi.
achanak hi mera pair fisala aur main sat aath fut kee oonchaee se niche aa gira.
is dauran mujhe ek vichitra-sa anubhav huaa.
achanak aur apratyashit roop se girane aur niche pahunchane men bahut hi thoda samay laga tha, lekin is thode se samay ke bich hi mere dimag men itane vichar kaundh gae ki main chakit rah gaya, jabaki manovaigyanik kahate hain ki pratyek vichar ke lie kafi samay lagata hai, par mujhe to alag hi anubhav huaa tha, aur mera ye anubhav unase bilakul hi alag tha.
doktar batalar ke skool men mere dimag ka jo vikas huaa usase bekar aur vahiyat ghatana doosari nahin ho sakati.
yah skool poori tarah se puratan panthi tha.
prachin bhoogol aur itihas ko chhod kar kuchh bhi nahin padhaya jata tha.
skooli talim ke roop men mere pas shoony tha.
apane poore jivan kal men main kisi bhi bhasha men maharath hasil nahin kar paya.
kavita karane par khas taur se zor diya jata tha, aur isamen bhi main koee tir nahin mar saka tha.
mere bahut se dost the, aur sabake pas dekhen to kul mila kar tukabandiyon ka achchha sangrah ho jata tha.
bas, inhin tukabandiyon men jod tod karake, aur doosare ladakon kee madad se main bhi is vishay men thoda bahut hath saf kar leta tha.
skool men jyada zor is bat par diya jata tha ki kal jo kuchh padha tha use achchhi tarah se ghont kar yad kar lo, aur yah kam main bakhoobi kar leta tha.
subah chaipal men hi main homar ya varjil kee chalis pachas panktiyan yad kar leta tha.
lekin yah kavayad bhi ekadam bekar thi, kyonki pratyek pady mahaj adatalis ghante men bisar jata tha.
main aalasi nahin tha, aur pady rachana ko chhod den to main shastreey pathan men nishthapoorvak mehanat karata tha, sirf tota ratant nahin karata tha.
mujhe hores ke muktak bahut pasand the, aur is prakar ke kavy adhyayan ka ekamatr aanand mujhe hores men hi mila.
jab mainne skool chhoda to main apani umr ke mutabik n to bahut medhavi tha aur n hi ekadam nikhattoo, lekin mere sabhi mastar aur mere pita mujhe bahut hi samany ladaka samajhate the, balki buddhimani men samany paimane se bhi niche hi manate the.
ek bar pitaji ne mujhase kaha,`bandook chalane, kutton aur choohon ko pakadane ke alava tumhe kisi kam kee paravah nahin hai.
tum khud ke lie aur sare parivar ke lie ek kalank ho.' yah sunakar main bahut hi khinn ho gaya.
main ek bat aur bhi kahoonga ki mere pita bahut hi dayalu the, aur unakee yadadasht ka to main kayal hoon.
shayad us din ve bahut hi gusse men the, jo aise kathor shabd unhonne mujhase kahe.
skooli jivan ke dauran apane vyaktitv nirman par nazar dalate hue main kah sakata hoon ki is dauran mujhamen kuchh aise gunon ka bhi vikas ho raha tha jo bhavishy kee aadharashila the, jaise ki meri ruchiyan vividhatapoorn thin.
jis chiz men meri ruchi hoti thi usake prati main utsah se bhar jata tha, aur kisi bhi jatil vishay ya chiz ko samajhane men mujhe bahut aanand aata tha.
mujhe yooklid padhane ke lie ek praivet tyootar aate the.
mujhe achchhi tarah se yad hai ki rekhaganit ke pramey siddh karane men mujhe bahut aanand aata tha.
isi tarah mujhe yah bhi yad hai ki jab mujhe ankal (fransis geltan ke pita) ne bairomitar ke varniyar siddhant samajhae to main kitana khush huaa tha.
vigyan ke alava meri ruchi alag alag kitabon men bhi thi.
sheksapiyar ke aitihasik natak liye main skool kee moti divar men bani khidakee men baithakar ghanton padhata rahata tha.
yahi nahin, main thamasan kee `sijana' aur bayaran tatha skot kee kavitaon ka bhi aanand leta tha.
mainne kavitaon ka zikr isalie kiya ki aage chal kar sheksapiyar sahit sabhi prakar ke kavy men meri ruchi khatm ho gaee.
mujhe is bat ka dukh bhi hai.
kavy se milane vale aanand ke bare men ek ghatana aur batata hoon ki 1882 men vels kee simaon par ham ghudasavari karate hue sair kar rahe the aur drishyon men jo jivant rang kavy ne bhara tha vah mere man par kisi bhi any saundaryaparak aanand kee tulana men kahin adhik samay tak bana raha.
skooli jivan ke shuruaati daur kee hi bat hai, ek ladake ke pas `vandarsa aofa di varlda' namak kitab thi.
main aksar vah kitab padhata tha aur usamen likhi huee kaee baton kee sachchaee ke bare men doosare ladakon ke sath bahas bhi karata tha.
main yah manata hoon ki yahi kitab padh kar mere man men door daraj ke deshon kee yatra karane ka vichar aaya, aur yah vichar tab poora huaa jab mainne bigala se samudri yatra kee.
skooli jivan ke bad ke daur men mujhe nishanebaji ka shauk raha.
mujhe nahin lagata ki jitana utsah mujhe chidiyon ke shikar ka rahata tha, utana koee aur kisi bade se bade dharmik kary men bhi kya dikhata raha hoga.
mujhe achchhi tarah se yad hai ki jab mainne kunal pakshee ka shikar kiya, to main itana uttejit ho gaya tha ki mere hath kanpane lage aur bandook men doosari goli bharana mere lie mushkil ho gaya.
yah shauk kafi samay tak bana raha aur main achchha khasa nishanebaj ban gaya.
kaimbrij men padhane ke dauran main aaine ke samane khada hokar bandook ko jhatake se kandhe par rakhane kee kavayad karata tha, taki bandook kandhe par ekadam sidhi raha kare.
ek aur bhi khel main kiya karata tha ki apane kisi dost ko kah deta tha ki vah momabatti jalakar pakade, aur fir bandook kee nali par dat lagakar goli chalata tha, agar nishana sahi hota tha to hava ke dabav se chhota-sa dhamaka hota aur nali par lagi dat se tikha patakha bolata tha.
mere ek tyootar ne is ajib-si ghatana ka jikr kiya tha ki lagata hai mistar darvin ghanton apane kamare men khade hokar chabuk fatakarate rahate hain, kyonki main jab bhi inake kamare kee khidakee ke niche se guzarata hoon to chatak chatak kee aavaz aati rahati hai.
skooli ladakon men mere bahut se dost the, jinhen main bahut chahata tha, aur mujhe lagata hai ki us samay mera svabhav bahut hi snehi tha.
vigyan men meri ruchi barakarar thi, main ab bhi usi utsah se khanij batorata rahata tha, lekin bade hi avaigyanik tarike se.
main sirf itana hi dekhata tha ki koee naya khanij hai, to rakh liya, lekin inake vargikaran kee savadhani main nahin baratata tha.
keet patangon par main tab se hi dhyan dene laga tha, jab main das baras (1819) ka tha.
main vels ke samudratat par sthit plas edavardas gaya tha.
vahan par main kale aur sindoori rang ke bade hemipteras keet, aur jayagoniya tatha sisindela jaise shalabh dekhakar chakit rah gaya.
ye keet shrapashayar men dikhaee nahin dete the.
mainne fauran hi apana man bana liya ki jitane bhi mare hue keet bator sakoonga, batoroonga.
mare hue keet batorana mainne isalie tay kiya tha kyonki meri bahan ne bataya tha ki mahaj sangrah ke lie keeton ko marana thik nahin.
vait likhit selaborna padhane ke bad main pakshiyon kee aadaton par dhyan dene laga aur is bare men khas khas baton ko likhane bhi lag gaya.
bade hi samany bhav se main yah bhi aashchary karata tha ki har koee pakshee vigyani kyon nahin ban jata hai.
mera skooli jivan samapan kee or tha.
is bich mere bhaee rasayan vigyan men kafi mehanat kar rahe the.
ghar ke bag men bane toolaroom ko unhonne ek achchhi khasi prayogashala men badal diya tha.
vahan par tarah tarah ke upakaran juta lie the, aur jyadatar prayogon men mujhe unake sahayak ke taur par madad kee ijazat mil gayi thi.
unhonne sabhi gaisen taiyar kar li thin aur kaee ek yaugik rasayan bhi bana lie the.
mainne bhi rasayan par kaee kitaben padh li thin, inamen sabase pasandida kitab thi, henari aur parks kee kaimikala kaitekism.
is vishay men mera man bahut ram raha tha, aur ham donon bhaee der rat tak kam men jute rahate the.
skooli shiksha ke dauran yah samay mere jivan ka sarkottam kal tha, kyonki isi dauran mainne prayogatmak vigyan ko vyavaharik roop men samajha.
ham donon milakar rasayanon par prayog karate hain, yah bat n jane kaise skool men fail gayi.
is tarah ka kam skooli ladakon ne pahale kabhi nahin kiya tha, isalie sabane isaka mazak udaya aur ise nam diya - gais.
doktar batalar hamare hedamastar the.
ek bar unhonne bhi sabhi ke samane mera apaman karate hue kaha ki main aise vahiyat kism ke vishayon par apana samay barbad kar raha hoon.
unhonne sabake samane bevajah hi mujhe ekantavasi sannyasi kaha, us samay to mujhe isaka matalab samajh nahin aaya lekin itana to main jan hi gaya tha ki kuchh kadavi bat kahi gayi hai.
yah dekhate hue ki main skool men kuchh khas nahin kar pa raha hoon, mere pita ne samajhadari dikhate hue mujhe kuchh pahale hi skool se uthava liya aur mujhe bhaee ke sath (aktoobar 1825) edinabarg yoonivarsiti bhej diya, jahan par main do baras tak raha.
mere bhaee apani daktari kee padhaee poori kar rahe the.
halanki main janata tha ki daktari kee praiktis karane ka unaka koee irada nahin tha, aur pitaji ne mujhe isalie bheja tha ki main bhi daktari kee padhaee shuroo kar sakoon.
isi dauran mujhe kuchhek chhoti moti ghatanaon se yah pata chal chuka tha ki mere pitaji mere lie itani jayadad chhod jaenge ki main aaram se zindagi basar kar sakoon.
halanki mainne kabhi socha bhi nahin tha ki main itana dhanavan hoon, lekin jab mujhe apani haisiyat ka pata chala to itana zaroor huaa ki daktari padhane kee mehanat ke raste men rukavat aa gayi.
edinabarg men sari shiksha laikcharon ke jarie di jati thi.
lekin ye laikchar itane ubaoo aur niras hote the ki bas, poochho mat.
inamen agar kuchh apavad tha to rasayanashastr ke bare men hop ke laikchar.
