un logon ne apane yahan ek din, saty narayan vratakatha ka aayojan kiya huaa tha.
jo purohit katha sampann karavane ke lie vahan aae hue the ve dhoti kurta men the aur apani kar se aae the.
ghar ka malik, kurta aur pili dhoti pahane tha aur malakin khoobasoorat banarasi sadi men, kisi dulhan kee tarah saji huee thi.
pooja ka ghar unhonne kisi mandap kee tarah sajaya huaa tha.
pandit ji jab pooja karavane baithe to us bade kamare men sabhi bachche tatha vahan jute aurat mard bhi aakar baith gae the.
pooja ke pahale, sanskrit men mantr bolakar kul devata, gram devata se lekar tamam devi devataon aur digapalon tatha navagrah ke devataon ka aavahan karake unako aasan dekar, naivedy samarpit karane ke bad unaka dhoop dip se poojan kiya jata hai, isake bad satyanarayan katha ke panchon adhyay kahe jate hain aur ant men havan aur aarati hoti hai.
pandit ji, devataon ke aavahan ke lie sanskrit ke jo bhi shlok bolate the ve, itane spasht aur shuddh hote the, sath hi unakee aavaj aur deh kee bhangima aisi hoti thi jaise sachamuch ke sare devata, aakash men baithe hue ho, aur pandit ji apane mantrochchar se unhen aakash se utarakar, vedi par aa birajane ka nivedan kar rahe ho.
unake nivedan par, jab devata vahan aa utarate the to bade aadar ke sath ve unhen, unaka aasan dekar, unake sthan par baitha dete the.
iha tishth? saty narayan katha ka panchon adhyay unhonne khud se nahin kaha tha.
use kahane ke lie, vahan aae, jitane bhi bachche the, sabako unhonne panch grupon men bant diya tha.
isake bad, unhonne, apane baig se, pahale se taiyar rakhi, char panch panno kee natthi kee huee, kaee parchiyan nikala tha aur ek ek adhyay kee parchiyan pancho grup men bant diya tha.
un parchiyon men panchon adhyay ke sanskrit ke shlok, roman lipi men likhe hue the.
shlok ke bad, unaka arth aur bhav unhonne angreji men anuvad kiya huaa tha.
jis grup ke bachchon ko, katha ka jo adhyay kahane ko mila tha ve pahale sanskrit ka shlok poora padhate isake bad usaka angreji men arth kahate.
jahan kahin bachche, sanskrit ke shlokon ke uchcharan men galati kar dete pandit ji bade pyar se, use tonk kar, usaka sahi uchcharann, sunakar usase fir se vah shlok bolavate.
vahan jitane bachche grupon men baithe hue the unake sanskrit ke shlokon ka gayan sunakar lagata tha ki sabhi shlok pahale se hi, unhen yad hai aur un shlokon ke bhav aur arth ka bhi unhen achchha gyan hai.
jitani der tak pooja hoti rahi, sabake sab bade bhaktibhav se vahan baithe usamen shamil rahe the.
vahan par bachchon se lekar bado tak men jaisi tanmayata aur shraddha mainne poori pooja ke dauran dekha, vaisa bhav, bharat men mujhe n hi yahan ke purohiton men dekhane ko milata hai aur n hi, katha men pahunche logon men hi.
khana pina khatm karake, jab main pati patni, vahan se chalane ko hue, to main ghar ke malik malakin ko talashane lag gaya tha.
malakin auraton ke bich ghoom ghoomakar unhen khilane men juti huee thi aur malik khane se nivritt ho chuke apane mitron ke bich baitha, gappen mar raha tha.
mainne use bulakar, usase chalane kee ijajat liya tha to usane, mera nihora karate hue mujhase nivedan kiya tha bas ek minat apana samay hamen aur dijie ankal ji, bas ek minat, mujhase itana nivedan karane ke bad, vah bhagata huaa auraton ke bich vyast, apani patni kee banh pakadakar use khinchate ghasitate hamare samane le aakar khadi kar diya tha.
main aur patni, agal bagal hi khade the.
donon hamare, samane khada hokar apane donon hath apane sine par jod, aankhe band kar, hamari prarthana men kuchh budabudae the isake bad donon hath jode jode hi apane ghutanon par baith gae the aur usi tarah vahan bhi prarthana kie the isake bad donon jamin par dandavat lot gae the aur apane donon hath hamare panvon kee taraf badha kar jamin par kafi der tak usi roop men dandavat pade rahe the.
he bhagavan ..........
main yah kya dekh raha hoon? dandavat padakar, pranam karane kee bat main kisse kahaniyon men bahut suna tha.
chhath jaise parv ke mauke par, kaee aurat mardon ko, jamin par lot lot kar ghat kee taraf jate bhi dekha tha.
dev sthanon ko jate raston par bhi dandiroop men, apane isht ke darabar men hajiri lagane jate logon ko bhi mainne dekha tha lekin vah sab, mahaj mere dekhane aur sunane tak hi simit tha.
unhen dekhakar agar kabhi kuchh mere dhyan men aaya tha to bas itana hi ki ve, log, kisi uddeshy ke lie mannaten mane rahe honge aur unakee vah mannat poori ho gaee hogi isalie ve is tarah lot lot kar apane aaradhy ke pas ja rahe hai.
isake siva, dandavat padakar pranam karane ke pichhe ka asal kya hai isake bare men kabhi mera dhyan hi nahin gaya tha.
lekin jab us ghar men, pati patni donon dandavat hokar, apane hath hamare panvon kee taraf badhakar jamin par pad gae the to mera samoocha sharir ganagana utha tha aur mujhe laga tha mere bhitar ka chaitany, un donon kee taraf undelata chala ja raha hai.
mere lie, yah bade ajib tarah ka aur alaukik anubhav tha.
vahin par, apani sanskriti men, shreshthon aur mahatmaon ke panv chhookar tatha dandavat padakar pranam karake, unaka aashirvad lene ke pichhe ka asal matalab meri samajh men pahali dafa aaya tha.
panv chhookar ya dandavat padakar pranam karane ka matalab, hain apane sampoorn ka samarpann, aisa samarpan jisamen do aatmaon ke bich chaitany ke pravah ke marg men, ahankar, jo ek badi divar banakar aa khada hota hai, usake visarjan ka ek bada saral aur karagar nuskha.
ahankar ka visarjan hote hi jis tarah pani kee dhar dhalava kee taraf bahane lagati hai thik usi tarah chaitany, pranam karane vale kee taraf pravahit hona shuroo ho jata hai.
chaitany ka pravah, ek alaukik ghatana hai, yah yachak aur data ke bich kuchh mangane ya dene ya len den jaisi duniyavi kriya nahin hai.
balki donon ka, donon ko, apana sampoorn nyochhavar kar dene jaisa hai.
duniya ke sabhi granthon men aur santon aur mahatmaon ne, eeshvar prapti ke lie jis samarpan kee bat kaha hai vah yahi samarpan hai.
aisa hi samarpann, do logon ke bich, jab prem hota hai tab bhi dekhane ko milata hai.
prem ke hone par, donon men se koee, kisi se n to kuchh mangata hai n hi kisi ko kuchh deta hai, balki donon hi donon par nyochhavar hue rahate hain, vahan donon men lootane aur lutane jaisi koee duniyavi kriya nahin hoti balki donon hi apana sanpoorn doosare par luta dene ko utavale hue rahate hain.
hamare ghar men ek nae mehaman ka aagaman hone vala tha.
usake aane ke din, subah, abhi ham log soe hi hue the ki bete ne hamen aakar bataya tha ki mehaman ne apane aane kee soochana kee ghanti baja diya hai.
usake aane kee soochana se vah, buri tarah uttejit tha.
isake pahale, tisari pidhi ke prasad se dada dadiyon, nana naniyo kee pulak aur unaka kilakana, kudakana main dekh chuka tha lekin isaka anubhav, kitana alaukik aur romanchakari hota hai, vah apane ke aane par hi samajh paya tha.
beta, hamen hadabadaya dekh, hamase kaha tha, aap log aaram se taiyar hoie, main patni ko lekar aspatal ja raha hoon aur vah use lekar aspatal chala gaya tha.
usake jane ke bad, mainne dekha tha ki aspatal valon ne dilivari ke bad, jachcha aur bachcha donon kee jaroorat kee ek kit, tatha doosare kaee samanon kee list, bete ko, is hidayat ke sath pakadaya huaa tha ki vah unhen, aspatal aate samay, apane sath jaroor lekar aave.
lekin beta, hadabadi men, sara saman, ghar par hi chhodakar, aspatal bhag liya tha.
usake jane ke bad, patni ne mujhe bataya tha ki, bete ko jo saman lekar aspatal jana tha vah to yahi rah gaya hai.
he bhagavan, ab main kya karoon? ek to mere lie yah ekadam anajani jagah, doosare bina kar ke yahan, ek kadam bhi ja sakana namumakin hota hai.
ham log kar bhi chalana nahin janate aur agar chalana bhi janate hote to bhi, ham intaraneshanal draiving laisens, kahan se late.
khuda n khasta hamare pas vaisa draiving laisens bhi hota to bhi yahan ke yatayat ka jaisa sakht kanoon hai sadakon par sab kuchh jitana svachalit aur haeetek hai, ek sau tis chalis kilomitar se kam kee raftar par sadakon par karen chalaee hi nahin ja sakati aur is sabase oopar, bharat men rod par baen chalane ka niyam hai jabaki yahan sab kuchh dahine chalata hai vaise men bharat ke mahir se mahir draivar tak, yahan kee sadakon par karen chalane kee himmat n kare, to ham jaise kamajoron kee kya majal jo yahan kar chalane kee bat soch bhi len.
ham donon ke bich, saman ko lekar, abhi charcha chal hi rahi thi ki isi bich, hamare ghar kee ghanti ghanaghana uthi thi.
lo aadhe raste se hi lautana pada n use? beta hadabadi men jo badi chook kar diya tha is par khijh men badabadata main, jakar daravaja khola tha to, mere ghar kee lain kee do ladakiyan mujhe namaste karake, bhadabhadati sidha bahoo ke bedaroom men ghusakar aspatal le jane vale samanon se bhari ataichi uthakar, bahar hal men nikal laee thin aur use kholakar usamen rakhe samanon ka, list se milan karane lag gaee thi.
ataichi men, list ke mutabik do tin saman nahin the.
itani subah, is samay kahan kahan ke stor khule honge, aur kis stor men, ve saman unhen milenge is par donon ne charcha kiya tha.
isake bad ek ladakee, bina mujhase kuchh poochhe ya batae ya paise kee jikr ke, apani kar lekar, use lane ke lie daud padi thi aur doosari ladakee, sara saman ataichi men sahej kar apani kar kee pichhali sit par dala tha aur use lekar aspatal daud gaee thi.
isake bad jo mere ghar kee tatha fon kee ghanti ghanaghanana shuroo huee thi aur logon ka, apane gharon se mere ghar aur vahan se fir aspatal ke bich, daudari shuroo huee thi to, jab tak jachcha, bachcha vapas ghar nahin aa gae the tab tak unakee daud chalati hi rahi thi.
koee apane ghar se ham donon ke lie khana banakar pahuncha rahi hai to koee nashta koee tharmas bharabharakar chay la rahi hain, to koee bete bahoo ke lie, tifin men bharakar khana aur nashta aspatal pahuncha rahi hai.
un logon ne, us samay apana ghar sanbhalane ke sath sath aspatal se lekar, ham donon tak ko jitani kushalata se sanbhalakar hamen nishchit kar diya tha aur is bat ka hamen jara sa kahi, aabhas tak nahin hone diya tha ki ve apane nahin hai use dekhakar main n sirf gahare tak abhibhoot tha balki buri tarah chakit bhi tha.
bharatiy samaj men, is tarah ka bahanapa bhaeechara aur parivarikata, aaj kahan kahin dekhane ko milati hai?
sab kuchh achchha achchha nipat jane ke bad, ek din, dopahar ke samay main, apane ghar ke makanon kee katar ke charon taraf bane raste par tahal raha tha to, do agal bagal ke gharon kee malakinen, donon bharatiy, apane apane ghar se bahar nikal kar, dhoop senkati huee aapas men gapiya rahi thin.
mujhe dekhakar donon apane hath jodakar mujhe pranam kee thi to main, unake karib jakar khada ho gaya tha.
daraasal, yahan aakar, jo bharat main, apani aankhon ke samane gujarate dekh raha tha vah mere lie tha to purana hi, lekin usaka roop, arth aur mayane, ekadam naya aur anootha tha.
vah isalie ki jo ladakiyan, bharat ke ladakon ke sath byahakar, yahan unakee bahuen banakar aaee hain, ve sabakee sab yunivarsitiyon, teknikal instityooton tatha prabandhan sansthanon se achchhi digriyan lekar nikali ladakiyan hai aur jin gharon se ve aaee hai unake man bap bhi achchhi hi haisiyat rakhate honge.
bharat kee is star aur haisiyat vale gharon kee betiyon aur bahuon ko, main kafi karib se dekha tha.
kaee men jis tarah ke thasake mainne dekhe, ise dekhakar mujhe laga ki jaise unhen koee surkhab ke par lage hue hon aur prithvi kee duniyadari se unaka koee matalab hi n ho.
madarn aur apadet dikhane aur dikhane, ke nashe men koee koee itana choor huee rahati hai aur doosaron ke samane aisi shekhi bagharati hai jaise samoochi duniya unakee jootiyon tale ho.
chay banana? na baba na, yah apane bas kee bat hi nahin hai, mujhe to yah tak pata nahin hai ki chay men chini dali jati hai ki namak.
o gad...
tum rotiyan senkati ho? senkogi hi, kyon ki tum bahin ji jo thahari, mere ghar ke mali, vo, vo, ghasite jaisa koee nam hai n tere bap ka aur teri man ka nam, meri naukarani ramapiyariya jaisa kuchh hai n? kisi ne agar unake samane, choolhe chauke ya duniyadari nibhane kee bat kar diya to us samay, unaka bigada munh dekhane layak hota hai.
lekin yahan, jitanon ko mainne dekha sab, kee sab, ko aala darje kee man, patni aur kushal grihasthin dekha.
aakhir e ladakiyan bhi to unhin ke bich se aaee huee hai aur yahan aane ke pahale aisa bhi nahin hai ki unake man bapon ne, unhen, kisi achchhe skool men, duniyadari kee, alag se talim dekar bheja ho.
fir donon men itana bada antar kaise hai? yah saval mujhe bhitar hi bhitar pareshan kie hue tha.
hamare ghar ke bagal kee donon padosinon ne, jab mujhe dekhakar, apane hath jod, mujhe pranam kiya tha to yah sochakar ki, apane prashn ka uttar janane ka mere lie yah ek achchha mauka hai kyon n main in donon se hi jo poochhapachhor karana hai, use karake, apane bhitar kee akulahat shant kar loon.
isalie main unake thoda aur karib jakar rook gaya tha.
aisa hai bete ki mere bhitar ka ek prashn, mujhe kafi dinon se pareshan kar rakha hai, use main tum donon se poochhana chahata hoon yadi tumhari ijajat ho to...........
poochhie ankal ji badi khushi se poochhie agar ham janate honge to usaka javab jaroor denge!
aisa hai ki, tum log, jo bharat se yahan byah kar aaee ho sabakee, sab achchhi padhi likhi aur achchhe gharon se bhi ho.
tum logon kee jab shadiyan huee hogi to tumamen se koee abhi padh hi rahi hogi aur koee, apani padhaee khatm kee hogi.
doosari tamam ladakiyon kee tarah, tum bhi duniyadari ke mamale men ekadam kachchi, anagadh aur anadi hi rahi hogi bavajood isake tum log, sabakee sab, itani achchhi man, patni aur kushal grihasthin hone ke sath sath, tarah tarah ke pakavan tatha vyanjan banane men itani siddhahast aur mahir kaise ho?
mera prashn sunakar donon men se ek ladakee, bade jor se thaththakar hansi thi aur thoda sochane ke bad, usane mujhe jo javab diya tha use sunakar mera man gadagad ho utha tha.
aisa hai ankal ji ki achchhi man, patni aur kushal grihasthin hona to ham ladakiyon kee sahajavritti hai.
alave isake, hamari mane aur ghar parivar, hamare paida lene ke sath hi, sugadh grihini ke sare gunn, hamen hamari ghutti men pilana shuroo kar deti hai aise men, ham duniyadari ke mamale men anagadh aur anadi kaise rah sakate hain? rahi hamari pak kala men siddhahast aur mahir hone kee bat to use ham karate karate sikh jate hain aur jo hamen nahin aata use ham doosaron se pachhakar sikh liya karati hai.
dalas men vaise to chhote bade kaee mandir hai lekin jahan hamara ghar tha vahan se sath sattar kilomitar kee doori par, kafi lanbi chaudi jagah men ek bada vishal aur bhavy mandir bana huaa hai.
vah mandir yahan ke logon ne apanon ke bich, chande ikattha karake banavaya hai.
us mandir ka nirmann, dakshin bharat ke mandiron kee tarj par kiya gaya hai.
kahate hain ki is mandir ko banane ke lie, dakshin bharat ke shilpi aur karigar, yahan aae hue the.
mukhy mandir ke bhitar, balaji se lekar, bramha, mahesh, durga, kali, hanuman tatha doosare tamam devi devataon kee moortiyan sthapit kee huee hai.
mandir se thoda hatakar, ek bada kanfrens hal bana huaa hai.
samay samay par bharat se bade bade sant aur mahatma yahan padharate rahate hain aur jab ve padharate hain to isi mandir ke prangan men bane aavason men unhen thaharaya jata hai aur yahan ke bade kanfrens hal men unaka satsang aur pravachan hota hai.
bharat ke sabhi pramukh tyoharon ka bhi yahan aayojan kiya jata hai, jisamen yahan ka bharatiy samuday badi, tadad men ikattha hota hai aur sab milakar use vidhivat manate hain.
jindagi chahe deshon kee ho, logon kee ya jiv jagat, kee sabaka sanchalan aur niyantran prakriti karati hai.
usi kee yah satta hai aur vahi isaka badashah hai.
apani samoochi satta ke kushal sanchalan aur us par majaboot niyantran ke lie, bhay ko usane, vajradand kee tarah apanaya huaa hai.
ek ko, doosare ka bhojan banakar, har kisi ke pichhe, usake khane vale ko dauda rakha hai jhapatta maro, nahin mar sakate ho, to fareb karake khao anyatha bhookh tumhen kha jaegi.
bhago, nahin bhag sakate ho to chhal, kapat aur pakhand karake, apani jan bacha lo, nahin to tumhare pichhe pada tumhara kal, tumhen kha jaega.
yah kha lie jane kee dar, jis tarah sabake pichhe padakar, sabako bhishan roop se aatankit aur asurakshit karake rakhata hai yahi prakriti ka, apane samrajy ko sanchalit aur niyantrit rakhane ka, karagar hathiyar hai.
choonki aadami bhi, prakriti ke samrajy ka hi ek jiv hai isalie doosaron dvara kha lie jane ka bhay aur apane jinda rahane ke lie doosaron ko kha lene kee bhookh, usamen bhi vaisi hi hai jaisa ki prakriti ke jiv jagat ke doosare sabhi jivon men hai.
lekin aadami aur doosare jivon men ek bada fark hai aur vah fark yah hai ki, aadami doosaron se jyada chatur aur samajhadar hai.
sath hi usamen, apani chaturaee aur samajhadari ke behatar istemal ka hunar bhi hai.
apane isi hunar ke chalate, aaj vah n sirf, aadami bana huaa hai, balki prakriti ke bad, prithvi ka doosara sabase bada khiladi bhi ban baitha hai, aur usi kee tarah sabal, saksham aur samarth bhi.
samajhadari kee apani isi khasiyat ke chalate, usane bhookh ko, usakee samagrata men samajha hai aur apani chaturaee se vah use, palakar apana tahaluaa bana liya hai.
usane samajha hai ki bhookh, jo sabhi, utpaton aur upadravon kee jad hai vah usake pet se shuroo hokar dimag aur dil se bhi gahare usake, jivan ke mool tak apane panv pasare baithi huee hai aur use kha jane ke lie kisi bhoodharakar kar rakshas kee tarah, dahadati chinghadati usake pichhe lagi rahati hai, sath hi usane yah bat bhi achchhi tarah samajh liya ki bhookh itani prachand aur shaktishali hai ki usase ladakar ise parast nahin kiya ja sakata.
isalie usane use, palatoo banana shuroo kar diya.
sabase pahale usane tan aur pet kee bhookh ko, palatoo banane ka vigyan vikasit kiya aur use apane kaboo men karake ek bada aur shaktishali morcha fatah kar liya.
fir man kee bhookh aur vahan se chalakar jivan ke mool par kundali marakar baithi bhookh tak ko samajhakar, use bhi palatoo banane ka vigyan vikasit kiya.
lekin usane apani samajhadari se deh, man aur jivan ke mool men ladi baithi bhookh ko samajhakar, apani chaturaee ke bal par, us par kaboo rakhane ke vigyan ke vikas se, apane manushy hone ke jis bhi mukam par pahunch liya ho, lekin apane bhitar ke janavar ke, hinsa tatha jhooth fareb ka jal rachakar, apane shikar ko patakhani dekar ya fosakar use marakar kha jane kee apani vritti par kaboo nahin kar saka.
isalie, aaj bhi bhitar se, vah janavar ka janavar hi hai, thik usi kee tarah histra, kunabaparast, kabaili tatha vaisa hi, aatankit tatha asuraksha se grast.
aisa nahin hai ki vah apane bhitar kee is bhookh ko samajha hi nahin, samajha usane aur achchhi tarah se samajha aur ise samajhane ke bad, ise bhi palatoo banane ke lie usane, doosaron ke dvara khud ko kha lie jane ke dar aur aatank se mukti ke lie, usane, apane ko doosaron ka tatha doosaron ko apana poshak banane ke lie paraspar ke sahayog aur bhaee, chare, ke madhyam se sabako bhay aur aatank se mukt karane ka bada karagar, hathiyar, vikasit kar liya.
lekin choonki yah hathiyar usaka khud ka nirmit tha isalie vah, poori tarah khalis aur shuddh hone kee bajae, bhitar se lekar bahar tak, isake reshe reshe men, banatoopana aur dogalapan samaya huaa tha, jisake chalate, usaka yah nirman poori tarah banavati aur dhokhe kee tatti banakar rah gaya.
parinam isaka yah huaa, ki isase logon men paraspar vishvas badhane kee bajae, unhen, ek doosare ke prati jyada shankalu aur chaukanna rahane par majaboor kar diya.
isilie aaj jindagiyan, chahe aadami kee ho ya deshon kee, prithvi ke doosare jiv jagat kee tarah hi, sab ek doosare se dare sahame rahate hain aur apane bhitar ke isi dar aur aatank ke chalate, ek doosare ko patak pachhadakar parast kar dene ke kam men jute rahate hain.
aur is tarah samoochi prithvi par, har samay, ghoshit aur aghoshit yuddh chhida rahata hai.
aisa yuddh, jisake lade jane ka n to koee nishchit maidan tay hota hai aur n hi usake lie pahale se nirdharit, koee kayada kanoon hi bana hai.
choonki yuddh jitana hi sabaka uddeshy hota hai isalie apane pratidvandi ko gherakar, apane shikanje men le lene ke lie, sab apani apani bisaten bichha kar apani apani goten aur chalen chalate rahate hain, aur kisi ke thoda sa kamajor ya gafil padate hi, us par toot padate hain.
jahan tak is sangram men jit ka saval hai to isake lie jaroori nahin hai ki pratidvandviyon men, apane deh se jo sabase jyada majaboot hoga vahi jitega.
yahan jit usakee hoti hai jo apani sharir se chattani hone ke sath sath, apane dil aur dimag se bhi jivat vala hota hai jo apane pratidvandi kee kamajor nason ko achchhi tarah pahachanata hai aur use dabakar usase chhadi bulava leta hai.
chakama dekar, use hakka bakka kar dene kee kala men mahir hota hai aur usakee majabootiyon ko bhedakar use ghutane tekava dene men saksham hota hai, vahi is yuddh men vijayi hota hai aur is sab men pravin aur samarth vahi ho sakata hai jo dhanabal janabal aur shastrabal ke sath gyan aur vigyan men prabal roop se sanpann hota hai.
amarika aaj isalie ativishisht aur advitiy nahin hai ki aarthik roop men vah, ati sampann desh hai ki usake pas tarah tarah ke nayab aur marak hathiyar hai tatha apane gyan aur vigyan se vah antariksh se lekar samudr kee gaharaeeyan tak nap lene men samarth hai.
ki usamen itani jivatata hai ki durdant aur durgam tak pahunch lene tatha alanghy ko langh lene ka usamen adamy sahas hai, ki pravah ko manachahe dhang se modakar apani ichchhanukool pravahit kar lene kee usamen prabal kshamata hai.
in tamam kshamataon aur dhanasanpada se sampann vah aaj prithvi ka akela desh nahin hai balki us jaisi sampannata aur kshamata ke aur bhi kaee desh isi prithvi par maujood hai.
fir aisa khas kya hai, amarika men jisake chalate vah aaj duniya ka ativishisht aur advitiy ka darja prapt desh hai? is prashn par barikee se gaur karane par jo bat meri samajh men aaee vah yah in tamam visheshataon aur kshamataon ke sath sath amarika men mujhe jo sabase alag aur khas dekhane ko mila tha, vah tha prakriti ka apane samrajy ke sanchalan aur niyantran ke lie, maryaditon ke prati vinamrata tatha sahayog tatha amaryaditon ke prati poori tarah kroor aur nishthur ho uthane ka usaka jo vidhan hai thik usi se mel khata unaka samoocha sistam aur vidhan.
aisa sistam, jisamen n to kisi laffaj aur khurapanchi ko laffaji aur khurapanch karane kee jara si bhi chhoot hai n hi kisi farebi ko fareb karane kee thodi si bhi jagah di huee hai.
kunaba paraston aur kabailiyon ke lie jisamen sans tak lene tak kee gunjaish nahin hai tatha logon kee kamajoriyan aur nakaratmakataon ko bhunakar, apana ulloo sidha karane men mahir logon ko jahan thodi si bhi mohalat n ho, itana nishpaksh aur nishthur sistam ki yadi amarika ka rashtrapati bhi katar men khada ho, to use bhi apana nanbar apane par hi aur vah bhi joote utarane ke bad hi, aage kadam badhane kee ijajat di jati hon aur yadi usane bhi kisi sistam ke ullanghan kee gustakhi kar diya aur vahan tainat adana sa karmi, usakee banh pakad liya to, doosaron kee tarah hi use bhi, usake samane natamastak ho jana hai aur vah sab bhogane ke bad hi usakee mukti hai jo vahan ke vidhan men likha huaa hai.
doosari badi khasiyat jo mujhe is mahan desh men dekhane ko mili thi vah tha yahan ke logon ka aatmavishvas! itana prachand aatmavishvas ki dushman se dushman desh ka hi koee kyon n ho, amarika kee dharati par panv rakh diya to vah apana hai.
fir n to vah yahoodi hai aur n hi eesaee, ya hindoo ya muslim.
n vah roosi hai aur n hi chini vah hai to sirf aur sirf amarikee.
aur jis desh ke logon ke bhitar itana aatmavishvas bhara ho ki unhen har chehara, jis bhi roop ya rang ka ho, sabake sab apane aatmiy ke chehare sarikhe dikhen, to vah mahan dharati aur us dharati ke mahan bashinde, anupam aur advitiy ke alave, doosare kuchh ho hi nahin sakate.
Pyaar mohabbat ke vishay par sochne mein hamara man tilmila utha.
Hamare purush bhakt bade pareshaan the ki unka jeevan stree ke bina bilkul adhura hai.
Isliye hum le aaye hain 30 tarike ladki patane ke.
In baaton ko zyaada seriously na lein to hi achha hai.
Joote-chappal padenge to humein dosh mat dena.
1.
Jis ladki par tumhara mitra fida hai, tum bhi uspar pyaar nyochavar karo.
Jaise hi tumhara mitra koi galti kar baithe aur chappal khaye, tum jaakar us ladki ka dil behla do.
Yaari dosti apni jagah, aur pyaar mohabbat apni jagah.
2.
Facebook par hamare hi page par dekho, kaafi yogya kanyaayen dikhengi.
Dhang se baat karke dosti kar lo.
Baat ban jaaye to humein dhanyavaad kar dena.
Aisi vaisi baatein ki to hamare shraap se bach nahi paoge.
Kaafi jan hamare shraap ka asar dekh chuke hain.
3.
Tumhe jo ladki pasand hai, jaakar uski saheliyon ki khoob tareef karo.
Wo sochegi ki unmein aisi kya baat hai jo usmein nahi.
Aur khud hi tumhari taraf khinchi chali aayegi.
4.
Kisi mahaan film abhineta ke saath apni tasveer khinchva lo.
Aur sab logon ko dikha do ki tum kitne prasiddha ho.
Tumhara uthna-baithna kitne bade log ke saath hai, dikha do.
Ladkiyon ko ye tasveer dikhakar impress kar do.
5.
Hamesha apni hi baatein karo.
Ladki ki ek bhi mat suno.
Aisa karne se ladkiyan samjhengi ki tum kaafi buddhimaan ho.
Aur wo tum par marne lagengi.
6.
Tum jise chahte ho use roz-roz har ghante pyaar-bhare sms bhejo.
Tumhe use dikhana hoga ki tum use kitna chahte ho.
Par dhyaan rahe sms freewale nahi hone chahiye, warna iska ulta asar hone mein der nahi lagegi.
7.
Apne batve mein dher saare kaagaz bharke ghumo.
Ladkiyon ko lagega ki tum bahut paise wale ho.
Aur wo tumhe apne sapnon ka rajkumar samajhne lagengi.
Jabki tum jaante ho ki tum to chai bechne wale rajkumar bhi nahi.
8.
Apni jeb mein hamesha saat-aath ladkiyon ki tasveer rakho.
Koi puchhe to bolo ki ye sab tumhe chahti hain aur tum duvidha mein ho ki kise pasand karoon.
Bas tum jise chahte ho wo tumhe khone ke dar se tumhare pichhe lattoo ho jayegi.
9.
Ladkiyan ki khoob taarif kiya karo.
Chahe wo us taarif ke kaabil bhi hai ya nahi.
Fir dekho chamatkaar ladki nahi to uski saheliyaan bhi paagal ho jaayengi tumhare peeche.
10.
Use bata do ki zindagi mein sabse zyaada tum humein maante ho.
Pyaar ke liye nahin par tum hamari bhakti mein jaan nyochhavar kar sakte ho.
Ye baat batane se tumhara aadha kaam to wahin ho jaayega.
Wo maan jayegi ki tum jaisa aur kahin nahi.
11.
Apni taarif sunna kise achha nahi lagta.
Isiliye hamesha naye-naye andaz mein uski taarifen kiya karo.
Pyaar ki manzil paane mein aasani hogi.
12.
Kisi ped par tumhara aur uska naam dil banake likh do.
Aur fir kisi bahane use ye dikha do.
Wo tumhare pyaar ka paagalpan dekhkar tumhe gale se lagaye bina nahi reh paayegi.
13.
Uske mata-pita se apni jaan pehchan gehri bana lo.
Kisi bhi bahane se unko roz ya to milne chale aao ya fir phone karlo.
Unke dil mein ghar bana lo.
Unki nazar mein ek susheel-honhaar ladke ban jao jo unki ladki ke liye ekdum badiya hai.
14.
Kisi achhe se gulabi kaagaz mein apne dil ka haal likhkar use de do.
Dene ke pehle patra par perfume chhidak dena.
Prem patra mein apne baare mein kam aur uske aur uski khoobsurati ke baare man jyaada se jyaada baaten likhna.
15.
Ghar ke neeche guitar ke saath gaana gaana purana ho gaya hai.
Tum desi tarika apnao.
Uske ghar ke niche harmonium lekar baith jao.
Phir apni madhur aawaz se pyaar bhare geet sunakar uska dil jeet lo.
16.
Jab bhi usse milo to sharmaana bilkul mat.
Ladkiyon ko sharmeele ladke bilkul bhi pasand nahi aate.
Hamesha uska haath pakad kar, aankhon mein aankhen daalkar hi baat kiya karo.
Pet mein titliyan ud rahi ho fir bhi ekdum vishwaas se khade rehna.
17.
Ladkiyon ko hatte-katte aur chaudhe seene waale ladke pasand aate hain.
Isiliye koi achha sa gym join karlo aur apni body banakar uske saamne dosti ka haath badao.
Wo tumhe mana nahi kar paayegi.
18.
Jab bhi use milo to alag-alag gaadi/bike ke saath milna.
Apne doston se unki gaadi/bike udhaar le liya karo ek din ke liye.
Use lagega ki tum karodpati se kam nahi aur wo pat jayegi.
19.
Ladki ke bhaiya se gehri dosti kar lo.
Aur uske ghar aana jaana shuru kar do.
Ek baar ladki ka bhai tumhare kaabu mein aa gaya to baad mein ladki bhi aa jaayegi.
Lekin dhyan rahe unke gharpe ladki ko zyaada bhav mat dena.
20.
Yadi tum apni padosan ko chahte ho to uske ghar aana jaana shuru kar do.
Chai-patti, shakkar lene ke bahane uske ghar ke chakkar kaatna koi buri baat nahi.
Fir ek din use chai peene apne ghar bulake apna dil ka haal bayaan kar do.
21.
Hamesha doosre ladkon ki burai kiya karo.
Aur bolo ki aajkal ke ladko ne to pyaar ko ek khel bana diya hai.
Wo samajh jaayegi ki tum kitne sharif ho.
Aur uske dil mein tumhare liye pyaar ki chingari jal uthegi.
22.
Tum jise patana chaahte ho uska peecha kiya karo.
Har roj uske chakkar kaato.
Uske baare mein jaano.
Wo kin logon se milti hai, kahan kahan jaati hai.
Uske baad kam se kam 21 dino tak uske saamne mat aana.
Wo khud bechain hokar tumse baat karne ke liye bekaraar ho jaayegi.
Dhyan rahe is tarike mein pitaai ka khatra hai.
23.
Jise tum chahte ho uski saheliyon se dosti karlo.
Unse pata karo ki use kis tarah ke kapde pasand hai.
Uske baad tum jab bhi uske saamne jao to vahi pehen kar jaana jo use pasand ho.
Tum uske dil mein apne liye jagah bana loge.
24.
Jise tum chahte ho uski sab se khaas saheli ko apni behen bana lo.
Ek baar ye kaam ho gaya to baaki ka saara kaam uski saheli yaani ki tumhari behen hi kar degi.
Use bhi to bhabhi chahiye.
25.
Tum jise chahte ho, hamesha uski saheliyon ki tareef karo.
Uski tareef mat karna jise tum pasand karte ho.
Uske man mein jalan paida karo.
Isse wo tumhari taraf aakarshit hogi.
26.
Jab bhi tum usse milo to hamesha uske haal chaal poocha karo, saath mein ghar parivaar ki bhi 2-4 baaten kiya karo.
Jitna jyada apnapan dikhaoge utne hi fatafat wo tumhari apni ban jayegi.
27.
Jise tum chahte ho uske khoob chakkar kaato.
Har samay uske aas paas raha karo.
Aur phir jab wo tumse baat karne ki koshish kare to tum use bilkul ghaas mat dalo.
Tum jitna door bhagoge wo utna hi tumhare paas aati jaayegi.
28.
Jab bhi usse milo to kahin khaane ko zaroor lekar jao.
Kharcha hamesha tumhe hi karna hai.
Ladki patane ka yah sunhara formula hai.
Apni pocket money double karwa lo.
29.
Jise patana hai hamesha uski haan mein haan milaya karo.
Wo sahi hai ya galat tumhe kya karna hai.
Jitna uski haan mein haan milaoge utna hi uske dil ke karib aate jaaoge.
30.
Uppar ka koi tarika kaam na kare to apne mata-pita se kaho ki uske mata-pita se tumhari shaadi ka prastaav rakh den.
Jo kaam tum nahi kar paaye, shayad bade-busurg kar len…
pahale har ghar men ek astra-shastr huaa karata tha jis ka nam sonta hota tha.
yah jab fenk kar mara jata tha to astr kahalata tha aur jab hath men pakade pakade is se dhunaee kee jati thi tab ye shastr ban jata tha.
bahar ke chor dakait hi nahin patniyan aur bachche tak isase darate the tatha isi ke karan patniyan charitravati aur putr aagyakari hote the.
angrejon ke jamane men yah daftaron men roolar kee tarah bhi prayog kiya jata tha jisase rajistaron men lainen khinchi jati thin.
yah pulis thane men bhi paya jata tha aur skool ke mastaron ke pas bhi paya jata tha, jisase aparadhi lain men rah kar pulis ka hissa daba nahin pate the aur chhatr mastaraji ke lie ghar men bane malapuye lane men kotahi nahin karate the.

ab yah nahin paya jata.

'' par kya ramarajy men pota tha?" main pota pota kee totaratant karane vale potavadiyon se saval poochhata hoon.
'' pahale ramarajy to lao tab pota kee jaroorat hi nahin padegi" ve hamesha kee tarah ulta jabab dete hain.
main rat men sapana dekhata hoon ki pota kanoon ban gaya aur har ghar men ek ek pota rakha huaa hai.
subah pati aafis ko jata hai to patni ko pyar se dekhate huye hidayat de jata hai ki dekho vo pota rakha hai koee aatankavadi aaye to utha kar pota mar dena sale ko.
patni virata se kahati hai ki yahan kaun aayega par tumhen raste men bas aato vagairah men jana hai isalie sath men lete jao sari aatankavadi ghatanaen vahin hoti hain.
pati kahata hai tum rakho aur patni kahati hai nahin tum le jao.
isi men pati ghante bhar let ho jata hai.

baboo kahate hain- sara, par jab pota tha tab bhi to sansad bhavan par hamala huaa tha, aksharadham men hamala huaa tha, raghunath mandir men hamala huaa tha...........

'' ek mahila karmachari poochhati hai ki kya bachche bhi pota se darane lagenge jo aajakal bahut shaitan hote ja rahe hain"

''aur bachchon ke papa jo aajakal rat men bahut der se daroo pikar lautate hain"

''afasar hi samajho, naya kanoon hai"

I.
Uske maranshil dekhrekh ke antim dinon mein, Ishu ne Apne Chelon ko wah diye jise Wah “ek naya aagya” batlaya (John 13:34).
Teen baar doharaya, wah aagya saral tha parantu mushkil: “Jaesa maine tumse prem rakha, waisa hi tum bhi ek dusre se prem rakho” (John 15:12; verse 17).
bhi ).
Ek dusre se prem karne ka shikshan Uddhaarkarata ke dekhrekh ka mukhye shikshan hai.
Dusra mahaan aagya tha “tu apne padosi se apne samaan prem rakh” (Matthew 22:39).
Ishu ne yah bhi sikhlaya, “Apne virodhiyon se prem rakh” (Matthew 5:44).
Parantu dusron se prem ko rakh jaesa Usne apne bhedh ke saath rakha tha ka aagya Uske chelon ko tha- aur humare liye- ek chunaoti ko mahaan tha.
“Sahi mein,” Pradhaan Thomas S.
Monson ne hume pichle April mein sikhlaya tha, “vaastav mein, prem susamachaar ka mulvastu hai, aur Ishu Maseeh hamare Uddhaaran hai.
Unka jiwan prem ka viraasat tha.”1
Kyo itna mushkil hai Ishu ki tarah dusron se prem karna? Yah mushkil hai kyunki hume un logon ke beech rehtein hain ji humare vishwaas aur mulye sur vaadon ke cheezon ko nahi jaantein hain.
Uska sabhi ke liye mahaan prarthna mein, Uska suli chadhane se pehle, Ishu ne apne chelon ke liye prarthna kiya: “Mine tera vachan unhein pahucha diya hai; aur sansaar ne unse bayer kiya , kyunki jaesa main sansaar ka nahi, waise weh bhi sansaar ke nahi” (John 17:14).
Phir, Pita se Usne guzaarish kiya, “Main yah vinti nahi karta ki tu unhein jagat se utah le ; parantu yah ki tu unhein sab dusht se bachaaye” (verse 15).
Hume duniya mein rehna hai parantu duniya ka ban ke nahi.
Hume duniya mein rehna hai kyunki, jayesa Ishu ne ek kahani mein batlaya hai, Uska raagye “khameer ki tarah” hai, jo is ka kaarye hai ki duniya ko apne prabhaao se aage badhaaye (dekhiye Luke 13:21; Matthew 13:33; 1 Corinthians 5:6–8) bhi dekhiye).
Uske chelen wah nahi kar saktein agar weh sirf unke saath rahenge jo unke vishwaasi aur karye ko kartein hain.
Yadi tum mujhse prem rakhtey ho, tu meri aagyaoun ko maanoge ( dekhiye John 14:15).
II.
Susamachaar mein kai shikshan hai vaadon ko rakhne ka jabki dusre vishwaas aur kaaryon ke logon ke saath ka.
Jhagde ka shikshan bahut mukhye hai.
Jab punaharjiwit Ishu ne Nephites ko baptisma ke karye ke liye jhagadtey hue dekha, Usne saaf taur se batlaya ki kis tarah se yah dharamvidhi hoga.
Phir Usne apne mahaan siddhaanton ko sikhlaya:
“Aur jis prakaar tum mein bhedbhaao hota raha hai waisa nahi hona chahiye aur mere siddhaant par ab tak jayesa tarikah diya jata hai, wah bhi nahi hona chahiye.
“Kyunki main tumse sach-sach kehta hoon ki, jo koi waadviwaad ka bhaaona rakhta hai wah mera nahi, parantu us shaitaan ka hai jo ki kalah ka janamdata hai aur wah logon ke hridyon ko ek dusre se ladne ke liye bhadkaata hai.
“Sunno, ya … mera siddhaant, hai ayesa baaton ko dur karna” (3 Nephi 11:28–30;zor diya gaya).
Uddhaarkarta ne bhedbhaao ke khilaaf Apne chunaaotiyon ka anth nahi kiya tha unke liye jo baptisma ke aagya ka palan nahi kartey the.
Wah kisi ke saath bhedbhaao nahi rakhta tha.
Woh bhi jo aagyaoun ka paalan kartein hain weh logon ke hridyon ko ek dusre se ladne ke liye bhadkaata hai.
“Kalah ka janamdata hai” shaitaan ka hai; Uddhaarkarta Shaanti ka Raajkumaar hai.
Usi tarah, Bible sihklata hai ki “bhudhimaan log krodh ko dhandh kartein hain” (Proverbs 29:8).
Pehle ke Devduton ne sikhlaya tha ki “un cheezon ke piche chalo [jo] shaanti deta hai” (Romans 14:19) aur “prem se sachchaai [batlaao]” (Ephesians 4:15), “kyunki mahushye ka krdh Parmeshwar ki dharam ka nirwaah nahi kar sakta” (James 1:20).
Naye revelation mein Prabhu ne aagya diya ki punaharsthpit susamachaar ke khushi ke vaani ko batlana chahiye “sabhi aadmi ko anpe padosi ke sang, daya aur vinamarta ke saath” (D&C 38:41), “namrata ke saath, … virodhi ke saath jhagda nahi karke” (D&C 19:30).
III.
Jaesa hum daya dikhlaatein aur bhedbhaao nahi rakhtey, hume humare sachchaai jo hum jaantein hain ko bhulana ya kam nahi karna chahiye.
Hume apne sthaan ya humare mulye ko nahi bhoolna chahiye.
Ishu Maseeh ke susamachaar aur vaadein jo humne banaye hain humein anant ke sachchaai aur jhut ke beech ke chunaotiyon ke kaarye ko jaane mein madad karta hai.
Us chunaoti mein koi na aacha na bura nahi hota.
Uddhaarkarta ne rasta dikhlaya jab Uske virodhiyon ne Use us mahila ke saamne laya jo “vyebhichaar kartey pakdi gayi thi” (John 8:4).
Weh apne khudh ke chal se sharminda the, weh dosh lagane waale chale gaye aur Ishu ko us mahila ke saath akela chodh diya.
Usne uske saath daya dikhlaya naaki us samay use kuch kaha.
Parantu Usne usko “aur phir paap na kar” (John 8:11).
Dayaluta se prem ki zaroorat hai, parantu Maseeh ke piche chalne waala-Swami ki tarah- humesha sachchaai mein rahega.
IV.
Uddhaarkarta ki tarah, Uske chelein paap ke vyeohaar se kabhi kabhi samna karega, aur aaj ga jab weh sahi aur galat ka bachaao karenge jaesa weh jaantein hain unhein kabhikabhi “paspaati” ya “kattar” bhi kaha jata hai.
Kai duniya bhar ke mulye aur karye mein Antim-din Santon ko ayese chunatiyon ko jhelene padenge.
In mein aaj bahut zyaada muhye hai ek-hi-ling ka shaadi ko karna United States ke kai states aur jilaaoun mein aur Canada aur kai duniya ke dusre deshon mein bhi.
Hum mein kuch hain jo shaadi mein vishwaas hi nahi kartey.
Kuch bachchon ko nahi payeda karna chahatey.
Kuch ashleel chitra ya khatarnaak nashile pardaath par pabandhi nahi chahatey.
Dusra uddhaaran hai- kai vishwaasiyon ko pata hai-ki vishwaas na karne waale pati ya parivaar ke sadasye ya vishwaas na karne waale karam chaariyon ke saath jine ka chunaoti.
Samarpit sthaanon par, jaese mandiron, bhakti karne waale gharon, aur humare gharon mein, humein sachchaai aur aagyaoun ko saaf aur sahi tarike se batlana chahiye jaesa hum punaharsthapit susamachar mein paaye hue mukti ki yogna mein sikhtein hain.
Hume wah karna chunaao mein boli mein aur jaati mein kaahooni taur se sahi hai, aur un deshon mein bhi jaha niji taur se izzat kiya jaata hai kaanooni dhang se.
Janta mein, jo jaati ke log kahate aur kartey hai mein dusri mahatav rahata hai.
Jaati ke muft ka istmaal kai janta ke kaaryon mein hota hai, parantu wah un zaroori cheezon par laago hota hai dusron ko vishwaas aur karyon ko karne mein.
Kanoon chaalchalan par pabandhi laga sakta hai jo galat ya achcha na ho, jaese yaon upyug, maar-dhaar, ya aatangwaadi chaalchalan ke, chahe jaati ke naam par ugrahwaadi dwara ho.
Kam khatre ki chaalchalan, chahe kuch vishwaasiyon pasand na kare, saralta se ant tak khatam hona chahiye agar Mormon ki Dharamshaastra ke bhavishyevakta dwara kanooni kiya gaya ho kahate hue “janta ki awaaz” (Mosiah 29:26).
Janta ke bhaashanon mein, hum sab ko susamachaar ke shikshanon par chalna dena chahiye apne padosi se prem karo aur bhedbhaao se bachne par.
Maseeh ke chelein namarata ke uddhaaran rahate hain.
Hume sabhi logon ko prem karna, achcha sunne wala hona, aur unke sachche vishwaas par chinta karne waala hona chahiye.
Bhale hi hum sahemat na ho, hume jhagdaalo nai hona chahiye.
Humare khatrili shirshak mein humare padavi aur vaartalaabh mein bhedbhaao nahi karna chahiye.Hume humare padviyon ko samjhaane aur khojne mein aur dusron par bhrabhaao dene ke liye imaandaar rehna chahiye.Yah karne se, hum chahtein hain ki dusre humare jaati ke sachche vishwaas aur humare jaati ke muft ke kaarye se apasand na ho jaye.
Hum chahata hoon ki hum sabhi Uddhaarkarta ke zaroori Niyam par chalein: “Is kaaran jo kuch tum chahate ho ki manushye tumhare saath karein, tum bhi unke saath ayesa hi karo” (Matthew 7:12).
Jab humare sthar gir jaatein hain, hume bure parinaamon ko izzat se swikaar karna chahiye aur humare virodhiyon ke saath izzat se pesh aana chahiye.
Bhale hi kuch ho, hume sabhi ke sang achcha vyawaahaar karna chahiye, kisi bhi tarah ke bhedbhaao ko chod kar, jaati ke bhedbhaao, paramparaon, jaati ke vishwaas ya avishwaasiyon, aur dusre yaon anustithi mein.
V.
Maine maha siddhaanton par baatein kiya hai.
Ab main us par baatein karunga jaha un siddhaanton ko Uddhaarkarta ke shikshanon mein vishwaasi hokar kai jaanemaane cheezon mein istamaal kiya jata hai.
Main shuruwaat apne jawan bachchon ke sikhe hue khelon mein se karta hoon.
Yah par Utah mein kai baar jo Mormon nahi hai ko humare kuch sadasyon dwara apasand aur alag kiya jata hai jo apne bachchon ko dusre jaati ke bachchon ke saath nahi rehne detein hain.
Sahi mein hum apne bachchon ko bartaao ke mulye aur sthar ko sikhaya jata hai bina hi unse dur jaye ya dusron ko izzat na de kar.
Kai girjaghar aur skool ke shikshakein kuch yuva, LDS yuva bhi, ke ek dusre ke sang ke vyahaar ko dekh kar dukhi hotein hain.Ek dusre se prem karne ka aagya mein dusre jaatiyon ke beech prem aur izzat shaamil hai aur dusre jaatiyon, paraampara, aur laabhdaayak pad bhi hai.
Hum sabhi yuva ko chunaoti dartein hai ki badmaashi, anaadar, ya bhaasha aur kaaryon mat karo taaki jo dusron ko dukh detein hain.
Yah sabhi Uddhaarkarta ke aagya ek dusre se prem karne ko rukhtein hain.
Uddhaarkarta ne sikhlaya ki bhedbhaao virodhi ka aozaar hai.
Yah kuch raajnitik abhi ke bhaasha aur kaaryeon ke khilaaf sikhlata hai.
Un niti aur logon ke saath karna jo tumhare vishwaas se alag hai raajniti mein mein zaroori hai, parantu dusre nitiyon ke karan vyaktigat jhagde shaamil nahi hona chahiye jo sarkaar ke khilaaf ho aur hissedaar ko saja nahi de.
Hum sab ko nafrat bhare vaartalaabh ko chod dena chahiye aur dusron ke sujhaao ko izzat se maanee.
Sabse zaroori bhedbhaao chodna aur humare gharon aur parivaarik netadaari mein dusron ke liye izzat ko karna.
Bhedbhaao avashyak hai- kuch bhedbhaao chote aur kuch bade honge.
Zaroori bhedbhaao mein, samjho ki parivaar ka ek sadasye dusre ke sath bina shaadi ke yaon sambandh rakh raha hai.
Wah do zaroori mulye ko ladaai mein daalta hai-humara prem parivaar ke sadasye ke liye aur hume aagya ko nabhaane ke liye.
Uddhaarkarta ke uddhaaran se, hum prem se dayaluta ko dikhla saktein hain aur sachchaai mein sthir raha saktein hain wah karne se jo hum dekhtey aur jaantey hai ki galat hai
Main ek parivaar ke rishtedaari ke uddhaaran se khatam karta hoon.
Lagbhag 10 saal pehle Midwest ke ek state sammelan mein, main ek bahan se mila jisne mujhe apne gaer sadasye pati ko uske saath 12 saalon se girjaghar aatey hue ke bare mein batlaya magar Girjaghar ke sadasye nahi bana tha.
Main kya kar sakti hoon? usne pucha.
Maine use salaaha diya ki sabhi achchie cheezon ko kaartey raho aur apne pati ke saath shaanti aur dayaluta se raho.
Lagbhag ek mahine baad usne likha: “Achcha, main sochti hoon ki 12 saalon tak pata chala ki main kitni shaant thi, parantu mujhe nahi pata hai ki kya main usko lekar bahut shaant thi.
To, maine ek mahine se zyaada bahut hi katin tarike ko kiya, aur unhone baptisma liya.
Dayaluta shaktishaali hai, khaaskar parivaar ko banana mein.
Uske patra mein aage, “main ab zyaada dayalupan ko karne ki koshish kar rahi hoon kyunki hum is saal mandir mein badhna chahatein hain!”
Che saal baad usne mujhe dusri patra likhi: “Mere pati ko [abhi] bishop ki niyukti mili hai aur [humare ward ka] ashirwaad prapt hui.
”2
VI.
Jiwan ke kai rishtedari aur kaaryon mein, hume zaroori hai ki hum bedbhaao ke logon ke saath rahe.
Jaha mukhye hai, in ke humari oar se bhedbhaao nahi hona chahiye ya bhol jana chahiye, parantu Maseeh ke chelon ki tarah humein dusron ke saath shaanti se jiwan ko bitana chahiye jo humare mulye ko nahi baatein ya un shikshanon ko nahi swikaartein jis par wah hai.
Pita Pita ka mukti ki yogna, jo hum bhavishyevata ke praktikaran dwara jaantein hain, ne hume maranshil awastha mein rakhta hai jaha hume Uske aagyaoun ka paalan karna hai.
Jismein shaamil hai humare bedbhaao waale padosiyon ke parampara aur vishwaas ko prem karna jaese Usne hume prem kiya hai.
Jis tarah Mormon ke bhavishyevakta ne sikhlaya hai, hume zaroor aage badhana chahiye, “Parmeshwar aur sabhi manushyon mein prem rakhtey hue” (2 Nephi 31:20).
Humare ird-gird ke musibaton mein jeena bahut mushkil hai, humare Uddhaarkarta ki aagya ek dusre se prem karne ka jaese Usne hum se kiya hai sabse badi chunaoti hai.
Main prarthna karta hoon ki hum ise samjhein aur apne sabhi rishtedaari aur gatividhiyon mein dhoondh kar jiwan bitaen, Ishu Maseeh ke naam se, amen.
Yeh prastaavit kiya gaya hai ki hum Thomas Spencer Monson ko Ishu Maseeh ka Girjaghar Antim-dinon ke Santon ka ke bhavishyevakta, paegambar, aur praktikarta aur Pradhaan ke rup mein samarthan karein; Henry Bennion Eyring ko Pratham Adhyakshta ke Pratham Salaahkaar; aur Dieter Friedrich Uchtdorf ko Pratham Adhyakshta ke Dusre Salaahkaar ke rup mein.
Jo sehmat hai woh prakat karen.
Jo asehmat hai, agar koi, to prakat karen.

Dhanyewaad, bhaaiyon aur bahanon, humare liye tumhare vishwaas aur prarthna ke liye.

• kakhag niyam:
yadi ka, kh ke prati aakarshit hai, aur aap ga ke prati aakarshit hai, to ka ke paas kh ke lie behatar sambhaavanae hai jaisee ki aapakee ga ke lie honee chaahie; aur akasar kh aur ga ek hee vyakti hota hai.

• pyaar me paDane ke dauraan sahee kaam karana hamesha takaleefadeh hota hai.
• jitana jyaada aap kisee naaree (purush) ko chaahenge, utana hee kam vo aapako chaahegee (ga).
• yadi aap kisee khoobasoorat kanya se shaadee karate hai to vah apanee ammee kee pratiroop ban jaatee hai.
aur yadi aap kisee saadhaaraN see kanya se shaadee karate hai to vah apane DaiDee kee pratiroop ban jaatee hai.
• purush kee maa ya naaree ke pita ko agar aap ijjat dete hai to ve har haal me aapase nafarat karenge.
• achchhee naaree ya achchha purush paarking kee jagah ke anuroop hote hai – saare achchhe to pahale se hee engej rahate hai.
• koee bhee achchha dikhane vaala vyakti aise vipareet seks vaale vyakti ke saath paaya jaata hai jo kisee soorat paatr nahee hota.
• pyaar koee uttar nahee hai.
yah to prashn hai- jisaka uttar haa hai.
• pyaar vyaktiyo ko moorkhata bhare kaary karavaata hai.
• yadi aap kisee se pyaar karate hai to unhe jaane deejie.
yadi ve aapake paas vaapas nahee aate hai to ve aapake laayak nahee hai.
• yadi aap samazate hai ki koee naaree sundar hai to usaka purush mitr is baat kee taakeed karane ke lie hamesha vahaa hoga.
• stree = samay + dhan
samay = dhan
stree = dhan^2
dhan = 8730buraee (dhan sabhee buraee kee jaD hai)
stree = buraee
• do vyaktiyo ke pyaar me paDane par kisee ko dosh nahee diya ja sakata sivaay un dono ke.
• pyaar aur jukaam me antar sirf itana hai ki jukaam ke lie vaikseen ab upalabdh hai
• sansaar kee sabase khoobasoorat stree sansaar ke sabase badasoorat purush se shaadee karatee hai.
aur, praaya: isake ulaT bhee sahee hota hai – yaanee sansaar ka sabase aakarshak purush sansaar kee sabase badasoorat stree se shaadee karata hai.
• yadi aap usase pyaar karate hai, vo aapase pyaar nahee karata(tee) hai.
• yadi aap pyaar me hai, vo nahee hai
• yadi aap pyaar chaahate hai, to vo aapako nahee milata.
• yadi koee khoobasoorat aakarshak stree/purush aapako pyaar karata hai – to vah zooTha hota hai.
• yadi aap dono baDe prasann hai, to shaadee hone tak ka intajaar keejie.
• pyaar aapaka sabase behatar dost ho sakata hai to vo sabase baDa dushman bhee hai.
• pyaar me sabhee vishvaas rakhate hai – parantu kya vah kahee maujood bhee hai?
KAI BAAR  AAPNE DEKHA HOGA,MAHSOOS KIYA HOGA KE  GHAR KA MAHAUL ACHCHA HOTE HUE BHI ACHANAK KUCH AISI PARISTHITIYAAN BAN JAATI HAIN,KE GHAR MEIN AAPAS MEIN MEMBERS KE BEECH VIVAAD ,KALAH  UTPANN HO JATA HAI,LEKIN HAMEIN USKA KOI SOLID REASON SAMAJH MEIN NAHIN AATA.KABHI -KABHI YE CHOTE-CHOTE VIVAAD ITNA UGRA ROOP LE LETE HAIN KE POORE PARIWAAR KI SAMPOORNA SHANTI BHANG HO JAATI HAI.HUM SOCHTE RAH JAATE HAIN,LEKIN KARAN HAMAARE SAMAJH MEIN NAHIN AATE.ISKA MAIN REASON GHAR MEIN NEGATIVE ENERGY KA HONA HI HAI, AB SAWAL YEH UTHTA HAI YE NEGATIVE ENERGY KAB AUR KAHAN SE ISS GHJAR MEIN AAYEE?
KISI BHI PRAKAAR KI PAAP KI KAMAAI,RISHWATKHORI,BHRASHT TAREEKE SE KAMAAI KARNE SE BACHNE KI SADAA KOSHISH KAREIN,KYONKE ISS TARAH SE KAMAAI GAYEE SAMPATTI/DHAN KA UPYOG THEEK TARAH SE LOG NAHIN KAR PAATE HAIN ,UNKI SANTAAN PATHBHRASHT  HO JAATI HAIN.
APNI MATA,BAHINO,PATNI AUR BETI KA SADAA SAMMAAN KAREIN.ISS SE CHANDRA,BUDH AUR SHUKRA GRAH AAPKE ANUKOOL HO JAATE HAIN.
  MATA KA APMAAN KARNE SE CHANDRA GRAH,BAHIN/BETI/BUA ADI KA APMAAN KARNE SEBUDH GRAH AUR PATNI KA APMAAN KARNE SE SHUKRA GRAH OPPOSITE(PRATIKOOL) HO JAATE HAIN.
ISI TARAH PITA(FATHER),GURU AUR ANYA BUJURGON KA SAMMAAN KARNE SE SOORYA(SUN PLANET) AUR GURU(BRAHASPATI PLANET)GRAH ANUKOOL HO JAATE HAIN.
INKA APMAAN KARNE SE THEEK VIPREET PRABHAAV HOTA HAI.
PAHLI ROTI JO GHAR MEIN BANE USE COW(GAAY)KO,AKHIRI ROTI STREET DOG KO JAROOR KHILAAYEN.
HAR "SHANIWAAR" AUR "AMAVASYA" KO POORE GHAR KI SAFAAI JAROOR KAREIN.GHAR KE SAARE KABAAD,JAALE ADI SAAF KAR,KABAAD KISI KABAADI KO DE DEIN.
SAFAAI KE BAAD POOJA GHAR MEIN AGARBATTI JAROOR LAGAAYEN.
SHUKL PAKSH KE PAHLE THURSEDAY SE START KAR HAR THURSEDAY KO SAFFRON(KESAR) KA TILAK LAGAAYEN.ISS SE GURU GRAH STRONG HOTA HAI,
GURU GRAH DHAN,VIDHYA,MARITAL RELATIONSHIP ADI KA PRATEEK HAI.GURU GRAH STRONG HONE SE INKI VRADDHI HOTI HAI.
HAR SHANIWAAR KO PEEPAL KE PED KI JAD MEIN MEETHA(SHAKKAR MILA)JAL JAROOR CHADHAAYEN.
BEFORE SUNRISE,ganapati JI KE 12 NAMES YA NIMN SHLOK KA UCHCHARAN KAREIN,TO KARYON MEIN KOI VIGHN NAHIN AATE.
SAB JAANTE HAIN,DESI KAPOOR KA POOJA MEIN PRAYOG KIYA JAATA HAI,DEVI POOJA MEIN KHASKAR PRAYOG KIYA JATA HAI,KYONKE ISMEIN NEGATIVE ENERGY KO EXPEL KARNE KI POWER HAI.ISLIYE LAGBHAG HAR POOJA MEIN DESI KAPOOR KA PRAYOG KIYA JAATA HAI.
RAAAT KO SONE SE PAHLE(KHANA ADI KHANE KE BAAD)KISI SILVER(CHANDI) KI KATORI MEIN YA AARTI MEINDESI KAPOOR KA EK CHOTA SA TUKDA GHAR KE POOJA GHAR MEIN RAKH KAR JALA DEIN.GHAR KI SAARI NEGATIVE ENERGY BAHAR HO JAAYEGI.ISS PRAYOG SE AANE WALI AAKASMIK BAADHAAON SE AUR VIPATTIYON SE RAKSHA HOTI HAI.
DESI KAPOOR KO PAANI MEIN UBAALKAR US PAANI SE POORE GHAR MEIN PONCHA LAGAAAYEN.WEEK MEIN KAM SE KAM 3 BAAR JAROOR LAGAAYEN.GHAR KI NEGATIVE ENERGY DOOR HO JAAYEGI.
TULSI KE PAUDHE KE BAARE MEIN SABHI LOG JAANTE HAIN,KE YE JAHAN BHI HOTA HAI,WAHAN SE VIPATTIYAAN DOOR RAHTI HAIN.TULSI KE PAUDHE KO GHAR KE ISHAAN KON MEIN(NORTH-EAST) LAGAANA CHAAHIYE,YA PHIR MAIN GATE KE PAAS.
ISHAAN KON MEIN ,YA MAIN GATE KE PAAS LAGAANE SE ENVIRONMENT KE BACTERIA NASHT HO JAATE HAIN,GATE KE PAAS HONE SE NEGATIVE ENERGY KA PRAVESH GHAR MEIN NAHIN HO PAATA HAI.
PAANI MEIN KUCH PATTIYAAN TULSI KI DAAL DENE SE PAANI SHUDHDH HO JAATA HAI.
TULSI KA PRAYOG BAHUT SI DISEASES MEIN SUCCESSFULLY KIYA JAATA HAI,ISS MEIN SHUDHDH PARA(MERCURY)HOTA HAI,JO ROG NAASHAK HOTA HAI.
GHAR MEIN JAB BHI FARSH PAR POONCHA LAGWAYEN,USMEINPAANI MEIN MUTTHI BHAR NAMAK DAAL KAR HI LAGWAAYEN.ISS SE BHI GHAR KI NEGATIVE ENERGY DOOR HOTI HAI.
FITKARI KI DALI KO PAANI MEIN GHUMAKAR YA  USKA THODA SA CHURNA PAANI MEIN GHOLKAR, US PAANI SE POORE GHAR MEIN FARSH PAR PONCHA LAGWAAYEN,TO GHAR KI NEGATIVE ENERGY DOOR HO JAATI HAI.
COW URINE KA USE KISI BHI TARAH SE KAREIN,YEH NEGATIVE ENERGY DOOR KARNE KA SABSE SARAL AUR SASHAKT SAADHAN HAI.HINDU GRANTHON MEINISKI BAHUT IMPORTANCE BATAAI GAYEE HAI.PRACHEEN KAAL MEIN HAMAARE RISHI-MUNI KOI BHI ANUSHTHAN KARTE THEI,TO PAHLE US JAGAH KO PALE GOBAR SE LEEP KAR US JAGAH KO PANCHGAVYA(GOBAR,COW URINE,SHUDDH GAAY KA GHEE, DOODH,DAHI) SE PAVITRA KARTE THEI,JIS SE WAHAN KI SAARI NEGATIVE ENERGY DOOR HO JAAYE.
USE:-KISI KATORI MEIN THODA SA COW URINE LEKAR USMEIN THODA SA JAL MILAKAR US PAR 108 BAAR GAYATRI MANTRA PADHEIN,PHIR KISI PHOOL SE YA AAM KE PATTON SE US JAL KO POORE GHAR MEIN CHHIRAK DEIN,TO DHEERE DHEERE POORE GHAR KI NEGATIVE ENERGY TO SAMAPT TO HOTI HI HAI,POORE GHAR KE VAASTU DOSH BHI SAMAPT HO JAATE HAIN.
FRESH COW URINE(BACHHIYA KA) JAL MEIN MILAKAR PEENE SE SHARIR KE JYADATAR ROG THEEK HO JAATE HAIN.
CANCER MEIN ISKA SEVAN KARAANE SE CANCER TAK THEEK HO JAATA HAI,AGAR 1ST STAGE MEIN HAI TO.AUR BHI BAHUT SE LAABH HAIN.
LOBAAN  MEIN DIVYA SHAKTIYON KO ATTRACT KARNE KI SHAKTI HAI,ISS KI DHOONI DEVI DEVTAAON KE YANTRON AADI KO LAGAANE SE WOH SHUDDH HO JAATE HAIN,POOJA STHAL PAR LOBAAN YA GOOGUL KI DHOONI LAGATAAR JALTE RAHNE SE WAHAN KI SAARI NEGATIVE ENERGY GAYAB HO JAATI HAI.AGAR POORE GHAR MEIN ISKI DHOONI ROZ YA WEEKLY KAM SE KAM DO BAAR LAGAAI JAAYE TO GHAR NEGATIVE ENERGY SE SURAKSHIT RAHTA HAI.
ISI TARAH GOOGUL KI DHOONI LAGAANE SE BHI YEHI ASAR HOOTA HAI,AGAR NIYAM SE ROZ YA WEEKLY KAM SE KAM 3 DIN ISKI DHOONI GHAR MEIN LAGAI JAAYE TO GHAR NEGATIVE ENERGIES KE EFFECT SE BACHA RAHTA HAI.NAVRATRI MEIN ISILIYE LOG GHAR MEIN DAILY KAM SE KAM 9 DIN TAK TO GOOUL KI DHOONI JALATE HAIN JIS SE SAARE GHAR KI NEGATIVE ENERGY GHAR SE BAHAR HO JAAYE.
ISKE PRAYOG SE GHAR MEIN KOI OOPRI BAADHA/HAWA AADI GHAR MEIN RAH HI NAHIN SAKTI.
ISKE ALAWA AAM KI LAKDI KA SWASTIK,OM,PARTICULAR BEEJ MANTRA KE EFFECTS AADI KE BAARE MEIN BHI PART-2 MEIN DETAIL SE DENGE.
UMMEED HAI AAP SABHI FRIENDS KO YE JAANKAARIYAN ,JO HAMNE AAP LOGON KO DEE HAI,PASAND AAYEE HONGI,AGAR KUCHH SUJHAV  DENA CHAHEIN YA KISI PARTICULAR CHEEZ KE BAARE MEIN JAANKAARI CHAHTE HON TO LIKHEIN,HUM KOSHIS KARENGE KE WOH JAANKAARI AAP LOGON KO UPLABDH KARWA SAKEIN.
VAASTU SE RELATED KOI BHI PROBLEM,AGAR CHAHEIN TO HUMSE CONSULT KAR SAKTE HAIN ,SAMADHAAN VEDIC VAASTU SE KIYA JAAYEGA.FROPPER FRIENDS KE LIYE YEH SEWA NISHULK UPLABDH HAI.
jab Teevee chainalo ke dhunaadhaar promo dekh-dekhakar antata: mere muhalle ka dhobee aur nukkaD ka chaay vaala bhee ek ke baad ek mobail ho ge to mere bhee jnyaan chakshu kuchh khule.
mitro-parichito-rishtedaaro kee najaro me to mai pichhaDa ho hee chala tha jo ab tak mobail nahee ho paaya tha.
is beech hafto yah khabar chhaee rahee ki disambar-janavaree ke do maheeno ke dauraan hee kul 45 laakh logo ne desh me mobail fon apanaaya.
ab jab dhobee aur chaay vaale bhee mobail ho ge, aur desh kee adhisankhy aabaadee mobail hone me juT gee prateet hone lagee to muze bhee antata: sharm see aane lagee aur mainne socha ki chalo apan bhee mobail ho hee jae;
zizakate hue, mainne mobail fono kee ek baDee-see dukaan me kadam rakha.
selsamen ne prashn vaachak darshTi se muze dekhate hue meree or musakaraahaT fenkee – “haa sar, apane puraane mobail ko ne, taaja-tareen behatareen takanolaajee yukt byooTee pees se badalane ka sahee vakt aa gaya hai.
aaj hee ek naya moDal aaya hai.
vah aapako isee dukaan par milega – anyatr aapako kahee nahee milega.”
“maaf keejiega, muze naya mobail lena hai.”
“oh, to aap ek atirikt mobail apane ghar ya daftar ke lie lena chaahate hai – bahut achchhe.
ab to yah nihaayat hee jarooree ho gaya hai- ek atirikt parsanal mobail fon vyaktigat jaroorato ke lie.”
mainne use beech me Toka - “nahee nahee – yah baat nahee hai, mere paas mobail nahee hai, mai apana pahala mobail fon hee khareedane kee soch raha hoo.”
us selsamen ke chehare par kee rang ae aur utar ge.
jaise ki vah soch raha tha – yah kis dharatee ka jeev hai jo ab tak mobail nahee ho paaya? ab tak to log do-chaar mobail fon khareedakar fenk-badal chuke hai aur yah ajeeb praaNee apana pahala mobail khareedane aaya hai.
lagata to khaate peete ghar ka hai – magar mobail hone me itanee kanjoosee! selsamen ke chehare par khinch aee prasannata gaayab ho chukee thee.
“oh, to aap mobail kisalie lena chaahate hai?” selsamen ne tanik aprasannata se poochha.
use laga ki mai shaayad usaka Taim kharaab karane vaala hoo.
mai sochane laga ki mobail mai kisalie lena chaahata hoo.
mainne usase poochha ki mobail log kisalie lete hai – kya fon karane ke alaava bhee koee kaaraN hota hai mobail lene ke lie?
selsamen ko mera pratiprashn ati chhudr kism ka laga, lihaaja usane muze ek prashikshu selsamen ke supurd kar diya.
prashikshu selsamen ko apana pad pakka karavaana lagata tha atev vah apane seeniyar se bhee jyaada chauDee muskaan meree taraf fenk kar mukhaatib hua.
usane muzase fir poochha ki mobail fon ka mai kya karane vaala hoo.
mainne use bataaya ki mere muhalle ka dhobee aur nukkaD ka chaay vaala mobail ho gaya hai.
jo ve apane mobail se karate hai usee tarah ka kuchh mai bhee karoonga – shaayad baat-cheet jaisa kuchh.
prashikshu ne muze prashikshit karana chaaha – “dekhie sar, mobail fon kee besik fankshanaliTee to Theek hai, ek hee hai- baat karana.
parantu aap ne-aadhunik mobail fono se bahut saare kaam kar sakate hai.”
mere jnyaan me varddhi ho rahee thee.
jijnyaasa vash poochha, “jaise?”
“jaise ki gem khelana, mobail fon ke antarnirmit efem reDiyo se reDiyo sunana, antarnirmit kaimare se foTo kheenchana, emapee3 pleyar fon se sangeet sunana, veeDiyo-malTeemeeDiya inebalD fono se moovee banaana va ple karana, Dabalyooepee – jeepeeaares ya seeDeeeme inebalD fono se inTaraneT kee sair karana, ee-mel va esemes-ememes sandesh bhejana-paana ityaadi;” vah ememes par jara jyaada hee, arthapoorN jor Daal raha tha.
aashchary se mera munh khula rah gaya.
“yaanee mobail fon se itane kaam lie ja sakate hai?”
“ye to fir bhee kam hai” prashikshu arthapoorN shabdo me samazaane laga – “veeDiyo inebalD kalar mobail fono se aap ve filme bhee dekh sakate hai; aur na jaane kya kya kar sakate hai; oopar se roj nee cheeje juDatee ja rahee hai; aur, aajakal to haee eND ke mobail fon to sTeTas simbal ke prateek ho chale hai- ab aapakee shakhsiyat ka andaaja is baat se lagaaya jaane laga hai ki aapake haath me kis kism ka-kitane ka mobail fon hai;”
muze laga ki nukkaD ka chaay vaala kalar veeDiyo vaala mobail liya hai to jaroor vo isee tarah kee film dekhane ke lie liya hoga, aur jo paDos ka karapT ofeesar pachaas hajaar vaala mobail laTakae ghoomata hai to vah apana sTeTas zaaDane ke lie hee aise ghoomata hoga.
mainne sharmaate zizakate hue usase kaha ki bhiya muze mobail sirf baat karane ke lie chaahie.
usane javaab diya ki aisa koee fon to ab sekaNDs me, koee puraana pees hee kahee mil sakata hai- ho sakata hai kabaaDee baajaar me.
jamaana ab malTeefankshan Divaiso ka aa gaya hai.
mobail me ab batiyaie bhee gapiyaie bhee aur bakhat paDe to pikchar bhee dekhie, gaana bhee sunie, sTeTas bhee banaie.
muze mobail hona hee tha atev le dekar bahut heel hujjat se ki jeeesem ka lena chaahie ya seeDeeeme, rangeen lena chaahie ya blaik eND vhaiT, kaimara yukt ya emapee3 pleyar yukt, nokiya ka lena chaahie ki elajee-semasang-moTorola-benakyoo-aur-pata-nahee-kya-kya ka lena chaahie – mainne ek mobail fon antata: pasand kar hee liya.
“isame kaun sa plaan Dalava de sar?” prashikshu apanee safalata par ki vah muz jaise mobail ganvaar ko bhee ek mobail bechane me safal ho gaya tha – gad gad hota hua poochh raha tha.
“plaan maane?” mai fir shankit hua.
“sar, do tarah ke plaan hai.
ek to posTapeD doosara preepeD.
ab yah aap par nirbhar karata hai ki aap kaun sa plaan lena chaahate hai.
jaise ki preepeD ka besik plaan do sau rupe ka jisame aapako Taak Taim aadha milega – veliDiTee hafte din kee rahegee.
isame pals reT rahega do rupe prati minaT.
isee ka freeDam plaan lenge paanch sau rupe ka to isakee vaidhata ek maheene kee hogee, TaakaTaim ful milega – apane neTavark me baat karane par pals reT pachaas paise doosare ke neTavark par pichahattar paise, lainD lain par ek roopaya bees paise;”
“ruko bhaee – ye preepeD gaNit muze samaz nahee aaya.
posTapeD plaan samazao”
“isame bhee besik plaan do sau rupe ka hai jisame hom neTavark par ek rupaye pratiminaT, lainDalain fon par do rupe, esaTeeDee teen rupe prati pals hai.
isake eDavaans renTal me aapako pratimaah chha: sau rupe dena hoga, badale me aapako teen sau rupe ka TaakaTaim muft milega, pals reT aadhe ho jaenge; agar aap jyaada baat karate hai to isaka freeDam plaan Theek rahega aur agar aap inakaming ke lie chaahate hai to isaka laifalaang inakaming free vaala plaan;”
mai in plaano ke chakravyooh me fans chuka tha aur anirNay kee sthiti aa chukee thee.
prashikshu ke barkhaast kie jaane kee sambhaavana ke beech Doobata utaraata baad me dekhoonga kah kar bagair mobail lie hee mai dukaan se baahar aa gaya.
mere mobail hone me lagata hai, kuchh deree hai.
aap ke kya haal hai? aap mobail hue ki nahee?
ek vinamr anurodh – samajaseva ke is prakalp ko apane-apane shaharon me shuru karen
Posted: 19 Jul 2008 11:57 PM CDT
ujjain men rahane vale shree pidi kulakarni ek nimn-madhyam varg ke naukaripesha vyakti hain.
unaka ek bada aopareshan 2005 men sampann huaa.
usake bad kisi any svasthy samasya ke karan unhen kafi din bistar par bitane pade aur poora parivar unakee seva men din-rat laga raha.
un dinon unhen kaee tarah ke medikal upakaran kharidane pade, jo ki unake kam ke the, jaise vhil cheyar, vokar aur folding letrin sit aadi.
bhagavan kee kripa se do varsh ke bhitar hi vah ekadam svasth ho gaye, bima nigam kee kripa se upachar men laga kuchh pratishat paisa bhi vapas mil gaya.
lekin kulakarni parivar "post-aoparetiv keyara" par jitana kharch kar chuka tha, usakee aarthik bharapaee bhi sambhav nahin thi, n hi is sambandh men koee sarakari niyam hain.
bharat men niji svasthy sevaon ka vistar teji se jari hai, kyonki sarakari svasthy sevayen bhrashtachar, lalafitashahi aur rajaniti ke chalate lagabhag nishpran avastha men pahunch chukee hain.
in niji svasthy sevaon ke sath-sath inase jude do udyog bhi teji se panape hain ve hain dava udyog tatha medikal upakaran udyog.
jaisa ki sabhi janate hain ki mahangaee ke karan dhire-dhire svasthy sevayen bhi aam aadami kee pahunch se door hoti ja rahi hain aur kisi vishesh paristhiti men aopareshan ke bad "post-aopareshan keyara" bhi kafi mahanga hai.
is sthiti se nipatane aur aam vyakti ko in kharchon se bachane, tatha rashtriy-bahurashtriy kampaniyon ke anap-shanap munafe ko niyantrit karane kee ek koshish ke roop men ujjain maharashtr samaj kee ek shakha "marathi vyavasayik mandala" (jo kuchh vyavasayiyon aur gair-sarakari karmachariyon ka ek samooh hai) ne ek vishesh samajaseva ka prakalp hath men liya hai.
is prakalp ka nam hai "do sv vidi mungi seva prakalpa".
ham sabhi ko yah maloom hai ki kisi vyakti ke aapat aopareshan ya any bimari ke bad ghar par usakee dekhabhal ke liye bhi kaee bar kaee tarah ke upakaran lagate hain, jaise ki aoksijan silendar, jalane ke marijon ke liye vishesh bistar "vatar beda", salain staind, stool pot, yoorin pot, chalane-firane ke liye vokar, chhadi, kamar dard ke marijon ke liye letrin sit, vhil cheyar, strechar aadi kee aavashyakata hoti hai, aur yah sabhi aaeetam behad mahange hote hain.
ho sakata hai ki kaee log aasani se inakee keemat chukane kee sthiti men hon, lekin asal men in vastuon ka upayog ek simit samay tak ke liye hi ho pata hai.
marij ke thik ho jane kee sthiti men yah chijen un gharon men bekar padi rahati hain aur antatah kharab hokar kabad men jati hain.
is samajaseva prakalp ke anusar marathi vyavasayik mandal ke karyakartaon ne is prakar kee kafi sari vastuen ekatrit kee hain, kuchh kharid kar aur kuchh parichiton, mitron se dan lekar.
jab kabhi kisi vyakti ko is prakar kee kisi vastu kee aavashyakata hoti hai to mandal ke sadasy use vah vastu pradan karate hain.
us vastu kee mool keemat ko shuru men "jamanata" ke taur par jama karavaya jata hai, yadi vastu 1000 rupaye se kam keemat kee hai to filahal isaka shulk 20/- mahina rakha gaya hai, jabaki yadi vastu mahangi hai (jaise aoksijan silendar aadi) to usaka masik shulk n lete hue 5/- rupaye dainik ke hisab se liya jata hai, taki vyakti aavashyakata samapt hote hi turant vah vastu vapas kar de aur vah kisi aur ke kam aa sake.
vastu vapas kar dene par jamanat rashi vapas kar di jati hai (mentenens ya vastu men aaee kisi kharabi ko thik karavane kee jimmedari bhi usi vyakti kee hoti hai), sath hi us vyakti se anurodh kiya jata hai ki is prakar kee koee vastu usake kisi rishtedar ya mitr ke yahan falatoo padi ho to use dan men dene ko protsahit karen.
5/-, 10/-, 20/- kee mamooli rakam se jo bhi rakam ekatrit hoti hai, usase ek aur naee vastu aa jati hai, is prakar vastuen dhire-dhire badh rahi hain, sath hi is seva prakalp ko utsahajanak pratisad mil raha hai.
filahal to yah ek chhote star par chal raha hai, lekin jaise-jaise isamen vibhinn vastuen badhengi, jahir hai ki kuchh atirikt jagah, kam se kam ek-do vyakti ka staf, steshanari aadi bhi lagega.
dirghakalin yojana hai ki ek embulens aur ek shav vahan kee bhi vyavastha kee jayegi.
is prakalp ko "nigetiv blad grup donar asosiyeshana" se bhi joda gaya hai (sabhi janate hain ki nigetiv grup ka khoon badi mushkil se milata hai) aur svayan is samooh ke adhyaksh shree abhay marathe 50 se adhik bar raktadan kar chuke hain.
is yojana men amir-garib athava jati-dharm ka koee bandhan nahin hai, yah ek samajaseva hai aur mamooli shulk bhi isaliye liya ja raha hai taki usase koee any naee vastu li ja sake aur sath hi seva ka upayog karane vala vyakti bhi is seva ko "for granteda" n lekar ganbhirata se le.
main sabhi blogaron, net mitron tatha any sabhi se jo yah lekh padhen, yah anurodh karana chahoonga ki ve log bhi apane-apane shaharon men is prakar ke kuchh logon ko ekatrit karake aisa prakalp shuru karen.
jo parivar kisi eksident ya aopareshan se gujarata hai, usakee vyatha vahi jan sakata hai, lekin yadi bhari kharchon ke bich is prakar ka koee madad ka hath jab mil jata hai to use kafi rahat milati hai.
aasha hai ki yah lekh adhik se adhik logon tak pahunchega aur usase kafi sare log apane shaharon men yah samajaseva shuru karenge.
shiksha aur svasthy, donon kshetr aane vale samay men aam aadami ko sabase jyada aarthik takalif denge, usase nipatane ka ek hi tarika hai "aapasi sahakara"… upayog karane ke bad bachi huee davaeeyon ka baink shuru karen, ya purane kampyootaron se kisi gairaj ya anupayogi kamare men garib chhatron ko padhayen, purane kapade bechakar bartan kharidane kee bajay yoon hi kisi jarooratamand ko de den aadi-aadi.
"aapasi sahakarita" ek tarika hai, mahangi hoti ja rahi svasthy sevaon aur dava kampaniyon se bachane ka…
