dakshin afrika men gandhiji ke sath unake jarman mitr kailanabaik rahate the gandhiji ke prayogon men vah unaka barabar sath dete the unhin dinon kisi galatafahami ke karan kuchh bhole-bhale pathan gandhiji se naraj ho gaye kuchh logon ne unako aur bhi bhadaka diya vatavaran garm ho utha laga ve pathan kisi bhi samay gandhiji par hamala kar sakate hain kailanabaik ko bhi yah bat maloom huee tabase vah barabar gandhiji ke sath rahane lage gandhiji ko maloom n ho, is tarah jahan bhi gandhiji jate, vah bhi unake sath ho lete ek din daftar se bahar jane ke lie gandhiji kot pahan rahe the kailanabaik ka kot bhi pas hi tanga huaa tha gandhiji ne dekha ki unakee jeb bhari hain unako aisa anubhav huaa, jaise usamen rivalvar tha unhonne turant jeb kee talashi li sachamuch usamen rivalvar tha unhonne kailanabaik ko bulaya poochha, "yah rivalvar apani jeb men kisalie rakhate hain ?" kailanabaik sahasa hataprabh ho uthe lajjit hokar uttar diya, "kuchh nahin, aise hi" gandhiji hans pade bole, "raskin aur tanlsatany kee pustakon men aisa likha hai ki bina karan rivalvar jeb men rakha jaye ? is parihas se kailanabaik aur bhi sharminda hue bole, "mujhe pata laga hain ki kuchh gunde aap par hamala karanevale hain" "aur aap unase meri raksha karana chahate hain ?" "ji han, main isalie aapake pichhe-pichhe rahata hoon" kailanabaik ka yah uttar sunakar gandhiji khoob hanse bole,"achchha tab to main nishchint huaa meri raksha karane ka prabhu ka jo uttaradayitv tha, vah aapane le liya hai jab tak aap jivit hain, tabatak mujhe apane aapako surakshit samajhana chahie vah, mere prati sneh ke karan aapane prabhu ka adhikar chhin lene ka khoob sahas kiya" yah sunakar kailanabaik vichalit ho uthe unhen apani bhool maloom huee gandhiji fir bole,"kya soch rahe ho ? yah bhagavan ke prati shraddha ke lakshan nahin hain meri raksha kee chinta mat karo meri chinta karanevala to vah sarvashaktiman prabhu hai is rivalvar se aap meri raksha nahin kar sakate" atyant namr bhav se kailanabaik bole, "meri bhool huee main ab aur aapakee chinta nahin karoonga" yah kahakar unhonne vah rivalvar fenk diya
gandhiji johanisabarg (dakshin afrika) men vakalat karate the shree polak unake sath the vah unaka hisab-kitab rakhate the gandhiji ka ek muvakkil tha vah fis samay par nahin deta tha dhire-dhire usapar bahut karja chadh gaya, parantu bar-bar takada karane par bhi usane bhugatan karane kee jara bhi chinta nahin kee jab polak bahut pareshan ho uthe to unhonne adalat men jane ka nishchay kiya usake lie jaroori kagajat taiyar kiye aur gandhiji ke pas jakar bole,"in kagajon par hastakshar kar dijiye" gandhiji un kagajon ko padhakar polak se bole, "kya aap nahin janate ki main is prakar ke kamon ke lie adalaton ke daravaje nahin khatakhatata? dhamakee dena hinsa hi to hain aur hinsa ke dvara kisi vyakti ko eemanadar nahin banaya ja sakata agar vah vyakti mere paise nahin chukata to mujhe apani moorkhata ka fal bhogana hi chahie maine hi to use chhoot de rakhi thi yadi samay par usase fis leta rahata to yah sthiti paida n hoti aparadh mera bhi hain" aur vah adalat men nahin gaye
ek bar dakshin afrika men ek mahine tak bina namak ka bhojan karane kee pratigya lekar finiks-aashram men bharti hue lekin shighr hi ve is sade bhojan se ukata gaye ek din unhonne daraban se khane kee masaledare aur svadisht chijen mangavaee aur chupachap kha li bad men unhin men se ek yuvak ne, jisane ve chijen khaee thi, is bat kee soochana gandhiji ko de di sham kee prarthana men gandhiji ne unhen ek-ek karake bulaya aur poochha, "kya tumanen vah khana khaya?"
sabane spasht inkar kar diya itana hi nahin, unhonne soochana denevale ko jhootha thaharaya isapar gandhiji bade jor se apane galon ko pitane lage aur bole, "mujhase sachchaee chhipane men kasoor tumhara nahin, mera hain, kyoki abhi tak maine saty ka gun prapt nahin kiya hai saty mujhase door bhagata hai" vah apane ko tadana dete hi rahe yah sthiti kab tak bardasht kee ja sakati thi sare yuvak ek-ek karake unake samane aaye aur unhonne apana aparadh svikar kar liya
5aata pisana to achchha hai
gandhiji ne jab dakshin afrika men aashram khola tha, tab unake pas jo kuchh bhi apana tha, sab de diya tha svadesh lauter to kuchh bhi sath nahin laye sabaka vahin trast bana diya aur aisa prabandh kar diya ki usaka upayog sarvajanik kary ke lie hota rahe bharat lautane par paitrik sampatti ka prashn samane aaya porabandar aur rajakot men unake ghar the unamen gandhi-vansh ke doosare log rahate the un sabako bulakar gandhiji ne kaha, "paitrik sampatti men mera jo kuchh bhi hissa hai, use main aapake lie chhodata hoon" vah keval kahakar hi nahin rah gaye, likha-padhi karavane ke bad apane charon putron ke hastakshar bhi un kagajon par karava diye is prakar ve kanooni ho gaye gandhiji kee ek bahan bhi thin unaka nam raliyatabahan tha, lekin sab unako gokeebahan kahakar pukarate the unake parivar men koee bhi nahin tha prashn utha ki unaka kharch kaise chale apane niji kam ke lie gandhiji kisi se kuchh nahin mangate the fir bhi unhonne apane purane mitr dan prannajivanadas mehata se kaha ki vah gokeebahan ko das rupaye masik bhej diya karen bhagy kee vidambana dekhiye! kuchh din bad gokeebahan kee ladakee bhi vidhava ho gaee aur man ke sath aakar rahane lagi us samay bahan ne gandhiji ko likha, "ab mera kharch badh gaya hai use poora karane ke liye hamen padosiyon ka anaj pisana padata hain" gandhiji ne uttar diya,"aata pisana bahut achchha hai donon ka svasthy thik rahega ham bhi aashram men aata pisate hain tumhara jab ji chahe, tum donon aashram men aa sakati ho aur jitani jan-seva kar sako, utana karane ka tumhen adhikar hai jaise ham rahate hain,vaise hi tum bhi rahogi main ghar par kuchh nahin bhej sakata aur n apane mitron se hi kar sakata hoon"
dakshin afrika men ek din shreemati kastooraba gandhi rasoeeghar men khane kee koee chij bana rahin thi gandhiji kuchh aur kam kar rahe the sahasa unhonne kastooraba se poochha, "tujhe pata chala ya nahin?" ba utsuk svar men bolin,"kya?" gandhiji ne hansate hue kaha, "aajatak too meri vivahita patni thi, lekin ab nahin rahi" ba ne chakit hokar unakee aur dekha poochha, "aisa kisane kaha hain? aap to roj naee-naee baten khoj nikalate hain" gandhiji bole, "main kahan khoj nikalata hoon yah janaral smats kahata hai ki eesaee vivahon kee tarah hamara vivah sarakari adalat ke rajistar men darj nahin huaa hai, isalie vah gair kanooni mana jayega aur too meri vivahita patni nahin balki rakhail mani jayegi" ba ka chehara tamatama utha boli, "usaka sir! us nithalle ko aisi baten soojha karati hain" gandhiji ne poochha, "lekin ab tum striyan kya karogi?" ba bolin, "aap hi bataiye, "ham kya karen?" gandhiji to yah sunane ke lie taiyar baithe the turant bole, "ham purush jis tarah sarakar se ladate hain, vaise tum striyan bhi lado agar tumhen vivahita patni banana ho aur apani aabaroo pyari ho to tumhe bhi hamari tarah satyagrah karake jel jana chahie" ba ne acharaj se kaha, "main jel janu! auraten bhi kabhi jel ja sakati hai?" gandhiji ekaek gambhir ho uthe bole, "auraten jel kyon nahin ja sakatin? ram ke sath sita, harishachandr ke sath taramati aur nal ke sath damayanti--in sabhi ne vano men apar du:kh sahe the" ba boli, "ve sab to devataon- jaise the utani shakti hamamen kahan hai" gandhiji ne uttar diya, "ham bhi unake jaisa aacharan karen to devata ban sakate hain main ram ban sakata hoon aur too sita ban sakati hai sita ram ke sath n gaee hoti, tara harishachandr ke sath n bikee hoti aure damayanti ne nal ke sath kasht n uthaye hote to unhen koee bhi sati n kahata" yah sunakar ba kuchh der chup rahin fir bolin, " to mujhe aapako jel men bhejana hi hain jaoongi jel men bhi jaoongi lekin jel ka khana kya mujhe anukul aayega?" gandhiji bole, "jel ka khana anukul n aave to vahan falon par rahana" ba ne poochha, "jel men sarakar mujhe fal khane ko degi?" gandhiji ne kaha, "n de to too upavas karana" yah sunakar ba hans padi aur boli, "thik hai yah mujhe aapane achchha marane ka rasta bata diya lagata hai ki agar main jel gaee to jaroor mar jaoongi" gandhiji khilakhila pade aur kaha, "han-han too jelo men jakar maregi to main jagadamba kee tarah teri pooja karoonga" ba dridh svar men boli, "achchha, tab to main jel jane ko taiyar hoon"
gandhiji us samay finiks-aashram men rahate the dakshin afrika kee sarakar se antim sangharsh aarambh hi honevala tha tabhi ek rat ko prarthana ke bad unake ek sathi ravaji- bhaee manibhaee patel ne kaha,"bapooji daraban men aaj main khoob ghooma, parantu satyagrah ke baren men mujhe koee utsah nahin dikhaee diya isake viparit adhikansh logon men isake prati ashraddha hi bhari huee hain bahut se log kahate hain ki gandhibhaee vyarth hi pet dabakar dard paida kar rahe hain siddhant aur manapaman kee bat chhodakar jo kuchh ham paida karate hain, use karane den to bahut achchha yadi ham goron ke sath sangharsh karenge to ve hamen aur bhi dukh denge aaj jaisi sthiti hai, usamen rahana hi kya achchha nahin hoga? jara moonchh nichi rakhakar chal lengen yahan ham rupaya kamane ke liye aaye hain, barbad hone ke lie nahin svabhiman kee raksha ke lie jel men jana hota to ham yahan kisalie aate? bapooji, aisi saf-saf baten bahut-se logon ne mujhase kahin main isase bahut dukhi huaa hoon sach to yah hai ki sarakar se ladane ke lie hamare pas kitani shakti prapt huee? kya aapane kabhi hisab lagaya hai ki itani badi sarakar se ladane ke lie hamare pas kitane aadami hain?" gandhiji hanse aur bole, "main to rat-din hisab lagata rahata hoon, fir bhi chaho to tum gin sakate ho sabhi to hamare parichit hai" ravajibhaee ne ginana shuru kiya sankhya chalis par aakar thahar gaee unhonne kaha, "bapooji aise chalis vyakti hain" gambhir svar men gandhiji ne poochha," parantu ye chalis yoddha kaise hain?" ravajibhaee patel is prashn ka arth samajhate the bole,"ye chalis to aise hain, jo ant tak joojhenge ye jikar bhi jitenge aur marakar bhi jitenge" yah sunakar gandhiji bol uthe, "bas aise chalis satyagrahi yoddha-pranon kee baji lagakar ant tak joojhanevale chalis satyagrahi yoddha-kafi hain tum dekh lena, aise chalis yoddhaon ke chalis hajar yoddha ho jayenge" yah kahate hue gandhiji bahut hi bhavavesh se bhar uthe unake rongate khade ho gaye usi svar men vah fir bole, "ye chalis bhi n hon to main akela hi gokhale ke apaman ka badala lene ko kafi hoon kitani hi badi saltanat kyon n ho, gokhale ke sath vishvasaghat karanevale ke viruddh main akela hi sangharsh karunga jabatak gokhale ko diya vachan poora nahin kiya jata, tabatak pagal banakar main goron ka dvar khatakhataoonga gokhale ka apaman ho hi kaise sakata hai? yah kaise sahan ho sakata hain?"
8/ mere ghar men yah kalah nahin chal sakata
gandhiji daraban men vakalat karate the unake munshi bhi pray: unhin ke sath rahate the usamen hindoo,eesaee,gujarati,madrasi sabhi dharm aur pranton ke vyakti hote the gandhiji unake sath kisi tarah ka bhed-bhav nahin rakhate the unhe apane parivar ke rup men hi manate the jis ghar men vah rahate the, usakee banavat pashchimi dhang kee thi kamaron men naliyan nahin thi peshab ke lie khas tarah ke baratan rakhe jate the unhen naukar nahin uthate the yah kam ghar ke malik aur malakin karate the jo munshi ghar men ghul-mil jate the, ven apane baratan svayan hi utha le jate the ek bar ek eesaee munshi unake ghar men rahane ke liye aaya usaka baratan ghar ke malik aur malakin ko hi uthana chahie tha lekin kasturaba gandhi ne is munshi ka baratan uthane se inkar kar diya vah munshi pancham kul men paida huaa tha usaka baratan ba kaise uthati! gandhiji svayan uthaven, yah bhi vah nahin sah sakati thin is bat ko lekar donon men kafi jhagada huaa ba baratan uthakar le to gaee, lekin krodh aur glani se unakee aankhe lal ho aaee gandhiji ko is tarah baratan uthane se santosh nahin huaa vah chahate the ki ba hansate-hansate baratan le jayen, isaliye unhonne oonche svar men kaha, "mere ghar men yah kalah nahin chal sakata" ye shabd ba ke hriday men tir kee tarah chubh gaye vah tadap-kar bolin,"to apana ghar apane pas rakho main jati hoon" gandhiji bhi kathor ho uthe krodh men bharakar unhonne ba ka hath pakada aur daravaje tak khinchakar le gaye vah unhen bahar kar dena chahate the, lekin jaise hi unhonne daravaja khola ashrudhara bahati huee ba bolin, "tumako to sharm nahin hai, lekin mujhe hai jara to sharmao main bahar nikalakar kahan jaoon yahan mere man-bap bhi nahin hain, jo unake ghar chali jaoon main stree thahari tumhari dhauns mujhe sahani hogi ab sharm karo aur daravaja band kar do koee dekh lega to donon ka hi munh kala hoga" yah sunakar man-hi-man gandhiji bahut lajjit hue unhonne daravaja band kar diya socha--agar patni mujhai chhodakar kahin nahin ja sakati to main bhi use chhodakar kahan janevala hoon
ek bar dakshin afrika men ek musalaman batalar gandhiji ke pas aaya bole, "gandhibhaee, mujhe bahut thodi tanakhvah milati hai bal-bachchedar aadami hoon utane men gujara nahin hota agar mujhe thodi-si angreji aa jaye to jyada tanakhvah mil sakati hai" gandhiji un dinon bairistar the unhonne kshannabhar socha aur fir man-hi-man nishchay karake javab diya, "achchha, main tumako angreji padhaoonga" batalar chakit hokar gandhiji kee taraf dekhane laga vilayati thath se rahanevala yah bairistar mujhe angreji sikhayega! use bahut khushi huee, lekin usake samane ek aur samasya thi usane vah samasya bhi gandhiji ke samane rakhi aur kaha, "aap mujhe padhayenge to yah thik hai, lekin naukari se samay nikalakar main yahan jaldi kaise aa sakata hoon?" gandhiji ne turant javab diya, "tum isakee fikar mat karo main tumhare ghar aakar padhaya karunga" batalar kee aankhe kritagyata se bhig aaeen bairistar gandhi pratidin char mil paidal chalakar usako angreji padhane ke lie jate aur fir usi prakar ghar vapas lautate yah ek-aadh din kee bat nahin thi poore aath mahine tak yahi kram chalata raha
ek bar kastooraba gandhi bahut bimar ho gaeen jal-chikitsa se unhen koee labh nahin huaa doosare upachar kiye gaye unamen bhi safalata nahin mili ant men gandhiji ne unhen namak aur dal chhodane kee salah di parantu isake lie ba taiyar nahin hueen gandhiji ne bahut samajhaya, pothiyon se praman padhakar sunaye, lekar sab vyarth ba bolin, "koee aapase kahe ki dal aur namak chhod do to aap bhi nahin chhodenge" gandhiji ne turant prasann hokar kaha,"tum galat samajh rahi ho mujhe koee rog ho aur vaidy kisi vastu ko chhodane ke liye kahen to turant chhod doonga aur tum kahati ho to main abhi ek sal ke lie dal aur namak donon chhodata hoon, tum chhodo ya n chhodo, ye alag bat hai" yah sunakar ba bahut dukhi hueen bolin, "aapaka svabhav janate hue bhi mere munh se yah bat nikal gaee ab main dal aur namak nahin khanoogi aap pratigya vapas le len" gandhiji ne kaha, "tum dal aur namak chhod dogi, yah bahut achchha hoga usase tumhen labh hi hoga, lekin kee huee pratigya vapis nahin li jati kisi bhi nimitt se sanyam palan karane par labh hi hota hai mujhe bhi labh hi hoga isalie tum meri chinta mat karo" gandhiji apani pratigya par dridh rahe
gandhiji ne sabaramati men aashram khola tha ek bhaee unase milane aaye vah bahut achchhi angreji janate the aur manate the ki badhiya angreji men lekh likhana desh kee seva karana hain unhonne gandhiji se kaha,"mere yogy koee ho to bataiye" unaka vichar tha ki gandhiji unase angreji men lekh likhane ke lie kahenge, par bat kuchh aur hi huee us samay gandhiji gehoon saf kar rahe the unhonne kaha,"vah yah to bahut achchhi bat hai ye gehoon binane hai aap madad karenge?" vah bhaee sakapaka gaye achchha mahin laga, parantu mana bhi kaise karate! bole, "avashy madad karunga" vah gehoon binane lage oopar se shant, man men soch rahe the ki kahan aa fansa! gandhiji kaise hain? itani badhiya angreji jananevale se gehoon binavate hain! kisi tarah ram-ram karake usane ghanta poora kiya fir bola, "bahut samay ho gaya, ab jana chahata hoon" gandhiji ne kaha, "bas ghabara gaye?" usane kaha, "nahin, ghabaraya to nahin, par ghar par jaroori kam hai" gandhiji ne poochha, "kya kam hai?" vah bhaee bole, "ji, rat ko khane men der ho jati hai, isase sandhya ka nashta kar leta hoon, usi ka samay ho raha hai" gandhiji hans pade bole, "isake liye ghar jane kee jaroorat nahin hai hamara bhojan bhi bas taiyar hone vala hai hamen bhi ek bar apane sath bhojan karane ka maukaa dijiye hamari namak-roti aapako pasand hogi n? main kam men laga huaa tha aapase baten nahin kar saka maf karen,ab khate samay baten bhi kar lenge" vah bhaee kya karate! rukana pada kuchh der men khane ka samay ho gaya bhojan ekadam sada rookhi roti,chaval aur dal ka pani n ghee,n achar,n mirch,n masale bapoo ne un bhaee ko apane pas baithaya bade pyar se khana parosa bhojan shuru hote hi baten bhi shuru ho gaee, par un bhaee kee buri halat thi vah thahare meva-mithaee se nashta karane val aur vahan thi rukhi roti ek tukada munh men den aur ek ghoont pani piye tab bhi ek roti poori n kha sake itane par bhi chhutti mil jati to ganimat thi vahan to apane baratan aap manjane ka niyam tha jaise-taise vah kam bhi kiya tab kahin jakar jane ka avasar aaya jate samay gandhiji ne unase kaha, "aap desh kee seva karana chahate hain, yah achchhi bat hai aapake gyan aur aapakee soojh-boojh ka achchha upayog ho sakata hai lekin isake lie sharir ka nirog aur majaboot hona jaroori hain aap abhi se usakee taiyari karen yahi aapaka desh-seva kee or pahala kadam hoga"
12/main tujhase dar jata hoon
sabaramati-aashram men rasoeeghar ka dayitv shreemati kasturaba gandhi ke oopar tha pratidin anek atithi gandhiji sen milane ke lie aate the ba badi prasannata se sabaka svagat-satkar karati thin travanakor ka rahane vala ek ladaka unakee sahayata karata tha ek din dopahar ka sara kam nipatane ke bad rasoeeghar band karake ba thoda aaram karane ke liye apane kamare men chali gaeen gandhiji mano isi kshan kee rah dekh rahe the ba ke jane ke bad unhonne us ladake ko apane pas bulaya aur bahut dhime svar men kaha, "abhi kuchh mehaman aanevale hain unamen pandit motilal neharu bhi hain un sab ke lie khana taiyar karana hai ba subah se kam karate-karate thak gaee hain unhen aaram karane de aur apani madad ke lie kusum ko bula le aur dekh, jo chij jahan se nikale, use vahin rakh dena" ladaka kusum bahan ko bula laya aur dono chupachap atithiyon ke lie khana banane kee taiyari karane lage kam karate-karate achanak ek thali ladake ke hath se nicher gir gaee usakee aavaj se ba kee aankh khul gaee socha rasoeeghar men billi ghus aaee hai vah turant uthakar vahan pahunchi, lekin vahan to aur kuchh hi drishy tha bade joron se khana banane kee taiyariyan chal rahi thin vah chakit bhi hueen aur gussa bhi aaya oonchi aavaj men unhonne poochha, "tum donon ne yahan yah sab kya dhandhali macha rakhi hain?" ladake ne ba ko sab kahani kah sunaee isapar vah bolin, "tumane mujhe kyon nahin jagaya?" ladake ne turant uttar diya, "taiyari karane ke bad aapako jaganevale the aap thak gaee thin, isalie shuru men nahin jagaya" ba bolin, "par too bhi to thak gaya tha kya too sochata hai, too hi kam kar sakata hain,main nahin kar sakati ?" aur ba bhi unake sath kam karane lagin sham ko jab sab atithi chale gaye tab vah gandhiji ke pas gaeen aur ulahana dete hue bolin, "mujhe n jagakar aapane in bachchon ko yah kam kyon saunpa?" gandhiji janate the ki ba ko krodh aa raha hai isalie hansate-hansate unhonne uttar diya, "kya too nahin janati ki too gussa hoti hai, tab main tujhase dar jata hoon?" ba bade jor se hans padin, mano kahati hon --"aap aur mujhase darate hain!"
san 1933 men gandhiji yaravada-jel men the us samay harijan-kary ko lekar unhonne ikkees din ka upavas karane ka nishchay kiya tha ek din panch baje khabar aaee ki koee harijan balak unase milana chahata hai samay nahin tha, lekin bechara ladaka kaee ghanton se daravaje par baitha bat joh raha tha vah panch mahine pahale bhi aaya tha us samay usane gandhiji se chhatravriti mangi thi gandhiji ne use vachan diya tha ki yadi vah kalej ke prinsipal ka pramann-patr le aayega to madad ke lie vichar karenge ab vah pariksha pas karake aur prinsipal ka pramann-patr lekar aaya tha jel men milane aane ke lie usane chappal kee jodi kharidi thi badi musibat uthakar usane ye paise ikatthe kiye the mahadevabhaee ne gandhiji se kaha ki vah ladaka ek minat se jyada nahin lega vah itana aashvasan chahata hai ki thakkarabapa usakee bat par dhyan dekar usakee madad karen vah ladaka aaya apane sath vah fool laya tha unhen usane gandhiji ke charanon men rakha lekin jab gandhiji ne use usakee bat thakkarabapa tak pahunchane ka aashvasan diya to usane kaha," main doosaron par vishvas nahin karata mera to aap hi par vishvas hai" gandhiji bole,"agar mere sathi itane apramanik hain to main sabase jyada apramanik thahara tumhen mujhapar bhi vishvas nahin rakhana chahie" yah sunakar ladaka ro pada hichakiyan bharate hue bola, aap hamen chhodakar jane ke lie kisalie taiyar ho gaye hain? aap hi kahate hain ki aapake sathi apavitr hain
aapake aasapas pavitrata ka vayumandal nahin hai, aur isalie aap upavas karana chahate hain" gandhiji ne kaha, "tum jo yah kahate ho ki main tumhen chhaudakar ja raha hoon, so main nahin jaoonga" ladaka bola, "main kaise manoon?"
yaravada jel men ek billi thi ek bar usake do bachche hue jaise hi ve kuchh bade hue ki tarah-tarah ke kel karake sabako rijhane lage gandhiji se unhe dekhakar bahut khush hote the ve bhi dhire -gandhiji se itana hil-mil gaye ki prarthana ke samay unakee god men aa baithate ya fir unake idhar -udhar chakkar lagane parantu vallabhabhaee unhen tar kee jali ke niche band karake aanand lete ek din vallabhabhaee ne ek bachche ko jali ke niche band kar diya to vah sir patakate -patakate jali varamade ke sire tak le gaya aur fir bahar nikal gaya yah sab usane apani buddhi se hi kiya kuchh door jakar vah shauch kee taiyari karane laga jamin khodi shauch karake use dhaka vahan mitti bahut nahin thi isalie doosari jagah gaya vahan usane yah kriya santoshapoorvak kee aur pahale kee tarah use dhankane laga doosare bachche ne bhi is kam men usakee madad kee gandhiji yah sab dekh rahe the bole in bachchon par aakash se fool barasane chahie
sabaramati aashram men ek bar shreemati kastooraba gandhi ke kamare men chori ho gaee chor kapadon se bhari huee dopetiyan uthakar le gaye kapade unhonne nikal liye aur petiyan vahin khet men chhodakar chale gaye jab yah samachar gandhiji ko mila to unhonne poochha ;ba ke pas do peti -bhar kapade kahan se aaye ?vah roj badal-badalakar sadiyan to pahanati nahin ba ne kaha rami aur manu kee man to bhagavan ke ghar tali gaee lekin jab kabhi ye bachchiyan mere pas aayengi to unhe den ke lie do kapade to mujhe chahie hi isi vichar se kuchh sadiyan aur khadi un petiyon men rakh chhodi thi is bat ka virodh karate hue gandhiji ne  kaha "ham kapadon ka sangrah nahin kar sakate pahanane ke lie jitane jaroori ho utane hi apane pas rakhe ja sakate hain usase adhik ho to unhe aashram ke karyalay men kara dena chahie gandhiji itana kahakar hi santusht nahin hue usi din sayankal kee prarthana ke bad unhonne sarvajanik roop se is vishay kee charcha kee aur kaha "hamare jaise logon ko is prakar ka vyavahar karane ka adhikar nahin hai ladakiyan hamare ghara
gandhiji baradoli tahasil men the pratidin hajaron stree-puroosh unake darshanon ke lie aate the ek din ek bhadr mahila unake darshan karane aaee usake hath men roomal se dhankee ek thali thi us thal men roopaye bhare hue the mahila ne vah thali samane rakhakar badi shraddha se unhe pranam kiya gandhiji ne ek kshan us mahila kee or dekha fir gambhir bhav se bole tum mere samane is prakar nangi kaise aaeen? yah sunakar sab upasthit vyakti stabdh rah gaye mahila ne ghabarakar apane vastron par ek drishti dali kahi se ve fate to nahin rahe ?sabhi vastr sundar aur naye the kisi kee kuchh samajh men nahin aaya gandhiji bole meri bat ka arth tum logo kee samajh men nahin aaya sabon kee buddhi mano jad ho gaee hai is bahan ke sabhi kapade vilayati hai n?aaj tum sabakee laj vilayati kapade dhankate hain?yadi kal ko vilayat se kapada nahin aaya to tumhari laj kaise dhankee jayegi?jo doosare par aashrit rahate hain ve nange hi hote hain apani ijjat ko apane hath se katakar khadi pahanani chahie
ek bar gandhiji baradoli men thahare hue the kisi ne unake sathiyon ko soochana di ki ek hatta-katta pahad jaisa kabuli masjid men aakar thahara hai kyonki vah gandhiji ke bare men poochhata rahata hai kahi vah gandhiji par hamala n kar de isalie unake sathiyon ne makan ke aas-pas kantile taron kee jo aad lagi huee thi usaka daravaja band karake tala laga diya usi vah kabuli us daravaje ke pas dekha usane andar aane ka prayatn bhi kiya, lekin vahan paharedar the, isalie safal nahin ho saka re din kuchh musalaman bhaiyon ne aakar bataya, "vah kabuli pagal maloom hota hai kahata hai ki main gandhiji kee nak katoonga yah sunakar sab log aur bhi ghabaraye, lekin gandhiji se kisi ne kuchh nahin kaha ve usi tarah apana kam karate rahe rat hone par vah apane svabhav ke anusar khule aakash ke niche sone ke lie apane bistar par pahunche unhonne dekha ki unako gherakar charon or kuchh log soye hue hain unhen aashchary huaa poochha, " aap sab log to bahar nahin sote the aaj yah kya bat hai?" un logon ne us kabuli kee kahani kah sunaee sunakar gandhiji hans pade aur bole, "aap mujhe bachane vale kaun hain? bhagavan ne mujhe yadi isi tarah marane ka nishchay kiya hai to use kaun rok sakega? jaiye aap log apane roj ke sthan par jaiye" gandhiji ke aadesh kee upeksha bhala kaun kar sakata tha! sab log chale gaye, parantu soya koee nahin vah kabuli pahali rat kee tarah aaj bhi aaya, lekin andar nahin aa saka fir savera huaa prarthana aadi karyon se nibatakar gandhiji katane baithe dekha, vah kabuli fir vahan aakar khada ho gaya hai ek vyakti ne gandhiji se kaha, "bapoo, dekhiye, yah vahi kabuli hai" gandhiji bole, "use roko nahin, mere pas aane do" vah gandhiji ke pas aaya unhonne poochha, "bhaee, tum yahan kyon khade the?" kabuli ne uttar diya, "aap ahinsa ka upadesh dete hain main aapakee nak katakar yah dekhana chahata hoon ki us samay aap kahan tak ahinsak rah sakate hain"
gandhiji hans pade aur bole, "bas, yahi dekhana hai, lekin sirf nak hi kyon, apana yah dhad aur yah sir bhi main tumhen saunpe deta hoon tum jo bhi prayog karana chaho, bina jhijhak ke kar sakate ho" vah kabuli gandhiji ke prem bhine shabd sunakar chakit rah gaya usane aisa nidar vyakti kahan dekha tha! ek kshan vah khada raha fir bola, "mujhe yakeen ho gaya hai ki aap saty aur ahinsa ke pujari hain mujhe maf kar dijiye"
jab golamej parishad men bhag lene ke lie gandhiji inglaind gaye to desh-videsh ke anek sanvadadata unake sath the! unamen se bahut-se sanvadadata jahaji jivan kee ghatanaon par namak-mirch jagakar prasarit karate the! ve prarthana ke drishy tatha charkha katane ke chitr dekar hi santusht nahin hote the aisi-aisi kalpanaen bhi karate the! ki hansi aa jaye! udaharan ke lie ek sanvadadata ne ek aisi billi ka aavishkar kiya tha jon pratidin gandhiji ke sath doodh piti thi! inhin men ek sanvadadata the shree slokov! gandhiji se apani yaravada-jel kee mulakat ka romanchakari varnnan prakashit kar vah kafi prasiddh ho gaye the! irvaning staidardan men gandhiji kee udarata kee prashansa karate samay unhonne bhi anubhav kiya ki bina kisi spasht udaharan ke yah vivaran adhoora rah jayega! bas unhonne apani kalpana daudaee aur likh dala ki jab prins aanf vels bharat gaye the tab gandhiji ne unhen dandavat kiya tha yah padhakar gandhiji ne unhen apane pas ! bolemi slokov aapase to main yah aasha karata tha ki aap sahi baten janate honge aur sahi baten hi likhenge parantu aapane jo kuchh likha hai vah to aapakee kalpana-shakti ko bhi lanchhit karanevala hai! main bharatavarsh ke garib bhangi aur achhoot ke samane n keval ghutane tekana hi pasand karunga balki unakee charann-raj bhi le loonga kayonki unhen sadiyon se pad dalit karane men mera bhi bhag raha hain parantu prins aanf vels to door main badashah tak ko bhi dandavat nahin karunga! vah ek mahan satta ka pratinidhi hai ! ek hathi bhale hi mujhe kuchal de parantu main usake samane sir n jhukaoonga parantu ajane men chinti par pair rakh dene ke karan usako pranam kar loonga !
ek din bihar ke champaran jile ke ek ganv se hokar logon ka ek juloos devi ke thanak kee or ja raha tha sanyog se gandhiji us din usi ganv men thahare hue the, jab vah juloos gandhiji ke nivas ke pas se hokar gujara to usaka shor sunakar unaka dhyan usakee or gaya pas baithe hue ek karyakarta se unhonne poochha ~yah kaisa juloos hai? aur ye itana shor kyon macha rahe hain" karyakarta pata lagane ke lie bahar aaya hi tha ki utsukatavash vah svayan bhi bahar aa gaye or sidhe juloos ke pas chale gaye unhonne dekha ki sabase aage ek hatta-katta bakara chala ja raha hai usake gale men foolon kee malaen padi huee hain aur mathe par tika laga huaa hai vah samajh gaye ki yah bali ka bakara hai kshann-bhar men andhavishvas men doobe hue in bhole-bhale logon ka sajiv chitr unake mastishk men ubhar aaya hriday karuna se bhig gaya thodi der tak isi vichar men doobe vah juloos ke sath chalate rahe log apani dhun men itane mast the ki ve yah jan hi nahin sake ki gandhiji unake sath-sath chal rahe hain juloos apane sthan par pahuncha bakare ka balidan karane ke lie vidhivat taiyari hone lagi tabhi gandhiji un logon ke samane ja khade hue kuchh log unhen pahachanate the nilahe goronke atyachar ke viruddh vahi to unakee sahayata karane aaye the unhen apane samane dekhakar ve chakit ho uthe tabhi gandhiji ne unase poochha, `is bakare ko aap log yahan kyon laye hai? sahasa kisi ko kuchh kahate n bana kshan bhar bad ek vyakti ne sahas karake kaha, ~devi ko prasann karane ke lie" gandhiji bole "aap devi ko prasann karane ke lie bakare kee bhent chadhana chahate hain, lekin manushy to bakare se bhi shreshth hai" ve kuchh samajh n paye bol uthe,"ji han, manushy to shreshth hai hi" gandhiji ne kaha,"yadi ham manushy ka bhog chadhayen to kya devi adhik adhik prasann nahin hogi?" bada vichitr prashn tha un graminon ne is par kabhi vichar nahin kiya tha ve sahasa koee uttar n de sake gandhiji ne hi fir kaha, "kya yahan par koee aisa manushy hai, jo devi ko apana bhog chadhane ko taiyar ho? ab bhi unamen se koee nahin bola thoda rukakar gandhiji ne kaha, "isaka matalab hai ki aap men se koee taiyar nahin hai tab main taiyar hoon" ve sab log ab to aur bhi hakke-bakke ho uthe pagal-se ek-doosare ka munh takane lage unhen soojh nahin raha tha ki ve kya kahen? vimoodh se khade hi rahe gandhiji ne ab atyant vyathit svar men kaha, `goonge aur nirdosh prani ke rakt se devi prasann nahin hoti agar yah bat kisi tarah saty bhi ho to manushy ka rakt adhik moolyavan hai vahi devi ko arpan karana chahie, parantu aap aisa nahin karate main kahata hoon ki nirdosh prani kee bali chadhana puny nahin hai, pap hai, adharm hai
champaran men nilahe goron ke viruddh janch ka kam chal raha tha gandhiji ke aasapas kafi log ikatthe ho gaye the unamen kushth-rog se pidit ek khetihar majadoor bhi tha vah pairon men chithade lapetakar chalata tha usake ghav khul gaye the aur per sooj gaye the use asahy vedana hoti thi, lekin n jane kis aatm- shakti ke bal par vah apana kam kar raha tha ek din chalate-chalate usake pairon ke chithade khulakar raste men gir gaye, ghavon se khoon bahane laga, chalana doobhar ho gaya doosare sathi aage badh gaye gandhiji to sabase tej chalate the vah sabase aage the us rogi kee aur kisi ne dhyan nahin diya apane aavas par pahunchakar jab sab log prarthana ke lie baithe to gandhiji ne usako nahin dekha poochha,` hamare sath jo majadoor tha, vah kahan hai? ek vyakti ne kaha,` vah jaldi chal nahin pa raha tha thak jane se ek ped ke niche baith gaya tha gandhiji chup ho gaye aur hath men batti lekar use khojane nikal pade vah majadoor ek ped ke niche baitha ramanam le raha tha gandhiji ko dekhakar usake chehare par prakash chamak aaya gandhiji ne kaha, `tumase chala nahin ja raha tha to mujhe kahana chahie tha, bhaee unhonne usake khoon se sane hue pairon kee or dekha chadar fadakar unhen lapeta fir sahara dekar use apane aavas par le aaye us din usake pair dhokar hi unhonne apani prarthana shuroo kee
champaran bihar men hai vahan gandhiji ne satyagrah kee ek shanadar ladaee ladi thi gore vahan ke logon ko bada satate the nil kee kheti karane ke karan ve nilahe kahalate the unhin kee janch karane ko gandhiji vahan gaye the unake is kam se janata jag uthi usaka sahas badh gaya, lekin gore bade pareshan hue ve ab tak manamani karate aa rahe the koee unakee or ungali uthane vala tak n tha ab is ek aadami ne toofan khada kar diya ve aag-baboola ho uthe
vah aapako mar dalana chahata hai is kam ke lie usane hatyare bhi tainat kar diye hain gandhiji ne bat sun li usake bad ek din, rat ke samay achanak vah us gore kee kothi par ja pahunche gore ne unhen dekha to ghabara gaya usane poochha,`tum kaun ho? gandhiji ne uttar diya, main gandhi hoon vah gora aur bhi hairan ho gaya bola, `gandhi! `han main gandhi hi hoon gandhiji ne uttar diya, `suna hai tum mujhe mar dalana chahate ho tumane hatyare bhi tainat kar diye hain gora sann rah gaya jaise sapana dekh raha ho apane marane kee bat koee itane sahaj bhav se kah sakata hai! vah kuchh soch sake, isase pahale hi gandhiji fir bole, `mainne kisi se kuchh nahin kaha akela hi aaya hoon bechara gora! usane dar ko jitane vale aise vyakti kahan dekhe the! vah aage kuchh bhi nahin bol saka
rajakot-aandolan ne jab deshavyapi mahatv prapt kar liya, tab rajy ke adhikari aur jamindar bhadak uthe us aandolan ke pichhe janata ka bahut bada bal tha gandhiji kee prarthana sabhaon men apar jan-samooh ikattha hota tha adhikariyon ne socha, is jan-samooh ko aatankit kiya jaye unhonne bhade ke badamashon kee ek toli ko lathiyon aur dandon se lais kar prarthana-sthal kee bhid ko titar-bitar karane ka kam saunpa prarthana kee samapti ke bad ve gunde bhid ko chirate hue gandhiji kee or badhe kangres svayam sevakon ne sadaiv kee bhanti ahinsatmak riti se unhen rokane ka prayatn kiya lekin unakee sari koshishen vyarth gaeen gandhiji motar kee or badh rahe the ki un badamashon ne unhen gher liya paristhiti sahasa vikat ho uthi dhakka-mukkee aur thela-theli ke karan gandhiji sankat men pad gaye tabhi sahasa unaka sharir kanpane laga vah dar nahin rahe the lekin us hinsatmak vatavaran kee pratikriya ke karan unaka sharir kanp utha tha upavas ke karan vah durbal bhi ho gaye the vah kisi bhi kshan gir sakate the, lekin usi samay unhonne aankhen moond lin aur bhaktibhav se ramanam ka jap karane lage kaee kshan bit gaye unhonne aankhen kholi ab paristhiti bilakul badal gaee thi unhonne dridhatapoorvak sabhi svayansevakon aur aashramavasiyon se kaha ki ve chale jayen aur unhen gundon kee daya par chhod den ve ab motar se nahin aavenge paidal hi chalakar pahunchenge usake bad unhonne gundon ke mukhiya ke mukhiya ko apane pas bulaya aur kaha, `agar tumhari ichchha bahas karane kee hai to main taiyar hoon aur yadi tumhara vichar kuchh aur hai to vah bhi bata do aashchary ki gandhiji ke svar kan men padate hi gundon kee hinsa mom kee tarah pighal gaee unaka saradar hath jodakar gandhiji ke samane khada ho gaya bola `mujhe maf kar do, bapooji mujhe aapase kya bahas karani hai! aap apana hath mere kandhe
par rakhie jahan bhi aap chalane ko kahenge, main aapako surakshit pahuncha doonga aur us sandhya ko gandhiji apana ek hath gundon ke saradar ke kandhe par rakhakar apane dere par laute
sevagram men gandhiji ka janm-divas manaya gaya sham kee prarthana ke bad gandhiji pravachan karanevale the isalie aasapas ke bahut se log aa gaye the gandhiji thik samay par prarthana sabha main aaye dekha, unake samane ghee ka ek diya jal raha hai yah naee bat thi vah ekatak usakee or dekhane lage kaee kshan dekhate rahe fir prarthana shuroo huee aur vah usamen lin ho gaye prarthana ke bad pravachan prarambh huaa charon or poorn shanti thi sab log yah janane ke lie utsuk the ki apane janm divas par gandhiji kya kahane vale hain sahasa gandhiji ne poochha, `yah diya kaun laya hai? kastooraba pas hi baithi huee thin boli `main laee hoon gandhiji ne poochha, `kahan se laee? ba ne uttar diya, `ganv se laee hoon aaj aapakee varshaganth hai n? gandhiji thodi der ke lie maun ho gaye fir gambhir svar men bole,`aaj agar sabase bura koee kam huaa hai to yah ki ba ne ghee ka diya jalaya aaj meri varshaganth hai, isilie diya jalaya gaya hai aasapas ke ganv men log bag rahate hain, ve kaise ganv men log bag rahate hain ve kaise jite hain, yah main roj dekhata hoon un becharon ko jvar-bajare kee sookhi roti par chupadane ke lie tel tak nahin milata aur yahan aaj mere aashram men ghee ka diya jal raha hai! bechare garib kisanon ko jo chij nasib n ho, use ham is tarah barabad kaise kar sakate hain? unake us pravachan men dard jaise sakar ho utha tha
kanoon ke samane sab barabar hote hain  gandhiji manate the ki samajik ya samoohik jivan kee aur badhane se pahale kautumbik jivan ka anubhav prapt karana aavashyak hai unake ramarajy kee yah pahali sidhi thi isilie ve aashram-jivan bitate the vahan sabhi ek bhojanalay men bhojan karate the isase samay aur dhan to bachata hi tha, samoohik jivan ka abhyas bhi hota tha lekin yah sab hona chahie, samay-palan, suvyavastha aur shuchita ke sath is or logon ko protsahit karane ke lie gandhiji svayan bhi samoohik rasoeeghar men bhojan karate the bhojan ke samay do bar ghanti bajati thi jo doosari ghanti bajane tak bhojanalay men nahin pahunch pata tha, use doosari pankti ke lie baramade men intajar karana padata tha doosari ghanti bajate hi rasoeeghar ka dvar band kar diya jata tha, jisase bad men aanevale vyakti andar n aane paven ekadin gandhiji pichhad gaye sanyog se us din aashramavasi shree haribhaoo upadhyay bhi pichhad gaye jab ve vahan pahunche to dekha ki baramade men khade hain baithane ke lie n bainch hai, n kursi haribhaoo ne vinod karate hue kaha, `bapooji, aaj to aap bhi gunahagaron ke kathaghare men aa gaye hain! gandhiji khilakhilakar hansh pade bole,` kanoon ke samane to sab barabar hote hain n? haribhaooji ne kaha, `baithane ke lie kursi laoon, bapoo? gandhiji bole, `nahin, usakee jaroorat nahin hai saja poori bhugatani chahie usi men sachcha aanand hai
main nikal doon to vah kisake pas jayega  gandhiji maganabadi men thahare hue the ek din ek yuvak unase milane aaya usakee aayu lagabhag atharah varsh kee hogi use kampan rog tha hath-pair kanpane lagate to rukate hi n the usane gandhiji se kaha,` main kisi ke kam nahin aa sakata mera jivan ek bojh ban gaya hai mujhe aap apane pas rakh lijiye gandhiji bole,`main har apang ko apane sath kaise rakh sakata hoon! mere lie yah sambhav nahin hai aap kahin aur aasara khojen parantu vah yuvak apani bat par adig raha vah kisi bhi tarah vahan se jane ko raji nahin huaa sham tak barabar ke makan kee sidhiyon par baitha raha ek bhaee ne is bat kee soochana gandhiji ko di kaha, `is yuvak ko nikal bahar kiya jaye yah sunana tha ki gandhiji bol uthe,`yadi main use nikal bahar karoon to vah aakhir kisake pas jayega? rahane do bechare ko! main sochakar usake yogy kam bata doonga vah yuvak vahin rah gaya gandhiji ne sabase pahale use sag-sabji dhone ka kam bataya shuru- shuru men vah yah kam bhi nahin kar pata tha, lekin vah himmat harane vala nahin tha kam karane kee usake man men badi utkat ichchha thi vah laga raha aur dhire-dhire hath men
chakoo lekar sag katane laga usake man men badi utkat ichchha thi vah laga raha aur dhire-dhire hath men chakoo lekar sag katane laga usake man men apani nason ko bas men rakhane kee ichchha-shakti tivr hoti gaee kuchh mahine bitate-n-bitate vah sachamuch thik ho gaya usake bad to vah padhane ke lie amarika chala gaya adamy ichchha-shakti, sahanubhooti aur pyar, ye tinon mil jayen to himalay bhi hilaya ja sakata hai
main bhi aise naiyon se bal nahin katavaoonga garmi ke din the gandhiji maganabadi se aakar sevagram aashram men naye-naye hi base the govind nam ka ek harijan ladaka unakee seva men rahata tha unake khane-pine, sone baithane kee sari vyavastha vahi karata tha vah is bat se bahut prasann tha ki harijan hokar bhi gandhiji kee seva karane ka use saubhagy prapt ho raha hai ek din usane gandhiji se kaha, "main thodi der ke lie vardha jana chahata hoon" gandhiji ne poochha, "kisalie?" govind ne uttar diya, mere sir ke bal bahut badh gaye hain vahan jakar unako katavana chahata hoon" gandhiji bole "kya seganv men naee nahin hain?" "naee to hain, par ve sab oonchi jati ke hinduon ke hain" "to kya ve tere bal nahin katate?" govind ne kaha, " ji nahin, ve harijanon ke bal nahin katate svarn hinduon kee tarah ve bhi hamase nafarat karate hain" gandhiji ne poochha, "to kya vardha ke savarn naee harijanon ke bal kat dete hain?" govind ne jhijhakate hue uttar diya, "ji nahin jati batane par ve bhi nahin katate" "to too jat chhipakar bal katavayega?" " nahin bapooji, jati chhipakar main apana dharm nahin dubona chahata" " to fir vardha jakar kya karega? tere bal kaun katega?" govind ne kaha, bapooji, vahan ek-do harijan naee bhi hain ve bade prem se mere bal kat dete hain" gandhi ji ne gambhir hokar kaha," achchhi bat hai, too ja lekin agar seganv ke savarn naee tere bal nahin kat sakate to main bhi unase bal nahin katavaoonga" aur usake bad se gandhiji ne bal katane kee mashin (kainchi) manga li aur aashram-vasiyon kee madad se apane bal katavane lage
ek bar gandhiji dilli se vardha ja rahe the rajakumari amritakaur unake sath thin gandhiji ne unase kaha ki sandhya ka bhojan vah gadi men karenge isake lie garm doodh aur garm pani sath le jana aavashyak tha lekin rajakumari
ke pas tharamas keval ek hi tha tab vah kya karen? kisi tarah shree ghanashyamadas bidala ko is kathinaee ka pata chal gaya ek din pahale hi vah ek naya tharamas kharidakar laye the vahi unhonne rajakumari ko de diya aavashyakata thi, isalie unhonne use le liya lekin gandhiji kee drishti to badi tivr thi khane ke samay unhonne us tharamas ko dekha turant bhanp gaye ki yah naya hai poochha, "tumane yah naya tharamas kharida hai?" rajakumari ne uttar diya, "ji nahin bidalaji ne diya hai hamare pas ek hi tharamas rah gaya tha" yah sunakar gandhiji ko bahut dukh huaa bole "tum itani garib ho, jo doosaron ka paisa kharch karavati ho! manaliya, unake pas bahut paisa hai, par tumako to adhik samajhadari se kam lena chahie bhagavan ne jise paisa diya hai, vah use dharohar mane usamen se ek kaudi bhi kisi gair-jaroori chij par kharch n kare mahadevabhaee vapas dilli lautane vale the unhin ke hath vah naya tharamas unhonne bidalaji ko lauta diya
bina majadoori kiye khana pap hai ek samay avadhesh nam ka ek yuvak vardha men gandhiji ke aashram men aaya bola, "main do-tin roj thaharakar yahan sab kuchh dekhana chahata hoon bapooji se milane kee bhi ichchha hai mere pas khane-pine ke lie kuchh bhi nahin hai main yahin bhojan karoonga" gandhiji ne use apane pas bulaya poochha, "kahan ke rahane vale ho aur kahan se aaye ho?" avadhesh ne uttar diya, "main baliya jile ka rahane vala hoon karanchi kangres dekhane gaya tha mere pas pesa nahin he isalie kabhi mainne gadi men bina tikat safar kiya, kabhi
paidal mangata-khata chal pada isi prakar yatra karata huaa aa raha hoon" yah sunakar gandhiji gambhirata se bole,"tumhare jaise navayuvak ko aisa karana shobha nahin deta agar paisa pas nahin tha to kangres dekhane kee kya jarurat thi? usase labh bhi huaa? bina majadoori kiye khana aur bina tikat gadi men safar karana, sab chori hai aur chori pap he yahan bhi tumako bina majadoori kiye khana nahin mil sakega" avadhesh dekhane men utsahi aur tejasvi maloom deta tha kangres ka karyakarta bhi tha usane kaha "thik hai aap mujhe kam dijiye main karane ke lie taiyar hoon" gandhiji ne socha, is yuvak ko kam milana hi chahie aur kam ke badale men khana bhi milana chahie samaj aur rajy donon ka yah dayitv hai rajy jo aaj paraya hai, lekin samaj to apana hai vah bhi is or dhyan deta, parantu mere pas aakar jo aadami kam mangata hai use main na nahin kar sakata unhonne us yuvak se kaha,"achchha, avadhesh, tum yahan par kam karo main tumako khana doonga jab tumhare pas kiraye ke layak paise ho jayen tab apane ghar jana" avadhesh ne gandhiji kee bat svikar kar li aur vah vahan rahakar kam karane laga
ganvon men vilayati davaen kyon? ek bar ek amarikee bahan sevagram-aashram men rahane ke lie aaee ek din kam karate hue achanak vah kisi tarah jal gaee socha, yahan kisi ke pas koee-n-koee maraham to hoga hi, isalie unhonne maraham manga gandhiji ne kaha,"is par mitti lagao" usane aisa hi kiya aur use aaram bhi maloom huaa vah kisi patr kee pratinidhi thi aur bharatiy sanskriti ka adhyayan karane ke lie is desh men aaee thi isalie use samajhate hue gandhiji bole"ganvon men vilayati davaon ka upayog kyaun kiya jaye? agar aisa huaa to hamare log kangal ban jayenge mamooli ghav ka ilaj kya ho sakata hai, yah hamen jan lena chahie usake sthan par jhat se taiyar maraham lagana mere vichar men ek prakar se aalasy ko hi badhava dena hai purane jamane men hamare desh kee boodhi bahanen desi davaiyon ka achchha gyan rakhati thin aaj bhi rakhati hai lekin ab usamen kuchh sudhar hona chahie agar unhen vaigyanik riti se samajhaya jaye to ve ganvon men ledi daktar jaroor ban sakati hain aap ek shikshit mahila hain hamare desh kee sthiti ka adhyayan karane aaee hain, isalie aap in baton kee or khas taur par dhyan dijiyega"
 main to pahale til saf karoonga maganavadi men telaghani gandhiji ke kamare ke pichhe hi chalati thi aur til aadi kee safaee unake samane ke baramade men hoti thi til kee safaee ka kam ba aur doosari bahanen karati thin ek roj ba ne balavant sinh se kaha, "balavant, dekho, ye til bahut barik hain aur inamen jo kachara hai, vah bhi bahut barik hai meri aankh se dikhaee nahin deta tum kisi majadoorani se saf kara do to achchha ho" balavant sinh ne turant kaha,"avashy kara doonga" un dinon ek bore kee safaee karane ke lie ek majadoorani do ya char aane leti thi parantu ek majadoorani ko til saf karane ke lie laga diya gaya lekin tabhi gandhiji kisi kam se apane kamare se bahar nikale majadoorani ko til saf karate hue dekhakar bole, is bahan ko kisane lagaya hai?" isaka uttar kaun de! ant men balavant sinh ne darate-darate kaha "bapuji, mainne lagaya he" gandhiji bole, "kyon lagaya he? mainne to yah kam ba ko saunpa tha n! tum bich men kyon pade?" balavant sinh ne sakuchate hue uttar diya,"til bahut barik hain aur unamen kachara bhi barik haiba ko thik-thik dikhaee nahin deta fir isakee safaee men paise bhi jyada nahin lagenge" gandhiji sahasa gambhir ho gaye unhonne kaha, "thik hai main doosare sab kam chhodakar pahale til saf karoonga" ve soop lekar til saf karane lage balavant sinh to jaise pasina-pasina ho uthe pas vale kamare men ba sab sun rahi thin thodi der men ve bahar aaeen aur gandhiji ke hath se soop chhinakar bolin, "aap apana kam karen ham saf kar lenge" gandhiji chale gaye aur ba til saf karane lagin
 isaka prayashchit karana hoga us varsh kathiyavad ke rajanaitik karyakartaon ne apana varshik sammelan morabi men kiya tha usi avasar par kathiyavad ke naujavan kangresiyon ka bhi ek sammelan huaa tha saradar vallabhabhaee patel aur pandit javahar lal neharoo kramashah in donon ke sabhapati the gandhiji to kathiyavad ke hi the unhen vishesh roop se aamantrit kiya gaya tha apane dal ke sath vah morabi gaye aur sammelan kee samapti par usi prakar vapas laut aaye gadi ravana hone ke bad sahasa gandhiji ne apane sathiyon ke bare men poochhatachh kee kitane vyakti sath aaye the kitane vapas ja rahe hain, tikat kitane hain, yah sab unhonne vistar se janana chaha janch karane par pata laga ki yatree kam hain aur tikat jyada hain shree mahadev desaee ne utane hi vyaktiyon ke lie tikat kharide the, jitane sabaramati se ravana hue the lekin ab pata laga ki do bhaee morabi men hi rah gaye hain unhonne is bat kee soochana nahin di thi aur ve log bhi vapas lautane kee jaldi men poochhana bhool gaye the ab chalati rel men is tathy ka pata laga gandhiji gambhir ho uthe unaka chehara antar kee
vedana se vyathit ho aaya vah itane ashant hue ki us rat n to svayan soye, n unake sathi hi so sake sari rat unake antar men tivr manthan aur chintan chalata raha, jaise vedana ka koee par hi nahin tha unhonne sara dosh apane oopar le liya ve apane ko hi pratadit karane lage- main itana gafil kyon ban gaya? maine dhyan kyon nahin rakha? ye sab baten mainne gadi par savar hone se pahale hi kyon nahin poochhin? galati meri hai mahadev to abhi bachcha hai, par mujhe budhape men yah kya ho gaya! log meri sachchaee par bharosa karake mujhe paisa dete hain us paise ka thik-thik upayog karana mera kartavy ho jata hai aaj main chook gaya mujhe isaka javab apane sirajanahar ke samane dena hoga aadi-aadi sathiyon ne unako bahut samajhaya mahadevabhaee ne apani asavadhani ke lie kshama mangi vishvas dilaya ki jo paise adhik kharch hue hain, unhen vah aashram ke hisab men nahin dalenge apane pas se de denge lekin gandhiji ko santosh nahin huaa bole "tum apane pas se kya doge! tumhare pas rah hi kya gaya hai!tumane apana sabakuchh desh ko diya hai ab alag kamaee kaise karoge? yah to ek bhari bhool ham sabase ho hi gaee hai isaka prayashchit hamen karana hoga"
kam kee chij ko sanbhalakar rakhana chahie  nahate samay gandhiji sabun ka prayog nahin karate the apane pas ek khuradara patthar rakhate the varshon pahale mirabahan ne unhen yah patthar diya tha noaakhali kee yatra ke samay ek bar patthar sanyog se pichhale padav par chhoot gaya us samay manu gandhiji ke sath rahati thi snanaghar men jab usane gandhiji se kaha, bapooji, nahate samay aap jis patthar ka prayog karate hain, vah main kahin bhool aaee hoon kal jis julahe ke ghar thahare the, shayad vah vahin chhoot gaya hai ab kya karoon?" gandhiji kuchh der sochate rahe fir bole, tujhase galati huee, too us patthar ko khud khojakar la" sunakar manu sakapaka gaee fir jhijhakate hue poochha,"ganv men bahut se svayansevak hain, unamen se kisi ko sath le jaoon?" bapoo ne poochha, "kyon?" manu ko krodh aa gaya bapooji sab kuchh janate hain, fir bhi poochhate hain yahan nariyal aur supari ke ghane jangal hain anajan aadami to usamen kho jaye fir ye toofan ke din hain aadami, aadami ka gala katata hai aadami, aadami kee laj lootata hai raha
ekadam viran aur ujad hai us par koee akele kaise jaye? magar bhool jo huee thi usane kyon ka koee javab nahin diya kisi ko sath bhi nahin liya, akeli hi us rah par chal padi kanp rahi thi, par usake kadam aage badh rahe the pairon ke nishan dekhati jati thi, ramanam leti jati thi aur chalati jati thi aakhir vah us julahe ke ghar pahunch gaee us ghar men keval ek budhiya rahati thi vah kya jane ki vah patthar kitana keemati tha shayad usane to use fenk diya tha manu idhar-udhar dhoondhane lagi aakhir vah mil gaya manu ke aanand ka par n raha khushi-khushi lauti dere par pahunchate-pahunchate ek baj gaya jor kee bhookh lag aaee thi aur is bat ka dukh bhi tha ki is bhool ke karan vah apane bapoo kee seva se vanchit rah gaee isilie vah unhen patthar dete samay ro padi use samajhate hue gandhiji bole, "is patthar ke nimitt aaj teri pariksha huee isamen too pas huee isase mujhe kitani khushi ho rahi hai yah patthar mera pachchis sal ka sathi hai jel men, mahal men, jahan bhi main jata hoon, yah mere sath rahata hai agar yah kho jata to mujhe aur mirabahan ko bahut dukh hota toone aaj ek path sikha aise patthar bahut mil jayenge, doosara dhoondh lenge, is khayal se beparavah nahin hona chahie kam kee har chij ko sanbhalakar rakhana sikhana chahie"
mere pas shan ka kya kam!  un dinon gandhiji poorvi bangal kee yatra par the ek din unhen nav ke dvara malikanda se lohaganj jana tha vah nav jamindar shree ray kee thi do din ke lie unhonne use gandhiji kee seva men rakh diya tha usi marg par shree ray ka ghar bhi padata tha, lekin us din gandhiji ko us kasbe men nahin jana tha par jis samay vah nav unake ghar ke samane pahunchi to andar se ek vyakti vyavasthapak ke pas aaya aur bola,"shree ray ke ghar kee mahilaen gandhiji ke darshan karana chahati hain" karyakram men is bat kee koee vyavastha nahin thi isalie vyavasthapak mahoday ko yah achchha nahin laga bole,"pahale svikriti kyon nahin li thi? kya jagah-jagah roke jane se itane bade neta kee shan fikee nahin padati aap janate hain ki unake oopar kitana bojh hain aur ve kitane vyast rahate hain?" ye sab baten gandhiji sun rahe the unhonne kaha, mere pas shan ka kya kam hai, bhaee? apane hi deshavasiyon ke samane apani man-maryada ka vichar kaise kar sakata hoon? chalie ham shree ray ke makan ke andar chalen vahan se lautakar aage badhenge" nav rukee gandhiji andar gaye striyon ne unaka yathochit aadar-satkar kiya aur unaka
hriday-kamal khil utha
bachchon jaisi kalpanaen nahin karani chahie  satyagrah ke dinon men ek bar gandhiji karadi nam ke ganv men thahare hue the ek din savere-savere hi kya dekhate hain ki ganv valon ne ek bada juloos nikala hai sabase aage striyan hain rashtradhvaj bhi hai, baje baj rahe hain sochane lage-ye log kya satyagrah karane ja rahe hain? lekin purushon ke hathon men ye fal, fool aur paise kaise hain? sochate-sochate ve jhonpadi se bahar nikal aaye log unakee jayajayakar karane lage pas aakar sabane unako shraddha se pranam kiya aur apane-apane upahar unake charanon men samarpit kar diye gandhiji ne poochha, "aap log kaise aaye hain? aur yah baja kisalie baj raha hai?" julush ke neta ne kaha,"mahatmaji, hamare ganv men hamesha pani ka akal rahata hai garmi ke din aaye ki kuen sookh jate hain, lekin aashchary ki is bar aap aaye to sabakuchh palat gaya ganv men aapake charan padate hi kuon men pani bhar aaya usi ke lie ham apana bhaktibhav pragat karane aaye hain" gandhiji ka svar jara kathor ho utha bole, "tum log pagal ho kya? mere aane ka aur is pani ka kya sambandh! eeshvar par mera adhikar nahin hai usake lie aapakee vani ka jo mooly hai, vahi meri vani ka hai" sunakar bechare ganv ke log lajjit ho uthe ab gandhiji hans pade aur bole,"dekho, kisi ped par kauaa baithe aur sanyog se usi ghadi vah dal toot jaye to kya tum kahoge ki kaue ne ped ko tod diya? bahut se karan hote hain tumhare kuen men pani aaya, usaka karan yahi hoga ki dharati ke bhitar kuchh uthal puthal machi hogi aur ek naya jharana foot pada hoga hamen bachchon jaisi kalpanaen nahin karani chahie"
37 /sarvajanik kam men avyavastha thik nahin  ek bar malabar pradesh kee ek kangres kameti ka mantree gandhiji ke pas aaya vah bahut dukhi tha usane sarvajanik kosh ka kafi dhan lok-seva men kharch diya tha, lekin usaka hisab vah nahin rakh saka tha isalie jama-kharch thik nahin ho saka tha lagabhag ek hajar rupaye kee kami pad rahi thi usane apane lie ek bhi paisa kharch nahin kiya tha lekin hisab to hona hi chahie karyakarini samiti ne usase kaha, "ya to hisab do ya paise bharo" mantree ne kaha, "main itani rakam kahan se doonga?" samiti ka uttar tha, " ham kuchh nahin janate sarvajanik paise ka hisab milana hi chahie" vah bechara bahut dukhi huaa usane socha, kyon n gandhiji ke pas chala jaye ve to meri bat samajh lenge unake kahane se shayad ye log man jayen bas yahi sochakar vah gandhiji ke pas aaya tha sab baten batakar usane kaha, bapoo, main skool kee naukari chaudakar apane ko kangres kee seva ke lie samarpit kar chuka hoon mainne ek paisa bhi apane kam men nahin liya" gandhiji bole," yah sach ho sakata hai, lekin aapako paise to bharane hi honge sarvajanik kam men avyavastha thik nahin hoti" mantree ne kaha, "lekin main paise kahan se bharoon?" gandhiji bole, yah main nahin janata kuchh bhi karake tumhen paise bharane chahie" us yuvak kee aankhon men aansoo aa gaye dinabandhu endrayooj pas hi baithe the bole, "bapoo yah yuvak pachhata raha hai isase aap itani kathorata se kyon bolate hain?" gandhiji ne kaha, "pashchatap keval man men hone se kya hota hai! asali pashchatap tabhi hota hai, jab dosh ka parimarjan ho is yuvak ko apani bhool sudharani chahie yah janasevak hai"
sabako kurate chahie  ek bar gandhiji ek skool dekhane gaye un dinon ve langoti pahanane lage the kandhe par ek chadar dal lete the unhen is roop men dekhakar ek bachche ne kaha, parantu shikshak ne use rok diya gandhiji sabakuchh dekh rahe the us bachche se bole, "tum kuchh kahana chahate ho?" vah bachcha bola, " aapane kurata kyon nahin pahana? main apani man se kahoonga, vah aapake lie kurata si degi aap pahanenge n?" gandhiji bole, " jaroor pahanoonga, lekin ek shart hai, bete, main akela nahin hoon" bachche ne poochha, "tab aapako kitane kurate chahie? do man se kahoonga, vah aapake lie do kurate si degi" gandhiji ne uttar diya, do nahin, mere chalis karod bhaee-bahan hain un sabako kurate chahie kya tumhari man chalis karod kurate si sakegi?" vah bachcha shayad kuchh samajh nahin saka gandhiji usakee pith thapathapakar chale gaye lekin shikshakon ne to sabakuchh samajh hi liya tha
ab aapako nind aa jayegi
briten ke suprasiddh majadoor neta shree fenar brokave bharat aaye hue the madras pahunchane par vah achanak asvasth ho gaye gandhiji bhi un dinon madras men hi the ve unhen dekhane aspatal gaye fenar brokave ke pas jakar bole, "main aapase milane aaya hoon suna hai, aapako bahut takalif ho rahi hai kya bat hai?" fenar brokave ne uttar diya, "aap aaye aapakee badi kripa hai main kya kahoon, mujhe badi baichaini anubhav ho rahi hai " gandhiji ne poochha, " aakhir is bechaini ka kuchh karan to hoga hi" fenar brokave ne uttar diya, "ji han, karan to hai nind bilakul nahin aati jara nind aa jaye to kitana achchha ho" gandhiji bole, "yah to aap thik kahate hain nind sachamuch rasayan hai" itana kahakar unhonne bade prem-bhav se inake mathe par hath rakha aur aankhen band kar li doosare hi laga, jaise ve samadhisth ho gaye hain aur apane eeshvar se
prarthana kar rahe hain kuchh der ve isi sthiti men khade rahe fir aankhen kholakar bole," ab aapako nind aa jayegi aur aap aaram anubhav karenge" itana kahakar gandhiji laut aaye fenar brokave ne apani pustak pachas varsh ka samajavadi jivan ka itihas men likha hai,"kitana aashchary hai ki gandhiji gaye aur kuchh hi der men mujhe ekadam gahari nind aa gaee nind khuli to main kaisi sfoorti anubhav kar raha tha!"
ab yah sone kee choodiyan n pahanegi  bangal ke suprasiddh kangresi neta baboo shyamasundar chakravarti kee devati ranibala koee das varsh kee rahi hogi apane svabhav ke anusar gandhiji usake sath hasy-vinod kar rahe the usake hath men sone kee chhah choodiyan thin unhen dekhakar vah bole, "tumhare nanhen-nanhen hathon men itani bhari-bhari choodiyan!" ranibala turant unako utarane lagi usake nana ne bhi use protsahit karate hue kaha, "han- han, ye choodiyan gandhiji ko de do" gandhiji ko laga, jaise yah udarata bahut uchit nahin hai, kyonki aakhir ye choodiyan baboo shyamasundar chakravarti kee to hai nahin chakravarti mahoday shayad gandhiji ke man kee yah bat bhanp gaye bole,"aap meri beti aur damad ko nahin janate ranibala ne ye choodiyan aapako de di hain, yah janakar meri beti bahut prasann hogi aur mera damad to bahut udar hai vah garibon kee madad karata hai" gandhiji ne yah sab majak men hi kaha tha, par unaka uddeshy gahanon ke prati aruchi paida karana to tha hi vah logon ke man men garibon ko sahayata karane kee ichchha bhi paida karana chahate the fir bhi unhonne choodiyan lautane kee koshish kee, lekin shyamababoo nahin mane tab gandhiji bole,"lekin ab rani sone kee naee choodiyan nahin pahanegi han, vah shankh kee choodiyan pahan sakati hai isi shart par main inhen le sakata hoon" nanhin ranibala aur usake nana shyamababoo donon ne saharsh unakee yah shart svikar kar li
sab chijen vyavasthit aur svachchh rakhana  ek din gandhiji ne aadesh diya ki rasoeeghar men bhojan karanevale vyaktiyon ke jhoothe bartan pratidin bari-bari se do ya tin vyakti manja karen aisa karane se logon men prem bhav badhega aur ek -doosare ke bartan manjane men jo ghrina v anubhav karate hain, vah door ho jayegi samay bhi bachega un dinon rasoeeghar kee vyavastha balavantasinh dekhate the unhen yah aadesh bahut achchha nahin laga unhen dar tha ki aisa karane se aur bhi avyavastha failegi gandhiji bole,"mera uddeshy avyavastha men vyavastha lana hai achchha, sabase pahale main aur ba hi is kam ka shreeganesh karenge" aur ve ba ko lekar turant bartan manjane kee jagah par jakar baith gaye unhonne sabase kaha," aap log apane bartan yahan par rakh den aur hath dhokar chale jayen" log ghabaraye, parantu ve janate the ki gandhiji jo kah dete hain, vahi karate hain isalie ve apane-apane bartan vahin chhodakar chale gaye gandhiji aur ba donon bade manoyog se bartan manjane lage balavantasinh barabar soch rahe the ki kaise gadhiji ko yah kam chhodane ke
lie manayen, lekin sath hi unhen aisa bhi lag raha tha ki jab gandhiji aur ba is tarah ka kam kar sakate hain to hamen bhi man men kisi kam ke lie chhote-bade ka bhedabhav nahin rakhana chahie udhar gandhiji aur ba men hod lag rahi thi ki kisaka bartan adhik chamakata hai gandhiji bartan saf karate jate aur kahate, "kyon balavant sinh, kaisa saf huaa hai? tum darate kyon ho?" aadami nity kare to kya nahin kar sakata? aakhir striyan ghar men sabake jhoothe bartan saf karati hi hain yah aashram hamara bada kutumb hai hamen to stree-purush ka bhed mitana hai isilie to rasoeeghar ka bhar tum par saunpa hai mainne jivan men bahut prayog kiye hain aur main is parinam par pahuncha hoon ki samoohik rasoeeghar kholane men jo kutumb- bhavana badhati hai vah aur kisi prakar nahin badhati jo rasoeeghar chalata hai usaka dayitv bahut adhik hota hai sab chijon ko vyavasthit aur svachchh rakhana aur jitane bhojan karane vale hain, unako bhagavan samajh kar, prem se khilana, yah aadhyatmik pragati kee badi sadhana hai tum isamen pas ho jaoge to main samajhoonga ki tum seva kar sakate ho"
aisa aadami kis kam ka  ek bar gandhiji deharadoon men mahilaon kee ek sabha men bhashan de rahe the vahan par unhen thaili bhi bhent kee gaee bhashan dene ke uparant ve bole, " main to gahane bhi
le sakata hoon daridr narayan ke lie angoothi bhi le sakata hoon aur choodi bhi le sakata hoon inhen dene men purushon se poochhane kee koee aavashyakata nahin, kyonki yah to stree -dhan hai isalie der kyon kee jaye? aap sab thode-thode gahane mujhe de sakate hain mere pas aane kee jaroorat nahin hai main hi aapake pas aakar le loonga" us din gandhiji ko bahut-kuchh mila, itana ki ve sanbhal bhi n sake kafi kuchh idhar-udhar bikhar gaya isilie sabha se lautate samay unhonne shree mahavir tyagi se kaha, "apane samane farsh ko khoob achchhi tarah jhadakar rupaye aur gahane batorana, achchha" kahakar ve chale gaye tyagiji ne sabase pahale pandal ko khali karavaya fir mude-tude not, duvanni, athanni aadi sikke aur chhote-chhote gahane-nath, bali, bunde, choodiyan jo idhar-udhar bikhare pade the, un sabako ikattha karake sanbhala aur kaimp men pahuncha diya rat ko prarthana ke bad gandhiji ne tyagiji ko bula bheja tyagiji bahut khush the shayad gandhiji ne shabashi dene ke lie bulaya hai! lekin jab ve vahan pahunche to gandhiji ne kaha, mainne kaha tha ki apane samane dari jhadakar sara paisa ikattha kar lena aisa lagata he ki tumane kisi doosare ko kah diya, kyonki sari chijen nahin aaeen tyagiji bole,"nahin bapooji, mainne svayan hi sara pandal jhada tha" gandhiji ne dridh svar men kaha,aisa mat kaho, mujhe tumhara vishvas nahin he tumane svayan nahin dekha aisa aadami kis kam ka, jo apani jimmedari doosare par dal de! tumhen svayan dekhana chahie tha maine to tumhare bharose sab kuchh chhod diya tha" tyagiji ghabarakar bole,"bapu aapase kisane kaha ki main vahan nahin tha?" gandhiji ne turant ek sone ka bunda nikal kar tyagiji ko dikhaya aur kaha, "yah bunda kahata hai ki tum vahan nahin the bhala koee stree mujhe ek bunda degi aur doosara apane kan men rakhegi? isaka jodidar kahan hai agar aankh kholakar dekhate to milata n! jo janata ke paise ke sath laparavahi vah bharose ka aadami nahin ho sakata mere pas apani koee poonji nahin hai main is nukasan ko kahan se bharoonga jab tak vah bunda nahin milata, vahan jakar jhadoo lagao jao" rat ho gaee thi latad khakar tyagiji pandal men pahunche gais ke hande mangavaye tarch li kuchh mitron ko sath liya dari, chataee sab kuchh jhada-buhara bhagy kee bat ki vah bunda mil gaya usake sath mile kuchh not, kuchh rupaye-paise, ek do angoothi, chhalle, chandi ke bale, aadi-aadi lagabhag dhaee sau rupaye ka saman hoga gandhiji kee nigah tej thi!
hamara matalab samay par ravana hone se hai  udisa yatra men kakasahab kalelakar gandhiji ke sath the ghoomate-ghoomate ve balasor pahunche vahan se unhen bhadrak jana tha vahan ek sabha ka prabandh kiya gaya tha parantu kisi karannavash gandhiji ka vahan jana sambhav nahin ho saka unhonne kakasahab se kaha, main nahin ja sakata, lekin tum chale jao aur mera sandesha sabha ko suna do" kakasahab taiyar ho gaye, lekin unhen le jane ke lie koee nihin aaya rah dekhate- dekhate ek ghanta bit gaya tabhi gandhiji ne unhen dekh liya unhonne acharaj se poochha, "kyon gaye nahin?" kakasahab ne kaha "main to taiyar baitha hoon koee mujhe le jaye tab n?" yah sunakar gandhiji bade naraj hue bole, " is tarah se kam nahin hote samay hote hi tumhen paidal chal dena chahie motar n mili to kya huaa, paidal hi chalate do din lagate to lag jate hamara matalab gantavy sthan par pahunchane se nahin he, samay par ravana hone se hai" kakasahab bade lajjit hue aur usi kshan chal pade
yahi to pavitr dan hai  khadi-yatra ke samay dakshin ke bad gandhiji udisa gaye the ghoomate-ghoomate ve eetamati nam ke ek ganv men pahunche vahan unaka vyakhyan huaa aur usake bad, jaisa ki hota tha, sab log chanda aur bhent lekar aaye prayah sabhi sthanon pararupaya-paisa aur gahane aadi diye jate the, lekin yahan doosara hi drishy dekhane men aaya koee vyakti kumhada laya tha, koee bijora, koee baingan aur koee jangal kee doosari bhaji kuchh garibon ne apane chithadon men se khol kholakar kuchh paise diye kakasahab kalelakar ghoom-ghoomakar ve paise ikatthe kar rahe the un paison ke jang se unake hath hare ho gaye unhonne apane hath bapoo ko dikhalaye ve kuchh kah n sake, kyonki unaka man bhig aaya tha us kshan to gandhiji ne kuchh nahin kaha us drishy ne manon sabhi ko abhibhoot kar diya tha agale din savere ke samay donon ghoomane ke lie nikale rasta chhodakar ve kheton men ghoomane lage usi samay gandhiji gambhir hokar bole,"kitana daridry aur dainy hai yahan! kya kiya jaye in logon ke lie ji chahata hai ki apani maran kee ghadi men yahin aakar in logon ke bich men maroon us samay jo log mujhase milane ke lie yahan aayenge, ve in logon kee karun dasha dekhenge tab kisi-n-kisi ka hriday to pasijega hi aur vah inakee seva ke lie yahan aakar bas jayega" aisa karun drishy aur kahin shayad hi dekhane ko mile lekin jab ve charabatiya gram pahunche to stabdh rah gaye sabha men bahut thode log aaye the jo aaye the unamen se kisi ke munh par bhi chaitany nahin tha thi bas pret jaisi shoonyata gandhiji ne yahan bhi chande ke lie apil kee un logon ne kuchh-n-kuchh diya hi vahi jang lage paise kakasahab ke hath fir hare ho gaye in logon ne rupaye to kabhi dekhe hi nahin the tanbe ke paise hi unaka sabase bada dhan tha jab kabhi unhen koee paisa mil jata to ve use kharch karane kee himmat nahin kar pate the isilie bahut din tak bandhe rahane ya dharati main gad dene ke karan us par jang lag jata tha kakasahab ne kaha, "in logon ke paise lekar kya hoga?" gandhiji bole," yahi to pavitr dan hai yah hamare lie diksha hai isake dvara in logon ke hriday men aasha ka ankur uga hai yah paisa usi aasha ka pratik hai inhen vishvas ho gaya hai ki ek din hamara bhi uddhar hoga"
isi ka nam hai andha prema  un dinon gandhiji bihar men kam kar rahe the achanak vayasaray ne unhen bula bheja anurodh kiya ki ve havaee jahaj se aayen gandhiji ne kaha, "jis savari men karodon garib log safar nahin kar sakate, usamen main kaise baithoon?" unhonne rel ke tisare darje se hi jana tay kiya manu bahan ko bulakar bole," mere sath sirf tujhako chalana hai saman bhi kam-se-kam lena aur tisare darje ka ek chhote-se-chhota dibba dekh lena" saman to manu bahan ne kam-se-kam liya, lekin jo dibba chuna, vah do bhagon vala tha
ek men saman rakha aur doosara gandhiji ke sone-baithane ke lie raha aisa karate samay manu ke man men unake aaram ka vichar tha har steshan par bhid hogi fir harijanon ke lie paisa ikattha karana hota hai rasoee ka kam bhi usi men hoga to vah ghadi bhar aaram nahin kar sakenge yahi baten usane sochi patana se gadi subah sadhe-nau baje ravana huee garmi ke din the un dinon gandhiji das baje bhojan karate the bhojan kee taiyari karane ke bad manu unake pas aaee ve likh rahe the use dekhakar poochha,"kahan thi?" manu boli,"udhar khana taiyar kar rahi thi" gandhiji ne kaha, jara" khidakee ke bahar to dekh" manu ne bahar jhanka kaee log daravaja pakade latak rahe hen vah sabakuchh samajh gaee gandhiji ne use ek mithi-si jhidakee di aur poochha,"is doosare kamare ke lie toone kaha tha?" manu boli," ji han, mera vichar tha ki yadi isi kamare men sab kam karoongi to aapako kasht hoga" gandhiji ne kaha,"kitani kamajor dalil hai isi ka nam hai andha-prem yah to toone sirf doosara kamara manga, lekin agar sailoon bhi mangati to vah bhi mil jata magar kya vah tujhako shobha deta? kisi patrika men hindi ke vigyan lekhak gunakar mulae ka ek lekh meri nazar se guzara jisamen unhonne kaha tha ki ek lanbe samay se ve apane lekh sidhe kanpyootar par taip karate hain.
aur ve chahate the ki hindi ke lekhak bhi kanpyootar mitr ho jaen, nahin to hindi ka bhavishy khatare men pade ya n pade hindi ke lekhakon ka bhavishy zaroor khatare men pad jaega.
yah bat kahin n kahin mere bhitar palati rahi.
hamare karyalay men sabhi sarakari karyalayon kee tarah angrezi ka mahaul tha.
hindi ke nam par pratiyogitaen, puraskar yojanaen, hindi baithaken bhi chalati rahati thin.
inake sath hi andar hi andar hindi men kam kee matra dhire-dhire hi sahi badhati ja rahi thi.
isi bich karyalay men kanpyootar ka pravesh huaa.
shuroo men yah kafi simit tha.
kanpyootar par taip matr karane vale log kisi taik‍nokret ke saman shraddha se dekhe jate the.
hindi vibhag ke log to saham kar udhar takate tak n the.
gunakar mulae kee bat hindi adhikari hone ke nate man men kahin kasakati bhi thi.
isi kashamakash men din bit rahe the ki hamare mukhyalay ne hindi softaveyar kee sidi bhej di.
yah sidi bharat sarakar ke sansthan si-dek ke hindi softaveyar eelapi (epeks laingvez prosesar) kee thi.
yah ek dos-aadharit svatantr bahubhashi hindi shabd sansadhak tha.
lagabhag utana hi shaktishali aur suvidha sanpann jitana ki us samay vard star namak angrezi softaveyar tha.
unake is kadam ne mere jivan kee disha hi badal di.
sabase jyada ham hi khile hue the.
main soch raha tha ki ab hindi ke vikas aur prasar ko kaun rok sakata hai.
lekin jald hi mujhe pata chal gaya ki kanpani ka kam jin softaveyaron men hota hai, yah unase kafi alag aur kafi simit hai.
mere utsah par tusharapat ho gaya.
par koee bat nahin.
kanpyootar kee pavitra-pavan duniya men hindi ka pravesh to huaa.
lekin thaharie, isake sath ek aur samasya aaee.
jo eelapi softaveyar hamen bheja gaya tha usamen keval inskript kunjipatal tha.
choonki vah mainual taiparaitar ke kunjipatal se buniyadi roop se bhinn tha isalie hamari taipatist ne us par taip karane se mana kar diya.
is chak‍kar se nikalane ke lie hamane socha ki ek kunjipatal kharid lete hain jo remingtan ke hindi kunjipatal jaisa ho.
taki hamari taipist ko us par kam karane men kathinaee n ho.
kunjipatal vikreta ne hamara gyan vardhan kiya ki yah mamala kunjipatal ka nahin, softaveyar ka hai, isalie behatar ho ki ham usaka kanpani ka softaveyar kharid len jisamen inskript kunjipatal ke sath-sath remingtan kunjipatal aur egzikyootiv kunjipatal bhi diya gaya hai.
abhi yah chal hi raha tha ki karyalay men vindoz aopareting sistam ne pravesh kiya.
jisake sath hi emaes vard, emaes eksel aur emaes pavarapvaint the.
angrezi men bani prastutiyon ko dekh kar man salata rahata tha ki yah sab hindi men kab hoga.
isase mujhe ahasas ho gaya ki manzil abhi door hai.
lekin main yah bhi samajh gaya ki manzil door bhale hi ho, par hasil kee ja sakati hai.
lekin kaise? main ek hindi adhikari, bhasha kee barikiyon ko to samajhata tha, sahayogiyon kee angreji manasikata ke danv-pechon se bhi anabhigy nahin tha.
parantu kanpyootar kee takanik ka kya karoon? vah kahan se sikhoon?
isi bich prachar samagri ke mudran ke samay pata chala ki ditipi kee duniya men hindi ka pravesh ho chuka hai.
aisi hi sthiti men ek din hindi adhikari ko dhoondhate hue ek softaveyar vikreta aae.
unaka nam tha shreekant aur ve esaaaraji kanpani se jude the.
unhonne mujhe kaha ki agar ham unaka softaveyar kharid len to ve sab kam jo angrezi men hote hain, hindi men bhi ho sakenge.
unakee is bat ne meri barason kee hasarat ko fir jaga diya aur hamane than liya ki ab chahe kuchh ho jae, hindi ko kanpyootar par usaka uchit sthan dilana hi mera makasad hoga.

To Ye hain hamare anmol tarike.
1- Ye jo papa log hote hain bhakton, bade hi chalaak hote hain, paise na dene ke tarah-tarah bahane banate rehte hain.
Isiliye jab bhi aap apne baap se pasie maangne jaayein to dhyaan rakhein ki jo bahanae pita shree ne pichhli baar banaya tha wo is baar na banane paayein.
2- Papa se pasie tabhi maanaga karo jab wo kisi kaam ki jaldi mein hon.
Jaldi baazi mein aapka kaam hone ki apaar sambhaavna hai.
3- Jaise hi papa ki tankhwa ki taarikh nazdeek aane waali ho, unki kuch zyaada hi khatirdari karo.
Wo ek glas paani maange to tum do glas paani do.
Wo nahane ke liye thanda paani paange to tum usmein baraf daalke do.
Aur jaise hi papa tankhwa lekar aayein apne pyare papa se jitna ho sake utna maal nikaal lo.
4- Har insaan ko apni taarif sunna pasand hai bachho.
Isiliye papa ke doston ke saamne apne papa ki khoob taarif kiya karo.
Aur jhoot mooth hi keh diya karo ki hume to papa har roz paise diya karte hain, aur papa ke doston ke saamne hi papa se poorne mahhene ka jeb kharch maang daalo.
Phir dekho chamatkar, papa ke doston ke jaane ke baad papa kya kya dete hain.
5- Har insaan ko pyaar zaroor hota hai bhakton.
Aur papa log to apne zamane ke hero hote hain.
To aaj hi pata karo ki wo kaun thee jisne tumhare papa ko apna deewana bana diya tha.
Agar tum ye raaz jaanne mein safal ho gaye to tumhari to nikal padi bachha.
Muh maangi keemat samay-samay par papa se vasool kar sakte ho.
6- Agar papa kisi ko buri nazar se dekhte hain to ye tumhare liye bada faaydemand saabit ho sakta hai.
Papa ko blackmail karna shuru kar do, ki agar unhone muh maangi keemat nahi chukai to papa ki khair nahi, socho mummy papa ka kya haal karegi agar mummy ko pata chala to.
7- Papa ke batve mein se 1000 rupiya nikal lo (apne papa ke batve se paise nikaalna chori nahi hoti bhakton).
Aur baad mein papa ko kaho ki papa aapke 500 rs mujhe gire hue mile the.
Papa ko lagega ki mera bachha kitna shareef hai, aur papa ki es bhool ka faayda tumhe 100-200 rs papa ki taraf se uphaar ke roop mein milenge aur 500 rs to pehle se hi tum papa ko thag chuke ho, to hui na ek teer se do shikar walli baat
