git bhi kavita kee anek vidhaon men se ek vidha hai.
is vidha men vyakt huee kavita gey hoti hai.
isalie git kee pahachan usakee geyata men nihit hoti hai.
isalie git tabhi git hai jab vah gey ho.
isalie jo kavita gey nahin hai vah git nahin hai.
kavita ke gey hone ka matalab hai ki usamen gan ke tattv hain aur vah gayi ja sakati hai.
gan ke vah tattv, jo kavita ko geyata pradan karate hain, vah usakee lay men pravahit rahate hain aur lay men pravahit rahana hi unaka achook dharm aur aacharan hai.
isalie bina gan ke tatvon kee lay kee kavita git nahin ho sakati.
gan ke vah tatv-lay men pravahit vah tattv-git men sannadv shabdon kee vyavastha kayam kiye rahate hain.
vah vyavastha svar-mukhar vyavastha hoti hai.
us svar-mukhar vyavastha men vyanjanon ke uchcharanon ke roop (aakar) pratishthit rahate hain.
uchcharanon ke inhin rupon kee sanhati lay ka nam pati hai.
us sanhati men aadami kee sans kee ek nishchit lamban-chaudan aur oonchan-nichan hoti hai.
us sanhati men sannaddh shabdon ke akshar-akshar ke bich ka antaral hrasv aur dirgh svaron se bhara rahata hai aur isi prakar shabd-shabd ke bich ka antaral bhi vaise hi svaron ke bharav se bhara rahata hai.
yadi svaron ka bharav n ho to akshar-akshar ke bich kee doori tay karana kathin hoga.
aise bharav ke abhav men shabd-shabd ke bich kee doori bhi tay karana kathin hoga.
isalie geyata aur kuchh nahin, git kee gatimayata hai.
git kee yah gatimayata jab svaron ke bharav se ek suniyojit kram-badvata pa leti hain tab sangitatmak ho jati hai.
sangitatmak ho jane ka matalab hai ki git ko usaka suniyojit pravah kiya jata hai aur vah gaya ja sakata hai.
koee bhi kabhi use gaye to use usi pravah se gana hoga.
us pravah kee disha nirdharit disha hoti hai.
nirdharit disha se uchcharit hokar hi git grahaniy hota hai aur grahan karane vale par apana prabhav dalata hai.
lekin git matra-sangit kee abhivyakti ya ikaee nahin hota.
jo git matra-sangit kee abhivyakti ya ikaee hota hai vah kavy ka git nahin hota.
vah to matr dhvaniyon ka niyojit pravah hota hai.
kavy ke git aur sangit ke git ka yah spasht antar kabhi bhi avahelit karane yogy nahin hai.
kavy ke git men kathy ka hona anivary hai.
yah bhi anivary hai ki vah kathy shabd aur arth kee sanshlisht aur sanyukt ikaee hokar doosaron ke lie abhivyaktishil ho jay.
sangitatmakata kavy ke git kee lay ko adhik svar-mukhar banati hai aur apane sookshm amoortan se kathy ko adhik spandanashil kar deti hai.
yah nahin, kathy ko kavita ke tattvon ke alava bhi sangit ka ek aur aayam sulabh ho jata hai.
us aayam se kavita ka kathy git ke roop men dhal jata hai.
aise dhalane men-git ka roop pane men-kavita men aakash tattv adhik aa jata hai aur is tattv ke samahit hone se vah, sadharan kavita se kahin adhik matra men dhvaniparak hokar door-door tak desh-kal aur manav-mastishk men vyapt ho jati hai aur apana chetan aur achetan prabhav dirghakal tak dale rahati hai.
nishchay hi git kee gatimayata ka geyata ka sangitamayata ka yah tatv git ke kathy ko vyanjit karane vale shabdon ke sanghatan se nirupit aur nibaddh hota hai.
git ke kathy ko vyanjit karane vale shabd bhi usakee gatimayata-geyata-sangitamayata ke tatv se sanghabadv hone ke lie vivash hote hain aur samarpit hote hain aur tab kahin vah sanghatan ka kritiroop pate hain.
matalab yah ki git ka kathy tattv aur gey tattv ek-doosare ke niyamak aur nirdharak hote hain.
unamen ek-doosare ke prati pragadh aatmiyata hoti hai.
ek ke bina doosara ji nahin sakata, poora vikas nahin pa sakata.
ek ka paryavasan doosare ka paryavasan hota hai.
isalie git ke gey-tattv kee, git se alag, usake kathy se alag, vyakhya karana moolabhoot bhool hogi.
vaise hi git ke kathy-tatv kee, git se alag, usakee geyata se alag, vyakhya karana moolabhoot bhool hogi.
un donon tatvon ka aakalan unake sanyukt aur sanpusht roop men hi karana hoga.
git apane jis roop aur arth men aaj git svikar kiya jata hai apane us roop auऱ arth men vah pahale svikar nahin kiya jata tha.
karan yah tha ki pahale kabhi vah sambhavanaen utpann nahin huee thin jo sambhavanaen aaj utpann ho chukee hain aur git ko apane anuroop gadh rahi hain.
git bhi apane roop aur arth ke lie utana hi parivesh par nirbhar hota hai jitana aadami aur aadami ke karm aur bhav aur vichar.
itihas kee yugin pravrittiyan aadami ke yug-bodh ko aur usakee kala-kshamata ko adhik-se-adhik prabhavit karati hain.
gitakar ka vyaktitv apane yug ke itihas kee simaon men banata hai.
yadi gitakar sashakt aur samarth huaa to usaka vyaktitv bhi apane yug ke itihas ko banata hai.
vaise, sadharannataya, vastu-sthiti yahi rahati hai ki gitakar apane yug se prabhavit raha karata hai aur jo git vah deta hai apane yugabodh ke anuroop hi deta hai.
git ke kathy aur shilp donon hi yugabodh ko hi rupayit kiye rahate hain.
pahale, yani bahut pahale, hindi men kavita hi gayi jati thi.
vah kavita, chahe matrik ho ya varnik, isaka koee asar usake gaye jane men nahin padata tha.
use sangitagy gate the.
sadharannajan bhi use apani kshamata ke anusar gane kee tarah gunaguna lete the.
vadyayantron ke sath bhi vah gayi jati thi.
tab is bat ka bhi dhyan nahin rakkha jata tha ki gey kavita ko varnnana-tmak ya tathyaparak n hona chahie balki use aantarik manovegon kee abhivyakti karana chahie.
gayak ka kanth un kavitaon ko apane sangit se bandh leta tha.
vah tal aur tan se nibaddh hokar geyata ka tattv pa leti thi.
jab vah gayi nahin jati thi tab vah matr chhand rahati thi.
kavitt aur savaiye bhi badi khoobi se sangitaparakata pa liya karate the.
tab chhandon se alag git ka apana niji astitv n tha.
yah bhi hota tha ki sangit kee raginiyon men-ragon men kuchhek kushal gayak kuchh kathy samahit kar lete the aur unhen hi sangit kee kriti ke roop men unake anuyayi shishy ga-baja lete the.
tab bhi lok git the.
parantu vah kavy ke antargat nahin aate the.
kavy kee manyataen unake pratikool thin.
ataev vah lok git janasadharan ke dainik jivan ke vishesh avasaron se jud kar kanth-kanth se nikalate rahe aur lokamanas ka manoranjan karate rahe.
unhen tab tak sahityik pratishtha nahin mili thi.
kavigan kavy ke siddhanton ke aadhar par hi kavitaon ka srijan karate rahe.
vah log lok dhunen lekar kavita kee rachana karane men sanlagn nahin hue.
vah kavitaen devi-devataon se sambandhit hon ya nirakar ya sakar brahm se hon athava premi eeshvar aur preyasi aatma se hon sab-kee-sab kavy kee mool manyataon ke manadand par hi aadharit hoti thin.
"aalha" bhi dholak aur mridang ke sath ganv-ganv men gaya jata tha.
vir ras ke niroopan men chhand-ke-chhand shabdon kee dhvaniyon se jhanajhana uthate the.
teg-talavar kee chal aur chamak bijali ko bhi mat karane men saksham hoti thi.
senaon kee umad-ghumad ko aur unake veg aur bal ko ghanaghor barasat ke badalon kee ghata ka ghamand bhi nahin laja sakata tha.
vir yoddhaon kee moortiyan aisi gadhi jati thin ki svayan vir kee moorti tak tuchchh jan padane lagati thi.
yuddh-sthal ke varnnanon men bhi aparimit kavy-kaushal ka parichay diya jata tha.
vir ras ke kathy men yahi sab vyanjit hota tha.
usake kathy ke chhandon ko charan kavi aur sangitagy ga-baja kar git-jaisa astitv de dete the.
rasaraj shrringar ko pratishthit kiye chhand bhi apane kathy men anekanek nayak-nayikaon kee mudraon ko hi samahit kiye rahate the.
nayak lobhi, lalachi, roopasakt, vasana-vilas -bhogi hote the.
nayikaen kam-kala kee sarthakata siddh karane men apane sampoorn aangik, vachik aur manasik astitv ka khula kamuk pradarshan karati thin.
chhand-ke-chhand unake deh-saundary kee yashti ban jate the.
prakriti unake raman karane ke lie hi uddipit dikhayi jati thi.
yah chhand bhi bade chav se sumadhur kanthon se rajadarabaron men gaye-bajaye jate the.
in chhandon ke atirikt bhi soor, tulasi, miran aur kabir ke pad bhi gaye-bajaye jate the.
vah sab ab bhi lok jivan men, ganv-ganv men, madhur svar se goonjate paye jate hain.
in padon ko hi aaj ke git ka poorvaj kahana nyayasangat hoga.
ve hi tab gey tatvon ko pakar hava men tairate paye jate the aur ve hi nar-nari (donon) ke kanthon se nikal kar man kee vyatha-man ka anurag-man kee dinata-aatmasamarpann-aaradhy ke prati aaradhana-aadi sookshm mano-bhavanaen vyakt kar rahe the.
ve bhakt ko bhagavan se jodate the.
ve din-hin ko jine kee aastha dete the.
ram, rahim aur krishn unamen hi niroopit ho-kar jan-manas ke hradayeshvar ban gaye.
unakee lilaon se valayit ve pad keval gey hokar hi desh-kal men goonjate rahe.
pad vastav men, us yug ke git hain.
geyata men unakee barabari chhandon men likhi aur gayi gayi kavitaen nahin kar sakeen-nahin kar sakeen.
kavy kee paramparik rudhiyan padon men bhi aayin par us sima tak nahin jis sima tak ve aur kavitaon men aayin.
pad fir bhi sahajata, svabhavikata aur nishchhalata se chhalakate rahe.
isilie ve janata ke gale lage rahe aur aaj bhi gey bane gunagunaye jate hain.
gey pad agey chhand-baddh kavitaon se koee baton men bhinn aur vishisht hote the.
gey padon kee bunavat any kavitaon kee bunavat se gajhin kam aur aatmaparak adhik hoti thi.
gajhin kam kee bunavat ke pad sadharannataya aadami kee sahaj svabhavik pravrittiyon ke pad hote the.
unake banane vale kavy ke siddhanton ke aachary nahin hote the.
padon ke rachayita jivan bhogate the aur apane bhoge hue jivan ko jivan kee vani men vyakti karate the.
isake viparit kavy kee ritiyon ke anugami kavi jivan ko un ritiyon ke sandarbh men dekhate, sunate, samajhate aur pakadate the aur unhin ke sandarbh men use vishisht bana kar kavita ka roop dete the.
is vajah se gey padon men jivan kee jhankee kuchh aur hi hoti thi aur agey chhand-baddh kavitaon men kuchh aur hi hoti thi.
kavy kee ritiyan, kavy ke siddhant, kavy ke alankarann, kavy ke sanskar-sab kuchh aadami kee sahaj vrittiyon kee prakrit sthiti men moolabhoot parivartan kar dete the.
parinam yah hota tha ki aadami kee sahaj vrittiyan vyakt hokar aadami kee sahaj bodhagamyata se door chali jati thin aur vishisht vyaktiyon kee sampreshaniyata pa leti thin.
tabhi agey chhand-baddh kavitaon kee sampreshaniyata gunnagy samajikon kee ruchi ko tusht karati thi.
padon kee sampreshaniyata jan-sadharan kee ruchi ko pusht karati thi.
jab raj-darabar men kavy-goshthi hoti thi tab vani ka vaibhav-vilas raja kee rajakeey manovrittiyon kee pushti ke liye hota tha.
us raj-daravar ka sampark janata ke jivan se nahin hota tha.
ataev padon ka vachan aur pathan raj-darabaron men nahin hota tha.
ataev padon ke nayakon ko raj-darabar ka kavi nahin banaya jata tha.
janata hi-raj-daravar se bahar-un padon ke gayakon ko aashray deti thi aur usi men rah kar usi ke sukh-du:kh men vah doobe rahate the.
han, mandiron ke pranganon men bhi unhen apane pad gane ka suavasar sulabh hota tha.
jab pad-gayak kisi devasthan se sambaddh ho jata tha tab usake padon men dharm-vishesh kee chhap bhi padane lagati thi aur tab aisi sthit men usake padon se manaviy prakrit sahajata vilupt hone lagati thi.
chahe raj-daravar ho-chahe devasthan-vahan pahunch kar kavi sahaj svabhavik vrittiyon ka kavi nahin rah jata tha.
isilie gey padon men bhi bahut-se aise pad milenge jo dharm ke sanskaron se sanskrit ho chuke hain aur apane mool-gey svaroop se door pahunch chuke hain.
dharmikata padon kee geyata ko dharmik sansthanon kee apani manyataon se doosare prakar kee geyata men badalati dekhi gayi hai.
us badali geyata men jo manaviy pravrittiyan vyanjit hoti dekhi gayi hain vah udatt bhale hi rahi hon-daivi bhale hon-manav-manav ke jagatik sambandhon kee vyanjak hoti kadapi nahin dekhi gayin.
us geyata se manav se manav judata nahin dekha gaya.
us geyata ka pramukh lakshy raha hai ki vah dharm kee dhvani se, manav ko manav kee haisiyat se nahin, balki ek dharmik ko doosare dharmik se jodati rahe.
yahi usane kiya bhi.
us kiye ka parinam yah huaa ki gey padon ke vibhinn dharmik gey svaroop hue.
kabhi-kabhi yah bhi huaa ki bhinn dharmavalambiyon ke gey pad ek-doosaron se takaraye aur tyajy bhi samajhe gaye.
yah sab isalie huaa kyonki aadami jivan jine ke bajay dharm jine laga tha.
aisi dasha men padon ke sahaj svar ka dharmik svar ho jana svabhavik tha.
kuchh had tak to aise hone kee vivashata thi.
us vivashata se inakar nahin kiya ja sakata.
lekin jab dharmik pravrittiyan roodh ho jati hain aur unakee roodhivadita sahaj manav ke man ko daboch leti hain.
aur us par bharapoor havi ho jati hain tab is roodhivadita se padon kee geyata men bhi bhari antar aa jata hai aur yah antar itana spasht ho jata hai ki gey pad bhi agey kavita kee tarah ke ho jate hain.
vah gaye bhale hi jayen lekin unakee geyata sahaj svabhavik manaviy geyata nahin hoti.
kavy ka itihas ise pramanit kar chuka hai.
dharmik manav kee manaviyata sahaj manav kee manaviyata se alag roop aur prakar kee hoti dekhi gayi hai.
tabhi to jo sahaj manaviyata miran aur soor ke padon men gey hokar vyakt huee hai vah adhik bodhagamy, sampreshaniy aur sanvedanashil hai bajay us manaviyata ke jo any dharmanuyayi kaviyon ne apane dharmik padon men gey bana kar prastut kee thi.
matalab yah ki padon kee geyata vastav men sahaj manav ke jagatik sambandhon kee geyata hoti hai jo aage chal kar aaj ke yug ke git kee geyata men parinnat ho jati hai.
bharee dupaharee me, jyeshTh ke maheene me, jab rohiNee nakshatr me soory apanee pooree tapan vaataavaraN me preshit kar raha tha, ek yaachak nange paanv dvaar-dvaar jaakar bhiksha maang raha tha.
kuchh ne us yaachak kee yaachanaamayee aavaajo ko garmee ke bhay se anasuna kar diya aur apane dvaaro ke paT nahee khole.
kuchh ne use laakho laanate bhee bhejee, kyonki usane apanee dravit aavaajo se logo ke aaraam me khalal paida kar diya tha.
kuchh ko usakee yaachanaamayee aavaaj aur usakee beemaar, karshakaay kaaya asar kar gee aur use kuchh-kuchh kahee se mil bhee gaya.
ek ko usaka dopahar kee tapatee dhoop me nange paanv yaachanaarat rahana jara jyaada hee dravit kar gaya aur usane apana faTa puraana joota jo kachare ke Dabbe me Daalane ke lie alag rakh diya tha, nikaala aur yaachak ko de diya, taaki usake paanv ko tapatee dharatee se thoDee raahat to mile.
yaachak ne hajaaro dhanyavaad dete hue us joote ko kartajnyta se tatkaal pahan liya, parantu do dvaaro ke aage jaane ke uparaant usane un jooto ko apane pair se utaara aur apane thaile me rakh liya.
vah daanaveer jisane apana joota diya tha, apane satkarm se gadagad us yaachak ko thoDa sa aage jaakar bhee dekh raha tha ki usaka puraana joota bhee kis prakaar ek achchhe prayojan ke lie kaam aa raha hai.
parantu jab usane yaachak ko joota utaar kar apane thaile me rakhate dekha to vah pashchaataap se budabudaaya ; saala ab use kabaaDee me jaakar bech dega.
udhar yaachak ke man me vichaar doosare the.
vah gambheer tha, aur soch raha tha ki agar vah joote pahan kar yaachana karega to fir logo ke man me daya aur karooNa kaise upajegee?
Bhrashtachar apni saari hadein paar kar chuka hai bhakton.
Hamare aashram mein bhi humne 4 dhokebaaz sishyaon ko range haathon dhandhla karte pakda hai.
Is amavashya ko un charon dushton ko sareaam faasi par latkakar hum Bhrashtachar ke khilaaf apni jang ka elaan karenge.
Desh bhrashtachar ke dal dal mein fas chuka hai.
Hume hamare china mobile mein laakhon sms praapt hue hain, jismein bhakton ne kaha hai ki “baba aaj ke zamane mein bina paisa khilaye koi kaam nahi ho raha”.
Ab jab aap bhakt musibat mein ho to bhala hum kaise chain se shaant reh sakte hain.
Isiliye apne pyaare desh ko aur apne priya bhakton ko bhrshtachar se mukti dilane ke liye humne bhi apne tareeke se in bhrashtachariyon ko saza dene ka nirnay liya hai.
Humne ek list banayi hai jismein 3525 bhrasht logon ke naam humne nikale hain.
Hum ye maang karenge ki in sabhi 3525 bhrasht logon ko hamare hawaale kiya jaaye taanki hum inhe kholte hue tail mein tal sakein, aur inhe machliyon ko khila sakein.
Is mahan kaam mein hamare saath Dhongi khandaan ke sabhi maha baba, bhakt jan tatha bhoot pishaach, chudail aadi bhi bhaag lengi.
Kyunki desh ke andar jo bhoot bhutaniyan hain unka khaatma karne ke liye humne khaas bhooton aur bhutniyon ki ek sena gathit kee hai.
Jo in dushto se inhi hi bhaasha mein baat karenge.
Apne aandolan ki shuruaat hum paatal lok ke aashram se karenge.
Hamare bhaktjan Paatal ke darwaaje se himalay waale aashram tak haathon mein torch lekar ek haa-haakaar raily nikalenge.
Kyunki Kailash parvat waala aashram aajkal marammat ke liye band kiya gaya hai.
Uski marammat mein to kai saal lagne ki sambhaavna hai.
Hamare aashram ki marammat ke liye 2500 karod ka contract diya gaya hai.
Aur iski marammat mein Taj Mahal banane waale kaarigaron ke bachhe lage hain.
Jaise hi hamare aandolan ki khabar in samachar channelon tak pahuchi inka poora ka pora dal hamare aashrm mein aa tapka.
Jaise ki Bharat TV, Chandrama TV aur Kal Tak ne dera daal diya hai.
Kashmir se kanyakumari tak tatha teeno lokon mein faile hue hamare bhakt jo bhi bhrshtachar se mukti chahte hain hamare aandolan mein jud sakte hain.
Aandolan se judi jaankari ke liye hamare paatal lok waale aashram ke darwaaze aapke liye hamesha-hamesha ke liye khule hain.
Chaliye hum abhi chalte hain.
Bharat TV mein aaj humn aapki pukaar naamak kaaryakram mein sakshaat prakat hone waale hain, aap bhi aaiyega apne dusht saathiyon ko bhi laaiyega aur ye naara zaroor gaiyega Bhrashtachar mitana hai dhongibaba ko agla PM banana hai.
Khush Raho.

antata: jab aap apanee nee kaar khareedane laayak paisa bacha lete hai, tabhee aapakee jamee jamaee naukaree chhooT jaatee hai.
koee bhee kaar tabhee kharaab hotee hai jab bahut jarooree me kahee jaana hota hai aur doosara koee vikalp nahee hota.
aur praaya: vah maamoolee see kharaabee hotee hai, jisako Theek karane ke lie injin baahar nikaalana jarooree hota hai.
bhale hee aap apanee kaar ko kitane hee achchhe tareeke se menTen kar rakhate ho, pende se tel to tab bhee Tapakega.
kaar se aa rahee ajeeb see aavaajo se chintit hokar jab aap apanee kaar ko mekenik ke paas dikhaane le jaate hai to vah aavaaj aashchary janak roop se us vakt gaayab ho jaatee hai aur aapake paas us aavaaj ko, us kharaabee ko varNan karane ke lie shabd nahee rahate.
har baar, jab aap saarvajanik vaahan se jaate hai to kaar paarking khaalee rahata hai parantu jab aap kaar lekar jaate hai to paarking me jagah nahee rahatee.
yadi aap kaar ke huD ke neeche kuchh kaam kar rahe hote hai to kuchh na kuchh aisa usame gir hee jaata hai jo pahunch se baahar ho jaata hai.
kaar Dhankane ke lie prayog me aane vaale vinail sheeT ka taapakram aapake haatho ke taapakram ke vyutkramaanupaatee hota hai tatha usame dhool andar-baahar dono taraf baraabar rahata hai.
aapakee kaar ka vinD skreen jitana jyaada saaf hota hai, vah utana hee jyaada keeTo ko aakarshit karata hai.
aapakee kaar me koee DenT va Daish tabhee paDatee hai jab beeme kee avadhi khatam ho jaatee hai.
aapakee pasandeeda - har kism kee kaar ke lie - bhale hee aap use aforD nahee kar pae, har kaar vikreta ke paas ;baDhiya maasik bhugataan rN plaan' hota hee hai.
aapake kaar kee kunjee hamesha usee jeb me rahatee hai jo sabase jyaada bharee huee hotee hai.
aur akasar jeb me sabase neeche rahatee hai.
gantavy par pahunchane ke Theek paanch minaT pahale aapake bachche kaar me hee so jaate hai.
kaar kee Taayaro me panchar raat ke samay, khaalee roD par hee hota hai.
aur roD saiD ke Taayaro me hota hai.
jab aapako deree ho rahee hotee hai tabhee har chauraahe par laal battee hee milatee hai.
jitanee shiddat se aap kahee jaana nahee chaahate aur majabooree me ja rahe hote hai to utanee hee shiddat se Traifik aapako vahaa sheeghr pahunchaane me saath deta hai.
kisee din aap Traifik jaam me fansate hai aur faasT len me chale jaate hai to vah len bhee Traifik jaam me fans jaata hai.
kaar me panchar tabhee hota hai jab aapake paas aujaar nahee hota hai.
aur khaasakar tab to hota hee hai jab aapake saathee ne aujaar nahee bhoolane ke lie aapako pahale hee kah rakha hota hai.
jab tak aapakee kaar me sTepanee hota hai kaar me panchar nahee hota.
jab bhee aap achaanak apanee kaar rokana chaahate hai to har hamesha peechhe se koee na koee vaahan tej gati se aata hee hota hai.
jab aap tejee se aur sheeghrata se kahee jaana chaahate hai to aapakee kaar ke saamane chal raha vaahan kachhue kee chaal se chalata rahata hai aur ovaraTek karane kee koee sambhaavana nahee rahatee.

Pachatar saal pahale,1939, February 14 ko, Germany, Hamburg mein, ek sarwajanik aokaash mana rahe the.Daya bhare bhaashanon ke dauraan, utsahik bheed, deshbhakt gaana ga rahe the, naya jangi jahaaz Bismarck ko Nadi Elbe mein pahali baar utarah gaya tha.
Yah,sab se shaktishaaly jahaaz paani par, ek asaadhaaran kawaj aur mashinari ka parchaai tha.
Nirmaan ke liye 380-milimitar tak 57,000 blueprints, raedar-simit, dohari-bandukh kalash ki zaroorat tha.
Jahaaz mein 28,000 miles (45,000 km) ke bijali sarcut the.
Yah 35,000 tan se ziyada aur ke kawaj-palate ne mahaan surakhcha pradaan kiya tha.
Dikhne mein alishaan, akaar mein vishaal, golabari mein bhayankar, nadubne waala mahaan jahaaz batlaya gaya tha.
Bismarckko milne ka samay do saal se bhi zyaada ke baad mukhar hua tha, jab 24  May, 1941 mein, British Navy ke do shaktishaaly ladaai ke jahaaz, the Prince of Wales aur the Hood, ke ladaai mein Bismarck aur German cruiser Prinz Eugen shamil the.
Paanch hi mimton mein Bismarck ne Hood ko Atlantic mein dubo diya aur sabhi parantu 1,400 mein se teen yaatri.
Dusre British ladaai waale jahaaz, the Prince of Wales, ko bahot nuksaan hua tha aur waapis chala gaya.
Teen dinon tak, Bismarck dobara phir ladaai par nikla, is baar British ke chaar ladaai waale jahaz se aur hawaaijahaz se.
Kul milaakar, British ne paanch ladaai waale jahaaz, do planen, 11chote, aur 21 tezi se ladne waale jahaazon ka istamaal kiya tagatwar Bismarck ko dhoondne aur dubone ke prayaas mein.
In ladaaiyon ke dauraan, kai missiles ko Bismarck par chode kewal kuch hi bahari nusaan pahucha tha use.

Kuch hi duri par shaktishaaly German hawaai jahaaz tha.
 Bismarck desh ka fatak tak nahi pahuch paya.Weh surakhcha ka sthaan nahi pradaan kar paye, kyuki Bismarck ne yojna bhare chalne ka chamta kho diya tha.
Rudder nahi the, madad nahi mila, faatak tak nahi pahuch paya tha.

Bismarck ab nahi tha.1
Bismarck ki tarah, hum sab bhi inginary ke chamatkaar hain.
Humari rachna, phirbhi, insaan ke chamta mein nahi tha.
Insaan bahot hi mushkil ke mashin ko bana sakta hai parantu usmein jaan nahi daal sakta ya usmein kaaran aur parinaam ke shakti nahi de sakta.
Yeh diviye uphaar hain, sirf Parmeshwar dwara banaya gaya hua.

Prabhu ki roshnighar sanket kar raha hai hum sab ko jabki hum jiwan ke samundra mein taer rahein hain.
Humara kaarye hai ki hum sidhe apni manzil ki oar badhein-Parmeshwar ki celestial raajye ki oar.
Ek insaan usi tarah nahi jaese bina rudder ka jahaaz, kabhi ghar ke faatak tak nahi pahuchega.

Engin aur paiyon ki shakti bekaar hai bina maargdarshan ke, us shakti ki istamaal, maargdarshan par chalne ki shakti ka disha, dikhlaai nahi dena, chote akaar mein parantu bahot hi kaam ka hai.

Humare liye, jab hum jiwan ke maarg par chalenge, Wah saaf taur se maarg dikhlata hai aur usi oar ishara karta hai jaha hume jana hai.
Wah satarkh karta hai: chakkar, khatron, chal se bacho.
Hum apne aap ko unse dhoka nahi dekhne denge jo hume gumrah kartein hain, weh chatur paap ke lubhaane waale rang-birangi cheezon se bacho.
Balki, hume prarthna karna chahiye; hume chote saral awaaz ko sunna chahiye jo humare aatma ke ant tak batlata hai Swaami ke dayabhare nimantaran ko, “Aao, mere piche ho lo.”2
Phirbhi yaha kai hain jo suntey nahi hai, jo aagya ka paalan nahi karenge, jo khudh ke banaye hue maarg par chalenge.
Unhein bahot ziyada bahekawe se guzarna padhata hai jo hum sab ke ird-gird hai aur jo bahot khatarnaak ho sakta hai.
Purohiti ke rakhne waalon, hume duniya mein mushkilon ke samay rakha gaya hai.
Hum is musibaton bhare duniya mein jaha sabhi oar jhagdon ki baochaar hai mein rahatein hain.
Raajniti ka khel desh ko barbaad kar raha hai, nirdehi shakti ko pakad rahe hai, aur sangaton ke khand tut rahe hain, aosar se maharum aur asafalta ke ahessas se chale jaatein hain.
Insaan ke sujhaao humare kaanon mein bajh rahein hain, aur humare ird-gird paap hotin hain.
Humari zimmedari hai ki hum humare Swarg ke Pita ke mahaan ashirwaadon ko jo usne hume diya hai ke laayak rahein.
Jaha kahi bhi hum jaaye, humara purohiti humare saath hota hai.
Kya hum pavitra sthaanon par rahatein hain? Kripa, jab tum khud ko aur apne purohiti ko khatre ke sthaan mein rakhtein ho ya un gatividhiyon mein bhaag lene se jo tumhare laayak nahi hai ya us tarah ka purohiti, jismein musibaton ko utana pade.
Hum jo purohiti ke rakhne waalon ki tarah niyukt hue hain badlao laa saktein hain.
Jab hum apne aap ko sudh rakhtein aur purohiti ki iszzat kartein hain, hum dosron ke liye sabhi uddhaaran hotein hai karne ke liye.
Devdut Paul ne batlaya, “Par vachan, aur chaal-chalan, aur prem, aur vishwaas, aur pavitrata mein vishwaasiyon ke liye adesh ban ja.”3 Usne yah bhi likha ki Maseeh ke piche chalne waalon ko “duniya ki roshni ki tarah” banna chahiye 4 Sachchai ke uddhaaran ko dene se buraai se bhare duniya mein sachchai prapt ho sakta hai.
Tum meinse kai Pradhaan N.
Eldon Tanner ko jaantey ho, jisne chaar Girjaghar ke Adhyakshtaoun ke salaahakaar ki tarah sewa kiya hai.
Usne sachchaai ke uddhaaran ko sidha uske kaam ke vehapaar bhar mein, Canada ke sarkaar ki sewa ke dauraan, aur Ishu Maseeh ke Devdut ki tarah .
Usne hume yah prerit bhare salaah ko diya: “Susamachaar ke shikshan ko jine se ziyada khushi aur safalta kuch bhi nahi dega.
Ek uddhaaran banno; achchaai ke liye prabhaao dalo.”
Usne aage kaha: “Hum sabhi ko kuch kaarye prapt hua hai[Parmeshwar ke] chune hue sewak ki tarah jise usne kaabil samjha hai uske naam mein purohiti aur karne ki shakti mein.
Humesha yaad rakho ki log tumhe neta ki tarah dekhtein hain aur tum veyaktigaton ke jiwan mein prabhaao daltey ho chahe achcha ya bura, jo anewaale peediyon par prabhaao daal sakta hai.”5
Hume sachchaai se shakti prapt hota hai ki aaj duniya mein Parmeshwar ke shakti sab se badi hai jab wah insaan ke beech kaam karta hai.
Maranshilta ke jiwan mein surakhshit dhang se safar, hume Anant Naaowik ki maargdarshan ki zaroorat hai-mahaan Jehovah ki bhi.
Hum madad ke liye pukaartein hain, hum swarg se pukaartey hain swarg ki madad ke liye.
Ek jaana-maana uddhaaran jo upar nahi pahucha tha wah Cain, Adam aur Eve ka putra tha.
Shakti mein balwaan parantu kaarye mein kamzoor, Cain bhukha, jarantua, aagya na maanne waale ko aagya dene waala ban gaya tha, aur katal karne se us veyaktigat chakar ko todh diya tha jo use surakhcha aur mukti deta.
Cain ne swarg ke cheezon se ziyada duniya dari ke cheezon se prem kiya; Cain kathor ho gaya tha aur paap ki oar chal pada tha.
Dusre samay par aur ek dusht raaja ke dwara, Parmeshwar ke ek sewak ko nirakhchin kiya gaya.Swarg se prerna ko prapt karke, Daniel, ne raja ke liye diwaar par likhe hue ko samjhaya.
Inaam jo use prapt hua tha ko dekhkar-ek raaj wansh ka robe, ek sone ka chen, aur raajniti ki shakti-Daniel ne kaha, “Apne dhan apne hi paas rakh; aur jo badalna tu dena chahata hai, wah dusre ko de.”6 Bahot payese aur shakti Daniel ko deni chahi thi, duniya dari ki cheezon ko aur Parmeshwar ka nahi.
Daniel ne nikaar kar diya aur vishwaasi bana raha.
Baad mein, Daniel ne Parmeshwar ki bhakti ki bhale hi yah tae hua tha ki ayesa nahi kiya ja sakta, use gaddhe mein shero ke saath fenk diya gaya tha.
Bible mein likhi hui katha hume batlati hai ki dusre subeh, “Daniel ko gaddhe mein se nikaala gaya, aur us par haani ka koi chin nahi paya gaya, kyuki wah apne Parmeshwar par vishwaas  ….”7 Khatre ke zaroorat ke samay mein, Daniel ka vishwaasi rahane ka kaarye ne diviye bachaao kiya aur surakhcha ka sharan sthaan pradaan kiya.
Is tarah ka bachaao aur surakhcha humara ho sakta hai jab hum apne jiwan ki gaadi ko anant ghar ki oar le jaayenge .
Itihaas ka samay, balu ghadi ki ret ki tarah, samay ke raastey par chalo.
Naye dal ke khiladiyon ne jiwan ke samay ko bhar diya hai.
Humare din ke musibatein hume daratein hain.

aisi kisi bhi imarat kee chhat se chhipakali kee paranpara men chipakakar gopaniy (halanki in imaraton men gopaniy jaisa kuchh hota hi nahin) kism kee baton ko sunane ka use bada shagal ho gaya h.

Jo Unke prachaar ke shuruaat ka ashcharyejanak pal hota, Ishu Nazareth Apne ghar ke prachaar sthaan mein khade huwe aur yeh shabd jo Isaiah ne bhavishyevaani ki thi ko padha aur Luke ke Gospel mein likha: “Prabhu ka Aatma mujh par hai, isliye ki usne kangaalo ko susamachaar sunaane ke liye mera abhishek kiya hai, aur mujhe isliye bheja hai ki tutedilon ko changa karun, bandiyon ko chutkaare dilaaun, … susamachaar prachaar karun aur kuchle huwon ko chudaaun.”1
In shabdon ko padhkar Uddhaarkarta ne pehla saarvajanik ghoshna kiya Apne maseehi prachaar ka.
Magar yeh verse se bhi spasht hota hai ki Unke aakhri praeshchit ke balidaan ke maarg par aur Punarjiwan ke samay, Ishu ka pehla aur zaroori maseehi zimmedaari kiya gaya tha ki usne gareeb ko ashirvaad diya, use bhi jo mann ke deen the.
Apne prachaar ke shuruaat se, Ishu gareeb aur masoom se ek alag dhang se prem karte the.
Woh usi tarah ke do logon ke ghar mein janma tha aur waisa kayi logon ke beech bada hua tha.
Hum Unki jiwan ke sabhi saansaarik tatva ko nahin jaante, magar Usne ek baar kaha tha, “Lomdiyon ke ghaddem aur … panchiyon ke basere hote hai; parantu manushye ke Putra ke liye sir dharne ki bhi jagah nahin hai.”2Hum jaante hai ki swarg aur jagat ko “aur usmein ki saari vastuwon ki”3 Rachnewaala, Apne buzurg awastha mein, bina ghar ke tha.
Itihaas bhar mein, gareebi maanav jaati ki sabse badi aur faeli hui kathinaaiya rahi hai.Gareebi ke parinaam aksar shareerik hote hai, magar jo aatmik aur bhaotik nuksaan usse pahunchta hai bahut hi haanikaarak ho sakta hai.
Kisi bhi kahani mein, us mahaan Muktidaata ne lagataar hamein pukaara hai Unke saath is bhaari bojh ko logon par se hataane ke liye.
Jehovah ki bhumika mein, Usne kaha Woh Israel ke gharane ka kadaai se jaanch karega kyunki “[zarooratmandon] ka dhan tumne lutkar apne gharon mein rakha hai.”
“Tumhara kya matlab hai,” Usne kaha, “ki tum mere praja ko peetoge, aur gareebon ke chehro ko pees daaloge?”4
Proverbs ka lekhak is baat ko spasht kar dega: “Jo apne padosi ko tuch jaanta woh paap karta hai,”aur “jo kangaal ki duhaai par kaan na de … woh khud [bhi] pukaarega, par uski suni na jaaegi.”5
Hamare dinon mein, Ishu Maseeh ka punahsthaapit Girjaghar ek saal ke liye bhi abhi punahsthaapit nahin hua tha jab Prabhu ne apne sadasyon se kaha ki woh “gareeb aur zarooratmand ki parwaah karein, aur unhein sahayta dein taaki unhein takleef na ho.”6 Us waakye mein aap aagya ki aawaaz ko pehchaane—“unhein takleef na ho.” Yeh bhaasha Parmeshwar istemaal karta hai jab woh kisi baat par zor dena chahata hai.
Jab duniya mein unch-neech ki kathinaai ko suljhaane ki baat aati hai, ek purush ya mahila kya kar sakta hai? Shikshak(Ishu Maseeh) ne khud ek jawaab diya hai.
Jab, Uske vishwaasghaat aur Krus Par Chadhaane se pehle, Mary ne Ishu ke sir par keemti sangemarmar ka tel daala, Judas Iscariot ne is ka virodh kiya aur “uske virodh kuch kaha.”7
Ishu ne kaha:
“Tum use kyun sataate ho? usne to bhalaai ki hai.
…
“Jo kuch woh kar saki usne kiya.”8
“Jo kuch woh kar saki usne kiya”! Yeh ek shaktishaali safaai hai! Ek ripotar ne ek baar Calcutta ki Maata Teresa se us shahar ke gareebon ko bachaane ke aashaheen kaam ke baare mein pucha.
Usne sankhya ko dekh ke kaha, usne kuch bhi to nahin haasil kiya hai.
Is choti si mahila ne turant jawaab diya ki uska kaam pyaar ke baare mein tha, sankhya ke baare mein nahin.
Bhale hi woh kayi anye logon ki madad nahin kar saki, usne kaha ki usne ek aagya ka paalan kiya Parmeshwar aur apne padosi se prem karo, un logon ko bachaane se jin tak woh pahunch saki apne saadhanon ke saath.
“Humse jo bhi ho paata hai shaayad saagar mein sirf ek bund sa dikhe,” usne kabhi kaha tha.
“Par agar hum woh na kare, tab saagar mein ek bund kam hoga [jitna abhi hai usse].”9 Gambheerta se ripotar ne samjha ki Isaai dharam sankhya se taalluk nahin rakhta.
Usne tay kiya ki agar swarg mein zyaada khushi hoti hai ek paapi ko lekar jo pashchataap karta hai un ninaanbe(99) ke milaan mein jinhe pashchataap ki zaroorat nahin hai, tab toh Parmeshwar pratishaton ki parwaah nahin karta.10
Tab hum “jo kuch bhi kar sakte hai” kaise karein?
Ek baat ke liye, jaise Raaja Benjamin ne sikhlaaya tha, hum is kaaran se apne saadhanon ko daba kar na rakhein kyunki hum sochte hai ki gareebon se apna dukh khud apne upar laaya hai.
Shaayad kuch logon ke kathinaaiyaan unhi ke kaaran aayi hai, par kya baaki log wahi nahin karte? Kya yahin woh vajah nahin ki yeh dayalu raaja puchta hai, “Kya Hum Sab Bhikhaari Nahin Hai?”11 Kya hum sab madad aur aasha aur prarthnaaon ke jawaab ke liye nahin pukaarte? Kya hum sab apne galtiyon aur hamare zariye utpann hue musibaton ke liye maafi ki bheek nahin maangte? Kya hum kripa ki bheek ki alochna nahin karte apne kamzoriyon ko chupane ke liye, ki daya nyaye ke upar vijayi hoga hamare stithi ko lekar? Yeh ashcharyejanak nahin, hai ki, Raaja Benjamin kehta hai hum paapon se chama paate hai Parmeshwar se vinti karne ke baad, jo daya se uttar deta hai, magar hum apne paapon ke chama hone ko rok dete hai jab hum gareebon ki vinti nahin sunte.12
Daya ke saath deen logon ki sahayta karne ke saath saath, hamein un zarooratmandon ke liye bhi prarthna karna chahiye.
Zoramitiyon ka ek dal, jinhe unke dharam ke log “gande” aur “bekaar”—yeh dhaarmik shabdein hain— samajhte the, ko unke prarthna gharon se baahar bheja gaya “kyunki unka pehnaawa ghatiya tha.” Mormon kehta hai, woh “sansaarik sampati mein unke paas bahut hi kam vastuwein thi; aur … hriday se bhi deen the”13—do stithiyaan jo lagbhag hamesha saath aati hai.
Alma aur Amulek jo ek saath prachaar karte the ne un ghatiya poshak ke logon ke hit mein baate ki unhein batlaa kar ki bhale unhein log sabhi suvidhaaen nahin dete hai, woh hamesha —apne kheton aur apne gharon, apne parivaaron aur apne hridayon mein prarthna kar sakte hai.14
Par phir, isi dal se, jinhe khud thukraaya gaya tha, se Amulek kehta hai, “[Aapke prarthna] karne ke baad, agar [ tumne] kisi deen, aur nange ko thukraaya, aur beemaar aur dukhi ko na bhent kiya, aur apne sampati mein se, agar [tumhare] paas [woh] hote hue, zarooratmand ko na diya—mai tumsekehta hoon, … tumhara prarthna vyarth ho jaaega, aur tumhare liye koi laabh nahin hoga, aur [tum] usi prakaar dhoni hoge jaise ki avishwaasi hote hai.”15 Yeh hamein shaktishaali dhang se yaad dilaata hai ki, chaahe hum dhanwaan ho ya gareeb, hamein “jo bhi hum kar sakein” karna hai jab anye log ki zarooratein hoti hai.
Ab, mujhe doshi na tehraaya jaae ki mainne raaste par bheek maangna ko uchit kaarye kaha hai, isliye mai aapko aashwaasan deta hoon mai bhi anye logon ki tarah mehnat, kamkharchi, atma-nirbharta, aur abhilaasha ke siddhaanton ka mazbooti se saath deta hoon jaise koi aur jiwit vyakti deta hai.
Humse aasha ki jaati hai ki hum kisi se madad maangne se pehle khud apna madad karein.
Iske alaawa, mai nahin jaanta ki kaise aapko apni zimmedaari puri karni hai un logon ko lekar jo kabhi bhi khud ki madad nahin karte ya nahin kar sakte.
Magar mai jaanta hoon ki Parmeshwar jaanta hai, aur Woh tumhe madad karega aur chelapan ke dayalu kriyaon mein maargdarshan dega agar tum lagataar chahate aur vinti karte ki Uske diye kisi niyam ko pura karne ke tarike dhoondhte ho jo Unhonne hamein diya hai.
Tum yahan pahechan ki mai samaajh ke kathin zarooraton ke baare mein baate kar raha hoon jo sirf Girjaghar sadasyon par hi nahin laagu hote hai.
Saobhaagye se Prabhu ka tarika apnon ko sahayta dene ka aur bhi aasaan hai: woh sab jo shaaririk rup se changa hai ko upwaas ka kaanoon paalan karna hai.
Isaiah ne likha:
“Kya yeh woh upwaas nahin jo maine chuna hai?…
“Kya woh yeh nahin ki apni roti bhukon ko baant dena, aur anaath aur maare maare firte huwon ko apne ghar le aana? kisi ko nanga dekhkar, vastra pahenana … ? [ki tum] bojh ko todkar, aur … dukhi logon ko chuda lena… ?”16
Mai un chamatkaaron ki gawahi deta hoon, donon dhaarmik aur saansaarik, jo unhein milta hai jo upwaas ke niyam ko jeete hai.
Mai un chamatkaaron ki gawahi deta hoon jo mere saath ghate hai.
Sach mein, jaise Isaiah ne likha tha, maine apne upwaas mein ek baar se zyaada pukaara, aur sach mein Parmeshwar ne jawaab diya, “Mai yahan hoon.” 17 Is pavitra saobhaagye ko kam se kam har mahine to aazmaao, aur apne upwaas bhent mein jitna ho sake utna daansheel raho aur anye hiumeniterian, shiksha sambandhi, aur prachaarak daano mein.
Mai vaada karta hoon ki Parmeshwar tumhare saath daansheel rahega, aur jo log tumhare haathon se sahayta praapt karenge tumhare naam ko sada dhanye kahenge.
Girjaghar ke teen chautayi se zyaada sadasyon ko pichle saal upwaas bhenton se sahayta mili hai jo sewanisht bishop aur Sahayak Sanstha pradhaan ke dwara diye gaye the.
Isse to kitne saare abhaari Antim-din Sant huwe.
Bhaaiyon aur bahanon, is tarah ke bhaashan mein apne jiwan mein na kamae hue ko khule taur se, ayogye, na khatam hone waale ashirvaadon ko yaad karna chahiye, donon saansaarik aur dhaarmikta se.
Tumhari tarah, mujhe paeso ki chinta hoti thi samay samay par, magar mai kabhi gareeb nahin tha, na to mai jaanta hoon ki gareeb kaisa mehsoos karte hai.
Iske alaawa, mai sabhi kaaran nahin jaanta ki kyun janam, swaasth, padhaai, aur aarthik maoke maranshilta mein itne alag hai, magar jab mai saekdo logon ki maango ko dekhta hoon, mai yeh nahin jaanta ki “agar Parmeshwar ka kripa nahin hota, mujhe kya kuch jhelna padta.”18 Mai yeh bhi jaanta hoon ki mai apne bhaai ka rakhwaala nahin, mai apne bhaai ka bhaai hoon, aur “kyunki mujhe bahut kuch diya gaya hai, mujhe bhi dena chahiye.”19
Is baat ko lekar, mai Pradhaan Thomas Spencer Monson ko khud samaanit karta hoon.
Mujhe is manushye ko 47 varshon se jaanne ka ashirvaad mila hai, aur marte dam tak mai uska ek rup hamesha yaad rakhunga jab–woh aarthik rup se ujda hua Purab Germany se laota tha ghar mein pahenne waale jute pahen kar kyunki usne sirf apna dusra suit aur uske anye shirt hi nahin par paer ke jute bhi daan kar diye the.
“Kitne sundar hai pahaadon par [aur hawaiadde se guzarne waale] unke paer jo achche samachaar aur shaanti laata hai.”20 Kisi bhi insaan se zyadad mujhe pata hai ki, Pradhaan Monson ne “wohi kiya jo woh kar saka,” vidhwaaon aur bina-pita ke bachchon ke liye aur usne to ab tak bahut kuch kar diya hai.
1831 ke ek praktikaran mein Prabhu ne Bhavishyevakta Joseph Smith se kaha, ki gareeb ek din Parmeshwar ka raajye ko unke paas aata dekhenge “shakti aur mahaan mahima ke saath.”21Mai aasha karta hoon ki hum is bhavishyevaani ko pura karne mein madad karenge apne sachche Ishu Maseeh ke Girjaghar ke sadasyata ke shakti aur mahima mein woh kare jo ho humse gareebi ke bandiyon ko chutkaara dilane aur unke sapnon ko nasht hone se bachaane ke liye, mai vinti karta hoon Ishu Maseeh ke kripalu naam se, amen.
Mere pyaare bhaaiyon, aaj shaam meri ichcha hai ki main faeslon aur chunnao par kuch salahaa doon.
Jab main San Francisco Bay Area mein ek jawaan wakeel tha, humare kampani ne Charlie Brown holiday TV specials banane waale kampani mein niyam ki kuch sarkaari kaam kiya tha.1 Main Charles Schulz aur uske banane waale ka dost ban gaya-Peanuts, Charlie Brown, Lucy, Snoopy, aur dusre aschariye kalakaaron ke saath.
Mere ek pasandita comic mein Lucy bhi thi.
Jab main yaad karta hoon, Charlie Brown ki basebol ko khelne waale ek zaroori khel rahe the- Lucy daeye feild mein khel rahi thi, aur uske oar ek uchi bol maari gayi.
Virothi khilaadi apni sthaan par the, aur yah khel ka aakhri daur tha.
Agar Lucy bol ko pakad leti hai, to weh khel jeet jaatey.
Agar Lucy bol ko pakad nahi paati, to dusre khilaadi jeet jaatey.
Ek kaarye jo sirf comik mein hi ho sakta hai, pure khilaadiyon ne Lucy ko gher liya tha jab bol niche ah raha tha.
Lucy soch rahi thi ki, “Agar maine bol ko pakad liya, mera naam hoga, agar nahi, to badnaami.”
Bol niche aaya, aur jabki uske saathi aschariye se dekh rahe the, Lucy ne bol gira diya.
Charlie Brown ne apne glove ko dharti par dhul par beeg diya.
Lucy ne phir apne saathiyon ki oar dekha, apne haathon ko apne kamar par rakha, aur kaha, “Kis tarah tum aasha kartey ho ki main bol ko padak lunga jabki main dusre deshon ke saath apne desh ke anokhe niyam par chintith hoon?”
Yah un kai bol mein se ek tha jo Lucy ne saalon bhar mein nahi pakda tha, aur uske paas har samay ek bahaana tha.2 Bhale hi humesha mazaakiya, Lucy ke paas bahaane hotey batlaane ke liye; weh uske bol na pakadne ke jhootey bahaane hotey.
Pradhaan Thomas  S.Monson ke dekh rekh ke dauraan, usne humesha sikhlaya hai ki faeslon par anewaali jiwan nirbhar hota hai.3 Ussi mul ke adhaar aaj raat mera salaaha hai ki bahaane banane chod do jo hume sache faeslon ko banane se rokhtey hain, khaaskar Ishu Maseeh ki sewa karne ki izzat ke saath.
Isaiah mein hume sikhlaya gaya hai, hume “bure ko tayaagna, aur bhale ko grahan karo.”4
Main vishwaas karta hoon ki humare dinon ke liye khaas maaine rakhta hai, jab Shaitaan ka prabhaao insaan ke hriday mein kai naye aur chaturaai ke tarikon se bhar rahi hai, ki humare chunaao aur faeslein saodhaani se karne chahiye, humesha faeslon aur cheezon ko lekar jis ke dwara hum jeetein hain.
Hum aagyaoun ko puri tarah se maanna chahiye aur pavitra vaadon ko nibhaana chahiye.
Jab hum bahaane ko bana kar mandir ke endowments nahi pratigya karte, mission par laayak nahi rahatey, aur mandir mein shaadi nahi kartey, weh haanikaarak hain.
Yah bahut dukh detein hain jab in faeslon mein vishwaas kartein hain, aur us tarike se nahi rahatey jo zaroori hai in faeslon ko karne ke liye.5
Kuch jawaan log kahatein hain ki unki faesla hai ki weh mandir mein shaadi karein parantu mandir ke laayak logon ke saath gatividhiyon mein nahi shaamil hotey.
Sahi mein, kuch log gativdhiyon mein nahi jaatey! Tum avivaahit purush, jitna der mein tum vivah karoge sahi umar aur bade hone ke baad, tum utna hi avivaahit khush rahoge.
Parantu tum aur zyaada peede ko mehsoos karoge! Kripa dhaarmik aur sammilit gatividhiyon mein “zaroor shaamil ho”6 apne mandir mein shaadi ke faesle ke saath.
Kuch shaadi nahi kartey jabtak ki weh apne padhaai pura nahi kar letey aur naukri nahi mil jata.
Bhale hi yah karna duniya mein swikaara jaata hai, yah faesle mein vishwaas nahi dikhta hai, naye bhavishyevaktaoun ke salaaha ke saath nahi hota, aur yah siddhaanton ke saath laayak nahi hai.
Abhi jald hi maine ek jawaan yuva ke aadmi ko mila.
Uska faesla tha ki wah mission par jaaye, padhaai kare, mandir mein shaadi kare, aur ek vishwaasi khushi se bhara parivaar ho.
Main uske faesle se bahut khush tha.
Parantu aage vaartalaabh mein, pata chala ki uske faeslon ke anusaar uska sanchaalan aur wah banaaye hue chunaao humesha sahi nahi the.
Maine mehsoos kiya ki wah mission par zaroor jana chahata tha aur gambheer bahakaawe se bach raha tha jo mission ki sewa par jaane se rokh sakta hai, parantu uske har din ke kaarye uski madad nahi kar rahe the use use jheltey hue shaaririk, ahessas, janta, dimaagi, aur dhaarmik chunaotiyon mein.7 Usne kaarye ko achchie tarah karna nahi sikha tha.
Wah skool ya seminary ke padhaai ko lekar gambheer nahi tha.
Wah girjaghar jaata, parantu usne Mormon ki Dharamshaastra nahi padha tha.
Wah apna zyaada samay video ke khel mein aur janta ke media ke istamaal mein lagata.
Wah sochta tha ki mission par jaana kaafi tha.
Jawaan purush, kripa karke humare Prabhu aur Uddhaarkarta , Ishu Maseeh ke laayak sanchaalan karta aur ghambheerta se taeyaar hokar pratinidhitav karein.
Mera chinta sirf un gambheer faeslon par nahi parantu kam zaroori cheezon par bhi hai-duniya ke sabhidinon aur kam zaroori faeslon mein jaha hum apna zyaada samay bitatey.
In sthaanon par, hume zaroori hai ki badlaao, baraabri, aur khaas gyaan par zor dein.
Yah zaroori hai ki bahaane banana bandh karein aur sahi chunaao ko karein.
Ek ashchariye zaroori uddhaaran aatam-nirbharta, baraabri, aur gyaan ka hai Internet ke istamaal ka.
Is ke istamaal se prachaar kaarye ho sakta hai, purohiti ke zimmedaariyon mein madad mil sakta hai, mahaan purwajon ko pavitra mandir ke dharam vidhi ke liye dhoondhna, aur bhi zyaada.
Achchaai ki chamta mahaan hai.
Hum yah bhi jaantein hai ki wah buraai ko faela skati hai, jismein ashlilchitra, electronic vaartalaabh,8 aur chupaap barbarana shaamil hai.
Yah paagalpan ke sujhaao aur tarikon mein bhi fasa sakti hai.
Jaesa Bhaai Randall L.
Ridd ne pichle maha sammelan mein shaktishaali se sikhlaya tha, Internet par baatein kartey hue, “ Tum bekaar ke cheezon mein fas saktey ho jo tumhare samay ko barbaad karega aur tumhare achche karne ki chamta ko kam karega.”9
Sachchaai ke liye rukaawatein aur virodhi sirf Internet par nahi hai; weh sabhi sthaan par hai.
Weh sirf yuva ko nahi balki hum par bhi prabhaao daaltein hai.
Hum us duniya mein rahatein hain jaha humesha hangaama hota hai.10 Humare ird-gird mein askat chitrkalaa kabhi na khatam hone waale tarike dikhlaatein hai jise “majaak gatividthiyon” kaha jata hai aur annaetik aur bina maarg ke jiwan.
Yeh kai madhyam mein humesha ka gatividhi ki tarah prasaaran hota hai.
Elder David A.
Bednar ne abhi haal hi sadasyon ko samuhik madhyam ko sachcha istamaal ke liye kaha hai.11 Ek jaana maana insaan jo apne ichchaaon aur sujhaao ko batlata hai, Arthur C.
Brooks, ne is sthar par zor diya hai.
Usne samuhik madhayam ke istamaal par tippani diya hai, hum apne jiwan ke khushi ke pal ko prasaarith kartein hain parantu skool ya kaam ke mushkil samay ka nahi.
Hum aadhe jiwan ko dikhlaatein hain- kabhi kabhi jhuti aur jo hum nahi hai.
Hum is jiwan ko dikhlaatein hai, aur phir “[humare] samuhik madhyam ke ‘doston ke jhute jiwan ko… puri tarah se” apnaatein hain.
Brook batlaata hai, “Zaroor wah tumhe bura mehsoos karega apne samay ke kuch bhaag ko khushi mein mehsoos karne ki jaesa nahi hai, aur tumhare samay ke kuch bhaag yah dikhlaatey hue ki dusre tum se zyaada khush hai?”12
Kabhi kabhi aysa lagta hi ki hum bekaar ke paagalpan, anchaahi musibatein, aur humesha ke jhadon mein fas chuke hain.
Jab hum paagalpan se bahar nikaltey aur saaodhaani se apne ird-gird ke sachchaai ko dekhtein hain, yaha bahut kuch nahi hota hai jo hume humare anant tak ke sachche neev ki oar madad kare.
Main janta hoon ek pita ko jo unke kai musibaton ke bawajood bhi apne bachchon ke farmaish ko pura karta hai.Wah unse saralta se puchta hai, “Kya yah tumhe aur bhi achcha insaan banayega?”
Jab hum apne galat chunnao ke bahaane banatein hain, bade ya chote, jo punaharsthapit susamachaar ke saath nahi chalta, hum zaroori ashirwaadon aur surakhchaoun ko gawa detein hain aur humesha paap ya apne maargdarshan ko kho detein hain.
Main khaas taur se paagalpan par chintith hoon13 aur “sabhi naye cheezon” ke sang dhun mein hoon.
Girjaghar mein hum sabhi insaan ke sachchaai aur gyaan ko badhaatein aur gungaan kartein hai.
Parantu jab parampara, gyaan, aur samuhik tarikein Parmeshwar ke khushiyon ke yogna se aur Ishu Maseeh ke khaas kaarye se alag ho jaatein hain, yaha par sangaton mein humesha viyojan ho jata hai.14 Humare dinon mein, kai sthaanon par anmol badhanti ke bawajood, khaaskar vigyan aur vaartalaabh mein, kai khaas mul kamzor pad gaye hain aur khushyaali aur sukh kam ho gaya hai.
Jab Devdut Paul ko Athens mein Mars Pahaad par bhaashan dene ko nimantrith kiya gaya tha, usne kuch dimaagi chal aur aaj ke sachche gyaan ki kami ko dekha.15 Acts mein hum padhtey hain: “Sabhi Athenians aur musaafiron ke liye jo waha the apne samay ko kisi aur cheez mein nahi lagaye, parantu chahe batlaye, ya kuch naye cheez sunne.”16 Paul ka zor tha Ishu Maseeh ke Punaharjiwan par.
Jab bheed ne jaati ke is poshan ke uske sadesh ko jana, kuch ne use mara; dusron ne use andekha kiya, kahatey hue, “Hum is Swami ke vishye mein baad mein sunnege.”17 Paul ne Athens kobina koi safalta ke chod diya.
Dean Frederic Farrar ne uske bhent par likha: “Usne Athens mein girjaghar nahi banaya, aur Athnes ke bagal se guzarne ke baad bhi , wah waha kabhi nahi gaya.”18
Main Elder Dallin H.

Phir mere high skool ke koach ne mujhe batlaya ki Stanford University ke footbol dal ke koach Merlin Olsen aur mere saath barah baje ka bhojan karna chahtey the.
Tum mein se jo jawaan hai woh Merlin ko nahi jaantey honge.
Wah Logan High School footbol dal ka ek sabse achcha America ki khilaadi tha jaha main quarterback aur bachaanewaale ki tarah khelta tha aur kai baar bol lekar goal ki oar dauda.
Jab Merlin high skool mein tha wah desh bhar ka sab se achcha khilaadi tha.

Merlin wah teesra khilaadi tha jise National Footbaal League ke liye chunna gaya tha aur ek barabar 14 Pro Bowls khel ko saalon tak aschariye taur se khela.
Wah 1982 mein Pro Footbal Hall of Fame ka sadasye ban gaya tha.20
Barah baje ka bhojan Stanford coach ke saath Utah, Logan Bluebird resturant mein tha.
Haath milaane ke baad, usne dobara mujhe se ankh nahi milaya.
Usne sidhe Merlin se baatein kiya aur mujhe andekha kar diya.
Bhojan ke baad, pehli baar, mere oar muda, parantu wah mera naam bhool gaya tha.
Usne phir Merlin ko batlaya, “Agar tum Stanford skool ko chuntey ho aur apne mitra ko apne saath lana chahtey ho, uska mark achcha tha aur wah ho sakta hai.” Yah anubhao mere liye pakka ho chuka tha ki main apne pita ke achche salaaha par chalun.
Mera maksad nahi hai ki main khel-khud mein bhaag lene waalon ka himmat tod doon ya Internet istamal karne waalon ka ya anye achche jawaan logon ke khushi ke gatividhiyon ko.
Waha ayse gatividhiyon hai jo saiyam, barabri, aur gyaan zaroori hai.
Jab achchie tarah se istamaal kiya jata hai, weh humare jiwan ko sudhaar deta hai.
Phirbhi, main sabhi ko lakhsh aur himmat deta hoon, jawaan aur buzurg, lakhsh aur uddesh aur zyaada achche sudhaar ko nirakhshan karne ke liye.Humare roz ka sanchaalan aur chunnao humare lakhsh ke saath samaan rahana chahiye.
Hume zaroori hai ki kamiyon aur manbahalaao se bahar nikalein.
Yah zaroori hai ki humesha chunnao ko humare vaadon ke saath sachchaai se Ishu Maseeh ki sewa karein.21 Hume us lakhsh se kisi bhi tarah se bahekna nahi chahiye.
Yah jiwan Parmeshwar ko milne ki taeyaari karne ka samay hai.22 Hum khush, hasmukh log hain.
Hum achche mijaaz ke indriyon ke abhaari hain aur doston aur parivaar ke saath bina samay ke mulye ke liye.
Parantu hume yahan vichaar par ghambheerta zaroor dena hai jo humare jiwan ko jeene ka neev ho aur humare sabhi chunnao ke.
Manbahalaao aur kamiyon jo bahant ko rokhtein hain khatarnaak hotein hain, parantu jab Ishu Maseeh aur Uske Girjaghar ke vishwaas ko kam kartein hain, wah khatarnaak hai.
Meri prarthna hai ki ek purohiti ke rakhne waale hai, hum wah kaam ko karenge jo Swami ke sewa karne waalon ke mahaan kaarye mein zaroori hai.
Sabhi cheezon mein hume yaad rakhna hai ki “Ishu ke gawahi mein himmat rakhne se” logon ko celestial aur terrestrial raagye ke mul parinaam mein se alag kiya ja sakta hai.23 Hum chahatein hain ki hum celestial ki oar alag paaye jaaen.

ek use dekho jab se us braind ke vigyapan men aaya hai ran hi nahin bana raha hai.
bana to raha hai kisi ne kaha nahin ki fir ye visheshagy bata denge ki chachcha-budha gaya hai tumhara chaheta dravid.
ran to banata nahin tim men dunse rahane kee jugad men hi laga rahata hai.
ek inhen dekhie, ye bhi sachin ko ran banana sikha rahe hain.
koee poochhe bhaiiya vo to salon se khel raha hai, hajaron ran bana chuka hai.
tum kahan tak khele ho, kitane ran banae hain.
to dekhie javab kya mil raha hai.
kahin khele bhale hi n hon khel to dekhe hain aur sare din dekhe hain.
bachapan se aaj tak sirf khel hi to dekhe hain, graund-graund kee khak chhani hai.
sachin to ran banane aur paise kamane men laga rahata hai.
fir jab maidan par khel bhi raha hota hai to kya use dikhata hai riple, ham dekhate hain ham.
tabhi to pata chalati hain galatiyan.
fir chilla-chilla kar yahan gala fadate rahate hain.
sunega thode hi...
ab unhen kaun samajhae abe, bavale tivi ke samane chillaoge to kaise to vo sunega, kaise to tumhari bat manega.
fir ek nahin saikadon lage pade hain tivi ke samane....
sabakee sunega to bahara hi n ho jaega, sachin ko hi kriket kee barikiyan sikhane kee utkantha.
ye hi aise nahin hai maichon men to poora stediyam hi shikshak hone ke mahan dayitv ko nibhane lagata hai.
ek bar aap maich dekh to lo, aapako pata chal jaega.
is rashtr men jigyasu chhatr kam kyon hain? isalie kam hain ki sare ke sare to part taim shikshak hain.
akasar maich hote hain.
sara jaroori kam chhodakar fir sare sanvida shikshak kee bhoomika men utar aate hain.
desh ke samman ka prashn hai bhaee.
sare kam ek taraf chhodakar jan laga denge.
koee sikhe na sikhe ye sikhane men koee kasar bakee nahin rakhenge.
maichon men aap aam ghar ka najara dekho, poora ghar tivi ke samane.
jo jyada premi hai vo to har shot par chikh-chikh kar lotan kabootar hota rahata hai.
maichon vale din ghar ke kutte-pillon kee halat kharab rahati hai.
unhen bhi malik ke sath bhaunk-bhaunk kar apani khushi prakat karani padati hai.
svamibhakti ke shashvat riprajentetiv hone kee paranpara ka palan karana hai.
halanki ve tay hi nahin kar pate ki aisa apana malik kahai pagalaut huaa ja raha hai.
kaee siniyar kism ke kutte to is sichueshan se tyooning baitha chuka hain.
ve malikon kee aisi bhayankar khushi prakat karane ke kshanon men bhi sanyamit bane rahakar sirf poonchh hilakar kam chala dete hain.
malik jyada khush huaa to tivi par dekhakar samane vale khiladi par hi bhaunk diya.
ve khel men jyada tang nahin adate, malik par najar rakhate hain.
kaee mamalon men malik se bhi jyada vyavaharik hote hain.
khiladi ko khel ke paise, vigyapan ke paise, jite to janata se paise, hare to kahin aur se bhi paise yani har or se paise milate hain.
hamara malik kyon vaisaee begani shadi men abdulla taip divana huaa ja raha hai, is par jyada dimag nahin lagate.
is karan ve tivi se jyada malik par najar rakhate hain.
malik unake aaeekyoo lebal ko nahin janata.
ve batana bhi nahin chahate roti-pani ka jugad bana rahe itana jaroori hai unake lie, isalie chehare par bholepan-moorkhata kee tajagi bhari chamak hamesha rakhate hain.
isalie kutton ka vafadari brands sadiyon se sakh kayam rakhe hai.
khiladiyon ka to brands aadi ka mamala lanba nahin hai, ve janate hain.
kutte hain isalie in fijool kee baton par bhaunkate nahin hain.
halkee si poonchh hilakar hi mudda uda dete hain.
bat chal rahi hai malikon kee, malik doobe hain kikret men, kriketar doobe hain khel men, khel ugal raha hai paisa, paisa bana raha hai hamen kriket shakti, shakti milane par ham kar sakate hain manamani, manamani karane kee hamari aadat nahin aisa ham klem karate hain, klem ham jitane ka bhi karate hain, is klem ke agenst ham dava karate hain sadiyon se samane vale kee khushi men hamari khushi ka, to use jit jane dete hain, is khel hamare lie jit har se jyada khushi ka mamala hai.
aur roti-pani ka jugad chalata rahe kutton kee khushi isamen hai.
poore drishy par ham koee tippani nahin kar rahe hain.
lekin e plas bi ejikyool too...
jaisa sidha-sadha samikaran aisa bata raha hai.
khair, jane dijie.
samikaranon kee kaun paravah karata hai.
samikaran to kitabon ke lie hote hain.
 lekin bhaee sahab aankadon kee kitab to hamari har ke aankadon se bhari hai, kisi ne kaha.
hogi, lekin harakar bhi hamane kitanon ke dil jite hain aapako pata hai ki nahin? pata bhi hoga to aap bologe thodi na, rashtraprem ke nam par to sabakee bolati band nahin ho jati hai.
bakee sare mamalon par ham kitana munh chalate hain desh kee bat aate hi chuppi sadh jate hain.
are, to hamare in bade khiladiyon ke balle bhi to chuppi sadhe baithe hain, ye tim par bojh ban gae hain bojh.
abakee bar pan kee dukan ke pas se eksapart kament aaya.
fir doosare ne bola- are, vo ganguli kal kaisa bachchon jaisa shot marakar aaut huaa.
nanbari hai nanbari ekadh maich men achchha khel liya agale 5-1॰ maichon kee vyavastha baitha li fir shuroo kar diya ghatiya shot marana.
ise to sanyas dilavao.
doosara bhi usakee han men han men shuroo, thik kah rahe ho bhiya, itane to bahar benchon par baithe hain jab tak ye hatenge nahin doosare ko mauka kahan se milega.
ye to patta likhakar lae hain ki lathi tekane kee umar tak maidan men hi dikhenge,bhale hi koee to inhen kandhon par dhokar pich tak chhod jae.
pan kee pichakari ke sath visheshagyata kee ugal bhi fachch se bainar roop men divar par ja saji.
are,ganguli to fir bhi khelata hai unhen dekho d vol ko divar hi dhasak gaee hai.
ve mistar vairi-vairi speshal hain.
aam maukon par kam nahin aate, speshal maukon par chalane lagate hain.
speshal mauke bhi kaun se jab tim kee har tay ho chukee ho to pich par thaharakar darshakon ko aur rulaenge.
har ka antar kam karane men apana speshal tailent dikhaenge.
itane men kisi kee prativadanuma aavaj bhi aa jati hai- ...to tumhare ve yang tailent kya kar rahe hain? ekadh maich men chalate hain.
fir ekadh kayade ka fost bolar aate hi sara tailent maidan par hi pasar jata hai.
sab spinaron ke khilaf hi uchhalate hain? tej gendabajon ko khelate samay to ghigghee bandh jati hai.
vo to hamare budhape hain jo chal jate hain, nahin to kya karega tailent...? bas aisa hote hi ek alag hi yuddh chhid jata hai.
sab ek-doosare par rashan pani lekar pil jate hain.
un bichare khiladiyon ko to pata tak nahin ki unake pichhe do-char khet rahe...
tin-char ke mathe foot gae...
in agyat shahidon ko kisi star par samman bhi to nahin milata? lekin majal hai ki samman kee jara si bhi bhavana dikhae ye to nisvarth bhav se apane taraf vale khiladi ke paksh men date rahate hain.
udhar van-de  shuroo hota hai, idhar ye timen bhi bant jati hain, desh men jagah-jagah test shuroo ho jata hai...
logon ka logon se ...
tim ke lie ...
har bar yahi kissa...
anavarat...
aage bhi anavarat
aadami aur janavar ke bich ka sanskritik antar janate hain aap ? nahin janate honge.
mai batata hoon....mote taur par agar koee janavar manushyon jaisa karm kar baithe to raton rat prasiddh ho jata hai...khabaron men aa jata hai....isake viparit, aadami janavaron jaisa aacharan karata rahe to ise koee khas khabar nahin mana jata....aadami ke sare gunah maf hain, kyonki jurm bhi aadami hi karata hai aur kanoon bhi aadami hi banata hai.
...aapako ek bail kee sachchi shree katha suna raha hoon....suniye aur jan-tantrik dhang se guniye....
bhind (gvaliyar) ke ilake men ek kisan anaj bechakar noton kee moti gaddi laya.
apani is kamaee ko surakshit rakhane ke lie, noton ko bhoose ke dher men daba diya.
kisan ji kee vaif ne rojana ke niyamanusar bhoosa bailon ko dala aur sath hi noton kee gaddi bhi bail mahoday ke lanch men chali gaee.
bail ji thake mande khet se laute the, so danadan bhoosa khana shuroo kar diya.
maloom tab huaa jab yan (chare kee jagah) kee safaee karate samay noton ke chabaye aur adh chabaye tukade pade mile.
bail chupachap jugali kar raha tha aur munh se noton ke tukade bah rahe the.
kisan ji matha pit kar rah gaye.
bail ji nirdosh khade the.
is saty katha se sarakari nishkarsh yah nikalata hai ki aap apane paise baink-post aafis men jama karo aur desh kee tarakkee men yogadan do.
...mere pas choonki aam hindustani kee tarah jama karane ke lie paise hi nahin bachate, so main is poore prasang par jara aadhyatmik aur sanskritik chintan kar raha hoon.
bail kya hain ?...not kyon hai ?...chara kise kahate hain ? vagaira-vagaira..itana to aapane kitabon men padha hi hoga ki hamara bharat ek krishi pradhan aur rajaniti pradhan desh hai.
donon hi kshetron men bailon kee kami nahin hai....bail us pashu ko kahate hain jo chupachap aankhen milaye bagair mal dakar leta hai aur sir jhukaye jugali karata rahata hai....usake sambandh men kaun kya kah raha hai, isaka bail kee sehat par koee asar nahin padata.
ekadam nirvikar...sidha sada....kheti se 'bhootapoorva' ho jane ke bad bhi bail sanchit mal kee jugali karata rahata hai....use kisi kee katu aalochanaon kee koee chinta nahin....jo chahe kamishan bitha de....
ab prashn yah uthata hai ki jab ek-se-ek haee pavar bhootapoorv bail noton kee gaddiyan par gaddiyan dakar gaya aur jugali tak n kee to fir is bechare bhind ke bail ko badanam karane se kya hasil.
...ise parampara kyon nahin man liya jata ki jo bail hai use not dakarane ka hak hai....
aap bhaee sahab, pichhale 36 varshon ka itihas aur ganit uthakar dekh lo ki kitana kisan ke hisse men aaya, kitana bailon ke ? bail hamesha kisan ke aage-aage chalata hai.
aage chalane vale ka hissa bhi jyada ho sakata hai.
kisan matha pit kar rah jata hai ki kash vah ek vishesh kism ka 'safed baila' ho jata aur use bhi not chabane kee suvidha rahati....hotal egri-kalchar par nigah dalen, aap! kisan vahin ka vahin hai...jamin vahin kee vahin hain...bail apani ghanti bajata huaa aage badh gaya hai....gramasabha se kameti...kameti se asembali, asembali se sansad...sansad se...jane kitane hi khet-khalihan langh gaya bail.
kisan kee aankh men ab bhi utane hi aansoo hain jitane gandhi baba ya lard karjan ke taim men the...balki kuchh jyada hi.
main yahan par un kisanon kee bat nahin kar raha hoon jinhen krishi vikas pradarshaniyon ke postaron men bivi bachchon ke sath hansate gate dikhaya jata hai.
ve sab numayashi aur kalpanik kisan hain jo sirf postaron par sajate hain...
hal nahin chalate...udhar har bail har kisan se adhik pavaraful hota hai....bail banate hi vah apani shakti aank leta hai aur kisan ke bhoose ke sath-sath usake not bhi chaba leta hai.
kisan khamosh rahata hai.
vah janata hai ki itihas hamesha bailon se banata hai...kisanon se nahin.
bail kee ek khas khoobi yah bhi hoti hai ki chahe vah kisi rang ka ho, khud ko kisanon ka sachcha hamadard kahata hai....kisan ghabara jata hai ki bailon kee is bhid men sachcha bail kaun hai....usakee aatma janati hai ki chahe koee sa bhi bail kyon n ho chare ke sath usake not jaroor chavayega.
fir bhi kisan raili men jata hai aur bhent dekar laut aata hai.
vah janata hai ki bailon se usaka janam-maran ka nata hai....bail hi usaka bhagy vidhata hai....
mainne yoonhi baee d ve, bhind vale bail sahab se poochha ki janab, aapane garib kisan kee sal bhar kee kamaee kyon chaba dali ?...bail sahab muskaraye or bole-'chabana aur sing marana hamari aadat hai....ham nahin chabate to koee doosara bail chaba jata....kisan ko noton kee gaddi kee kya jaroorat ? use sirf apana karm karana chahie aur fal 'bailon'ke lie chhod dena chahie, yahi krishak dharm hai ! jamindari yug se yahi chala aa raha hai !...kisan ke pas yadi not sahi salamat rah gaye to ham bailon ko poochhega kaun ?..vah traiktar nahin kharid lega ?...shree bail ke aise shreevachan sunakar bailon ke prati meri aastha aur bhi badh gaee!...kisan ka kya? usaka yahi dharm hai ki har subah pipal par ugate sooraj kee roshani men naee fasal ka khvab dekhe aur ham doobate sooraj ke sath apane sapane dafan kar den !...use apani sari umr bailon ke chare ka bandobast karate hue hi gujarani hai !
in dinon 'baila' aur bhi sakriy ho uthate hain aur apani aasmani hamadardi oopar se barasane lagate hain....kisan kritagy ho uthata hai ki bailon kee hamadardi usake sath hai !...bailon kee aankhon men bhi aansu hain ! use aur kya chahiye ?...
mera khyal hai ki ab aap aadami aur janavar...kisan aur bail ke bich ka fark samajh gaye honge ! at: bhind ke bail ne kisan ke not chabakar sirf apana bail dharm nibhaya hai !...dosh kisan ka hai ! not bhoose men kyon rakhe?...kya vah janata tha ki in noton par usaka koee hak nahin hai ? kya use pata tha ki not antat: 'baila' ke havale hi hone hain.
bail se main batachit kar chuka hoon...kisan ka itanravyoo bekar hai !...
sab kuchh de chukane bad kisan intaravyoo dene layak nahin rah jata hai !

chandanavud childran skool...!
aankh mulamul...gal...gulagul...badan thulathul, magar aavaj bulabul ! ve matr van pis tahamad men lipate, stool par ukadoon baithe, bidi ka tota sarthak kar rahe the ! rah-rah kar anguliyon par kuchh gin lete aur bidi ka soonta fefadon tak khinch dalate the! jahan ve baithe the vahan kachchi pili eent ka tin se dhaka bhainson ka ek tavela tha ! n koee khidakee n raushanadan ! shayad unhen dar tha ki bhainsen kahin roshanadan ke raste khisak ne jaen ! subah savere ka taim tha aur bhainsen shayad nashtoparant tahalane ja chukee thin ! tavela khali pada tha ! unhonne mujhe bhar aankh dekha bhi nahin aur bidi choosate hue anguliyon par apana antahin kelkyooleshan jodate rahe !...
mainne unase sandalavud childan skool ka rasta poochha to unakee aankhon aur bidi men ek nanhi si chamak ubhari !...dhire se anguli aakash kee or utha di goya naya childran skool kahin antariksh men khula ho ! magar main unaka sanket samajh gaya ! najar oopar uthaee to tavele kee tin ke oopar ek takhti najar aaee, jis par gorashahi angreji men koyale se likha tha-di sandalavud childran skool !...pravesh chaloo ! ingalish midiyam se kaksha 6 tak majaboot padhaee ! prinsipal se milen !...
'takhti padhakar main dang rah gaya !...yahi hai chandan lakadi skool ?...chandan dar kinar, kahin tarapin ya kolatar tak kee boo nahin thi ! meri majaboori apani jagah thi ! muhalle ke ganeshi lal ke pote ke dakhale kee jimmedari mujh par thi ! khud ganeshi lal umr bhar padhaee likhaee kee illat se pak rahe aur apane bete ko bhi pak rakha ! sirf gud kee kismen jan lin aur khandani karobar chalate rahe ! magar pota jyon hi nekar men panv dalane kee umr ko pahuncha, unakee patohoo ne jid pakad li ki chhutakanna padhi hai jaroor, aur vah bhi nikhalis ingalish midiyam se !...usakee najar men hindi midiyam se padhane se behatar hai ki gud bech le !
patohoo ne apane maike men dekha ki angreji midiyam se padhe chhokare kaise fat-fat aapas men ingalish men gali galauj karate hain !...ek smartanes si rahati hai susari !...chunanche ganeshi lal mere pichhe pad gaye ki chhokare ko kahin angreji midiyam men dalava hi doon !...udhar julaee-agast kee jhadi lagate hi childran skoolon men vah kich-kich hoti hai ki aadami apana mara huaa bap bhale hi dobara hasil kar le, magar bachche ko skool men nahin thoons sakata !...
angreji ke 'doneshana' aur hindi ke 'anudana' ka fark isi vakt samajh men aata hai aadami ko ! anudan ke bis roopayon men bachcha hindi midiyam men dhans jata hai, magar doneshan tin ankon se niche hota hi nahin !...angreji kee gretanes ka pata yahin par chalata hai ! khair...! shiksha sandarbh men yah ek achchhi bat hai ki barish men fooli lakadi par uge
kukuramutton kee tarah, julaee-agast men childran skool bhi danadan ug aate hain ! har gali-muhalle men bhootapoorv lakadi kee talon aur halavaeeyon kee dukanon par narsari montesari skoolon ke bord tang jate hain ! har sain bord ka yahi dava hota hai ki hamare yahan bachcha man kee god jaisa surakshit rahega aur aage chalakar behad nam kamayega !...aise hi durlabh tatha naye uge skoolon men 'sandal vud childran skoola' ka nam bhi mere kan men pada tha !
nam men hi chandan si mahak aur hali-vud jaisi chahak thi !...aur ab main tin jadit, roshanadan rahit usi skool ke samane khada tha !...
bidi tahamad vale thulathul sajjan ne aakhiri kash khinch kar bidi ko sadagati tak pahunchaya, aur tahamad ke svatantr kone se munh ponchh kar aankhon hi aankhon men poochha ki kya chahie ?...mainne donon hathon se bachche ka saij bataya aur dhire se poochha ki prinsipal kahan hain...kab upalabdh honge ? ve bhadak gaye ! gurra kar bole-'ham aapako kya najar aave hain ? taee-kamij andar tangi hai to ham prinsipal nahin rahe ? jara badan ko hava de rahe the ! aap bachcha aur fis utha laie ! bharti kar lenge ! '
main satapata gaya aur is bar unhen us dhang se abhivadan pesh kiya jis dhang se amooman angreji midiyam se hota hai ! yah poochhane par ki bakee tiching staf kahan hai, unhonne bataya ki bakee ka staf bhi vah khud hi hain ! klas thri staf bhi, aur klas for (jhadoo, ponchha, safaee) bhi !...do adad ledi tichas bhi hain, jinamen se ek unakee maujooda patni hain aur doosari bhootapoorv ! filahal donon ghar men ladaee-jhagade men masaroof hain ! chat se tiching seshan shuroo hote hi aa jaegi !...abhi kul teees bachche namajad hue hain ! pachchis poore hote hi blaik bord mangava lenge aur padhaee jo hai use shuroo karava denge !...mujhe tasalli huee ! darate-darate poochha-khidakiyan, roshanadanon, pankhon aur bainchon vagaira ka jhanjhat aapane kyon nahin rakha ?'...
ve dooradarshi ho gae !...aap chahate hain ki bachchon ko abhi se aaram talab bana den ?...
glasago kabhi gae hain aap ? vahan ke san chalis ke paitarn par hamane skool shuroo kiya hai ! bachchon ko, use kya kahate hain...han...hardaship kee aadat dalani hogi !...fir dhire-dhire sab kuchh ho jaihe !...agale sal roshanadan khulava denge...fir agale sal pankhon vagaira kee dekhi jaegi !...paeesa chahie, ki nahin chahie ?...pachchis bachchon kee fis laeeke suroo men hi aaksaford yoonivarsiti khol den ka ?...taim pas hote-hote sab kuchh huee jayihe !...bachcha le aavo !...do hi siten bachi haingi !...
'so sahab, chandan vud childran skool ke pradhanachary ke shreevachan sunakar main kafi se bhi adhik prabhavit huaa ! sari himmat bator kar ek antim prashn poochha- 'mahasab ! vaise to apane in diya men chare-bhoose kee kami chahe bhale hi ho, magar bachchon ka tota nahin hai ! fir bhi magar do bachche aur n hath lage to kya aap skool dijalv kar denge ?' ve pun: bhadak gaye !...aaye gae soobe-soobe nahoosat failane !...
jis bhagavan ne teees bachche diye, vah do aur nahin bhejihe ka ? dijalav kar bhi den to kaun si bhus men lathi lag jaeehe ?...pahale is tin men pakke koyala kar gudam raha !...socha ki iskool dal len ! dal liya !...inte padhe likhe hainge ki kaksha 6 tak padhaye le javen ! nahin chal paeehe iskool to koyale ka laisans koee kharij huee gava hai ka ?...lapak ke bachcha lai aao !...' main lapak kar chal pada !...
raste bhar pradhanachary kee us angreji se prabhavit raha jo ek filmi gane 'aakash men panchhi gaing...bhauran bagiyan men gainga' jaisi thi ! massab door tak takatakee bandhe mujhe ummidavar najaron se dekh rahe the, goya kah rahe hon-bachcha laeehe jaroor ! jaeehe kahan ? idhar main yah soch raha tha ki ganeshi lal ke pote ke bhavishy ke lie gud bechana munasib rahega ya sandalavud childran skool men angreji midiyam se shiksha arjit karana ?...
(not-yadi kisi skool ka nam yahi ho, to anyatha n len ! nam kalpanik hai !...)
purane ya bujurg logon ka yah aadarsh vaky hai ki hamen doodh pina chahie kyonki doodh pine se manushy men takat aati hai halanki isi takat ko bad men yuva log unhin bujurgon se ladne jhagadne ke kam men prayog men late hain.
yadi kisi vigyapan kee bhasha men bat karen to kah sakate hain '' doodh piyen kyonki isamen jan hai." lekin doodh pine kee prakiya matr itani si hi nahin hai ki doodh liya aur pi liya tatha takat grahan kar li isake lie badi tapasya karani padti hai.
yah bhi ham sab janate hain is duniyan men jo nar hain unhen apane man ko nirash nahin karana chahie tatha kuchh kam karana chahie arthat vivah karana chahie aur jab vivah hoga to jahir hain unakee patni bhi aaegi aur jab patni aaegi to vah yada kada mayake bhi jaegi jab vah mayake jaegi to pati ko svayan hi khana ya to banana padega ya bazar men khana padega khana to chalo vah bajaऱ men kha lega kintu subah subah uthate hi use chay bhi to chahie .
vaise puroosh chahe kitana hi kamachor ya akkhad kism ka kyon n ho chay tatha khichadi banane ka gun to use janmajat se hi mila huaa hota hai.
usakee sabere sabere chay pine kee aadat ke karan hi subah huee nahin ki sabase pahale to doodh vale ka intajar karo.
jo log aisa karate hain ve is kathan ko bilakul bakavas samajhate hain ki intazar ka maza hi kuchh aur hai'.

1- Kisi se bhi udhaar maangne se 8-10 din pehle usse khoob mel-jol badha lo.
Ek baar murgi jaal mein fas jaaye to saare ande tumhare hain.
2- Jisse udhaar maangne ki yojna bana rahe ho use pehle ek chhoti-moti party de do.
Aur 2-4 tareefein kar do.
Fir dekho tumhara kaam kaise banta hai.
3- Thoda sa emotional atyachar karna behad zaroori hai.
Agar emotional atyachar safal raha to fir jitna maangoge utna udhaar milega.
4- Udhaar hamesha 2-4 logon ke saamne hi maanga karo.
Aisa karne se udhaar dene wala kabhi bhi udhaar dene se mana nahi kar paayega.
5- Koshish karo ki paisa shanivaar ko maanga jaaye, Kyunki agle din to ravivaar hoga.
Fir 2-4 din jaise taise taal hi loge.
6- Apne kisi chacha ya tau ko beemar batakar koi lambi chaudhi rakam ainth lo.
Uske dil ko itna pighla do ki wo majboor ho jaye tumhe paisa dene ko.
Udhaar hi nahi, tumhe wo bhet mein hi de de paise.
7- Wo jise sabse zyaada pyaar karta hai uske saamne uske pair pakad lo.
Aur zor-zor se rona-dhona karke jitna ho sake utna paisa ainth lo.
Waapas dene ki koi zaroorat nahi hogi.
8- Ek baat hamesha yaad rakho udhaar maangkar ek-do baar time se pehle hi udhaar chukta kar do.
Phir jaise hi udhaar dene waalon ko tum par yakeen ho jaaye to koi bada haath maar lo

agar aap laabh ke pad par hai, aur kaanoon bhee aisa maanata hai, to bhee koee baat nahee.
aise kaanoono kee aisee-taisee – aap svaya saksham hai apane lie naya kaanoon banaane-banavaane ke lie, jo puraanee tithi se prabhaavashaalee maana jaega – aur jo yah sunishchit karega ki aap koee bhee, kisee bhee laabh ke pad par nahee hai – bhale hee us pad par aapako achchha khaasa maanadey, ghar-ofis-kaar-fon, vyaktigat sevako-sachivo kee suvidhae haasil hotee ho.

kisi bhi manushy ka vyaktitv evan usaka bauddhik vikas , usake parivesh , desh , kal ,paristhiti ke anuroop hota hai ! subhadra kumari chauhan ek sath hi pragatishil nari , grihini , man , kavi , lekhika , svatantrata sangram senani , jananetree v rajaneta thin ! ve jamin se judi huee thin , atah unake anubhavon ka sansar ati vishal tha ! yahi karan hai ki unake sahity men kahin bhi natakeeyata v banavatipan nahin hai varan vah hriday sparshi abhivyakti ban pada hai ! unaka janm 1904 men ilahabad ke nikat nihalapur namak ganv men ramanathasinh ke jamindar parivar men huaa tha ! itihas vid janate hain ki bisavin sadi ke praranbh men bharatiy samaj men jatigat , vargagat , dharmagat , lingagat roodhiyan apane charam par thin ! bal vivah kee parampara thi ! in kuritiyon ke viruddh hi subhadra kumari chauhan kee katha drishti bhi kendrit thi ! bahumukhi vyaktitv ke chalate v durbhagyavash asamay mrityu ke karan unhonne bahut adhik nahin likha hai , par jo kuchh bhi likha hai vah sab ka sab marmasparshi , uddeshyapoorn v shashvat ban kar hindi sahity kee dharohar ke roop men supratishthit hai!
subhadra kumari chauhan kee khoob ladi mardani vah to jhansi vali rani thi , hindi ke sarvadhik padhe v gaye gaye giton men se ek hai ! yah git svayan men git se adhik vir gatha kee ek sachchi kahani hi hai ! jisamen kavayitree ne rani lakshmibaee ke jivan ke sare ghatana kram ko ek padyatmak kahani ke roop men is sajivata se prastut kiya hai ki pathak ya shrota vir ras se bhav vibhor ho uthata hai ! yah rachana unakee pahachan ban gaee hai !
bikhare moti unaka pahala kahani sangrah hai , isamen bhagnavashesh, holi , papipet , manjhalirani , parivartan , drishtikon , kadam ke fool , kismat , machhuye kee beti , ekadashi , aahuti , thati , amaraee , anurodh , v gramina kul 15 ek doosare se badhakar kahaniyan hain ! in kahaniyon kee bhasha saral bolachal kee bhasha hai ! adhikansh kahaniyan nari vimarsh par kendrit hain!
subhadra kumari chauhan ke samooche sahity kee safalata jis aadharabhoot tathy par kendrit hai , vah mere pas upalabdh bikhare moti kahani sangrah kee prati par ek mitr ke dvara doosare ko pustak bhent karate huye kee gaee tippani hai! jo in kahaniyon kee lokapriyata , upayogita v aam pathak ka sahity anurag pradarshit karati hai ! aaj kitane pathak svayan pustaken kharid kar padhate hain ? bhent karana to bad kee bat hai ! aesi ruchikar hriday sparshi kitani kahaniyan likhi ja rahin hai ki ve pathakon ke bich charcha ka vishay ban javen ?unakee kahaniyan kritrim , saprayas likhi nahin lagati ! ve to aasapas se hi uthaee gaee vishay vastu kee taratib se prastuti hi hain !
unmadini shirshak se unaka doosara katha sangrah 1934 men chhapa ! is men unmadini , asamanjas , abhiyukt , sone kee kanthi , nari hriday , pavitr eershya , angoothi kee khoj , chadha dimag , v veshya kee ladakee kul 9 kahaniyan hain ! in sab kahaniyo ka mukhy svar parivarik samajik paridrishy hi hai!
sidhe sadhe chitr subhadra kumari chauhan ka tisara v antim katha sangrah hai ! isamen kul 14 kahaniyan hain ! roopa , kailashi nani , biaalha , kalyani , do sathi , profesar mitra , durachari v mangala 8 kahaniyon kee kathavastu nari pradhan parivarik samajik samasyayen hain ! hingavala , rahi , tange vala , evan gulabasinh kahaniyan rashtriy vishayon par aadharit hain
subhadra kumari chauhan ne kul 46 kahaniyan likhi , aur apani vyapak katha drishti se ve ek ati lokapriy kathakar ke roop men hindi sahity jagat men supratishthit hain !
vibhinn kshetron kee jalavayu , vatavaran , bhoogol , sabhyata , sanskriti , parivesh , rahan sahan , samaj vigyan ke adhyayan anveshan men yatraon ka mahatv nirvivad hai .
sabhyataon ke aadan pradan , jenetik roop se brids ke sammilan men bhi yatraon ka yog raha hai .
itihas men jhanken to bhagavan shree ram kee manav danav sanskritiyon ko milane vali uttar dakshin ko jodne vali yatra ko shanti yatra kaha ja sakata hai .desh bhar men pandavon kee yatraon ke smarak milate hain .
samooche bharat ko tirth yatra ke ek sootr men pirone hetu poorab pashchim uttar dakshin men dharm pithon kee sthapana ka abhinav kary vishv itihas ke sanbhavatah sabase kam umr ke yatree , aadi shankarachary ji ne kar dikhaya hai .haj yatra kis musalaman kee hasarat nahin hoti ? sare vishv men bharatiy sanskriti ka paracham laharane ka shrey vivekanand ji kee shikago yatra ko hi jata hai jisane unhen sadhoo se svami ke roop men pratishthit kiya .
bairistar gandhi ko rel ke tisare klas ke dabbe men kiye gaye deshatan ne hi mahatma gandhi bana diya .
achanak paristhitiyonvash payalat se pradhanamantree bane rajiv gandhi ne rashtravyapi yatraon se hi lokapriyata ka sachcha janadhar paya .
itali ke aitihasik yatree markopolo kee terahavin sadi kee poorvi deshon kee yatra ko hi aaj ke global market ka janak bindu kaha jana chahiye , jisane sarvapratham pashchimi sabhyata ko poorvi desho se parichit karavaya.
kolambas ne yatra se hi amerika aur vest indij dhoodh nikale .
purtagali yatree vaskodigama ne kep aaf gud hop ka naya samudri marg khoja .
chini yatree vhenasang v fahiyan kee dayariyan aitihasik dastavej banin .
rahul sanskrityayan ka samoocha amooly sahity hi ghumakkadi par aadharit hai .

balivud ne bambe too gova , en ivaning in peris , lav in tokiyo , bambe too bainkak , etti dej eraund di varld , aadi anek yatra kendrit filmen banaee hain .

midil skool tak ke bachchon ko shikshak ya abhivavakon ko samay samay par post aafis , relve rijarveshan , polis thana , baink , jalapraday sansthan , aasapas ke udyog , aadi ka bhraman karavane se ve in sansthanon se prayogik roop se parichit ho pate hain .
