ho sakata hai ki aapake ghar me is baat par koharaam machata ho ki Teevee par kis samay kaun-sa prograam lagaaya jae.
kaaraN, bhaee jee ko emaTeevee-faishan Teevee dekhana hota hai to bahan jee saanta baarabara - kyonki saas bhee; jaise kaaryakramo kee deevaanee hotee hai.
bachche kebeesee-2, antaaksharee aur Daans-Daans kee koee kaDee chhoDana nahee chaahate.
aapako har aadhe ghanTe par samaachaar apaDeTs dekhana atyant jarooree lagata hai.
oopar se krikeT ka miyaadee bukhaar to rahata hee hai.
ghar me Teevee ek, dekhane vaale kee.
har ek kee apanee pasand.
ek hee samay me kee-kee chainalo me aane vaale kee-kee pasandeeda kaaryakram.
sambhav hai ki praaya: kisee ek samay ek chainal par antaaksharee ka fainal raunD chal raha ho aur doosare par emaTeevee ka fainal kaunT Daun.
kisee aur chainal par krikeT ka fainal maich dikhaaya ja raha ho, to kisee any chainal par vaarshik vyanjan pratiyogita ka pariNaam dikhaaya ja raha ho.
fir ghar me har ek ko doosare ka pasandeeda kaaryakram nihaayat hee ghaTiya, ubaoo, nirarthak aur isee prakaar na jaane kya kya lagata hai.
lihaaja ve apane pasandeeda kaaryakram ko hee dekhane aur doosaro ko dikhaane kee jugaaD me lage hue rahate hai.
jaahir hai, aisee paristhitiyo me aapake gharo me yada kada mahaasamar bhee to hota hee hoga.
parantu kuchh log meree tarah ke bhee hote honge, jinhe Teevee ke har kaaryakram me aanand aata hai.
antaaksharee bhee achchhee lagatee hai aur rasoee sho bhee.
filmee kvij me bhee maja aata hai aur DaakyoomenTree me bhee.
Delee seeriyal me to dainik akhabaar kee tarah ka eDikshan hai.
film besD kaaryakram aur filmo kee to baat hee kya hai! krikeT, kaar resing, boksing ke thril ka maja Teevee ke alaava kahee nahee hai.
ab aisee sthiti me dimaag ke bheetar mahaasamar hota rahata hai ki kaun-sa prograam dekhe aur kaun sa chhoDe – kyonki sabhee saale praim Taim me hee, pata nahee kyo dikhaate hai.
jab ek chainal par kisee pasandeeda Delee seeriyal ka mahatvapoorN episoD chal raha hota hai, usee samay, formoola van kaar resing ka fainal raunD kisee doosare chainal par dikhaaya ja raha hota hai.
dono hee kaaryakram apane ko bahut pasand hai.
par dono kaaryakramo ko ek saath to nahee dekh sakate.
bahut hua to nee takaneek vaalee pip (pikchar in pikchar) Teevee ya Dabal vijan Teevee laee ja sakatee hai, parantu aavaaj to kisee ek chainal kee hee sunanee paDegee.
fir yah bhee to hota hai ki kisee teesare-chauthe chainal par kisee soorat na chhoDane laayak pasandeeda kaaryakram chal raha ho.
kabhee aisa bhee hota hai ki kisee chainal par amitaabh bachchan aur raanee mukharjee kee film blaik ko dekhate rah ge ya krikeT maich me fans kar rah ge to pata chalata hai ki paanch-saat pasandeeda kaaryakram vibhinn chainalo me ae, aakar chale bhee ge aur ham haath malate rah ge.
praim Taim ka to aur bhee rona hai.
pratidin praim Taim par vibhinn chainalo me ek se ek achchhe kaaryakram dikhae jaate hai.
jaahir hai, kisee bhee chainal ka praim Taim ka koee bhee kaaryakram kisee ke lie bhee chhoDa jaane laayak nahee rahata.
sabhee kaaryakramo ko dekhana Teevee chainalo-proDyoosaro ke lie to jarooree hai hee – darshako ke lie bhee aavashyak hai.
par ek saath itane saare achchhe kaaryakramo ko koee kaise dekh sakata hai.
isaka koee hal tatkaal nikaala jaana chaahie.
kisee ne is samasya ka hal aise suzaaya – do-chaar Teevee seT le ao aur veeseeaar / veeseeDee ya kampyooTar kee haarD-Disk me inhe rekorD kar lo.
fir maje me apane prograam baad me, furasat me dekho.
isase aapaka pasandeeda koee prograam chhooTega nahee.
par, tab bhaee, aakhir din me chaubees hee to ghanTe hote hai na! mere jaise sabhee chainalo ke sabhee kaaryakramo ke deevaano ke lie to yah aiDiya bhee fel hai! oopar se, har maheene-do-maheene me ek naya chainal aur chala aata hai – Dher saare ne, majedaar kaaryakramo ko lekar.
jaahir hai, kya dekhe-kya na dekhe ka zagaDa to baDhata hee rahega.

vidyaarthee jab fel hote hai to unhe unake shikshak ghaTiya paDhaate hai.
; skool ka sabase sharaaratee bachcha skool ke praachaary ka beTa hota hai.

upapramey - jis din vidyaarthee der se skool pahunchata hai, us din upasthiti pahale darj kar lee jaatee hai.

; achchhe vidyaarthee/adhyaapak doosare skoolo ke hote hai.
; jaanch pareeksha ke din pandrah pratishat vidyaarthee ati aavashyak kaaraNo se anupasthit hote hai.
; yadi shikshak kala vishay paDhaata hai to praachaary fijikal Trening sankaay ka hota hai aur vah kala vishay se ghor nafarat karata hai.
aur yadi shikshak fijikal Trening sankaay ka hota hai to praachaary bhee usee sankaay ka hota hai aur usake jamaane me vah apane vidyaarthiyo ko kee raashTreey-antarraashTreey maich jitava chuka hota hai.

; yadi aap kisee kaksha me kisee vishay me pravesh paana chaahate hai to agar usame "ka" vidyaarthiyo ke laayak seeT hotee hai to pravesh soochee me aapaka kramaank "ka+1" hota hai.
; kaksha ke samay kee rooparekha is tarah banaee jaatee hai ki usase pratyek vidyaarthee ka adhikatam samay barabaad hota hai.

; vaanchhit kors ke lie praathamik aavashyakata vaala kors vaanchhit kors ke poora hone ke baad ke semesTar me paDhaaya jaata hai.

yah poochhe jane par ki mirja sirf ek hi palle men oon ke gole samet, is nirmanadhin svetar ko utare bagair kyon nikal pade, mirja bamak uthe, "tum kya jano ki ruhani ishk kya hota hai ? jo chij itani mehanat aur mohabbat se unhonne ham par chadhaee hai, use utar fenken ? hamen jara bajar se masoor kee dal lane kee jaldi thi.
is palle ko utarane men ek umr lag jati.
so socha ki lao, palle-gole samet hi bajar ho aaen.
jamana dekh le ki shahajahan aur mumataj bivi ka ishk abhi jinda hai.
behatar hoga ki gola tum sambhal lo aur hamare pichhe-pichhe bajar tak chale aao." abhi ham gola uthakar jhad-ponchh hi rahe the ki hamari bhavaj (begam mirja) burke kee chhanv tale taish men funkarati huee dakhil huee aur kichin men dakhil hokar hamari bibi ko bhi ghasit laee.
sari prishthabhoomi unhen samajhaee aur mirja ko vo-vo dhuli-punchhi sunaee ki agale ka patiya gul aur dhibari tait ho gaee.
begam bhabhi ke total gusse ka saransh yah tha ki akl ke nam par paidal mirja, jaldabaji men bachche ke svetar ka palla dat aae the, aur apane svetar ke palle men salaiyon samet bachche ko lapet kar rakh aae the.donon hi 'andar kanstrakashana' svetaron ka dijain ek tha aur purani udhadi huee dhuli oon se ban rahe the.
mirja sir jhukae bagalen jhank rahe the, aur main soch raha tha ki jab bachche ke svetar ka palla mirja par fit aa gaya tab mirja ke svetar ka palla bachche par sahi kyon nahi utara ? kya aaj ke daur men bap-beton men palle-bhar muhabbat bhi bakee nahin rah gaee! oont aur oont men koee fark nahin hota...magar bachchon aur bachchon men fark hota hai.
bachche amir aur garib hote hain...
bhookhe aur saje-dhaje hote hain...magar oont hamesha nanga hota hain! oont amir aur garib kabhi nahin hota!...aajadi ke in mahattvapoorn 36 varshon ka asar bachchon par bhale hi pada ho...oonton par nahin pada.
oont ke bare men ek panjabi kahavat hain ki 'jat chalis da...bota paintalis da'...bota oont ke bachche ko kahate hain! at: oont ke bachche kee keemat hamesha oont se jyada hoti hai| insanon me sirf rajanitik bachchon kee keemat hi jyada hotihai| aam aadami ka abhavagrast bachcha do kaudi ka....n khane ko, n pahanane ko...bina vajah prithvi par aane ka pap bhogata hai aadami ka bachcha.
...ab aap kripaya oonton aur bachchon kee ek ghatana suno...
dilli aur jayapur ke bich rashtriy marg par tooriston ke manoranjan ke lie rajasthan toorist devalapament karaporeshan ne 'mid ve' nam ka ek umda restran banaya huaa hai.
yon bhi bhookh ke desh men aalishan restran banana ek achchhi bat hai.
yahan bachchon ke lie oont kee savari kee vyavastha hai.
yah bhi ek achchhi bat hai.
bachapan rahate tak hi bachcha oont kee savari kar sakata hai.
bada hone par rajaniti aur vyavastha ke oont aadami kee pith par savar ho jate hain aur desh dhire-dhire aage badhane lagata hai.
khair...pichhale dinon dilli ke mardan skool ke bachchon ka ek dal bas sen jayapur ja raha tha.
bachche is restran men utar gaye aur oont kee savari karane lage.
thodi hi der men jane kisane kaisi hava fook di ki yachchon ko oont se utar diya gaya...paise vapas kar die gae aur oont kee savari band ho gaee.
ab chakkar kya tha ki ek sahakari uchch adhikari apani bachchi ke sath aae hue the jo oont kee savari kee jid kar rahi thi.
at: sadharan bachchon ko oont se utarakar oont kisi khas 'bachchi' ke lie rijarv kar diya gaya.
is ghatana par n bachchon ne bura mana, n oont ne.
donon hi janate the shayad ki 'bal divasa'ka svang rachane vale is desh men, bachche aur bachche men jamin aur aasaman ka fark hota hai.
..kuchh bachche janm se hi munh men chandi ka chammach aur satta ka shahad lekar paida hote hai.
shesh sare bachche sirf bhookh aur abhavon kee gard lekar janm lete hain.
ye 'ghatiya' bachche n bal divason kee raunak ban sakate hain, n hi oont kee savari ke yogy hote hain.
dilli ke mardan skool ke bachche fir bhi achchhe khate-pite gharanon ke hai.unhen bhi oont kee savari ke aanand se vanchit kar diya afasar shahi ne| ab jara us bachche ke bare men sochie jo adhananga hai...bhookha hai...sirf bachcha kahalane ka aparadhi hai.
vah sirf door se yah dekh sakata hai ki oont kaisa hota hai aur 'bade' bachche is par kaise savari karate hain.
ghuti huee lalasaon ka yahi jahar aage chalakar abhavagrast bachchon ko aparadhi banata hai to ham kahate hain ki bal-aparadh badh rahe hain...yahi nanhe-nanhe kuchale hue araman ek din jahar aur samaj-virodh ka ghinauna jvalamukhi ban jate hai.
aap kisi bachche se us kee roti chhin sakate hain...mitti ka khilauna chhin sakate hain...magar usake man kee nanhi-nanhi kamanaen nahin chhin sakate.
kal jo log is bachche ko vot kee lain men khada karenge, ve aaj ise do kshan oont kee savari ya mitti kee ek chhoti-si chidiya dene se kyon katarate hain? ...kitani bal sansthaen...kitane hi shishu kendr evan bal sudhar grih apane bade-bade bord khokhale dholon jaise latakae baithe hain, par desh ka aam bachcha aaj bhi utana hi rita hai jitana apane bachapan men main tha.
bachche ke hisse men, in 36 varshon men sirf tirange jhande kee tasvir aaee hai jisake rang dekhakar vah khush ho leta hai.
kahan hain ve log jo kahate hain ki is desh se 'bal-shrama' (chaild lebar) khatm ho raha hai ? thand men thithurate hajaron masoom aaj bhi eeten dho rahe hai...gadi khinch rahe hai...doosaron ke bartan manj rahe hain.
doosaron kee fenkee huee joothan hi in bachchon ke hisse ka prajatantr hai...aajadi hai.
...mahakavi miltan ne ek bar kaha tha ki main kaee-kaee janm sirf bachcha bane rahane ko taiyar hoon...shart yah hai ki mujhe ek bachche kee tarah bharapoor jine ka adhikar mile.
miltan nahin rahe is sansar men...sirf kamana rah gaee jo aaj adhikansh bachchon ke chehare par ek sapana banakar mandarati rahati hai....bachche oont ko dekhate hain, oont bachchon ko dekhata hai...
donon ke bich men ek sampoorn samajavad kee doori hai.
khuli karon par se sadak ke bachchon par mala fenkana aur bat hai...band kothariyon men unake pet kee bhookh aur tan kee bimari aankana aur bat hai.
...madar teresa jaisi hamadard hastiyan sadiyon men kahin ek paida hoti hain.-36 varsh se gal-bajae ja rahe hain bal kalyan ke nam par.majadoor ka beta majadoor aur bhikhari ka beta bhikhari hi paida ho raha hai.
bhookh ke dher par bhookh hi janm le rahi hai....
adhikaron kee hod-si lagi hai.
jisake pas nanhe bachchon ko oont par se utar sakane ka adhikar hai, vah usi ka bharapoor upayog kar raha hai.
ek apane bachche kee khushi ke lie kitane hi bachchon kee aankhon se khushi kee chamak chhini ja rahi hai.
yah upalabdhi hain neharoo ke sapanon kee|
...main desh ke mamale men tang adana nahin chahata.
jinaka desh hai vah desh ko jidhar chahen mod le jaen.
magar bachchon ke mamale men bolane ka mujhe hak hai.
main bachchon ka lekhak hoon...khud bachcha rah chuka hoon...bachchon ke adhabune sapanon kee ek poori duniya dekhi hai mainne....in aramanon se khelata hai koee to man kasak uthata hai.
aap bhale hi bal sangrahalay, bal udyan, oont aur hathi-ghode hata lo! magar jab tak ye hain, in par sab bachchon ka saman hak hai ! afasar shahi ke panv pasarane ko aur bhi jaminen hain ! chand bachchon ke cheharon kee hansi chhinakar afasarashahi surkharoo nahin hoti...syah aur badanam ho jati hai....bachchon ke bhole man to yon bhi bhi sab kuchh bahut jald bhool jate hain! bachche jo thahare!

antat: apane aansuon kee nakad keemat vasool kar apane ghar laut gaye.
main is ghatana se ratti-bhar prabhavit nahin huaa....kahe se ki main us desh men rah raha hoon jahan nakali aansoo thok ke bhav litaron bah rahe hain...aur nakadi kaish kara rahe hain....in nakali aansuon ke pichhe 36 varshon kee pragati ka poora itihas hai.
desh kee chinta aur samasyaon par nirantar bahate aansoo ...jaise room koolar men andar hi pani ka pravah hota rahata hai....aur in aansuon kee bharapoor keemat hai satta...kursi ...gaddi...adhikar.
mainne magaramachchh aaj tak nahin dekha...dekhana bhi nahin chahata.

insani magaramachchh jyada kalchard hota hai.
keemat vasool leta hai...nakali aansoo bad men bahata hai...deshahit men...imej bani rahati hai.

bhopal ke suresh nandamehar ek mamooli charmakar hain.
anyay sahana unakee fitarat men nahin hai aur isi fitarat ke chalate unhonne pani men aag lagane jaisa kam karane nikal pade hain.
charmakar samaj kee mang ko lekar 27 dinon tak bhopal ke roshanapura chaurahe par dharane par baithe suresh ko jab akhabaron men paryapt jagah nahin mili to unhonne man men than liya ki ab ve akhabaron men apani khabar chhapavane ke lie nahin jaenge balki apana akhabar nikalenge jo unake samaj kee aavaj uthane men aage rahega.
is tarah ek akhabar ka janm huaa aur nam rakha gaya bal kee khal.
yah suresh ka hi sahas tha ki jeb men footi kaudi nahin aur akhabar shuroo karane kee than li.
suresh nandamehar bhakt kavi raidas kee parampara ko kahin aage badhate dikhate hain to kahin unakee takat dushyant kumar ke gazal kee vah lainen hain jisamen unhonne likha tha- kaun kahata hai aasaman men surakh nahin hota, ek patthar to tabiyat se uchhalo yaron.

surakh kar dikhaya hai.

ek charmakar se patrakar banane kee tathakatha sunate samay suresh ke chehare par kabhi chamak aa jati hai to kaee bar nirash bhi dikhata hai.
nirasha ko vah apane pas fatakane dena nahin chahata aur isalie vah jaldi ubar jata hai.
usakee shikayat jamane bhar se hai aur yah shikayat use apanon se hai.
samaj ke hak ke lie ladane ko nikale suresh ko kadam-kadam par virodh ka samana karana padata hai.
kabhi usakee garibi aade aati hai to kabhi usakee vah aupacharik shiksha jo patrakarita ke lie jaroori hai.
vah garibi aur aupacharik patrakarita shiksha ko lekar bahut chintit nahin rahata hai.
usaka manana hai ki usake is kam men patrakarita ke anubhav rakhane vale anek sathiyon kee khoob madad milati hai.
suresh batata hai ki shasan ne ham logon ko apane paramparagat pesha jari rakhane ke lie gumatiyan di thi lekin vah gumatiyan itani chhoti thi ki isamen hamara gujara nahin chalata tha so hamane isake lie shasan aur afasaron se man-manauvval kee lekin kisi ke kan men joon nahin rengi.
virodh-svaroop hamare samaj ke logon ne roshanapura chaurahe par dharana diya.
akhabaron se apeksha thi ki hamari mangon ko ve apane akhabaron men pramukhata se jagah denge.
jagah to mili lekin aavaj buland karane layak nahin aur isi ka khamiyaja hamen bhugatana pada.
lagatar 27 dinon tak ham dharane par baithe rahe aur benatija dharana khatm karana pada.
akhabaron men dharane kee khabar pramukhata se nahin chhapane ke karan shasan-prashasan bhi ganbhir nahin huaa aur hamari mang adhoori rah gaee.
is ghatana ne mere bhitar vidroh paida kar diya aur mainne tay kar liya ki ab khud ka akhabar nikala jae aur apani bat likhi jae.
akhabar nikalane kee aupacharikata se main aparichit tha lekin patrakar dost santosh tivari ne madad kee aur mujhe bal kee khal nam dilli se mil gaya.
khabar men bal kee khal nikali jati hai lekin is nam ke pichhe kee kahani bhi doosari hai.
mere pas itana paisa to tha nahin ki akhabar ke prakashan ka kharcha utha sakoon to
apane ek naee mitr se kaha ki tera pesha bal ka hai aur mera khal ka (joote banane ka) to kyon n ham donon milakar akhabar shuroo karen.
usakee maukhik sahamati ke bad akhabar ke lie nam bal kee khal bheja.
bad men mera vah dost baink kee naukari men chala gaya aur mainne akele hi akhabar ka prakashan shuroo kiya.
suresh batate hain ki samaj ke kuchh logon kee madad se akhabar chhapane laga.
dilli aur munbaee ke samaj ke logon ka protsahan bhi mila.
samaj ke logon ne aarthik sahayata dekar mere kam kee nirantarata banaye rakhi.
ab janasampark sanchalanalay aur doosare vibhagon se bhi vigyapan ke roop men aarthik sahayata milane lagi hai.
suresh batate hain ki vartaman samay men bal kee khal kee koee sadhe sat hajar pratiyan chhapati hain aur isake varshik sadasy bhi hain.
vigyapanon ke roop men prapt rashi se chhapaee ka kharch nikal aata hai.
samachar prapti, sanpadan aur chhapaee kee prakriya ke bare men suresh batate hain ki alag alag sthanon se patrakarita men roochi rakhane vale sathi samachar bhej dete hain.
main aur samaj ke kuchh log jo ki isamen roochi rakhate hain, sanpadan men sahayog karate hain.
shasan kee hamare samaj ke lie banaye gae karyakramon ka vivaran bhi prakashit karate hain taki logon ko isaka labh mil sake.
ek charmakar dvara samachar patr ke prakashan kee bat to bahut logon ko maloom hai lekin bahut thode se logon ko yah bat maloom hogi ki suresh letar pres ke dinon men kampojing ka kam karata tha aur usane yah kam sikha bhi hai.
usakee roochi aaranbh se apane paramparagat peshe se pare patrakarita men rahi hai lekin jivanayapan ke lie use apane paramparagat vyavasay par hi nirbhar rahana padata hai.
bal kee khal ke panch sala safar ka anubhav suresh nandamehar ke lie khatta-mitha raha hai.
mantree gopal bhargav hon ya kamishnar janasampark jab suresh ko bal kee khal ke nam se pukarate hain to usake chehare par prasannata jhalakane lagati hai.
kaee bar isake karan kaee patrakar naraj bhi ho jate hain, aise men suresh dukhi ho jata hai.
use khushi is bat kee bhi hai ki apane akhabar ke silasile men vah adhikariyon se mel-mulakat karata rahata hai lekin kabhi kisi ne suresh nandamehar ko anadekha nahin kiya balki usake prayas kee sarahana hi huee hai.
suresh nandamehar kee ichchha hai ki ek bar vah mukhyamantree shivarajasinh chauhan se jaroor mile.

is bich usakee ikka-dukka mulakat hai.

yah poochhe jane par ki dinabhar akhabar ke lie bhagadaud aur der rat tak dukan par kam karane ke bad kabhi aisa nahin laga ki ab joote-chappal kee dukan band kar di jae, is par suresh kahate hain ki dukan band kar diya to mera aur mere bachchon ka kya hoga, unhen khana-kapada kahan se milega....vah kahata hai n to mujhe joota banane men sharm hai aur n batane men...akhabar to madhyam hai mere bhitar ke gusse ko nikalane ka...yah mere jivanayapan ka jariya nahin hai...yah thik hai ki is dhandhe se meri tabiyat par viparit asar ho raha hai lekin isaka koee vikalp bhi to nahin hai.

bachapan se hi mujhe sahity kala, sinema aadi men vyapak roochi rahi hai shayad isi ke parinam svaroop dinakar ji ke sahayog se kalej men ''apavada'' namak ek prishthiy patrika ka padarpan huaa.
bhavishy men is aasha ke sath ki apavad ek apavad nahin rahega, hamane sahity ke safar men ek angreji patrika ''kranis intaraneshanala'' ko bhi prakashit kiya.
yadyapi sahity ki is anokhi aur dil lubhane vale anubhav ne is kshetr men aage badhane ke lie prerit kiya kintu parivarik jimmedariyon men ulajhakar isamen ek viram chihn lag gaya.
parantu bachapan ke sakha dinakar ji ne fir is pustak ko prakashit karane ka anurodh kiya to anayas hi soya huaa vah sahity prem fir ubhar kar ek bar satah par aa gaya.
halanki yah ab main achchhi tarah samajh chuka tha ki is tarah ka prayas aarthik roop se koi labh nahin laega parantu yah ek vyavasay hi to nahin hai, varana premachand ji, fanishvar nath renu aadi anek sahityakar atidhanadhy hote.
khair bhoopen hajarika ji kisi bhi parichay ke mohataj nahin hai.
man kamakhya v brahmaputr ke is vilakshan kalapremi ko sara desh janata hai.
bachapan men ek bar inase milane ka mauka mila to inhonne gale lagakar mano mujhamen apani amit chhap ka ek ansh chhod diya.

sangit, gayan v git rachana, vah bhi itani smaraniy, sanvedanashil v karnnapriy yah bhoopenada ka apana anokha andaj hain.
logon ke dil men bhoopenada ka git ''dil hum hum kare'' bas gaya.
parantu main to usi din unaka bhakt ho gaya jab inaka sangitabadgh kiya huaa git aarop film men ''nayanon men darapan hai, darapan men koi'' suna.
sach men bhoopenada asam ke gaurav hain, inake vyaktitv ke kuchh anachhue pahaluon ke bare men is pustak ko prakashit karate hue main gauravanvit mahasoos kar raha hoon.
bhagavan unhen svasth rakhe aur ve apani dhunon se hamen sada rijhae rakhen, isi aasha ke sath.....aasha hai yah aapako pasand aaegi, kripaya apane sujhavon se hamen avagat karaen.
ataH is mahan hasti bhoopenada ko mera ek bar fir ''salama''.
usha pablikeshan ki pahali prastuti hindi men pratham prakashit bhoopenada ke vyaktitv par pustak, aaf aashirvad, prerana, sahabhagita ki apeksha karegi taki bhavishy men bhi any sahity ke nagine aaf samaksh prastut kar saken.
guvahati ke ek karyakram men svar samragyee lata mangeshakar ne kaha tha - 'ham asam ko bhoopen hajarika ke nam se janate hain.' bhoopen hajarika ke bahuaayami vyaktitv ke kitane roopakh hain - gitakar, sangitakar, gayak, sahityakar, patrakar, film nirdeshak, patakatha lekhak, chitrakar - aur har roop advitiy hai, anootha hai.
asam ki mati ki sondhi mahak ko suron men rupantarit kar unhonne desh-videsh men asam ke sangit ko pracharit kiya hai.
ve asam ki janata ki char pidhiyon ke sabase chahete gayak hain.
bihoo samarohon men varsha men bhingate hue rat-rat bhar log unako gate hue dekhate-sunate hain.
asam ki sanskriti, brahmaputr nadi, lok parampara, samasamayik samasya - jivan ke harek pahaloo ko unhonne giton men roopantarit kiya hai.

fir ve kahate hain, 'main ek premagit sunana chahata hoon.' ve gane lagate hain - 'shaishavate dhemalite ...' git ka bhav hai - 'bachapan men ham sath-sath khelate the.

tumane mujhase vada kiya tha ki sath-sath jienge.
tumane kaha tha ki tumhare bina ji nahin sakoongi, jan de doongi.
magar mere pas dhan nahin tha.
tum apana vada bhool gayi aur ek dhanavan ke sath byah kar chali gayin.
ek din mainne tumhen mahangi poshakon men dekha.
kya tum soch rahi thi ki tumhare bina main apani jan de doonga ? main jan nahin doonga, balki jita rahoonga, taki ek naye samaj ka nirman kar sakoon.
yuvavastha men unhonne yah git likha tha, jo aaj bhi sunane valon ke hriday ko sparsh karata hai.
fir ve gane lage 'jivan boohalishalai aah ...' isi git ko unhonne bangla men bhi gaya.
ve thak gae the.
unhonne ek navodit gayika ki taraf ishara karate hue kaha, 'ghar ki ladaki hai.
do gane sunaegi.
fir main gaunga.
'damana' film ka ek gana bhi sunaegi.' 'damana' men bhoopen hajarika ne apane purane lokapriy giton ko naye andaj men pesh kiya hai.
gayika ne gana shuri kiya 'bijulir pohar mot nai', fir gaya - 'o ram-ram aalata lagaungi ...' bhoopen hajarika ne tali bajakar gayika ki prashansa ki.
ab unhonne fir gana shuroo kiya - 'sagar sang mat katana satoorilo, tathapito huaa nai klant ...' yah git unhen bahut pasand hai.
is git men unaka jivan darshan chhipa huaa hai - sagar sangam men kitana taira main, fir bhi main thaka nahin.
nirantar joojhate rahane ka jivan darshan.
ab ve gane lage - 'bookoo hoom-hoom kare, ghan gham-gham kare o aai ...' gulajar ne film 'roodali' ke lie isaka anuvad kiya hai.
hindi men bhi unhonne gaya - 'dil hoom-hoom kare ...'.
yah git jab khatm huaa to unhonne kaha - 'ebsatrekt pentings ho sakati hai, ebsatrekt film ho sakati hai to ebsatrekt git kyon nahin ho sakata ...'.
isake sath hi apana mashahoor git gane lage - 'vimoort mor nishati jen maunatar sootare bovapa ekhani nila chadar ...' meri vimoort rat mano maun ke dhage se buni hui ek nili chadar hai ....
unhonne kaha - 'mujhe pata chala hai ki aaj ke is karyakram ko intaranet ke jarie duniya bhar men prasarit kiya ja raha hai.
main bahar base asam ke logon ke lie, bharatavasiyon ke lie, vishvavasiyon ke lie gana chahata hoon' - ve gane lage - 'vi aar in d sem bot bradar, vi aar in d sem bot bradar ...' fir isi git ko asamiya men aur bangla men bhi gakar sunaya - 'aami ekhanare navare yatree, aami yatree ekhanare navare ...'.
nana ke ghar ke pas se chhoti nadi 'bharaloo' bahati thi, jo brahmaputr men milati thi.
sabako tairate hue dekh bhoopen ka ji chahata ki vah bhi tairen, magar tairana nahin aata tha.
ek din bhoopen ne dekha ki ek chhoti ladaki nadi men naha rahi hai.
kinare par khade kisi aadami ne kaha ki vah doob jaegi.
bhoopen fauran nadi men kood gaye.
bachchi ne unhen jakad liya.
donon doobane lage.
tabhi ek bihari pulisavale ne unhen pani se bahar nikala.
bahar nikalane ke bad pulis vale ne bhoopen ko dhamakaya ki aainda is tarah ki harakat nahin kare.
usaki dant sunane ke bad balak bhoopen ne tay kar liya ki vah tairana avashy sikhega.
agale din vah ek bans ki sahayata se tairana sikhane laga.
ek ghante tak koshish karane ke bad vah tairana sikh gaya.
jab tairana aa gaya to bhoopen ne tay kiya ki relave ke pul par us samay khada hokar pani men chhalang lagane men bada maja aaega, jab relagadi aa rahi hogi.
usane vaisa hi kiya.
kamakhya steshan se relagadi guvahati ki taraf aa rahi thi.
tabhi bhoopen pani men kood gaya.
tairate hue kinare ke ek ped ke pas pahuncha.
relagadi aage jakar ruk gayi.
gard ne utar kar fatakara, 'marana chahata hai kya ?' bhoopen bhagata huaa nani ke pas pahunch gaya aur sara hal kah sunaya.
gard ne jo fatakara tha, usase balak bhoopen naraj ho gaya tha.
usane tay kiya ki relagadi ko patari se girana hoga, tab us gard ko saja mil jaegi.
agale din bhoopen ne rel ki patari par pattharon ko dher ke roop men rakh diya.
isake bad ghar men aakar khat ke niche chhip gaya aur besabri ke sath relagadi ki pratiksha karane laga.
relagadi ki aavaj sunai padi.
bhoopen ke dil ki dhadakan tej ho gayi.
relagadi teji se gujar gayi.
patari se relagadi utari nahin.
balak bhoopen ne dubara vaisi koshish nahin ki.
chara
nilakant hajarika ka jaldi-jaldi tabadala hone ka prabhav balak bhoopen ki padhai par padana svabhavik tha.
1933 men guvahati ke sonaram skool ki tisari kaksha men bhoopen ka dakhila huaa.
1935 men dhubadi ke praimari skool men bhoopen ka dakhila huaa.
chhah mahine bad hi bhoopen ka dakhila guvahati ke katan kolejiet skool men karavaya gaya.
jahan se panchavin ki padhai poori karane ke bad bhoopen ko pita ke sath tejapur jana pada.
tejapur hai skool ki chhathi kaksha men bhoopen ka dakhila huaa.
1936 se 194॰ tak bhoopen tejapur men raha aur ye char varsh usake jivan ke atyant hi mahatvapoorn varsh sabit hue, kyonki inhin char varshon men bhoopen ke bhitar ki pratibha ko ujagar hone ka mauka mila.
tejapur men us samay asamiya sahity-sanskriti ke do yug purush jyotiprasad agraval aur vishnu rabha sakriy the.
unake prayason se tejapura
men sanskritik vatavaran ban gaya tha.
padmadhar chaliha, parvati prasad baruva jaise gitakar-sangitakar the.
in sabake sampark men aane ke sath hi bhoopen ke bhitar ka kalakar pallavit-pushpit hone laga.
bangali manch par ravindr sangit pratiyogita hui.
tab bhoopen ko keval ek ravindr git gana aata tha, jise gakar bhoopen ne pratham puraskar prapt kiya.
puraskar ke roop men sone ka padak mila.
panch varsh ki umr se bhoopen haramoniyam bajana sikhane laga tha.
tejapur men vishnurabha ne shastreey sangit ki buniyadi baten sikhai.
asam men tab lokagiton evan satron ke nrity-sangit ko pracharit karane ka koi prayas nahin huaa tha.
bangla bhasha ke tarj par foohad aur saste giton ka prachalan ho gaya tha.
jyotiprasad aur vishnurabha is mahaul ko badalane ki koshish kar rahe the.
ve asamiya lokagiton ko janapriy banane ka aandolan chala rahe the.
sangit ke kshetr men naye-naye prayog kar rahe the.
vishnu rabha gajal ke andaj men asamiya men git likhate the aur bhoopen ko sikhate the.
ek aisa hi git tha 'aajali hiyar maje bijuli kan mare, poovar duvar bheli aahe tai kiran dhali, hiya je mor chamake ...' (bhole din men bijali ki tarah van marati hai, poorab ka daravaja kholakar vah kiranen failati hai, mere dil men roshani fail jati hai).
bhoopen chhota tha aur aise giton ka bhavarth samajh pane men asamarth tha.
isake bavajood manch par vah gane laga tha.
bhavishy ke kalakar ko khad-pani milane laga tha.
bhoopen bachapan men hi sochane laga tha ki kya git se samaj ka kuchh upakar kiya ja sakata hai ? skool men chhathi kaksha men padhate hue usane pahala git likha - 'kusumbar putr shreeshankar guru'.
1939 men ek aur git likha - mai agnikumar firingita'.
fir likha - 'kanpi uthe kiy tajamahala'.
tejapur ke van rangamanch par aaye din sanskritik karyakramon ka aayojan hota tha.
bhoopen ke pita bhi natakon men abhinay karate the.
jyotiprasad piaano bajate the.
bhoopen man ke sath karyakram dekhane jata aur mahilaon ki gailari men baithakar karyakram dekhata.
jyotiprasad ke vyaktitv ka us par gahara prabhav pad raha tha.
tabhi bhoopen ko pata chala ki jyotiprasad ne asamiya ki pahali film 'jayamati' banayi thi, halanki tab tak film pradarshit nahin ho payi thi.
jyotiprasad ne van rangamanch ko jivant roop pradan kiya tha.
adhikatar log keval unaki ek jhalak dekhane ke lie aate the.
jab tak jyotiprasad se parichay nahin huaa tha tab tak bhoopen ke man men badi ichchha thi ki kisi tarah jyotiprasad ke karib pahunch jae.
mahapurush shankaradev (asam ke prakhyat vaishnnav sant) ki jayanti ke avasar par bhoopen ki man ne use dhoti-kurta pahanakar jayanti karyakram men ek 'baragita' gane ke lie bhej diya.
man ne bhoopen ko 'baragita' gana sikhaya tha - 'jay jay yadav jalanidhi yadav dhata'.
isase pahale keval panch sal ki umr men bhoopen ne guvahati men manch par pahali bar git gaya tha.
tab asamiya sahity ke janak lakshminath bejabaruva ne mantramugdh hokar use choom liya tha.
doosari bar dhubadi men bhoopen ne gaya tha.
tisari bar tejapur men baragit ka gayan prastut kar bhoopen ne bhoori-bhoori prashansa arjit ki.
log kahane lage ki nilakant hajarika ka ladaka mithe sur men baragit gata hai.
tejapur ke ghar men guvahati se aane vale mehaman thaharate the.
bhoopen tab aathavin ke chhatr the, jab unaka parichay guvahati se aaye kamalanarayan chaudhari se huaa.
kamal bahut achchhe gayak the.
unhonne bhoopen ko ek gajal gana sikha diya.
bhoopen tab chhathi men tha, jab ek din jyotiprasad agraval, vishnu rabha aur fani sharma bhoopen ke pita se milane aaye.
ye tinon vyakti tejapur ke sanskritik aakash ke jhilamilane vale sitare the.
unhonne bataya ki bhoopen ko kalakatta le jana chahate hain aur usaki aavaj men rikard taiyar karana chahate hain.
do din do rat ka safar tay kar bhoopen kalakatta gaye.
rikarding kampani echaemavi ke studiyo men bhoopen ne gaya.
balak bhoopen ke kad ke hisab se maik unchi thi, isalie do lakadi ke bakse jodakar bhoopen ko us par khada kar diya gaya tha.
'jayamati' aur 'shonit kunvari' film ke lie nayika ki aavaj men bhoopen ne git rikard karavae.

isase pahale mastar madan ne kam umr men gane ka kirtiman sthapit.

ab jivit bhittiyon ko dekhakar isamen kuchh satyapan aur sanshodhan bakee the.
par isi bich main dakshin amarika ke bhoo-bhag ke savirami uthan se vahan ke samudr tat par padane vale prabhav ka adhyayan kar raha tha.
sath hi, vanon ke nasht hone aur talachhat ke jamav ka adhyayan bhi jari tha.
isase main prerit huaa ki adhogaman ke prabhav par bhi kuchh likhoon, kyonki yah anuman lagana aasan tha ki moongon ke oopar uthate jane se talachhat par mitti jamati chali gayi hogi.

jab main bimari ke karan kuchh aur nahin kar pata tha to bas yahi karata rahata tha.
san 1842 kee grishm ritu men thode arase ke lie sharir men thodi takat mahasoos kee to narth vels kee yatra par nikal pada taki yah jan sakoon ki badi badi ghatiyon ko pani se bhar dene vale purane gleshiyaron ka kya prabhav pada.
filasfikala maigajina men jo lekh mainne padha us par ek sankshipt aalekh bhi mainne prastut kiya.
is yatra men kisi parvatamala par chadhane ya ghoomane ka kam mainne aakhiri bar kiya kyonki isake bad mera sharir itana mazaboot nahin rah gaya tha ki bhoovaigyanik sarvekshan ke lie zaroori dooriyan tay kar sakoon ya pahadon par chadh sakoon.
landan men jitana jivan mainne guzara, usake shuruaati dinon men sharir men itana dam-kham tha ki main janaral sosayati men ja sakoon.
main kaee vaigyanikon tatha any suprasiddh ya alp prasiddh logon se mila.
yahan main unamen se kuchh ka zikr karoonga, halanki unake vishay men jyada kuchh nahin kahana hai.
apani shadi ke pahale aur bad men mera leyel se sabase jyada milana-julana raha.
mujhe aisa lagata hai ki usaka dimag kafi sulajha huaa tha.
usakee spashtatavadita, sajagata, vivekashilata aur usake lekhon men maulikata, in sabase to yahi prakat hota tha.
main bhoovigyan ke bare men jab bhi usake lekhon ke bare men koee tika tippani kar deta tha to vah tab tak chain nahin leta tha jab tak ki sare mamale ko fir se n dekh le aur kaee bar mujhe bhi pahale ke mukabale adhik dhyan dete hue dekhana pad jata tha.
vah mere sabhi sujhavon par har sambhav prativad karata aur sabhi tark khatm ho jane ke bavajood kafi samay tak sandeh se ghira rahata tha.
usakee doosari visheshata thi, any vaigyanikon ke kam ke sath usakee hardik sanvedana.

vigyan men usakee ruchi badi prabal thi, aur manav-matr kee pragati ke bare men usake bade nek vichar the.
vah bada hi dayalu aur dharmik vishvason ya kuchhek avishvason ko lekar poori tarah se udar tha; lekin tha vah pakka aastik aur bada hi nishpaksha.
laimarik ke vicharon ka virodh karane ke karan use badi khyati mili thi.
lekin baudhape men usane disenta thyori ko apanaya aur apane charitr kee isi visheshata ka parichay diya.

bhoovigyan ab tak hue sabhi vaigyanikon ka jitana rini leyel ka hai, utana shayad kisi aur ka nahin, aisa mera manana hai.
jis samay main bigal kee yatra par jane kee taiyari kar raha tha, to hensalon us samay any bhoovaigyanikon kee hi tarah se sopanik jal-pralay men vishvas karate the.

is tarah ke vicharon ka samarthan kisi aur kitab men mujhe nahin mila.

Hamare priya bhakt Ranbir ki nayi naveli film aayi hai Rockstar.
Kya abhinay kiya hai Ranbir bete ne.
Hamara to man kar raha tha hum bhi apni jaadui chatai mein udte hue chillayein “Sada hak aithe rakh”!!
Ek sachhe aashiq ko jab chot lagti hai to kaise wo tarakki ki taraf badta jaata hai is film mein dekhiye.
Agar aap bhi zindagi mein safal hona chahte hain to bhakton pehle kisi se behad mohobbat karo baad mein apna dil tudva lo, are-are aisa hum nahi kehte, aisa is film mein dikhaya gaya hai.
Aur is film ki naayika arthaat heroine ne to hamare dil mein chhuriyan chala dee.
Na chahte hue bhi hum poore cinema ghar mein akele-akele sitiyan maar rahe the.
Kya sundarta hai nayika ke chehre mein, hum to ek dum mantra mugdh ho uthe the bhakton.
Aur jab Ranbir beta apna sangeet utpaadak yantra arthaat apna guitar bajata tha to humara bhi man kar raha tha ki hum bhi ab kahin jaakar apna china wala guitar bajayein.
Ranbir aur Nargis ne jis tarah ki prem leela ki hai use dekhkar to hame bhi apni pehli waali mehbooba ki yaad aa gayi.
Hum bhi aise hi pahadon ki vaadiyon mein raas leela rachaya karte the.
Hum bhi kahan apni jawani ke dino mein pahuch gaye.
To bhakton dil lagane se kya faayde aur nuksaan ho sakte hain yadi ye jaanna ho to zaroor dekhiye Rockstar, aur aap bhi boliye “Sada hak aithe rakh”

mareej ko dil ka bhayankar daura paDa tha aur mareej ke aspataal pahunchane se pahale hee yamadoot apana kaam kar ge the.
usane mareej kee nabj dekhee jo mahasoos nahee huee, dil kee dhaDakane sunee jo gaayab thee aur ghoshit kar diya ki mareej ko aspataal me mart avastha me laaya gaya.
mareej ke sampann parivaar jano ko yah khaasa naagavaar gujara aur unhonne halla machaaya ki mareej ka ilaaj uchit prakaar nahee hua aur ek prashikshu ke haatho galat ilaaj se mareej ko bachaaya nahee ja saka.

Hamare Ishu Maseeh ne ek pavitra manushye, ek dhaarmik purush ko chuna, jo Unke susamachaar ke purnata ki Punahsthaapna kar sakta tha.
Usne Joseph Smith ko chuna.
Jab Bhavishyevakta Joseph Smith 17 ke umra ke the, ek devdut ne Joseph se pehla bhent kiya use naam se pukaara aur usse kaha ki woh, Moroni, ek shubhchintak hai jo Parmeshwar ki upasthiti se aaya hai aur kaha ki Parmeshwar ne uske liye kuch kaam diya hai.
Kalpana kijiye Joseph ne kya socha hoga jab us devdut ne use batlaya ki “sansaar ke har ek desh, jaati aur bhaasha ke log use bhala bura kahenge.”1 Shaayad Joseph ke aankhon ka achambha dekh Moroni ne dohraya, ki sansaar ke sabhi log use bhala bura kahenge.2
Joseph Smith ke baare mein achcha kahawat aahista se aaya; buri kahawat turant shuru ho gayi.
Joseph ne likha, “Kitna niraala hai ki ek gumnaam ladke … ko laayak samjha gaya  … aur yogye mein mahimaa moh lena ...
ki woh sabse kadwa atyachaar hai.”3
Jab ki Joseph ke prati logon ka pyaar badhta gaya, anye log unke virodh bante gaye.
38 varsh ke umar mein, 150 aadmiyon ke giroh, jinke chehre pe kaala rang tha, dwara uski hatya ho gayi thi.4 Jabki Bhavishyevakta ka jiwan achaanak khatam ho gaya, Joseph ke khilaaf bhala aur bura baat abhi shuru hi ho raha tha.
Kya hamein ashcharyechakit hona chahiye ki uske khilaaf bura kaha jaa raha hai? Devdut Paul ko paagal aur dimaag kharaab kaha jaata tha.5 Hamare Priye Uddhaarkarta, Parmeshwar ke Putra ko, petu, piyakkad, aur usmein dushtaatma hai kaha gaya tha.6
Prabhu ne Joseph ko uska bhaagye batlaaya tha:
“Dharti ke kone kone ke log tumhara naam puchenge, aur murakh log tumhara hasi udaaenge, aur narak tumhari or tezi se faelega;
“Jabki jo hriday se pavitra hai, … budhimaan, … aur dhaarmik log, tumhare haathon … se ashirvaad dhoondhege.”7
Prabhu kyun achchaai aur buraai ko ek saath ghatne deta hai? Ek vajah hai ki Parmeshwar ke vastuwon ke khilaaf jaa kar sachchaai ki khoj karne waale apne ghutnon par ho ke jawaab dhoondhte hai.8
Joseph Smith Punahsthaapna ka Bhavishyevakta hai.
Uska dhaarmik kaarye shuru hua jab Pita aur Putra use dikhe, jiske baad kayi anye swarg ke dut unse mile.
Woh Parmeshwar ke haathon mein saadhan bana pavitra dharamshaastra, nazarandaaz kiye aur khoya hua dharamsiddhaant, aur purohiti ko saamne laane ke liye.
Budhimaani se zyaada kuch hona chahiye yeh janne ke liye ki Joseph ka kaam kyun avashyak tha; iske liye hamein Joseph ki tarah, “Parmeshwar se maangna chahiye.”9 Aatmik sawaalon ke aatmik jawaab hotein hai Parmeshwar ke dwara.
Kayi log jo Punahsthaapna ke kaam mein nahin vishwaas karte hai nahin jaan paate ki swarg dut dharti par insaanon se baatein karte hai.
Woh kehte hai yeh namumkin hai, ki sone ke patte ek devdut dwara pahunchaae gaye the aur Parmeshwar ke shakti dwara anuwaad kiya gaya tha.
Use vishwaas na karne se, woh jald Joseph ke gawahi ko thukraate hai, aur durbhaagye se kuch log Bhavishyevakta ke jiwan ko badnaam karne ka paap karte hai aur unke charitra ke baare mein jhoot bolte hai.
Hum khaas kar udaas ho jaate hai jab woh jo kabhi Joseph se prem karta tha apne gawaahi se mukar jaata aur phir Bhavishyevakta ke baare mein bure shabd kehta hai.10
“Elder Neal  A.
Maxwell ne ek baar kaha tha, “Girjaghar ke baare mein un logon se seekhna jo Girjaghar se nikal gaye hai, us tarah hoga “jaise Ishu ke baare mein Judas se salaah lena.
Jo ab girjaghar nahin aate hamein apne baare mein zyaada batlaate hai aur jisse woh nikle hai(girjaghar) uske baare mein kam batlaate hai.”11
Ishu ne kaha, “Apne baeriyon se prem rakho, … aur apne satanewaalo ke liye prarthna karo.”12 Chalo hum unpar daya karein jo Joseph Smith ki aalochna karte hai, hum apne hriday mein jaante hai ki Joseph Parmeshwar ka bhavishyevakta tha aur hum samajhte hai ki yeh sab Moroni ne pehle batlaya tha.
Hamein us vyakti ko kaise jawaab dena chahiye jo Bhavishyevakta Joseph Smith ke baare mein sune ya padhe hue galat baaton se pareshaan hai? Zaroor, hum humesha swagat kartein hain, sachche aur sahi swaalon ka.
Joseph ke charitra ke baare mein sawaal aayein, hum un hazaron logon ke shabdon ko kahe jinhonne unhein niji rup se jaana tha aur jinhonne apna jaan diya taaki unke dwara sthaapit hue kaam ko pura kar sakein.
John Taylor, jise chaar baar goli maari gayi thi us giroh ke dwara jisne Joseph ko maara tha, wohi baad mein ghoshna karega: “Mai gawahi deta hoon Parmeshwar, devduton, aur manushyon ke samaksh, ki [Joseph] ek achche, aadarniye, [aur] dharmaatma vyakti the—…[aur] ki uska niji aur saarvajanik charitra doshrahit tha—aur ki woh Parmeshwar ke bhakt ke tarah jeeta aur marta tha.”13
Hamein us imaandari prashanktra vyakti ko yaad dilaana chahiye ki Internet jaankari “sachchai” filter nahi hai.
Kuch jaankaariyaan, bhale kinti bhi vishwaasniye lage, sachchaai nahin hai.
Kai saal pehle mainne ekTime megazin ka article padha ki kisi ne ek patra paaya hai, shaayad Martin Harris dwara likha hua, jismein Joseph Smith ne jaise kaha use Mormon Dharamshaastra mila tha uske khilaaf tha.14
Girjaghar ke kuch sadasyon ne is patra ke kaaran girjaghar aana hi chod diya.15
Afsos, woh bahut jald chale gaye.
Mahinon baad visheshagyon ne paaya (aur jaalsaaj ne batlaya) ki woh patra ek dhoka tha.16 Tum jo khabron mein sunte ho uspar sawaal kar sakte ho, par kabhi bhi Parmeshwar ke bhavishyevaktaaon ke gawahi par sandeh mat karna.
Hum jaanch karne waale ko bata sakte hai ki Joseph ke baare mein kuch jaankaari, jabki sach ho, shaayad kisi alag tarah se pesh ho jo uske dinon aur haalaathon ko dekh kar nahin batlaaya jaata hai.
Elder Russell M.
Nelson ne is baat ko samjhaya tha.
Usne kaha: “Mai United States sarkaar ke liye chikitsak tha unke Atlanta, Georgia ke National Center for Disease Control mein.
Ek baar jab mai taxi ka intazaar kar raha tha ek bhentvarta ke baad taaki woh mujhe hawai-adda le jaa sake, mai zameen par let gaya kuch dhup lene ke liye waapas Utah ke thandi mausam mein jaane se pehle.
… Baad mein mujhe daak dwara ek tasveer mila mera jab mai leta tha jo koi chitrakaar ne dur se khincha tha ek khaas telephoto lens waale camera se.
Uske niche tha ek likhawat, ‘National Center ka Sarkaari Chikitsak.’ Tasveer to sach tha, likhawat bhi sach tha, par sachchaai ka istemaal kiya gaya galat nazariya pesh karne ke liye.”17 Jo hum jaante hai ki sach hai use hum nahin phenk dete kyunki kuch baaton ko hum abhi samajhte hi nahin.
Hum jaanch karne waale ko yaad dilaaenge ki Joseph ek hi insaan nahin tha jisne devduton se bhent kiya.
Mormon Dharamshaastra ke gawaahon ne likha, “Hum gambheerta ke saath yeh bhi suchit karte hai ki Parmeshwar ka ek dut swarg se niche aaya aur … humne un swarn pushto tatha unmein khodi hui lipi ko apni aankhon se dekha hai.”18 Hum kayi anye gawahiyon ko bhi dohraa sakte hai.19
Ek jaanch karne waale ko punahsthaapit susamachaar ko baatne ke kaam ko Prabhu ke kaam ka parinaam ki tarah dekhna chahiye jo Bhavishyevakta ke zariye utpann hua.
Ab duniya mein 29,000 bhaktgan ke dalein hai aur 88,000 prachaarakein hai duniya bhar mein susamachaar sikhlaate hue.
Laakhon Antim-din Sant ab Ishu Maseeh ke uddharan anusaar jeena chahate hai, sammaanit jiwan, gareebon ki dekhbhaal, aur dusron ki sewa karne ke liye apna samay aur gunon ka istemaal karna.
Ishu ne kaha:
“Achcha ped bura fal nahin laa sakta, aur na nikamma ped achcha fal laa sakta hai.
…
“…Is prakaar unke falon se tum unhein pehchaan loge.”20
Yeh varnan phuslaane laayak hai, par jaanch karne waale ko sirf unhi par bharosa karke apne sachchaai ke khoj ko ant nahin karna hai.
Har ek vishwaasi ko Bhavishyevakta Joseph Smith ke divye mission aur charitra ke dhaarmik pushtikaran ki zaroorat hai.
Yeh sach hai har ek peedhi ke liye.
Dhaarmik sawaalon ke dhaarmik jawaab chahiye Parmeshwar se.
Haal hi mein main United States ke Purabi tat par tha, ek mission samaapt kiye prachaarak ne mujhse ek dost ke baare mein kaha jo Bhavishyevakta Joseph Smith ke baare mein jaankaari paakar niraash ho gaya tha.
Woh kayi baar baat kar chuke the, aur us prachaarak ke bhi mann mein sandeh paeda hone laga tha in baatcheeton ke kaaran.
Mainne to socha tha woh apne dost ko mazboot karega, mujhe uske apne gawaahi ki chinta ho rahi thi.
Bhaaiyon aur bahanon, mai tumhe saodhaan karna chahata hoon: tum auron ki madad nahin kar sakoge agar tumhara apna vishwaas surakshit nahin hai apni jagah par.
Kuch saptaah pehle mai Dakshin America mein ek hawaijahaaj par gaya.
Hawaijahaaj sahayak ne hamara dhyaan ek suraksha vidio ki or moda.
Hamein chetaoni di gayi thi, “Aysa hoga to nahin, par agar jahaaj ka pressure badle, tumhare seat ke upar ka bhaag khulega, aur oxygen mask dikhenge.
Agar aysa hua, aage badhiye aur ek mask ko apni or khinchiye.
Mask ko apne naak aur muh ke upar rakhiye.
Elastic rassi ko apne sir ke upar pehne aur mask ko theek karkepehne.” Uske baad yeh chetaoni: “Dyaan rakhiye ki aap apne mask pahen liya hai kisi aur ko madad karne se pehle.”
Jo buraai hui thi Bhavishyevakta Joseph Smith ke baare mein badhti rahengi jaise Uddhaarkarta ka Dusra Aagman nazdeek aata hai.
Woh aadhe-sachchaai waali baatein aur chatur dhoke kam nahin honge.
Kuch tumhare parivaar aur dost honge jinhe madad ki zaroorat hogi.
Abhi samay hai apne dhaarmik oxygen mask ko theek karne ka taaki tum tayyaar raho sachchaai ki khoj kar rahe anye logon ki madad karne ke liye.21
Bhavishyevakta Joseph Smith ki gawahi hum sab ke paas alag alag dhang se aayegi.
Woh shaayad ghutno par prarthna karte samay aayega, Parmeshwar se puchte samay ki woh ek sachcha bhavishyevakta tha.
Woh shaayad Bhavishyevakta ke Pehle Drishti ka varnan karte samay aayega.
Baar baar Mormon Dharamshaastra padhne se tumhare hirday mein ek gawahi sama sakti hai.
Woh tab aayega jab tum Bhavishyevakta ke baare mein apna gawahi de rahe ho ya jab tum mandir mein khade ho aur yeh samjhoge ki Joseph Smith ke zariye pavitrata badhaane ki shakti dharti par waapas aayi thi.22 Vishwaas aur achchi abhilaasha se, Bhavishyevakta Joseph Smith ki tumhari gawahi mazboot ho jaaegi.
Maedaan ke baahar se paani se humesha gubbaaro ke khel tumhe bigho sakte the, par woh kabhi bhi tumhari vishwaas ki jalti jwala ko bujha nahin sakti thi.
Aaj jo yuva log sunn rahe hai ya anewaale dinon mein in shabdon ko padhoge, ko main ek khaas chunaoti deta hai: Bhavishyevakta Joseph Smith ki gawahi khud haasil karo.
Apne aawaaz ko, Moroni ke bhavishvaani anusaar, Bhavishyevakta ke baare mein achcha kehne ke liye istemaal karo.
Yeh hai do sujhaao: Pehle, Mormon Dharamshaastra mein woh shaastra dhoondhiye jo tum mehsoos karte aur jaante ho ki ekdam sach hai.
Tab use parivaar aur doston ke saath gharelu shaam sabha, seminary, aur apne Jawaan Purush aur Jawaan Mahilaaon ki kakshaaon mein batlaao, yeh kehte hue ki Joseph Parmeshwar ke haath ka saadhan tha.
Iske baad, Bhavishyevakta Joseph Smith ki gawahi padhiye Pearl of Great Price ya is patrika mein, jo ab 158 bhaashaaon mein uplabdh hai.
Tum ise online paa sakte ho LDS.org par ya prachaarakon ke paas.
Yeh Joseph ki apni gawahi hai jismein har waardaat likha hai.
Aksar ise padhe.
Joseph Smith ke gawahi ko apne aawaaz mein record kijiye, use lagataar suniye, aur doston ko sunaae.
Bhavishyevakta ke gawahi ko apne hi aawaaz mein sunne se tumhe sahayta milega gawahi ko badhaane mein.
Aage chal ke badhiya aur anokhe din aayenge.
Pradhaan Thomas S.
Monson ne kaha: “Yeh mahaan kaaran … aage badhta rahega, jiwanon ko badalta aur ashirvaad deta hua.
… Duniya ki koi bhi shakti Parmeshwar ke kaarye ko nahin rok sakta hai.
Chaahe jo bhi ho, yeh mahaan kaarye aage badhta rahega.”23
Mai aapko apni gawahi deta hoon ki Ishu hi Maseeh hai, hamare Uddhaarkarta aur Muktidaata.
Usne ek pavitra manushye, ek dhaarmik purush ko chuna, jo Unke susamachaar ke purnata ki Punahsthaapna kar sakta tha.
Usne Joseph Smith ko chuna.
Mai gawahi deta hoon ki Joseph Smith ek aadarniye aur dharmaatma aadmi the, Prabhu Ishu Maseeh ka chela.
Pita Parmeshwar aur Unke Putra, Ishu Maseeh, unko dikhe the.
Usne Mormon Dharamshaastra ko Parmeshwar se di gayi uphaar aur shakti ke dwara anuwaad kiya.
Hamare samaaj mein mrityu ke parde ke piche, hum achchi tarah samajh jaaenge Bhavishyevakta Joseph Smith ke pavitra niyukti aur divye mission ke baare mein.
Us din, jo ab-door-nahin hai, tum aur mai aur “[kayi]laakhon anye log ‘Bhaai Joseph’ ko dobara jaanenge.”24 Ishu Maseeh ke naam se, amen.

samaroh ki adhyakshata samakalin janamat ke pradhan sanpadak ramaji ray ne ki.
unaki pratinidhi kavitaon par samalochanatmak tippani karate hue arun kamal ne apane vaktavy men kaha ki yogendr krishna ki kavitaen sanpoorn hindi kavy-paranpara men ek naya adhyay jodati hain.
unhonne kaha ki bit chuke shahar men ki kavitaon men aaj ka hinsak hota samajik paridrishy ek nae muhavare men ujagar huaa hai.
aayojan ki shuruaat karate hue kavi shahanshah aalam ne kaha ki yogendr krishna ke is rachanatmak sahas ko ve salam karate hain.
is avasar par samikshak om nishchal ne pustak ki antarvastu par vistar se charcha karate hue kaha ki aathaven dashak se hi bihar ka kavy-paridrishy kafi samriddh huaa hai.
pustak men sankalit kavitaon ki charcha karate hue unhonne kaha ki inaki kai kavitaen moolyon ke tootane ka dard bayan karate hue vartaman samay ko roopantarit karati hain.
yatharth ko bunane ka unaka ek apana tarika hai.
ve nepathy ki gatividhiyon ko sanjidagi se darj karate hain.
unhonne kavi ki subah ke paksh men, hatyare jab buddhijivi hote hain, hatyare jab masiha hote hain, bit chuke apane shahar men, poorvajon ke garbh men thahara samay, kam pad rahin barooden tatha dilli men pahali bar jaisi kavitaon ki vishesh charcha karate hue kaha ki in kavitaon ke madhyam se kavi apane samay ke bade prashnon se muthabhed karata dikhata hai.
unhonne kaha ki apani kavitaon men yogendr bilakul hi nae evan maulik muhavare ke sath prastut hue hain.
ye kavitaen inhen agrim pankti ke samakalin kaviyon ke bich khada karati hain.
apane adhyaksheey vaktavy men samakalin janamat ke pradhan sanpadak ramaji ray ne kaha ki yogendr krishna ne apani hatyara sirij ki kavitaon men samay ki jo barikiyan darj ki hain ve behad dilachasp hain.
samaroh ka samapan kathakar shivadayal ne apane dhanyavad-gyapan ke sath kiya.
is avasar par ravindr rajahans, kumar mukul, vinay kumar, sanjay kumar kundan, bhagavati prasad dvivedi, sudhir suman, javed hasan, em ke madhu, musafir baitha, arun narayan samet shahar ke anek sudhi pathak, sahityakar evan buddhijivi upasthit the.
ravindr vyas hariyali ke chitere hain.
aise men jab manushy hariyali aur paryavaran se door hota ja raha hai, vo kankrit ke jangalon men hariyali ko harata ja raha hai, tab ravindr vyas kee kalakritiyan darshakon kee aakhon men hariyali kee tripti pradan karati hain.
aankhon aur man ko rahat milati hai aur chahunor hariyali ka aabhas sa hota hai.
ravindr vyas kee kalakritiyon ka aadhar hi hariyali aur hara rang hai.
hare rang ke alava ikka dukka rang hi inakee kalakritiyon men jhalakate hain.
ravindr vyas kee kalakritiyon men bhale hi ekarasata (monotonas) v ek binbata ka ahasas yada kada ho jata ho, magar ye bat bhi tay hai ki aadami hariyali aur jangal kee chhata se kabhi bor nahin hota.
 ravindr vyas apane chitron ke madhyam se hariyali kee apratim chhata bikherane men bakhoobi safal rahe hain.
hariyali ke chitere ravindr vyas ke chuninda chitron kee pradarshani bhopal ke saral aart gailari men chal rahi hai jo 17 aktoobar sham tak jari rahegi.
